1b1(rnying rgyud): rgya gang skad du/ sa ma ya sarba bi ti a nu sa rbas nAM tan+ta bi ma la rA nAn+tu/ bod skad du/ dam tshig thams cad
1b2(rnying rgyud): kyi nyams chag skong pa'i lung / bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal
1b3(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis zlos pa'i dus gcig na/ rim la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse mo/ seng ge'i za 'gram lta bur gyur pa'i gnas/
1b4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i khang par nga byung du grub pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje/ sku gsum
1b5(rnying rgyud): gyi ston pa rnams kyi gsung gi tshogs ma lus par spyad cing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'gro ba rnams kyi bla ma chen por gyur pa de la/ 'khor du gyur
2a1(rnying rgyud): na tu kun du tu
2a2(rnying rgyud): tsho ga 'dzin gyi rtsa la pa kraSh+ka ma stan las langs te phyag nal 'byor gyi glegs su byas nas/ 'di skad ces 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu gsal/ kye ho pal ldan rdo rje gsang pa'i
2a3(rnying rgyud): bdun/ bya skrod nal 'thonas med pa'i// rgyud la gnas pa nal 'byor ba'i// gzhi 'dzin srung btsog 'du'o// / nyi ce sa d+hag paskang bshegs chog rnams/ byi byas pa
2a4(rnying rgyud): tu // sa sas 'i das pa pa rgya sa gas pa / na
2b1(rnying rgyud): bams 'anas nam klun// gzhisungs namathabs 'badug/ da la bshad rgyas lags par nyu// zhes ga sungs dasmra/ ma ba na pa n+d+ha gang buzhes zla 'dzinam rnamam
2b2(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// sngon 'das pa'i dus dran pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas/ ston pa chos kyi sgra dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sgra dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i
2b3(rnying rgyud): dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / sku lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sku bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyud dag pa'i zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsungs pa'i rgyud sde mang po dang / chud ma dag pa la sgrub pa'i
2b4(rnying rgyud): ka rnams kyis/ nu tra la sogs pa rnams yang dag pa'i sa la gung bstan pa'i dus na/ 'gyod tshangs kyi smre sngags brjod pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi rig 'dzin pho mo mang pos gsungs pa'i bshags pa rnams gsang ba'i dam tshig
2b5(rnying rgyud): slong ba'i cho gar gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig 'dzin dang rU tra 'khor dang bcas pa'i bshags pa rnams kyi rgyud chen po'i de gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung ba
2b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas gsungs pa dang / rU tra la sogs pa dregs pa can dpag tu med pas 'gyod bshags phul ba dang /
2b7(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis bshags pa'i thabs rnams bshad par zhu/ 'gro ba'i don du gsungs/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams la phan pa'i don du shod/ ces zhus
3a1(rnying rgyud): so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yin pas rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags pa rnams rgya ba shags pa'i don dbye ba 'di gsung dam/
3a2(rnying rgyud): kye ho yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam la gnas pa'i bla ma dam pa ni bzhi zhig yod de/ de yang gang zhen/ gyi sgo 'dogs yongs su gcod par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang / nang rang byung gi ye shes
3a3(rnying rgyud): ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang / gsang ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang / mthar thag de kho na nyid kyi chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i bla ma da
3a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dam pa de dag gi lam la gnas par bya ba 'ang rnam pa gsum yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs ston par byed pa dang / lam nyams su len pa'i gdams ngag ston par
3a5(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang / 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i don ston par byed pa'o// dam pa de'i lam rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba ma gtogs pa'i bshags pa bya ba dang / khyad par du yang ma dag pa'i snang ba dang / nyams kyi
3a6(rnying rgyud): snang ba dang / dag pa'i snang ba rnams ma rtogs pa dang / kun gzhi rgyu'i rgyud dang / lam thabs kyi rgyud dang / phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud ma rtogs pa dang / rgya'i rnal 'byor dang / lam gyi rnal 'byor
3a7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor mi rtogs pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa lung gi tshad mi dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyams myong rjes su dran pa'i tshad ma / tha ma rdo rje slob dpon snya khung brgyud/
3b1(rnying rgyud): pa lan dag gi tshang ma dang / dngos po'i mtha' rtan kyang 'thabral bar 'jung pal rgyas kyi chud ma mnags pa smra/ du dgacugs par bya ba'i phyir 'di dag bshad de/ dbang gi chub ma nub pa dang / thon rlabs kyi btud pa ma
3b2(rnying rgyud): nyams pa dang / gdams ngag gi sargas lag pa dang / mos gus kyi bsam pa tshems par nus pa'i phyir/ phyi'i rten 'brel dang / nang gi rten 'brel dang / gsang ba'i rten 'bre ba dang / mthar thug ro lo nyid kyi rton 'brel
3b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrigs nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' tshad ma dang / bla ma'i man ngag tshad ma dang / rang gi rig pa tshad mas gtan la phab ste/ blta ba'i dug phyung / bsgom pa'i bdud rtsi bsten/ spyod pa la dor nas gsang sngag gsang
3b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam la zhugs pa rnams la/ dam tshig nyams chag byung bar gyur na theg pa la ma zhugs kyi bshags pa dang / na rag dong sbugs kyi bshags pa dang / brjod med dang / dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bshags pa dang / rdo rje dpal chen dang / ye shes mkha'
3b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro dang / zhi ba sangs rgyas dang / khro bo khrag 'thung dang / rU tra'i smre bshags dang / rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa dang / blta ba'i klong bshags dang / dbang bzhi rdzogs pa thabs lam gyi bshags pa dang / 'bras bu'i don rtogs sku gsung
3b6(rnying rgyud): thugs su byung ba'i bshags pa rnams bshad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
3b7(rnying rgyud): kyis theg pa la ma thugs kyi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// oM dang por bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// yul la chags pa skye bar mi bgyid de// pha dang ma la brten nas gzugs su snang // rang dbang med par 'jig rten
4a1(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di mthong // ma rig chung zhing gzhon pa'i dus mtshams na// gti mug dbang gis dge sdig don ma rtogs// 'dod chags dbang gis pha rol 'khor bar 'khyams// zhe sdang dbang gis sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis// ngan pongs
4a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i rgyu bsags te// mno bsam shes nas chos la skyabs su mchi// dang bas nya stong dus drug sgor zhugs te// nye stong chos brgyad dus khrims mnos pa las// de la nyams pa'i skyon sems ma mchis te// nya stong tshul bzhin sung ba'i dge 'asnyen
4a3(rnying rgyud): pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis skor zhugs nas// nyan thos sdom pa tshul bzhin ma nos pa las// rtsub bzhi dang yan pag drug la sogs// nyis brgya lnga bcur khrim
4a4(rnying rgyud): mchis// nyan thos 'dul khrims srung ba'i dge slong la// nyams po bka' yi chang pa byung na bshags// de nas la ral tho sems cher smos nas// rten 'brel bcu gnyis bgrub pa'i sgor zhugs te// rang rgyal sdom pa tshul bzhin ma ba las//
4a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin med par mngon rtogs shing // snang srid sgyu ma lta bur shes pas na// de la nyams par bya ba'i sngon ma mchis// rang rgyal sdom pa srung ba'i dge slong la// nyams pa bka' ye chad pa byung na bshags// de nas par la blo sems tshar skyes nas// jen chen bya
4a6(rnying rgyud): bsems kyi sgor zhugs te// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa mnos pa las// sngon 'jug kun rdzob don dam byang chub sems// sdom pa nyi shu'i tshul khrims skyon ma mchis// de la nyams pa'i skyon lha ma mchis na// sdom brtson tshul bzhin srung ba'i dge slong
4a7(rnying rgyud): la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// dag pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sgor zhugs te// kri ya di mchog tshul bzhin mnos pa las// dkon mchog gsum dang rdo rje slob dpon dang // rdo rje rdun da
4b1(rnying rgyud): ming sring dang // de bzhin rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// de la nyams pa'i sgron lha ma mchis na// kri ya'i dam tshig srung ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la zla sems cher skyes nas// u pa ya yi
4b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig sker zhugs nas// phyag rgya sngags dang man ngag sgrub pa yi// blta spyod kri yog tshul srung rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// blta spyod rnam pa gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas// yo ga
4b3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig tshul bzhin mnos pa las// dkon mchog gsum dang de 'khor byang chub sems// rdo rje bla ma mched dang lham dral dang // dbang thob rnal 'byor gzhan la mi spyod cing // rang rtags phyag rgya rtag tu srung ba la// de la nyams pa'i skyon lha ma mchis na//
4b4(rnying rgyud): yo ga'i dam tshig srung ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas// ma hA yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das
4b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos// yab lnga dang ni yum lngar sbyor bas na// rgyal ba'i dam tshig mchog tu gsungs pa las// ma hA yo gasrung ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyi sgor
4b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas// a nu yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las// phyi nang snang srid dus gsum thams cad kun// rang rig ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan te// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'chang byed cing // a nu yo gsung ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na
4b7(rnying rgyud): bshags// de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas// khyab gdal chen po theg pa'i sgor zhugs nas// a ti yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las// med pa'i dam tshig dang ni phyal pa dang // gcig pu'i dam tshig dang ni lhun gyis rdzogs// grangs dang phyogs las
5a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dam tshig la// rtul ba rnams kyis da mchog mchog tu gaspangs// bsrung mtshams med pas med pa'i dam cho ga la// gzung dang 'dzin pa med pas byul pa yin// thams cad sems su 'dus pas gcig byed/
5a2(rnying rgyud): lhag ma med par 'dus pas lhun gyis rdzogs// de la nyams pa'i skyon sem mchis na// a ti yo ga sung ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags// sde snyed rnam pa gsum gyi bsrung byani// tshul khrims rnam par dag pas 'dul mthar phye
5a3(rnying rgyud): rang dbang mngon du gyur pas mngon mthar phyin// shes rab rnam dag mdo sde'i mtha' du phyin// phyi yi lce sbyin sde 'irgyad srung ma rnams// dam tshig nyams par gyur na mthol po baM shags// pri yo ka rnam pa gsum gyi dasu byani// dag pa rnam gsum kri ya mtha' du phyin
5a4(rnying rgyud): blta spyod gnyis med u pa ya mthar phyin// sum du lha yi skur gsal rnal 'byor mtha'// dpal mgon bdun cu la sogs srung ma rnams// dam chog nyams par gyur na mthal lo bshags// yo ga dam gsum dam tshig bsung rtse ni// rtsa ba yan lag srung badz+ral
5a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor che// sgrub pa khyad par dam tshig a nu'i mthab// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi rdzogs chen po// nang dang gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad rnams// dam tshig nyams par gyur na mthol lo bshags// mtshan nyid sde snod gsum dang theg pa gnyis// phyi ba thub pa rgyud la gri
5a6(rnying rgyud): yoka gsum// nang pa thabs kyi rgyud la yog gsum// theg pa rim pa dgu yi dam tshig rnams// blta sprod 'brel bar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la// mkha' 'gro bka' yi chad pa ci ste bcang // dbang phyug zugs kyi sprul pa ci ste dgye// rgyu 'bras ma spangs dge ba
5a7(rnying rgyud): dang du brangs// rig pas spyad rnam par sprin la 'jom// bka' bzhur ma por rlud lung ma ni ngag dbrangs// yal bar mdor gzhung bzhin dang du blangs// lus ngag yid gsum btud nas gsang sdigs tshes// sgom sgrub spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug sa//
5b1(rnying rgyud): tA cho ga nyams cag byung na bskung gyur cig/ rtsa ba yan lag pam ltung nyas byas dang // sbom po bla mo la sogs nyes skyon rnams// skyon du gyur pa thams cad mangs par mdzod// mchog dang thun mod dngos gru bstsal drugasol// ya shes smra la das rgyags ma par yang /
5b2(rnying rgyud): de 'bor bka' mi srung ma de mchog can// thugs dang 'gal bar byar na brjod pa dgas so// yun gyi sgrib pa ma chis nazhib pa skyongs// dpral gyi rkyen grags paji sa na rkyen gegs pazlo/ cings pa mchog gi dngas thab sa ma drugs pa// des gsungs so//
5b3(rnying rgyud): med rgya'abo bshags pa'i skyed las/ theg pa la mthugs kyi pa shags pa ske'i zhwa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos snron mi rnas pAn+d+ha sbyin pa spangs pa sgra'i bu'i rnal 'thor la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gan tu bzang po chen pos bzhi
5b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / phyogs btsun bzhugs pa rnams kyis zhus pa ni 'di lta ste/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rig 'dzin po mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu brkyangs phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan
5b5(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / che mchog he ru ka la sogs pa rigra gA'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams la gsol pa/ bdag cag rnams rang bzhin rdzu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi gral du 'khod de/ gsang ba'i theg pa chen po
5b6(rnying rgyud): 'di la spyod cing / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / che mchog ge ru ka la sogs pa rnams kyi zhal mthong zhing / phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gyi sa la lhun gyis grub par 'tshal ba rnams nyams pa dang / chag pa dang / bag chags ngan pas
5b7(rnying rgyud): bsgribs te mchis pa la/ nyams chag dang rtog sleb srung ba'i thabs gsol zhing zhun gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rig 'dzin po mo rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta bu'i
6a1(rnying rgyud): gsu gas na tshug / yang ga dgas hA/ na ma/ pa pas sug na
6a2(rnying rgyud): dang mtha bsgrub pa'i gnas 'dis bu'i klu bab d+h-ims par yang dka'an/ sa ba sgrub ba nga/ sa pa 'i sa dgas/ 'dan pa dag thab ma 'dzin bags pa dpagasu ma pa dzin nas stongs spangs pa la
6a3(rnying rgyud): dang / skal par ldan pa 'ga'ading 'ga'i spyod yul len gyi/ gang rang chu na ma thun pang ni ma yin no// de lta bu'o sgo thugs pa'i rnam 'byor ba mnyams rgya gdang ga N+DI bskyang ba'i rnabs med pa rna ma yin te/ thabs ni yod do// nyan thos kyi zag pa
6a4(rnying rgyud): ma nyis bya na/ gas bye na badri pas med pa sa ma kyi 'a gas pa pa sa dang yang tsha smra sbyinas 'dab ma gtung rnams kyang ma sa ya dang / gas
6a5(rnying rgyud): dpyi nga ka gsung ba dang rnams cag zung dgas dang la sa pa dang 'jam/ ska ga po pa'i thab ma yong // de pa nga thun na/ rnal 'byor gyi hrI ma ngan song ngo zugs zhes thab bzugs pa// de nas phyogs brtan sa lhags pa sa
6a6(rnying rgyud): kyang du l+h+wag can po rnams kyis/ ma 'du 'das dpal 'an tu bab ba la 'di na kyis gas to// la // da sa da po// rgyal ga/ namams kyi yan thas la bang te/ brkyangs thag la na du la nas
6a7(rnying rgyud): kyis gas // dpal pa nga rnal cir byem sa pachig dag pa byed pa'i phyi sa sa na mings smon pa dag nas rab gas na rgya bka gsang b.las pang shi kyis gsang pa bdug sa pa
6b1(rnying rgyud): nas gsal pa dang / de nas snyan pa kun tu bzang bas rnal 'byor pa rnams la bka' stsal ba/ bsnyen sgrub rnam pa can ma gang zhugs pa'i rnal 'byung mam rnams la skyer ngam chag ga bsung ma tshams bsam skyes ni/ khyab pa zhag bzhag kun/ dadag can
6b2(rnying rgyud): cing rtsa ba'i da kyig gsum du 'dzum mo// de yang lus dag yid gsum du 'dus te/ lus ngag yed gsum mi sgo nas nyams chag byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i srag sung thugs kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis stong pa'i thabs ni bzhugs so// yid gi nonas ma
6b3(rnying rgyud): chag kya na/ thugs kyi blta bas pas ste/ rnal 'byor d+hi gal 'dir 'tshod pa rnams kyi yid dam sems ni dran dam par thugs yang dag pa'i yo zhes nyid yin la/ yang dag pa'i ye shes ni nga gi gnag ni kyang chub kyi semam+b+ha yin te/ phan gzhis bcom pa la yid rang byung /
6b4(rnying rgyud): na da sa gyin/ da pa sa sa/
6b5(rnying rgyud): pan rje ba pa dang / mad dang thamajal yang yinas mabyung sa pa yin te/ rdza' macig nyams chagangasas// de ste nga bya dang / dbang ba dang / rnam par shes pa yang mthung ma skye cad das brjod par bye ba'i banas pa da
6b6(rnying rgyud): klub dang / sgra phyag tur bsgom par bya ba yang yin sa mabyung ma gyes pa ste/ gleng brdad dang rtso bsgrub simatha' las 'das pas/ gsung gi dam tshig nyams chag blangs so// delta bu'i yenas ma byung ma smras pa'idon de lta ba 'din/ ngan cil ma rtogs shing rtogs
6b7(rnying rgyud): bair dka' bas/ rang bzhin gyis gsang ba chen po yin pas/ thugs kyi mchog nyams chag slongs so// de ltar rtsa ba'i nyams chag gsum bskangs pan chad/ yan lag gi dmachog thams cad kyang ye nas mabyung ma skyes pas/ yan lag gi mchog tham
7a1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dang sa chag gongs so// deltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnam pa ni mi bsrung ba bsrung bachen pa 'i/ de bye dudus ga yong gsum gyi thonas nyams chag byung ba dmapa phra gsung thugs kyi byags rjes blangs pa// des kyis bka' stsal ba
7a2(rnying rgyud): dang / de phyogs bdun sa zhugs pa'i rnal dpor marnams kyis son pa dra tu bang pos ded ces gas so// nga ma/ ston pa nga bas ma bsrung med pa'i ge dpe zhing rjel pa bye// sam gyi// zhes sum na
7a3(rnying rgyud): rdzas la brje brgya sa drug bcom mo// de nas yang sto pa bzang pal bcom ldan 'das rigs pa'i sangs ma dpas kyi 'did ces gsar te// snod pa pan tu babang ba di rna bu'i de nas mabyung sa gyes pade/ gdod pa rnas pa ma shes rig pa'i rgyal pa'i ge rangag ra
7a4(rnying rgyud): sanang / ma pa rnamapa pa bzung du yang med pa// nyams cig bsgrang duyang med de/ deg bu don ni 'dogs par/ gsang grags kyi ning rugs pa'i tshal gyi rnal 'byor ba dang/ rdeg byong ba la las gsang lags do kyi dang ga nim go ste/ lab rdzo tshogs kyi
7a5(rnying rgyud): gleng / la la na ga mo lha dang ga sog 'jog byeng / lalas ni de bzhir gshegs pa'i bkar brdam chod byed pa rnams kyi don du rnams cag tung na ba gang zhing bshags pa'i thabs ni ci mchis/ de dag la thugs rjes gzung ba'i thabs shig bstan du gsung zhes dus pa /
7a6(rnying rgyud): tu babang popo 'dis kyis bka' la to// rnal 'byor pa blta 'dasan ning shes rab ldan pa rab sa thongon rnam sa tshig pa gang shing shegs pa'i thangs ni bzhugs so// de pas 'dzi tho dza dang / yid ma'i swA dang / rdo yang
7a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil po dza dang / thub bas pa bdu 'i ga pa mornam pa du cinamamapa 'apa la dasu me dung mi gas te/ mtshan nam brjid sums sa ba kyi 'byengs rgyag tsha na byang ba'i bangs yod no// de ltab pa dang rigs ngas ga gas pa'i dbang gis
7b1(rnying rgyud): song ga sum du ltung bar dgas pa rnams kyi ched du/ 'gyod tshangs kyi bshags pa mad tsam zhig bstan gyi khyed cag rnam kyis lus gcer bur phyung ste/ chas rab tu gyis la yan lag lngas la brde ba cing brgyangs phyag 'tshol cig/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal
7b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor po mo rnams kyis chas rab tu byas te/ ston pa kun tu bzang po ltar mnyan pa dang / de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ ho klong chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni don dam par chos kyi dbyings/ yum gyi mkha' b+ha g.yangs
7b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong / rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// kun gzhi gsang ba dag pa'i dbyings nas yid rang byung gi ye shes rang shepa rig gi rgyal po yid byed pa po
7b4(rnying rgyud): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab/ chags med sngon dang bral bas gdan pad ma la bzhugs pa/ sangs rgyapa dang sems can mnyam par mkhyen pas phyag mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
7b5(rnying rgyud): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad don dam par chos kyi dbyings su srud ma chos can mtshan ma'i ston gyis ma grob pas gdun pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ kunA la khyab par gnas pas phyag mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can/
7b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad skyed pa'i gzhi/ yu la kun tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal mo// ma la la ho// chos rnams rnam dag ye nas lhun grub pas// b+ha ba byed dang yid chos rnam par dag/ nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin gud la snyoms mdzad pa// kun bzang yab yus
7b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po gnas su dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri can/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis kye shi dang 'pho 'gyur gyi rtog pa mi mnga' bas phyag
8a1(rnying rgyud): da sa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa 'a dzangam brjod pa pargyag 'tshal la// ngan dam par sems can ldag cags kyang ba gnasas dag pa/ dIbad gshugs pa thams du sa srung bdun tu/ sangs ma / mdong 'a zu
8a2(rnying rgyud): she kyis su la dbang bgyur bas drug rgya khor lotshan/ tsam ldan 'dus dpal rnam par ldang mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// dod dam par sems cad kyi tshor ba'i drang po gang pa su dag pa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams can kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid/ sa
8a3(rnying rgyud): ta ni can/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las ma g.yos par che ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bas/ phyag tu rin po che 'bar ba can/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi 'du shes kyi phung po gang
8a4(rnying rgyud): dgra pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi bdag nyid/ mngos byed ma bya'i we tsara~M/ so sor rtag pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dang rang gis tsha nyi dgas pa la mchags pa pa phyag d+ha brdzu can/ bcom ldan 'das dpal snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tsha
8a5(rnying rgyud): don dam par sems can gyi 'du byed kyi phung po gnas su dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi bdag nyid/ cang byed dang shang te khA'i khri can/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las mthar phyin pas phyag tso rdo rje rje gras can/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
8a6(rnying rgyud): don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos spyanam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med snang // gzugs su 'ang 'a tshon bzhin du so sor gsal// thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i// rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par 'byung ba
8a7(rnying rgyud): da bo das su dag pa/ yum ched mo sung tu bzang mo// dus gsus kyi rgyal bathams cadade 'byung ba'i gnaH/ yum chen po nas mala'i dbyings thugs la phyag 'tshal ma// don dam par 'thung bas 'jo bo gnas su dag pa/ yum ched
8b1(rnying rgyud): spyan ma/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa ga/ yu ma chen mnan dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par 'byung ba cu ngab gnas su dag pa/ yum can mo m+b+ha ma k+te/ drus gsum gri thal ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyigater 'dzin ma/ yum chen mo
8b2(rnying rgyud): chen dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par 'byung ba me'i ngo bo gnas su dag pa/ yum chen mo ni bza' dkar mo// dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung mchog ma/ yum chen mo pad+ma dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par 'gyun ba rlung gi ngo bo gnas su dag pa/
8b3(rnying rgyud): yum chen mo mtshig sgrol ma/ 'gro ba rnams 'phags pa'i sa bcur sgrol ma/ yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyag ma la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar pho brang bde bar gshegs pa'i yum// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed mdzad ma// rigs kyi yum gyur rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
8b4(rnying rgyud): don dam par sems can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po// 'gro ba rnams bla na med pa'i gnas su sbed par byed pas phyag rgya rin po che'i myu gu can/ shar phyogs na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
8b5(rnying rgyud): don dam par sems can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po/ nyon mongs pa'i skye rgyun gcod pas phyag rgya ral gri can/ lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi sna'i rnam
8b6(rnying rgyud): par shes pa gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas phyag rgya pad+ma can/ nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi lce'i rnam par shes pa gnas su
8b7(rnying rgyud): dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pas phyag rgya rdo rje can/ byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi mig gi dbang po gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
9a1(rnying rgyud): byams pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las rnam par rtsal bas phyag rgya klu shing rman phyogs can/ shar sgom tshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam pa sems can gyi rna pa'i dbang po gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems
9a2(rnying rgyud): dbang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba/ nyon mongs pa chos nyid du mkhyen pas phyag rgya glegs bam po ti tsan/ lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi sna'i dbang po gnas su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
9a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po/ nyon mongs pa gnas su dag pa las dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du skong bas phyag rgya rin po che'i snye ma can/ nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi lce'i dbang po gnas su dag pa/ byang chub
9a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' 'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa'i zug rngu mi mnga' bar shin tu mdzes pas phyag rgya me tog ut+pal can/ byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam shes dbang po dag pas gru gsung thugs// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi sas
9a5(rnying rgyud): mchog ste// sems dpa' chen po brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi mig gi yul gzugs su sdang ba gnas su dag pa/ badz+ra pA s+ya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pas mnyes par byed pa las mi 'gyur bas phyug rgya rdo rje khu tshur can
9a6(rnying rgyud): ji sgeg mol ba rgyag tshal lo// dan sa par sems can gyisa'i yul bri rlom pa gnas sa drug pa/ badz+ram+b+ha le b+he/ mchod pa rnyan ma ched par byed pas phyag kyi rin po che'i phreng ba rten/ dri rje phreng bam la phyag 'tshal ma// rdo rna dam par sems can gyi rna ba'i yul
9a7(rnying rgyud): grags gnas su dag pa/ pradz+ra skr-i ti Te/ sgra'i mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag cu pi lang can/ deji sra dbyangs ma la phyag 'tshal lo// den ngas par sems can gyi lho'i yul ra thob gnas su dag pa/ brjod rje ste/ phyag rgya'i mchod pas mnyes par byed
9b1(rnying rgyud): ca tug sazung na/ dgu lta mal thug rnamapa/ nanam nga chub rtson nugang bya// rnams pa sa rnam pa mchad pas rtsal pa da// blang chub rgyam rdzogs pa nag 'tsham ma// dang das par ya dus 'dudu 'ad
9b2(rnying rgyud): na/ pas gas pa da / gas // da ma na da pa byu ga / / nyis du
9b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// ded sa smra mapa sa pa bya / / tha da pa ma na/ lung pa gyu/ dad
9b4(rnying rgyud): sa su nas sa
9b5(rnying rgyud): grub la la lo// da pa pa m+b+ha m+bu kyai gyi pa ga pa dgas/ mtshan panan shing paste/ thams parten pa pa ma bya da ga bar 'ad pa u la na/ na dag
9b6(rnying rgyud): mo// drin dme bar sems can pa lus gyi dbang po gnas sru dag pa/ khro brtson pa stobs pa ste/ snying rje chen pos 'gro'i 'don drug lnga ye shes las 'drems par mdzad pas byabargyad kyu sa can/ slong bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// dod dam par
9b7(rnying rgyud): na gyi lus kyi rin bya gnas su dag pa/ mam chen po da 'phrin te/ dga' bcan pam 'dra ba'i don mang bas phyag kyang dbyug srul gyis dkris pa can/ rdub gong bdag pal phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems cad kyi sa kyi sa shes gnas su dag pa/
10a1(rnying rgyud): po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ btang snyoms chen pos 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin par mdzad pas phyag rgya rdo rje rgya gram can/ byang sgo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// drag shul thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa// tshad med bzhi ldan sgo bzhi thub par byung /
10a2(rnying rgyud): sgo ba bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi rtag par blta ba gnas su dag pa/ badz+ra ad+hu sha ste/ 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes 'dzin par byed pas phyag rgya lcags kyu can/ rdo rje lcags kyum la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi chad
10a3(rnying rgyud): par blta ba gnas su dag pa/ badz+ra pA sha ste/ 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes 'dren par byed pas phyag rgya zhags pa can/ rdo rje zhags pa ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi bdag tu bltab gnas su dag pa/ badz+ra s+pho Ta ste/ 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa
10a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes mi 'tshong bar mdzad pas phyag rgya lcags sgrog can/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi mtshan mar blta ba gnas su dag pa/ 'adz+ra g+haN+De ste/ 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes thal bar rlog par mdzad pas phyag ma dril
10a5(rnying rgyud): tsas/ rdo rje dril bu ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag chad mthar phyin gsang ba yum gyi ngang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril 'khrol ma// skom chen mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi lha'i 'jig rten du blta ba gnas su dag pa/ lce'i nges pa ste/
10a6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa nga rgyal gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya pi wang can/ lha'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems can gyi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten du blta ba gnas su dag pa/ lha ma yin gyi thub pa ste/ nyon mongs pa phrag dog gnas su dag par
10a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas phyag rgya ga cha chen/ lha ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// den dam par sems can gyi mong ji ga rten du blta gnas su dgag mi'i nub pa ste/ nyon mongs pa 'dod chags gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya gseg rkang bar ba can/ me'i bcom
10b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'amal la// den das par thams can gyi byol sang gi 'dag rten du gnapa su dag pa/ byam pa gathubab ste/ nyon mongs pa gti mug gdus smra dag par mang dpas b+hag shegs pas po can/ byom song gi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal //
10b2(rnying rgyud): do ni dam par thams cad yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du blta ba gnas su dag pa/ yaM dgas kyi thub pa ste/ nyon mangs pa ser sna gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya rin po che'i sbom buca na/ yaM dwags kyi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam par sems ca
10b3(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du blta ba gnas su dag pa/ dmyal ba'i thub pa ste/ nyon mongs pa zhe sdang gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya ma chu can/ dmyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// ster 'og phyogs bzhi 'jig rten 'dul ba'i mgon// nyon mongs su
10b4(rnying rgyud): 'joms chud drug dag par sbyang // bcom ldan thub pa drug la phyag 'tshal lo// ho b+h+ya 'phrul rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor phyogs btsun bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ltar sdang ba thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal
10b5(rnying rgyud): lo// a la la'o// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dul gcig gi stong na rdul snyed kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing / brjod kyis mi long ba'i lha rnams la rnal 'byor ba bdag cag gis lus rdul snyed du sbal nas lus ngag yid gsum shin tu gnod
10b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyod dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// gal te rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan rna bar lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang dmyal ba chen por mi ltung ngo // de bas na gus pos phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul dkyi
10b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la// gang zhig gus pas phyag 'tshal na// nyams chag kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig bskangs nas dngos grub 'thob// de skad ces ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor 'o mo rnam sa
11a1(rnying rgyud): al 'ato// zhes ba'arjod cing lus sa 'bade yi bcwa phyag pan stong du btsal bas rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis nyams chag pa nangs nas phyag rgya chen po'i ngag 'dzin gyis la bsnyen par gyur to// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kyang nyams chag bskangs nas
11a2(rnying rgyud): tho chung pa'i jig 'dzin gyis 'khad kyis bsnyen par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal mabyor gyi zhal 'dir 'dus pa'i smon pa rdo rje sde bang dpon gri bkang dzin gyis/ 'phye sbyong dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mar ma
11a3(rnying rgyud): gcigang blta ba'i rdo rje ldan grogs rnams nyon cig/ sna 'phul kho bo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya / thugs bachen po'i chos nyid kyi dang las ma g.yob par du thugs rdorol pa chen po khro bor rgya lugs can/ phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don mthod pa rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing
11a4(rnying rgyud): nyams chag skrangs shig/ de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis nyon pa kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ rol pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de'i mtshan rnams bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// a la la ho// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos
11a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa/ ho dgongs su gsol/ rang rig pa thabs kyi rgyal po khro bo thams cad kyi rje btsan chen po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyi dpal/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i dpal chen po/ che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lta bu'i lbu dus
11a6(rnying rgyud): gsum du 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing / zhe sdang chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas dreg pa pho mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ khro bo thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid/ badz+ra he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings nas skye ba med pa'i gru brnyes pa gti mug chen po'i thabs/
11a7(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pas ma hA de la'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ khro bo thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid/ buk+ka he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid byang chub sems kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa/ nga rgyal chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa/
11b1(rnying rgyud): khro bo thams cad kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid/ rat+na he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid chags pa med pa'i dbyings nas byang chub sems dpa'i sku brnyes pa/ 'dod chags chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas klu'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ khro bo thams cad kyi gsung gi bad
11b2(rnying rgyud): da/ rak+Sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dzin las grub pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa mchog gi gru brnyes pa/ phrag dog chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas gnod sbyin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ khro bo thams cad kyi phrin las kyi bdag nyid// karma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b3(rnying rgyud): myor ba'i dbyings nas phyin ci log gi lta ba 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa/ ga Na'i thabs la mkhas pas drang srong gi gdan la bzhugs pa/ rAk+ka he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dam tshig gi dbyings nas myong byeng+ga ci rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa/ nyams pa bskang ba'i thabs
11b4(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pas srin po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ sa nu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i dbyings nas skye gnas kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa/ mtshan ma'i thabs la mkhas pas rlung lha'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ gu h+ya he ru kaM la phyag 'tshal lo// grol ba
11b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas reg bya'i rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa/ ta na'i thabs la mkhas pas bgegs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ yaT he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'drang ba'i// he ruka dpal rnams
11b6(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings nas yum chen khro mo'i sgra brnyes pa/ spu dpal du 'bar bas rngams pa'i cha lugs can/ gsung dpal du 'bar bas rngams pa'i gdangs skad can/ thugs dpal du 'bar bas thugs rje chen po can/ dpal 'bar khro
11b7(rnying rgyud): nga'i rgyal mo che/ khro mo chen mo gnam thal dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid dbyings kyi phyag rgya las/ rnam par thar pa'i sku brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'brel med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa/ 'adz+ra gr-i Sh+Ti thA rI ma la bya
12a1(rnying rgyud): lo// mnyam nyid blang dor med pa'i dbyings nas rol pa ye shes kyi sku brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril pas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa/ bud+d+ha ba d+hI hA rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// byams mgon chos nyid kyi dbyings
12a2(rnying rgyud): nas thugs rje ye shes kyi sku brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa/ rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid pad+ma'i dbyings nas skyon bral pad+ma'i sku brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'brel med
12a3(rnying rgyud): par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa/ pad+ma kro d+hi shA rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// las rab rol pa'i dbyings nas/ don grub mchog gi su brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa/ ka ru lo d+ha shwa rI ma
12a4(rnying rgyud): pa phyag 'tshal lo// drod las skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul pa ste/ rak+kha kro tI shwa rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mngal las skyes pa 'joms pa las srul pa ste/ sa nu lod+hI shwa rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// brdzus nas skyes pa 'joms pa las sul pa ste/ ku h+ya lo d+h+we shwa rI ma pa
12a5(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// sgong las skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul ba ste/ yak+ka kro d+hI shU rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dbang phyug skya la 'khril mdzad cing // mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ma// gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo sngon mo bam
12a6(rnying rgyud): dbyug 'dzin// go rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo ser mo mda' gzhu 'dzin// tsau rI ma la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dmar mo chu srin 'dzin// pra mo hA la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo mthing nag rdo rje 'dzin// bai tA lI la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// puH
12a7(rnying rgyud): sI la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo ljang gu dung khrag 'thung // g+hasma rI la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo nag mo byis snying za// sma sha nI la phyag 'tshal lo// khro mo ser skya mchog lus 'brel// tsaN+Da lI la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa me lcar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas//
12b1(rnying rgyud): shes sku mchog 'jigs byed kyang kyis bzhugs// khro mo chen mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// sing hA kha ro bsnol ser seng // seng ge'i dbul phyag 'tshal lo// b+ha s+thi mnan lnga bsnol dmar stag/ stag gi dbu la phyag 'tshal lo// sri la nag mo b+hi rdzag la// wan
12b2(rnying rgyud): dbul phyag 'tshal lo// shAn 'dral lha mthing ga spyad// spang mo'i dbu la phyag 'tshal lo// gr-i D+ha gri mar rgyu 'dren rgod// bya nod dbul phyag 'tshal lo// kan zhing phrag spang mgo ring // dur bya'i dbul phyag 'tshal lo/ kA ka kha ro ba na gri nag/ bya rog dbul phyag
12b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// u lu mthing ga rdo chu lhag// 'ug pa'i dbu la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// phra mon chen mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom thon mo lcags kyu 'dzin// nA ga
12b4(rnying rgyud): ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgo ma nag mo zhags pa 'dzin// phag gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin// seng gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom ljang gu dril bu 'dzin// sbrang gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gdong mo lo nya mgyogs ma bzhi/
12b5(rnying rgyud): shar g+ho nub byang sgo ba thub par bsrung // zho skyong khro mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid rnam dag ngang las cir yang sdang // sna tshogs cir yang bskur ba'i sku mnga' zhing // srid gsum zhing du sbyor bas g.yang gzhi gsol// stong khams gnas sror nyi zer nag/
12b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'phen// sgor byed ni zhags 'phen la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam rtog nad rnams rtag tu bsal ba'i phyir// mi 'bral cir yang bsgyur ba'i sgra mngal zhing // nyon mongs lnga gzhom thong khrag mdzung thung 'phen// thugs rje thabs mkhas mi rnams gnas su spor// spong byed
12b7(rnying rgyud): mdung thung 'phen la phyag 'tshal lo// ma rig sems can dbyings su gzung ba'i phyir// chos nyid bde ba'i sku las g.yos pa med// stong khams dbang srud dung khrag thugs kar baphyil// brjid pa'i rol pas stong khams gnas su spor// spor byed dril 'grol
13a1(rnying rgyud): sal cag 'amal ma// thags ba mas gan ga khyabab po// mdag ba nga// ngas pa 'dra ba'om// nga la dbang yang dang thag gas sa// u pa sa gnas thung can 'an// nga ru mgasas/
13a2(rnying rgyud): gaphyag 'tshal lo// sdug brdal ming zad yongs su gzhig pa phyir// mthing nag chen mo rnams pa'i sku mngang zhing // g.yul chen rab bag rdo rje sar mda' 'phen// lha mon gnas sgor dung theg zhal du gsol// sgor byed zhing mda' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo//
13a3(rnying rgyud): ldog par blta ba dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir// lu mdog dmar nag dbang dag 'joms pa'i zhal// phyi nang sgrib gnyis spangs nas bde ba'i phyir// rdo rje glog phreng yi dgas gnas su sor// sror byed glog phreng can la phyag 'tshal lo// gti rme la rmongs pa dbang du mdzad pa
13a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// dkar nag phyed ma zhi drag ldan pa'i bu// gti mug sod mdzod thong khrag zhal du gsol// byol song gnas su spong bas pA k+Sha ne ba// spor byed bla brda ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal brgyad dang bcu drug spad pa'i phyir// sku mdo ga ser nag rdeg rgyas po
13a5(rnying rgyud): dgal pa sto mdzad thaMng theg na'ajug sa la// nga la ba shA sa rje ma man tha na 'a // dati sa dung la shes mnas sngor rnam palas// ngas na mdzan pa'i chu ba med pa rnams// lamya na
13a6(rnying rgyud): 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i// chud drug rnams la dbang drag rol par mdzad// gror byed bcud du mtshan gsol mi bzad ma// kun kyang 'jigs tshul tshal snying rjer ldan// skam gsher spel ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// thod khrag mtshon cha 'dzin cing
13a7(rnying rgyud): ni ga kyi mi sa sa chu nga na/ du chung gi sasu 'gyur// spyi bu 'a du mingasu dubrag ga ldan sung ma / na drug pa mi ma du byings /
13b1(rnying rgyud): mchag byed kyis dngus grub sum du gsol// rnal 'byor dmar nag rje shul badzin// g.yag mag can la phyag batshal lo// rnal 'byar dmar par rtse lnga 'dzin// sbal mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'gror ser dag dbug sreg 'dzin// gang tsunab
13b2(rnying rgyud): can pa phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dka dmar dreng dmar 'dzin// sre mo'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor byer mo 'khor lo 'don// pha wang mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dmar skyab ma dbyug 'don// jed mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam
13b3(rnying rgyud): 'bye dang 'amo rgya dgas 'dzin// ngom mog can la phrug 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor sngon mo bral pa 'dzin// rtse skyen mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor lo sa tu 'don// sdig pa'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul 'thor nag sa 'ong dung chad // zham ga can
13b4(rnying rgyud): spyad 'tshal lo// rnal ba myong dmar nag tu lagasu 'dzin// wam go cad de phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor nag mo bamachen 'don// stag mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dmar mo log chen 'dzin// nod mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dmar rag
13b5(rnying rgyud): tug sto// mas can me phyag 'chol pa// rnal dbyar dka ma 'dzin// khyang migacan la thuga'atsham mo// rnal 'byor dmar par byis pam rjon// themagroca nu la phyag 'ardal po// rna'i 'byor dkar dasar bang 'dzin/ khri zung ma
13b6(rnying rgyud): tshem po// rnal byor dbur su dzin// sha ba'i mgo 'a phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byar ltang nag na cung 'dzin// srung mgacan la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dmar ser mo sngon 'dzin// srin ma gcin la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor ldang med pa ba
13b7(rnying rgyud): ga ma go cad la byeg 'tshal po// rna'i 'byor rdzing sngon drung khrag 'dzin// sha mgo can la phyag 'tshal mo// rnal 'byor dmar spang ba mchen 'dzin// ba lang lago la phyag 'tshal mo// rnal 'byor ldang nage bdud rtsi 'dzin// srul mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam
14a1(rnying rgyud): 'byor dag po lcags kyu 'dzin// khwa thag mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byar sngon mo zhags pa 'dzin// ramag can la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor dmar mo lcags srog bsdams// sangasago can la phyag 'tshal lo//
14a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor ljang nag dril bu 'dzin// sba ka'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal gyi 'khor tshogs badz+ra a ra li// mkha' la shugs 'gro ma tshogs dbang phyug ma// rnal 'byor nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje gzhon nung
14a3(rnying rgyud): sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod pa'i skyon spangs skye la dbang mdzad pa// khro chen hUM kAr la phyag 'tshal lo// ma byin len spangs yo byad dbang mdzad pa// khre chen
14a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// srog gcod skyon spangs tshe la dbang mdzad pa// khro chen gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// phra ma'i skyon spangs chos la dbang mdzad pa/ khro chen rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// ngag rtsub skyon spangs las la dbang
14a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// khro chen bdud ci 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo// log par blta spangs ye shes dbang mdzad pa// khro chen dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzun gyi skyon spangs mos la dbang mdzad pa// khro chen mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// ngag 'khyal
14a6(rnying rgyud): skyon spangs sems la dbang mdzad pa// khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sems skyon spangs rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad pa// khro chen khams gsum rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// brnab sems skyon spangs smon lam dbang mdzad pa// khro chen stobs
14a7(rnying rgyud): po che la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes pha rol phyin pa ste// sgra 'byin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab pha rol phyin ma skye// ji ji snyems la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims pa rol phyin pa skye// rdo rje rjer le phyag 'tshal lo// bsam gtan pha robargyan sa ste// du khrod
14b1(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// thab pa kyi pha rol phyin ma ste// gtun khung ma la phyag 'tshal lo// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ma ste// rab gtum ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin ma ste// mda' snyems ma la phyag 'tshal lo// smon lam pha rol phyin ma ste/
14b2(rnying rgyud): spyod byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma ste// gsod byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin ma ste// skul byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dregs pa bsnol ba'i gdan steng nas// ye shes bskal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i klang
14b3(rnying rgyud): bdud 'dul yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// cing yang skul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tsham so// mngon par byang chub tu
14b4(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrubs pa yi// tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas yon tan mthar phyin pa// sku dang ye shes tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung ba lnga las sku bzhengs ma// rtag rgyal lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin dbyi
14b5(rnying rgyud): las grub pa mo// dbyings phyug lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu 'bras byang chub sems kyi sprul pa ste// mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// ga Na pa ti'i sprul pa ste// kIng kar la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo dpal mo'i sprul pa ste// kid ka rI la phyag 'tshal
14b6(rnying rgyud): lo// 'jig rten khams la dbang mdzad ma// 'jigs byed dpal 'bar ral pa can// 'dod pa'i ro la chags pa mo// ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// legs nyes lhang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod cing // bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub pa'i grogs mdzad ma
14b7(rnying rgyud): dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa kun tu bzang po yis// de skad ces ni bka' stsal pa// gang gis sgyu 'phrul khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal na// nyams chag kun kyang dag 'gyur te// mtshams med lnga yi sdig kyang 'byed
15a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsaH/ nu dag gnas kyang dang lpags te// rab 'dzin rdul bya'i zhing dgags// zhes bka' phrul pa dang / thug smra brnyanas lhags pa'i rnal 'byung ba ma rnams kyis/ al la to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnan byor ci gro thas kyi sa bsha
15a2(rnying rgyud): pad+mo mtshur che'o// zhes brjod de/ lus sa la brde ba cing brkyangs phyag lan stong du bcol lo// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan rnal 'byor po mo rnams kyis thos pa tsam gyis rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams che ga thams cad bgrangs te/
15a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur te/ yi ge khor po tshogs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis grub par gyur to// de nas dus der dpal rdo rje sems dpa
15a4(rnying rgyud): thu bdus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje ye shes kyi bdag nyid/ sgra mtshan gyi me tog la dpe byud bzang po'i 'bras zlas brdzun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / gdungs dang / ting nge 'dzin pa sogs
15a5(rnying rgyud): ma/ gzhan yang dbul dgus lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dbang bslang ba/ deng dkar dang / tI dang / rin po che dang rgyun sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gdan yang byang chubs rgyas dpa' brgya glang cher sprul pa brgyad kyis rin po khri bye rtagasu
15a6(rnying rgyud): skyeng na/ bad+mad shrI zla brtsegs pa'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngu bzhugs pa/ srubalte bas chog mi shes pa ste/ shin tu sbyim me/ lhung ngo / sbyin ne/ nam mkha'i 'da' mon nas/ ma la nang gi gzugs brtan ltang snang la rang bzhin med pa zhig
15a7(rnying rgyud): dzig min chos bye dbyings kyi pho zang nas/ mngon sum du byon tu ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye nyon pa kun tu bzang gi kyad kyis gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa thams cad kyi nyams chag song spyad par bya ba'i ched du/
15b1(rnying rgyud): khyong kyai sa brgyad tshangs kyi chag bshad pa 'din rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sum/ rnal 'byor pa yang 'das pa rnams kyi la mtshan pa/ da ltar kyi rnal 'byor pa ma rig pa rnams mig 'byud ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byad pa rnams kyi 'dzin thal
15b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi'i lam chen po 'di lta bu bku' stsal pa/ thugs rje rtse la ngomatshar le lags so// de bas na bdag gis kyang yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba/ zin pa gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yang snying / nyams chag dang rtog smra ba thams cad sel bar byed pa 'di
15b3(rnying rgyud): brjod dz+nyAnal 'byod pa nyams chog da sh+log bra~M brtan/ gsog 'jog dang / bag chags ngan pa can byed dmas nyon cig/ sau badz+ras rnas ma ya/ mnu pA la ya/ badzas don pa N+Di/ dr-i D+ho mab+ha la/ su Sh+yo mab+hama?/ an+ya d+ha ma thA la/ mu N+Da ma N+Da pa/
15b4(rnying rgyud): sarbas d+hi m+me tha laH/ sa gams tsam/ ti thi lA hU~M/ ho/ rtag nas rba thug ta drim ma mr-iH/ badz+nyA d+ha ma/ mad+has ma ya sat+kA le/ 'di dag dus gcig la lan brgyan brgyad bzlas na/ nyams chag thams cad bdangs te na dngags
15b5(rnying rgyud): dra lung ba ltas thar bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byong sa kyang ni gagis yi ma du ma nas 'dzin/ zo N+Di la ming dzi gsum gyis ngas chu thams cad kyims kyi dam par dgongs nas srung slob mngang la/ tshe 'ams nas kyang bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi zas dam pa
15b6(rnying rgyud): gdon men par 'gyur// da kyis gsam pa da / phyogs ban myig pa de su du myor ba yo mas kyi/ dang la na ri sems da ma brgyang sa phyag san stong du kyi la zhing 'di na cesagasam to// tsams 'das pa pa rjesems dpa' das
15b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yang snyig / nyams chag dang rtog slob rnams cad spyong bar byed pa yi ge brgyapa bka' stsal pa mtshar ci legs so// alal to// de nas dpal kun chu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// rdorje
16a1(rnying rgyud): dang rgya chu kya gas sa rgya snyamams na ga / nga tsu sa sa zung pa dag na sa sa sam
16a2(rnying rgyud): mardzogs bcun pa srugs pa'i ma gyur ba ma ma kyis su dum btug su'am te/ 'argyad cis sa smras / gangang lpags pa/ bcwamaldan 'das dang badran na bdang pa dang / gas ba ba gnogs pa pasag pa/ byang rdzas
16a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams ni thugs rje rje la thab semakhas pas dran pa snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ sngar 'dras pa'i rig 'dzin gyis la bzhugs pa rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag rgyag la sogs pa gsung sngags kyi gong lpags song tsal rnams phyi/ dze
16a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i mdzod spyod dam pa klong du ma gyur cing / dgong sa stong dam pa gdengs su ma chud pa'i dbang gis bka' gas dang chen po sbyang nyes par gyur te/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig las 'gongs shing 'das par gyun pas/ la las ni de bzhin gshegs
16a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bka' ngo ba nyid kyis mi btsas pa la/ gzu lums dang ras gcod kyis/ pa las ni dam pa ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon la snying nas smad pa dang / bka' bachub dang / thugs dang 'gal ba'i las mang po bstis/ la las ni dang tshig gcig pa rdo rje phun grong
16a6(rnying rgyud): la/ blta spyod log pa dang / ngan sems dang / 'phya sems dang / chu 'brog dang / brdeg gcig dang / ngan du zlab la sogs pa sku'i dmachog nyams pa'i las bgyis/ la las ni dang po da thob dpon gyis lung pog te/ bka'adzin ma nos pa las/ yi
16a7(rnying rgyud): mo nam gsas zhing / zhom srung ma dzugs pa dang / mang dang thas rjid rgyan ca pa nga/ brgyan gyipa 'i ma dus las grol te/ mazla 'das pa la chags pa'i sasu phy-is/ lags ni bka' gsang patha mo'i da sbyong ma na cung shing
16b1(rnying rgyud): sbas pa'i gsang ba rnams dang / gsang bar ngos pa dang / gsang bar gnyer gtad pa rnams gzhan la spel ba la sogs pa sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum 'tshig pa'i las bgyis pa 'di dag/ phyogs bcu'i sku
16b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / grub pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i rig 'dzin po mo rnams dang / ye shes dang las las grub pa'i legs nyes kyi bstang 'dzin cing / dam tshig gi rjes gcod pa'i dam can rgya mtsho rnams la mchod pa 'di la brten nas/ 'gro
16b3(rnying rgyud): tshangs su gsol ba'i mdo ni sku'i dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis/ 'jig rten 'dir yang lus la mdze shu la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang dmyal ba chen po'i yang gting thar pa'i dus med pa'i gnas su lus gshag gtub la sog
16b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu 'di lta bu bsags pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so// gsung gi dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis/ 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i ngag dig lkugs la sogs pa dag gi rgyu 'di lta bu bsags pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so// thugs kyi
16b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis/ 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i sems skyo 'bog la sogs pa dang / ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so// la las ni dbang ma mnos par slob dpon gyis bzung nas/ bka' zab mo la dbang thos
16b6(rnying rgyud): brdabs pa dang / la las ni gab pa'i man ngag ma rtogs par/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel te/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zab mo bab col du spyad pas/ khwa dang lcang ki lta bu'i sdig las bgyis te/ dmyal ba mi bzad pa'i las bgyis pa
16b7(rnying rgyud): rnams mthol zhing bshags so// la las ni ye shes kyi lha dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig tshul bzhin du mnos pa las/ gsog 'jog gis bka' bskus te/ tshogs kyi spyang ki dang / khral gyi gsog 'jog dang / grogs bral
17a1(rnying rgyud): tshod yod pa dang / rngam chos kyi phud dang 'phags pa la bsngos pa la thug thub bgyis/ la las ni 'jig rten 'di'i skad cig yud tsam las ma rtogs pa/ 'jig rten phyi ma ma 'tshal te/ grogs kyi dga' dang bcan thabs dang
17a2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi las bgyis te/ gsang sngags kyi gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga la spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te/ ta na ga Na gnyis dang / ma byin par len pa dang / brdzun du sra
17a3(rnying rgyud): ngag 'khyal pa rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so// mi spang ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags
17a4(rnying rgyud): dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te/ dri chen dang / dri chu dang / dmar chen dang / mAM sa dang / rdo rje zil pa rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te/ phung po lnga dang / 'byung ba lngan
17a5(rnying rgyud): dbang po lnga dang / yul lnga dang / kha dog lnga la sogs pa rnams/ rigs kyi yab dang / rigs kyi yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du ma 'tshal ba mthol zhing bshags so// bsgrub pa
17a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thod pa
17a7(rnying rgyud): bgyid rgya las/ 'bad rtsol dang brtson 'grus chung ba mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang bsgrub pa khyad par gyi dam tshig nyi shu dang / spyod pa rgyan gyi dam tshig bzhi dang / rang bzhin blta ba'i dam tshig bzhi dang / gal ma do nges pa'i dam tshig gsum
17b1(rnying rgyud): sogs te nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhung las 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams kyi bsrung mtshams mi shes shing / gzhung dang 'gal ba ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi rgyud kun gyi lung las 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang /
17b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / nyan thos kyi 'dul khrims dang / 'jig rten pa'i khrims mna' las 'gal ba ci bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang bka' zab mo khyad du bsad de/ skye bo dang thad kyi dbang gis nor dang gsug gi dbang
17b3(rnying rgyud): du btang ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra'i sngags bzlog byas pa dang / pra ti ha na dus kyi mchod pa chen po la bsngos pa dang / ma hA bo d+hi la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la thug thub bgyis nas spyad pa dang / khyad par du yang tshogs mcho
17b4(rnying rgyud): pa sgrub pa dang / bsgom pasru po mol bac+doMs pa lasogs pa/ cad pa sa thung bams da da yadas rdzes te/ dngas su ltud pa dang / dbyeg ga pa ces na nang gi skye sugs pamathamathong ba nasas// gzhan yang yan lagan
17b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig stong rtsa brgyad las 'das te/ ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu bsags pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs so 'tshal gyis/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam tshig ngo ma 'tshal te/ dam tshig nyams pa dang / las
17b6(rnying rgyud): ngan sna tshogs spyad pas/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyu bsags pa mthol zhing bshags so// nya stong dang / dus drug dang / dus bzhi la sogs pa dus dam du bcas pa las 'das te/ dus las g.yel ba'i nyams chag thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/
17b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang chos spyod bcu'i sgo nas/ dge ba'i phyogs bgyis par dam bcas pa las rngo ma thogs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// sgyu 'phrul ye shes rang snang gi lha la rtog pa mi mnga' yang / de'i
18a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor du gtogs pa'i ye shes dang / las las grub pa'i legs nyes kyi bstang 'dzin cing dam tshig gi rjes gcod pa'i bstan pa gnyen po srung ba dang / chos skyong ba rnams kyi thugs dang 'gal bci bgyis pa thams cad
18a2(rnying rgyud): mthol zhing bshags so// gzhan yang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa mched dang lham dral rnams kyi thugs dang 'gal ba'i las ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// de ltar mthol bshags zab mo dang / 'gyod tshangs rngag po
18a3(rnying rgyud): shin tu gnod 'gyod dang bcas pa bgyis pas rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa sor chud de nyams chag thams cad skongs par gyur cig/ bka' la rwas chod byed cing / sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel ba dang / ta na bskal ba gnas su ma rtogs pa dang
18a4(rnying rgyud): gaN sbyor ba byin gyis ma brlabs pa la sogs pa/ gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i dbang gis ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig/ bsnyen sgrub zab mo dam du bcas pa las/ rang nyams dang tshod yod du gyur te/ mchod pa lo zlar
18a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa dang / nya stong dus chod las 'das pa dang / dge ba'i phyogs bgyid par dam bcas pa las rngo ma thogs pas/ ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig/ dus kyi mchod pa chen po la bsngos pa'i yo byad dang / ma hA bo d+hi mchod
18a6(rnying rgyud): rten chen po'i yo byad dang / bsgom bsgrub zab mo'i yo byad dang / gzhan yang phud la gzhogs shing / lhag la phri ba dang / khral la ngan pa dang / gsog 'jog gi las bgyis pas/ pre ta ka yi dwags kyi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par
18a7(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis sba lo dang / tshul 'chos kyis gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i blta spyod zab mo gzhung ma bsrangs pa dang / yang dag pa yin nam ma yin snyam nas sems la rtog pa byung ba dang / yin par ngo shes kyang sems la
18b1(rnying rgyud): so la zhugs te/ shas bzhin du ma spyad pas/ tir+thaka byol song gi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig/ chos nyid don gyi blta ba ni ma rtogs/ kha 'byams chog gi blta ba la gdengs byas na/ dmatshig nyams pa can dang /
18b2(rnying rgyud): dam 'dras can dang / da ma med pa dang / thig gribacan dang / gsang sngags kyi snod du mi rung ba rnams la chos bshad pa dang / bskang ba dang / tshogs 'dres pa dang / tshig tu 'dzags shing khyod la mchings pa dang / snod med pa la gsang sngags spel ba
18b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa 'bag 'bog gi las bgyis pas/ phyi nang gi dam can rnams kyi thugs dang 'gal bas/ 'jig rten 'di'i rkyen du gyur te tshe thung zhing nad mang ba dang / phyi ma'i sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig/ gzhan yang bdag cag
18b4(rnying rgyud): d+hAl 'byor ba 'di 'tshogs shing 'dus pa rnams kyis/ 'tshad tshangs 'di la brten nas/ gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa mtha' dag ga nyams cag dang / rtog sde pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig/ de sa bu'i 'gyod tshangs rnal 'byor kyi ste khras 'di dang / de
18b5(rnying rgyud): rgyamachogatanas tshang bzab ma 'ad pa rten / da rgyas ngam pas cings pa na pa smrasaso// rgyu byung sa pa bad pas / cings bdugasol ba'i 'de pa khyo nabs / 'dun cig 'di 'as pa rna la 'byor ba /
18b6(rnying rgyud): m-i la rnams dang / gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi skyo nags so tshal thams cad kyikri ba p+na byung ste/ b+hag rten po'i ga 'din seMs la spya gyis srab par byur cig/ bdag ga gi ngas gsum da ba ng+ge dang / brnangs ma dang / mA nga/
18b7(rnying rgyud): lA ma dral dang / pha ma dang / dmadzes rgya bsgral lo 'tshal la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyir mi sdig pa'i sanan te ye shes bla ma'i sa la ldan thos grub par gyur cig/ des bu'i bden pasas chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes
19a1(rnying rgyud): bya'i bag chags phra mo man chad/ gnyen po rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes chen pos sbyangs te/ sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de mthar phyin nas bcu gcig kun du 'od kyis 'thob par gyur cig/ rang byang chub rnams ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis
19a2(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bse ru'am ne co lta bu 'thob par gyur cig// nyan thos rnams ni bden pa bzhi mthar byin pa'i 'bras bu dgra bcom pa 'thob par gyur cig/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyang chos dge ba bcu spyod par gyur te lha dang mi'i go 'phang
19a3(rnying rgyud): 'thob par gyur cig/ lha dang mi rnams ni chos spyod bcu'i sgor zhugs te dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'dzin cing theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ma nor bar ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshad ma dang rtag tu 'grogs shing / des bsan
19a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i don ma nor bar 'grel zhing rtogs nas rig 'dzin rnam gsum myur du 'grub par gyur cig/ de lta bu'i 'gyod tshangs la brten nas/ bdag cag gi man ngag gi don ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang sku tshe ring ba dang / 'khor
19a5(rnying rgyud): dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang / dgongs dpyod thams cad lhun gyis grub ste/ bstan pa'i sgron me mdzad la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/ bdag cag rnal 'byor pa 'dir 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams ni/ 'jig rten mthong ba'i chos 'di la/ tshe ring ba dang //
19a6(rnying rgyud): nad med pa dang / dpal dang gzi mdangs dang / 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ gsang ba'i theg pa chen po 'di yang bka' btsan zhing byin che ste dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ gsang
19a7(rnying rgyud): grags zab mo 'di dang ba'i yul khams la sogs te/ rgyal khams thams cad du dus kyi 'khrug pazhi bar gyur cig/ mtshan gyi bskal pa nyams par gyur cig/ me nad dang phyug nad thams cad spyan chad par gyur cig/ char chu dus su babs te/
19b1(rnying rgyud): phyugs rtag tu legs pa dang / sems can thams cad bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par gyur cig/ dri med dkyul po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ nyams chag drang rtog sgrib skyong ba'i bshags pa ste le'u gsum pa/
19b2(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rjed mchog la gnas pa rnams kyis brjod med kyi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// oM ye shes su mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// rtswa rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang // thugs rjes nyi gas la 'od bzhin gyis
19b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing bzhugs su gsol// brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos kyi sku// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso// thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya cher rol pa yi// zhe khro sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
19b4(rnying rgyud): dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i// kun tu bzang po bla med mchod sbyin gyis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya tshor yongs bkod de// phye nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mchos mchod// kun tu bzang mo gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// rgyal ba 'od dkyil 'khor rab
19b5(rnying rgyud): 'byams ma lus kun// 'du 'brel med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pas// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' che// chos rnams rnam dag ye nas 'od gsal zhing // rnal 'byor nyid dbyings
19b6(rnying rgyud): skabs ma las 'das pa// mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dung // kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas gdal ba la// gyi nang gsang ba bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// sngang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i dbyings// 'byung dang 'thung 'gyur yab
19b7(rnying rgyud): yu~Mm ldan rdzogs rnams// gsang chen rab dkyis gzungs chen bdag nyid ma// mkha' dbyings klong yangs bad+ma 'akyil pa ni// gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal ba// ma bcos spos med byang chung skyed po'i sku// cir yang sdang ba ba rtsen brdzu/
20a1(rnying rgyud): drung lha// 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag nyid chen po rags lnga yab yum dang // byang chub lham dral khro ga khro mo'i tshogs// rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag/ rigs lnga dpal chen po rgyal yab yum
20a2(rnying rgyud): gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya sgom bzhi// ye shes sprul pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams// ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung la sogs// legs nyes bstang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod pa'i// phyi nang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// dbang gyur rdo rje dam can
20a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs su gsol// thugs rje'i gdung 'tsho ba rnal 'byor bdag cag gis// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub sems bskyed de// bla med go 'phang bgrod par bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang // sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog
20a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'da' dka' dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams// sde phyir mnos shing gnyer du smras so 'tshal// yun du mi gtong 'da' bar mi bgyid la// don las gol zhing bzlog sems ma mchis kyang // gdod bya long yod snyam
20a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gre lo yis// klong dum b+har rtsal thugs chung ba dang / shes bzhin mi ldan pag med da' gyur te// bsgom la me brtson pa snyed sgru g.yol la sogs// tshong dang mtshong ma ga dbang gis ni// ston pa'i dka/ 'dud dam las 'gal gyur te// rnal 'tshur
20a6(rnying rgyud): gang zhig dam tshig nyams pa dang // skad cig tsam yang phrad par mi bya zhes// bka' las byung yang de ltar ma gyogs te// gsang sgo 'chol bas dbye bas la dka' ba la// mngon shes chung pas skyon can ma rtogs te// nyams dang tshogs 'dres nyams
20a7(rnying rgyud): pa bskang ba dang // nyams dang snod min rnams la chos bshad dang // nyams la mi 'dzem nyams pa'i skyon la sogs// nyams dang 'grogs shing nyams pa de dag gi// nyams grib skyon gyis gos par gyur to 'tshal// tshe 'di'i rkyen dang yun gyi sgrib pa
20b1(rnying rgyud): rnams// rang gnod 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol lo bshags// byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // gnyis med dbyings las mi 'gyur bdag bkod de// mi dmigs btang snyoms dang du bzhugs nas kyang // gnyis med don gyi
20b2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa stsal du gsol// don dam gnyis med spros dang bral ba la// rnam rtog gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam gyis dbang gis na// nongs pa mchis rnams rab gnod bzod par gsol// zhes gsungs so// dri med rgyal po
20b3(rnying rgyud): bshags pa'i rgyud las// ye shes lha dang 'khon gcugs bshags pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rje'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin yab kyi tshogs rnams kyis bshags pa'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa 'di gsungs so//
20b4(rnying rgyud): ston pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yi// lung dang tan tra mang po mdor bsdus shing // gsang sngags ma hA yo ga'i sgor zhugs pa'i// mi 'da' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// dam la gnas shing tshul bzhin bsung ngo zhes// bka' gsang rgyud las des
20b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhin du// mA rig le lo skyid snyom rkyen dbang gis// bka' las 'das shing dam las g.yel gyur pa// rang gnod 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol bshags na// mi dmigs btang snyoms ngang du bzod par bzhes// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
20b6(rnying rgyud): las// sri zhu dad pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis// rdo rje slob dpon thugs dang 'gal ba dang // brtse gdung khrel 'dzem chung ba'i rang shugs kyis// mched dang lcam dral thugs dang 'gal ba dang // sngags dang phyag rgya le los rgyan bcad de// gsung gi dam las
20b7(rnying rgyud): 'das par gyur pa dang // spyi gsang bzhi dang bar gsang brgyad la sogs// gsang bar 'os dang gsang bar gnyar gtad pa// gsang sgo yal bar btang ba la sogs te// rtsa ba'i dam las 'gal ba ci mchis pa// rang gi nod 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol
21a1(rnying rgyud): na bugagasun// mtha gyur thab thogasas bdag zugs/ rnams pa'i canarnams bshags na byung ba dang // grags sdugs padangasathab rna madrug pal// mang ba 'du chugasab // 'dod gas
21a2(rnying rgyud): gti mug nga rgyal dang // phrag dog la sogs nyon mongs lnga rnams ni// gsang sngags bla na med pa'i spyod yul las// kun tu bzang po rol pa che ba'i rgyan// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin la// ye nas yin pa de ltar ma rtogs te// log nom
21a3(rnying rgyud): gis spangs pa bzod par gsol// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga po la// mAM sa bshang gci khu ba rak+ta rnams// ye nas bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrubs pa'i rjes// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gshegs pa'i shul
21a4(rnying rgyud): yenas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la// gtsang sde rnam rtog brtul zhugs chung pa yis// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang du ma rtogs te// dam rjes dang du ma blangs bzod par gsol// srung par bya ba'i dge tshig lnga po la// bye shi med par rtogs pa'i
21a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang // gnas dang dus dang ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// khams gsum mA lus gnas nas bskul ba dang // dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i blta ba dang // sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// thabs dang shes rab mngon spyod sbyor ba dang //
21a6(rnying rgyud): ser sna 'jud gegs can gyi zas dang nor// thabs mkhas 'od zer tshul du ma byin blang // sems can don du 'phags pa mchod pa dang // gsang sngags blta spyod gzhan gyis mi rig phyir// gtir dpag dka' phyir rdzun du smra ba dang // zhing bcu zhe bcad drag
21a7(rnying rgyud): shul spyod pa'i sngags// bka' dang lung las de ltar 'byung bzhin du// spyad cing nyams su ma blangs bzod par gsol// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga po la// phung po lnga dang rnam shes dbang po lnga// 'byung ba lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// kha
21b1(rnying rgyud): dag la dang spyan lnga la sogs rnams// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi yum sngar shes par bya'o zhes// rgyal ba'i bka' las de ltar byung bzhin du// shes rab zhan pas da ltar matogs te// bka' dang gzung las 'gal du
21b2(rnying rgyud): bzod par gsol// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga po la// phyi nang snod bcud snang srid ma lus rnams// ye nas sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin la// bdag gi dbyings las gzhan na mi bzhugs kyang // go rtogs rig pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis// rtogs
21b3(rnying rgyud): paklong dum thur bathod par bzhes// tshogs kyi mchod pa la sgra 'das pa dang // tshogs cig la zas 'brur chags rlung ba dang // rdorje slob dpon thugs dang 'gal ba dang // dam gongs mkha' 'gro thugs dang 'gal ba dang // btso grangs khre' 'a
21b4(rnying rgyud): chung ba'i rang shugs kyis// mched dang lcam dral thugs dang 'gal ba dang // lung dang bka' las 'das pa mthol lo bshags// lta ba 'phangs mchod par gyur pa dang // spyod pa la ma dor bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa mi bzod
21b5(rnying rgyud): pas// rdo rje srin pos snying khrag 'thung ba dang // tshe thung nad mang nor yal dgras 'jigs dang // mnar med dmyal ba shin tu skyi g.ya' bar// sdug bsngal mi bzod yun ring gnas pa rnams// bdag gis dam tshig bshags pa bgyis pa yis//
21b6(rnying rgyud): nyams shing chag pa thams cad sor chud de// go 'phang chen po'i 'bras bu thob par shog/ dus gsum rgyal bas bdag la byin gyis rlobs// dam skongs mkha' 'gro mang pos bdag srungs shing // gnyis med gsang ba'i dbyings nas 'od shar te// mkha'
21b7(rnying rgyud): ltar dag cing rnam rtog mi mnga' yang // sngon gyi thugs rje'i dbang gis bdag bzung ste// yid bzhin sku mchog bdag la bstan pa dang // rig 'dzin dngos grub dbyings nas bdag la stsol// lha dang lha min phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor rnams// mi 'da'
22a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag nyi shu lnga// tshor dang ma tshor ma rig dbang gis na// nyams pa'i skyon gyis gos par gyur to 'tshal// bdag gis dam tshig gdungs pa'i bshags pa 'dis// rnal 'byor
22a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa bskangs gyur nas// go 'phang chen po'i 'bras bu thob par shog/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus rnams// mnyam nyid rdo rje'i gral du gnas par shog/ mkha' 'gro ma yi thugs rjes bdag bzung zhing //
22a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon rnams gtan nas byang ba dang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes gsungs so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ nyams grib bskang ba'i bshags pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// / de dus
22a4(rnying rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin yum gyi tshogs rnams kyis bshags pa 'di gsungs so// ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro dam tshig can// phyi nang srung ma ma lus dgongs su gsol// yun ring dus nas bsten cing bsgrubs pa'i//
22a5(rnying rgyud): lha// srung ma dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol// rdo rje skyob dpon mched dang lham dral dang // rig 'dzin srub po rnams kyang dgongs su gsol// rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i// sku gsum gdung 'tsho ba rnams kyang dgongs su
22a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// bkod pa'i rgyal po dam tshig 'bum sde las// yo ga rnam pa bzhi yi don ched du// mkhyen rab mchog tu gyur pa'i gsang bdag gis// nyi shu rtsa brgyad mdor bsdus grangs bstan pa// rtogs nas bsrung zhing bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i//
22a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal pa gang rje mardzogs par// ga ga sa dngag kyims rgya// bkrang chu pos malas 'a gyu // ga sung mthams da padang // mas sa grangs smra rgyas rgya sa/
22b1(rnying rgyud): u ma padas// sa gsal 'gyu sa mal la bgags/ thob pa su dadu 'a ba'o// ga pas na ma na nag pa gal sanas// na ma ga dad pa sas cos/ sun nga ca /
22b2(rnying rgyud): pa mthol lo bshags// yi dam lA yi ting 'dzin g.yel gyur cing // phyag rgya rnam bzhi gzhung bzhin ma gsal te// sngags dang bzlas brjod snying po bar chod pas// gsung gi dam chog nyams pa mthol po bshags// gsang brtul sogs man dag ga
22b3(rnying rgyud): gtad pa// dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dris med pa la// tshig tu 'dzags shing spyod la macings pa yis// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// spyad par bya ba dmachog rnam pa lnga// lhor rgol ma byin len dang rdzun dus// tshig brgyad la sogs
22b4(rnying rgyud): dramachog smad lnga ni// gnyis su med pa'i ngang du mnyam sbar nas// 'gro ba'i don du gzhung bzhin spyad rtul// bka' dang gzhung baphrin spyad par ma gyur te// ma rig log par smad pa'i nyes byas kyis// spyad pa'i dam tshab nyams pa mthol zhing bshags/
22b5(rnying rgyud): mi ldang ba yi dam chag rnam lnga ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rgyal dang // phrag dog lasogs nyon mongs rnam lnga ni// ye nas rigs lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir// rtogs nas spang du med par gnas rgyal// de bzhin ma rtogs nyon mongs rang
22b6(rnying rgyud): dkAr spyad// mi spang dmachog nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// dang dablang ba'i dmachog lnga po ni// dri chen ni myed mar chen zil pa dang // sha chen la sogs dam rdzas rnam pa lnga// grub pa bzhi dang yin pa gsum la sogs// so song rnam par rtog pa kun gongs
22b7(rnying rgyud): shing // dngos gru bsgrub par byed pa'i thabs chen po// 'dzin rtog med par dang du thang sbrul// gnyis med pa ska bas dang du mablangs te// gtsang sder ba sbag nas tshul bzhin ma blangs pas// rten pa'i dmachog nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// zhes
23a1(rnying rgyud): pa ga sa rnas la// sa dang byung ldan pa// / bdag lda pa cwal gyu pa // / rnamags pa dang sa g+sas// yub rnams byu byu shes pa las// ga ma pa rlu na
23a2(rnying rgyud): rmongs shing 'khrul pas de ltar ma rtogs te// nyan thos la sogs theg pa 'og ma las// rtog pa khyad par can du ma gyur te// shes bya'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga la// rdo rje'i rigs dang de bzhin gshegs
23a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rigs// rin chen rigs dang de bzhin bad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rig sul sogs te sangs rgyas lnga// 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bya nye// skyom grub ting 'dzin le la med pa yis// sgrub pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyid rgyal// 'bad pa'i rgyal chung nom
23a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub yun thung bas// sgrub pa'i 'bras zung drung mthob ste// bsgrub bya'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags// de la sogs te dam tshig chen po yi// gzhung dang 'gal bar gyur pas nyes byas shing // ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro mchog can// ma
23a5(rnying rgyud): gling rgyu mardo'i thugs dang n-i 'gal ba// shin tu gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags// rdorje slob dpon mched dang lha madral dang // rnal 'byor dam can thugs dang ci 'gal ba// dam las 'gal gyur brjod pas mthol zhing bshags// bdag
23a6(rnying rgyud): gis rtsa gcig zol thog med pa yis// skya med sems kyis bshags sbyang 'dri brjod pas// bdag nyid nyams chag sgrib pa 'dir byang nas// tshe 'di nyid la rig 'dzin sa thob ste// byin rlabs cal 'phang gzi brjid nus mthu dang // sku gsung thugs
23a7(rnying rgyud): dngos du bsngal du gsol// zhes gsungs so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ dmatshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i bshags pa ste le'u drug pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmachog la gnas pa'i dpal chen po rnams
23b1(rnying rgyud): kyis bshags pa 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal phyag brnyan ni// thabs mkhas thugs rje ye shes sprul pa dang // rang rgyud rnal 'byor dag pa'i grub pa can// rdo rje lcam dral mang po dgongs su gsol// kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//
23b2(rnying rgyud): snying la gnas pa'i dam tshig byin brlabs pa// theg chen khyed kyis dang du bzhes nas kyang // zhal 'ches gang lags rjes su dgongs par mdzod// bdag gi mig la sogs te dbang po lnga// bems po'i rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pas// khyed kyi sku
23b3(rnying rgyud): gsung mi mthong mi thos te// mun pa'i tshogs dang 'dra bar bcings mod kyi// 'on kyang yid ches sems 'di rtse gcig gis// mngon sum 'dra bar rtag tu rjes dran na// dus gsum kun nas ma bsgribs mkhyen pa yi// rdo rje lcam dral mang po bdag la dgong+ga//
23b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes mngon shes ldan zhing zhugs brtse ba// mthu rgal rmad byung phan pa'i dgongs pa can// gzhan gyis ma bcol nyid kyis zhal 'ches pa// bden par gsungs pas bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/ gang dag byang chub sems dang ldan pa dang // grugasu
23b5(rnying rgyud): sa kyi rnal 'byor spyod pa la// kun nas bsrung zhing re ba bskang ngo zhes// khyed kyi thugs dam mi 'gyur de lags na// bdag la bla med byang chub sems mchis kyis// sku gsung rnal 'byor brtson par bgyid lags na// rdo rje dam can ma lus rgya mtsho yis//
23b6(rnying rgyud): kun nas bsrung zhing re ba bskang du gsol// theg chen rnal 'byor bskyang bar zhal 'ches pa'i// dus dang tshad mkhyen mthu dang ldan bzhin du// skyes mchog khyed kyang btang snyoms mdzad na ko// dang po'i dam bcas 'gal bar mi 'gyur ram// gang gis gang
23b7(rnying rgyud): la rang gis dam bcas pa// de yis de nyid don du gnyer dgongs pa// gzhan gyis bskul zhing gsol gdab mi 'tshal na// nyid kyi thugs dam 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// bdag gi dam tshig rdo rje'i mchog gsum po// khyed kyi thugs dam mchog kyang
24a1(rnying rgyud): de lags pas// rigs mi mthun kyang dam tshig gis bsdus na// lham dral tshul du nye zhing gdung bar mdzod// sngon 'das dus na bstan pa 'jig la sogs// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs gang byung yang // khyed kyi rdugs//
24a2(rnying rgyud): rje lhag par der phyung zhing // drag shul thabs kyis 'dul ba ji bzhin du// da lta dus ngan bstan pa 'jig la sogs// sdig pa'i 'bras bu smin par khyed mkhyen gyis// rdo rje lham dral ma lus rgya mtsho yis// so so'i thugs dam chen po dgongs mdzod pa//
24a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du phrin las mdzod// dbang phyug la sogs byed por khas 'ches kyang // de nyid dngos po lta bur byed mi nus// khyed ni sgyu ma'i chos la mnga' brnyes pas// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin cir yang grub par mdzod// mi nus mngon shes mthu dang
24a4(rnying rgyud): mi ldan yang // dam tshig chos phyir srog lus phongs pa med// khyed ni thogs med mthu dang ldan bzhin du// 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs ci phyir bskul las bshags// srid pa las kyi dus la ma bab ces// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las mi mdzad cing // tham
