24a5(rnying rgyud): cad kun la las kyi dbang btsan na// thugs rje'i byin rlabs su la ci zhig bgyi// gang zhig chos min 'gal bar spyod pa yang // 'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ram// shes rab snying rje thabs dang mi 'gal ba'i// re ba bskang ba lta zhig smos ci 'tshal//
24a6(rnying rgyud): 'dra' dka' rdo rje dam tshig mchog bsrung bar// grub pa khyed dang 'dra ba ma lags na// chos srung 'gro don bdag gis mi lcogs pas// byin rlabs mchog dang ldan par mdzad du gsol// dam tshig nyams pa la sogs nyes pa rnams// tshe rabs
24a7(rnying rgyud): 'di la nyams su myong 'gyur ba// chos dbyings 'gro don bdag gis rtogs pa ru// chos la dbang bsgyur khyed kyis bzlog tu gsol// thugs rje brtse ldan rdo rje lcam dral la// 'di skad bskul zhing gsol lta mi 'tshal na// zhe sdang mtha' yi sems
24b1(rnying rgyud): kyis mi gsol te// 'gro don byang chub sems kyis smre lags na// thugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa bzod par gsol// 'phags pa'i bka' chad bdag la mi gtong zhing // thugs rje rgyan pas tshangs pasngal du gsol// dri med rgyal po bshags da /
24b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ rdo rje dpal chen gyi bshags pa ste/ le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i chog kyi bzhags pa 'di gsungs so// oM ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug
24b3(rnying rgyud): khro rgyal gtso// bde chen gnyis med yum gyi dbyings su myor// bdag tu blta ba'i nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa'i// dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// ta na'i gnas mchog sgrol ba gnas ma stobs// ga Na'i gnas mchog sbyor ba byin ma
24b4(rnying rgyud): brlabs// dpal chen lo rgyal thugs dang ce 'gal ba// thugs rje tshe mnga' khye la bzod par gsol// rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa tan gaN ni// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'gro// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan bas ma yas kyis// ye shes/
24b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum thugs rje yis// rtse gcig sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzod la// bar gcod byed pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du zlog/ grub pa'i 'bras bu dus 'dir stsal du gsol// hUM rdo rje mkha'
24b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro dbang phyug go rje brgyad// sa~M dz+ha la sogs yul gyi phra men brgyad// ti ga dong la sogs 'bar mkhro mo bzhi// dpeng gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// oM bsgom ba srub dus las g.yel bar gyur pa yis// sgrub pa'i rdzas ma chog bdud rtsi
24b7(rnying rgyud): a mr-i ta// dus drug mchod pa'i tshul du ma sbyar ba// bzod par gsol la tshangs pa stsal du gsol// byang chub sems dang mAM sa rak+ta dang // dri chen dri rgyag kud ha na// gnyis med sbar ba'i sman mchog a mr-i tas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i thugs
25a1(rnying rgyud): dam bskar gyur cig/ 'bar ba'i sku mchog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud dang srin po ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// rtse gcig sgrub pa po la zhal skyon la// bar gcod byed pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du ga/ oM sha na mkha po
25a2(rnying rgyud): phyug nyi shu brgyad// srid gsum rgyal mo dur khrod brgyad kyi yum// gtso mo mngon spyod ma bdun 'khor dang bcas// dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// mchod pa lo zla'i dus las 'das pa dang // rdzas dang phyag rgya dus 'dir mjogs she/
25a3(rnying rgyud): dmar gyi dam las g.yel gyur te// sha za mkha' 'gro'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// bzod par gsol lo tshangs par sbal du gsol// dur khrod rdzas mchog thal chen ba suta// sha zag dmar gyi mchod pa rab sbyar te// d+hat+ta'i snod du dmar chen bskyil ba 'di /
25a4(rnying rgyud): shwa za mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam paska gyur cig// oM thon tsha dpal chen khro rgyal spyan snga ru// sras kyang ma bcol nyid kyis zhal 'ches te// rtse gcig sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzod la// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor srungs shig/ oM las kyi mkha'
25a5(rnying rgyud): sa / kyigs ba / nga pag
25a6(rnying rgyud): cing // gnyid chang rmongs pas skye mchod ma skyongs pa// bzod par gsol lo tshangs par stsal du gsol// dam tshig lhag ma kha chu'i 'od zer 'phro// kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin a mr-i ta// sha khrag bdud rtsi'i mchod pa chen po 'das// las mi mkha'
25a7(rnying rgyud): thugs dam ba skad gyur cig/ oM stong khams yongs su 'chol bar gyur mod kyang // bdag ni rdo rje'i dam las mi 'da' zhing // dpal chen bsgom bslu ba las la brtson lags na// skyes chen khyed kyi thugs dam mnyes gyur cig/ dur khrod klong dgu'i mkha' 'gro
25b1(rnying rgyud): rna ba tho chags// khabs gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal cing zab// thams mgon byed kyis thugs pa ga dgas la// dbu pa tshogs me sngar 'bar bzhi ba mdzod// thugs 'i gdung ma ba dag 'dzin pa dag gas no// dang par byang srab rgya tshogs /
25b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed nas// 'da' dka' rdo rje'i dam tshig mchog gsum po// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'da' bar me bgyid la// gsang sngags 'chol bar gyur gyis gsal ka mod// nyams dang tshogs 'dres gyur pa bskang so 'tshal// b+h+rUM sems nyul bas skyon can ma
25b3(rnying rgyud): rtogs te// rang gnod 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol bshags na// grogs ngan nyams grib skyon gyis ma gos shing // nyams pa rnams la chad pa sgor bcad de// 'di phyi'i rkyen dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bar// phra men sbrul tshogs dbye bsal mdzad du gsol//
25b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bshags pa'i len ste brgyad pa'o// de nas longs spyod chen pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug zin pa rnams kyis chos nyid zhi ba'i
25b5(rnying rgyud): bshags pa 'di gsungs so// kun bzang yab yum gsan cing dgongs su gsol// yid dang chos ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// kun bzang yab yum dgongs spyod de 'dra yang // de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te// kun bzang yab yum
25b6(rnying rgyud): thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// rgyal ba rigs lnga gsan cing dgongs su gsol// phung po lnga ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dgongs spyod de 'dra yang // de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs
25b7(rnying rgyud): te// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// rigs kyi yum rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol// 'byung ba lnga ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// rigs kyi yum lnga'i dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
26a1(rnying rgyud): blan ga sa pa smram ga// rnams gas // sa sa ba// nga pa //
26a2(rnying rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas// sems dpa' ba rgyang byed gongs spyad 'dra yang // de ltar bdag gi sngam rig mtshugs te// sems dpa' ba hrI nag sad ci dag pab// drug mapa med pa bdeng ba shagal// de ga
26a3(rnying rgyud): dgangs su gsol// yul bzhengs bzhi yanas mngan sangs rgyas// sems ma brgyad kyi dgongs spyod du dra yang // de ltar bdag gis rig pa rtogs te/ pa brgyad ci zugs dang rnaM gal pa// thags ches
26a4(rnying rgyud): thubang drug rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol// nyan mongs drug ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// thub pa drug gi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang // de skar bdag gis mdag pa rtogs te// theb pa cwa /
26a5(rnying rgyud): brjod par gsal// sgo ba bzhi rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsal// tshad med bzhini yi nas mngon sangs rgyas// sgo ba bzhi yi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang // de ltar bdag gis ma reg ma rtogs// srob bzhi mi rdzag /
26a6(rnying rgyud): rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// sgom bzhi rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol// rtag chad mu bzhi ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// sgom bzhi me dgongs spyod de 'dra yang // de ltar bdag gis ma rig pa rtogs te// so ma bani ye drug
26a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul ba// thugs rje tshe mngal khyung la bzod par gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis zhi ba'i bshags pa di gsungs so// mi rang rig ye shes blo dngam ldan pas// bdag gis kyi so lapas dpa
26b1(rnying rgyud): rnams// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor lha ru sbyor ma 'tshal// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu gnyis la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// yid chos kun bzang yab yum sbyar ma 'tshal// ma reg rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs/
26b2(rnying rgyud): bzang yab yum sku la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// phung po lnga po ribs lngar sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i skul bzod par gsol// rang reg ye shes blo dang me
26b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// 'byung ba lnga rnams yum lngar sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// rigs kyi yum lnga'i sku la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// shes bzhi dbang bzhi sems dpar sbyor ma'i 'tshal//
26b4(rnying rgyud): ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// yul bzhi dus bzhi sems mar sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// byang
26b5(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i tshogs la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// nyon mongs drug po thub par sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// thub drug sprul pa'i sgra la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes
26b6(rnying rgyud): dang mi ldan pas// reg sogs rnam bzhi sgo bar sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang sems pa dag tu bzung bas nongs// sgo skyong khro bo bzhi la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// rtag chad mu bzhi sgo mar sbyor ma 'tshal// ma rig rang
26b7(rnying rgyud): sems pa dag tu bzung bas nongs// sgo skyong khro mo bzhi la bzod par gsol// rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas// ma rig dbang gis 'khrul pas nongs bgyis pa// nyon mongs las kyis yi dam lha spangs te// slu byed dbang gis slob dpon
27a1(rnying rgyud): steng nas spyad// dartul rdugs pas mched dang lham dral dbugs// srab la 'byar bas gsang sngags gzhan la sbrelA// sar gA'i dbang gis mchod padus lus 'das// grogs don sgron ses gsang nga cag zug/ brgya
27a2(rnying rgyud): zhugs chung bas bgegs sran tshar mchod// jam zhing thug rngub lcug phur nyams la sogs// tshe rabs thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// tshe 'di'i lus bzung da ste yan chad du// sdig pa mi dge'i las rnams ci dgyis pa// dus reg dus
27a3(rnying rgyud): bad gsol// 'phags pa lags pas khyekhyod kyis dang dudu zhes// sems can lags pas bdagu nongs 'khrul pa mchis// l+h+wa ma lags pas bshags na gnang bar mdzod// thabs la mkhas pas tshangs pa skal dugs pa// zhes byas sa // da
27a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs brtanas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum thams cad kyis zhi ba'i lha tshogs la bshags pa 'di gsungs so// kun tu bzang po thugs mchog rin po che// khams gsum dbang du spyad pa yab lags shing // don dem dbyings su sbed pa
27a5(rnying rgyud): yum lags kyi// bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sgra bslus shing // bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes// kun bzang yab yum sku la bzod par gsol// rigs lnga sangs rgyas thugs mchog rin po che// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab legs
27a6(rnying rgyud): shing // don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi// bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs su bsdus shing // bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes// rigs lnga yab yum sgra la bzod par gsol// sems dpa' sems ma thugs mchog rin po che/
27a7(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yaMb lags shing // don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi// bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing // bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes// sems dpa' sems ma'i sku la bzod par gsol// sku
27b1(rnying rgyud): sku badrug su mchog rin zlan// bcad kyi sems can khams gsum dbang du spyad // snod kyi 'jig rten don dam dbyings sa sbyor// bdag sras lha mar ma rtogs su bzlas shing // bdag cag nyams chug sems la 'gyod pa smos// sbrul su thub pa drug pa
27b2(rnying rgyud): bzod par gsol// sgo bsgo mthugs mchog rin po che// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab lags shing // don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi// bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs su bslus shing // bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'byod ba
27b3(rnying rgyud): sgo bsgom rnams la bzod par gsol// zhes gsungs so// ji med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i bshags pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dmachog la gnas pa'i rdul 'thor gyi dbang
27b4(rnying rgyud): b+hag chen pa rnams kyis/ khyo bo'i dkyil mkhor la bshags pa 'di 'gro ba'i don drugasungs so// mau dang po rang bzhin mnyam pa da kyil 'khor nga // gAzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bdag dang mthal bas// gnyis su med pa'i gnas lpags don ma rtogs/
27b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med chos kyi sku la bzod par gsol// don dam mi 'gag gsal ba'i go 'byed pa'i// zla gsal drang ba'i dbyings su smra bzhengs la// byang chub thig le'i 'od kyis khyab mdzad pa// kun snang drang ba'i sku la bzod par gsol// don dam gye ba med
27b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mkha' dbyings las// 'bras bu yon tan 'byung ba'i skur sdang ba// dbang chen rim gyis bskyed pa'i bzhugs gnas rten// dbang chen gzhal yas gsal bar ma gyur pa// pho brang 'bar ba'i klong du bzod par gsol// bde chen nyid las phyag
27b7(rnying rgyud): rgya'i skur snang zhing // ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan rang rang bsdams// ji ltar gsal ba'i ngang du ma gyur pa// 'jigs byed he ru ka la bzod par gsol// gnyis med sku la 'khril ba'i gzungs mchog ma// pad+ma'i don la chags pa'i mkha' dbyings su// 6
28a1(rnying rgyud): med byang chub sems kyi 'od slo ba// po d+hI tha d+hi'i sbrul bzod par gsol// thugs las skyes pa'i ye shes khro mo rnams// rnam shas drar khrod brgyad mi mkha' 'grom// gdi la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba// gnas kyim bca
28a2(rnying rgyud): la bzod par gsol// thugs rngo ni ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // log rtog mtshan mar 'dzin bzhi pa'i phyir// mchog shog rngam pa 'bar ba'i skur sprul pa// si ta la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba// yul gyi phra men brgyad la brjod par ga/
28a3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'gugs dang 'ching dang sdom dgyes sgo ma bzhi// rta gdong la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba// sgo bzhi phyag rgya rnams pa bzod par gsol// mngon spyod las las grub pa'i dbang phyug ma// dge dang pi dag gnyis kyi
28a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// mtshogs dbang phyug zugs dang ci 'gal ba// ma srid rgya mtsho rnams la bzod par gsol// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // phra mo'i ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur pas// yon tan 'dzin
28a5(rnying rgyud): rnams la bzod par gsol// bdag gis skye ba thog ma ma mchis nas// da lta'i lus 'di bzung ba yan chad du// ma rig dbang gis srid pa'i khams kun 'khor// ji srid mi lus blangs nas gar skyes kyang // mtshams med lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga// sdig pa'i las
28a6(rnying rgyud): kyir ma ci mchis pa// dngos kyis bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // de la rjes su yi rang bgyis pa rnams// byang chub thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // tshangs par mdzad nas dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas dam tshig la
28a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis 'di gsungs so// hU~M bskal pa dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong // dug lnga gnas kyar ye shes he ru ka/ dbyings kyi yum chen khro mo lnga dang sbyor// gau r-I la sogs nang gi mkha' 'gro bzhi/
28b1(rnying rgyud): gas sogs kyi yirna pa 'bye pa/ satalasags pa ca ga na gas// kri d+hal sogs mamams kyi gsheg sa/ nga sasus dang g+sa rgyud// bcwa sus nga bya thos gsungs
28b2(rnying rgyud): 'thung skya tshogs sku yang ma gsal zhing // snying po grangs nyungs phyag rgya gnas ma son// tshogs dang 'byor pas gnas snga ma bskangs pa// khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la bzod par gsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor kyi
28b3(rnying rgyud): phyag pho mo rnams kyis/ ha ru ka'i dkyil 'khor la bshags pa 'di gsungs so// oM dang por gsang mchog sdom pa 'di mnos nas// 'da' dka' khas blangs dam las g.yel gyur te// khrag 'thung rigs lha'i thugs dang tsaM 'gal ba// thugs rje che mang
28b4(rnying rgyud): khyod la bzod par gsol// gaNa'i sgor mchog tog 'dzin par chad kyis// yum rkyen po ng+ge'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// khro mo dbyings phyag lnga la bzod par gsol// rdzas dang phyag tu mngon du ma gyur te// sha zag dri'i thugs dang ci 'grel ba// gnas kye ma
28b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad sku la bzod par gsol// sha khrag mchod pa gzhung bzhin ma 'tshogs te// sid+d+ha pra min thugs dang ci 'gal ba// yul gyi mkha' 'gro'i sku la bzod par gsol// shar lho nub byang sgo mazhe ma phyed de// ta gdong sgo ma'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// ye shes
28b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi la bzod par gsol// 'da' dka' khas blangs 'khor drug mthul te// ma bdun sring bzhi'i thugs dang ci 'gal pa// mkha' 'gro bcu gcig skul bzod par gsol// longs spyod 'byams nas tshogs kyi phud nyams te// phud gal dbang phyug zugs dang cang
28b7(rnying rgyud): pa// dbang mo nyi shu brgyad la bzod par gsol// gnas lam brten bya byed 'byung 'jug gis// ti ra'i gnas rgyal thugs dang ci 'gal ba// gnas rgyal chen mo'i sku la bzod par gsol// sku mnyes pha ma'i tshul du mgyur te// rdo rje slob dpon thugs dang ci 'phrul
29a1(rnying rgyud): da rgyal ba'i skul bzad par gsopa// ting 'dzin pa rnams ni thom byed de// dang rgyal the na thugs dang ni 'gal ba// na pa sgron mo'i skal bzod pa gso// la lo zlos pas phyag rgya rgyun chad do// kAr+m+ma las mkhan thugs da rgya
29a2(rnying rgyud): 'gal ba// las kyi slob dpon skul bzod par gsol// skyong ba'i tshen tshad la ma phebs te// shes rab snyems ma'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// gsang sum rig mo'i skul bzod par gsol// rgol ba'i chen nyid 'dzin gnas ma stobs// phre
29a3(rnying rgyud): dang ci 'gal ba// sgrol ging bdag po'i skul bzod par gsal// sbrul sku khro mo'i thugs su mgyur te// 'gugs 'dren po nya'i bugs dang ci 'gal ba// mgyogs byed las mdzad stsal bzod par gsol// le lo'i dbang gis brtse gdung rgyan chad dra/
29a4(rnying rgyud): rtsug ma zed lha thugs dang ci 'gal ba// rdo rje ming sring skal bzod par gsol// khro mo'i phyir na dam tshig nyams la sogs// phyi nang rjes gtsad thugs dang ci 'gal ba// dam tshig phyir byed la bzod par gsal// longs spyod gsol nas lhag pa'i spyod
29a5(rnying rgyud): haM/ bru~M 'khor brten pa'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje che mda' khye la bzod par gsol// bzod par mdzad nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol// dri med rgyal pa bshags pa'i rgyud las/ khro ba'i dkyil 'khor khrag 'thang la bshag pa ste la ru bcu ro//
29a6(rnying rgyud): ni nas yang dpal chen po haM d+yA ka la sogs pa'i dmatshig la gnas pa'i gtso' khor rnams kyis bshags pa 'di gsungs so// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems// dri med drung mo dog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// rngam dag 'od gsal zla 'ad dkyil du
29a7(rnying rgyud): mdzes// ji ltar maba' la nyi 'od 'bum ba dal zhing // dpa ni rjod par stong 'bar lham me ba// srid pa gsum gyis mkhan kun par zags// khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcigs// byams mgon thugs rnga'i sgra khyod dgangs sugasal// bdag ni thon
29b1(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// lam log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams// sngon tshe las log sdig pa spyod pas nongs// sdig pa'i las rnams ci byas rang gnongs 'gyod// dar zhing drags pa'i las dbang de btsan pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsha
29b2(rnying rgyud): phyi khyer te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mes ni rang rgyud bsregs// gti mug mun pa 'thebs pas shes rab ljongs// 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i 'dam du rnam shes bying // nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan// phrag dog drung dmar 'tshubra pas 'khor bar g.yengs/
29b3(rnying rgyud): bdag tu blta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su lhung // sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad char ltar 'bab// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' zhing // sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas// rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu
29b4(rnying rgyud): gdungs gyur te// phung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam// bdag 'dra blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams chu trad skyes// skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad// yi chad
29b5(rnying rgyud): kyang las la bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra// las dbang chu klung 'phral dug la ldog/ rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las byung // bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngom thogs// lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du song // las/
29b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rlung dmar drag po des bdas pas// bdag ni de sngon bskal pa grangs med du// 'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 'khyams pa la// nye gnas khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa'i gnas sbyangs nas// ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs
29b7(rnying rgyud): drung da lta 'khod// nyi ltar 'od 'bar zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bas mi ngoms pa// thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis// ldongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon khyod de sngon gang na bzhugs// las
30a1(rnying rgyud): dbang das pas ma pa da smras// kun ga ci smrig pa 'ab 'dugs nas// dug su sngags 'di 'dun cig/ nywa Tag pa pa sa 'ab lags// sas gan sus sa su 'dam dag /
30a2(rnying rgyud): nam nig 'dri po lus sems 'bral ba'i tshe// dge pa shes thogs de thal te gshin rjes khring// de tshe 'jig rten nyings mi stongs te// las kyi bang dgis bdag nyed gcig zung 'dzums// dus deng bdag la mgoni sgribs ma mdzes nA// gleng gi
30a3(rnying rgyud): bshos du las ma bzhes par// da lta nyid du brtan te mngon spyod mdzod// las kyis mnar ba'i bya ba bdag 'drab// thog ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gan sa las mthar te// bskal pa grangs med skye ba'i snyed du// do
30a4(rnying rgyud): bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te// sha rngus bas gsan 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam// rdug khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam// las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang // khamos gsum bgrangs shing gyi shi'i kha brgyud kyang // byas pa'i las
30a5(rnying rgyud): rnams don med chud do zos// skye bgrangs med ji snyed de tsam gyi// skye ba gcig gcig khon tsam gyi lus// zla med byang chub dun du rab spyad na// de tsam byas pa'i las la don rab yod// don gyis yang ye mya ngan 'das zin na// las kyi dbang btson nyon mongs
30a6(rnying rgyud): stongs chebs// sha khrag 'dus pa'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams// sdug bsngal bzod dka' srid pa'i btson rang rgyud// mi bzed drug pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta ba// nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung // thig pa'i las rnams byams mgon d+hA
30a7(rnying rgyud): la bshags// thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyun bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol// ma rig log pa'i las kyi dbang btsan pas// mi shes mun pa'i nang du gtan 'thams na// ye shes sgron me'i zer gyis mi stongs sam// nyes byas las kyi
30b1(rnying rgyud): rnam smin ma bzod na// thugs rje chen pos phrin las mi mdzad dam// phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhur lags na// thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam// dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sprin gyis mi
30b2(rnying rgyud): gso'am// las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal mer 'bar na// thugs rje bsil ba'i chu rgyun mi 'bebs sam// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying gyur na// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyangs
30b3(rnying rgyud): sbyangs nas// nam zhig rang gis 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma mchis// bdag nyid las 'phro'i dbang btsan bzhag na lta// thugs rje che zhes su la ci zhig bgyi// dpa' po khyod la thugs rje'i stobs mnga' zhing // sngon rgya
30b4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba'i las kyi 'phro btson na// yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par// snying nas da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha// zhes dregs pa can rnams kyis bshags so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ rU tra'i smre bshags ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// /
30b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod kyi bdag po chen po rnams kyis/ rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// chos nyid dus gsum spros pa med pa la// 'dzin rtog med pa'i rang rig ye shes kyis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las// yul dang
30b6(rnying rgyud): dbang po gnyis su med par bshags// yum gyi b+ha ga dgyes pa'i pho brang du// yab kyi rdo rje gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa la// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su med par bshags// ting 'dzin rnam gsum blo yi bdang bcad
30b7(rnying rgyud): nas// phung po rnam shes yul dang dbang po rnams// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas// 'gro drug sems can rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par mdzod// ces kyad rnal 'byor chen po ltar bshags so//
31a1(rnying rgyud): de nas lung sbyar bshags pa 'di gsungs so// rtsa srog tsat+ta lus dag yid gsum po// klu rgya gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad// rdo rje klong dgra dpal chen tu nAka/ khams gsums dgra gnyis su med par bshags// dza
31a2(rnying rgyud): bAlba yi kyil 'khong bu// spring po brjod pas smram tshag rdzogs pa'i dzal// dbyer med mnyam nyid nge ba nyid kyi smra// thabs la mkhas pas gnyis su med par bshags// byi nang spyod bcud gnyis med chos kyi phra// nga dang bdag gongs nyid mnyam pas/
31a3(rnying rgyud): ris ngan song rgyu 'bras rnam gnyis po// gnyis med bde chen klong du mthar phyin shog/ ces lung rjes su rnal 'byor ltar bshags so// de nas man ngag ltar bshags pa 'di gsungs so// ji ltar snang ba kun bzang bde chen gnas// yod med rtag chad mtshan mo'i
31a4(rnying rgyud): tshig las 'das// 'di ltar ma rtogs bdag nyid gang yin pa// de nyid ma spangs rtogs pa'i klong du bshags// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur ba tshig btags pa med// rtsol med bsgrub med nam mkha'i dang du gnas// yang la khyab pas kun gyis 'dod dgur sbyar//
31a5(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log rtog byang chub lam du bshags// rtogs pa'i man ngag don du mi ldan na// tshig gis mtshon pas byang chub me 'thob ste// rang sems ye nas sangs rgyas yin shes pas// rang byung ye shes klong du mthar byin shog/ de ltar bshags na sgrub pa thams cad
31a6(rnying rgyud): dang // nyon mongs las ngan ma spangs rang dag nas// 'bras bu yang dag sangs rgyas 'thob bo zhes// man nga ga rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ltar bshags so// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud lung man dag gi bshags pa skye lenu bcu gnyis pa'o//
31a7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i rang nas blta ba'i klong bshags 'di gsungs po// chos kyi dbyings nyid spros pa med pa la// gzung 'dzin gnyis su bltas yongs dogrol// dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa nyon mongs// spros med/
31b1(rnying rgyud): rnyan klong dru bshags par bgyi// kun tu dbang po bzang ngan med pa la// bzang ngan gnyis su blta ba zang chad// gtsang dang sme bar 'dzin pa nyon dmongs// bzang ngan med pa'i klong du bshags par bgyi// mnyam pa nyid la che chung med pa la// sangs rgyas sems can panywa/
31b2(rnying rgyud): mongs grol// che chung gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon mongs// mnyam nyid bde chen klong du bshags par bgyi// byang chub sems la skye shi med pa la// 'di dang phye mang blta batha~Mng chad// skye shi gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon ro mongs// 'chi med g.yung drung klong du bshags pa
31b3(rnying rgyud): bgyi// thig le chen po gla zur med pa la// gzugs dang rdzas su blta ba zang re chad// gla zur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// kun nas zlum pa'i thig le chen por bshags// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang nyid la// thog ma tha mar blta ba yongs re gol//
31b4(rnying rgyud): 'pho 'gyur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// 'gyur ba med pa'i thig le chen por bshags// rang byung ye shes btsal du med pa la// rgyu 'bras gnyis su blta ba thang re chad// rtsol bsgrub gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// rtsol ba med pa'i rang byung klong du bshags/
31b5(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes rtag chad med pa la// rtag chad gnyis su 'dzin pa snying re rje// yod dang med par blta ba nyon re mongs// rtag chad med pa'i ye shes klong du bshags// chos dbyings rnam dag mtha' dbus med pa la// phyogs ris mtha' dbus spro bsdu thang de
31b6(rnying rgyud): chad// mtha' dbus gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// chos dbyings rnam dag mtha' dbus med par bshags// gzhal yas khang la phyi nang med pa la// phyi dang nang du blta ba thang re chad// yangs dog gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// yangs dog phyi nang med
31b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i glong du bshags// yum gyi mkha' dbyings mtho dma' med pa la// steng 'og gnyis su blta ba snying de rje// mtho dma' gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon ro mongs// b+ha ga yang sa dog med pa'i klong du bshags// chos kyi skul dbye ba med pa la// yul
32a1(rnying rgyud): dang soms bas ba bad na// gas sa na tan dmang // sas med pa'i la shes gyu bzhugs// rig pa'i ye shas nang nasam sha ngas// ngan ngas na na dang // gzugs da
32a2(rnying rgyud): la dngos po mtshan mang 'dzin// ye shes rang bzhin klong du ma zol lo bshags// skye ba med pa'i don de martogs na// gang zag 'khrul pa'i sgra ni yongs dgol// phye med chos par dang bdag tu bzung // bde chen gyi med song du ba
32a3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid don de blol ma gsal bas// snang srid sgyu ma yin par ma shes te// zang zing nor la chags pa'i sems ni skyes// chos nyid skye med chags pa med par bshags// 'khor ba rang bzhin med par ma shes pas// dngos po mtshan ma'i
32a4(rnying rgyud): rtag par 'dzin// mi dge'i las kyis bde ba 'tshol byeng ba// byang chub skyon bral klong du mthol lo bshags// mnyam pa'i don nyid mnyam par ma rtogs pas// gnyen bshes 'khrul pa'i grogs ni rtag par 'dzin// mi shes bye bo sems 'di
32a5(rnying rgyud): rigo la// mnyam nyid chos nyid grong du mdzol lo bshags// chos nyid bden pa'i don dang maphrad na// bden pa'i don por mi dge'i las la brtson// ston pa'i bka' bor mi chos g.yeng bas bskus// chos nyid bde chen klong du mthol po bshags// rig
32a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang sar ma grol bas// rang rig don por g.yeng ba'i las la brtson// 'di 'dri'i don med sems can snying re rje// dbye bsring med pa'i rdzing du bshags par bgyi// ye shes lha tshogs srung ma dam can rnams// dmachog gzhung bzhin grub pa'i
32a7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor la// matogs lta ba'i gros sgrib byung ban// rang gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthal lo bshags// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las// grol lam lta ba'i bshags pa bstan pa'i maT lte bcu gsum pal/
32b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mangs spyod chen po'i dam tshig la gnas pa rnams la/ thabs lam dbang gis yongs su rdzogs pa'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so// oM bdag lus gzhal yas khang du gnas pa'i nang // spyi mgrin snying ga lta ba gsang /
32b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su// drug lnga rnam dag rigs lha yab yum su// bskyed rim dbyings kyi lam dum shes bshags// lus sems ye nas zung 'jug gnas pa la// snang phyogs stong phyogs zung 'jug ma shes te// mnyam bzhag rjes thob nyams lan
32b3(rnying rgyud): shes// ngo bo nyid gsum blta ba'i klong du bshags// ye nas 'khor 'das dbyer med yin pa la// snod bcud gzhal yas khang dang lhar ma shes// 'byung bzhi'i chos la mnga' dbang ma brnyes pa// grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbyer med dang du bshags//
32b4(rnying rgyud): ye nas skye shi med par ma shes pas// martogs 'chi dus snang ba bsgyur ba dang // 'od kyi gong bu skra yi 'bom shes// 'dral ba 'gyi gro dngang du bshags par bgyi// lus kyi rtsa yi gtso bo phal pa rnams// ye nas sprul skur gnas pa ma shes ti//
32b5(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha m+bu rang gas la bsgom ma shes// sbrul zhwa'i rang bzhin lhan gli 'bras bur bshags// lus rtsa bum pa'i dbang dum shes pas// ma hA lo ga'i babyed drim bsgom ma rus// bum dbang dam chog rnams pa mthol lo bshags// tshangs par gyur na
32b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed rim dngos grub stsol// zhes phyi'i dbang gi bshags pa de skad gsungs so// de nas gsang dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// lus gnas yi ge longs sur gnas pa la// 'khor lo rten dang ma rten man ngag gnad// bde ba nyams su len
32b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam ma bsgoms// bdag la byin rlabs lam gyi dang du bshags// nyon mongs dang ni rnam rtog snrel zhi rnams// gsal zhing yangs pa'i rang byung ye shes gnas// snying gar ro rgyang dbu mazung 'jug bde// blta b.rang byung ye shes klong du bshags/
33a1(rnying rgyud): sgra dbyangs ye nas skad du gnas pa la// 'gro ba rigs drug so so'i rang skad dang // gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis yin ma shes// grub mtha' ma 'dres yongs rdzogs dang du bshags// sems kyi 'od gsal se nas/
33a2(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral med// ma bsgoms rang chas yin par ma shes pas// 'chi dus rang gsal 'byung bar ma 'tshal ba// 'da' kha'i gdams ngag 'od gsal dang du bshags// lus gnas yi ge longs sgyur gnas pa la// lam du ma shes bde ba ma bsgoms
33a3(rnying rgyud): pas// gtum mo'i drod kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa// 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ngang du bshags// gsang ba dbang gi gdams ngag shes gyur kyang // rang gi bde ba lam du ma longs te// gtum mo'i drod rtags lus la ma shar ba// gsang dbang dam
33a4(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// zhes nang gi gsang dbang gi bshags pa de skad gsungs so// de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// lus khams bdud rtsi rang la gnas pa la// yum bdag 'dod pa'i byin rlabs mnyam
33a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes kyi bsdus rgyas rnams// ma bsgoms 'khor lo thabs kyi lam du bshags// bde ba ye nas rang la gnas pa la// go rim gnas dang spar bya ngo bo yi// bde ba rnam bzhi nyams su ma lon pa// bde bzhir blta ba
33a6(rnying rgyud): lhan skyes rang du bshags// bde ba rang la gnas par ma shes shing // sdug bsngal rkyen gyis bde ba ma bsgoms pas// bde stong rgya chung grub mtha' ma rtogs pa// lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i rang du bshags// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ma shes
33a7(rnying rgyud): bris// daci shid dang spang sbyar mjug// mkhong sa ban sa bad ba ma 'byungs pa// 'dal dngas mas dang nga du bshags// yi nas bdud rtsi thegs can dran-i// chos sru ma med par gnas palas// ma zhes ma rtogs du
33b1(rnying rgyud): spangs pa// 'bras bu mas kyi sku yang nga du gshags// dri can drin mas pagabrel// 'byung ba bag ste/ khams kyi bdud rtse pa// bde ba chog padan ma rtag zal bdag// kun byas sa shas dang ga pa shags// gas gsang danas dang dra
33b2(rnying rgyud): shes kyi dbang gi bshags pa de lta gsungs so// de nas bde ba chen po'i dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so// thabs dang shAs rab gnyis ka rang gnas kyang // thabs kyi chud dang shis rab rgyu dgu dang // gnyis gang rgyud la dag par ma spangs pa/
33b3(rnying rgyud): rba rlabs lam gsum dang du bshags// lus ngag sems dang lus sems gnyis kA la// phan 'dogs rang la gnas par ma shes pas// rgyu mthun rnam spen skyes bu byed pa dang // dri ma med pa'i yon tan ma shes pa// blta ba'i chos rnams rnam dag dang
33b4(rnying rgyud): du bshags// blta ba dang gnas nyams su ma myong bas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i grub mtha'i rtags ma shar// bde stong rgya che'i grub mtha' ma rtogs pa// 'khor 'das chos rnams bde stong gcig tu bshags// sbyangs dang goms dang las la sbyar
33b5(rnying rgyud): du med// martogs dbang gis sbyangs goms las ma sbyar// srog rtsol rlung la goms par ma gyur pa// 'da' kha phyag rgya chen po'i dang du bshags// ye shes thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi sku// ma sbyangs gnas lugs don du ma rtogs pas// lam bstan
33b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rbarlabs lam ma bsgoms// 'bras bu ro bo nyid kyi sku ru bshags// srog dang rtsol ba lnga yi bdag nyid la// rtsa ba phung po rnam shes yan lag sogs// rlung bcu srog shing gsum du ma rtogs pa// bde ba chen po'i dbang gis klong du bshags
33b7(rnying rgyud): kho byed pa dang can da gi sa sa 'o// 'i rgya pa bag 'i kyis/ bas mi ma dang ga bshags pa rgyal rabacu zhi sa// des pacom ldan 'das yang dan par rdzogs
34a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis/ 'bras bu rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so// oM snang stong zung 'gyu zlos thal nas kyig/ sathob yan na du zag chen phra la rnams pa// mtshan dang dpo byung snang du langs sku
34a2(rnying rgyud): dang // sbyor lam man chad kun la snang ba yi// mdzad pa tha dad ston pa sprul pa'i sku// chos dang gzugs su dbyer med rdo rje'i lha// yon tan ma btsal lhun grub mngon byang s+ya// de ltar ma rtogs su lnga'i nga du bshags// don gsung chos rnams
34a3(rnying rgyud): skye med dang du gnas// skye med smra brjod thams cad gzhi ru 'gyur// rdo rje grag stong dbyer med 'dus ma byas// mngon byang sgra skad mtha' dag thams cad ni// rang byung ye shes ngo bo nyid du gsal// longs sku'i gsung ni rang gi yul rnams la//
34a4(rnying rgyud): yi sgo nas 'khor la go brda sprod// sprul pa'i gsung ni yan lag zug cur snang // gsung lnga ye nas snang tshul martogs pa// gsung lnga ldan grub dang du mthol lo bshags/ stong nyid ye shes dngos po med par gsal/ me long ye shes rtog pa med par shar//
34a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid ye shes bzang drin med pa rigs la// nor rtog spyi dang rang mtshan ma 'dres gsal// b+ha kub bdag gzhan don la col med gyis la// gnas tshul martogs thugs lnga'i ngang du bshags// rang rag byung chub sems nyid ging khams ni// mnam
34a6(rnying rgyud): nem la bteg na 'phar la sogs// rang rig gzhal yas khang snang byi nang med// rang rig 'od byer d+ya h+nA bAh+ma maM// zug re nas 'od bezer drug r+b+ha 'gro// rig pa dang nyi gdan du snang ba ste// 'bras bu'i chos rnams thugs su chud pa'i rtags/
34a7(rnying rgyud): rang reg nyid ni gyen du snang ba nye// 'khor 'das ma grangs spyan gyis brub ni// yon tan martogs ches nyid da nga nga du bshags// nyon mongs rnam par rtog pas sems khengs rnams// sangs byas mdzad pas myed mnyan zhi bar mdzad// rmongs
34b1(rnying rgyud): zhing dbus dang 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnams// shes bya longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas par mdzad// mib rnam dul snang ba'i gang zag rnams// dbang gi las kyis bsdu zhing 'dul bar mdzad// thugs thabs ces mi 'dul gdug pa rnams// mngon
34b2(rnying rgyud): snong drag pos tshad ni gcod par mdzad// de ltar ma rtogs rigs rnams bdag po'i ngang // phyogs ris med cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad// gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo las grol ba// srung thob med par rang snang dag tu thob// las kyi rang bzhin dngos byas te
34b3(rnying rgyud): bai zad// gdul bya gzigs pa'i sku gsung thugs la bshugs// zhes sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las snga'i sgo nas yang dag par bshags pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod kyi bdag po rnams kyis 'dri gsungs so// rtse dmas
34b4(rnying rgyud): them byings kyi le mdug pa// lus bu skri byang bskyed rim sbal ba'i su// yi ga'i 'gros thim thags pa las dag pa// ngag gi sgri babyung rdzogs rim longs spong bu// bdud rtsi khams kyi dngas ma bzud ce la ma// sems kyi ste bdag dang se
34b5(rnying rgyud): mra/ rlung gi 'gros drim mi shugs rje'i drung // lus dgage yed dag ra btud gyi sa// de ltar gnas pa ma togs grong du ni// sku bzhi rlung la ldan phrab dang du bshegs// zhes babs kyi 'bras pa'i gshegs pa gsungs so// dri med kyil po bsha
34b6(rnying rgyud): ba rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i don ma rtogs pa bshags pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so// oM swa gsung thugs kyi sprul pa rigs gsum mgron// de la gnyid pas khams ga
34b7(rnying rgyud): sgron mo yin// rigs lnga 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro sde bzhi rnams// de la gtad pas gsang sngags krung ma yin// sngon sbyangs gang zag chos kyi spyan ldan rnams// de la gtad pas bstan po dar ba yin// gsungs pa'i rgyud chen lung dang mthun par gtang // de ltar
35a1(rnying rgyud): byas bka' srung rnams la bshags// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams mnyes nas sku gsung thugs la bshags pa 'di gsungs so// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas// rdo rje dam can ma lus dgongs
35a2(rnying rgyud): su gsol// dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// sgrub pa'i rig 'dzin byang chub go 'phang du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgrub pa'i phyir// yi dam lha dang rdo rje slob dpon dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig grangs su mnos pa las// dam bcas bka' las
35a3(rnying rgyud): 'da' bar mi bgyi ste// las dang skal bas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // phrag dog la sogs shor nas nongs bgyis pa// rdo rje slob dpon ston pa'i sgron me la// snying nas smad cing dam tshig nyams pa dang // dam
35a4(rnying rgyud): tshig gcig pa'i rdo rje spun rnams la// ngan sems log par blta ba la sogs pa// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// yi dam lha yi phyag rgya ma gsal zhing // sngags kyi bsnyen pa grangs las chad pa dang // dus drug las kyi mchod pa khyad par du// gnyen
35a5(rnying rgyud): skab bskar ba'i cho ga ma bgyis te// bka' ltar ma lcogs gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// rdo rje slob dpon byams pa'i bka' drin gyis// snyan khung brgyud nas sems kyi dkyil du bzhag/ thugs kyi man ngag byin pas dang
35a6(rnying rgyud): tshig 'dres// gsang mtshams 'das nas 'chol bar smras la sogs// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du ma rtogs te// yan lag dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// le lo rto pa las gnyid kyi dbang gyur te// brkyen
35a7(rnying rgyud): sa/
35b1(rnying rgyud): lam du// yo byad 'byor tshogs chung ba mthol lo bshags// yi dam lha tshogs rnams kyi spyan lam du// mngon rtogs slong len bgyis pa mthol lo bshags// mkha' 'gro sde bzhi rnams kyi spyan lam du// khas blangs dam bca' nyams pa mthol lo
35b2(rnying rgyud): bshags// chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi spyan lam du// gtor ma lo zlar 'gyangs pa mthol lo bshags// dus gsum pham rnams kyi spyan lam du// drin la lan gyis ma lon mthol lo bshags// mched dang ldum dral rnams kyi spyan lam du// dam tshig rtse
35b3(rnying rgyud): gdung chung ba mthol lo bshags// 'gro drug sems can rnams kyi spyan lam du// snying rje phan sems chung ba mthol lo bshags// so sor thar pa rnams kyi sdom pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa dang // rig pa 'dzin pa sngags kyi dam tshig sogs// 1
35b4(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad mthol bshags mi 'chab po// mi sbed slan chad gcod cing sdom par bgyid// dus gsum byas bsags sdig sgrib mthol bshags na// tshangs par mdzad nas sku gsung thugs la sogs// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes gsungs
35b5(rnying rgyud): nas 'khod rnams rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba ste le'u bcu drug pa'o// // dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong pa'i lung / bshags pa thams cad
35b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi mA la mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyigs dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // dus kyis yi ge rgyan 'byugs par mdag pa rnams sngar gyi dpe khungs thub dag la gtugs shing gong ma'i gsung rgyan dang /
35b7(rnying rgyud): gtsung don pa dpyad de rang bzos pa bslad pa dge slong ngatsho gyis bzhad pa brda tshig gnyis ka dpyi byin grus dag par bgyis te yid gtan du rung ba'i phyi mor bsngags pa dag par bas shis par gyur cig// slar yang sngar nas gams dang dor phyogs rig tun song kyis pas tshi 'byung gar de chad lhag rnams zhib par gcos te yid brtan du rung bar bgyis pa'o// /
36a1(rnying rgyud): rmA gar skad du/ badz+ra ta dza sIn drA la tan+ta/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gzi ldan 'bar ba'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thob pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
36a2(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems rdo rje yum gyi b+ha ga lA/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen po la dbyer med par bzhugs so// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na bar du gcod pa'i
36a3(rnying rgyud): bsam sbyor ngan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ste/ gang zag gi mi la log par spyod pa dang / bdud dang bgegs la log par spyod pa phyogs gcig tu gyur te/ de la mi la logs par spyod pa ni/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang /
36a4(rnying rgyud): nas na nga
36a5(rnying rgyud): la btsongs/ bsam pa ma dag pa'i gti mug gis sems la btsal/ phrin las ma dag pa'i babacol gyis bslus/ gsang sgo med pa'i spyod pas bka' nyams te 'chal bas/ yid rkun dang log pa'i srin po'am dmyal ba nyid du gyur pas phyi ma'i
36a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dus 'dir cung zad kyi bsam pa mi 'grub cing / log pa'i bdud de dag kyang de'i grogs byed pa dang / bgegs dang bar chod byed pa'i rigs las kyang gzhi bya bar byas nas 'byung po phyir sha zan dang / 'byung po khrag 'thung mang po'i
36a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshogs dang bcas nas/ rgyab brten dang 'phral gyi ded dpon du 'jig rten gyi nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i bsod nams spyod pas grub pa'i dbang ldan bgegs kyi gtso bo dang / chung ma dbang ldan drag mo dang bcas pa bzung nas byang shar
36b1(rnying rgyud): kyigyi mtshams nas sems can thams cad kyi bdud gcod pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang srog la brku ba dang / rnal 'byor pa chos gzhung bzhin du spyod pa la gnas 'phrog pa dang / dam sri dang / bar chod dang / bsam sbyor ngan pa byed pa dang / de dag kyang
36b2(rnying rgyud): shin tu 'dul dka' ba mi thul te gdul dka' bar gnas so// de bzhin du lha gdon dang dri za'i gdon gyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyab brten dang / dkar po'i phyogs la dregs pas spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gdon gyi rigs mang po dang /
36b3(rnying rgyud): dpon du phyogs skyong pa'i brgya byin dang / chung ma i nI bzung nas shar nas gong ma bzhin du bar gcod byed do// de bzhin du shar lho mtshams nas thab gdon dang / me las gyur pa'i gdon rigs mang po dang / ded dpon du mtshan ma'i sbyin sreg gi las
36b4(rnying rgyud): sa
36b5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje ya ma ni/ chung ma gshin rje 'joms ma la sbubs btsal te/ lho nas gnod pa byed pa gong bzhin no// lho nub nas srin po'i gdon brjed byed kyi gdon bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsod nams mtshan mar spyad pa las grub pa'i bden bral dang
36b6(rnying rgyud): chung ma srin mo rkun mo la skyabs dang dgung btsal nas gnod pa gong ma bzhin no// nub nas klu gdon dang chu gdon la sogs rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsod nams dngos por spyad pa'i chu lha wa ru na dang / chung ma chu mo stag ris la sogs pa la skyab
36b7(rnying rgyud): btsal nas nub nas gnod pa byed pa gong bzhin no// nub byang gi mtshams nas rlung gdon skyo byed dang / rig sngags 'chang gis don bsam gyis mi khyab pa rlung lha ba ya be dang chung ma rlung lha ba dan mo la skyabs btsal nas nub byang nas gnod pa byed pa gong ma
37a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// byang nas gnod sbyin dang mi'am ci'i gdon la sogs pa gnod sbyin ku be ra dang / chung ma gnod sbyin sgro mo la skyabs btsal nas byang nas gnod pa byed pa gong ma bzhin no// 'og nas sa bdag dang gtan dang srin po
37a2(rnying rgyud): pho mo mang pos bdag phag chen po dang / chung ma sa'i lha mo brtan ma la skyabs btsal nas 'og nas gnod pa byed pa gong ma bzhin no/ steng gi phyogs nas gza' skar gyi gdon mang po dang ya bdud pho mo 'jig rten gyi bsod nams phyogs ris la sbed
37a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba dang / chung ma nyi mo dang zla mo skyabs dang rgya ba brten dang rje bor bzung nas steng gi phyogs nas sems can thams cad 'joms shing 'tshe ba dang gnod cing 'tshe ba dang rnal 'byor pa thams cad la nyams len cing bar du gcod pa dang / gnas 'phrog pa dang /
37a4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa mi 'grub par byed cing 'khod pa las/ byang chub chen po dag gi dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad gsol to// e ma ho bco
37a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag na/ bgegs dang phyogs skyong ba rnams rnal 'byor pa dang sems can rnams la ma rungs par bgyid na/ de dag gang gis gdul ba'i dus la bab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di
37a6(rnying rgyud): ni bsod nams dregs shing log par spyod pa'i mthu brtas pas/ rab tu gdul dka' ba las/ gang gis kyang mi thub pas 'di 'dul ba'i thabs ni/ ston pa zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin gyi thugs la khro bo yab yum bcu mdugs te/ de'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
37a7(rnying rgyud): gyi dpung ni gang gis kyang bskyod du med de/ 'di rnams sngon bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod tsa na/ yul gyi ming dur khrod shing gcig na/ yab bram ze ke'u shu dang / yum bram ze mo dbyings ma gnyis la/ sras
37b1(rnying rgyud): mthe mang nas/ de sa thags sa na// nga banas da pa pas/ durnams rab tu sa// dug / ng+gAs padu/ shub smon po dang / sgom yon dadu/ smras /
37b2(rnying rgyud): spyang bram chu ring dang / trai la ta la sogs pa'i gnas na nyon mongs pa las de rnams kyis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil mdzod nas byung ba'i yi ge baN+Da tham par smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag srid srang bcu 'bran
37b3(rnying rgyud): po 'di/ nam zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang gi phyi'i sgo dang phyi'i srung mar gyur cig/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi stongs dang
37b4(rnying rgyud): grogs su gyur cig/ chos gzhung bzhin du byed pa dang / rnal 'byor dgongs spyod la gnas pa rnams kyi dpal du gyur cig/ de rnams la gnod cing bar gcod byed pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur cig/ sems can na zheng tsha ba rnams dang / sems can lag
37b5(rnying rgyud): cing nyams thug pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur nas/ bdud dang bgegs rnams 'dul zhing tshar gcod par gyur cig/ rnal 'byor gang zhig gis gzhung bzhin mi shes na yang / gsang ba'i don la mos pa dang / yi rang bas bdag cag gi snying po bzlas pa'am/
37b6(rnying rgyud): bskul tshig gis dran tshig gcig tsam 'dzin pas kyang / de'i mthu dang grogs su gyur nas kyang / de'i stongs byed par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dang gnod pas nyen te/ nyam thag cing phongs pas/ bdag gi don ma nor bar shes pa lta ci smos kyi/ mtshan
37b7(rnying rgyud): tsam brjod pas kyang / gang la bya ba 'grub par gyur cig/ rnal 'byor ba shes rab zhen pa la las mchod pa dang yo byad phung la rlom pa la/ bdag cag gi bka' bden pa bdar ba tsam gyis dngas par gyur cig/ rnal 'byor ba'i bka' me nyan cing / dam las rlog pa'i
38a1(rnying rgyud): ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang srin mo shas che ba bdag cag gi zab cing rgya che ba 'di lta ci smos te 'dzin pa'i grogs su yang 'khu ldog med par gyur cig/ gang sdig pa 'ba' zhig can dmyal bar skye bar nges pa dang / ngan pa'i ngang tshul can
38a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i dpyang thag chad pa rnams bdag cag gi 'dug bzhin du bsgral nas/ bla na med pa'i lam la 'god par gyur cig ces smon lam cher btab bo// bram ze ke'u shus bdag nam zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs/
38a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang dang / de ltar bsgom pa'i gzhal yas khang gi steng phyogs nas khro bo hUM kA rar gyur te/ sku las ye shes kyi 'od zer nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel
38a4(rnying rgyud): steng gi gdon bgegs 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa dang / bar gcod nang du mi thar pa dang dngos grub phyir mi 'byung bar byed pa'i khro bo chen por gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// bram ze mo dbyings mas bdag cag gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs
38a5(rnying rgyud): nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ nam zhig de ltar gyur nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang dang / rnal 'byor gyi gnas khang gi 'og phyogs nas bdag mo las phor gyur te/ shes rab kyi khro bo'i mtshan
38a6(rnying rgyud): gyi rnam pa mang por gyur te/ sku las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bum gyi gzi dang ldan te/ thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas/ 'og gi gdon bgegs 'dul ba gong ma bzhin du gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu btab bo// de bzhin du sras thu bo ka yas/
38a7(rnying rgyud): shar gyi khro bo gzi ldan gyi skur bsgyur nas/ shar gyi gdon bgegs 'dul bar smon lam btab po// de'i chung mas khro bo de'i yum du smon lam btab po// de'i 'og ma bram ze si has/ lho'i gdon 'dul ba dang / chung mas de'i yum du sems bskyed pa
38a8(rnying rgyud): bram ze 'di rnams kyi mtshan don mangs kyang song zhag rgyas/
38b1(rnying rgyud): yang dbakonan// dang tanag/ bram ze ma klangs byung/ bram ze sangs shar b+ha/ bram po rgyun thos kyis lto nub/ zlum ze ba zlas nub byung / de bzhin du ba rlung bam nam gtas/ bdag nam zhig gsang sngags kyi go nas mngon par sangs nus par byu /
38b2(rnying rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas par sbyar nas kyang khru chen pa khamasu gsum nam rgyal lo shes kyi 'ad zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur cig// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang dang / nab 'byor ba'i gnas yang gi byang shA
38b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams gnod cing bar gcod byed pa'i gdon bgegs gtso dang g.yog dang 'khor dang bcas pa 'dul zhing tshwar bcad nas bskal te rnam par shes pa gnas sbar te/ gnas kyi byang shar nus gdon bgegs nung du mi gtong ba/ dngos grub phyir
38b4(rnying rgyud): shor bar byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal por gyur cig gi smon lam btang po// de rnams kyi chung mas khro ba rnams kyi yum du smon lam btab pa/ thabs dang shes rab dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par gyur cig par smon lam btab po// de nas
38b5(rnying rgyud): bram ze khyo dang chung ma dang bcas pas bdag cag gi yul dang / gnas dang nor dang longs spyod dang / lus dang srog dang tshe dang sha khrag la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / mi dang myi ma yin pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i rigs
38b6(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gong ma de dag la sogs pa rnams yongs sheg gyur cig/ sos ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du zo'atshwa'athung longs spyod cig/ zhes smras nas de dag la bgyi'o// de dag gis kyang zos 'chos te/ rdul tsa ba yang med
38b7(rnying rgyud): par byas par// de nas bram ze po mo de dag gis kyang / rnam par shes pa'i sems lha'i sras su bskyed nas/ lA ma yin gyi dpung bzlog go// lha'i rgyal po'i sras de las kyang gnas 'phas nas/ 'od kyi 'od phung bkyil bar gyur nas/
39a1(rnying rgyud): 'og min gyi gnas rigs lnga yab yum sbyor ba'i mtshams su zhugs nas/ rigs lngas thabs dang shes rab tu rol pa las/ thugs kyi dpal be'ur gyur nas dbu'i rgyan du byin nas/ rin po che bstar la brgyus da/
39a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' gnyis las lam du phyung ste/ gnyis su med pa'i sras su gyur te/ gnyis ni byang chub kyi sems rnam gnyis su gyur/ brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad kyang re ngoms
39a3(rnying rgyud): bldag pa mdzad cing dbang bskur nas rgyal ba'i gdung rgyud 'dzin pa'i sras su gyur te/ byin gyis brlabs te tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du don mdzad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam gnyis dang / 'khor nye ba'i
39a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dang mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad la sogs par phyung nas/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i zhi bas 'dul ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i bdud dang srin po dang / dgra dang bgegs 'dul zhing tshar gcod par mdzad tsam na/ rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med
39a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems las rdo rje 'dzin pa mthu stobs kyi mnga' bdag zhe sdang gi skur gyur nas/ nyi ma'i gdan la so sor bkod pa'i zhi khro phyed ma'i thugs ka nas/ khro bo bcu phyung / khro bo bcu'i sku mi mngon nam mkha'i dbyings de bzhugs nas thugs gsang
39a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mkha' nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du byung nas/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab las/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsreg sbyang tshul bzhin du mdzad/ bdud dang dgra bgegs btul zhing tshar bcad nas/ ming yang mi grags par gyur nas/ de nas dngos
39a7(rnying rgyud): po'i chos rtag pa ther zug yin pa'i phyir rim gyis bsdus nas thugs kar thim ste/ thugs mi gnas pa'i dbyings su bsdus te bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i dus la bab po zhes bka' stsal pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi dbang phyug gis/ ston
39b1(rnying rgyud): bzung chub kyis mas rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsopa to// kye kye di'i dus la bab bzhes pa dang / de nas rgyal ba'i byang chub sems rdo rjes hU~M hrI rlu dz+ra rdzun hU~M zhes bskul bas/ chos nyid kyi dang bla ti nge 'dzin nam gsum gyis kyang dbyung sa pas/ bcom ldan 'das ma
39b2(rnying rgyud): spang thams cad 'dus pa'i nas rdo rje 'dzin/ zhal gsum phyag drug/ zhabs sems dpa'i skyir mo thung dang bathugs pa/ phyag gsas rdo rje dang rin pa tshe dang 'khor lo ba rnams pa/ g.yon dril bu dang pang+kA la gri brnams pa/ g.yas dkang gA na pang
39b3(rnying rgyud): dbus mthing / sku zhi khro phyed ma las yid tsam khro bag tu bzhugs pa/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i byin gyi brlabs dang ldan pa/ che ba'i yon tan la sogs pa'i mgron mang pos brgyan te/ dang po re yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs byas te/ nyid la nyid kyi
39b4(rnying rgyud): la na
39b5(rnying rgyud): 'jug nas ni// zhe na'i di ngang ting 'dzin gyis// gnas rnams bsrung byer rnam par brjid// ces brjod pas de'i lug zi brjid dang ldan pa 'jig rten pa'i phyogs skyong dang bdud dang bgegs rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams ri dwags kyi tshong ba bzhin du rnaMs
39b6(rnying rgyud): rong gnas so// de nas zhe sdang 'dul ba'i khro bos thugs ka nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tsuM zug nag 'bar ba gcig tsar re 'thon pa las/ shrI badz+ra d+hu kAr hUM zhes brjod pas/ khro bo hUM kAr mdog dmar nag dbyar gyi sprin dmar 'dra ba/ sre
39b7(rnying rgyud): kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba/ kha bgrad pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal gsum phyeg drug pa/ g.yas dkar ba g.yon sngob dbus dmar ba/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis hUM gi phyag rgya bcings pa g.yas rdo rtse dgu pa/ g.yon
40a1(rnying rgyud): dril bu g.yas par ma sngags kyu/ tha ma ral gyi// g.yon par ma dag+sa ste/ tha ma zhags pa 'dzin pa/ zhabs kyad kyi dor sgrubs nan/ lba snod krung chen gyiganon dang / mi'i g.yang gzhi dang / u skad stag na
40a2(rnying rgyud): pags pa dang po ti tsi ti'i sham thabs dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi gshog pa dang / sbrul dmar bkra dang / ser bkra dang / sngo bkra dang / ljang bkra dag gis dbu rgyan dang snyan cha mgur chu dang skra chings dang / phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu byas pa/
40a3(rnying rgyud): thod pa skam po'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa/ thod pa rlon pa'i phreng bas do shal se ral khar brgyan pa/ spyan bzlog pa b+h+ri ku Ti gnyer ma gyigyen du bsgreng ba/ snyan la dung gi khong seng can/ sku che la yan lag rags pa/ shin tu rngams la rab tu
40a4(rnying rgyud): brjid pa zhig rgyal po chen po'i bka' bsgo ba blon pos bka' nod pa'i tshul du dma' breng de/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po ci bka' stsal zhes gnas pa las/ rdo rje 'dzin pas phyogs bcu'i khro bo bcu rnams sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can gyi don la
40a5(rnying rgyud): pas/ de'i gdan shoms shig ces bka' stsal nas/ de nas dbang dang gzi byin bskyed pa 'di skad ces bsgo ba'o// hUM/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// khro bo chen po hUM kA ra// sku che yan lag rags pa ni// dbyar gyi sprin
40a6(rnying rgyud): phung lta bu'o// bskal pa'i me dpung ji bzhin du// 'od zer dang ldan rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// dang po'i phyag gnyis hUM rgya bcings// g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri bsdams// g.yon gnyis zhags pa dgra
40a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum rab tu gnas// smin mtshams khro gnyer dmar ba'i spyan// zhal gsum mche ba gtsigs nas ni// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis rnam par bsgyur// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // 'di 'dra'i gzugs ni bskul byas
40b1(rnying rgyud): na// yid de la bka' stsal lo// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha d+h+waM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na Sh+kaM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya kr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho d+ha ga bAn/ bidz+ra rA dza hU~M phaT zhes gzi byin bskyed nas dbang rtags tho ba lcags kyu gtad pa dang / hUM kA ras tho ba dang ljags kyu
40b2(rnying rgyud): spangs te/ rang gi snying ga na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du snying po 'di phyung ngo // hU~M/ de las nA~M shrI rA dza su ma b+ha rI dze hUM phaT las khro bo T+wA~M ki rI dza sku mdog sngo nag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mdzong / phyag g.yas g.yon dang ngoganyi tu
40b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bcas pa/ phyag mtshan mi 'dzin pa gzhan phyag mtshan hUM kA ra 'dra ba gcig thon nas/ de'i mdun du jo bo la bka' nod pa 'dra ba gcig dbang chen po ci bka' stsal zhes sngo phreng nge 'dug pa las/ hUM kA ras gong ma bzhin du bskos nas/
40b4(rnying rgyud): ma bye 'din babyed de/ dang badrug tha mi garnams pa'i zum sa// med pa ge pa san par rung // gas pa la starnams par gyud ma/ masbyin la lags rjo /
40b5(rnying rgyud): ras tho ba dang lcags kyu TAk+ki rA dza la gtad pa dang / TAk+ki rA dzas tho ba dang lcags kyu blangs nas/ spyan 'bar ba nyi zla'i 'od pas 'tsher ba/ zhal 'bar ba'i ra ros drag po'i sngags brjod pa/ sku 'bar ba'i cha lugs dri rab ltar brjid che ba/ bskas
40b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i me dang nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi dang ldan pas/ zhabs 'bar ba'i cha lugs rdo rje 'gros kyi zhabs gar bor bar rdo rje'i ra ba dang / brtsigs par gyur pa dang spun 'bar ba'i gar glog ltar 'gyu ba/ nir yang brnyes pa'i gzugs dang chas te gshegs
40b7(rnying rgyud): pas bgegs dang phyogs skyong thams cad 'di skad ces 'khams te tshig smra'o// e ma lha'am klu'am 'on te sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun nam thugs rje'i bdag po ci mdzad pa lags zhes TA k+ki rA tsa tho bo 'dzum gyi phyag rgya bcas te/ hUM hUM zhes bya ba
41a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgra brjod nas/ rnam pa tshul grul pa bzhin du sum nyan dang thor ma'i lags brjod pas lcags kyus dbang ldan po mo'i skyeng gnas bzung nas tho bas 'bras ma thos par smyan na ldan na btangs pas 'khor gyi bganas
41a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad had skrag ste/ dus chen po byung ba yin no zhes 'dzer zhing gcer bu lo 'phos pa'i lha rgod drag po bzhin du 'dar had de gnas pa las/ gyang chen pos sdong ro mang po bsgyur ba bzhin du/ 'khor gyi bgegs mang po thams cad 'gyel te/
41a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas nas kyang ling ling g.yon nas kyang ling ling mang po spungs te/ dper na rgas pa'i sdong ro mang po spungs pa bzhin du'o// de'i steng du bshan pas khog pa brtsegs pa bzhin du/ bgegs kyi ro mang po srungs pa'i steng du/ dbang ldan po mo
41a4(rnying rgyud): bcings su byas te phyag rgya chen po bzhis mi shong bar dam du bcings te/ sngon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran/ 'gyod gnong gi smre sngags 'don/ phyis bka' mi bslu bar dam dang dmod bcas shing gnas so// de bzhin du phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad lteng 'og
41a5(rnying rgyud): gi/ phyogs skyong bcu'i 'khor gyi gdon thams cad spungs pa'i steng du/ phyogs skyong pho mo skye bcings su bgyel nas/ gong ma de kho na bzhin bkod nas/ tho ba lcags kyu slar hUM kA ra la gtad nas/ 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' klong dag pa 'dir// logs
41a6(rnying rgyud): par 'dzin pa'i phyogs skyong bgegs 'khor 'dul// dregs pa btul nas rim bzhin bting lags pas// 'bang ba'i sku las dkyil 'khor bskyed du gsol// zhes brjod nas b+hu kA ra'i thugs kar thi ma mo// hUM kA ras kyang tho ba dang lcags kyu zhe sda
41a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje la phul te/ gang na bting lags so zhe sdang rdo rje khro rgyal gtso// zhe sdang rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// khro bo rngam chen drag po sprul pa'i sku// shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha can// 'jigs byed yum rnams mi mngon sbas pa ni//
41b1(rnying rgyud): ku na su tu na su /
41b2(rnying rgyud): sa yin slo ni ma sa ma mas ma sa
41b3(rnying rgyud): sa sashA
41b4(rnying rgyud): nas pas/ pa'i srid pa thams cad dus gcigatugs te/ yeshesags pa pa'i 'dags pa rgyags btsud pa das 'o// de nas slong ngam ngas pa'i thugs sanas/ smon lam las grub pa'i ma po sas
41b5(rnying rgyud): skad ces bkan kyim hA// gzugs chen 'bar bas 'jigs byed pa'i// thab bcu dag byung nus me// rnams bsrud pa'i nyi ma'i snang // ma stod zhal gsum phyag kyang drug/ zhwa srang ljags sur datha gas de sa/ sbyin
41b6(rnying rgyud): nam rdzo rnams pa// rim pa pan dab cuganas// dgags rnams thams cad pa shes pa'i rkye/ da pa sa paka sa ma thang pam grang // brjod pa'i rnam kyis bsrung pa ste// 'byu la pa can
41b7(rnying rgyud): da sa bu gsu 'dreg na na sa/ brtsus pa'i chagasas myod/ bam ba tu 'gas pargyad pa rgyan gyis thugs kyis bcwag das/ gags rgya myi byas
42a1(rnying rgyud): gshad pa/ s+yAd khro bo 'u lags ma phyag drug pa/ da lcags kyi phur bA zung ga smras pa/ dus gsum la thugs kyi gas pa dang / zu gas pa la drug pos 'joms pa'i phaD+gags ma da nam/
42a2(rnying rgyud): dang phyag mtshan ji ltar mdzad kyi tan+t+ra las 'byung ba bzhin du gyur to// A~M pradz+nyan+ta kr-ita badz+ra ma DA sho d+hi hU~M phaT/ oM pad+mA d+ha kr-it+ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ A~M ya mAn+tak+Shita badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita badz+ra ma hA kro nA hU~M phaT/
42a3(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ A r-I la daN+Da badz+ra d+hA phaTi/ A~M Sh+Tadi rAng badz+ra ma kroHhU~M phaT/ A~M ma hA ba la badz+ra hU~M kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ I ka po la kun la~M badz+ra ma~M dA kro d+ha b+h+rUM phaT/ A~M shrI badz+ra TIk+Shi ra bad+h+wa~M ma d+ha kro d+ha gr-I pan+tus pa pyid bya byed gas
42a4(rnying rgyud): bskul nas/ shar du rnam par rgyal ba'i mi dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ lhor gshin rje'i gshed / nub tu rta mgrin/ byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ shar lhor dbyug pa thon po/ lho nub tu mi g.yo mthun pa/
42a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i rgyal po/ thung shar dro thobs partse/ zlog tu lams gsum rnam par la sa padz+ra 'khyil ba/ smyung gi tsog s+yas twAM k+Sha ste/ chub chen po badz+ra po 'di dag kyang / zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dang
42a6(rnying rgyud): lcags la sogs pa/ ji ltar mdzod las byung ba bzhin 'thon te phyogs skyong bcu 'byor dad pa ngas pa'i steng na seng gi rnam par rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa las/ zhe sdang rgyal pos yang steng go phyogs nas nr-ik+Sha ra la ba /
42a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang lpags su gtad nas phyogs 'drug khri rnams la phra po tho cigangs bcwo'o// rgyangs brgya gyi tshul pa me bzhin du banas/ bdud ci 'brel pas da bzhin ba dang grags kyi blangs te/ bka' chag 'dun brjo
42b1(rnying rgyud): d+hI/ khro ba'i rgyal po 'di dag gis// bgags kun bkrag nas rnam par 'dag/ blo ldan rab tu 'byod pa las// chog bzhin du gyur kun btag// rdo rje bdud kyi khrul ba yis// rdo rje thur ba nyid gnas pa// ut+pa la ldan pa'i mdag 'dug/
42b2(rnying rgyud): 'a ba'i phreng ba 'jigs pa'i 'od// lte ba mar chang rgyas rnams ni// phur rtse lta bur rnam par bsgom// ro stod khro bo lta bu nyid// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// bgags kyi tshogs le 'og tu gzug/ de yi sngags ni brjod bya ste// rdo rje
42b3(rnying rgyud): des btab nas// bgegs lus gzhan du mi g.yo ba'o// g+ha b+ha bA ta ya sarba duSh+Ti hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba bi s+t+wa~M hU~M phaT/ gr-I hU~M hU~M badz+ra kA la ya badz+rA nar A dz+nyA ba ya ti tA ya wA ka tsi d+ha badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaH/ zhes brjod nas/ bo gshin rje'i ga
42b4(rnying rgyud): lpags kyus sked pa nas bzung nas/ thor tshugs kyi steng du thob pargyab pas slad ljags kyi phur pa nyi ma'i steng du thal byud nas/ brgya byin pho mo dang dri za la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad kyi stong la zug par gyur to// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams
42b5(rnying rgyud): steng 'og bcur btab nas tho ba dang lcags kyu zhe sdang rdo dz+wa la gtad/ skar yang byang gi phyogs su gong bzhin du 'khod pa lasaM/ yang zhe sdang rdo rjes hU~M kA ra la bka' stsal ba/ steng gi gyog su hUM zhes bsgred pas/ dwe bAr steng gi phyogs nas babs te thob
42b6(rnying rgyud): dang lcags kyu blangs te byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la gong bzhin du gtad nas ston pa la thob dang lcags bu slar phul te/ steng gi phyogs na gong du btab pa bzhin du 'khod do// de nas zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung le bzhugs te rdo rje tho bzlogs nas dang/
42b7(rnying rgyud): skad do// rdo rje thob phyag bsnams mchog/ gnod mangs rgyal po rnam par bsgom// hU~M brjid 'bar ba blta ba yin// bgags rnams thams cad phung pos btab// badz+ra rbakra dzin tISh+Tha kro d+ha han hUM phaT zhes brjod nas/ zhabs rdo rje 'gros kyis
43a1(rnying rgyud): rnams mdzad nas/ thugs ka nas khro chung mang po mtshon cha 'bar ba skar mda' 'khrugs pa bzhin du byung bas khro bcu'i bar dang go mtshams dang go dmigs thams cad khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug phyag na mtshon cha mang po bsnams pa/
43a2(rnying rgyud): che ba dang chung ba grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bar mtshams dang go dmigs thams cad bkang ste/ tha na khab kyi rtse mo tsam yang gzug pa'i sa med par gyur te/ de yang khro bo gnod mdzes kyi shangs 'bar ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga nas raM dmar po 'bar ba'i
43a3(rnying rgyud): tsha tsha mgal bu dum bu tshig pa ltar babs nas 'di skad do// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje'i me// rnam par 'phro ba rab bsams te// ma rungs pa dag tshig byas nas// phyogs bcur rab tu 'phro bar 'gyur// phyogs mtshams phur pas btab nas ni//
43a4(rnying rgyud): steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlabs// 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'khrugs pa yis// rdul cha tsam yang med par bsreg/ dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM zhes brjod pas/ khro bo thams cad kyi sku las me dpung chen po dus tha ma'i bskal pa'i me 'bar ba ltar shin tu mched pas
43a5(rnying rgyud): khyung gi sgo nga'i sbubs su zhugs pa'am/ rdo rje'i gur thabs su phub pa las/ me ri 'dab 'byor du gyur pas/ srid pa gsum gyi dngos po yang dus gcig tu tshig na gzhan bar du gcod pa'i bgegs lta ci smos kyi rab tu 'bar ba'i sreg pa'i me dpung du gyur
43a6(rnying rgyud): to// de nas zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin pas nyid la nyid dam pa'i tshig 'di skad do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi sras su bdag bskyed nas// gsung mchog yig 'brur dbang bskur te// thugs kyi dbyig tu bdag bskyed pas// rnam
43a7(rnying rgyud): rtog bdud ni ming yang med// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnal 'byor dgongs pa mthar phyin pa'o// zhes rol pa bskyed do// de ltar bstan pas phyi nang gi chos thams cad dang sems can
43b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad khrob bcu yis ngan ma mdzad pa dang khro bo bcu'i rang bzhin du sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang mdan// de nas gdon gyi rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / sum brgya drug cu dang / gdon chen po bcwo brgyad dang / phal pa bcu dang / rigs chen ma pa
43b2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i gdon thams cad dam la thogs pa las/ ngag gi dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'dzin pa la bgegs 'di rnams ma khrom pas/ khro bo bcu'i dgongs pa dang mi ldan pas rnal 'byor la bar du gcod pas de'i dgra bgegs la thabs kyi
43b3(rnying rgyud): pa bstan du gsol pa la/ zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bgegs 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa'i bgegs yin te de ni so so'i las ma togs pa yin/ gsang ba'i dgongs pa chen po 'dir ni las dang rnam par smin pa yang ga la 'byung gi/
43b4(rnying rgyud): thabs chen bla na med pa'i lam rnyed pas 'jigs shing 'dzem dgos med pa'i phyir dper na gangs kyi seng phrag skyes pa gcan gzan gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhin no// gong ma ltar ma grub pas kyang don 'di ltar ma gyur na yang mtshon cha 'bar ba'i mtshams 'dis
43b5(rnying rgyud): kyang gang yang mi chod pa med de bdag nyid chen po brjid pa dang chas pas 'di skad gsungs so// hUM/ yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang // rnal 'byor dam can so sor gnas// 'dus pa'i 'khor las
43b6(rnying rgyud): ma gtogs pa// kun kyang re ba bskangs zin pas// da lta nyid du so sor dengs// gal te bka' las 'das gyur na// rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal khros pas// mkhar la char bzhin phab pas ni// brgyad khri bzhi stong gdon rnams kun// lus kyang du
43b7(rnying rgyud): bu brgya rags nas// mgo yang tshal pa tshal par gshog/ snying yang chu ser phye ma bzhin// zhig par gyur yang gdon mi za// skye ba rnam bzhi lhan cig kyang // 'gro ris drug po so sor sgrol// mi ma yin la sogs pa yang // rang ra
44a1(rnying rgyud): gnas su bde bar dengs// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' las ma 'da' zhing // zhes sum b+ha ni'i sngags brjod pas// bgegs thams cad ras bal rlung gis gtor ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jigs
44a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs pa las tho ba dang tsha tsha dang / me ri 'bar ba'i gur thabs su gyur nas rlung tsam yang rgyu ba'i skabs med pas 'di skad do// ra yi dkyil 'khor brtan bya'i phyir// khro rgyal byin gyis rlabs las byung // mtshon cha rnam pa sna
44a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor rim pa'i tshul bzhin srung // steng yang rdo rje'i bla re ste// rdo rje'i thog zog ser ltar 'grel// 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi ste// sa gzhi rdo rjes gcal du bkram// bar ljang rdo rjes sprin ltar gti ngas// rdo
44a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs// phyogs mtshams rdo rjes gtams pa las// rdo rje'i bskal pa'i metshon 'bar// rlung yang rgyu ba'i skabs med pas// rdo rje'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ 'das na khru yang bcug 'gyur na// gdod bgegs 'das pa sgos
44a5(rnying rgyud): oMbadz+ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ steng yang 'khor lo'i bla re ste// 'khor lo'i thog zog ser ltar 'gril// 'og kyang 'khor lo'i sa gzhi ste// sa gzhi 'khor lo'i gcal du bkram// bar snang 'khor lo'i sprin phung gtibs// 'khor lo'i tshe tsha skar ltar 'khrug
44a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams 'khor los gtams pa la// 'khor lo'i bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rlung yang rgyu ba'i skabs med na// 'khor po'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhing / 'das na lha yang brlag 'gyur na// gdon bgegs 'das pa smos ci dgos// oM ba
44a7(rnying rgyud): tsakra tsakra hU~M phaT/ steng yang ral gri'i bla re ste// ral gri'i thog zog ser lhar 'gril// 'og kyang ral gri'i sa gzhi ste// sa gzhi ral gri'i gcal du bkram// bar snang ral gris sprin ltar gtibs// ral gri'i tsha tsha skar ltar 'khrugs// phyogs mtshams
44b1(rnying rgyud): dral gri'i gtams pa la// rab ze'i bskal pa rimachen 'bar// rlung yang rgyu ba'i skabs med pas// ral gri'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ 'das na lha yang brlag 'gyur na// gdon bgags 'das pa spos ci dgos/
44b2(rnying rgyud): oM hrIt+ta hUM phaT/ steng yang rgya gram zla re ste// rgya bram thog thog ser ltar 'gril// 'og kyang rgya thams gzhi ste// sa gzhi rgya gram gcal du bkram// bar snang gya gram sprin phung gtibs// rgyag mtshatsha skar ltar 'gro// phyogs ma
44b3(rnying rgyud): rgya bran gau tams pa la// rgya gram bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rlung yang rgyu ba'i skabs med pas// rgya gram mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ 'das na lha yang brlag 'gyur te// gdon bshegs 'das pa smos ci dgos// oM dzi na bza dzin
44b4(rnying rgyud): tsun/ gleng yang dardzug thu sa// dbug tu rtog dang sa ra 'phrul// 'og kyang dbyug ti'i sagazhil// sa gseng drug tu gcal du bsas// bar tha~Mng dag na ster gtabs// dpag to ma 'jugs
44b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams dbyu ga tos gtams pa la// dbrog to'i bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rlung yang rgyu ba'i skabs med na// dbyug to'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ 'dis nal+la yang brlag par 'gyur// gdon bgegs 'das pa
44b6(rnying rgyud): spos ce dgos// oM badz+ra rma ta bo hU~M phaT/ zhes phur pa dang mtshon cha'i tshogs grangs med pa 'phros pas/ bar du gtsad pa'i bdud de dag thams cad Adza ka'i dog bul/ til mor gyis brgyab pa bzhin du/ mgo tshal pa bcu gas
44b7(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas sdang ba'i dgra baspel ba dang / thugs rjes sems can gso ba'i phyir// khro bo rdo rje gu lang gi bsad gso 'di skad gsungs so// ya tha tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang // sred pa'i
45a1(rnying rgyud): mo man chad nas// ma tha dmyal ba'i sa gzhi dang // rdo rje gtams pa yan chad du// 'khor lo 'bar ba kun btang ste// phyogs mtshams khor 'khor yug tu// dpag tshad
45a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad khri bzhi stong nas// nye ring med pa tshun chad du// log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs// kun kyang gsod par byed pa ru// rdo rje 'khor los gtubs nas kyang // rdul phran bzhin du brlag par bya'o// oM badz+ra tsakra tsakra hUM phaT/ dz+nyA na tsakra hUM
45a3(rnying rgyud): phaT/ ha nA tsakra hUM phaT/ tip+ta tsakra hUM phaT/ pa tsa tsakra hUM phaT/ zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis/ mgo lus dum bu lnga lngar gtubs/ gzhob sgog rdog pas brdzis pa bzhin du gyur/ der lhun mig g.yas pa zhog ste/ 'di skad gsungs /
45a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi spyan bur ldog pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba las// ye shes 'od zer 'bar ba yis// shin tu drag cing rab gtum pas// gul dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// gdug par gyur pa'i
45a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma kun// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya'o// ma sUr+ya maN+Da la hUM gis dngos po thams cad bsreg go// de nas klu dang sems can sngags zer gyis phog nas/ 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams slar gso ba'i phyir/ g.yon pa'i spyan 'bar ba las
45a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi byung ste/ 'di skad do// g.yon pa'i spyan zur ldog pa yis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las// bdud rtsi bsil ba'i chu blugs pas// drag po'i sngags kyis skrag dngangs pas// rul lcags tshig nas brgyal ba rnams// gu lang dbang
45a7(rnying rgyud): chen nye dbang dang // nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// thal bar gyur pa gso bar bya'o// a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM gis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis slar gsos/ dran pa rnyed par gyur nas/ thugs rje'i sras su byin gyis brlabs nas bzhag go// de nas ngag
45b1(rnying rgyud): gi dbang phyug gis thabs mkhas pa sa nas/ de tsam dubs pa lags sam zhes gsol pa dang / rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i grobasam gyis mi khyab pa mang yang / rgyud 'di las cher ma gsungs kyang 'di dag gi nang
45b2(rnying rgyud): du ma gtogs pa'i gang zag chos spyod pa yin na yang / mkhan po dang rdo rje slob dpon la yang bslabs pa dang gus pa'i tshul ma byas par/ gsang sngags la rgyab nyan dang kun bu dang / chos la thabs dang zil dang / gsog dang sgras 'tsho ba rnams dang /
45b3(rnying rgyud): gal te gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i don bstan cing phogs nas/ man ngag bstan par byas kyang de nyid la zungs su dar cig kyang mi 'dzin te/ brgyud cing mi gnyan par byas te/ kun la srel zhing bsgrags dang ston pa dang / mu stegs
45b4(rnying rgyud): dang / skye bo phal pa la sogs pas gsang sngags pa lta zhing nyan pa las spyod pa'i don dang sbar nas/ nyes patsum po che ba dang / chu 'phrog dang brnyas tshad tha ni yi ge dang / dam tshig la sogs pa la dpya ba'i smon ma pa sna tshogs par 'dogs pa
45b5(rnying rgyud): rnams ni bsal zhing grang bar lung las gsungs te/ de'i phyir chos skye ba med pa yin kyang / grong dang 'du 'dzi las dpag tshad dang kyar grags thag ring ba btsal ba dang / dben zhing 'gol ba'i gnas btsal ba dang / thugs ye shes la rnam
45b6(rnying rgyud): rtog med kyang log pa lung dum bstan pas/ bkra shis pa'i gnas gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du btsal ba dang / chos mnyan pa la ris med na yang / blun po thog rdzis dang bkres phongs kyi nang tshangs 'byung bas tho dang mtshams bcad pa dang dus dang gnas
45b7(rnying rgyud): kyisang ba dang / don rnapa mo kun gyis thun mong sa yin pas gzhung dang mi thun pa dang / rigs rgyud bzang ba dang spyod dang ldan pa'i grogs btsal ba dang / nang rtags dang mtshan ma mthob kyi bar mi gtang ba'i phyir/ dad pa dang 'byor pa ched dpag da /
46a1(rnying rgyud): bar mad dang po 'dug gis mtshugs par bya ba'i phyir/ skyon dang mi mthun pa'i 'am ba srungs hA/ ngang 'don par bcad na lam med pa ba can 'grus kyis thang chos gsangs te 'dog do/ rna da /
46a2(rnying rgyud): don mchog 'di// skal ldan rnams las ma gtogs par// skal med shes rab zhan pa dang // snod ngan thos na 'jigs shing skrag/ nges pa'i don las gang log par// na pa yod na rna ba bcad// blta ba 'dug na mig byung ngo // ga
46a3(rnying rgyud): pa yod na bskul bar bya// spyod pa brlang po brtsam par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis gsungs so// oM nA shA ya mA ra ya phaT/ ta rban tset+ta paM ril mA ra ya dza/ zhes pas bar du gcod pa sgra ma grags par gyur to// ngag gi dbang po de lta bu'i ga
46a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni/ thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir/ dang po sangs rgyas nyid kyi bsgrub pA la/ de nas sgra rnams kyi bsgrub pa la rim gyis spyod yul du bka' stsal pa/ mi phal rigs su sdang na yang / mi phel pa dag lha dang 'dra ba'i spyod yul ma yin pas/
46a5(rnying rgyud): bcad cing / ma 'dres pa gsal bar bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi yang snying yin par gsungs so// ngag gi dbang po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang / smon lam gyi byang chub
46a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams thugs rje che'o// ye shes kyi lha'i nang nas kyang bskub thag nye ba'i sras brgyad dang / yab yum sems dpa' rnam gnyis kyi sprul pa khro bo bcu nye ste/ gang zhig khro bo bcu'i rus dang / ming dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya ci
46a7(rnying rgyud): khro bo gcig gi rjes su gzhol na yang bcu po kun bsgom zhing bsgrub pa dang 'dra bar de'i re ba skong bar mdzad do// khro bo 'di rnams 'phags pa thams cad kyi nang nas thugs rje chen pos bstod/ sems can thams cad bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar
46b1(rnying rgyud): dza na yang / rnal khyor pa dang sbyinan pa dang / 'dod pa/ dus thams cad du ga pa'i dus med pa dang / ser sna dang chags pas bcings pa dang / bka' gnyan par mi sems zhing / bdag nyid che zhing btsan pa dang / thugs
46b2(rnying rgyud): gsang bgab pa las/ sbas pa'i don ma thos pa dang / rten dang mos tshad du byas pa'i dbang gis gang yang yid mches te/ 'di dag don gyi thog tu ma phebs pa/ mkhas shing rtogs pa'i man ngag can la/ ded pa dang dam tshig tu 'brel bas
46b3(rnying rgyud): brtse ba gus pa'i sems kyis sgra med pas phangs pa med par mi 'bul bar/ skyes len cing nan tan dang zol gyis blangs te/ bka' gzhan nas khrungs phyung ste/ de nyid srung smod cing che ba 'byin pa dang / gsang ba'i bka' nges pa 'dod pa tshil pa'i
46b4(rnying rgyud): don du 'tshong ba dang / so so'i don kun la 'dug par 'dod cing / de'i tshul bzhin du gang yang mi byed pa dang / phal cher chos log pa dang // bog shong dang sdeb sbyor la mos pa dang / rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig la mi gnas shing / phyi nang
46b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang lcags bzhin ma nos pa dang / spyod pa gsang ba'i don 'di dag gsang mtshams med par ston pa dang / gsang ba nges pa'i don ltos pas rnams kyang nyams par gyur pa rnams la ji ltar bsgrubs kyang de'i 'bras bu mi 'ang ste slar de nyid
46b6(rnying rgyud): 'chi ba'i bdud la sogs pa'i gegs su 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i phyir rjen/ de dag thugs rje dbri bkol mi mdzad kyang / dper na zas brgyad can sems can rid pas mi 'dra ste/ 'chi ba'i dug tu 'gyur ba bzhin/ 'phag pa'i thugs rje chen po
46b7(rnying rgyud): dmatshig nyams pa'i bdud du 'bab ste/ gang de nyid kyis de bzhin du dam btsang khas 'ches nas/ de nyid kyis de bzhin du ma byas pas de nyid kyi bdun du byung ba la/ nyams pa'i 'bras bu rdo rjebs sra bas/ gnyen bcos kyang bcas pan/
47a1(rnying rgyud): thabs med pa'o// de bas na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las 'phags pa'i thugs rjes mi 'gyur ba med na/ dmachog nyams pa'i dmyal ba las 'phags pa'i thugs rjes der badrug go// de bar nar pa la 'gyod pas
