47a2(rnying rgyud): na pa yod na chos nor ba'i las smin pa'i 'bras bu la 'gyod pas phan pa med do// ci la yang cung zad tsam sdod long yod kyang rdo rje dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal la skad cig tsam yang bsdad long med do// de'i phyir sdig pa thams cad kyi nang nas srog gcod
47a3(rnying rgyud): pa che'o// de yang khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad srog bcad pa bas/ mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa che'o// mtshams med pa'i las bsdoms pa las/ chos log par spyod pa sdig che'o// de gang zhe na/ gong ma des
47a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de bas na rna bas thos pa la sdig che ba ni/ gsang sngags la rgyab nyan byed pa dang / rkun bu bsten pa dang / 'og 'bru byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slob dpon las bka' mthob cing / sangs rgyas la thag zlab byas pas/ mig gas
47a5(rnying rgyud): mthong ba la sdig 'go ba ni/ sngags kyi spyod pa brlang po dang / gsang bar spyad pa blang ba dang / gsang bar spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor la mi gtogs par blta ba'o// dri dang bro ba la sdom pa la sdig che ba ni/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi longs spyod la
47a6(rnying rgyud): thom pa'o// bka' bcag pa sdig che ba/ slob dpon gyis bsgo ba mi nyan pa'o// ngas blangs pa la sdig che ba/ g.yar gyis blangs pa ltar ma byas pa'o// bslus pa yin pa'i phyir de dag gis don du 'di gsungs te/ mtha' yas
47a7(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kun// bral sras ma yin gang byed kyang // mnyam pa sangs rgyas sras med de// ci'i byer zhen martogs pas// rang gis log par spyod pas so// bde gshegs te ring me mjed kyang // 'phags pa'i bka' chang
47b1(rnying rgyud): byung ba yang // gang zag nyid kyis rang phung bsgrubs// thar pa'i dus med 'ching ba'i glu// don la nyan par mi sems par/ phan par 'dod nas don la 'jug/ ma rtogs dbang gis smrang gyur pas// ya nas ma btsal shin tu dgyes/
47b2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pas/ de'i phyir gsang tshig mi thub pa dang // gol ba sdig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir// mtshams chod par bya dgos pas gzi ldan 'bar ba'i rgyud 'di ni/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi nang nas/ yang shin tu yang thugs
47b3(rnying rgyud): rjes gces la gal che ste/ dper na nang tsha grang la mkhas pa'i sman pas/ mi deng nang du byed pa bzhin/ bka' dang mi mthun pa spong bar byed do/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ sangs kyis sA la zhugs kyang mi chos gdams ngag dang
47b4(rnying rgyud): phan pa'i sgo nas/ sems can la nges pa'i stangs gcod pas phan 'dogs pa dang 'dra bar tshwa d+hi lam gyi khro bo 'di rnams nyid kyis che ba'i mchog brnyes kyang / sngon gyi thugs ngam gyis sku ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bum gyi gzi dang ldan pas 'khor ba mthong
47b5(rnying rgyud): bAr du/ gzhung dang ldan pas bsgrub nges pa rnams kyi stongs dang grogs mdzad/ mi ldan zhing gol pa rnams kyi bar gcod dang / log par spyod pa'i nyes pa 'gog pa'i phyir btsal ba dang / skrod pa dang / bcos pa dang / 'gro gcod pa dang / byar
47b6(rnying rgyud): mi lhung ba'i don du/ thugs ye shes kyi gzi mdangs ldan par mdzad pas/ gzi ldan 'bar ba'i rgyud ces 'di la btags so// de ltar gsang sngags 'di gsang ba thams cad kyi nang nas gsang ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang sngags par khas
47b7(rnying rgyud): 'tshos nas gsang sgo mi sdom na/ gsang ba med na sngags pa phung bar 'ong ste/ sdig kyang de las che ba med cing / khro bo dang khro mo dang / pho nya dang phyag brnyan gyi bkang chad kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// gsar pa'i dam cho gnos nas dam tshig can
48a1(rnying rgyud): zhes dam bcas nas/ bka' dam pa dang / sngags dam pa dang / gsang ba dam pa dang / dbang dam pa dang / spyod pa dam pa dang / phrin las dam pa dang / dam tshig rnam pa dang / man ngag dam pa dang / rdzas dam pa
48a2(rnying rgyud): sbed par zhabs rdol du spyad na/ nges tshig tshu la sbyar/ gtan tshig rlung la phyar/ lus ngag yid gsum shin tu ru la tshig nyams te/ mnar med par skyes pa la khro bo 'di dag dam chen dang thugs rje can du 'ong ste/ sdug kyang de las sdug pa med la/ snying ya
48a3(rnying rgyud): de las rde ba med do// 'dir yang ma mo dang mkha' 'gro sgrol ba'i zhing bcur gyur nas/ phyi ma la thar pa'i dus med par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten rtsal 'chang rnams kyis dpyas shing dbang mi bsgyur te/ rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang de la skabs byed
48a4(rnying rgyud): dus te/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba mi bzod pa myong ngo // 'di dag gsang zhing sbyang legs na/ bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar yang 'grub bo// ngag gi dbang po/ dper na sman pas rtsa dpyad kyis 'du ba rnam bzhi ngos ma zin pas/ tsha grang gi
48a5(rnying rgyud): log par sbyar na/ 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ba bzhin/ gsang sngags 'di spyang nyes na ma rung bar 'gyur te/ gsang sngags dang drags nas spyad nyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dar ba'i dbang gis bsrung ba'i rim pa med par/ brtse gdung chung zhing
48a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang gis spyod pas nyams so// sngags 'du byed kyi dam pas na yang nyams so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi shes pa'i dbang gis// be grags dang / sgo skur dang / bzhed par gyur pas nyams so// gsang sngags 'phyar zhing ngom
48a7(rnying rgyud): sa myang na yang nyams so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bka' smod cing gdeng ma zin pas dngos grub yal bas nyams so// gsang sngags spyod pa mi gzob par spyad na yang nyams so// de tse'i phyir zhe na/ 'phya slab dang 'chal rgod du gyur pas nyams
48b1(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags gsang sgo med par sprad na de bas kyang nyams te/ yag dang sgo slar dang / mtshang mag tu gyur pas nyams so// sngags shes rab brtul zhing ma shes pas spyad na nyams so// de ci'i phyir na don ma khrol bar the tshom dang rtog pa skye ba'i rgya
48b2(rnying rgyud): pas nyams so// gsang sngags rgya le lo dang sgyu snyoms can gyis spyad na yang nyams te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las su ma rung bas sgro sur 'debs shing rdzun par spyod pas nyams so// de bas na sman pa mkhas pa 'dra ba'i/ sa ra sa dang tra dang / pra
48b3(rnying rgyud): dngas ma ya dang / dz+nyA na dang / g+hu h+yaM dang sen du ma dang / d+ha ma tal dang ldan pa rnams kyis myong ba gsungs so// de yang 'di skad do// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyan cing bsngal me dbang
48b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i sems can la// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i dam chu 'dis// lus sems rgyud la phog pas kyang // thal ba rdul bzhin brlag 'gyur zhing // blta ba'i rdo rje dug chen po// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ dug kyang dug/
48b5(rnying rgyud): ste smyan kyang sman// rtogs pa rnams la sman yin kyang // ma rtogs pa la dug tu 'gyur// khu ba khrag tu dmigs nas kyang // rang sems dpang du btsugs nas kyang // tha tshig gnyen po srog bsrung phyir// gzhan gyi drin la mi gnas par//
48b6(rnying rgyud): oM rdo rje gto ba'o// oM badz+ra ma thas rba hU~M hU~M Sha thAb kuN+Da le han ta na dz+nyA phaT/ zhes ldan gyi sgo nas mtshams bcad // de nas rnal 'byor chen po phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/ rnal 'byor tshogs pa longs spyod cing / mchod pa dag par 'dul ba
48b7(rnying rgyud): yang kun gyi thun mong ma yin te/ gnas yid du 'ong bar tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas rung bar/ slob dpon dgos ched kyi thabs lnga dang ldan pas/ mched lcam dran pa'i snod drug yod pa dang / gzungs ma pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs rgyud dang ldan pa dang /
49a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal tshab kar ma phyi nang la brda mjal ba dang / yon bdag bsam pa dag pa'i stobs gsum dang ldan pa dang / mchod po bshams sbyar gtsang sbra'i tshul shis pas/ gang mang ma spa pa'i longs spyod chen pos rgyal
49a2(rnying rgyud): mchod pas skad skong dgyes dgyes shing dgongs pa 'phel dngos grub thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur/ gzhung 'di yang gar song song bab col du ma yin te/ rdo rje slob dpon rim gyis snang ba'i dbang ma nos pa/ chags shing 'jungs pas dad pa chung pas/
49a3(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal dang khengs pas dam la mi gnas pa/ shes rgya dang thos pa chung bas gtan tshig nyung zhing don ma khrol ba/ ci la yang yid ma ches pas/ ras chod dang smyon thabs byed pa/ sems krung du ma phebs pas phyogs ris dang rtog pa can ma yin pa
49a4(rnying rgyud): dang / gsungs ma thob pas g.yem zhing ngo tsha dang bral bas/ gsang med cing dpral ba 'thug pa'i 'phyar sham ltar song ba/ rgyal theb dang kar mas byed po'i brdal shed ma bye ba dang 'dra ba dang / mched la mkhon brnyas dang / lkog 'phyas dang
49a5(rnying rgyud): da pa rung gi nga rtse gdung med pa dang / mchod pa'i rgya mtshogs par phud nyams grangs nyung zhing tshor shor ba dang / mchod pa byin gyis ma rlobs zhing chad dbang dang gnyid dbang du gtad pa dang / gnas grong dbus dang 'du 'dzi can du mchod cing bsgrubs kyang
49a6(rnying rgyud): bstod nams dang grub pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ slar bar chad dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib par 'gyur bas/ tshe srog la gnod pa 'di skad do// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad do// las kyi gtsong ni bskang bshags bya// thang lhod med pas brtson 'grus
49a7(rnying rgyud): 'byin// rnal 'byor mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// nga ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu dbang bdag/ nga yi bka' las 'da' byed pa// de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // gnod par byed pa gang yin pa/
49b1(rnying rgyud): rdul phran bzhin du brlags nas kyang // zag rten la yang dgod par byung // oM badz+ra ban+d+ha tha tsam pa baT/ zhes pas/ tshogs kyi bar chad dral tshwa tsam yang med par gyur tu// de nas yang gsung gi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa mthar/
49b2(rnying rgyud): mdzegs par byed pa'i mtshams bcad mtshams 'tshal lam mi 'tshal zhes gsal pa dang / rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal pa/ gang la yang mi tog mchags pa ni/ ci la yang mtshams pa cad du med na/ de na gnas pa'i nyung gis/ de lta bu dang mi
49b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa sha lhag mang bar gnas te/ rtogs pa chung zhing shes rab zhan pas ci spyod cing brtsam yang / drang por mtshams bcad pa dang / bar bar rdzogs rdzogs kyi skabs sgra/ smon lam gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtsal bgos te/ gdod ci bya ba la
49b4(rnying rgyud): pa med cing mthar phyin par gyur te/ de ni dper na bshan thog dang / sru 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ cis kyang mi 'jigs shing bag tsha ba mad la/ de dang mi ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ sku la bsngo bas dus thams cad du bag tsha ba bzhin du/ khro bo 'di
49b5(rnying rgyud): dag ni rnal 'byor dang / sems can gang phor ba'i skyabs dang dpung mdzad pas/ ji ltar bcol ba'i don mdzad de/ rnal 'byor pa gzhung dang mthun zhing klong du gyur pa rnams ni/ 'di ltar bskul kyang mi g.yel la ma bskul kyang de nyid la 'dris pas bkra
49b6(rnying rgyud): pa med la/ phal cher dang du ma blangs na bar chad du 'gyur bas nan tan du bya ba'i phyir ro// de bas na 'di skad do// bgegs zhes bya ba gzhan na med// bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung // rnam rtog ma yin mtshan ma ni// rgyal bas bltas kyang mi
49b7(rnying rgyud): gzigs so// dngos grub par chod gang yin pa// nor bas gnyis su bzung bas te// don gyis kun ni ma phyin pas// bsod nams phral bar byed pa yin// de bas 'di rnams sun dbyung zhing // rang byung dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir// lhas
50a1(rnying rgyud): kyang lha yi gshang gci za// mis kyang ma rig dri ma spungs// rnam rtog med pa'i ye shes kyis// dug ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar bshad// phal pas spyod pa'i rdzas min pas// gsang bas spyad la sba bar bya// 'di
50a2(rnying rgyud): ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// gsang chen bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// lha la gtor bas thugs dam bskang // bgegs la sogs pas thal bar rlog/ mi la babs pas dngos grub 'bebs// ya mtshan rmad du
50a3(rnying rgyud): byung ba yi// rdzas 'dis bar chad brlag par 'gyur// oM badz+ra a ma~M ta sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ zhes dngos grub bsgrub la bar du gcod pa'i mtshams bcad do// ngag gi dbang po/ mkhas par ma sbyangs pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// slob dpon gyi bsgo ba
50a4(rnying rgyud): mi nyan pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// zol zog gis dngos grub ma 'thob po// gsang 'chol bas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// dbang ma thob pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// tshe byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang ci phyir zhe na/ snod dri ma can gyi rdzas dang
50a5(rnying rgyud): 'dra ste/ cir yang spyad du mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// ngag gi dbang po/ dus nam zhig gi tshe gsang ba 'di dag gsang mtshams med par blta ste/ dar bar byed pa'i dus byung ba'i tshe/ gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas gsang ba'i don bzhin ma spyad pas gsang
50a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i bsgrub rtags kyi 'bras bu ma thob tsa na/ de la rgyud lung nas sngags 'di dag tshig gcig tsam du ston pa las/ de bzhin du ma grub pas btsun to zhes skur pa btab nas/ rgyu'i chos la 'jug cing / sngags kyi mtshang 'bru zhing smad par 'gyur bas/
50a7(rnying rgyud): rdo'i phyi yang gsang zhing mtshams bcad pa'i rgyud 'di rab tu zungs su bzung ngo // ngag gi dbang po/ bus nam zhig tsan/ sngags brdal ba chen por byung bas/ tan la sogs pa'i spyod pa dang / phrin las thams cad ma gsang bar skye bo min
50b1(rnying rgyud): kun la cha yod par byas pas/ sman chus mna' dgag pa bzung zhing gtag pa dang / bskal zhing dmod byed la sogs pa brtsams/ mi nag la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di ltar spyod pa dang gnod pa dang nges pa 'di spyod pas/ 'di dag gi srog
50b2(rnying rgyud): la ma phab na/ mtha' phung bar 'gyur zhes sems nas/ rnal 'byor pa srog dang phral nas/ rnal 'byor pa'i sku dag 'byung bas/ de'i bar chad gdul zhing bsgral ba'o// de'i don du yang khro bo bcu po 'di med du mi rung bas/ 'di'i don la rab tu
50b3(rnying rgyud): brtson par bzung ngo // ngag gi dbang po/ dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na/ rnal 'byor gyi chos dbang ma thob par la las bshad/ la las bstan/ la las bstabs/ bsgrub pa'i mthu rtsal dang bral te/ 'khor gyi dbang phyug thams cad bros
50b4(rnying rgyud): byer du ma brdzobs pas/ mu stegs dang log pa'i phyogs mtha' dag gis bstan pa la dgra dar bar byed de/ rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa la sogs pa ma rungs par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ khro bo bcu po 'dis 'dul zhing /
50b5(rnying rgyud): zuthugs rje dang thugs dam du ldan pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang phyug yin pas khyad par gyi dam tshig tu yang bka' 'di gzung ngo // ngag gi dbang po dus yan 'ga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bka' la dam mi srung ba dang / lus dang srog dang tshe dang / nor dang longs
50b6(rnying rgyud): khyod la bcu zhing rlom pa mang ba'i phyir/ rnal 'byor thabs med cing mi mkhas pas/ mu stegs log chos la sogs pa spyad de/ sha za gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / bdud dang / byad snyems dang / k+Sha mi bsrun pa la sogs pa dang / yi dwags
50b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung po la sogs pa'i dam rdzas dang / bskul ba dang / zod gtong gi las byas pas/ lo nyes dang / sad dang / ser ba dang / btsa' dang / mu ge dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / nad ngan pa dang / rims sna tshogs dang / skyo 'bog la sogs pa
51a1(rnying rgyud): 'phel bas/ bgags dang dri dang / dgra su nga rabs skrag dus ngan pal bab pa'i tshe thugs rnga can gyi lha ma ba bculas gzhan med pas/ log par blta ba 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal thams cad ni byi nab 'di 'du yi ma dang ca na
51a2(rnying rgyud): gi dbang po/ dus dang phal pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa yang dag pa'i don mi 'tshol bas/ ras chod dang gzu lums dang / the co dang skyo thabs kyi las byas te/ shes mi shes med par slob dpon ni kun byed/ mkhas mi mkhas med par ris ris su bzung nas kun 'chang bas dbang dang das mi
51a3(rnying rgyud): phrin las dang / gtan tshig ni slob dpon la yang med/ nga rgyal tsha ba dang / khe dang dregs pa ni 'khor yin chad 'dzin pas/ man ngag can gyi mkhas pa rnams kyang thugs ma mnyes pas/ thugs kyi man ngag bka'i thigs pa gsang ba nges pa'i don zab mo sbas te/ dmod pa gtsung
51a4(rnying rgyud): so// rnal 'byor pa phal cher ras chod can mgo rmongs par bya ba'i phyir/ dkrugs 'tshol bas/ gsang ba'i don dag bon spang ngam gtsug lag bzhin du brjod pas/ bka' las ma byung ba'i chos yin par rgyas btab pa'i las rtsing ngo // srog gcod pa la sogs pa ru
51a5(rnying rgyud): rgyang 'dzin bzhin du spyad pas/ 'phral gyi grwa yon dang / gang zag gi bkur k+ki tsa ma la chags pas/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka'i 'bras bu chus khyer te/ 'bras bu ngan song gsum du kye nges pa'o// gang zag gdon gyis bslus pa dang 'dra ba la yang / ga
51a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis/ skyabs dang dpung mgon khro bo bcu yin nges pas/ gnyen du blangs te/ rgyud 'di ltar shes par bya zhing yid la gzung ngo // ngag gi dbang po/ rnal 'byor pas chos zab mo'i snod dang mi ldan pa'i tshe/ yin rung min rung bka' la
51a7(rnying rgyud): 'dogs so// de'i tshe snod dang ldan pa rnams ni nyung ste/ bka' btsan par sems nas don gsang zhing gsangs nas ba sgrubs pas/ grub pa thobs srid pa tsam gnas so// snod mi ldan par phal cher gyis spyad pas/ don gyi bden pa ma rig par gsang sngags la brten nas//
51b1(rnying rgyud): bras bu bde ba 'tshol zhes pa las gol te/ snying rje phar mi gtang bar zhe sdang phar gtad / byams sems phar la mi bsgom par bkur sti tshur 'dod/ mkhas pa rang gis ma sbyangs par dpon por phar 'chol/ sbyin pa rang gis mi gtang bar bza' zhing spyad par phar dga' bas bden pa'i
51b2(rnying rgyud): chos lugs nI rgor/ mi bden pa'i dargyal na ni/ gnyen pa'i dmachog ni med/ mi gnyen pa'i rang mthong ni che/ don gyi man dag ni nug/ me dgos pa'i rtsing chos ma spad pa pas/ ston pa'i bka' ni nub/ rtsa ba'i dam chog ni gting nas nyams te 'phags pa'i zhabs 'did/
51b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni bskyas par 'gyur tsa na/ nyes pa ci byas na brjod mi rung pa'i sdug bsngal myong bas/ sgro sbyar rang gi chos la btab/ dpe ngan byed la rung ba yod par smos/ spyi don las med kyi zer te ngan par brtag cing byas sngon nas sdod/ rtag tu re ba rlung
51b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor los ded tsan/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra me ma mur gyi ngobs steng na/ khras nyen pa'i bye'u mang po 'phur ba la/ thog dang glog gi rgyas bskor nas/ khro chu lol ma'i chu bab ste/ sdug bsngal ldog pa'i 'bras bu dus gcig tu srin can yang / bskyab par bya ba'i thibs dang kying rten dung
51b5(rnying rgyud): dpung gnyen du smon lam du btab pa'i khro bo bcu las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang skabs dbye mi nus pas/ rgyud 'di dam tshig nyams pa skong bar gsungs pa'o// ngag gi dbang po/ dus lnga brgya pa'i tshe rnal 'byor pa thos pa chung zhing / dad pa mod pas sems can gyi na
51b6(rnying rgyud): mongs pa'i nad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tsam gnas pa la// de 'dul ba'i sems can de bzhin gsheg pa'i bka' bdud rtsi'i rgya mcho gsungs pa bzhin du/ chos nyung bar dgos pas/ phyi nang gi bka' 'di dag gang zag gi snod kyi rim pa dang sbyar nas/ 'drer mi gnang ba ni badz+ra sbyor tshang mang du
51b7(rnying rgyud): sde thugs pa bzhin du thos pa ma/ gang na phrin pas thams cad byes mi shes pa'i zab thebs pa bzhin du las byug pa gathams cad gas kyi bganag cu dun rjes par 'dab/ minas pa'i byar badrug/ rdum dza bye pa yinang// gsang ba yin no// ga na
52a1(rnying rgyud): nas bran la sbeng/ dang na 'dag ces nas mnyam nyid kyi chos la khrad 'dud/ gang drug gi sbyin rtseg dang thub pa mthob pa'i rang zhes dang mngon shes med pa'i bcos mang bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la thug zung spyad pa sde mnangos dka' zad kyi gnas su gang dag
52a2(rnying rgyud): mo ba dang lha ji byed po'i lce dngang tshig la sdug bsngal myong ba yang / bshags pa dang sbyong ba dang sgrol ba'i smon lam gyis// khro bo bcu las thugs rje che ba med pas pham ltar chud 'di gzung ngo // ngag gi dbang po/ rnal 'byor ba chos lams shing rjes su 'breng ba/ bka' nga ni dngu'abyed rje dus
52a3(rnying rgyud): la yang mi 'ilta bar rdo rje theg pa la mom/ mchod sgrub bsrung ba las/ shes rab kyi rgyud med pas gong ma 'byong ste/ long ba grogs shor ba dang 'dra ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi jo bo 'di rnams ma bsgoms/ spyan madrangs mchod pa ma byas kyang do/ gshegs kyi
52a4(rnying rgyud): sa dbang bskur dngos grub gsol bar mdzad pas/ mig gi 'bras bu dang 'dra bar khro bo bcu gzung bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dag pa shin tu thab mkhas la thug rje che ba'i rgyud 'di/ ston pa byang chub kyi sems
52a5(rnying rgyud): dang de dang mi gnyis pa'i sras zhing khams thams cad 'dul ba'i gtso bo lag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa 'di/ ma rig pa'i sems can rnams la nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi dang ldan pa rnal 'byor pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad la/ bu gcig pa 'am byams pa ltar mdzad pa ji ltar de bltar yid bzhin
52a6(rnying rgyud): byang chung sems dpa'i tshe bya dang ldan pa/ nam 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas/ sru khro bo'i cha lug su bzhugs pas/ nga rgyal dregs pa can dang / gti mug rang shes can dang / gol zhing chos spyod pa la rgol zhing gnod pa rnams tshar gcod par mdzad pa'o// gzi ldan 'dang ba
52a7(rnying rgyud): rim gyi rgyud 'di rnal 'byor pa dang sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sangs rgyas zhing kun spyod par gyur cig par smon lam btang // 'khor rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug rnams kyang dga' nas dong ngo // khro bo bcu'i smon lam gzi ldan 'bar ba'i mtshams kyi rgyud rdzogs so//
52b1(rnying rgyud): #/ tha ma nangs pa 'das pa las/ dad btsun dang ldan pa 'i gyis pasargyud 'chang ba'i thabs dang / rgyad ma bstan pa zugs// nam b+ha yaH/ na mo gu ru \u0f7fwa sbyin
52b2(rnying rgyud): hUM/ dad pa dam tshig la gnas shing / bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la mos pa lam du byed pa'i rnal 'byong po mo gang dag gis/ rgud 'chang bar 'dod pas/ dus khyad par can nye stong
52b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad gsum dang tshes bcu la sogs pa dang / gza' skar bzang po la babs pa'i tshe/ bkra shis la byin chags shing yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i dkyil
52b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bzhengs shing sku rten bkram/ phyi nang gi mchod pa dang / spyan rag gtor gsum la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad bshams shing / bsgrub mchod ci 'grub la 'bad/ de nas
52b5(rnying rgyud): ma nyid kyis ma pan sus ngag ya gas ma rgyud dag cing sems pargyad da nga ldan pa'i nga nas/ ba'i ste rgyung pa spong brgyags pa na ched tshogs pa'am/ mthukhan na /
53a1(rnying rgyud): nA gas ci bad la sa pa sa/ sna na gas nga dang la tul / thugs rgya ma mkhan nad mangs nan 'ang
53a2(rnying rgyud): brtul ba'i khu bas bri/ yon tan gyi chung bstan pa'i srog shing gser sbyangs pa'i khu bas bri/ phrin las kyi chud spu gri reg gcod skyes dang mgrir shi ba'i khrag dang dug dang rgya stag gi khu bas bri/ bla mo'i gsar
53a3(rnying rgyud): chud bka'i bud mdzod/ yi dam gas kyang bka'i thar ma dang / mkha' 'gro gsang chung bka' lde mig gsub/ bdud rje a mr-i ta dang / byang sems dkar dmar/ sin d+he ra/ tsan dan/ ga pur/ grwar
53a4(rnying rgyud): gu ma/ gi waM/ li shi/ ru rta/ dzA ti rnams sbyar zhing / gzhan yang byin rlabs kyi rdzas rnams mtshal dang bsres shing bri/ yi ge dbu can lhag chad med par bris te/ thams cad rang gi sor bzhi pa'i tshad
53a5(rnying rgyud): du byas te glegs bu mgo zhabs ma dkrugri par phyogs gcig pa can du bris te/ so so rigs mthun gyi dar kha dog can gyis rmel ba la mchod pa'i rdzas rin po che sna tshogs/ 'bru sna tshogs/ sman sna tshogs/ dang
53b1(rnying rgyud): snatshogs dang bcas pa rin po tshong za ma tog gam gzur btsal nas/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'grod dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su khri'u khar bzhugs su gsol/ de nas rang nyid dri bzang po'i chus kha lag gdong gsum dag par bkra/ gos gas pa d+mar
53b2(rnying rgyud): mid pa gon cing / bde ba'i stan la gnas pas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos spyod bya/ yul phyogs kyi gzhi bdag dang / 'byung ba'i tshogs la gtor ma byin la bden pa'i stobs brjod/ de nas bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i
53b3(rnying rgyud): sa ma hi dang ldan pas/ glegs bam gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing / swa b+hA was stong par sbyangs pa'i ngang las/ glegs bam gyi bris gzhi gzhal yas khang rnam par dag cing bkod pa du ma dang ldan par gsal ba'i nang du/ yig 'bru'i ngo bo thams cad
53b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnam par gsal zhing / de dag thams cad kyang / rang rang gi rgyan cha lugs rnam 'gyur dang bcas pas/ rgyud dgu po'i tshig 'bru yang
53b5(rnying rgyud): skad du ti re re bklag par bsam pa la yang / chos gsung yig 'bru'i char sgra tshi li li babs pas glegs pa ma la thim/ gzhan yang bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
53b6(rnying rgyud): byon nas glegs bam du bsams pa'i sku la thim par dmigs te/ gzhan du las kyi po ti bris pa'i rgyud tshig dgu po rab brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'bring lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ tha ma nyer bdun bklag pa'i dus/ dang po la rang nyid ston pa snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed de/
53b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i ljags kyis bklag/ des 'gre bar/ gnyis pa la bdag nyid rnam snang / ljags 'khor lo/ gsum pa la bdag nyid 'ang dpag med/ ljags pad+ma/ bzhi pa la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'/ sngags rdo rje/ lnga pa la bdag nyid rin chen 'byung
54a1(rnying rgyud): dzan/ ljags rin po che 'bar ba/ drug pa la bdag nyid don yod grub pa/ ljags snga tshogs rdoH/ bdun pa la bdag nyid mchu skyes rdo rje/ ljags gser gyi rdo rje/ brgyad pa la bdag nyid rta mgrin dbang chen/ ljags
54a2(rnying rgyud): dngul gyi gri gug/ dgu pa la bdag nyid yum rdo rje phag mo/ ljags gnam lcags kyi ral grir bsams la bklag/ de tsam spos pa la mi dga' na/ bdag nyid ston pa snang ba mtha' yas/ ljags pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma can du bsams pa/ ha cang
54a3(rnying rgyud): 'i rnam pa can gang yang ma yin par bkrag/ bar gyi thun mtshams rnams su gtor mchod dang tshogs kyi yo byad la sogs pa 'bul/ rnal 'byor pa'i lus dag yid gsum dkyil 'khor gsum gyis ma he dang ma bral zhing / skabs su dam chog dang ldan
54a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i grogs du yod pas rtsa ba gsum gyi bsnyen 'dzab brjod/ de ltar 'bad pas 'ja' dang 'od dang / zer dang / dri bzang gi dad pa dang / chos kyi sgra dbyangs la sogs pa'i sgra dang / glegs bam la 'od 'bar ba la sogs pa'i lhas byung bar 'gyur ro//
54a5(rnying rgyud): de nas mched dang lham dral la sogs pa 'dus pa rgya mtsho la zab mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang yon 'bul ci 'grub byas shing / dus bzang po'i tshe snga dro dang por glegs pa ma rang gi spyi bor blangs pa tsam gyis phyogs dus kyi bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'/ yi dam
54a6(rnying rgyud): zhi khro rab 'byams/ dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa thams cad rang gi spyi bor srung gis byon nas byin gyis brlab/ dbang bskur mdzad de thams cad rang gi snying gar sob kyis thim par bsams la/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang la mnyam par gzhag
54a7(rnying rgyud): glegs bam nam du yang zhal ma phye bar rang gi mchan khung g.yon du drod dang skad cig kyang ma bral bar 'chang zhing dus dang rnam pa thams cad du dad pa mos gus kyi shugs bskyed la ci ltar 'dod pa'i don 'bras la gsol ba gang ba/ de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs
54b1(rnying rgyud): sgrubacang pa brjod/ bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro la gtang dag go mtshad pa cha ldan pa 'thal/ gzhan yang rdzas kyi bu bskyod pa thams cad skye nga mthun la gzhan dang lda gyi smyes bu du nga gang dag la ga dag par 'dod pas kyang / tshul de dag la nga rgo nga
54b2(rnying rgyud): gyis gang gis chang ba de ba glegs bam gyis dbang bskur nas gdagra par bya'o// de ltar khyad par mang du byung ba'i chung 'di dag tshar gcig tsam bzhengs pa'i bsod nams kyis phung po dpags med de/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mthang de'i
54b3(rnying rgyud): pa bsod nams dang mnyam pa'o// rgyud kyi glegs bam gang gis mthong ba dang reg pa dang / de'i tshig 'du zos pa thams cad ni bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa'i lus kyi sgrib pazad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chang zhe
54b4(rnying rgyud): kun chub par byed pas ni/ de gnas skabs tshe 'dir lha dang me dang lha min thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bkur sti phu dud dpag tu med pa byed/ mi dang mi ma yin gyi gnod pa gang dang gang gis kyang mtshugs shing lha 'dre thams cad
54b5(rnying rgyud): bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gyi nang gi bar chad nye 'tshe thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'dod pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad cher bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyis cho 'phrul gnod par byed pa thams cad las rnam
54b6(rnying rgyud): par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'dra ba rnam bzhing nad kyis mi gnod par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang ma rungs pa thams cad nyer ma nus shing dbye bar 'gyur ro// dpa' bod da nga mkha' 'gro dam can chos skyong srung ma thams cad kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
54b7(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i phyogs ngan pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro// nam 'chi ba'i tshe yang dus ma yin par 'chi bde 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing / gnad ga cod kyi sdug bsngal med par dga' ba
55a1(rnying rgyud): rlung/ pa'i 'dun pa dang bcas te 'che zhing tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sran ma smin gyi phung bgatibs pa ltar gtibs nas spos kyi / ral mo'i sna skrun pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pas bsrus te/ bdab can la sogs pa sangs rgyang tu
55a2(rnying rgyud): zhing khams rnam par dag pa rnams su skyes nas mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// rab dbugs chad pa'i dus der sgra dang 'od dang zer dang / 'da' tshon dang me tog gi char la sogs pa'i lhas khyad par can dpag tu med pa 'byung zhi phung po la yang lnga
55a3(rnying rgyud): gdung ring bsrel la sogs pa 'byung ste/ de dag gang gis mthong ba'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib pazad nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po brnyes par 'gyur ro// gang gi lus la rgyud kyi glegs bam bzhugs pa'i gang zag des
55a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba gang gi lus la reg pa'i 'gro ba de dag kyang / lus kyi sgrib pa byang zhing / ngan song gi skye sgo chod nas thar pa'i sa bon thebs pa yin no// de ltar rgyud 'di dag mthong thos dran pa la sogs 'di dang gang 'brel par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnams med
55a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi lam sna zin pa'o// gzhan yang che ba'i yon tan rdo rje'i ljags kyi dbang pos kyang brjod pas mi langs pa'o// de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tsha ba du ma dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ltar brtson par bya'o// tha na chud de dag rnams tshar re bris te rang bzhin
55a6(rnying rgyud): kyis bcangs pas kyang / yul ris rgyal khams thams cad bkra shis bde legs kyis khyab nas dpal phun sum tshogs pa la sprod par 'gyur ro// d+ha thim/ rgyud kyi bcings thabs dang che ba'i yon tan brjod pa/ da lta mnga' bdag yab sras dang / ma 'ongs
55a7(rnying rgyud): rjes 'jug rnams kyi don du/ bdag 'dra bad+ma byung gnas kyis bka pa'o// skal ldan las can gsung gi sras dang phrad par shog/ sa ma sa/ rgyan+yar+m+ma/ smras / gtadaH/ gter \u0f7f/
55b1(rnying rgyud): na / na na dun du rgyug da du // /
55b2(rnying rgyud): bid skad du/ sgra ma~M yaM dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs brgyad 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad stong brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpalar nga byung gi ba chen pa gri brjid mapa'i yas pa lA TI gA'i ma lo// @
55b3(rnying rgyud): skad bstan po'i dus gcig na/ dkar ser dmar ldang rab 'khrugs shing // le bairgan zlag ma 'bar ba'i dbus// sna tshogs nyid kyi tshang khang du// dus gsums le mtho nas ni// g+he rgan 'chi'i bklo thugs// mi bzod g.yo bas rab bskus
55b4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje spo baspu 'gyed pa'i tshe// ye thog dang por spun gyis grub// sna tshogs las la dbang sgyur byed// rdzu 'grel zlab phyogs bcur 'gyod// gsum snar dbyer med gzig mang pos// kun la khyab pa'i byang chub sems// gzugs sna dro ri
55b5(rnying rgyud): chos// yul bcus rkyen dang cha lugs ldan// rdo rje pad+ma'i 'khor tshogs la// srid dang spro 'i srubs 'byed pa// wa 'joms drug rdzogs gsum dang ldan// gnyis bsdus don 'byung gnyis las grol// bzhi rdzogs gtan la dbab par bya//
55b6(rnying rgyud): rdo chos la sogs pa yi// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad zhus// kye kye ston pa 'od mi 'gyur// gar bsgrub gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang // gnas der gang zag ji lta bus// nyams su len pa'i chos ni gang // chos
55b7(rnying rgyud): de tham gang la kra// srub sa ji ga bral ba rtag/ bsgrub pa'i grogs gang dus chas rnam// dkyil la lar lhartags rtags chad dang // srin las kha ba sbya ba d+has// sbyin byed dbang dang mchog dang // thom byed gdams par spyad bcas// dpe bsas /
56a1(rnying rgyud): spyod 'bras bu// chags lam gsang ba'i gdams pa stsogs// de ltar bskyed rdzogs thams cad kyi// mthar thug 'bras bu grub mtha' dang // sa la mchod tshul ji lta bu// ldan 'bras dus skabs bka' stsol zhig/ de skad 'bor
56a2(rnying rgyud): zhus pa'i tshe// bcom ldan dpag med mtha' yas kyis// rang shang sprul pa'i 'khyar rnams la// sna tshogs cho 'phrul 'di gsungs so// thugs bcud 'jus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ba sdong brtsegs pa las// gleng gzhi'i becu stod papo'o// hrI/
56a3(rnying rgyud): gang do ldan pa'i 'gram// zan byol lha sme nang ga rgan dbe na// bag do byi chags rtsA T+Te// 'ad mi mongs su gang dgos cing // gnams dkar zlum zheb la// ba zhis dam rgyas pa nyid// dam nga TIgs pa nga//
56a4(rnying rgyud): kyang ring // 'jigs shing smrig yang lwa 'dre 'dra// 'gol zhing gzungasar rdzogs rim bsten// spyi dang bye brag gang la yang // gnas dang yul dang nye bA'i gnas// rgyal bas zhabs bcug bak+Sha shis pa// yid dang mthun pa ma phyog tug
56a5(rnying rgyud): sa bdud 'dus pa'i d+ha rgya po pa rjod 'jigs pa las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi bsgrub pa da nyams ldan gyi gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // 'di nyid nyams su len pa'i bya// dang dang brtson 'gyes gtong ma rje/
56a6(rnying rgyud): ma gro tha~Mng nga chubarten// dmig cing gzung sa // sreg thong po na gan nga/ ma gtsung ga tshig 'a gnas// rdul lagrus tshugs 'angacoM// da/
56b1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur// khyod chags zhing la ba rlung // chang ba tun mud ci gzhan pa na bsgrub// rdzun dang ga ma sgyu bra ma rgyung // 'dudu yon sa dbul rtag pa mad// sbyang dza gang sa mas bskyed ldan// gzhan dbang ma sang rang dbang thob// khyo ldan ga tu TAb
56b2(rnying rgyud): bzang ba'am// yang ni skyid smug sde tshogs sbyangs// tshe 'dis bya ba gang la yang // re ltos bral zhig po thag chod// 'di mi na gzhan ltos bral bas bsgrub// thugs bcud 'jus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ gang gis bsgrub pa'i gang
56b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // dang du mi len spangs pa'i chos// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog la sogs kyis// dbang gyur rigs drug ngal ba'i khyu// grub bya nyam sa len gcig dril chos// da
56b4(rnying rgyud): nyan rang byang chub sems// stegs byas sa lam rim gyis bgrod// tha ma'i 'jug pa dang po nyid// kri A yog lha dang sngags// bskyed ri martags rdzogs rang dbang thob// gzhan don phrin las rtsol bar ldan// 'bring pos brtan pa thob par bya//
56b5(rnying rgyud): byung spyan rdzogs nyid// thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bor grub/ thugs brgyad 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong ba rtsegs pa las/ spang bya'i chos dang nyams su zlang bya ba spyod rdzogs kyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
56b6(rnying rgyud): yid ces blangs btsun brgyad par rdzun// rig pa'i gnas la mchongs shing // yang cigan na 'drang gos 'dod gyur// lamachog 'khrul dang 'jigs pas spyo'o// skyed drugan pa jom hU~M / kyi 'ad drug/ nga don rje pa /
57a1(rnying rgyud): d+har+thasgrub don gyis tha ma rnyed// bdag shegs bka' yang lag lan grubs// bka' dbras ba brgya dag pa blangs// slob panargyu gtadad rjes bsgrags// brgyad pa tham na ga'o// mngan pa la sems 'byu
57a2(rnying rgyud): smin byed dbang bsrur chos sgo 'apyid// grol la ma khrid gdab rlung bshad pa// gsang brtsa ba'i bla ma'o// tshe rabs las smon bla ma ni// mthong thos dran pas rab gdung zhing // des bstan gdams brgyad la phan// dgongs shing 'bral med 'a
57a3(rnying rgyud): sems 'byung // blta bsgom spyod bral gdeng dang ldan// snying rje byang sems gzhan don bsgrub// phyi nang chos la lag len mkhas// gzhan rgyud shes dang der khrid brtson// bskyed rdzogs brtan thob lung bstan ldan// 'byung la sprul bsgyur ba
57a4(rnying rgyud): gso nus// gang la gang 'dul bye brag shes// gar 'dug btsal la spyi bos blang // de lta bu yi bla ma rnams// lus ngag yid gus bka' bzhi ni bsrub// log sems spang zhing mnyes par bya// de 'bras rang bzhin yid snron 'grub// de la
57a5(rnying rgyud): log pa bla ma'i gzugs// bdud kyi byin brlabs sprul bsgyur ston// rnam thar shis shis 'dra na yang // mkhas pas legs brtags mi bsnyen 'dor// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ldong brtsegs pa las// spyang glang gi bla ma
57a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang dag don gnyer 'dod pa gang // snang srid rte 'brel rgyu rkyen las// 'byung phyir phyi nang gsang ba dang // gnas skabs la sogs rten 'brel rdzas// wa 'bag rdo rje dril bu dang /
57a7(rnying rgyud): byad tur lu dung bris pa bzong // sna tshogs dang phyib long sogs// hU~M mi na dragang dgos pacing// nang gling zong ma // na rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// gang bsgrub las kyi thung ba ni// dkar sa rad mar nag pa sogs gsung /
57b1(rnying rgyud): ba na por shal ma yod// raShA'i za ma tog la sogs// gang 'thad thugs rten rdzas rnams kyang // lus dang gri bltar mi 'bral 'grogs// zhi btil dang sman sna tshogs// rin chen darang sogs rgyas pa la// mtshal dang siN+Dal bag na dbang //
57b2(rnying rgyud): khrag mtshon drug phur drag po la'o// gsang ba byang sems dkar dmar dang // sha lI dang ni bdud rdzi lnga// dbang po sman rag gtor mar bcas// yid 'ong mtshan ldan mchog tu'o// gnas skabs rgya chen rten 'brel rdzas// gang la gang dgos thams pa dkyang //
57b3(rnying rgyud): mngon nan 'dzin chags med tshul cis// don gnyis bsgrub ra mkhas pas bcangs// dkyil 'khor lha dang michad lum sgrogs// dgyes paskad m+b+hi na ga seng mchod rdug// dgra bzlog ga mtshan nad bzlog stan// de dag rnams pa da kla ma
57b4(rnying rgyud): thugs brgyad 'dus pa'i thud kyirgyal po pa slong brtsegs pa las/ zlab rten gyi rdzas bsnyen pa'i la ste drug pa'o// / thabs sgrogs blo brtan snying dus ni// gzhung bzang khrel che gas cig ga// dang brtson shes rab stong /
57b5(rnying rgyud): dam gtsang shes mthun ci l+le nyan// g.yo rgyu ser sna mngon zhen chung // gsang sngags la mos skrag sems med// khog yangs nyon mongs shes chung ba'i// thogs dang ldan cing bslab par bya// slab rten shes rab thogs mchog ni// yid 'od bzhin
57b6(rnying rgyud): mdzes sngags la dang // ngag nyung gsang thob rnal 'byor gus// lus mnyen 'khril ldem dri bzeng zo// lus thung dbyangs spyan dka' mi gcog/ g.yo sgyu ser sna tog pa chung // rtsi bzang gsang rngub ru ma mkhregs// blo yang tshig brtan gtong ngod rje/
57b7(rnying rgyud): de las yig pa'i bran kho la rigs// nad gtsong can dang gzhan dbang song // rigs de na yun ring du \u0f7fkhas man// gegs byed dngos grub mi 'byung spang // 'on gyir dngos grub stsol nus dang // mthong ba tsam gyis bde ba babyed// rnal dbyor yid dang
58a1(rnying rgyud): smra 'dogs nga dang sa na bang ma/ sa dpa la bye// dang sa na spyo/ gas myed dbya thogs s+ho//
58a2(rnying rgyud): na sa
58a3(rnying rgyud): man sa
58a4(rnying rgyud): dun na/ sa
58a5(rnying rgyud): sa su sa
58b1(rnying rgyud): brang gling dgra 'dab brgyad mdzes// skr-i khang ta babs khyud mar bcas// 'ja' gur dur khrod 'byung ba 'khrugs// mdzes pab spun ldan brjid par dgod// ra tshogs dang 'bring tha ma yis// rin chan 'bru tshon grang 'byor dang // gzhal gang/
58b2(rnying rgyud): drar lI tsa ka li// ras bris stegs bu rdul tshon bri// sgyu ma lus kyi grong khyer dang // rtsa rlung khams kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sa chu me rlung las grub rgya// dngos sogs rab 'bring tha ma la'o// ma bcos lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang // lnga sngo 'od
58b3(rnying rgyud): lnga'i dkyil 'khor nyid// lug kyad spro ba spu'i dkyil 'khor bcas// rab 'breng tha mar shes par bya// rgyas bsdus bsdus dar de nyid bsdus// sa brtags 'dul sa chog sogs// chag chag thig tshon byin rlabs rnams// rab tu shis pa'i byab
58b4(rnying rgyud): skye// mkhas pas lha yi nga rgyal gyis// skad cig gcig rdzogs babs lugs sogs// gang byung gang dgos gnas nyid du// gdong ldan dkyil 'khor bya ba bsgrub// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bad sdod brtsegs pa las/ dkyil
58b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi bya ba bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// I// / bla med bsgrub don gnyer 'dod gang // byin rlabs dngos grub phrin las kyi// lha yi rnal 'byor 'di dag la// nang bcud dag phyir gsal bar blta// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i
58b6(rnying rgyud): zlos// ma bcos spos bral de nyid lha// rang byung gsal 'tsher lhun sdug lha// thugs rje zhal phyag gzugs snang lha// yab yu ma thabs shes ni dang khro// dkar ser da mar ldaljang spug dang nag/ de bzhin kha dog sna tshogs pa// cha lugs
58b7(rnying rgyud): phyag mtshan ma nges gsal// 'od dang 'od zer sna tshogs rgyan// sras dang sprul pa yang sprul tshogs// mi zad gsal bar sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las phyir snang lha// gang zag blo yi khyad par gyi// so sos ji ltar 'dod pa'i sgra/
59a1(rnying rgyud): zin las kha bsgyur sna tshogs kyang // ye shes lha gcig nges 'grub na// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// lha tshogs gang dang gang dag la// ca 'dod dngos grub zhu ba'am// bskul sogs las rnams nges par
59a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub// des na gcig dang du ma'ang rung // gsal stong 'dzin med dang nyid las// sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs// mkhas pas chags bral ldan par blta// de nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dur khrod 'breng na bslab gyur kyang //
59a3(rnying rgyud): mchog dang thun mong 'bras bu gang // ci 'dod rang byung lhan grub 'byung // de nyid ma rtogs a 'bas blos// ye shes sems dpa' bsgrub gyur kyang // gnas skabs ldan 'bras phra'u las// yang dag 'bras bu srid mtha' tsam// yang na gzhan
59a4(rnying rgyud): don blo nges dang // dad pa dam tshig ldan pa pos// mngon zhen bral bar bsgrub gyur kyang // ci 'dod 'byung bar rten 'brel lo// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bde sdong brtsegs pa las/ lha ba skyed cing bslab par bstan pa'i le'u ste ba
59a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / I// lha bsgrub sngags kyi rnam grangs las// smra brjod las 'das de nyid sngags// gsang ba skye med rdo rje'i bzlas// lhun grub 'byung sgra nang gi'o// phyi ltar rtsol bcas tshig 'bru'i sngags// dril dang gtso 'kho
59a6(rnying rgyud): kha bsgyur sogs// bye drag so sor swA ba ya // gsal dag sgra zur ma nyams gces// oM AHhU~M hrIH/ badz+ra gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi d+he wa DAk+ki ni/ ro d+hi tsit+ta/ ma hA su kha/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ shAn+ti ka/ hrIHma ha ri ni sa/ ra tsi Sh+Thaya/ sarba sid+d+hi/ kA ya
59a7(rnying rgyud): t+ta/ dz+nyA nasaH/ a mi daM wa/ mimaHt+ta saM d+ha wa a d+hid+ha ne// ma ma A yudz+nyA na/ sid+d+hi ba la d+h+waM swAhU~M/ oM AHb+h+yAM d+ha nA~M/ pad+ma badzAhrIH/ d+hU mag+na ye T+Tak+ki na na ma swA hA/ oM A d+h+waM/ gra ru shrI/ bud+d+ha tha~Md phreng \u0f7fpa~M/ za ro tsa na a~M/ sa@
59b1(rnying rgyud): oM wA hA/ zasad+d+he/ ats+tshaH/ mas paH/ oM.Ak+Sha/ bAm+b+ha// b+h+yaHAH/ sa k+ShaH/ oM s+yAH/ grA ts+tshas+t+wa~M/ mthab / !/ oMb+h+yaH/ badz+ran/
59b2(rnying rgyud): d+hi a rtsig ne rtsig/ mA ma ruM lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ bud+d+ha ka pA liM dpa' bo d+hI/ bud+d+hi pra DAk+ki ni mA ma ru lu h+ni swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru thI/ badz+ra ma hA kro ta gyi gr-i wa/ ma ma a~M ka tsa ti trUM/ oM AHhU~M/ gu ru sh+le/ badz+ra dA Ni ma hA krong /
59b3(rnying rgyud): mA sid+d+hi hU~M/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ yak+Sha sa ma ya/ hrIHma hA ri nis/ ra tsahrIHya/ ma ma yo gi ni/ sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ shIn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ wa shi ku ru swA hA/ sha truM mA ra ya phaT/ oM AHhriM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ti hUM hrIH/
59b4(rnying rgyud): oM AHhU~M/ ma hA rak+ta/ mU la rak+ti/ dz+wa la maN+Da la hUM hrIH/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA ba liM taM/ te dzA ba liM ta/ b+ha la~M b+ha te/ gu h+ya ma hA shrI/ sa ma ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra ak+saM a/ puMSh+paM pu/ d+hU ba d+hA/ A lo ke hrIHg+han d+hi g+han/ nai wa~M d+ha A/ shad+d+ha hA/
59b5(rnying rgyud): a b+hi Shi pU maM/ b+h+rUM rak+Sha hUM/ de la sogs te sngags kyi rigs// bsgyur dang bsgyur kha'i rnam grangs rnams// rgyas bsdus rnam pa ma nges par// gang byed so so'i sham bu gdags// 'bru 'bu mo grangs kyi bsnyen pa ste// dus kyi tshad ni lo gsum
59b6(rnying rgyud): la// tshad ni rtags rdzogs bar du bzlas// de la nges med shes par bya// rgyal po'i pho nya lta bu dang // zla ba skar phreng mgal me'i tshul// bung ba tshad grol lta bu ste// 'jab dgongs pazhi dang ldan par shes// phyi nang che chung go rim dang // ring thung
59b7(rnying rgyud): mgyogs bul drag dang zhan// skyon drug dor zhing tshul shes par// don 'bras ma smin bar du 'bad// spyir ni rnam grangs go rim dang // tshul can tshul min spang blang sogs// sngags kyi byed las gang yin rnams// so sor brtags te bya bar shis//
60a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin sngags dang bzlas brjod gsum// gcig mdangs gcig gis bskyed pa'i phyir// gsal dag brjod pa gtsang ba gces// da 'bras yid 'dod dngos grub 'byung// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bar
60a2(rnying rgyud): sdong brtsegs pa las/ sngags kyi rnam grangs bgrang tshul dang bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// I// drod tshad rtags dang mtshan ma gnyis// mi rtog ting 'dzin de nyid po'o// mngon zhen kun rdzo'i rjen khung ding/
60a3(rnying rgyud): gding rnyed snang srid cir mi sems// dngos nyams rmi lam rab rib la// 'ja' 'od shel dang bum gter rnyed// dri bzang rol mo nyi zla shar// me tog khrus rgyan gos bzang gon// rdzing 'dor gzhan bkur ri mthon 'dzegs// lnga tshogs 'bul
60a4(rnying rgyud): smin /
60a5(rnying rgyud): mdor na lus dag yid bde zhing // khams rgyas rtogs 'bar 'dod pa'i don// chos 'grub gnas skabs mthar thug gi// byed 'bras 'byung ba mtshan ma'o// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ rtags dang mtshan ma
60a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / I// / lha dang bla ma grub nas ni// ci 'dod phrin las khab sgyur brtson// byin rlabs 'dod pas bla mas ni// dad cing gdung bas las la sbyang // dngos grub 'dod pas yi dam lha/ pho mo
60a7(rnying rgyud): zhi drag gzhan phan blos// dril dang bye brag so so sogs// yid gnyis med par las la sbyar// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// bar chod sel dang bstan pa bsrung // ma mo rA ni chos sbyor gi// las sbyor dam tshig ldan pas 'bad// gzhan
60b1(rnying rgyud): yang gnas skabs mthar thug ge// phrin las kha bsgyur las phran rnams// dang dang brtson 'grus dam tshig ldan// yid gnyis bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// lha dang bla ma la sogs dang // 'khor dang sprul pa yang sprul gyi//
60b2(rnying rgyud): bslab pa grub nas brtsam par bya// de grub mnyes par ma byas shing // 'dod pas las sbyor gang brtsams kyang // 'grub par mi 'gyur bar chad ni// mi rung ltas dang bcas te 'byung // de phyir lha dang bla ma nyid// grub na mnyes par bya ba dang // ma mo
60b3(rnying rgyud): nA ni bran khol bcas// thugs dam bskangs nas las la sbyar// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad stong brtsegs pa las/ phrin las kha bsgyur dang las sbyor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// A~M// / lha dang sngags
60b4(rnying rgyud): kyi de nyid don// ma rmongs bstan pa thob bya ste// mtshan nyid kun ldan bla ma yis// rang smin las ni gzhan smin brtson// dam tshig kun ldan dad pa'i gzhi// kun bslad skyes bu dam pa yis// lus dang longs spyod la sogs rdzas// dngos 'byor
60b5(rnying rgyud): sprul cing man+t+ra la dbul// dag byed nyid ni thog ma la// rig b+ha lnga yis lnga nyid bshig/ gsang ba shes rab tshig don bskur// yan lag mtha' rjes yongs su rdzogs// b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud+d+he k+Sha ya a b+hiSh+Ti Sha mAM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa au/ oM badz+ra ad+hi
60b6(rnying rgyud): ShIts+tsha hUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karmA a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ oM AHhUM gu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta guSh+yo a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ oM DAk+ki ni pradz+nyA su khadz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa tur a
60b7(rnying rgyud): b+hiShiny+tsaSh+T+r-ihrIH// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// lus la rdzas sbyin phyi rol pa// tshig sngags nang dba'i ting 'dzin gsang // brda dan sprad pa de kho na// bskur thob ma bskur thob pa nyid// bskur nas mi tho ba la sogs pa// dpon slob gnyis kyisnga /
61a1(rnying rgyud): blang rnams// dbang gi bye brag shes par bya// gsung sngags rtsa ba dbang nyid de// de nyid rdza bdam tshig las// 'da' bar mi bya bsrungs mtshams rnams// gnyis kas shes phyir dngos grub 'byung // thugs bcud 'dus pa'i chung
61a2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fla ro pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ dbang bskur bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // gsang dang sngags kyi de nyid don// bla na medang kho na ste// de yi bla na med pa ni// dam tshig la gnas mchog tu bsngags// phrin
61a3(rnying rgyud): 'grus gsung ste// bye brag gnas skabs mthar thug gi// yan lag rtsa ba'i dmachog dag/ nyi shu lnga dang lha nyi drag ces// skyon yon skad zlar gzhig byas la// ma nyams bsrungs na don 'bras 'grub// nyams na yun ring du myang /
61a4(rnying rgyud): de don legs shes bya// rdo rje theg par gyur to cog/ spyi dang bye brag gang la yang // bstan pa'i rtsa ba dam tshig ni// rnam pa mang po de bzhin no// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las// dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste
61a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / I// / grol lam yang dag gcig nyid la// bden pa gnyis phyir bskyed dang rdzogs// rab dbring tha ma'i blo can gyis// gnyis med rdzogs dang bskyed pa'o// 'khor 'das spyi gzhi yang dag don// ma bsgribs rjen pa bskyed
61a6(rnying rgyud): pa la// ngo bo stong pa rdzogs pa ste// sna tshogs 'phro 'du gnyis su med// gzhi rdzogs lam snang 'bras bu mthong // sgo yul yul can gsum 'dzom na// mngon sum 'phel zhing tshad la phe ba// zad nas gnyis 'bras de nyid thob// nyag thag
61a7(rnying rgyud): gcig chod yan lag skam// klong 'phyo spogs grol brtan pa tshugs// rtsal rdzogs mdzes pa'i rkyen gyis sbas// 'od zer 'gro 'dra las kun byed// rtsad cho dang yang su 'dod khyer// seng ge ri nab glang po skyong // kun pal btang snyoms cir mi blta//
61b1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' bo rgya mtsha ma// ma nor gcig chog glo bde ba'i// cod pan pog pa de nyid sogs// bsnyen cing mchod dab zlas pa 'bad// sta gon dang po'i bya ba'o// gnyis par dal dang rdzas bkod de// dmigs pa gsal zhing bsgrub la brtson//
61b2(rnying rgyud): gsang rtags rdzogs pa dang // rten 'argyarang rtag tu ma yengs blta// de nas gsum par las la sbyar// gang 'dod phrin las kha bsgyur gdags// 'dod don 'bras bu yid la bya// don grang ga la ma mchis la bzhag/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis ma
61b3(rnying rgyud): ra la// rdzogs rim gsam pa 'bring po nyid// thams bskyed rim bzlas pa 'bad// mthar thug bskyed rdzogs yang rtse yin// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyun gyi chal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ grol lam bskyed rdzogs kyi gdams ngabargyad
61b4(rnying rgyud): bcu drug pa'o// I// / chags chen lam du zhugs pa yi// bla med bzud kyi mthar jug 'ad// sa la ma gyur bgrod / cig gis// smin grol gnad kyi yang zhan 'di// dang po sprin byed ngal dra gzhug/ gnyis par chags pa me pa
61b5(rnying rgyud): thing ngo sgom// gsum par nyams le nag cig thog gzir// rdo stong snang srid bde per rol// me lo rnamal/ yeng rang zhing // dben par du m+bi'i dkyil 'khor bsham// mos gus gsol bzur rdzogs gdab// gsang ba'i dang grags dbang ba dang
61b6(rnying rgyud): dga'adang mchog dga' mchog rabadaga'// ngad skyong me rtog ting 'dzin babyung // ma yangs 'bras sus dul gtad// 'di ni rtag gcig gnyis med don// b+h+yo d+haHt+ta ma hA mu kha dz+nyA nad+hAtra aSh+TaSh+Tad+hamaM/ b+ha was g.yo 'bul lnga tshogs kyi//
61b7(rnying rgyud): las 'a dbang 'byor pa nyin sdug pade// phyag bskor gang bsgyur skyong lam n+ya// sngon du 'gro bzhin chag sa// myo byung gas rab drung myong bcing // rkyen mthar mi srog can la khyib// dab dang 'byar thab las su rung // bar drug nad la dbang par bya/
62a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i mda' bsnun 'phen byas te// dbab bskyil bzlog bkram dbang dpyor thob// dang gzhan spyor byas las la myur// tha ma nyid de rim pas so// mthar thug ngan ston ye shes bskyed// nga sprod rgyas gdabal
62a2(rnying rgyud): sogs te// yang dag bla med 'bras bu'i mchog/ rang gzhan rnal 'byor rgyal pos blta// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brdzogs pa las/ khwa k+ki'i chags lam gsang ba bla mad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u stem du bdun
62a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// A// / bskyed rdzogs brtan pa thob pa yi// 'bras bu bcud du smin tshul dag/ gnas skabs mthar thug yang dgadon// ngo bo dbyer med grub tshul ni// chad rtags yid gnyis las grol te// 'bras bu sku gsum bcud ngu smin// 8
62a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan kun don las byed cing // don gnyis yang dag chod du ldang // pha rol rgol ba sun 'byin nas// sna tshogs las la dbang 'byor te// yang dag sa la 'god pa dang // yang na dbyings su grol bar byed// dbang po gsum gyi khyad par las//
62a5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid dang ni bar do ru// gcig gi brgyad des chod nas/ yang dag brtan pa mi g.yo 'gyur// rdos bcas nyid dang bral ba'i tshe// rdul bral mkha' dang 'od zer 'ja'// yig 'bru sku gdung ring bsrel sogs// sku gsum thob rtags mang 'a byung
62a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'bad pa don yod gcig cho ga nyid// 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka'// la las rna ba'i dbang po ru// lan cig thos kyang don chen 'grub// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi 'bras
62a7(rnying rgyud): bu grib tshul bstan pa'i le khri ste bco brgyad pa'o// sle// / 'di la dbang spyod rig pa'i bu// skye 'chi mi gos rdo rje sgra// rje med mchod bras 'dab brgyad las// legs kyang sprul sku pad+ma 'byung // rgyal ba rnams kyi phrin las bdag /
62b1(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs spyod pa rlan po mas// gdul bya'i mas blo tha dad la// rnam pa bzhi ma dran byer 'gyur// desras sbal dang yang skal dang // sa rangs don byed skyes dran// tsho thung pa la la zhing// 'di nyid mtshan cam 'dzin pa 'byung // de nang
62b2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i zer thag ltar// stang sbrul khyab byed gnas skabs 'gar// 'phros pa'i phreng ba'ang re re tsam// mtha' nas mthang ru 'byung bar 'gyur// tshul min 'chol bar 'byung srid kyi// tshul 'di nam yang 'jig mi mnga'// ci rtsi ma
62b3(rnying rgyud): gdung 'dzin pa// g.yung dring nyid du brtan pa'o// bstan pa dam pa 'di dang ni// don byed dam pa sprul par brngas// 'di 'brang srid pa ma lus kun// mi nub dar rgyas gnyis ldan shog/ thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad stong brtseg
62b4(rnying rgyud): pa las/ ma 'ongs lung bstan dang smon lam gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// I// / 'di ni bstan pa gang bab kyi// rin chen bzhus pa'i khu ba'am// yang na gang 'thad sman sogs kyis// bris shing lus pa bcangs pas kyang // mau 'dir
62b5(rnying rgyud): dang mis mchod cing // bar drugacod pa'i bdud tshogs kyang // zhi ba'i las la gnas pa dang // bkur stir bcas te bsrung bar 'gyur// tshe 'phos lhas bzang mtshan mar bcas// rlud gdon duHkha nye zha zhing // mtha' yas bkod sogs ni
62b6(rnying rgyud): khams su// 'grod 'gyur ni rlom meng gyur na// bsgrub cing nyams su blangs pas ni// bla med 'bras bu rgyar thob ste// rang gzhan don gnyis 'grub pa dang // 'bras bu ldan rdzogs spos kyi dgos// de byer bstan la zhugs rnams kyis// nyams
62b7(rnying rgyud): su len dang gzhan la ston// 'bri klog 'chang zhing gsol ba gdab// de 'bras nus pa dpag par dka'// thugs bzud 'jus pa'i rgyun gyi rgyal po pad spong brtsegs pa las/ che ba'i yon tan dang bcang thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o//
63a1(rnying rgyud): bskad dpag med rgyal po yis// dbang po la sogs 'khor rnams pa// rang bzhan kong nas rang babs sa// pad+ma thugs kyis smras pa dang // byang chub sems dpa chags/
63a2(rnying rgyud): po la sogs dang // ma mo mkha' 'gror bcas pa rnams// rjes su yi rang tshul gyis ni// e ma e ma bcom ldan 'das// yang dag don ldan bla na med// legs so legs so legs par smras// bstod bsngags rngams mdza
63a3(rnying rgyud): thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ rdzas su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / A~M// / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug gzi brjid 'od dadag med kyi
63a4(rnying rgyud): rang byung du babs pa'i bka' dri ma med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan dang / phrin las mi zad pa dpal du 'bar ba'i dgongs pa mngon du byung ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // sa ma ya/ rta na gzugs
63a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs kyis bka' 'di spangs/ gtor kun dam nyams log lnga can gyi dbang po skabs/ skal ldan las can gsung gi skyes dang 'phrad par shog/ sa ma ya/ chu rgya che/ d+ha thim/ g+haH/ sbrul phru gar gyi da'ang phyug sangs rgyas gling pas/
63a6(rnying rgyud): yos kyi lo glang gi zla ba'i tshes brgyad/ yos kyi nyi ma nyi dros 'brug gi dus su/ bla dkar dung gi sgo mo nas/ klu brtson drag po yab yum gyi bsnyen bkur byas nas gter phul ba lags so// phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du bkra shis par gyur
63a7(rnying rgyud): cig// u rgyan gsang ba brda' skad du/ shak+sha/ ma khrag sa tsakrAH/ rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru te waT+Tak+ki ni sarbak+Sha ya tam+b+has ma la ba ra ta ni swaSh+Ta na ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa
63b1(rnying rgyud): zhes thab/ ma thag dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag tu med cing gzi brjid mthang yas pa'i dpal la zug 'tshar lo// a na hA// bklong chen pa'i bzung // spyod pa dpag med rgyal po / nas 'a dgas
63b2(rnying rgyud): tshabs ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// thabs shes 'jus shing tshogs pa'i tshe// snang srid rol pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// gnang don bskyed pa'i don zhus pa// e ma a ma bcom ldan 'das// gyi nang snang srid rten brel kuH// ye da
63b3(rnying rgyud): mi rol pa las// ma dag pa dang dag pa dang // ye dag chen po dag pa'i klong // sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bsgoms na// bla ma lha dang rdzam+b+hi dang // de dang de yul yang sprul pa// rkang gangs mtshan bshad stsal du gsol// de bzhin rngon lus brnya tshul dang // dka
63b4(rnying rgyud): ser dmar sogs sku mdog dang // de bzhin rgyan dang cha lugs dang // rnam 'gyur mdzad pa phrin las dang // rtsig mtshon 'dzin dang de tshur dang // dbang po yab kyi rgya mtshan dang // dpa' mo yum gyi rgyu mtshan dang // de dag 'khor gyi rnam grangs dang /
63b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas rnams kyi skul pa dang // sprul pa de las yang sprul dang // de dag rnams kyi rtogs brjod dang // de ltar lha rnams ji ltar bsrub// lha deng bsgrub pa'i dgos pa gang // bsgrub pa'i 'bras pa yon tan ci// ma bslupa nyes pa ji ltar 'gyur/
63b6(rnying rgyud): ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsrub// nad ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bslab// gsang lhur bsgrub ni ji ltar bslab// de bzhin de nyid ji ltar bsgrub// lha mchod thugs dem ji ltar bskang // bdag nyid lha ru ji ltar gsal// mdun du babyed tshul ji lta bu// dam tshig
63b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i ngo bo gang // de bzhin ye shes sems dpa' gang // de nyid bsros na ji ltar bsre// dbang bskur rgyas 'debs ji ltar bya// de dag rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gang // bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// dgongs bkrol nas phul
64a1(rnying rgyud): du gsol// zlu ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis rgyud zhal mor ba las/ gleng bzhi'i du mig gi lang ska dang po'o// ste// de ltar bzhin zhum par dzun// dpag med rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// mya ho 'dus
64a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs nyon// 'gyur med ye shes rdo rje'i tshig/ rtog bral chen pos yid lazung // yi gdangs chen po'i tsha 'phrul las// ros pa ye shes lhar snang ba// rkang grangs ma tshan bshad ji ltar
64a3(rnying rgyud): nges don bka' de spros par bya// 'jug pa rnams ni sgro don du// cha ba sprin dang grol ba dang // mchog dang thun mong bsgrub phyir dang // sna tshogs las kyi bye brag rnams// nges par 'dod la grangs yang yang // rnam par nges pa med mod kyang // ga
64a4(rnying rgyud): bya'i don du nges pa can// rkang grangs mtshan gyi 'jug sgo bstan// bla ma yi dam DAk+ki ste// kun don ye shes rol pa las// brda dang rtags kyi rim par spros// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba ste// tha ma 'bring dang rabA kyi blo// nges pa can dang nges pa med// rab
64a5(rnying rgyud): tu mnges de bzhin nyid// nges pa can gyi lha spros pa// dpag tu med pa'i gzhal yas khang // mtshon bya mtshon par byed pa'i sku// lham mer lhang nger snang ba can// steng dang 'og tu rnam par rgyal// phyogs dang mtshams dang dbus dag dang // gyi ru
64a6(rnying rgyud): gsal dang nang dugs la// bar ram yang ni de bzhin nyid// rnam par nges pa can du ste// gsal 'grib med pa rgyal ba'i sku// de bzhin tshe chung mtshan ma bral// rkang grangs gcig dang du ma sogs// mtshan 'dzin nor pa rnam par spang // nges
64a7(rnying rgyud): pa med la lha rang nyid// gud na ma yin mtshan ma bral// brda dang rnam rol gar gyis mtshon// ye shes sgyu ma'i lhar snang ba// snang tsam nyid na brjod mtha' yas// de phyir rkang grangs cho 'phrul te// cho 'phrul nyid la cho 'phrul lo// rab tu nges pa
64b1(rnying rgyud): med pa las// de bzhin nyid la de bzhin su// gcig pa nyid la du mar ro// dgag dang bslab pa ma mchis shing // ye klong kun chub phyag rgyar mtshon// rab tu 'khrugs pas rnga mar gsal// kun tu gdul ba gcig tu 'dus// 'dre don 'phrul gyi yang
64b2(rnying rgyud): zhun no// de ltar gsum gyi mtha' bcad phyir// kun gyi spyi phud bla ma ste// cho 'phrul du ma yi dam lha// kun don rmad byung mkha' 'gro nyid// 'khrul pa ngan rtog dgag pa yi// thabs kyi rgyal pos 'di smras pa// dri med mtsho gleng gi sar rgyas pa'i stong
64b3(rnying rgyud): mngal gyi mgos pad+ma badz+ra rtsal// bde ba'i ro 'byin lha lha ma man+dar// thabs shes bde stong gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rgyal ba yongs kyi thugs bcud 'dus pa ste// de yi rtsal las rnam 'phrul du mar snang // 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yab yum
64b4(rnying rgyud): mched de brgyad// zhe sdang rdo rje nga rgyal rdo rje dang // 'dod chags rdo rje phrag dog rdo rje dang // gti mug rdo rje bde ba'i rdo rje dang // mtsho skyes rdo rje khrag 'thung rdo rje ste// dpa' bo yab kyi dgyes pa skor ba'i yum// skyod byed ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma dang // de bzhin
64b5(rnying rgyud): sreg byed ma dang tsin+ti ka/ rmongs byed ma dang la ma man+da ra// gsod byed ma ste thabs shes yab yum tshul// mtha' bral rol pa'i ngang du rnam par gnas// bud+d+ha thod phreng rtsal dang de yi yum// bud+d+hA nAk+ti rnam par rol pa ste// de yi cho 'phrul 'gyed pa 'khor gyi
64b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs// badz+ra thod phreng rat+na thod phreng rtsal// pad+ma thod phreng karma thod phreng rtsal// rdo rje mos pa rtsal dang myu gu rtsal// bzhad pa rtsal dang gar gyi dbang phyug ste// de dag rnams la gnyis med 'khrol ba'i yum// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// bi sha
64b7(rnying rgyud): sarba dmatshig 'jig rten gyi// mkha' 'gro rnams dang gnyis med mnyam rol gnas// mi bskyod rdo rje bde ba'i dbyings phyug ma// yab yum gnyis kyi cho 'phrul spros pa las// pad+ma 'byung gnas blo ldan mchog gi sred// nyi ma 'od zer seng ges sgrog dang //
65a1(rnying rgyud): brnas ma rgyal so// sa / ma // da sprul ba mamaldan pa // na / mnam/
65a2(rnying rgyud): shAkya dam mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul ma// gdul bya'i ri 'dod bskang zhing nyams dang ldan// pad+ma dbang chen rig byed lha mong bcas// bde stong rol pa'i cho 'phrul sprul pa'i 'khor// rdon nyi ma thogs med bral po dang // nyem
65a3(rnying rgyud): nga // rdo rje khror ma/ hUM mjed dang // ro langs bde cwo rdo thog nod 'bur// yum chen legs skyes phra me na dbyings phyag ma// srid pa'i rgyal mo 'i khros dbang po che// gar gyi dbang phyug gis kyi dbang mche// srid pa chags byed la ba cwa yI
65a4(rnying rgyud): stong zag med do yis tshims par byed// dbang po chen po rig 'dzin thod brtsal// mkha' 'gro nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// yang yum gnyis kyi cho 'phral 'khor gyi tshogs// lhun gyis grub dang phyag rgya chen po dang // tshol dbang dang ni mi smin ring
65a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin te// dam tshig dbang dang man ngag lung dang ni// shes rab rgyad dang nyams chag skyong ba ste// de dag rig 'dzin bzhi dang slob dpon bzhi// pun gzog ma dang rnal 'byor dgyes sdo ma// dbang gi lha mo rnal 'byong ro langs ma// dam tshig bdag
65a6(rnying rgyud): srub byed ma// phyod byed tshangs ma chong dzin rgyal mo ste// de ltar yab yum rnams kun mchog par la// rdo rje drag po khams gsum srid pa'i bdag/ yab yum gnyis kyi rngo 'phrul 'bar ba las// ya ma rting gos rje drang dkar dang // srin mo glog phreng yan
65a7(rnying rgyud): me dpal dang // gza' bdud spu gi klu bdud mgo gu pa// dbang phyug chen po ma hA kA lA'i sku// za byed nag mo bdud mo rem ti// khrag mig ma dang mon mo mi srun ma// lum gcig ma dang thog gi 'u yug ma// u mde b+h+rUM lha mo dung skyong ma// bstan pa bsrung tshus/
65b1(rnying rgyud): slob sam dgas pa s+ho// sangs rgyas dpa' bathod pa'i drum thung // sangs sa dpa ma gnyis ming 'brel ba mas// sprul pa'i po ba kyad lab snam bcas pa yang // da ban nan pa' ba dang // ma dang nga ltadu skye sla ba dang // nga
65b2(rnying rgyud): ging 'gugs byed stsol gang gsod byed dang // stobs ging mabyud rgyag ging las byed pa// rdo rje dpa' mo rin chen dpa' mo dang // bad+ma dpa' mo las kyi dpa' myo nga // rdo rje ging mo rin chen ging mdang // pad+ma gling mo lus kyi gling mo ste//
65b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas dpal gyi bka' lung nyan// rte ma smin dbang chen e kA tsa ta gnyis// gtso bo'i tshul las sprul pa'i 'khor brgyad po// ye shes zil gnon las kyi khro bo dang // ye shes mamo zil gnos sbyi zi la non// dazipa gzhi la nod
65b4(rnying rgyud): dang // tha 'dral myong pa nod na byed do// yum chen sebs ma dang khro ga nyer ma// ldan cig ma dang ngorjes 'dibs pa// rje las byeng gA shi rjelas na// yongs rnyed gan zung la // rab ma da nas
65b5(rnying rgyud): babyed// lag na rdo rjegs dbu'i dbyings thug ma// yab yum gnyis las sprul pa'i khro ba na// rnam par rgyal ba dang nig shin drug shing // tu mthun dpang chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // dbyig pa sngon po dadi na mig mgrin// 'dod pa'i rgyal po kham
65b6(rnying rgyud): gsum rnam par rnal// khro bo Sh+Ti kar dang stobs po mo// rdo rje mda' snyems dung khrod ba dag mo dang // rdo rje gtum mordo rje rlung 'byin ma// rdo rje ma rdo rje ga can 'ang ma// rdo rje sems mngon skyal byeng me// rdojom byin rdo rje gsong byed ma// yab yum
65b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang rang rang phrin las brtson// kun kyang gcol bor tshul du rnam par gnas// mun pa'i spagase la gsal sdang ye shis ston// wag dong pag gnong khyigadong 'ug gdong ma// brtan byed po nyam che ba 'joms byed pa// phyogs dang mtshams rnams dpal
66a1(rnying rgyud): gyi wang bzhinaspyan// dba' bo sbyong dbyug dpa' bor rab gsum ma// dpa' bo keng dus dpa' mo gtum mig ma// keng dus gtum po dpa' mo 'od ldan ma// dbu' mo mche gcogs dpa' mo snga chen ma// srar b+he ri dpa' do
66a2(rnying rgyud): brtan ma dang // 'od dpag med pa dpa' mo mi thung ma// rdo rje 'od ldan lang ka'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje sku mchog dpa' mo shing grib sa// rdo rje gzhon nu dpa' mos srung ma// rdo rje ral pa dpa' mo 'od can ma// rab tu dga' ba dpa' mo drung shugs ma// dpa'
66a3(rnying rgyud): hU~M mdzad dpa' mo chang 'thung ma// rab tu bzang po dpa' mo gtsug phud ma// rdo rje bzang po dpa' mo rab bzang ma// dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpa' morta snyam// sman mi bzang dang dpa' mo khwa gdong ma// stobs chen rgyal po tsakra'i shugs 'chang ma// rin chen
66a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dpa' mo dang skyes ma// rta mgrin rgyal po dpa' mo glang sna ma// nam mkha'i snying po 'khor lo'i go tsa ma// dpal ldan he ru ka dpal rab dpa' ma// pad+ma gar dbang dpa' mo stobs chen ma// rnam par sdang mdzad dpa' mo 'khor bsgyur ma// dpa' bo
66a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dpa' sgo brtson 'grus ma// dpal gyi bka' sdong lung gi pho tar bcas// so so rang rang las kyi gnyer 'dzin cing // skyobs shugs rtsal ldan rjod nyul bstan pa bsung // de sogs drang don dpag med ye shes lha// rtog pa skur la drang phyir rnam par
66a6(rnying rgyud): spros// de ltar lha yi rlung grangs su// shes par gyis shig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga yis drang por bshad pa la// khyed kyis nges pa'i don du zung // slad du byung 'jug chen por sbyor// la thag dbyer med nyid du chod// bla mA yi dam mkha' 'gro thams
66a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha'i rkang grangs mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / I// / yang ni 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// byin gyis brlabs la rnam mang yang // rnam pa lnga ru 'dus pa ste// snying rje byang chub sems
66b1(rnying rgyud): brnamapas// dang gi bas margyad byed kyis na// sa ldan nasasasas// rdzo ma kyi // ngashA gas nga dung phyogs// zlas pa \u0f7f// dran na da par ga/
66b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes wA ru byin gyis brlab// 'ba'i bcung bdud rtsir mos byas te// mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brtag// dri ny-id byi de na ba rnam lngal sa// spros pa'i ldan lag bsngam mi khyab// dr-i skar byin brji ba lnga ldan pa'i// rdul gyid spyod
66b3(rnying rgyud): zung // 'di ni ye shes rmang po che// med pa'i dbyings lngas dpag med snang // stang tsam ny-id las rnam grol ba'i// gdeng thob lha mi rol bar 'gyur// myi nang sngang srid dkyil 'khor nyid// gzhal gi sa khyang dang na rnams kuH// sbom
66b4(rnying rgyud): drug zla rnams sna/ khring phyir// 'jug pa'i thabs la snang ba yin// snang ba sprin ris 'dra ba la// mngon par 'i dra la \u0f88\u0f90 m+bi snang // yang dag gnad kyi don bstan pa// sa mtshams sbyar bas shes par bya// rtog pas skyegs pa'i na rnams rnaM/
66b5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis ma brdebs rlangs pas byung // rlangs pa sel ba'i ti zur du// ye shes rab ldan rang sdang smos// em 'di ni tibs kyi gsang // ma dag 'khru lnga ba'i blo can la// rdzu dan dpongs pa yang yang gsang // 'khod drug drug la sku
66b6(rnying rgyud): snang // de nas byin gyis brlab pa phyung // g+hA nAng du khebs shes par bya// gang gis gtan la phebs nges kyang // snying gi khur du che ba yin// b+h+ra maM yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rgyud shel gyi bo las/ b+h+yon gyis brlab pa'i
66b7(rnying rgyud): ga nas bskrun pa'i labu skye ga skyes pa'o// hU~M// yang ni sring tshogs sems dpa'adun// dgang se ngas ma rdzog su na// 'dag tu tshogs 'brang bani// ye shes sgra 'di sa byu ba'o// gdung bya'i mis thon du las/
67a1(rnying rgyud): tu dkar zhing 'tshor ba dang // de bzhin dmar la dngas pa dang // nag la rngam pa'i rang bzhin can// ser gsal gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// la lar mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sgo sgra dang ni thal ba'i mdog/
67a2(rnying rgyud): ni char sprin mun rum bzhin// dmar ser gur gum mdog ltar 'tsher// spug nag dang ni rab tu ldang // dud pa'i mdog la rngam par snang // la la phyed gzugs ri mo can// 'da' sna lta bur khra bo'i mdog/ de sogs kha dog rnam pA nI// gci
67a3(rnying rgyud): sa du mar snang // de yi dgongs don gnad rnams ni// thugs rje che ldan rnams kyis ni// gdul bya'i re 'dod bskang don du// rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang // yang ni phrin las sna tshogs kyis// sgyur byed rim par spros pa ste// de phyir gang 'dod to
67a4(rnying rgyud): sku rnams la// rnam par nges pa'i kha dog can// sbrul dang yang sbrul du mar snang // mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// nam mkhas khyab pa'i gdul bya la// 'dul byed thabs kyi rgyal por spros// gdul bya'i snang tshul du ma la// 'dul byed bye brag
67a5(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khyab// thabs mkhas snying rje'i cho 'phrul du// kha dog sna tshogs snang ba'o// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i sku mdog gi rnam par nges byed bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / I// / kye ho 'dus
67a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// de ltar ye shes lha rnams kyi// rgyan dang che lugs ji ltar na// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan gyi// lha yi cho 'phrul sna tshogs las// rgyan dang cha lugs ma nges kyang // gdul bya'i bas ma yid tshim slad du// rol ba'i cho 'phrul bsta
67b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// zhi ba'i tshul dang khro ba' tshul// de bzhin zhim khro yi tshul// khro bo lA yang rnam pa dgu// khro dang rngam dang rab tu lo// 'jigs gzugs bska mtho dang gis so// dam tshig dbang gis za ba dang // sprul pa lta bar khro ba dang // na
67b2(rnying rgyud): shug+sa gyis khro ba ste// khro tshul yan lag bcas pa'o// rang bzhin babs kyis khro ba de// 'khor ba bskyil phyir khros nas ni// spong la ma gtum pos log khyed rnams// 'joms shing brlag par byedapa // lta gzengs/
67b3(rnying rgyud): na 'joms byed mtshon cha thogs// rab tu drag rtsub dar dang ldan// rngam pa'i tshul gyis khro ba ni// 'jigs tshul bcas nas a ma~M tsig bstan// mig khri grad mthe bas ma ma chu bsdam// lag na mtshon thogs badzag supa sgom// rab tu myos
67b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chas// stobs ldan glang chen ko rlon dang // mi yi pags pa khrag ris can// gcan gzan skyug gi yun lkugs rnams// snod khribs smad dkris skad la bcings// khrag zhug thal ba'i chom rjes zug lnga// bod srong ma kyi rgyun 'os
67b5(rnying rgyud): brgyan// kha gdangs mche ge tsigs mig gsum bzang // lus la bsgral pa'i me chen 'bar// ha ha hU~M hUM phaT lab grogs// lag na mtshon che'i char po 'bebs// sbal med la sogs 'doms pa'o// 'byigs pa'i gzugs bstod khro ba ni/
67b6(rnying rgyud): che yan lag rags pa la// dpa' brjid ldan zhing 'gying ba can// mthong ba tsam gyis skrag pa'o// ngang gis khro ba rnam pa gnyis// ye shes lha yi dang khro dang // las byed shan pa lta bu'o// ye shes lha yi dang khro ba// khro bo'i cha lcags du mar bcas/
67b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs don g.yo ba med pa'o// las byed shin pa lta bu ni// nam yang brtse sems bral ba la// yang ni brnag pa'i dmigs med par// gang byed drag shul ldan pa'o// dam tshig dbang gis khro ba ni// gshis la khro ba med bzhin du// log spyod
68a1(rnying rgyud): sgrol bar dam bcas pa// sngon tsho dpal gyi spyan sA ru/ d+hA tra bsgral par khas blangs nas// de bzhin du yang khro ba la// gnas skabs dus stabs bskrun nas su// de la cha lugs nges pa med// sbal pa lta bur khro ba ni/
68a2(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'i ngang lus khro skur snang // gang la ci 'dul rnam 'gyur can// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa'o// rnam 'gyur shugs kyis khro ba ni// stangs stabs rnam pa mang po dang // rol pa'i cha lugs du mar bcas// drag po'i shugs kyis rtsub 'khrug smra
68a3(rnying rgyud): ston// ye shes lha yang skrag byed na// nyams pa rnams ni lta ci smos// thams cad brgyal zhing rangs par byed// ye nas khro bar bsngags pa'o// khro tshul yan lag bcas pa ni// gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa ste// mgo dang yan lag mang po
68a4(rnying rgyud): yis// so sor las byed phrin las skyong // de ltar khro dgu gang la yang // lus stobs ldan zhing yan lag rags// sgo dang mche ba rab tu rno// kha gdangs mig bgrad khro gnyer bsdus// smin ma ag tshos me ltar 'bar// rkang lag sen mo lcags/
68a5(rnying rgyud): klu 'gugs// skra dang ba spu mtshon char gzengs// dpa' rtags drar khrod chas rnams dang // dar dang rin chen du mas spras// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong nas 'gying // lus la sbrul pa du ma 'gyed// zhi ba la yang rnam pa lnga// ye nas zhi dang gnas//
68a6(rnying rgyud): skabs zhi// gdul bya'i don du zhi ba dang // rnam 'gyur skyabs kIs zhi ba dang // mngon par 'phags pas zhi bdang // de yang ye nas kwib ni// gdod nas skye ba med pa'i klong // thugs rje kun snang nyi 'od gangal// chags bral nyon mongs rang gis
68a7(rnying rgyud): 'jil// rgyan dang cha lugs rnams ma nges// rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gnas skabs zhi ba ni// mdzes shing yid 'ongs rgyan gyis sbas// gzhon sha chags shing bag dang ldan// kun ldan ye shes spyan rab mdzes// gdul bya'i/
68b1(rnying rgyud): don du zhi ba ni// sprul pa'i 'od zer phyogs bkur 'gyed// ye shes snang ba lam mer ston// gang la gang 'dul mdzad pa mdzad// rnam 'gyur stabs kyis zhi ba ni// thams cad yongs la khyab par brtse// log spyod byams pa'i shugs kyis 'dral// nyer
68b2(rnying rgyud): zhi kun dang mthun pa ston// mngon par 'phags pa'i zhi ba ni// tshad med bzhi yi dpyad zag can// gdal ba chen po kun la snyoms// thang lhod skyo dub med pa'o// kun kyang cha lugs rgyan rnams ni/ 'jam mnyen dar gyi cod pan dang // stong g.yogs
68b3(rnying rgyud): spang dkris 'ja' sna ma res// spyi gtsug mthon ka rin chen tog/ rtse bran phrog zhu pa tra can// mgur chu stan yod 'khor lo dris// phyag zhabs dpung rgyan ga du bu dkris// se mo do dang do shal can// sna tshogs rin chen phra rnams kyis// stod smad sku yi rgyan
68b4(rnying rgyud): du byas// gzhan yang rus pa'i phreng ba dang // sna tshogs dar gyi pho long sbas// mnyen lcug zhi sgeg 'khril ldem can// bzhengs dang bzhugs dang stangs stabs kyi// skyil krung la sogs rol par gnas// zhi ma khro yi rnam pa nI// gci ka~M tu ma des sna tshog
68b5(rnying rgyud): tshul// 'dzum la ngar ba'i rnam pa can// khro la zhi ba'i cho 'phrul dang // skra ni zhi la rnam 'gyur khro// rnam 'gyur zhi la cha lpags khro// cha lugs zhil stangs stabs khro// spyan dang zhal gyi rnam 'gyur yang // gcig zhi gcig khro phyed ma'i tshul//
68b6(rnying rgyud): mche bsdus pa'i so mdangs can// bzhad na spyan gyi rnam 'gyur khro// 'dum zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa can// zhi zhi 'dral khro zhing rngams// rngam rngam 'dra la rab tu zhi// g.yo ba'i rnam pas rol pa ste// kun kyang sbrul dang yang sbrul lo// de lta rwa'i
68b7(rnying rgyud): dang khro bo dang // phyed ma la sogs gang dang gang // rgyan dang cha lugs dpag tu med// la la gdul bya 'dul slad du// la la rnam rol gar gyi tshul// la la 'jug tshul tha dad ste// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// nges dang ma nges de bzhin no//
69a1(rnying rgyud): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra chung shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rgyan dang cha lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// I// / yang 'dus sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// gsal snang ye shes lha rnam
69a2(rnying rgyud): kye// rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las ni// phyi nang gsang ba bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang ye shes rnam rol pa// kun rdzob tsam du sna tshogs snang // don dam rnam des yongs la 'dres// zhi bar mdzad dang rgyas par mdzad// de bzhin drabang drag phrin
69a3(rnying rgyud): las mdzad// sna tshogs las rnams dbang bsgyur mdzad// gang yang dngos dang dngos min gyi// 'khor dang sprul pas gzhan don mdzad// mos pa rnams lnga mo sa snang mdzad// ma mos pa la'ang de dag gi// 'dul thabs tshe 'phrul du ma yis//
69a4(rnying rgyud): dang drag dang phyed ma dang // brtse ba'i nyams kyis dpa' brtul ston// snang mdzad rol pa ye shes sku// gcig las du mar 'gyed pa dang // de las de bzhin rim gyis smos// mang po gcig tu dril nas ni// ci bzhin 'gro don thabs kyis brtson//
69a5(rnying rgyud): sa 'og sa bla sa steng dang // de dang de las gzhan pa rnams// rnam par g.yo zhing las la sbyar// 'khrugs mar sna tshogs rol par ston// dpa' dang rol pa nyams kyis kyang // sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // mnyam rol sprul pa yang dang yang /
69a6(rnying rgyud): rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis// lus la sku dang dgra la gsung // de bzhin sems la thugs kyi'o// rgyan gyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// phyi nang gsung ba'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa grangs 'das gdul bya la// rjes rnams du mas
69a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul thabs ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis kyi// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// rnam 'gyur dpag tu med pa yang // brda' dang bcas pa'i phrin las rnams// char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bab par byed// dmigs pa dang bcas
69b1(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa bral// phyag rgya du mar yang yang spos// kun la cha yis snyoms par 'gyur// mdor na gang yang sgra dang bcas// dkyil 'khor rim pa las kyi nI// 'jug dang 'phro ba'i rnam 'gyur las// sna tshogs las kyi chog 'gyur// bzas
69b2(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs gdung bsel// duH kha'i gnas las de bzlog cing // mthar phyin thong mchog bgrod pa'o// bla ma mi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi u chud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las bskrun pa'i ledze ste drug
69b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// A// / gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// ma des sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes rol pa'i lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rgyun gyi phyag mtshan dang // de dag tshul gyi rnam 'gyur ni// gdul byad bskang don du
69b4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogasde dang ldan bya// brda' dang rtags kyis kun stod de// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po rje// pad+ma rgya ga ma rnam pa lha// pe gshegs mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'o// gri phug rul gr-i dgra sta dang // mda' ga zangs the kha d+h+r-ig/ mngang rlung spu
69b5(rnying rgyud): tshod dang // mragri dang ni mtshon ma yis// nyon mongasu la sogs rnam rtog 'joms// phung ba thob gtu na shing dang // thod dbyug tshon gyi gu gu dang // gnam lcags zo lum jug gi gri// mA tshungs bdud dang dre dra 'dul// rtswa mi sbrul dang rdo rje yi// zhags
69b6(rnying rgyud): pas drug gsum 'ching bar byed// bum pa lung bzed gtud kyi sbom// pang phor rin chen gzhong pa dang // padz+ra rA ga ga'u dang // t+yeng+ga sgram dron sdod chen po// dngos srab rnam gnyis bzung cher 'bebs// phrag mtshon zhing debyug rdzo
69b7(rnying rgyud): bsho la dang // bad macing po rgyal mtshan dang // rnga yab bcon khrim shing zhe// dpa' rtags nyon mongs g.yul rgyal rtags// rnga dang hU~Md+hU cang tirje dang // thod rdzas chos gsung sgra sgrogs byed// po ti ut+pal rin chen rlu // sprin gyi sdong
70a1(rnying rgyud): po rin chen phreng // ma long yid bzhin re 'dod bskang // nyi zla'iri rab ma dpung 'bar// chos 'byung rlung dang ma thabs kyis// sred gsum gdar sha gcod par byed// sngags pa mar khrag gi phur pa tshur// /
70a2(rnying rgyud): sbyangs sbal thog ser tsit+ta dang // sngags kyi par bu neT le'i rgyal ba ste// rdzogs pa las la bo la ma rungs 'joms pa'i rtags// me tog bdug spos mar me ji// zhal zas sgra dbyangs lha rnams kyi// dgyes par skang zhing mtshar
70a3(rnying rgyud): rnags// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// 'gugs dang 'ching dang sdom pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams myos par byed// de las gzhan yang longs spyod kyi// mdzes byed phyag mtshan du mar bcas// rang snang rnam ngag chos
70a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin// thugs mchog ye shes rtags kyi rgya// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang mdzod 'dzin// rnam rol cho 'phrul dpag med pas// skyo dang dub med kun tu spyod// gang dang gang la spel byed cing // sgrib med yang dag kun la sbyor// brtul /
