70a5(rnying rgyud): spyo pas 'gro don mdzad// e ma 'di dag rmang du byung // dgongs pa yongs rdzogs dkyi ldang khor bkra/ bla ma yi mya mkha' 'gro thags cad kyi su rgyad shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i phyag ma tshan gyi rnam par dbye ba ladzin tshul bstan pal
70a6(rnying rgyud): ste bdun pa'o// AM// sprul pa'i 'khor rnams gus par nyon// ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo yab kyi rnam rol ni// thabs kyi ye shes tshul bstan pa// don la yangab yum ris med kyang // snang tshul gdul bya 'dul don pa
70a7(rnying rgyud): thabs deng shes rab 'dri 'phrod pas// phan tshun gye na g.yas dang g.yon// gnyis sbyor nyon mongs bral ba ste// dag pa'i skad cig so ma la// mdag lo 'dab skye ba na// g.yo med dge pa'i rang snang sba// 'di bu nathabs kyi rgyal po yin// nyon
70b1(rnying rgyud): la sogs 'khor rnams 'jig/ phung po gang yang gtor ba'i rlung // 'di kun rab mchog ye shes yin// rtsal chen dpa' bo he ruka/ yab kyi tshul du rnam par snang // bzang po'i sprul ba rang byung ba// gsal tsam na yin che bar grags/
70b2(rnying rgyud): dpal chen brtul zhugs nas stobs 'dzin// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba ste// kun kyang 'joms pa'i dpal du shar// dpal chen bde ba'i ye shes bskyed// dpa' bo srid pa'i rtse mo gnon// khyod kyi sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang // nyon
70b3(rnying rgyud): mongs g.yul las rgyal bye dang // rdo rje'i cho 'phrul du ma yas// rdul dang yang sbrul de sprul zhing // 'dod chags dgra las rnam rgyal ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ye shes kyi// 'dod chags ma spangs rang byung nas// 'dod pas 'dod pa
70b4(rnying rgyud): nyid 'grub byed// des na dpa' bo e ma mtshar// yab kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la rdzogs// bzang po yang ni de yi pha// dbang rab gtso bo de bzhin byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyung shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha la
70b5(rnying rgyud): gdul bya'i don du dpa' bo yab kyi snang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // / yang nyon 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun// ye shes lha yid kyis 'khor du// dpa' mo yum gyi rje ma rol ni// shes rab ye shes tshul bstan pa'i//
70b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag don la yab dang yum// phan tshun rnam ra se byas mod kyang // yul gyi rnam par gyes nas ni// shes rab ye shes dag pa'i sgra// mkha' klong yangs pa'i ngang nying las// sgyu ma'i rtsal snang 'gro zhing 'du// nyid las byung zhing
70b7(rnying rgyud): nyid la thim// nyid las ma g.yos byas byung med// de phyir yum gyi rnam 'phrul las// 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kun// shar lho nub byang phyogs dang ni// de bzhin byang shar la sogs mtshams// steng dang 'og ste phyogs bcu ru/
71a1(rnying rgyud): rtsom pa nga dang ma// 'as ng+ya na mang // rtag sa pa bdams // rlu sa gan na pa rgya// dus pan ya na // rna ba rgyal gas dam
71a2(rnying rgyud): bskang ba ste// bde stong rol ba'i rnam 'gyur las// sbrul dang yang sprul der sprul zhing // phyogs bcur dpag tu med 'gyed pa'i// rgyan gyi rnam rol mang po yang // kun tu snang zhing yang la spro// dga' bzhi ye shes spos dang bral// 'a
71a3(rnying rgyud): chags la sogs dug rnams kyang // nyid kyi klong las rang byung zhing // nyid kyi dbyings las rang sar thim// de ltar yang dag de las gzhan// g.yo ba med las rnam par g.yo// g.yo ba'i rlabs kyis yongs la khyab// yongs la khyab cing lo
71a4(rnying rgyud): la gsal// gsal ba thams cad sa ler snang // de yang bzang mo'i dgongs par ro// de ltar dpang mo yum nyid las// snang ba ma 'gags rtsal ye shes// thab chub chen por 'dus pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis rkang shel
71a5(rnying rgyud): ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i dpa' mo yum gyi snang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// I// / rna ma rol phul ba'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes dkyil 'khor lhan mas kyi// 'khor ci nam grangs yang dag brjod// skra dang gsung dang rmugs
71a6(rnying rgyud): dang yang / yon tan phrin las byung ba yi// 'khor dang de yi yang 'khor dang // de las gzhan yang sprul ba'i 'khor// 'jig rten pa ltar snang ba ste// gcig bcu brgya stong khri 'bum nas// grangs kyis mi rdzogs mthar thug par// 'khor gyi rnam
71a7(rnying rgyud): dusasu su //
71b1(rnying rgyud): bka' nyan sras sdod yin pa ste// nyid kyi cho 'phrul las byung cha// 'khor dang 'das pa gnyis ka'o// gnas skabs yul don 'khor rnams ni// 'bar ba zhabs kyi gdan khri la// nye bar rag pa'i 'khor yin cing // gcapa nyid las sprul pas so// gud nam yin/
71b2(rnying rgyud): slong rdol bas// las kyi gnyer len bran gyi tshul// yang du yang du 'du 'gro ston// byed pa de bzhin las kun byed// che las byu snang gtso bo'i phyed// de khyed phyi rol rnams la ste// de dang rjes mthun las kyang bsrub// rnam par rol la rnam mi gnas// rnam
71b3(rnying rgyud): rol rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor// zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // de bzhin rgyas dang dbang sogs dang // rim nas rim bzhin 'khor lo rnams// khyo dngadra ba med yang yang bskor// bar mtshams med par 'byung ba ste// de dang de la nye bar gnas// chug
71b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'phur dang 'jol ba dang // lag gis 'gro dang lto 'gro'i tshul// skad ceg nyid la srid pa gsum// yongs su khyab pa'i bya ba byed// de bzhin re re la yang 'khor// grangs dang skyed kyi bka' nyan pa// sgo mtshams la sogs re re ni// brda tsam du
71b5(rnying rgyud): ni snang ba dang // de phyir ming dang 'khor gyi grangs// de yi byed pa las dang bcas// de la spros shing de las sdud// de yi rnam grangs shes par bya// mdor na ye shes lha yi 'khor// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// sprul dang yang sprul
71b6(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khyab// rang rang blo ye spyod yul d+ha// gang 'tshams par ni shes par bya'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis rgyud she rtsi bo las/ ye shes lha'i 'khor gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu ba'o// // / rang d+he
71b7(rnying rgyud): la ba'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar lha tshogs 'khor bcas kyi// sprul ba la ni rnam pa lnga// dngos su sprul dang brdus ti t+pa la// phog par sprul dngang gis spru laM// rnam par 'gyur ba'i spel par// dngos su sprul pa dngos 'dra ba'i// gcig
72a1(rnying rgyud): las brgya stong khri bum sogs// mtshan dang bcas pa dpag med pa// rgyad dang rol pa'i rnam 'gyur bcas// rnam pa gcig la kun \u0f7fsnang // gdul bya ranga'i rnarang tshul dra// ma bu tshul du snang // bar+Na sa ta sbru la ni dngos ma
72a2(rnying rgyud): yin// rigs la rig byed mang po dag/ dbus la sogs par snang bzhin du// yod pa ma yin med ma yin// yod med las 'das sgyu ma'i sku// snang la rang bzhin ma grub par// bugs rje'i zhal phyag rnam par gsal// chel rags dang dri zhing nyin// rgyan
72a3(rnying rgyud): lugs rdzogs pa'o// log par sbal ni zhi ba las// khro bo gtum po'i tshul du byung // sku mdog la sogs dkar po dang // nag la rngams par ston pa dang // ma rungs dur khrod chas chen rnams// dar dang rin chen rgyan dang bcas// khro ga dag rdu ma
72a4(rnying rgyud): par gnas pa la// zhi 'dzum lham me lhan ner ston// de ltar zhi las khro bo dang // khro bo las ni zhi ba ste// yang nyid yum du gyur pa dang // de bzhin yum nyid yab tu 'gyur// 'khor rnams gnas 'gyur gtso bo'i tshul// gtso bo gnas 'gyur
72a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du snang // de sogs rim pa bsam mi khyab// thugs rje ngang gis sprul pa ni// gang yin gtso bogayo med kyi// sku gsung thugs las 'od zer gyi// dkar dmar mthi ga'i rnam pa can// dngos dang dngos min 'dra ba yi// sprul pa dpag med
72a6(rnying rgyud): bkyes nas ni// snang srid 'jig rten thams cad gang // so sor phrin las sna tshogs byed// yang ni so so'i gnas su thim// de bzhin gcig las gcig sprul zhing // mar me gcig las gcig 'phel bas// thams cad mar mes gang ba dang // sdod
72a7(rnying rgyud): po gzig las yalag 'bum// mo sor gyes pa lta bur sprul// de yang gdung bya'i snang chu 'di// bla ba sa ni chu snod bzhin// gzig las mang por sprul snying ngo // rnam par 'gyur ba'i sprul pa ni// thugs rje zhal phyag can rtsi lha// sprul nas
72b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rdo rje dang // rin chen 'dra zug ma dang // ral gri kha T+wA~M gri gug dang // phur pa dag tu spru pa dang // sa bon d+hi dang hrIHla sogs// yi ge'i rnam par sprul pa dang // de bzhin phyag mtshan yig 'bru las// thugs rje zha phyag 'dzin pa yi// d+ha rba rang /
72b2(rnying rgyud): par ston pa dang // de bzhin me chu la sogs pa'i// 'byung ba'i rnam par sprub pa dang // rgya sbyin btsun mo'i rnam pa'am// bran la sogs pa srung ba ste// gdul bya gang dang gang 'dul ba// de dang de la der sprul nas// 'gro don spyod pa'i rnam 'phrul can//
72b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// srung ba la yang sprul pa dang // der sprul la sogs brjod mazung yus// rnam par 'gyur ba'i sdu pa rnams// dgongs pa'i rmong nas rang byung ba'i// gcig dang du ma'i grangs mtha' zad// rnam par ma nges nges
72b4(rnying rgyud): med do// za ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku spyad shel gyi ngo bo las// ye shes lha yi gtso'akhor gyi skal pa bstan pa'i la'u hU~M bcu gcig pa'o// s+thi// / zug rdo stsal ba'i 'khor rnams nyon// phul ba de las yang spru la ni// snang
72b5(rnying rgyud): srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi// gang stod skye 'bri mang po las// chags 'jig gnas dang stongs sa yi// srid pa'i rtse nas na dag par// byed pa dum rabacas pa ste// lus dang lus kyi rnam 'gyur dang // ngag dang ngag gi rnam 'gyur dang // sems dang sems
72b6(rnying rgyud): rnam 'gyur dang // de las spros pa'i bde dang sdug/ rang babs btang snyoms parta sa ste// rnam pa du mar snang ba kun// sprul pa de yi yang sprul nyid// bde gshegs snying po'i cho 'phrul te// rang rang so sos byas min par// 'dod 'tshams nyid las rab
72b7(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas// skye dang 'gro 'di lha dang sgra// lha rnams nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul// de bzhin byed dang byed papo// sna tshogs las kyi bye brag kyang // de yi yang sprul byed pa las// byed pa chums chu ngor lam// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin no// sri
73a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'did dgasun byal// kha zla dang log zad ma tha' bang// dbar na bud mod sgrub pa la// bla dang bu med la yang // ram bzhin 'brel ba'i 'khrul 'khor dkar// spang srid 'di dag yang sung // spang ba sprul ba
73a2(rnying rgyud): yin par bya// yang sul de sbrul 'khor lo 'askor// des na snang srid dmyal ba ye// dkyil 'khor nyid du shes par bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rgyud shel gyi ro bo las/ ye shes lha yi yang sprul bstan pa'i badrug nyis
73a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// sprul pa'i 'khor rnams gus pas nyon// ye shes lha yi rtogs brjod ni// spros na brjod kyis mi lang yang // yang dag don rtogs 'di ltar brjod// e mdo mtshar chen po'i dpal// ye shes khro bo bzhad pa las/
73a4(rnying rgyud): gabar snang shing sring pa 'dul// mnyas par gnas dang mi gnas med// dkar la dang sadang po gas la'i// dper las rjong ba'i rang bzhin rdzogs/ 'dzon tshogs 'bar man// mA ya thams dzad kyil// dad smra yin papa can/
73a5(rnying rgyud): pa mi mnga' bral mi mnga'// gsal dang 'grib pa yong mi mnga'// de bzhin skye dang 'bri med pa// ye shes lus can de 'azhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes rdo rje 'chang // gzugs kyi rdo rje sra ma khregs pa// 'joms par byed cing 'jig par byed// srid pa'i
73a6(rnying rgyud): gnas rnams skem byed pa'i// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// bskal pa grangs 'das mun sel ba'i// 'od kyi snying po phyogs kun brdal// bsnyel ba med cing rub pa med// rnam par sra zhing mkhregs pa can// 'jam mnyen 'od kyi gong bur gnas//
73a7(rnying rgyud): dkar ser dmar ldang rab tu ma khregs// rgyang dang drung las khyad par bral// gzi brjid dpag tu med bzhin du// blta bar bzod cing gang gis mthong // bzhin gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bya// nam rol bde ba'i dpal 'i spyod// hata dgyes pa'i gad ma cher rjod/
73b1(rnying rgyud): phan tatshangs pa'i byangs kyis thab// sbalas chos kyi chog gis kyang // smin par byad dang dpral ba'o// sdug pa mad cing tham pa med// 'brulas dan dad rnam par ston// brjod mtha' mas ga don ma spyod// yang ma thang bad pa'is par pa na/
73b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// zos nyid skad las rnam kun 'byung // gdul bya 'drab rab sdang grags// rnam rol 'du ba nges par sa la// 'bras bu 'byin cing rnam rol ba// de dag dbyangs kyi gar mkhan no// hUM hrIH/ mkha' klong yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brje badz+ri
73b3(rnying rgyud): lcags bu rnon po yis// srid pa gsum po gdar sha gcod// mkhyen pa'i ral gri 'bar ba yi// 'od kyis ma rungs drab gcod// srid pa'i gzod snying drung nas 'byin// 'gyur med g.yo 'gul bral ba'o// yongs khyab mkha' gsal bcom ldan ci
73b4(rnying rgyud): mu mthar thugapa stongs byed cing // ri bo thams cad rnam par 'jig/ khod ma nya ma chen po ting 'dzin gsal// sku gsum zhing rnams nges par snang // tsau toH mi bzad rab 'khrugs dpal 'bar ba// ba spu'i mtshon cha rnam par gzengs// ral pa mi bzad
73b5(rnying rgyud): mun ltar 'khrigs// khrag gi rgyun 'dzag gdangs pa'i zhas// nyi ma 'bum gzi'i spyan rnams kyis// bud shing ma lus bsreg par byed// so dang sen mo spu gri yis// gzugs phung thams cad phye mar gtub// sa 'og gnas nas steng gi phyogs/
73b6(rnying rgyud): gzir zhing zil gyis gnon byed pa'i// rab tu 'khrug pa'i ye shes kyi// gnam lcags rdo rje 'bar ba las// sprul pa ma rungs rnam par 'joms// bskrad cing brdeg pa'i rnam pa can// rim pa brtan yang rab tu g.yo// steng gi phyogs rnams 'dar zheng
73b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrigs// bla 'og tsha ba'i dpal gyis bsreg/ rgyun babs rba klong 'khrugs 'dra ba'i// cho 'phrul rab tu bstan nas kyang // ma lus g.yo bar byed pa'o// nam mkha' khengs pa'i rnam 'gyur can// gzi brjid dpal 'bar 'chang bar byed// ha ha drag
74a1(rnying rgyud): margod pa ga rgyangs kyis// g.yo bar byed pa'i dru sprul can// 'byug stong ldi ng+gA'i byung nas// rkyes ka pal dbyangs cad thogs// ngan nam rnam par nyams// sa 'gas sangs sa bya// byad ma dwags mang sad/
74a2(rnying rgyud): byed // ngan song gnas gsum byud nas 'byin// nam rol dpa' thugs cal 'chang ba'i// kha nas 'od 'bar gyi mtsho zhi za// dang srong dmod pa'i rigs sngags kyang // skad cigs gol gtogs pas bzlog/ rim pa bdun yi khro bo pang // bskal bar byed
74a3(rnying rgyud): no can// hUM hUM brna gcing gzir ba'i rnam pa yis// 'phags pa'i tshogs kyang g.yo bar byed// dran pa rab tu 'phro ba yi// cho 'phrul du mas gang khyab pa// nyid kyi dpal be'u'i dbyings su spyad// 'joms par byed cing mos par byed// rnam par rab tu ga'i ra bar
74a4(rnying rgyud): byed// rgol ba log rtog rdung nas 'byin// nyon mongs tra rgod gnas nas bzlog/ skem byed lcags kyu chen po yis// gnas ngan nges par 'dren pa po// hUM mdzad stobs chen a la la// zhi dang khro dang 'dzum pa dang // ye shes lha dang de yi 'khor// sbrul
74a5(rnying rgyud): dang yang sprul mdzad pa yi// rnam mthar mtha' yas brjod las 'das// thugs chen nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gsung 'od 'bar ba tshangs pa'i sgra// lhun po sku chen gzi brjid 'bar// ye shes snang ba lam mer gsal// bkod pa du mar ldan pa
74a6(rnying rgyud): skye// a la la mchog dgyes par mdzod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// A// sems dpa' rang byung 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha yi bslab tshul
74a7(rnying rgyud): ni// rnam pa gcig tu mnges te// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor la brten nas// dmigs 'ches nyid du bsgrub pa dang // g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'dun pa bzung ste bsgru ba dang // snying po srog gi gnad nas bskul// dam tshig dbang gis bsgrub pa dang //
74b1(rnying rgyud): dang cing gdung ba'i dang shugs kyis// rang dbang med par bslab pa dang // g.yel ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// thang lhod med par bsgrub pa dang // mchod dang brtod pa'i las rim gyis// dgyes pa bskangs nas bslab pa ste// de ltar bad+ma 'a tshul nam drug dang // de//
74b2(rnying rgyud): las gzhan pa'i grangs snyed kyis// bsgrub tshul rim pa mang bstan pa'i// ye shes lha dang lhan cig bya// dang pos ma dag 'khrul nor spang // gnyis pas shes pa drung nas 'don// gsum bsagasal dag sgra zur 'byung // bzhi pas log rtog the tshom spang // 3
74b3(rnying rgyud): pas ti na mdzun bsgyur bsgrub// drug pas bdag 'dzin 'khri ba gcung // dang pos mo byad gtso bor ston// gnyis pas bskyed chog gtso bor ston// gsum pas rtags chad gtso bar ston// 'ani pas nyag pas ma gtse bar tan// rdza pas mtshamam
74b4(rnying rgyud): gcod gtso bor ston// drug pas longs spyod gtso bor ston// dang pos dus gnad gtan la dbab// gnyis pas ting 'dzin gtan la dbab// gsum pas grangs tshad gtan la dbab// bzhi pas thag cod gtan la dbab// lnga bas bskyang mtshams
74b5(rnying rgyud): gtan la dbab// drug pas khrid rim gtan la dbab// de lta bu yi tshul gyis bslab// ri ma dang cig char rnam pa yis// ye shes lha yi brlab pa 'bad// thog ma par dang mthar dge ba// rang nyid sgo gsum bag yod dang // ye shes sgra ni srub
74b6(rnying rgyud): gang // ring por mi thogs 'bras bu 'byung // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku chud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha ji ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// I// / rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye
74b7(rnying rgyud): shes lta ba srab dgos pa ni// lus sems dri mar bcas pa rnams// dri med rnam par dag byas nas// sdang srid ro mnyam ngang nyid du// bde chen ye shes dag pa yi// snang zhing srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// tshemabu gcig tu gro ba dang // rang rang
75a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ gnas las skal// su kha rnams la rnam par byad// mchogadon 'bras tha rnas bya nas// gragapa pa nyid du yang dan pa// dran ma dngas byab tshugs la'ang // nam nang drud dang / ra ma
75a2(rnying rgyud): par byed// dbang gi dbang yul dbang nga ste// drag pos dgra 'gegs rnams gsod 'gyur// de las gzhan yang las rnams kun// 'bras bum zad thugs pas 'byung // de las dog rgya rnam par thal// sa khyod de zhinang / 'oganas
75a3(rnying rgyud): par spyod// mkha' spyod gdon mi za bar 'grub// rang la gzhan dang gzhan la rang // gnyis ka lhan cig nyid 'grub byed// rigs dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang // gnas dang gnas bzang la sogs te// skad cig mang grod kun gyis grub// ci 'donas 'chag
75a4(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i gdeng dang bcas pas bgrod// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// nying lag las phran bcas pa yang // bas ma 'phel yang dag don la reg/ pha rol dman par gyur rnams kyang // skad cig tu ni bdag nyid dang // lhan cig 'bras bu brnyes pa yin//
75a5(rnying rgyud): dag bsam don gang yin rnams// 'di yis sbyor ro 'dus pa'i 'khor// rnam rol yin gnyis bral ba yi// nges pa can du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// yanga'i gnas rnams rgyab kyis phyogs// gnas skabs thun mong la brten nas// mthar thug mchog la yang dag
75a6(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis yang dag gang yin yang // thogs pa med par zang thal lo// sgo dang skur pa dang bral zhing // ngo mtshar bstod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba yi// sru yi yon tan thams cad kyang // g.yel ba med par myur du phyo/
75a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gsung dang thugs mchog gi// yon tan ma lus 'dir rtsol byed// e ma 'di ni bsam mtha' yas// legs baspel nas nyes par sgrub// bla med la sogs don 'bras rnams// rang babs spun gyis grub pa'o// bla ma yo dam mkha'
75b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyarnan gag kyi 'o nga/ yun tu par bslab pa 'dags pa bstan pa na rlungs// rang 'jas mas pa bananasan// zhab zu po na bya zun// gangan na rgyam na/
75b2(rnying rgyud): byed namathar nas pa'o// tham pa la thams ngan napa'o// gzugs mag sa pa'i// gzha nam brtson sbyin ces byab// sang yang dgatus/ 'azla pa tam byas 'dun par//
75b3(rnying rgyud): slad du 'dings nas// chos kyis rnam par grol byed pa// 'di nyid 'dzin yang dag 'byung // gnas skabs mazer zug don 'bras brnyes// yid kyi de bzhid 'khrul sangs nas// mkhyen dang brtse ba'i rang bzhin gyis// g.yo ba da pa'i 'gro do ra/
75b4(rnying rgyud): gcig la nges gtad mi mnga' zhing // mkhara' ltar yongs 'khyab pa yis// gang dang gang 'de 'a // dgongs pas yongs bya ba smin pa dang // grol ba nyid du yang dag ces// bla ma lha dang mkha' 'gro ma// nus pa'i stobs gang 'dir 'dum
75b5(rnying rgyud): byed// mdon na lhas ngan med gsum po// gsum dkyil khor nyid gyur pas// skra gsum zhing du sbyor bar byed// sngags ma ye shes lnga ldan pa'o// bkod pa gcig pa'i lam na lpags// phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes banyis// gis
75b6(rnying rgyud): yan tan bras bu rigs// rab 'bring ba ma tshul du ste// yang datha' nyid las gzhan pa 'o// rtsil chen 'drub par mi 'gyur ro// bram mi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rlung shes gyur po las/ ye shes ci lta bslab pas grub pa'i yon tan
76a1(rnying rgyud): dang 'as / sa/ / rnaman tu /
76a2(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid bral bar 'grub 'i srid// byabs dang bral ba'i 'dre doman-i// 'dab gshog chag pa'i mkha' lding bzhin/ migs pa'i ga'o// byed dza brgya pa da// 'a ga
76a3(rnying rgyud): byung// dbul zhing la po su 'khod par 'khod// 'brang ba la// da pa rnyid pa the/ rje nas yin// dge slob 'thas pa'i mdzag
76a4(rnying rgyud): drag tu g.yo gang 'khor bar 'khor// las kyi khung nas 'i thod// lhag sngags kyis mazin pa'i// rjes du ya nags pa yang ma bcings nas// las kyi ba brgyad pa dang yang // 'phru pa'i lu
76a5(rnying rgyud): nam par gro bldan cad // gdanalas 'jugs par mi 'gyur // khyi me nyes pa brjod mtha' yas// tham ya kha' da na pa'i bo las/ yegs kyi l+h+wa ma'i sa pa'i nyas cing dud pa //
76a6(rnying rgyud): dbang smo/ 'a 'a/ sa da/ ngas #/ dag na pas/
76a7(rnying rgyud): ga sa sa napa gyu na/ sa zung chung mas
76b1(rnying rgyud): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi su rgyud zhal gying po las/ ye shes kyi b+ha b+hi wAr bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i 'adz+ra ste bco brgyad pa'o// // / yongs 'dzin sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// nang ltar ye shes lta bgrub na/
76b2(rnying rgyud): kyis lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// skye med thub bu'i bzlas pa 'bad// rang snang rtogs pa'i gtor mchod 'bul// gsal snang dag pas gtan pa dab pa// snang srid sgyu mar shes pa na// ye she
76b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa ste// ting 'dzin 'phro 'dra'i las sbyor brtsam// gang la dmigs pa gnas su skor// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi mu rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha nang ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
76b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus shing tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang ba ltar bu lha bskyab pa// thabs kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// ye gdangs chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rang gsal 'od kyi lha bkram zhing // skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya// chu bo rgyan gyen la
76b5(rnying rgyud): la// g.yo ba med par bsgrub pa yis// bdag gis bdag nyid gtan la phapa// 'pho 'gyur med na grub pa ste// gang shar rol pa'i las sbyor bya// snang srid gzhir bzhengs chen por 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi swA hA
76b6(rnying rgyud): shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha gsang ba lhur bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ma yengs nyon// de bzhin nyid ltar lha bsgrub pa'i// man ngag thabs kyi rgyal
76b7(rnying rgyud): bstan// rang snang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rtsol bral chen po'i lha bkod de// 'byung 'dug rlung gi bzlas pa 'bad// shugs 'byung rang babs bslab pa brtson// 'khrul pa dag nas lha 'grung pas// blang dor bral ba'i las sbyor za//
77a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das gnyis mang ngagacig 'gyur// rnam lo sal kha' 'ag thams cad kyis chud gel byung po las/ ye shes pa nyi byon ltung bsgrul pa'i thul bstan pa'i le te dgacig pa'o/ !// dang
77a2(rnying rgyud): po sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha mchod thugs dam bskang ba ni// gyi lhar thun mong rdzas kyis mchod// nang ltar dbang po rnam lngas mchod// gsang ba rtog tshogs rig pos mchod// de nyid spos bral dgongs pas mchod// bude stong pos
77a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bskad// snang spri dag zhing bzheng sa rten pa'i grod// rlung dong bral ga sa dam ba skang // byung sto byed pa skang ba'i sbrul// mAnya ma nyid rol pa chen pas nga // de sna thugs da du m+b+ha yis// 'bras bramache ga dang ldan//
77a4(rnying rgyud): ma sa/ phyogs ni kyis tshul bar 'gyur// bram yi dbug kha' 'grothams da byen kyad sa ma ci thugs ma thong ba'i rim pa ldan pa'i 'i snyen gnyis pa'o//
77a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnams can// bdag nyid lnga bsgom 'di lta ste// gzhi gnas ye shes dbang po phreM/ steng 'og phyogs bcur mi blta zhing // nang du bkrig pas ar la gtad// phung po khams dang phyi mched du ni// ye shes lha yi rol pa ste/
77a6(rnying rgyud): sa rang gsal lam+b+ha m+me ba// thugs mizha la phrag rkyen dang bcas// dang babs lhag par bzhug pa laM// dad pa'i dbang po gas la ga dbapas// snang ba yab la stong pa sum// gnyis med chung 'dug chen po'i dbyings// g-is la 'gre 'bor gyur
77a7(rnying rgyud): 'a bste// ma ga sapal/ na 'i das nas// pa na med pa 'i 'di 'a skye tshu sa rgya sa rjid// khyim 'das sa thamams
77b1(rnying rgyud): gal byer pa las/ bdag tu lags kyi thur gas ladu la rtul bstan du ma gsum sa / das pa'i la ba cagasum yangs na// ya du la gas ba // ba na ci gzhal las khang /
77b2(rnying rgyud): rta babs bcas// tshangs khang 'od kyi dra bas sbrel// sgrib g.yogs med par spyi nang gsal// rang bzhin 'od lnga 'khrigs pa'i dbus// ma bon yig 'bru phyag mtshan la// mngon par lhag pa'i su bsgom zhing // gtso bo 'phor ni sum 'am
77b3(rnying rgyud): yang 'khor de yi byed byed gsal// rgyan dang cha lugs rnam par bkra// ngo bo bla ma chos su las// rang bzhin yi dam longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje su la sgra mkha' 'gro ma// rnam grangs dam tshig rdzogs par gsal// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pa'i//
77b4(rnying rgyud): 'od dang 'od zer 'gro 'dur bcas// rang sdang dag pas gsal bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rlud shol gyi ri bo las/ mdun bskyed ye shes kyi lha bsgom pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// ni// / da
77b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo ni// mos bsgyur blo yis bskyed pa ste// rkang grangs mtshan dang bcas pa rtse// gtso bo nyid dang de yi yum// 'khor dang de yi yang 'khor dang // so sor tshom bur bcas napani// kyi
77b6(rnying rgyud): dgra rna rnam par nges// spyi bo la sogs gnas rnams su// I sogs yi ge'i 'bru rnams bkram// sngon gyi rjes bzung ba tshig ltar// dam tshig dbang gis bskyed rnams so// rang las byung zhing dang nyid dang // dmachog gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir// dpe
77b7(rnying rgyud): rnams dang nas kya// rnal pa dmam kha' 'khrimams cad kyi sa rgyang shes kyi'i b.las/ spyad 'i tshig pa babyed par badzin pa'i me nang rdzab sa// / da gang rtsul pa'i 'as rnamasan// lagasasasas dpa ga/
78a1(rnying rgyud): // gdod nas dgra pa chos kyi sgra// rang byung rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// shad grol sbrul klu 'gro ba 'dul// rang babs byin rlabs zlu ma mchog/ dngos grub gnyis steng yi dam lha// phrin las rmad byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/
78a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i rang bzhin yab kyi cha// stong pa'i bdag nyid yum mchog ste// mnyam par gnas bzhi pa'i sgra// tur ltung thol skyes khro myur bzhengs// rol pa'i ye shes zhim khro// de dag gdod nas sman gyis chub// byas bcos byung bde ma yin//
78a3(rnying rgyud): shes rig rgyal por snang // de phyir ye shes sems dpa'o// bla mra yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra chung shel gyi ri bo las// b+ha ye shes sems dpa'i bzhugs tshul bstan pa'i le'u skye nyer drug pa'o// // / rang krol 'dus pa'i 'khor
78a4(rnying rgyud): rnams nyon// dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa// lha gnyis dbyer med bsre ba'i tshul// chu la chu bzhag ci bzhin du// de bzhin nyid la 'od kyi tshul// phan tshun tha dad ma yin par// dbyer med du mdo gcig nyid// yin par shes shing yin tshul du// rnal
78a5(rnying rgyud): byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta// bapreD+ha/ me byed med pa dang // gzhag zu 'jog byed 'ad / don kyang gnas skabs su ladzin na// skyed pa'i dam myig sems dpa' la// dbyings na ni le shes sems dpa' bcug/ rbal ma blang bzla/
78a6(rnying rgyud): de bsres dang bsgom lhug par bzhag/ 'di kun thabs kyi yan lag ste// gdul bya 'gro ba 'dren phyir spro// kun kyang yang dag dgongs don spyod// cho ga'i yan lag ji bzhin pa// sprul pa rnams kyis spro bar gyis// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro
78a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lhad ma tshig pa dang ye shes pa bsre ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// / gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs nyon// dam tshig ye shes sems dpa' gnyis// dbang srur rgya yis 'di ltar
78b1(rnying rgyud): gdab// rnam snang mi bskyod 'od dpag med// rin 'byung don yod grub pa ste// rigs rnams kun gyi gtso bo mchog/ sangs rgyas mda' bdag rigs kyi lha// ji ltar snang ba'i rigs rnams la// rgyal thabs spyi drug rang dbang bsrung // dag pa gsum gyi
78b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab pas// 'bras bu mu lnga ye shes lnga// phung khams skye mched gnas dag nas// rang rang rigs kyis dbu brgyan nas// rigs bdag bdag po nyid kyis mtshan// 'od dpag med sogs de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur byas gdab mtshon pa'o//
78b3(rnying rgyud): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku chud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha dang ngol pa gcig pa'i dbyings su dbang bskur rgyas gda' tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // rang byung khrul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar 'an
78b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha rnams kyi// rgyu mtshan rnam grangs dpag med kyang // gcig tu dril nas don ston pa// snod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa// sgyu ma'i lus nyid gnas dag phyir// bzhugs gnas pho brang gzhal yas bstan// bcud kyi sems can gnas dag cing //
78b5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid lha ru gnas gyur pas// ye shes lha yi rnam thar bstan// gdul bya sprin grol lam bgrod phyir// ye shes bla ma'i ngo bor bstan// dgos 'dod de ba bskang ba'i phyir// yi dam zhi dang khro bor bstan// phrin las dmigs su bsgyud pa'i phyir//
78b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro rol pa chen por bstan// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel phun tshogs phyir// de ltar 'phro 'dra na tshogs bstan// rtsa rlung thig le'i ngo bo yang // gzhal yas lha dang bcas pa bstan// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// rang byung ye shes lha yi dang // ye
78b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab rdzogs sku lnga'i zhing // spos bral lhun grub phyag kya'i zhing // gzhi sdang dag pa chos kyi dbyings// lhag med nyid du mya ngan 'das// sma dang 'od du bcas nas kyang // sku gsum zhing du mngon du 'byung // gdul bya rnams la
79a1(rnying rgyud): lhag mar bcas// sku gdung ring bsrel bzhag nas kyang // gzhan phan thabs kyis 'gro ba rnams// rim gyis 'dren par des byed do// yang mtha' bar de nyid du yang // rang snang ye shes lha dang phrad// dang ngo sheman rnam
79a2(rnying rgyud): par grol// de yang rgyu 'bras de yis yin// sprul pa las kyi sprul pa'i sgra// s+ya dang mtshan dpes ba sbas shing // las dag zhing la rab snang bas// byang chub mngon du de 'gyur zhing // ngo sogs dpal dang yang dag rngan// b+hi ru nyid du snang bar byed//
79a3(rnying rgyud): tham mi dmamapa' 'gro rnams cad kyi spyan she kyi ba sa/ yu~M shes kyiska bsgrub pa'i rnam med byi sa pa bstan pa'i 'a' sa nyed dag pa'o// // / de nyid pa skyes thus pa'i dge// dpag med kyil dus rang gzungs //
79a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sme yi rdo rje rje rdo rje// ro dang reg bya'i rdo rje dang // sems dpa' chos kyi rdong sogs// gdul byar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshims par gyur pa'i don gsungs pas// dga' zhing mgu nas dz+wal ra// rangs pa'i sems
79a5(rnying rgyud): gis spyi bos 'dud// lha dang mi dang lha yin dang // klu dang rig sngags 'chang la sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams yi rangs shing // bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sgra rgyud shel gyi ngo bo las/ rjes su yi
79a6(rnying rgyud): rangs shing mngon par bstod pa'i les ste sum cu pa'o// // / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sprul pa/ rang byung du babs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shim gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs
79a7(rnying rgyud): so// / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya n+ya/ bdag 'dra bad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ spa rang 'gyur du bkod pa'o// rta the ma/ phrul bu sangs rgyas gling bas bla dkar rung gi sgo mo nas gdan drangs pa'i thab chos phyogs dus kun tu dang zhing rgyas la sun ring du gnas par gyur cig/
79b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ NaH sa gas/ uHna gsang ba brda' gang du bstan pa/ rgya gar skad du/ b+hurba d+ha dzaHkan sarba wA ga tAnA ra dzA gaN+DI ta dpa/ pad ska da du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung ltad rin chen 'jugs nas zla ba/ bcom ldan 'ad chos
79b2(rnying rgyud): gsung smra ba'i dbang po gzi brjid rgyal po mtha' yas pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rkyen bkod mdzes pa yi// pho b+h+ring gzhal las bsngags pa na// mdos byed ma bya'i khri steng du// ston pa dpag yod rgyal po dang // dpa' mo bdi stong mnyam
79b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas// dgongs pa chen po bzhugs pa'i tshe// nyid kyi sprul pa las byung ba'i// bde bar rol pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad zhus// e ma ston pa bcom ldan 'das// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang // yang dag
79b4(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi pad+ma las// mnyam dbyangs chen po'i dpal mnga' ba'o// g.yangs chen po gcod mdzad cing // sngags kyi sprin char 'bebs papo// brtse ba'i thugs kyis 'dir dgongs shig/ ye shes dbyings kyi lha rnams kun// nye bar bsgrub par byed
79b5(rnying rgyud): ba la// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod rnams// nges pa'i don du sbru du gsol// de yang sngags kyi ngo bo dang // nges tshig dbye ba rnam grangs dang // sngags dngos bgrang tshul bsnyen pa'i tshad// drod rtags dang ni bzlas pa'i tshe// dag dang ma dag /
79b6(rnying rgyud): skyon yon dang // sngags kyi bsgrub tshul rim pa rnams// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas kyang // bdag cag yid kyi 'dod pa rnams// dus 'dir skong bar mdzad du gsol// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yi//
79b7(rnying rgyud): mchog don bsgrub 'dod rnal 'byor pas// ye shes lha dang dbyer med du// bsre bar 'dod na sngags la brtson// sngags pas sngags la mi brtson pa// sems kyi reb skong mi 'gyur// gang gis sngags la brtson byed na// sngags kyi ngo bo ngos
80a1(rnying rgyud): zin gces// de bzhin sngags kyi nges rdog kyang // gan du rmobs shes pa garjes// sngags kyi dbyeng ma shes na// rang gis dang nyid 'ching bar 'gyur// rnam grangs pa shes ljags rdzob// bar+tha da
80a2(rnying rgyud): 'gros byed dang mtshungs// sngags dngos ngo yis ma zin na// sol ba gser du bsrub dang mtshungs// sngags kyi 'grub tshul ma shes na// mtshan med g.yul du zhugs dang mtshungs// bsnyen tshad gtan la ma phebs na// nad pos mgrin
80a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'dra// sngags blos drod rtags ma shes na// tshod med mda' rgyang 'phen pa 'dra// sngags kyi skyon yon ma shes na// dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas 'dra// sngags kyi bsgrub tshul ma shes na// long bas long ba khrid byed 'dra// des na de dang / rim pa
80a4(rnying rgyud): rnams// shes par gyur pa'i sngags pa yis// lha bsgrub sngags la 'bad pa na// stobs dang nus pa bsam mi khyab// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa'i// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'jig rten
80a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i longs spyod kun// sngags la brtson pas 'grub gyur na// 'jig rten longs spyod spos ci dgos// des na snang srid 'khor 'das kyi// cho 'phrul nus stobs sngags kyis byed// sngags kyi nus stobs bsam mtha' yas// de phyir
80a6(rnying rgyud): sngags pas sngags la brjon// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung spyad rin chen 'brug sgra las/ gle ga zhi'i le'u skye dang po'o// I// / rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha rnams bsgrub pa la// snying po rnam
80a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ngo bo bstan// yengs 'khrul med par yid kyis zung // ye shes lha sngags ngo bo dang // 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo ste// ye shes lha sngags la yang gsum// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro ste// bla ma bla na gnyan po'i gtso// spyi phud dkon mchog
80b1(rnying rgyud): rin chen pas// yongs kyi thog mar byung bas gces// de dag sngags kyang dponi// gdung bas gso ba btab pa'i don// brjod pa sngags su byung ba ste// ngo bo g.yel ba mi mnga' bar// rjem su 'dzin pa byud pa'o// yi dam ni ba khro ba dang // @
80b2(rnying rgyud): dang rnam pa gsum// zhib g.yo med ting 'dzin ni// khyab gdal chen po kun la spro// 'di bsgrub tshangs pa'i gnas gzhir 'gyur// ngo bo 'gyur med dgongs pa'i klong // yengs 'khrul thal bar bsngags pa'o// khro bo rngam byed rab gtum pa//
80b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba madrangs 'doms// 'di bsgrub 'byung po la sogs pa// madrangs pa rnams sreg cing byed// ra brgyab khrig tum pa ste// gnod byed dgra 'gegs gnyen por bsngags// ni gro las rnams yongs kyo bdag// zhi bar 'dod bzhi ba dang /
80b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin khro bar 'dod la khro// gang yang rgyas par byed pa dang // dbang mdzad dbang gi rgyal po ste// drag po rab tu drug par byed// ngo bo gang la'ang 'jug pa ste// sna tshogs las pa bsngags pa'o// de ltar zhi dang khrol sogs// yi dam
80b5(rnying rgyud): bon dang // snying po sngags su 'byung ba'i phyir// sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brjod// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi ngo bo ni// srog gnad gnad nas bskul nas kyang // phrin las dmigs bu bstsal byas te// bka' nyan gus phyir bsngags pa'o//
80b6(rnying rgyud): las byed pho nya bran gyi tshul// gang dang gang la 'jug byed pa// de dang de yi las la bsngags// dregs pa gtum dang dregs byed dam// gang yang mkha' 'gro shugs kyis 'gro// srog yig gnang nas bos pa'i tshe// dbang tshig dbang gis dbang
80b7(rnying rgyud): med du// de phyir dgug dang 'khril ba dang // 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa dang // bka' nyan las la bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo la// phyi dang nang dang gas rab gsum// phye ltar snang sred lha 'dren mas// gnad nas
81a1(rnying rgyud): bcul zhing las la rbad// dbang med bran du bkol ba'i phyir// gnad 'ab byas dag tu bsngags pa'o// nang ltar dregs pa sde brgyad rnams// dpal gyi ho ta las mkhan du// gta ra ga dag
81a2(rnying rgyud): bya// dam la gnas phyir srog nas 'dzin// dum la gnas phyir ba rdzogs pa'o// gsang brda 'thor dang nyid dang // kun cig dag tu skyes nas kyang // rtag tu 'bral med 'grogs byed cing // sa
81a3(rnying rgyud): gnod rtser 'tsho bar byed pa rnams// bskal zhing bzlog pa'i mthu dpung rgyan// de dag g.yel bar mi byed cing // dam la gnas nas bka' bzhin bsgrub// gter gtad pas byed zan du 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i phyog byor// me
81a4(rnying rgyud): nas 'god cing ba spyang // gzer du gdab phyir bsngags pa'o// mdor na sngags kyi ngo bo shes// ming dang srog nas drangs byas te// dam la gnas par byed pa dang // rang rang gnyen por rab bsngags pa'o// tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams ma
81a5(rnying rgyud): gsung byung rin zin 'brug su las/ sngags kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gzugs sbal sogs 'dus pa'i 'khor// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi ga bstan gyimanyon// rA ma'i
81a6(rnying rgyud): ga ni// thugs rje stsal bar byed pa'o// yid ma sngags kyi nges tshig ni// dngos grubaskul bar byed pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi nges tshig ni// las la bsngags pabyed pa'o// gang dang gang gi srog rdzogs rnams// brtson cing
81a7(rnying rgyud): btsam gyin na// dngos su mthong dang chom du // rtags dang mtshan mangs brgyad nas// 'dod pa'i don gang 'grub pas na// bzlas pa sngags kyings chog yin// ming dang srog gi yig dang // mthara' bsgrer las kye yig dang // na
81b1(rnying rgyud): gnan gnad yog rnams// bzlas dang thos dang bcangs la sogs// gang dang gang byas dang dang // las bgrub sngags kyi ngas pa'i tshig/ don rab dbya bas shes par bya// bla ma yod pa mkha' 'gro thams cad byagasung chud ngas pa
81b2(rnying rgyud): mig bzhin pa 'aM ma bsus pa'i/ mas 'dam pa'i la'o pa ston// shAr yi das kha' byabral// rdzogs ci rgyab btu pa// tham sa sa nas ba ro// drug
81b3(rnying rgyud): bdang/ de ga na rgyu nga/ dkyis pa ngas ma lags// tham byu pa sdugs// mad nga zugs gyung sa sa/ bad pas ngas// gang sogs/
81b4(rnying rgyud): smra na da/
81b5(rnying rgyud): bsgral rmugs ni// gru gsung thugs kyi srog yin te// oM AHhUM gi swa las drangs// yid kyi gsung ba bskyed bya zhing // ngag nas thugs dam bskul bar bya// ma yengs chu kun lta bu yis// gnad nas bskul bas rjes 'din 'gyur// dam
81b6(rnying rgyud): gaunin po bstan pa'i sngags// sA la la las drangs nas kyang // sgyu chu'i skad kyis mtshams sbyar ti// I dang rtswa hA'i thams su gzhug/ dam tshig gnyen po dkyis dgongs shing // don 'bras myung du stsol bar 'gyur// dgyes pa rmongs par
81b7(rnying rgyud): sa #
82a1(rnying rgyud): 'bras 'grub// de yang hUMSh+T+rIH'i gdangs dang ni// e ma hoHla sogs pa yi// 'dren dang bcas pa shes pa yin// mdor na bla ma'i mtshan smos pa// bod kyi skad dang phyag bsrang // gan tsu ga yi go 'dugasu
82a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rgyas gdab 'dren dang bcas par brjod// dad dang ldan pa sus brtson pas// bla ma'i sku gsung thugs dang ni// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po// dbyer med gur nas chus stobs mnyam// rang gzhan don 'bras ci 'dod pa// khyer du
82a3(rnying rgyud): phyir zhes pa gnad// ye dam sngags kyi dbye ba yang // spyi dang bye brag rnam mang zhing // spyir ni srog sngags mtshan sngags dang // dA mchin sngags dang las kyi sngags// las la 'jug pa'i sngags dang ni// nges med dmod spel sngon la mu swA
82a4(rnying rgyud): srog sngags rang rang sa bon las// sbyar byed yi ge dbyangs gas pa can// gnad la dbab par byed rnams yin// de yang AM dang hUM phaT kyis// thems la bcug nas bgrang ba'o// mtshan sngags d+he wa zhes pa'am// lha ye mtshon
82a5(rnying rgyud): tshon gyi grangs// saM skr-i ta yi skad las drangs// thog mtha' can gyi thems la gzhug/ dam tshig sngags ni mtshan sngags mthar// sa ma ya yi sgra las drangs// las sngags de dag rnams kyi gsham// shIn+tiM puSh+Ti la sogs pa'i//
82a6(rnying rgyud): so so re gang 'dod las sngags gdags// yang yang ang la gtad pa gnad// las la 'jug par byed pa la// sngags mthar b+h+yo dang rbad sogs btags// hri nga hring dung dung gnad nas bsgyel// chug rgyug bred breng bcas pa ste// mtha' can
82a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa las 'jug sngags// myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// nges med dmod mo spel tshig dang // smon lam mtha' bsgyur bcas pa'i sngags// 'di dag dam tshig cha la gtogs// las myu brda yi sngags yin pas// gang 'a
82b1(rnying rgyud): gdags pa gnad yin cing // go rim ma log gces pa yin// mdor na yid la dam byed pa// spang blang med pa gnang dang kyi// dam tshig dag las ma g.yos na// yi dam myur 'grub bsam gtan 'phel// bye brag yi na ma lha ge sngags// gang
82b2(rnying rgyud): la dmigs pa'i sgra rnams kyi// rtswa sngags so sor nor 'khrul med// srog 'dren dang ni mtshan sngags te// skyes pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'i// gang yin sor gzhag dam du bcing // mdor nu spyi dril rtsa ba dang // yan lag bcas pa 'di ltar
82b3(rnying rgyud): te// oM AHhUM hrIHbadz+ra g+hu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi d+hi wa D+ha k+ki ni/ bo d+ha tsat+ta/ ma hA pu khA/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ shIn+tiM ka/ d+hIHma hA ri ni sa/ ra tsa hrIHya/ sarba sit+ti/ kA ya wA ka tsiH/ g+hA na sa tA/ a mi de wa/ ma ma tsit+ta saM b+ha la? a d+hiSh+ThA naM/ ma ma A
82b4(rnying rgyud): na/ sid+d+he pha la h+ye s+t+waM hUM/ dper na de 'dra'i tshul gyis ni// las grub spyi dril yin pa'i phyir// chu chun lta bur 'bad pa'i don// yang sras sems kyi gder 'cha' ba// bde legs yon tan spel bar byed// rang rang snying po'i mtshan don bcas/
82b5(rnying rgyud): thog mtha' dbu zhabs thems la gzhug/ de ni yang dag gdams pa'o// de sogs bye brag gang yin pa// mkhas pas shes par byed pa gnad// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi sngags la ni// srog yig ha ngi ni sa la// las sngags mA ra ya sogs/
82b6(rnying rgyud): gyi// sham bung bcas pa las kyi sngags/ DAk+ki ni yi sgra bzhin du// ming don gnang nas srul byed pa// thams dang bcas pas brtson pa ni// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par byed// dmod mor bcas pa'i sngags 'byung bas// dam tshig 'brel
82b7(rnying rgyud): par las la sbyar// phyi rol pa dang nang pa yi// khyad par mgo mjug gnyis las byung // nga ro dang ni tshig drag can// na maHtad+ya thA las drangs// sa bon srog nas 'dren pa yang // rgyan dang bcas pa'i yi ger 'byung // de sogs nang
83a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags la te// bram za dang ni drang srong gi// dmod sngags las yin thun mong ba// thun mong la 'jug gzhan las min// ngar bral ba'i rgyan yig dang // bsdus pa'i yi ge mdag rnams// sto da /
83a2(rnying rgyud): kyi lpags pa min// las byed gnang la dbab pa yi// sngags dkrug bzlog pa la sogs rnams// bye brag phra mo'i sbyor ba bstan// lugs 'byung nang nas lugs bzlog bstan// de dag rnams kyi bye brag kyang // sgra dang dbyang sa gas 'drod la
83a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // mkhas pas 'byin 'jug shes par bya// mdor na spyi dang bye brag gi// sngags kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab// phal cher las kyi byed pa gtso// las grub 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir// sngags rnams klong kyang yang dag ste// 'bras bu mi 'byin
83a4(rnying rgyud): sngags nor pa'i// zab zab 'dra yang mi brjod sbyang // gnod kyis zin pa'i ting 'dzin dang // nor 'khrul med cing sel ma zhugs// sngags dang bcas nas lha bsgrub pas// don 'bras bla med mchog la reg/ brjod pa rlung gi 'drung 'jug can
83a5(rnying rgyud): s+ye li kA li'i sngags kyi sgra// tha ma la dag gi sgra don dag/ de 'i 'dris par sus byas pas// longs spyod su chu rnam par grol// rlung gi gnad dang mi ldan zhing // sngags nor sgra tshig ma dag pa// lhag chad mel zhugs log par lhung // 'bras bu
83a6(rnying rgyud): kri du 'gyur// de phy-ir las dbu las kyi rigs// rmang thung lpag pa med pa'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// las rnams sngags kyis 'grub pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung chud rin chen 'jug sgra las/ sngags
83a7(rnying rgyud): byab ba rten pa'i 'a bzhi pa'o// // rang spu la rig pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sngags kyi rnam grangs mtha' ya kyang // tha sa dang ni yid ma skye// mkhang 'dzin papa kyi chags pa dus/ de don rdzogs kyi rnam grangs brjon
83b1(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i sngags kyi rnam grangs la// nges pa can dang nges pa med// grangs dang yang dag de bzhin te// des can rang rang gzhung las drangs// rgyud don gnad dang bcas pa'o// des med rang rang thabs kyi blos// mtshan nas gzhi blangs bsgrub nas kyang // oM
83b2(rnying rgyud): dang hUM sogs the mra bcug pas// rigs 'dra dbyangs gsal las bsgyur zhing // dag par bya ba'i sngags byung ba'o// drang don sngags kyi rnam pa ni// gang zag 'dod can don slad du// 'gyur can smon lam dag pas bya// dad pas kun nas pa spang rnams
83b3(rnying rgyud): yang dag de bzhin nyid kyi sngags// spos dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid sngags kyi gnad ldan zhing // rlung gi yon tan mthar phyin te// rol pa sngags la mkhas pa'o// swA hA au sogs sgra med kyang // sngags kyi nus pa don 'bras gang // rtso med/
83b4(rnying rgyud): shugs las 'byung ba'o// yi dam lha sngags rnam grangs las// spyi dri la dang ni so so ba// s+thi dril d+he wa la sogs dang // sa ma ti yi sgra yis bsgyur// gcig 'grub rgyal ba yongs 'grub pa'i// rnam grangs gcig la 'bus pa yin// so sor byung ba'i lha
83b5(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi// nam grangs dpag tu med 'byung ba'i// rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams dang // sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rmad po che yi rigs// rdo rje can gyi
83b6(rnying rgyud): byung ba// rang gnad srog yig bcas pa'o// gang yang dngos grub 'byin sogs kyi// sngags thems mtha' bsgyur mang po 'byung // grangs snyed ye shes klong 'byung zhing // gzhi 'bras lam srod du ma'o// mkha' 'gro'i ljags kyi rnam grangs la// 'byung ba
83b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sgra las kyang // DAk+ki rang ga nang srog sngags 'gyur // dus kyi sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i shugs// thams cad TA k+ki'i sngags kyi grangs// gnad kyi zin pa'i sngags pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i srog gnad dang sngags

84b2(rnying rgyud): dIde ge gang byung myed drug pa// rang gan thog gi rdzogs su bags// srogag yi ge bsreg rnams// sa pan la la 'drag pa'i thugs// rjeg las thog nid lag zir// nga zlog tu dpyong bzang ba'i chags// dmi tshig mi ge thag pa yin cid/
84b3(rnying rgyud): mdzungal sogs so gcig pas// drag bstan gang yin rnam par nyams// rdo gcig gis ni bya tshogs sdod// de bzhin srog gnad 'bru sngags kyis// rgyal po las byed gcig zu ba yin// don med sngags 'bru grangs mang yang // sngags min sngags kyi don lagos
84b4(rnying rgyud): gsadA sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags sogs// sngags rnams gang la'ang gtogs min pa'i// sngags kyi gas pa nas dbyung bar // 'khrul med mtshan nas grangs pa yi// sngags rnams mnor gnad la gzir// don 'grus 'grub 'gyur yid gnyis med/
84b5(rnying rgyud): bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyig spyang chud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags dngos bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// I// / yid kyi sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// rang byung 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// bzlas pa sngags kyi bgrang tshul la// byi dang nang du
84b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dang // de nyid du ni bgrang tshul to// de la sI dang bye brag gnyis// spyir ni phyi ltar bgrang ba'i tshul// gsal la dag cing stan pa yis// mar+g+ha sbyor sdebs dang bcas nas ni// phreng bas grangs tshad gtan la dbab// nang ltar sngags kyi bgrang tshul ni// rdo rje
84b7(rnying rgyud): grub bur dazlas nas kyang // don mnor bar gyi steng bsrel// drod dang mtshan mas gtan la dbab// gsang ba ltar du bgrang tshul ni// rang thung rlung gi 'gro 'ong dang // smad pa'i bzlas pa nyer btson te// phyi dra thung dang nang du 'dug/ khong du gnas pa rnam gsum gyi// khyed
85a1(rnying rgyud): ma / da sa/ ga / na ga // sa/ chu na rna
85a2(rnying rgyud): dbang // thugs sngags kyi sa pa las// zhwad grub dang rtsal 'bras pa sbyin// co la dang bral ba'i bzlas pa yis// rdol thal ring byung la shes brtas// brag sngags kyi bgra rgyu \u0f7f// zla cwo sa gus te// gdung badrug bamed papas/ gas
85a3(rnying rgyud): 'de byung 'a da 'bod// yid ma lha yi ting 'dzin dang // gsal dag snying po sngags 'dzab thogs// mkha' 'gro dang babyed brtul lugs dbyung // 'brug stong ldir 'dre drag sngags sgrogs// de ni gyi yi babyadang rgyal te// byin song las rnam slar 'a
85a4(rnying rgyud): rang dang bral de ldeng med bsre// brjod tshig gal ma gyis su bsgyur// gsol 'dra byas gdung thugs mchi 'aklag/ smeH bsdams shing brjod pa sbyang // yi dram dang gis le lus la ba'o// 'gro 'ong ga 'gros dang btsun// srog sngags
85a5(rnying rgyud): shu ba zung ba zlas// lus gan dag yo med gtan la dbab// mkha' 'gro sdang phreng rol pur blta// swa brjod thams cad sngags sde shes// phrin la pa 'gro 'a dmigs pa bsgyur// gang shar rang lugs gshis la dbab// de na nang gi bzang chu
85a6(rnying rgyud): mchog dang rngu zung las mi 'gying // 'phrul phyir yul gyi spyom pa bcad// rang sems chos su bra mar ba rtsa// dbyung 'jug gnas gsum chung la bskyab// blam li dag gi sgra brjod srong // phung khams ga zed ltar shes pas// brjod bsngags
85a7(rnying rgyud): blang gro'o// thogs yig 'bru yid la bcas// dus thom mthams pacad du zad// bdag sus 'byung ba'i grong byed// babyung mkhor 'dul nyid// kun 'thung rjod das dang spalags// ngag yid 'bre la ba gtananas zad// de dgas pa
85b1(rnying rgyud): tshul te// de dag gang gi brtson pa yi// skyes bu tha mal las mad nas// 'bras bu mchog la myur du reg/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang nyid nas// 'khrul ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// yengs pa med pa'i bzlas sngags bsgrub// gtad gzhag med par nus bsred//
85b2(rnying rgyud): lus nyid lha la ngag nyid sngags// yid chos 'pho 'gyur med par grol// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi bzang tshul bla na med// 'bras bu yi grub gded chen rnyed// bgrang tshul phyi nang gsang gsum dang // de nyid sngags kyi bgrang tshul las
85b3(rnying rgyud): g.yo med don chen 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sla las/ sngags kyi bgrang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// I// / yang sprul sems dpa'i 'khor chags kun// ye shes lha sngags bsnyen
85b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshad// bstan phyir ma yengs gus par nyon// gtso 'khor dang ni sprul ba dang // yang sprul rnams kyi bsnyen tshad la// grangs kyi tshad dang dus kyi tshad// rtags kyi tshad dang rnam pa gsum// grangs tshad gang yin gtso bo yi// snying po dag la 'bru 'bum ste// ming
85b5(rnying rgyud): don sngags las de bzhin las// sa bon srog sngags de bcu 'gyur// 'khor gyi bsnyen pa 'bru khri ste// las kyi sngags la de las 'gyur// gnyis dang gsum sogs las dang bstun// rang gnad 'khor gyi srog sngags la'ang // khri la lnga 'gyur bzlas
85b6(rnying rgyud): pas 'grub// 'on kyang sngags dang rnal 'byor gyi// dgra grogs khams dang bstun pa yi// grogs phrad 'bring la nang phrad rab// dgra dang phrad na tha ma ste// de yis 'gyur tshul mkhas pas dpyad// rab la rkyad pa 'bring khug pa// tha ma dag ni spang ba 'am// yang
85b7(rnying rgyud): na 'dun pa bsgyur bas 'grub// pha rol dgra la rang nyid grogs// de ni rab tu spang ba gces// rang nyid dgral pha rol grogs// de bung bsten par rabatu ba tsam la// yang dag 'bras bu 'gyangs par 'gyur// sprul pa la ni ma nges pas// yang sprul de bas nges pa med//

88a7(rnying rgyud): game rjes pa dang / kyi 'dod ngas grab 'byung bar 'gyud// sbrid kyi breg gang po yang // gsang nas grags parjes pasrung pa yis// kyabs kyid pang dag las pa sbyor// mag sang 'asal zhing ga galal ba// ti ma ma ma mi gyu bye/
88b1(rnying rgyud): dadang pa thag rnams// mkhas pas 'gas par byad da dbang // ma pi dam pa kha' nga rnams da cig sung byud du bar 'jug rna las/ sngags pa zas pa dag dang mdag pa'i sngon yon bstan pa'i lang brgyab pa// yang dag sum du du
88b2(rnying rgyud): rnams nyon// sngags kyi bsdub tshul bshad par bya// rlung dang me yi sde tshan dang // chu dang sa yi sde tshan dang // de bzhin nam mkha'i rje tshan dang // bsgom dang phral ba'i rnam pa can// re re la yang lnga lnga las// phral ba'i sde la 'i re'o// sdom la rlung gi
88b3(rnying rgyud): ga ni rlung gi rlung yig go// kha ni rlung gi me yig ste// ga ni drung gi chu yig ste// b+ha ni rlung gi sa yig yin// nga ni rlung gi nam mkha' yi// yi ge yin par shes par bya// de bzhin tsa tsha dad+ha nya// me yi rlung me chus mkha'// pa pha ba b+h+ra ma dang wa// chu le drung mo nusas
88b4(rnying rgyud): ta tha da d+han dang lnga// sa yi rlung me chus mkha'// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na lnga yang // nam mkha'i drung me nu ma mkha'// phral po'i sde tshan yi ge ni// ya ra la wa rnam pa bzhi// rlung mem chu'i yi ge ste// sha ni me yi yi ge ste// Sha ni skad byed spyil snyoms// si ni ma yi yi ge la/
88b5(rnying rgyud): dang a ni nam mkha' yi// yi ge yin par shes par bya// k+Sha ni nus paskyed pa yis// yi ge yin pas kun la snyoms// ya g+ha thams cad sa ru bsdu// zhabs kyu chu la 'greng bu me// gu gu nam mkha'i khong du bsdu// na ro rlung la nga ro rnams// lnga ldan yin pas mkhar
88b6(rnying rgyud): mkha'// me chu gnyis po dgra gshed la// de bzhin sa rlung dgra gshed yin// me rlung gnyis dang sa chu 'phrod// nam mkha' kun khyab kun la snyoms// de las gzhan yang 'byung ba'i ste// spyi mthun dgra grogs bskor bar b+ha// nang bsde ba nang dang nang 'a
88b7(rnying rgyud): ni// prog yig yin par shes par bya// khod nas byung dang rgan nas byung // so dang rgan dang gyertsa dang // mnyam par 'thung dang ldanapa 'byung // mchu nas 'thung dang bcas spyor da // ring dang thung dang sbom pa dang // pra dang lder dang yang gyi ste// rtor pa'i/
89a1(rnying rgyud): yin pa grags pa// rlung ba rgyas nam ma pa rnams// nga da du khrug pa dang // gags / dgasus rgyung can dang // 'thung brdzu sa pa rnams// rang dang khams pa nasu na// thung nang/
89a2(rnying rgyud): mthu/ brdzob pa rnams// bkra dang zhenas grogs spang // me dang bu phrad bzang po la// dgra dang grogs phrad 'bring po te// dgrag ga 'di ba pas ste// rang slong sanas gnas bskur \u0f7f// nang zadapal thar btang snyoms byed// dan
89a3(rnying rgyud): mabu'i bsde ba rnams ni// rigs mi mthun dang rigs mthun dang // gcig grogs gcig gis byed pa dang // gcig dgra gcig gis byed pa dang // gcig rten gcig gis byed pa yi// su mtshan thams cad shes par bya// 'byung ba sdeb gnang
89a4(rnying rgyud): rnams pa'i thugs shing // rang rang khams dang bkun gyur na// rus stobs 'bar nas las myur 'grub// de nas de yi bsdeb log na// sngags kyi nus pas rang gshed byed// tshe dang srog le gzan pa dang // dbang zang longs spyod 'joms la
89a5(rnying rgyud): sogs// nyes padu ma 'byung bar 'gyur// nges na sngags kyi bsrub tshul rnams// go rim ma log shes pa yis// oM deng namo pa sogs pa'i// thog ma'i yi ge gnad che zhing // de nas rim bzhin dbu can dang // gzung bri sngags
89a6(rnying rgyud): 'bru brje dang bstan// batha' brten dag la ngas la med// swAhA hU~M phan la sogs pa// gang yang las kyi shugs ltar sbyar// dag sar dbang dang ljang gu dang // kha dog thebs su bstan pa yang // dkar po rgyal dam po po//
89a7(rnying rgyud): pos 'a rjeng badrung// dam mkha' dag ni rje dang mthong // dpazhin po ni khyer sngag sa dang mtshungs// phyogs dang byung rje gyi rnam pa par// shing ba byed dbris dang // byeng pa tha gyi mdzu'o// de nga po rigs mthad rnams
89b1(rnying rgyud): lha dang lha mo la sogs dang // bsdeb kyi yi ge smad nas ni// mthun phyogs bsgrub la mi mthun sdang // des mtshon ming gi rnam grangs kyang // yi ge 'thung ba'i dgra gshed pan+de// mthun phyogs gdags la mi mthun dor// dag dang ma dag tu/
89b2(rnying rgyud): par las// nus pa 'phel dang mi 'phel gyis// khyad par shin tu che ba'i phyir// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gtan la dbab// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyad rin chen 'jug sba las// sngags kyi bsku ba tshul bstan pa'i le
89b3(rnying rgyud): bcu gcig pa'o// s+thi// yang 'dus sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// wA dang de yi bsgrub sngags dang // brtson par byed pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// sngags kyi dmachog ldan pa gces// sngags kyi rlung gi sdeb sbyor dang //
89b4(rnying rgyud): dang mgrin pa sna dang ni// so dang rgan mchu rnams las 'byung // skye med yi ge khong nas te// de ltar de yi dam tshig tu// bza' ba tung zas dang brjod pa dag/ skyon gyi rnam pa gang yang spang // de yang ri sgog zhag lnga nyams// rlung gi sgrog pas zhag
89b5(rnying rgyud): dgra nyams// lce yi dbang pos nyer gcig nyams// sga g.yer zla b+hag khu ba yis// zhag gsum nyams par 'gyur ba yin// byin gyis ma brlabs sha dang chang // zhag lnga'i bar du nyams par 'gyur// mdor na dri ngan dku ba'i rigs// bzang
89b6(rnying rgyud): dang btung ba gang yin kyang // zhag mang sngags kyi nus pa gsod// de phyir de dag spang bar bya// mun dang phra ma la sogs pa// ngag gi mi dge'i las rnams kyis// sngags kyi nus pa gtan brlag gam// mthar yang yun ring 'gyangs par 'gyur// des na
89b7(rnying rgyud): de dag gang yang spang // bzlas brjod sngags la brtsod pa'i tshe// pus gdab 'jig rten bre mo yis// sngags kyi nus pa nyams pas spang // dmigs pa'i las sngags ma gtogs pa// mchil swa hA kha chu la sogs pa// 'gul la man por nus pa gsod//
90a1(rnying rgyud): ga du 'ang dgadu ba ga// gas sa gdas ba / bab dang thugs na// da pa dadam gtas sa dang // dbabad pa dag sa byug sa nan// ga myu dang glubas+ho/
90a2(rnying rgyud): sngags panas nyams par 'gyur// da dang dri yi rigs rnams dang // sngags la brjid mtshag rnams// gsang ba 'as pa gsang pa dang // de bzhin na rdzang bar gtar gtud dang // gsang tsug gang pa gas thabag ces// sngags kyi ngas rtags da /
90a3(rnying rgyud): 9// rtags dang tsha paci zung yang // ga tugs byeng byed pa ni// dam tshig yid bye thub pa'i bzung // gzhan yang sngags la gtses pa 'i// dad bye bgadumatshig rnams// go ma ma logargya pa ga ces// thab pi dam mkha' 'grong das/
90a4(rnying rgyud): ci gsung skyed den chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi ma chog bstan pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan dpag med rgya la pr-I // sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba'i don// brtse ba dgongs napa ba gsungs //
90a5(rnying rgyud): mdzo mtshar che// dgra' zhing stobs mngon par brjod// yang dag rdzogs byer na gang yin// gtan rdzogs go rim gang lags pa// bdag sogs ga hral bur gyur ba yi// rang rang blo dang gang 'jams pa'i// ye shes lha dang da /
90a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'dras dang ma 'das pa'i// srog gnad rab tu bskul ba'i don// 'bru dang yi ge la sogs pa'i// g.yo ba med par rabasnang ba// legs so legs so lags par gsungs// dga' bring spo bas rjes yi dang // lha dang mi dang gyi yin da
90a7(rnying rgyud): gsu la/ dag shing byang rgya / es sa na pa brgya nga 'dab ga da dug zungs/ sas na sa su 'i ba ga dun
90b1(rnying rgyud): kasum sangs rgyas thams cad kyigasung gi dbang phyug gis/ ljags kyi bad+mal bkram/ drang gi tshams par nas bshad/ mgral gyi bras pa nas drol/ thugs kyi dpal bldanas bton pa'i rgyung kyi rgyal ba rin chen 'brug sgra zhes bya brdzogs na// @
90b2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f\u0f7f/ thasaH/ gtir / ga \u0f7f/ / thum sa ngas rgyas byung ba'i gtang ba'o// phyogasarnas gnas skabs thams cad dung sheng rgyas la ldan pang du gnas par gyir rdzog// rgya rkyen gtsang ba badz+ra'i skangs ga
90b3(rnying rgyud): ka/ rgyag slad du/ gurba t+pa la na rnaMs ta nAg gad+ha ba bai stA nA ma/ bod ska \u0f7f/ b+hA ba li da ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rnye na ma mal na langs zhes byab/ bcom ldan 'das thog med kyim non pa rjo sa 'gyur ba/ ga
90b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal ldan lha gsung thugs yon tan phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i snying po g.yo ba med pal phyag 'tshal lo// zhing khams rnam par dag pargyan bkod pa'i pha brang brtsegs pa/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams
90b5(rnying rgyud): dbus la sogs pa sngags dang bral zhing // yongs sum chad pa/ gsal la 'ad 'bar 'ad rnam par btubab brgyan gyi snyur po rang tu brjid pa la zhi / sngang yul du bab pa las s+yA/ gzung 'drin ngos bzung dang bral ba'i gling yangs pa chen
90b6(rnying rgyud): bar/ gdod na nyid de 'drenanapa par dag la ba mi mang shing / dus gsus mnyam pa nyid du bzugs das/ phyogs zil the gdul bya legs yang theb ma byed/ mnyam par dgang sanas/ bzod par dka' zhing ltos pa med par gcigs/
90b7(rnying rgyud): nas// mnyam pamed pa'i medad pa paskyel pa med par ma da pa'i sbyin pa mam ldan 'dasas sasatshan po mthang pham pa'i mgan sa/ rgyang churna sems dpa' sprul pa'i ma'ar rnam par snang mdang dang / mi bskyed pa dang / men cad 'ang mngad /
91a1(rnying rgyud): man du sasu ga / gas / na smra/
91a2(rnying rgyud): rje sebs pa la sogs pa/ sbal pa dang sdang gi dkyil 'chen gyi rol pa las byung ba'i 'khor rnams kyis/ dus mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par byung ba rang byung dgangs slo ge 'ong zeng ga turnam pa bab pan tshe/ bcos ldan 'das kyi skye ga zung thugs
91a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor 'as 'od zer dkang po dadu/ 'od zer dmar po dang / 'od zer mthing gang ba tu 'jo deng lakho byems dpa' dang / bems ma rnams kyi gnas gsum du bris pa'i / sprul pa rang byung gi 'khor rnams dang sdang gi dkyil 'khor los pangs shes
91a4(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs kyi che ba dang la bstan pa'i don dam nam mkha' klong yangs lta bu'i dgongs pa gtan la dbab par gsol bas/ de nyid du nyid kyi thugs yangs pa chen pa mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer kha dog ste tshogs pa'i 'phro 'dra phyogs ba
91a5(rnying rgyud): nga du khyab par mdzad de gsungs pa/ e ma bas ma brjod bul ba'i 'khor// sems dpa' dang ni sems mnyon// du'i stong las rab spros pa// nga yi klong las rang shar ba// dkyil 'khor nga yi dbyings las gsal// 'gro 'dung yi
91a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings las da// rang byung nga la thams cad rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i ye shes don rab bzung // tha ba yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u snyed la // // rang snang sprul
91a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnamasanyon// blos med spros dang bral ba'i don// sa bral ye shes rkyen dun spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sems kyi spros pa bcad de bsgom// deb sgom gdang du brdzun pa 'o/ slod gtan la dab ba don du// mtshang
91b1(rnying rgyud): tid ldan pa'i thal gces// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus kyang // mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la// grAs btud 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas// de phyer mtshan nyid can ldan pa'i// tha ba de yi sku yi ma// mdzes shing bag dro lhan chags pa// nga
91b2(rnying rgyud): pam gdul bya'i yid dang mthun// gang la gang 'dul thabs la mkhas// gsung gi cha yang 'jam zhing snyan// 'jig rten 'chal gtam bre mo chung // nges don chos kyi gsung char 'bebs// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung dang mthun// de bzhi
91b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyang mkha' ltar dag/ blta bsgom gzhi 'bras don dang ldan// rang 'dod bral zhing gzhan don la// brtse bas skyo du ba med par brtson// mdor na mdzad pa'i rnamathar rnams// bla med theg ma thog chos dang mthun// de ltar ldan pa/
91b4(rnying rgyud): la btsa/ nyi ma mam na pad ga na kyi// dag pa dang pa na pa 'ad / bku gyi yo kyis gyes par bya// thugs Sh+Tha thu la gnas// du brjes 'dug pa shA tho
91b5(rnying rgyud): ma brjen papa/ 'de logs pas ma thol ba smyan 'grub// thuzla pa dang pa lang 'phyo blathos pad de sngags rgyu nas stsal 'thongad padas pas/ rgyan nyid byu na rtsubapa 'anas bsnyen tshul bstan pa'i 'byes nyise mas/
91b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la// rmyi nang don 'jom chos yod kyang // snod ldan slob ma ma 'dom na// rnam grol 'bras bu mi 'byung phyir// gdul bya stod ldan slob ma gces// de yang dang brtson shes rab che// b+h+yo yangs
91b7(rnying rgyud): ser sna'i'adzini chags chung // chos spyod brtson 'grus kyo ngu ba med// bla ma la gus 'gro la brtse// dam tshig la gnas g.yo bla med// khrel 'jom ngo cha chad gzhung btsan// 'jig rten chos la yid mi
92a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ 'dug/ 'khrul phyir mi 'brang nyon mongs zab// yab lob mi byed 'gran sems thal// de sogs yon tan dpag med cing // b+h+ra ma mgo 'i thod bzhi khung// mched dang thogs la dag dang / gang
92a2(rnying rgyud): pa khong gi snying ltar 'chang // dam tshig mig 'bras lta bur btsa'// bsgo ba'i bka' nyan mnyen lcug ldan// brtsam pa mthar dbyung phyi thag ring // rang nyid pham khur gzhan selas 'don// de ltar 'dron pa'i gang zag ni// zhal ldan bde gshegs
92a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi sras// snod kyi rab mchog gdams pa'i chos// lhag par sbyin cing thabs kyis bskyang // nyams len srang la rim gyis gzur// 'bras bu don mchog gtan la phab// rgyal ba rnams kyi nges lung sbyin// yon tan de las log pa'i
92a4(rnying rgyud): skyon gyi rnam pa mang tshogs pa'i// dam med slob ma rgyang thag bsring // de ltar thang dang dor ba yis// slob ma'i mtshan nyid legs par brtag/ b+h+ra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' slong yangs las/ mtshan nyid ldan
92a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i slob ma brtag cing spang blang bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// s+t+rI// / mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// gnas dus khyad par can 'jo mtsho// snod ldan rigs mthun slob ma la// spos bcas phyi yi bum dbang bskur// lus
92a6(rnying rgyud): sprin lha yi phyag rgyas gdang // ngag ljin sngags kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sems smin chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab// dkyil 'khor yo byad rdzas tshogs pa// longs spyod rkyen gyi phyag rgyas gdab// zab mo g+ha Na'i yo byad kyis// ye shes lha yi dgyes
92a7(rnying rgyud): pa bzung // stangs stabs gar gyis mnyes par bya// dpa' bo thabs kyi bde ba dang // dpa' mo shes rab stong nyid kyis// gnyis med rol pa'i rtsal la bslab// spros pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bya ba du ma la zhugs pa'i// spros pa thabs
92b1(rnying rgyud): ma ba cad nas// smros dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dang du rim gyis gzung bar bya// dpa' ba lab dang dpa' mo sus// gnyis med nam ral sems dpa' yis// lA gas myang du bab pa na// phabatags 'dang dang 'tha ba dang //
92b2(rnying rgyud): yid dbug so zhing yang migs byung // dAl badrub narnams brjing // sras bcas tham pa'i byadabang gis// 'byung pa dang bcas 'bras pa 'thung // tha sa yi dang mnga'ang thomams pa bye thugs chud dmam 'ang gang yangs rgyag/
92b3(rnying rgyud): b+h+r-i spros bcas bus dpung gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// smai// / yang ni yang dag bshad bya ba// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// snod ldan zhes bu nyer gcig la// yo byad dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// dumardzas rnam pa mang tshogs pa'i/
92b4(rnying rgyud): ljin byed spos med nang gi dpag/ lab bum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// brten nas rim gyis bskur bar bya// de la phyi nang 'jug pa dang // dmigs pa'i 'phro 'du dag la bslab// slob mas dang bdun pabyed nas kyang // tha bar ces
92b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i maN+Dal phral// gsol ba gdab cing gus pa bskyed// bla ma yab dang yum bcas pa'i// lha yi rgyal ldan pa pos// gsang ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// thabs shes slob ma'i lce steng dbab// brda' dang bcas pa'i ye shes bskyed//
92b6(rnying rgyud): bde dang stong par ngo spang bas// lus ngag yid gsum rab sbyin cig// khyad par dag la nus pa 'bar// dpal drang gzi brjid rab 'phro zhing // dbang don dran pas don 'bras 'grub// e maM bla gsang thig le yis// bde chen ye shes yang dang
92b7(rnying rgyud): chog/ 'bad med myur du skye bar 'gyur// de skyes spos med dang la gzhag/ gzhag bya bzhag byed med bzhin du// rnam par rang grol lhag par 'char// de ni spos med nang gi dbang // gdul bya dag pol ye shes brnyes/ bla ma yid
93a1(rnying rgyud): ga marnams gas rgyud dmamatha' tha~Mng sa na thos yo ga sa dang ga nga/ ga na smra/ rnamams// can du sa na

93a6(rnying rgyud): med ngam grub shangs// ro stong brgyad kyi lab la bzong // bag chags sems pa 'khrul pa bzhig/ bdag po byasad nas ma khyod 'azlog/ mnam ma chos ny-i byings su bsnga'// e ma shes rab ste shes kyi// dbang do
93a7(rnying rgyud): sa rgya pa'i dang 'du 'thug sa yongs sa pa' 'thobams cad kyizug brgyad dumab ma pa su sa sbyin kyang kyi rgya shes sa gas byed ba shis drug gas/
93b1(rnying rgyud): ma \u0f7f// thog dbang srod ldan rgyas thul// mtshan nyid ldan pa 'a thams bskrad// gzugs sems ci kyil khang du// dang blang dul ba'i ltar gas zhing // 'bya' bra la dad pa gtub pa// dkya cags pas dang mang du/
93b2(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal smos pa med par 'thal// gzung ba'i tshig gis gsol ba gdag// badz+rad ni tshig dbang nga srod gdab// nyam sa gas la y-i shes 'khor lo bskor// 'khor 'das kyis gdal dang lagags/ don dam byang chub sem dpyi du// mtshan pa
93b3(rnying rgyud): bul ba'i dbang mchog gis// lus dag yid gsum sbyin nas kyang // gyi nang snod brgyad brda don skad// stang sring tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// bdag gzhan mnyam gsal dbyings kyi dang // 'bras bu cu gsum ye shes lnga// zhing dang bcas par
93b4(rnying rgyud): wAn gyis rdzogs// de ltar bzhi rdzogs dbang bsrub pas// dpon slob dgra' bya de'igs la nyams bskyang // gtang rag ce dga' bu grol zab// bkra shes pasngo sogs mtha' rgyas kyi// de la bas las rjes dbyings su bsku le/ rdza pa yi dam mkha'
93b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs rgyud namamakha' kyang yangs ldas/ smin gyid pan nyid kyitshig dbang ngon pa rgya'i lab cwa bdun pa'o// dbang nams thob pa'i dal 'byung bas// gsang chen dam tshig drim pa rnams// dang du 'ang shi tsam bani
93b6(rnying rgyud): bzung // drug c-i gas gan tan dang // sbyin ldas rnam pa na / bdan lags ma ban tu/ skyed nang dang gtsa ba dang / nyid la lcags gang da gang // rgyas gsal nas dag ye gsus gyis// n+d+ha ma tha~M da
93b7(rnying rgyud): sa po nyi ga tu // dang bdabang sa la dang / phreng byang brgyam pa'i byeng da/ bshags du rjong su tshu 'bros// spyong pa 'a 'dreng sa pasabya// srin byeng ga la dag
94a1(rnying rgyud): mtshams gcad pa dang // sa mdzAms gcad du med tshul gyis// yang nas yang du dran shestAH// gal te nyams pa la thogs mal// 'gyur dang bcas pa'i chag nyams lngas// de 'gyur da pa'i bangs cad
94a2(rnying rgyud): kyis// rdzas dang bcas pa'i bshags pas byeng// ltung bar mi 'gyur sor chud nas// dngos grub yang dag brnyes pa yin// rang lo nges par nyams 'das na// de so na ma bshags na ngag spyod// de phyir yon zhag dus kyis// nyams
94a3(rnying rgyud): sa mtshams ma 'das par// 'gyod de gang bshags bde legs 'gyur// mnyams yon tan rtsis las 'das// nyams kyang bshags pas yon tan 'byung // nyams kyang bshags par ma byas dang // bshags kyang thams ma gan
94a4(rnying rgyud): bla ma nyid dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje dmyal ba'i yang gting du// 'tshod pa'i sdug bsngal rtsis las 'das// bshags par byed dang ma nyams bsrung // sdom par byed pa'i thabs mchog ni// dpal dang ldan pa'i spyod yul lo// bla ma yi da
94a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ dam tshig ma nyams par byed pa dang // nyams na bshags par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / s+thi// / dgongs klong yang dag mchog gi don// grol byed rmad
94a6(rnying rgyud): du byung ba las// rang snang rtsal chen rdzogs 'dod pas// gtan la dbab pa'i dang po ni// chos nyid rol pa ngos bzung ba'i// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta// gdod nas yang dag chen po la// spang blang gtang gzhag ming
94a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral/ de bzhi ni dngos 'dzin bya byed bral// kyu rkyen las 'das phyogs lhung bral// smra bsam las 'das de bzhin nyid// ye klong kun bzang rab snang zhing // brda dang rtags kyis mtshon du med// gzhi snang dang gsal 'od
94b1(rnying rgyud): zin pa// smyos dang bal ba'i dang du gdal// am gdang nas rnam dag // bla brdang thal ba yal pa// b+h+ram yi dam mkha' 'ag thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nang mthang grod yangs las/ gdad ma'i dgongs phrangs bzung ba'i leng snyed thub pa/
94b2(rnying rgyud): gagi chen po ngos gzung ba// rnam pa drug dang yang dag ldan// 'di ni 'dod can gzhi nyid de// sna tshogs snang zhen 'tshel bang ngol// 'on kyang sna tshogs snang ba yi// ri mo dag la ngos bzung nas// du ma nyid du gtsur mgur/ na
94b3(rnying rgyud): gsal la// yul dang yul can 'du 'phrod pa'i// badz+ra las skad du grags pa bzhin// zad mtha' bral bA'i gzhi mar gyur// bskus pas mig sogs dbang po la// de yul gzugs sogs rnam pa drug/ de las spros pa mang byung 'gyur//
94b4(rnying rgyud): pa du mang rab grags pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' 'tsho la ji bzhin no// b+h+ra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ gzhi sna tshogs su smra ba sun dbyung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
94b5(rnying rgyud): 'dapa spyi gzhi ngos 'dzin pa// rtogs na grol zhes lung ma bstan// ma rtogs 'khrul zhes sgo ma btags// btang snyoms lung ma bstan du gnas// dper na til la mar khyab bzhin// lo 'dab myu gu gang yang min// 'bras bu yin yang
94b6(rnying rgyud): ldog bzhin// pade dang sdug bsngal gang yang min// rkyen gyis ma bskrang cang mi spro// rkyen gyis nam bskul phra mo ldang // de la der snang 'byung ba ste// sna tshogs las kyi 'khrul 'khor srid// de sogs gang du 'ang ma yin la// sgo
94b7(rnying rgyud): sing sogs min shes pas// khong lung ya gis spong kyang 'thus// den 'khong 'das sbyin zheste// rtogs te sangs rgyas byung ba med// matogs 'khor ba de'i 'byams// ting snyoms nyid du gnas pa nyid// gti mug chen po'i sman pa /
95a1(rnying rgyud): ma rig 'thibs pa'i d+habs g.yogs// ya shrIs sgrib mun drug pan// smyig zhi mnyam pa nyid dun// tha ma yi dmamakha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam ma kha khyod yangs las/ 'khor 'dus gnyis kyi
95a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// I// ye thog dang pa'i sangs rgyas ni// grol gzhi 'gro dang 'gyur med pa'i// rlung byung da grol dgongs pa'i grong // napa d+h+r-ig chos kyi dbyings las gsal// 'gro 'duye shes drug
95a3(rnying rgyud): yis// sAl-i dang rgyo 'phrul du ma 'gyed// rang byung lce shes dang grol gyi// rang rtsol 'a 'du'ang po ni// kun khyab chen po gtI mig s+ho// mdzad pa med pa'i 'od zer gyis// mA kha' mnyam 'grol mkhang ltang khyab//
95a4(rnying rgyud): nas rang shes rig pa'i slong // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyan mongs dang 'jil rang rtsal rdzogs// de bzhin de la ye shes kyi// rol pa dang rtsal tshe 'phrul yang // de nyid de las ma g.yos par// re re la phang
95a5(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa 'ong dang bcas par snang // zang dang thal mar tsAs kun la// phyogs dang ris su ma chad khyab// thugs rje zhal phyag bcas pa yang // rgyan dang cha lugs mtshon dper bcas// gdul bya rab snang gdal bar snang // 'bri
95a6(rnying rgyud): dang tha mar bcas pa ste// re re bzhin du gsum gsum ste// dgu la dgur stang gcig la gcig/ brgya sogs de bzhin rtsis 'das kyi// mthang 'ug yul dang yul can dang // rab gsal gang dang gang 'dul snang / 'khu
95a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul byed las 'das shing // grol bya grol byed las 'das pa'i// 'khrul grol rang babs ming maza' bral// ka dag lhun grub rol par bzhugs// ye thog bzang ba grol gzhi ste// bya byed bya rtsol las 'das sa// tha ma yi dma' khang /
95b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams cad kyi thugs byud nam mkha' klong yangs la swA/ dag pa sangs rgyas kyi tshul gzhi bstan pa'i le'u skye bcu gnyis pas/ shrI// martogs sems can 'khrul gzhan// nga med pa yang ru bzung // ngang 'dzin ta la gru
95b2(rnying rgyud): ldong las// nga yi 'dzin pa zhugs pa ste// dper na sprin med nam mkha' la// zol skyes glo bung lhags pa'i sbyin// gcig la gnyis 'phel cher rgyas nas// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par byas// de las chang dang spobs ma'i cho ga
95b3(rnying rgyud): rtsis las 'das pa byung bzhin du// ming med pa la ming btags 'khrul// gcig las gnyis kyis ming gi tshogs// phung po 'dus las grangs dang gzugs// rnam pa du mar g.yos pa yis// da dang khyod dang phan tshun bcas/
95b4(rnying rgyud): las cher langs sred pa sogs// thun mong sna tshogs las su snang // dmigs pa can dang 'dzin pa'i rkyen// 'bras bu sna chog rgya du 'khrul// yul can bdag por 'dzin pa yis// rkyen las sna tshogs ming byung 'khrul// de la de dmig
95b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs blo// thol skyes de la deng 'dzin zhugs// de ma zag tu bdag rkyen gyis// yul dang yul can skul ba ste// phan tshun gcig la gcig ltos pas// dza dang dbyug gu 'phrad pa las// sgra 'grong ma phrad mi thag ste// bdag
95b6(rnying rgyud): bris kun tog phra mo las// bdag ces gnyis su sbrad las 'khrul// de yis de bskyed de sogs 'byung // de nas rim nas rim bzhin du// lha me la sogs 'gro ba dang // mngal dang sgod kye sa la sogs pa'i// rnam pa sna tshogs
95b7(rnying rgyud): skyes nas 'khrul// las kyi 'phen spung dpag med spyod// skyerga ni 'chi'i 'grong 'khrugs// ma rtogs 'khrul ba lu gu rgyud// bag la nyal gyi rlung langs pas// rab tu g.yo zhing 'khrugs pa yis// byed sdug las kyi 'khrul 'khor/
