96b2(rnying rgyud): gi A 'bras las mi bkol// lte ba btsum med par gnad la gzir // lus gcud 'phung dang mnye ba dang // skabs su myong ba'i las la brtson// mnyen lcug ldan pa'i gnas lugs kyis// gdang shA bcad nas gtan la phebs/
96b3(rnying rgyud): tan ting 'dzin 'phel ba'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkhang klong yangs las/ lus 'khor 'das ru shan dbye zhing gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// hrI// sngon du 'gro ba'i snod
96b4(rnying rgyud): pa las// 'khor 'das ru shan phyed pa'i thabs// ngag skyang sems la phan pa'i phyir// ngag gi gnad la goms par bya// rlung ro drag po'i shugs phyung bas// mda' ltang steng 'og g.yas g.yon du// gsum gsum dag gis dbyung bar bya//
96b5(rnying rgyud): de nas g.yo med gnad la dbab// gsang ba'i 'jam chung nar gyis drangs// rdzogs nas lhod kyis glod la bzhag/ rdzing gi chu ltar bstsol nas kyang // dgang nas cung zad bzhag pa la// nus pa rdzogs nas dal gyis dbyung // de ltar 'byin 'jug
96b6(rnying rgyud): gnas byed pa// drag la yun thung ma yin cing // da la la rgyun bsring tshod dang sbyar// rang phabs gshis la dbab pa gces// yang ni 'byin 'jug gang tshe yang // ched du ma yin rang lugs kyis// gtan la dbab pas las la sbyar// mi dang
96b7(rnying rgyud): chu dang rlung ngag dang // nam mkha' sa yi rlung rnams kun// gang dang gang cheso so yi// dus dang slad de gnad la gzing // steng dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams dang // g.yas g.yon ring nyung mnyam pa nyid// gang la gang dang de la des// sa mtshams
97a1(rnying rgyud): rabatugs pa gnas// gdus pa snyan// rgyung rnas sa dang sa ng+yas dang // dani 'phrul bar byed pa'ang// yang na gang nga ngas smrasas// pasgrub pa gang yang las marung // 'bas rgya
97a2(rnying rgyud): par 'byung ba yin// me dus rlung dang rlung dus rgya// sa dus nam mkha'i rlung she sna pas// nam ma kha'o go 'a byed kun la'o// g.yas g.yon 'gro dang 'jug pa'i dus// rtse mom ning myong ba yi// grangs la bslab cing rtsal
97a3(rnying rgyud): lag dang maldanan// snron sgya posregs par 'gyur // des nA ng+ge la rim gyis bsgrub// gam+b+ha nas rgya ga ng+gA'i bye pade 'gyud// sbrul yid pam 'ag thams cad kyi thugs rgyu na pal pa gling yangs la ste/ ngag 'ad
97a4(rnying rgyud): dbye zhing gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// I// / yang ni sems gnad sngon 'gro'i las// 'khor 'das rgya shan 'byed pa'i thabs// lus dang ngag gi gnad ldan pas// dang po dran pas ma 'dzin pa sdung/
97a5(rnying rgyud): sngang byas 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi// rjes dpyod tog pa du ma spro// phyir 'gyur byed pa du ma yi// mno bsam 'gro 'du dpag med bya// gang la gang dang de la de'i// rtsal snang 'khrul pa sna tshogs byed// de lta'i byed pa du ma la
97a6(rnying rgyud): pasam blo ngan+da zhes mang po dang // lcags kyu lta bur 'gugs pa dang // ral gri lta bung no ba dang // phyug shad so mangs lta bu dang // glang chen lta bur 'gying ba dang // stag mo lta bung ngang ba dang // seng ge lta bung rtsal ba dang /
97a7(rnying rgyud): zug lta bar lding bste// spyi sor lta bu rgya la sogs// sna tshogs rnam pa dum la// sro zhing bsdus pas tasha bcad/ bar du sems kyi spros pa bcad/ sbrang 'das zin pa'i rjes mi bcad/
97b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba gdus thag pa cad// da lA'i drag gsum la// rgyar gyis dang ga dang la gcing // yid bas ma dran pa par dpur sogs// srog wAng 'khrug cing byu ltung ldeng // gyi nang skang ba rol// ya yang 'gyod pa 'azhes ngag /
97b2(rnying rgyud): byung gnas dag thal sogs dang // dbyibs dang kha dag rnam pa rtan// yang med yin min na skad dang // gcig dang du mang smyung ba dang // skye 'chi dgag bsrub 'dug mi 'dug/ gyi nang la sogs gtad khungs gang // yin pa su
97b3(rnying rgyud): yin bcad de// gnas lugs khung du spang bar // des ni kho yi mtshangs rdol te// gnas lpags dang la yin+ta lcags kyi// ye gzhi'i steng du zhabs par 'gyur// de ltar gtan la thebs pa'i dang // mA ba tsas smras bskrad mi ky-i bar //
97b4(rnying rgyud): gang gang ngang la spyod de bzhag/ bcing dang grol ba med par gzhag/ gzhag zla 'jog byed med pa dang // bya tshol 'dzin pa med pa ste// nga dngang ldid med pa dang // bdag gzhan ris sum gyes dang // bzang ngan rtog pas mi grags par//
97b5(rnying rgyud): sa na shes kyi nyid du hU~M// gnas sngags sems kyis na d+hI// ma ra 'das rgyas kyis dun thog phapas// rdzog bzhag kyil ba'i dang du thim// tham yi dam lang dgrathams kyad kyi zugs na nam pa pa' mong yangs pas/ yid
97b6(rnying rgyud): das dun dr-i kyi dang gtan la phab pa'i lets+tsha sne bad+hU drug pa'o// // / sras+t+ra dag yi gsum gan dag TI nas// gzhan la pho byA ba'i skyes hrul// gnas sag kyi gzhi'i ngo bo bstan// dkar dang nag po'i chos ma gug
97b7(rnying rgyud): 'khong dang 'das pa'i rkyen las 'das// skyeng 'og la sogs phyogs mtshams dril// dbyibs dang che chung la sogs pa'i// gzugs kyi rnam pa ngos gzung med// gang nas gang du song ba dang // gang dang gang du 'ang ba dang // gang dang ga
98a1(rnying rgyud): srid pa dang // 'gro dang 'dug pa la sogs te// rnam pa 'di dang 'di lta zhes// bltar med mtshan du med pa dang // ming dang yi ga'i brgyud dang // bdug dang gzhan nas zla ba dang // 'khor dang 'das pa nyid dngan
98a2(rnying rgyud): de'i chu chen po ma dang // rtsa ba snying po yal ga sogs// gang du yang ni ma grub pas// brjod pa kun las 'das pa'o// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' slong yangs pas/ sems gnas lugs gle bo gtan/
98a3(rnying rgyud): la pheb pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// rnga bo stong pa'i ngang mdangs las// rang bzhin gsal sdung 'od du shar// rnam pa bkra bA rig byed gsal// skra tshogs snang drang sbrang yul dang // phra dang rigs dang 'phrigs pa

98a7(rnying rgyud): skyong gi zugs brgyan rdzun nin// rang gsal ba zag ma dang sa 'ad bza// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khong rab rgyas pa// ma byas rgyas pa sod par snang // ma gris brisapa med pa bab// ma bkris kris pa med par legs// mabyon kyi
98b1(rnying rgyud): med par sleb// ma bltas bltas pa med par mthong // mnyan nyan pa med par thos// ma bsnam mnam pa med par dku// ma zos khros pa med par bro// ma reg reg pa med par tshor// ma dran dran pa med par rig/ sbrang srid pas ma yul med
98b2(rnying rgyud): pa shar// ma gu chu dang 'o ma 'bres// rang skad dkyil 'khor nyid la rdzogs// e mdo mtshar snang ba'i chos// rang bzhin snang stong chu zla bzhin// byas byung med par rang snang ngo // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs byung nam
98b3(rnying rgyud): klong yangs las/ sems kyi rang bzhin gsal stong 'dzin med du gtan dbab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // / thugs rje rnan par 'gag med pa'i// rang gdangs 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las// 'chang sgom 'gags cing
98b4(rnying rgyud): yang shar// shang dang grol ba du ma yang // rgya mtsho Ta rlabs chu nyed bzhin// rtsol med dang shar rang grol ba// 'phro dang 'du ba'i tshod phrul can// phra dang rags pa'i gya gyu ba// mthong ba med la rgyug cing spyod// rig rig po dang chung ngung po//

98b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i rtog tshogs kyang // dkyil 'khor de las phyogs na min// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta g+hi// th+ya byed bya bdum pang // sna chags shar grol sprul pa'i sba// mdong na 'phro du mang po dag/ col med rang shar de bzhin gshegs/

100a1(rnying rgyud): yongs ga// gas pa ma dang bda' ba// bar drud dgang+gAl zhes dag/ thamag 'atsun pa nadus na// mar 'phral ga nas gdadu nasu na sulagags// byas pa ba ba /

100a4(rnying rgyud): 'bol ltar// 'phel bar 'gyur dang bcas pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ nyams kyi mthong snang gong du 'phel ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u lte nyid gcig pa'o//

100a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra grol ba nyid du 'gyur// dpa'i ldan dkyil 'khor lhan gyis grub// ye shes rang sbyang 'khrul pa dag/ skang srid bya tshol 'dzin pa thal// nyin dang mtshan mo'i snang mtha' zed// zas skom gos kyi zhen pa dang // nyon phongs chags
100a7(rnying rgyud): nga gis ni// zlab te rgyas lta bu ste// da nas dgung la shul mi mtshon// ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs mngon shes 'char// phyi dang nang med mnyam par gdal// tshogs drug tse 'phrul nyal gyis ni// tshogs drug rang spel gtan la reb// dag pa
100b1(rnying rgyud): pang dag zad khab// 'phel 'grib med par dkyil 'khor rdzogs// tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ rig pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad la thob par bstan pa'i le'u ste ter gnyis pa'o//
100b2(rnying rgyud): darje rjes kyi dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs nas// phyi dang nang med kun tu yang // gdal ba chen pa'i slong du thim// log zhi'i steng durtsal zed rdzogs// chos zad po zad la khrul ba zad// zad pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas nas// bong bu ma yin
100b3(rnying rgyud): men// gnyis sgrang kun gyi mtha' las 'das// yod ces kun rdzob ma yin la// med ces phung du ngo mtshad // gang yang mtha' las 'das pa'o// sgo btags zhen thos ma mo tsam// gtan du yod pa ma khyen cing // sbrang srid 'khor 'a
100b4(rnying rgyud): dmas kun// nyid kyi klong du yangs par thim// rtsal chen yang med par rdzogs// dpa' shugs chen po'i dkyil 'khor zad// zad cing stong pa'ang ma yin te// ming gi rnam grangs las 'das nas// brjod bya rjod byed brjod pa las// 'das
100b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang du thim pa'o// re re'i skad tshul ma yin par// gting rdzogs yangs pa'i klong du dag/ phyi yi yul snang 'khrul zad par// nang gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs// ye shes dang ni nyon mongs kyang // dbye ba med par mnyam pa ni// chos nyid
100b6(rnying rgyud): yangs pa'i dang du zad// dpa' bar 'gro dang rdo rje 'dzin// mi g.yo gting gsal dngos 'dzin bral// tha snyad dri ma zad nas kyang // byas med byas pa kun las 'das// phung po kun kyang dus gcig zhig/ gsang zin bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor
100b7(rnying rgyud): zhig// yangs shing gsal la rtog pa med// a me srib g.yogs dang thal ba'i// mkhas pa tshig dang rdzun chag dang // yang bag mar dang ngogs// mtha' dbus la sogs 'gro ldog rnams// dus 'dir zung zad le slong grol// kun
101a1(rnying rgyud): chub tu yi he ru yang // rdzas 'dir skad tsam ma yin la// slobatags nyid las 'das pa'o// zang ma dang ni thal ba nyid// bla ma wA dung nAk+ki la// dkyil 'khor nyid kyang zang thal byar// sdang ba rdzogs ngas pa
101a2(rnying rgyud): shes kyi// thugs rdo zhal phyag skur shar bas// ye shes snang ba'i cha ma 'gags// 'dzin cha thams cad zad pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ chos nyid thad+ma phreng gi dkyi
101a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas/ 'dzin cha thams cad kyi mtha' rdzogs par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyed gsum pa'o// s+t+wa~M/ zag pa zad pa zhes bya byar// dang po 'dzin cha mtha' yas kyang // rtsal gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshe// bab chags
101a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i 'dzin cha ni// phra mo tsam yang mi snang bar// dkyil 'khor dbyings su thim nas ni// 'dzin dang 'dzin pa zad pa las// chos nyid zad pa zhes bya ste// de ltar 'dzin pa rang zad nas// bdag tu rtog dang gzhan du tog/ phyi nang
101a5(rnying rgyud): gang dang bdag gzhan sogs// phan tshun dbye ba med klod du// gzhi snang ye shes zhes bya ba// gsal la dag cing rnyog ma med// rab rib bag chags gtan zad pa'i// ye shes 'od gsal lam me ba// 'khor 'das yongs grol gdal
101a6(rnying rgyud): pA las// dkyil 'khor du ma'i 'char sgo can// ye nas rab tu shes pa'i phyir// gzhi snang ye shes rnam par dag/ kun 'dus sems dpa'i rgyal po ste// ye shes rnams kyi rtsa ba zug/ 'di las 'phro dang 'du med kyang // gsal ba 'od//
101a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor bkra// de las 'du dang 'phro ba yis// ye shes dbye ba du mar 'gro// gdul bya du ma'i spyod yul du// ye shes du ma'i dkyil 'khor yang // sku dang 'od du bcas par ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud
101b1(rnying rgyud): rna pa grod pangs las/ gzhanang gi migs bsnyen pa'i 'a ba tir bsgriba'o// / nga thugs can pa las// chos kyi dbyings kyi ga zhes sa// mapa d+ma da bus mad par mnyam gang sa nga/ sa da lakhor 'das dkyi garjod nag tra/
101b2(rnying rgyud): g.yogs thal ba la mu me ba// spyi zlum ye shes rab 'byams su// rang rdzogs sa ler shes pa ste// dbyings las rab snang thugs rje yi// rtsal 'gro zer gyis gdul bya yi// re dang 'dod pa bsgreng ba'o// de la chos dbyings yo shes tI ra//
101b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus med pa'o// gti mug mi shes mun pa sangs// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rgyas// gdod nas rnam dag spros bral zhing // spos dang yang dag de bzhin nyid// chos dbyings rab 'byams ye shes so// bla ma mi dam mngo
101b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams cad kyi thugs chud nam mkha' klong yang sa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// I// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang // 'char sgo rnam pa du ma yi// rol pa ma 'gakra sa le ba// rab ri btsun par bsangs
101b5(rnying rgyud): nas// snang ngor gsal tsam ma yin par// gting gsal ye shes chen po'i don// thams cad rang la rang bzhin snang // gsal la ma 'dres so sor snang // 'phro dang 'du dang rlabs g.yo ba// phyogs dang res tshad ma yin cing // 'khor mo lug pa
101b6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba ste// snang la rang bzhin ma grub gsal// gsal la 'dzin pa med par khyab// bdag dang bdag rkyen yul 'das par// sgo rnams gang yang ma 'gagra shing // lhug pa nyid du snang ba las// me long lta bu'i ye shes te// bsgrib bya spring byed 'asgrib pa las
101b7(rnying rgyud): 'das shi rang snang dkyil 'khor rdzog// yul dang yul can gnyis mnyam par// gsal la ma 'dres shar ba'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thug rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ me long lta bu'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste her drug pa'o// I// / mnyam pa nyid
102a1(rnying rgyud): kyi ye shes ni// 'khor ba gting mtha' med pa dang // 'das pa dkar po'i chos rnams kun// phan tshun gyog su ma chad par// ris med mnyam nyid chen por gnas// gting gasngal chen po'i gdangs las kyang // sna tshogs bkra ba'i 'tshong du yang // ma
102a2(rnying rgyud): nyid spang dang blad med par// ye shes gcig pa'i klong du grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam ris med la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste// de dag ye nas shes pa la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes// ming du btags de rje dong ste// don lnga yangs
102a3(rnying rgyud): med cing // phyogs dang ris drangang khyod med// bzang dang ngan pa la sogs te// mdor na gnyis snang las 'das pas// gting gsal ye nas dag pa'i klong // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs byed nam ma
102a4(rnying rgyud): yangs las/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// // / so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// dbyings gsal chen po'i rol pa las// rtsal gyi 'phro 'du 'gyed pa dang // de dang de'i cho 'phrul las// rnam pa du mar snang
102a5(rnying rgyud): ba kun// ma 'dres 'dres pa med bzhin du// gsal 'grib med par so sor snang // rang las rang nyid 'od shar bas// chags pa med cing bral med par// 'od ldang las kyang 'od kyi mdangs// g.yos pa med par bkra lam mer// ye gdungs nyid du rab shes
102a6(rnying rgyud): pas// rnam par rig bkra 'du dang 'phro// phra zhing grim dang yang zhing g.yo// so so nyid las so sor snang // sred bral gzhir snang 'phrong du yis// ye shes dag pas rtogs dang grol// rnam par rig byed ma 'gags par// so so rtog pa'i ye shes nyid// rang
102a7(rnying rgyud): byung dbyings las rang shar po'o// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u sti tar brgyad pa'o// hU~M// / byab grub pa'i ye shes ni// phrin las las kyang zin las /
102b1(rnying rgyud): 'du 'gro dang snad rtsal po che// sbrul dang yang sbrul kun nas sprul// gdul zla gdul ba 'dul byed kyis// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang snang zhing // 'bras bu yang dag de bzhin nyid// col zal chen por lhun gyis grub// byas pa med kyang rang gshis las// rang /
102b2(rnying rgyud): byung 'dus ma byas su snang // de bas bya byed rtsol bral bas// bya ba byed cing byed pa bya// yang dag chen po grub pas ni// de ni yang dag yi gdangs su// shes dang rnam rig rnam par bkra// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes nyid// grangs mthang las kyang rnam zad pa/
102b3(rnying rgyud): bdag rtog ma yin gzhan ma yin// bdag gzhan ris la yod ma yin// yang dag yang grol las rnams zad// de las bya ba grub pa ste// ye shes tid ni sgrib pa bral// kun nas yang yang bskyar gzhi med// rgyan dang bcas pa'i rol pa ste// 'di kun
102b4(rnying rgyud): gtang gzhag med pa yin// bya ba med la byung ba med// byas pa med pas bskyar gzhi med// de phyir 'khrul pa dang dag pas// ye shes rnam par grol ba'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ bya ba grub
102b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// s+thi// / yang dag ye shes bden ma mthong // bar ma do ru 'khyams pa la// bar do gnad kyi don bstan pa// bar mdo yi dbye ba dang // sa mtshams gnas lug snang lugs te// skye gnas par do
102b6(rnying rgyud): 'chi kha yi// bar do dang ni chos nyid kyi// bar dro srid pa'i bar dro ste// de ltar dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// de la bar do'i sa mtshams ni// mal skyes nas 'chi kha yi// nad kyis btab pa tshun chad du// skye gnas par ngo zhes bya ste// g+hi nas 'byung bzhi rim gyis
102b7(rnying rgyud): phyo// na dbugs cad ba rgyan chang du// 'amibam mi ba zin// denas nang shi dbugs cad nas// skun grub sngang brgyan chad rgya// rjes nyid par dngas mtshams yin// de nas meng la du chung brdzun// srid pa par dngas mtshams pan// /
103a1(rnying rgyud): nas par de'i gnas lugs ni// rdos bcas sha khrag lus grub pas// ye shes snang ba 'gag pa te// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rtog tshogs d+mo 'du mya tre// yul dang yul can 'thab pa de//
103a2(rnying rgyud): gnas par do'i gnas lugs so// rlung mkhris pan kan 'dus pa sogs// 'chi rkyen nad kyis 'byung ba rnams// rab tu 'khrugs shing lus ngag yid// sdug bsngal tshong ba dpag med myong // 'chi kha byer dro'i gnas lugs yin// bdag dang bdag ging
103a3(rnying rgyud): 'di napa yi// phung po lus kyi rten por nas// rang las rang dbang dus der thob// skad cig chos nyid bden don mthong // chos nyid bar dor longs spyod pas// chos nyid par do'i gnas lugs yin// rngon gyi bag chags las dbang gis// gzugs
103a4(rnying rgyud): gcig yod snyam srid pa'i lus// dbang po tshang zhing thogs pa med// yul rnams kun la thogs med rgyung // rnam shes bya sgro drung bskyod bzhin// dri za yad yud nganam bun// srid pa bar do'i gnas lugs so// gnas lugs de las snang lugs ni/
103a5(rnying rgyud): sgra gnas par do'i sbrang lugs su// rang bzhin babs kyi gnas pa las// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // nyon mongs la sogs rnams kun// yul las sbyar zhe na kun tu spyod// 'chi kha bar de'i snang lugs kyang // shes pa rtse gcig mi gnas pa
103a6(rnying rgyud): smig rgyu g.yo ltad pa ni bun dang // lang long zang zing du mad snang // rab tu gapo zhing 'phrigs pa 'ong // chos nyid bar do'i snang lugs su// rang sbrad chos nyid ngol pa'i klong // dang rtsol ma 'gags sna tshogs te// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// mu dang yenas
103a7(rnying rgyud): thig wa~M dang // zer dang chos nyid rang sgra ste// dun ting sing khrol dpag tu med// 'byed dang byed pa dang grol nyid// rang shar grol nas bden pa mthong // srid pa bar do'i snang lugs la// zilam nyid kyi snang ba ltar// yang yud gyad rkyod sna tshogs pa// rid
103b1(rnying rgyud): yul bden snang 'char ba ste// rigs drug gang dang gang skye bar// de dang de yi snang ba 'char// so sor dmigs yul rang rang gi// las kyi 'phen sdud snang ba'o// de ltar bar mdo ru yang // rab 'bring tha ma yang mtha' yi// skyes bu rtsal sbyang lam sna bzung //
103b2(rnying rgyud): skye gnas nyid nas bye brag dgye// nges par 'khrul pa'i snang ba dag/ ye shes rang rtsal ngo yis bzung // rab la shar grol 'bring po glod// tha ma rang gi rang sa bzung // yang mtha' smon lam rtsal chen sbyang // 'phar dad bgred la bzung bas kyang // g.yo
103b3(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gang la goms pa de 'grub 'gyur// 'bras bu nges pa'i gdeng chen ni// skad cig nyid la zin pa gces// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yongs las/ bar do bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //
103b4(rnying rgyud): nyams su len pa'i gnad bstan pa// chu dang rkyen las gyur pa yi// las kyi sgrib pa skyong ba ste// lus kyis lus nyid ar la gtad// ngag gis ngag nyid btson du bzung // sems kyis sems nyid gtan la phab// spyi 'dus sgo gsum gtan la dbab// des
103b5(rnying rgyud): shes chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'dun pa bla ma 'bral med bsten// blo sna bsnyung zhing mi rtag bsgom// gzhan don blo bskyed rang 'khris bcad// 'dod yon zhen pa'i 'ching ba gcod// bag chags mngon zhen g.yeng 'a bor// gnas lugs ye shes dran
103b6(rnying rgyud): bsam bzung // gang shar blo bral dang la gzhag/ 'khor gsum gang shar rgyas btab pas// ye klong nyid du mngon sangs rgya// 'bras bu rang ba pas lhun gyis grub// ma bcos yangs pa chen po'i don// sa chen rab tu gnon pa yin// bla ma yi dam mkha'
103b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro bams cad kyi thugs rgyud rnamam kha' slong yangs las/ nyams len gyi gnad bstan pa'i le'u skyem gcig pa'o// d+ha// tshor bas las kyi 'bras bulas// nag po zad pa'i sbyangs stobs kyis// rang grol phyag rgya chen po bstan// gan
104a1(rnying rgyud): chags gan pa cwag canan// dbamag/ sa bstan pa med// ral pa ma gags blanags // rgyu rnam la gzugs parnyan sbya// dz+ra blung na pa man par shAn+d+ha// mnas ba ga ma /
104a2(rnying rgyud): gdag khya ba 'od po che// sems can kun la thun mong snang // khyad par dal 'byor ldan pa yi// lus can kun la rdul du zhug// g.yo med gting gsal chen po nye// nam mkha' rgya mtsho rgyal tshul// thogs dang gos pa med pa'o// bla ma yi ma mkha
104a3(rnying rgyud): rnas ca kyi thugs rgyu namamakha' grong lang+yas las/ gzhi gnas gas kyi phyug n+d+ha rgyun po bstan du'i in+d+ra sa gnyis pa'o/ hU~M/ bzod byed lam gyi rdzas na che// gang shwad rnam pa sna tshogs san// chu lung mo skyes pa dang /
104a4(rnying rgyud): mkha'al gyi tshogs 'gro ba'i rjes// mtshal khabathabs pa ltar// gang shar lam gyi rol pa rnams// gang shar dang grol phyag rgya che// sbrang phral ma 'gags gzung mul thal// dang las dzang nyid rnam pa ste// dang shor rol pad gan thabs pa/
104a5(rnying rgyud): la ca tshul ba 'gags pa// rnam tshan po gnas ga// thal yirnam ma 'da' phra thams ma zugs rgyu rnamam pa spyod myo sa pas/ g+sa pal ga DU 'i sa gas pa //
104a6(rnying rgyud): bu rung sangs rgyas pa'i sgra// phrag rgya chen po yangs pa'i klong // gzhilas rnam par ma g.yos par// ring bab gshes la 'gyur med chos// lus dngag yid kyi rnam rol kun// mkha' la sprin tshogs dngangos pa ltar// 'bad rtsol lad par rangs zin/
104a7(rnying rgyud): g.yo 'gul med par gtan la pib// ri dogs med pas lam rgya lardzogs// nu rkyen las 'das phyag rgya che// 'bras bu ga rgya chen po kye// ma bcos rang bab spun gyis grub// dpe bral nam mkha'i da kyil 'khor bzhin// gteng rdzogs chen por rab
104b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam bzung // bla ma ya ma mkhar 'gra thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ 'bras bu phrag rgya chen po buskrun pa lawa ltas bzlab kra/ b+hU// da ltar gni la ma 'bras bu yi// phyag rgya tshal mngang brnyes pas// nyam/
104b2(rnying rgyud): len lamagyi ngogs dpung ba// lus ngag yid gsum mnyam gnas pas// g.yo med bsam gtan dang la gzhag/ tshogs drug yul la yid mi ho// gang shing mnyam pa nyid gnas pa// dmigs pa rtse gcig mi gtad par// phyam ga
104b3(rnying rgyud): gcig don la gzhag/ de la spyod lam ci bder spyod// phyi nang yul dang yul can kun// spang blang dgag bsgrub med pa'i ngang // 'gyu ba dngas sangs nyid gnas pas// spro baspu'i spros pa rang chod de// re dogs blang dor las 'das 'gyur// nyon mongs la
104b4(rnying rgyud): sogs rang sar dengs// ye shes dang gnas lhun gyis grub// gsal 'grib med pa'i nyams las kyang // sna tshogs shar grol rtogs pa 'char// blta ba'i gdeng chen rnyed pa 'byung // bsgom pa gshis lugs rang bab 'char// spyod pa
104b5(rnying rgyud): 'bad rtsol las 'das 'byung // 'bras bu ro dogs 'dzin pa bral// de kun lam gyi rtsal skyong ste// bdag don rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis// dang bsgom gdal ba lkug par 'char// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs chud nam mkha' klong
104b6(rnying rgyud): yangs las/ lamra nyams len pogs dbyung ba bstan pa'i le'u skyeso lnga pa'o// // / nyams len lam gyi rtsal 'byongs nas// cir snang grogs su shar nas kyang // 'bras bu btsa nas zin pa ni// snang srid 'khor 'dis chos rnams
104b7(rnying rgyud): klan// du ma ro gcig mnyam gnas pas// yangs pa chen po'i gnas lugs la// rang bab gshes la g.yo med bzhag/ rnam mkhyen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // srid pa yang mtha'i sems can kun// mnyam nyid gcig pa'i nga du ste// de bzhin/
105a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa// gdeng ldan na la 'byor pas// yang la dang mang la dogs// rad ga med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sAng sbrid thams cad d+ha yis gdab// gtadad ba med pa'i dang la gzhag/ gsal 'grib med pa 'dang la gzhag/ rang yan yin pa'i ngang la gzhag/ rangs
105a2(rnying rgyud): zin pa'i ngang la gzhag/ bcos bslad med pa'i dang la gzhag/ blang dang dor ba med par gzhag/ de ltar de 'i gnas lpags la// ye shes dang bsgom chen po zhes// 'bras bu btsunas zin pa ste// nam kun ye shes mchog gi dong //
105a3(rnying rgyud): nas dmigs su stsol// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klod yangs las/ 'brus bu ye gzhi'i steng du btsanas zin pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// m+b+hi// / gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don ldan zhing // phyir mi ldog pa'i gad
105a4(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// phrin las gzhan don 'byung byed pa'i// ngang las thugs rje'i rlabs g.yo zhing // lus la lus te rdo rje yi// rtsal cheni phal ma g.yos pa ltar/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'gyed pa dang // ya ma zung rnams ston pa'o// 'gag med ge lung gi rdul
105a5(rnying rgyud): 'phros pas// sgra la dbang 'byor tshungs pa'i dbyangs// gdul bya dpag tu med rnams kyi// so so'i skad du rnam par sgrogs// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// gdal bas don rtogs sprin grol byed// 'gyur med rol pa ye shes thugs// snatsho
105a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i lam rgyud du// re re la ni re rer snang // thams cad mkhyen lnga shugs las 'byung // 'gro 'dul rtsal snang dpag tu med// rtsol bral chen po'i 'gro don gyis// ngan song dong sdug chen por ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud
105a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' klong yangs las/ don thob the tshom med pa'i dgongs pa des 'gro don shugs 'byung du mdzad par bstan pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// // / spyod pa spyod nas don 'byung ba// yang dag don ni yang dag bshad// gang gis nyams su
105b1(rnying rgyud): len pa yi/ sa bu dang brtson snying rjer ldan// phongs med bdag lus thed la bor// re ltos tam dpag tsha med// 'jig rten chos la mthun mi 'jug/ snang ba'i chos la zhen mi chags// legs nyes rtsis gdab bral ba yi// yang dag nges pa'i
105b2(rnying rgyud): chos la 'dug/ snang zhen 'khri ba zad kyis bcad// gang la'ang nyam nga med par bya// spobs pa'i gzengs chen bstod pa gnad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ nyams su len pa'i gang zag bstan pa'i lo
105b3(rnying rgyud): so brgyad pa'o// / I// / yang dag blang dror med pa yi// chos mchog nyams len brtson pa'i gnas// rab la dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i// 'bring la gnyen zhing rtsub pa ste// tha mar rang mthun skyabs dang bstun// yam zung gi gnas rnam
105b4(rnying rgyud): su// nyams len drong dang mi ldan spang // 'jig rten skye bos bgrod pa'i sa// yid gnyis 'jug pas mi bsten spang // dam nyams gnas mal mi gtsangs// bslab la bar chad 'jug pas spang // mdor na skyon yon legs brtags te// dang po legs pa'i
105b5(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog btsal// de nas rang la rang shes nas// yang la sogs 'jigs pa spang // de nas brtan pa thob pa yis// nges med gnas kyi pad ma ris spang // tshong dus la sogs g.yeng ba'i sa// ma rungs lha 'dre mi gsum kun// 'bru srang 'dus chen po
105b6(rnying rgyud): bsnyen// des ni yang dag dron chen 'grub// nges pa rnyed nas gdeng chen thob// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ nyams len gyi gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / s+t+waM// / tshul ldan legs
105b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyes mchog de// dmigs pa'i gnas der slebs pa dang // rig pa rten dang phral nas kyang // sems nyid chos kyi dbyings su 'phang // mkha' ltar khyab pa'i ngang la gzhag/ gces 'dzin lus kyi gdung ba bcad// sa rdo lta bur lings kyis dong // ska
106a1(rnying rgyud): srid 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// byin tsam du bun gyis bsgyur// gtad med rig pa dbyings su sbyar// gyi nang snang zhan 'bye ba brgyad// yul med dmigs gtang bral byar bzhang // rdza nadang mi sogs 'ang
106a2(rnying rgyud): ba pa dang du bsgyur la btang // cog bzhag chen por la zag bcad// mdor na gdal ba chen po'i nga // mtha' bral yongs gro la gnad la gzir// glang dor la sogs blo las bskyung // bla ma yi dam ma pa'i 'gro thams cad rna
106a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa rten dang phral nas blta ba'i la thag gcad par bstan pa'i le'u hUM bzhi bcu pa'o// ste// / la thag chod pa'i dus nyid na// mi gtsang rdzas kyi phung po ste// bdag lus 'byung ba'i grong khyer ba shing // ye shes lha rnams dbyings su ra// dA
106a4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsir dmigs pas bsgyur// thugs rje rtsal gyi dgongs pa yis// lhas 'dod lnga la mchod byas shing // 'dres 'dod 'dre la ltos med sbyin// lan chags rigs drug sems can la// pha ma rgyal rtsod 'dren med sems kyis// yang khu 'jig sra
106a5(rnying rgyud): la sbyin// re dang ltos pa med pa yis// gang la sbyin dang gang gis sbyin// gang ltar sbyin pa'i tshul rnams kyi// 'du 'gro chos nyid bden pa'i mthu'i// dpung dang bcas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// kun kyang bden 'bras mchog la reg/ bla ma yi dam
106a6(rnying rgyud): mkho' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs chud nam mkha' klong yangs laswa/ bdag tog 'khrul ba'i gces 'dzin bshig nas wA 'dre'i 'khrul cha bcad pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// // / de ltar de la rab brtson pa// bdud dang bdud kyi ngas
106a7(rnying rgyud): mi dang 'a'adu gang yang ru/ 'dul na ma 'phrul dum mas// skabs kyi la gros khyod pan// de da pa dmigs pa gtad// bdag dang ban rgyan dbyer med sre// thams sams gyis bzung // bden na thong yang dun
106b1(rnying rgyud): gas// sa ya rdzogs pa lta la / gang 'brang dpa// dang ma dang ldan dupang / bdag gan dgas tu ga// bla na pa nang nga kyang // ga dang ga nga thal bas pas/ drag dang tu
106b2(rnying rgyud): bgyi'o// rnam grol legs pa'i lam la sbyor// byang chub chos kyis bon gdib/ las 'azas dkar po'i bu gachags pa dag/ bla ma mi dam ma byangang gro thams cad kyi drugs tud rnam sa ldang klong langs las/ ba gtan
106b3(rnying rgyud): rjes thog pa rjes btang ba'i le'u rkyen gnyis pa'o// // / gdod nas rnam dang / zhes mchog/ gtung gzhag bral ba'i gdeng thob nas// rdul N+DI rab tus pas yang min// zlob pa dang po la darjo sa ti laste// rje
106b4(rnying rgyud): grol gcig zag rjod// dgongs stong ma par lhur dag pa'i dang // gzhi rtsabral bar cig pazhig pa// cir snang rangasang grol ba yis// skang srid la khor 'das gtan pa phag// hU~M chud 'dre med dang garjod// skye sa zal sa kyi byings drim/
106b5(rnying rgyud): 'bru ba nag deb da // bzadang du mar gcigs// thar me dam pal dang ga thams cad kyi thugs rgyud rnamam par stong yangs pas/ dang med la par 'das thams cad nga byu gyi dul zag gca da nga yor 'dis gtan pa du 'bya ba'i 'di spyo /
106b6(rnying rgyud): gas pas sna ba skyed pa'i zlas// ma bamed par spyad pa'i dbus// du kyis thug pa zlang kyi mi // gang ga yul la smos pad+mag+sa// sa nga gis gzha da // bcos med pa'i
106b7(rnying rgyud): bas// gnas slebs gral gyi bya ba las// 'bod dang rtsol ba med tshul gyis// shugs la spyod pa gnad yin cing // ngag gi bre mo zungs zad pas// 'khrul pa yul phyir mi spro bar// smra brjod gtang gzhanag mad pa'i dang // rang bab mang du
107a1(rnying rgyud): tsan ne ba// ka ku shab shub med par gzhag/ ngag spyod bla med yang dag don// bklag dang sdebs su bsgrig par bya// yid dpyod nyon mongs rang gar min// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can gyis// rang grol gnyen po 'phang
107a2(rnying rgyud): med dang // 'bad bcas kyis ni lam du 'khor// gang la yang la khu 'phrig med// spyod pa babs mal nyid du spyod// spang blang dgag bsgrub med par gzhag/ rnam grol thabs dang ldan spyad pas// yang dag lam du 'jug pa'o// bra ma la dam ma
107a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ tshul chos 'dzin pa phral nas spyod pa rang bab tu bskyang bar bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// // yang dag don gyi lte ba dang // gnas lugs babs kyi ngang bskor
107a4(rnying rgyud): dang // bya rtsol bral ba'i spyod pa dang // gzhi thog phebs pa'i 'bras bu ste// gang dang gang la bsngags pa la// snyoms kyi 'dun pa 'dug mo 'dug/ mi 'dug thag chod snyems bral te// snyems bdud mchod lam la 'khyam// dang snyems dang la skad cig
107a5(rnying rgyud): gcad// gcad tshul gang shar rtog tshogs kun// bcing grol med pa'i lhag pa las// lhag ma med par la thag gcad// lhag mar bcas pa'i dmigs pa yis// snyems dang bcas te yid gnyis 'gyur// 'dun pa gang la gang gta nga // de dang
107a6(rnying rgyud): la der dmigs med// yang sa dang dog pa med par yang // mi bzo ba zo ba med par bzhag/ bzos pa'i chos kyang yid gnyis rgyu// re dang dogs par de 'gyur ro// 'khor dang 'das pa gang la yang // re ltos snyam ste ma med par gzhag/ ltos pa cad de re ba
107a7(rnying rgyud): rgyu// de la shugs kyis dogs pa 'byung // re dogs ltos pa can gyis ni// blta bsgom spyod 'bras 'jur bus bcings// 'jur bu'i mdu pa rang grol nas// gnyis 'dzin grongs 'das grangs mtha' zad// ming dang ming tshogs phung po zhig/ gnyis
107b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la 'das chen po'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ gnyis 'dzin blang dor gyi snyems thag gcad nas gnas lugs yang dag gi gdung zan bcanga' ba'i la ru su zhelnga pa'o// // @
107b2(rnying rgyud): bu yang dag mchog gi lam// bgrod par 'dod pa'i thog ma nyid// lus gaund rtsa ba'i dra ba brtag/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste// 'dus tshogs srid pa'i rtsa ba las// bag chags las kyi 'du 'phrod kyis// lus gcig blangs pa las kyi lus/
107b3(rnying rgyud): smin sha khrag phung po la// gnas lugs yang dag don bzhugs pas// ma dag las kyi rgyu rlung gis// 'phro 'du bya byed du ma spyod// des kyang 'khrul 'khor nyid du 'khor// de dag 'khrul 'khor bshig pa'i thabs// byang chub rgyun rlung dag pa'i gzhe
107b4(rnying rgyud): 'phro 'dus rdo rje'i lus bsgrub pa// mi 'gyur g.yung drung rdo rje'i sku// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// yi shes rtsal las byung ba yis// sbrul dang yang sprul gzhir snang zhing // sha khra ga la sogs du ma'o// de las lam snang ye shes kyi// grong
107b5(rnying rgyud): khyer rtsa yi dra mig ste// sdong po dang ni yal ga las// gyes shing mtshon pa mang du ste// 'khor lo lnga la sogs pa yi// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyang // thad ka zad ka'i khyim du gnas// so sor gang dang gang gi rten// spyi bo dang ni rkang pa'i
107b6(rnying rgyud): mthar// rnam par bkram nas don kun byed// grangs can dang ni grangs med pa// stobs dang stobs min khyad par ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ rdo rje'i lus gzhi rten du gyur pa las/ lam
107b7(rnying rgyud): rgyab rtsa'i 'char tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// hrI// gnas pa rtsal rgyu ba yi// rlung gi chags tshul rim pa las// rgyu dang rnam par rgyu ba dang // phra rags la sogs nam mang yang // nyi khri chig stong drug brgya las//
108a1(rnying rgyud): Na ba yan lag gnyis pa 'das/ rna ba lnga dang yan lag pa sa mang las kun rnam par byed// rnamam pa drung sa chung ngas// skabs kyi rnam byur d+ha byed pa// yang mthangs sa nyas thog dag/
108a2(rnying rgyud): byed las kyi rlung dang bcas// 'phro 'durnam par bkra ba las// las kun byed cing 'phen dang srung // byed zug srang gshong+ga sna tshogs las// phyi dang nang las kun tu d+ha// bzang ngan las kyi 'phro 'dra kun// rba rlabs mazung rab kya grags/
108a3(rnying rgyud): pa byas shing las kyis las// las la rnam par spel ba dang // srung ba dang yang 'khrugs mar ni// thog ma bar dang mtha' rim bzhin// g.yo ba can dang g.yo ba med// rab tu brtan pas las kun byed// las dang las ma yin pa dang // las las/
108a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phros pa dang // byang chub lam gyi rtsal nyid kyang // de dang de las rnam par 'byung // phra mo la sogs thun mong gi// sbyor ba dpag tu med pa yang // de yi rnam grangs thabs las 'byung // de dag mkhas pas shes par bya// grang rdzob
108a5(rnying rgyud): dang ni don dam gyi// nor gyi snying po sbrel dang sdung // de dang de yi shugs las 'byung // g.yas dang g.yon du 'jo ba dang // mnyam par rab tu gnas pa las// de yi yan lag yab dang yum// gnyis med mnyam par gnas pa rnams// du
108a6(rnying rgyud): las ma g.yos las la sbyar// ske 'chigs chung na sogs kyis// skye dang sbed pa'ang de dang de'i// byed pa phra dgas las byung bas// btson du 'dzin dang rtsal sbyong dang // dus la babs tshwa las sbyor gyi// 'byin 'jug bsrel ba'i las la

108b1(rnying rgyud): dang gas pa dums pad// sa sand sonas las na du mal bcan pas 'a// sa songam sa pal thosasas dposags ma sa sa/ rlugacub dang blang ba cud pa ma gnadang tha du

108b7(rnying rgyud): gnad dang ldan pa yis// nges par la lo med par brtsam// mchog dang de bzhin thun mong sogs// gang 'dod 'bras bu nges par 'byung // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ kun rdzob cu'i

110b7(rnying rgyud): babs kyang // bde ba'i ye shes 'phel grogs byed// zug du med pa'i yon tan gyi// rnam pa dpag med lus la 'byung // dag la bdebang bar ba ni// rlung la rang dbang 'byor thob pas// ring dang thung dang garang gtad du// nges par lam du 'gro ba dang // nus pa'i/
111a1(rnying rgyud): // stobs 'bar gre ldeng de// stan mthun rang gzhan kun dgar byed// yid bde drug rngu kun dang bral// dga' ba bzhi dang ye shes lnga// nyams kyi rtsal chen 'bar bar 'gyur// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum dang // de dang de yi rol pa las// bde ba zag bcas
111a2(rnying rgyud): zag pa med// d+hA du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i// 'grus pa rnam par grol 'gyur te// mtshan dang dpe byung can du rgyus// hrI nang gsang pa'i brdadon 'grod// rnam mi ma mkha' 'gro thams ched ci thugs rnye rnamam / 'di nyams chang nga
111a3(rnying rgyud): skyed lnga pa'o// auM// don myong ba gnyis pa la// gyi nang gzhan sogs gsal ba yis/ nyams le ni gnod kyi ngos zin 'gyur// spyi drugs le dang nang dugs la// de las gzhan pa rags pa ste// mdzin sum pa dang rnams spang dang // rang bag 'on
111a4(rnying rgyud): sogs// dbang po'i spyod yul gang la yang // nye ring med par gsal la sogs// rnam par bkra la rig byed gsal// phyogs dang ris sum chad pa// mnyam pa nyid du drang ba ba gsal// dgag dang bsgrub pa med par ni// sa li trig ge lha ma med// lha yang napa phyag
111a5(rnying rgyud): sku mdog bcas// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba dang // 'od zer rab tu 'gro ba yang // rang snang zer dang bcas pa las// gyis 'byung ba dang yang dag gsal// gzung dang 'dzin pa med par gsal// g.yo 'dul padang tog med pang gsal// rang gzhan dbyed med 'dres pa
111a6(rnying rgyud): gsal// sangs rgyas se can med par dgas pa// rab mnyam grangs pa chen po la// dgag dang bsgrub pa med par yang // rang snang dag nyi dgas labs// ba mo mun sangs e s+ya ho// ma mings mkha' 'tsha thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mang spong yA
111a7(rnying rgyud): gal ta mas 'chang bar basbyin pa'i ladu steng drug pa'o// g+ha// / gsum pa gnas lugs mchog tu// stod nyams zhen pa mid 'char ba// bde dang gsal ngag po med par// rtog stong pa'i ye shes kyis// mnyam nyid dang la gnas ra 'gyur// gas dang sme ba'i dang bzhin//
111b1(rnying rgyud): u sug pan su/ ga // sa sa / na / sa gzhu/ sa su su/ ma /
111b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'a byu da/ nga ngas pa/ da kyil thal ba gyu // sa dang sa men thal bya'o// gi swA na la gar y-i// ngos pa pan nyid 'drug// 'jal pa dag pa sa /
111b3(rnying rgyud): tAM// mi stong dag pa'i snong do la nas// rtag gcig hU~M kun gshis la shAr+ya// shang ba de ny-i da krol// de ltar bdegs la spyod pa'i dang // ma ga le shes tha ma yin// bla ma lci ma mkha' thams cad kyi thugs kyad nam mkha' slong ba sam/ song
111b4(rnying rgyud): yi dag gad la khrab tu bstan pa'i gyen sted bdun pa'o// // bde spyong rnag pa med pa'i// ye shes rangs sbyin pa'i gnad// gshes la g.yo ba stod bzhin pa// bcas bcos bapo skyed ldag pa'i klong // rang gas la nyid kyi gnas par gzhag// bdag rkyen
111b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan na dang // de bzhin du thongam rnaMms gcig mug N+DI brgyan len pa'i phyir// de dag dang bab pa tsas med pa // ra nga gnas las nas med du// dalal pa ba nas gzhag pa las// dang ba dag pa dang bar druganas// tham brtan pa yong pa cig/
111b6(rnying rgyud): ts+tsha la gas las// la sbed dpag tu med shar bas// snang ba chos sgra mnyam pa nyid// longs zhugs ladag rkyen dang zlal// l+h+wam bu la pa 'gag med las// yang sprus tshe 'phrul bcas pa snang // zhugs sa yi shes nyid las// rmyang na 'das da cang na dru
111b7(rnying rgyud): nas mya ngan 'das pa // gas pa'i 'bras chu yang dag go// gnas rlabs bral gyi 'bras bu yang // tshel dbas kyi yob pa dang // mang sa rgyad nying la dbang 'byur ba// na mo gang dang gang ngagarnams// rjem med rang byung sdug par // 'dod nga 'dod chags rnam

112b1(rnying rgyud): la/ ga rtso lta bu'i man dag go// zlum pa dam ma kha' 'grothams cad kyi byud nam mkhar klong yangs las/ byung chub lagacis gags la ba'i le ste dag pas// / mam mam ma nan ngas// ma ldan dag med nga gyi/ tsu po phyog pas// ma
112b2(rnying rgyud): 'dral don du// yang dag mthar thug theg pa'i chos// gdul bya gang dang gang 'tshams pa// so sor ba lta bsgom spyod 'bras bcas// gzhi sdang pe shes chen po'i gnang // gdod nas dge pa'i ying snying mchog/ dri med la ma mchig bzod pa'i thabs// rgo ba med pa'i brgya sa bul sa dzod rgyu krung byu /
112b3(rnying rgyud): gsung las chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog// zug rje brtso ba chen po yis// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// lhung der rtsal bas rjes yi rang // bdag cag sprul pa'i 'khor dang yang // yang 'khor gdul bya'i zhing gyur pa// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi dang dri bskul bum so Ta// rjes su yi rang mngon par bstod// bla ma
112b4(rnying rgyud): yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thug rgyang nam mkhang klod yangs las/ rjes su le re shing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// sI// g+sa kyi brdung dri ma med pa'i rgyang kyi rgyal po nam mkha' klong yangs zhes bya ba/ bdag 'dra drang byung gnas kyis bsgyur brdzog so// ta na gadreg pa sde brgyad tshogs kyis bka'i byang
112b5(rnying rgyud): gter dun bka' la ram chod gzu lu pa byed pa byung na dbang po sdug+ha/ sa ma ya/ n+ya h+ya n+ya/ d+ha thi ma/ bdag 'dra sangs rgyas rdo rjes me mo yos kyi lo dkun blab rgyang glang gA'i tshes brgyad yos kyi nyi ma 'brug gi dus su blad kAr dung gi sgo mo klu ba tsan gyi gnas sgo nas gdan drangs pa'o// rdzas snod ni klus phul ba'i rdorje'i 'dagang las byas shig g+ha'i
112b6(rnying rgyud): gos kyis spun bsres shing / mthing rtsis byug pa'i ga'u ste/ 'di lus la bcangs pa tsam gyis mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi mthong ba'i sgrib shing du 'gyur bas/ lha sras nyid kyi lus la bcang bar bya zhing / rgyud kyi shog dril lung bstan dkar chag zem byang / gser gyi rdo rje nor bu rin chen rnams/ rtsa brgyad 'dzin gyi
112b7(rnying rgyud): ru'i lag tu 'grim par byas sam// mchog gi rnal 'byor pa gang rung gi lag tu gtad de// bstan pa'i btsas su ma 'phyags par chongs shig/ de dag gal te ya bral zhing 'thor na byin rlabs kyi rgyud zam 'chad par 'gyur ro// / sa ma ya/ d+ha tha~Mm/
113a1(rnying rgyud): #/ u D+yan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ nag sa k+sha Tha ga/ k+Shargya ga skad du/ g+hu rba d+he wa DAka ni sman suNatat+t+wa shA sa na yatwA nA ma/ bod skadadu/ bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi man tan ni spyad bstan pa sgrog/ yang sa
113a2(rnying rgyud): b+ha ba/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gsung gi pad+ma la phyog 'tshal lo// bdi gshegs rgyal ba thams cad kyi// su dang gsung dang thugs rjor// mau 'gyur sprul pa'i 'a
113a3(rnying rgyud): kyis// rab tu bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gtso// dpag med rtul po snang mtha' las// ston pa gzi brji dbal 'bar ba// gtso'akhor mnyam par bzhugs pa'i dus// yang dag rnam par bkrab yi// bo phreng lhun por brtsegs pa'i gnas// rab bzang brtseg
113a4(rnying rgyud): bzangs su// gdul bya rnam pa du ma la// 'dul byed thabs kyi phan lag mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi yan lag tu// thun mong gang dang gang dgos rnams// ljags kyi dbang po la bkram nas// brtse bar dgongs nas gsung du gsol// de ltar gdung bas zhus pa ya
113a5(rnying rgyud): sngon pas dgongs nas bka' stsal pa// zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs thun mong las kyi rigs// phra mo'i sbyor ba rim gyis gsungs// bla ma lingam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi hud bsten pa'i thog shing las/ gleng gzhi
113a6(rnying rgyud): s+t+waM dang po'o// I// bla med byang chub bsgrub pa la// lam gyi mthun gyen pa sgrub rgya'i phyir// thun ming thabasaM kyi las rnams kun// stobs dang ldan pa'i blos thus brtsam// 'bras bu drug sum byed pa'i lam// mthun rkyen
113a7(rnying rgyud): yan lag tu// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba brtsam// de don 'grung gang 'bras bu gsum// gdon mi za bar smin par 'gyur// de ltar las kyi dang pon// byin rlabs dngos grub phrin las rnams// 'byung phyir rtse ba'i bsgrub pa bya// dang pa mos gus shus gyur pa//
113b1(rnying rgyud): thA ma rgyan dang cha lugs can// sku gsum po mtshan dpes sbrus// gnas wA la sogs yan lag mthil// rtse gcig ma yengs mdung tshugs bsgom// bdag lus sbrum 'gyong khyer 'di// yi ma zhi dang khro bo'i tshul// gang 'dod dba' badzad lda na/
113b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed// rtsa gnas pa spu'i grong khyer du// rigs kyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// grangs med rtsis las 'das pa yang // rang rang rgyan dang cha lugs bcas// rigs kyi mdog can phyag mtshan 'dzin// sbrul dang yang sprul bcas pa yang // gzhan yang da
113b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dad pa'i lha// sprul pa la sogs dpag med rnams// snad la rang bzhin ma grub par// gsal la gling g.yogs med par bskyed// oM AHhUM hrIH/ badz+ra g+ha ru d+he wa DA k+ki ni sarba sid+d+hi pha la hUM a/ sgra zur ma nyams dag par bzlas// mi gyo'i bar du gyi ltar te/
113b4(rnying rgyud): snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzab tu sgrogs// de nas ngal du ba skyo ba'i tshe// nang ltar gsang sngags shu ba zur bzlas// dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'bad// de dag klong du gyur pa dang // gsang ba phye med rdo rje yi// bzlas pa rlung gi 'khor lo bskor// tha ma pi dam
113b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro la// dngos grub blang ba'i dmigs pa yang // dus gsum la sogs skabs suzla// des ni phyi nang gsang pa'i rtags// rab 'bring tha ma rim pa bzhin// dngos nyams rmi lam nyid du skye// rab 'dring zam 'di ltar 'byung // sku ston gsung sgrogs rnams 'gyur
113b6(rnying rgyud): de la sprul pa du ma'o// dadus rang sems rang ba ba rmod// dgag bsku bu la sogs yid gnyis sbyang // 'di ni don chan dam pa ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod gtor 'bral// rdzas dang dmigs pa la sogs pa'i// thabs kyi yon lag mang po yang // r-ig na
113b7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas spyod sems la// dbang byar thob pa rnams kyis kyi// de nas ni rgyas dbang drag sogs// las dang las kyi sbyor ba rnams// rang 'dod bral zhing spyo ba med// s+t+rI byang chub sems ldan pas// rang dbang thob nas mchis brgya/
114a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' shugs rang dang ldan par bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rtsa ba'i bslab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// s+t+wa~M// / dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
114a2(rnying rgyud): pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro ye// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// rin rjen tshon sring po'i thabs// tho rangs mi tshig ma 'dres dus// bdag nyid snang ba mtha' yas sku// dmar gsal mdang sa dz+nyAn ma rnyeng gnag mngo/
114a3(rnying rgyud): cho bram bcud ldan can gyis sbas// longs sku'i cha lugs ldan pas bsnams// dus gsum rgyal ba bkug nas ni// bdag nyid tshe bum bcas la bsgrim// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na A yu dz+ye b+h+rUM swA hA/ de ltar brgya stong la sogs bzlas// rin chen tshe yi dngos grang zang /
114a4(rnying rgyud): phya ma gdal dmigs med dang la bzhag/ tshe 'phel dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ tshe sring pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// hrI// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnab 'byor pas/
114a5(rnying rgyud): bla ba yi ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dung ni yan+ta lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// bsod nams rgyas par byed pa'i thabs// zla rgyas bco lnga'i dus kyi tshe// bzhi mnyam dar ser dri med la// bdag lus rin chen gser gyis bres// yang snying rtsa
114a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags kyi mthar// purbA dz+nyA na puSh+TaM ku ru ai swA hA/ khri 'bum la sogs ci 'grub bzlas// sna tshogs dar dang rin chen bcas// mi yis mu mthong lus la 'chung // bsod nams mda' thang rab rgyas nas// 'gro ba'i kha lo yid bzhin bskur// bla ma yi dam
114a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi drung bsten pa'i srog shing las/ bsod nams rgyas par byed pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// s+the// dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rba ba dang ni lan lag gi// brten pabasgrub
114b1(rnying rgyud): gtan la pheb byas te// longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa'i thabs// skar margyal la brdungs pa yi// gser gyi byang bu mig dgu pa// gsu yi pra can dang dmar dril// mi lag mi 'brim lus la 'chang // bde gshegs rigs lnga la sogs pa'i// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro//
114b2(rnying rgyud): rnams// yang yang bcug nas byang bur bstim// mA sngags pa su'i gsham can bzlas// dpal 'byor longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bskrun pa'i srog shing las// longs spyod 'phel ba'i thabs bstan pa'i
114b3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// b+hi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// 'gro ba 'du bar byed pa'i thabs// zangs kyi byang bu sor bzhi la// mtshal gyis snang ba mdzang /

114b5(rnying rgyud): srog shing las/ 'gro ba dbang du bsdu ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la phab byas te// dpal dang gzing rjid rgyas pa'i
114b6(rnying rgyud): thabs// thabs shes byang sems dkar dmar la// rin chen mtshal gyis kha tshar btags// sman mchog rgyal po gser mdog can// sbyor ba bsres pa'i ril bu ni// ri dwags tha ba'i ril ma tsam// brgyad dngo rtsa brgyad byas pa la// rtsa sngags 'bum gyis rar blad pas/
114b7(rnying rgyud): nang ma brgyadangadu rtsa brgyad dadu// mi lagam brgyad kyi stong byung // dkyil 'khor lhags pa dpa' shugs bskyed// dpal da ngag zi brjid cas par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkhang 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan kyi rgyang bstan pa'i thog shing 'as/ dpal dang gzi brjid kyis
115a1(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi 'du ste bdun pa'o// / dad panan ldan pa'i nal byod pas// bla ma yi dmam 'a'asam// zla ba dang ni pan+d+ha wAs // badz+rAn brdzubag na k+Sha brgya te// chos kyi skye grags thogs gangs// rang rdzas da
115a2(rnying rgyud): mchod rten bsgom// ngag ni A li kA le bsgom// med sems kyi gnas lugs ni// skabs ma brjod pa la dang la bdag/ ma A/ i s+yai/ u m+mA/ r-i r-I/ l-il+lA/ a ma~M/ oM ma~M/ oM am kA khwag sbyang/ dz+yo dz+haiH/ Tag tAnA \u0f7f/ ta zad d+han/ pa
115a3(rnying rgyud): ya ra la la/ shaM Sh+Ta sa heT+Ta/ khri 'bu ma bar du dag bcad bzlas// chos kyi stan grags 'thob par 'gyur// tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chos kyi stan grags thob pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
115a4(rnying rgyud): dadabacon ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsku ba gtan la pheb byas te// 'gro ba byams par byed pa'i thabs// nye ring med pa'i sems can la// byams dang snying rje la sogs pa// tshad med bzhi bsgom skabs
115a5(rnying rgyud): 'ogagazug/ rang nyid mtsho skyes rdo rjer ba sgom// snying po sngags kyi 'a ba dbyungs bzlas// rang sems ni mo med dri rgyal ltar// g.yo 'phrul med pa'i dang la gzhag/ 'dod zhen la sogs dngos 'dzin srung // 'byor tshogs longs spyod tshogs su gtad// rlob pa rnam/
115a6(rnying rgyud): ni dodari dgas dor// 'gro ba tha dang blams shing 'dra// yeng 'ong bkur sti byed par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bskrun pa'i srog shing las/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi byams par byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// I/ da
115a7(rnying rgyud): brtson ldan pa'i nal 'byor bas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'grol// rtsa ba dang ni lan lag gi// bstan pabasru gtan la pheb byas te// mthu rgyal che bar byed pa'i thabs// rang nyid stobs kyi rgyal por bsgod// rtsa sngags mthu pa'a'i gsham// mang du bzlas shing lus rgyal
115b1(rnying rgyud): dz+yo // glang canan dngam byas 'khrugs// ga sum drung te ma dzad// smras pag nag can thun thugs go// sras stobs rab rgyas par 'gyur// thag sna mam par 'gro thams ca kyi na tan rlung brtan pa'i thog shing lag/ stob pa dang ma cang ra/
115b2(rnying rgyud): rnyed pa thabs bstan pa'i 'a gyi bcuba'o// / dang btsun ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// blam phyed mam pa' dmo pa// ca bdung ni panA ga gi// btsun pasdu gtan 'phe rgyas te// da don tu bsgrib pa sog pas// seman kyi
115b3(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'i thabs// rnadzo sbyin cig pa rnam par bya// blang mib la dgang lasags pa// zhing nying rnams rgyum po gyig// bdag sbyid ljid rgyal bye// me byur thub cu mi lda dang// mas pa gyu babyed dag ba gas pa// ti 'phyogs 'du sa shr-I /
115b4(rnying rgyud): den dgrasu ma dag gi bskye rje sa dbu'// Na thugs ni pa'i sham gyu can// mang du khrus la ci 'dod bya// zhi ba'i sprin las gzho bar gyi// ci byu mamyod gtor la sogs kyis// nya rnams dkyis shing ma pa ba dang // mi mdun rdzogs rnams 'a bar
115b5(rnying rgyud): ma med rnamangs thams pa kyis na med pa stu 'i phog ga las 'i kyin theg na cu gcigapa'o// dud ci ldan pa'i napa gyu ngas/ rnama'i da ma pal rdzog// ba dang ni ldan 'gab/ ban pa b+hab ba napa
115b6(rnying rgyud): rmadang 'ongs spyod 'ag srung // yon tan nus par byed pa'i byas// rnam pa'i sbyin ma sa dag 'a'abad// 'bras pa can gyi shi rnams la// dul brtsi ga zlabs tha bzhi cig/ ra nus pa'i bya ba byed do// mthab sa skyes gas pa'o//
115b7(rnying rgyud): rmim po'i sbyi la ba 'i ngo bskyed// dasang rdzog pa chen zigs pa// long khyod byur ba'i san sa byug/ rdzugs rgyam pa sham thucan// mang brnas pad don gsol ba ga pa// rgyas nga dzin las gzhal bar gyi// gzhan pang mchod pa stod pang srung /
116a1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta smra rnas / smras// / ma sa / / rna / na/
116a2(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la theb byas te// lha 'dre mi gsum la sogs pa// snang srid dbang du sdud pa'i thabs// 'od ltar dbang gi sbyin sreg bya// tsan+dan mjo mo shing sogs kyis// dpang
116a3(rnying rgyud): dal zla gam dag tu brtsig/ rang nyid dbang gi rgyal gyis// thab tu lha rnams dmar por bskyed// me tog dmar po sna tshogs dang // mngar gsum la sogs bza' btung dbul// rtsa sngags dbang gi sham bA can// ci 'grub bzlas shing 'gugs pa yi// gang 'dod dmigs
116a4(rnying rgyud): pa drug tu gzir// dbang du sdud pa'i phrin las gzhol// dbang rdzas dbang gi mchod sogs rnams// gang 'os dbul ba'i las rnams bya// gang dmigs dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan kyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbang
116a5(rnying rgyud): gi sbyin sreg gi le'u skye bcu gsum pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i las// drag po'i las kyi sbyin sreg mi//
116a6(rnying rgyud): brnag cing gtum pa'i 'dun pas bya// gang la dmigs pa'i rU pa thi// steng du seng ldeng la sogs pa'i// drag po'i shing gis gru gsum brtsig/ me sbar khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// thab tu drag po'i lha rnams kun// ljang gu la sogs mthing nag bskyed// dmigs bya'i
116a7(rnying rgyud): rUrlub zag rdzas dang // dug khrag sha chang la sogs dbul// rtsa sngags drag po'i sham can bzlas// bskal zhing gzir ba'i las rnams bya// bsad cing brlag pa'i phrin las gzhol// dmigs bya gang yin thul bar 'gyur// gang yang las kyi kha skong rnams// rig rtsal
116b1(rnying rgyud): na / na/ sun su /
116b2(rnying rgyud): sa
116b3(rnying rgyud): ma na ga
116b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
116b5(rnying rgyud): sa sa
117a1(rnying rgyud): kun sgyed// 'du sa ga ga sa// / dz+ra nga spyanan// dwags pas sa pa // sa na / mas bag/ nganas byu pa dang /
117a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi mtshon cha yi// gru pang rab tu bskor bar bya// gnod byed gang gis mi tshugs bsrudang+ge// sa brtan rdo rje la lam mo// grAm yi mamakha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chung ba'i ling ste bcu drug pa'o//
117a3(rnying rgyud): rtsibs stong 'ar ba'i dbus// bdag nyid dadang chen 'bar bang bskyed// yongs dril rtsa ba'i sngags kyi thar// gnod byed bye mas na mAr la bzlog byed/ ga ci ta par bahU~MH/ bad zang byang ma dag shed dang bratho ba/ byad pa rang bung dngu rtso
117a4(rnying rgyud): su
117a5(rnying rgyud): bdog/ blam yi dam ma pa' 'grothams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing dus/ bzlog pa'i le ste bcu bdun pa'o// sl-i/ dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor des// b+h+ra ma yi dmam pa' 'gro yi// rtsub dang ni yan lag ga// bsnyen bsgrub ga
117a6(rnying rgyud): pheM ba byas te// spang ba'i dag dang gdod pa'i bgegs// spyir drags dpar byed papa'i sa// btul zhugs ldan pas brtsam par bya// rongs drug shog la sogs la// dmigs bya'i dru bdug khrag gis// skye ma ched do bar bris pa la// drilas gang
117b1(rnying rgyud): dgra bo bskyed// dri las gang dmigs 'dre bskyed cing // dmigs pas gnod byed bkug la bstim// drug khrag lcags phye til nag gi// thun gyis zab cing drag sngags brjod// rang nyid dbang chen 'bar bar bskyed// oM hA ya bI wa hU~M phaT/ dgra 'a gegs gcod
117b2(rnying rgyud): byed mA ra ya/ srog dung tshal ba rbad/ nI tri tsit+taM mA ra ya myog rbad dza dza/ srog la a mu ka hur Tu ma mA ra ya rbad phaT dza/ zhes pa drag myur bzlas pa yis// dbang chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// sprul pa dpag med 'phros pa yis// mtshon thogs dgra ga tub brlag
117b3(rnying rgyud): par bsam// thul rtags las grub ling ro bsreg/ dgra bgegs gad la bya ba zul// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gsod pa'i las kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// IM// / dad brtson ldad
117b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed dgra bgegs gnan pa'i thabs// mdze pho rabs chad thod pa ru// dmigs bya'i gzugs bri ming bcas gzhug/ rnam par shes pa
117b5(rnying rgyud): bkug la bstim/ lcags sgrog 'bar bas byad du gzhug/ drag po'i rdzas kyi thun brdeg cing // gnod byed che ge mo kA ya wAka tsit+ta mA ra ya/ staM b+ha ya/ nA sha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ nan nan/ oM laM hUM laM mA ra ya phaT/ ces pas drag tu bzlas nas kyang // ro ras nag pos dril
117b6(rnying rgyud): bar bya// tshon skud sna lngas byad du gzhug/ mchod rten rnying pa'i rmang du mnan// g.yo ba med par non par 'gyur// dus gza' drag po'i thebs dang sprad// bskal pa'i bar du ldang mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing
117b7(rnying rgyud): las/ mnan pa'i le'u skye bcu dgu pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// gnod byed skrod par byed pa'i thabs// rang nyid dbang chen
118a1(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba yis// dargyal ldan pa'i mdun nyid du// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor skyed // dmigs bya gang yin sdigazir bskyed// de la rnam shes ba// gal bstim// gnod byed tshig mo las smug gta la ya ya Ta b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes pa dag
118a2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa yis// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab g.yos pas// dmigs bya rang dbang med par bskyod// 'jig rten gzhan du byer bar dmigs// de ltar las sbyor lan gsum gyis// gang la byas pa yul gzhan du// dbang med las kyis bskyod par byed// bla ma yi
118a3(rnying rgyud): dam mkha' gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las// bsnyad pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// zlu ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// brten bslab gtan la theb
118a4(rnying rgyud): byas te// gang zhig dbang du byed pa'i las// skye 'gro po rnams 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yid rgyal gyis// dmigs bya'i gzugs byas ming dus bcas// rang gi mal 'og dong du gzug/ zangs phye ma bya'i khrag gis zab// rnam par shes pa dgug
118a5(rnying rgyud): bstim ning // chege mo a ku sha wa ts+yai hrI rdzing / zhes pa rtsa sngags shum thar gdugs// zhag gsum dzes bzhir ling+ga bton// sin+d+hu rarA dang kyi sgyeb dang // myos byed rang gI d+hi chu'i nang // spangs pa'i khu ba gang dmigs kyi// lus la gtor ba mkhong du btang /
118a6(rnying rgyud): gang zlab skyes pa dbang du 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi byud bstan pa'i srog shing lam/ skyes pa 'bugs pa 'i le'u ste ti gcig pa'o// wi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// b+h+ra ma yid ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsub
118a7(rnying rgyud): dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// skye 'gro ma rnams 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen 'bar bar bskyed// mdun du dmigs bya'i rlung ni// bag zan dag la bcos pa'i nang // gang dmigs meng dus bris la gzug/ zangs
118b1(rnying rgyud): gzhong nang gzhug dkrug bstim bya// che ge mo nr-i aM kra sha sa rba zhing rdzing / dung ngung bud med kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa wa shrI ku ru hUM/ zhes pa zhag gsum bzlas pa'i tshe// d+ha dur dang yungs kang dang // gong mo'i khrag gis thun zab cing // nus pa rang gi dri rgyas skangs/
118b2(rnying rgyud): zhig nas dmigs bya'i 'grim lam gnan// rang dbang med par khrug par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi skud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ bud med 'gugs pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// s+thi// dad brtson ldan pa'i
118b3(rnying rgyud): dpyor pas// bla ma yI dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gang zhig 'byung po 'gugs pa'i thabs// dug shog dag la gang dmigs kyi// 'byung po'i gzugs bris byad du gzhug/ pheM ni gnan gzan rjod par
118b4(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ mo ni nu puSh+TinAng du gzhug/ bdag nyid khro ba'i de rgyal gyis// dmigs bye dgug bstim yang yang bya// gnod byed chege mo tri a~M kra sha dzaH/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ de ltar rtsa sngags sham bu can// bzlas shing drug khrag hU~Mng+ga gyis drab// 'byung po yI dwags
118b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// rang dbang med per khugs nas ni// ci bcol las byed thul bar 'gyur// ling ga lha rten 'og rgya ste// las grub rang gnas bskyod pa yis// gnod na drag po'i las le sbyor// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing
118b6(rnying rgyud): leste// dbyung po 'gugs pa'i le'u ste ter gsum pa'o// sti// / dad bcon ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// zlu ma yi ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bslab gtan la phyeb byas te// nor rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i thabs// rang ti
118b7(rnying rgyud): lha ming rgyal gyis// zangs sogs rin chen na ma tog/ nang du 'bru sa rin chen dang // sman sde dar thab lasags pa// longs spyod rdzas dang nor gyi ming // rtsa sngags ga shes chen mtshal kyis bri// sna tshogs gtsug cing mdun du bzhag/ 'jig rten 'ams byed
119a1(rnying rgyud): sa// sa sa smra// sasmras // / na/
119a2(rnying rgyud): bdag la bla zhing nam tha sa// sbyin chungs// kying sa kyim pa ts+tsha// hrI med pa ba tha mas kyi na tan rnang brtan pa'i rdzog ga las/ nam thasas 'i gyi na //
119a3(rnying rgyud): rlu ldan pa na pa khyon pas// tham yi ma gapa// ni ba da na lan gas// btsun pa gan la ma te// bca rgyang dgas par byed pa'i sa// bdeg byed ky-i y-i rgya / nga/
119a4(rnying rgyud): ni// smram na ma brjid// TIdA 'di gas ngas pa rgyu sang / 'jis rgya zung // dag gsu ba da ba pa 'digags// rtsa ba'i thegs dang bdus pa'o// ma
119a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis mdzod// rje/ bdud ci de la la sgom// dngos grub chen po'i ngas spyang rigs// bdu rje'ang nyid dgas pa bcang // dpani bza brdung 'dra bar 'gyur// gang byung longs spyong tshogs su 'byud// bla ma yi dmam pa 'thob mas na
119a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyu bsnun pa'i srog shing sdes/ bcwa bkyang khrugs pa'i lang+gA ra lda // / dang badzin ldan pa na pa byor bas// blam snye mam par rlom// ba dang na ma 'ag+sa// brdzun pa pa gsa' gyusate// gos dngas
119a7(rnying rgyud): par byid pa'i thabs// rnams pa'i khya gas pa zhing // dka sa ma sbe da ci rigs// mchog paras skul la sogs kyi// zod pa ngos pa po ge hU~M// den can gsar dam mtsha kyis ze// nang blo can gyi mdang la gags// las byeng dbyeng dang
119b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' mar gzug/ b+hU ma yi dam mkha' 'gro mchod// rtsa sngags bzlas shing dngos grub zhu// de dag mdzad kyi yang thug sa// rgyun du 'dod gsol smon lam gdab// dar thab snam ras la sogs pa// gos rnams shugs kyis 'dru bar 'gyur// rang 'dod 'khrib ca
119b2(rnying rgyud): zhen pa bskyang // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gos 'grugs pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// sgra// / dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag sa/
119b3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gzhan yang gang dang gang dag gi// 'dod yon dmigs bya 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi ngar ldan pas// gang 'dod rdzas kyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang bcas pa gser gyis bri// dar dmar khung du dril byas te// 'dod
119b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha mo de la bstim// rtsa sngags ha ri ni sa'i mthar// che ge mo wa shaM ku ru hri swA hA/ mang bzlas mchan khung g.yon du bcangs// ming byang tsan+dan dmar po yi// byang bud dag la bri ba ste// dbang skud spel tshig dag kyang bkod// byang bu'i tshad ni sor bzhi'o// des ni
119b5(rnying rgyud): gang dmigs dngos su 'du// tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyad bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rdzas 'gugs pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag
119b6(rnying rgyud): gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// yid 'ong bu mo 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen nga rgyal gyis// dri med dar dmang mtho skor la// khye'u'i byang sems dkar po dang // rgya mtshal dang ni d+ha du ras// gang dgug gzugs dang ming byang bri// nr-i dang bcas
119b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i las sngags brjod// ha lo khug chos glang po'i sna// me tog gsum gyi khu bas byug/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi mtha' bsgyur du// che ge mo niganal neg nal phra mo thun phra mo thun/ hi shang bram khug dung nr-i swA hA/ zhes pa zhag gcig bzlas nas ni// dbang shes gos kyi
120a1(rnying rgyud): skAr ba yas// nang med 'ong tham 'dra// blam yi dam mkha' ga thams da m+b+ha na tan kyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog she las/ thu mo grags pa'i lan ter brgyad par/ dud bdan ldan pa rna byong
120a2(rnying rgyud): brA prA yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bslab gtan la pheb byas te// zas nor longs spyod sris spyi'i thabs// drug po'i rang thag ste phye dang // btsad po'i dris phyeskam po dag// bsre ba'i tsha tsha bzhengs pa gnyis// dar sdes dril la ba sung dzan/
120a3(rnying rgyud): dza yi gA 'ur bcug la sgra// ten 'brel de yi sbyor ba la// btin nas sris sme 'phel bar 'gyur// tham yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rlung bstan pa'i srog shing las/ sris 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste nyer dbu pa'o// // dad rtson
120a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// lha rnams kun gyis bkur ba'i thabs// zangs sogs rin chen byung bu la// lha rnams kun gyi gzugs bris te// dngos bskyed sbyin 'dran
120a5(rnying rgyud): bzhug bstim bya// rta sngags bzlas shing dar snas gril// rang gi dmigs rten zhabs su swa// cung zad gnad la dbab par bya// des ni lha rnams kun gyis bkur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ lha rna mas kun
120a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bkur bar byed pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub pa tan la pheb byas te// mi rnams kun gyis bkur ba'i thabs// tA la'i lo ma la
120a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// gtsang ma'i shing gi lo ma la// skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis// yi ge nr-i gcig bris pa'i mthar// yongs 'dus rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor// gzhan yang yi dam lha sngags dang // mtshal gyi A yi kA li bri// de dag dar snas dril byas te// sa sna
120b1(rnying rgyud): dgu yi n+ya tsha dang // lhan cig lha rten zhabs swA swa// rnal 'byor mi rnams yangs kyis bkur// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mi thams cad kyis bkur bar byed pa'i thabs kyi laT lta so gcig pag
120b2(rnying rgyud): dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phreb byas te// mi ma yin gyis bkur ba'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// spre'u dar ma'i thod pa ru// pha bong long bu'i
120b3(rnying rgyud): thug la// mtshal gyis yi ge tri bris gzhug/ lha 'dre mang po'i ming byang yang // gser dang mtshal gyis bris pa rnams// ze 'og khrug ma'i nang du gzhug/ rtsa sngags bzlas shing bkug bstim bya// rang nyid gang du gnas pa yi// yi dAm lha rten 'og d+ha swa/
120b4(rnying rgyud): tu mi ma yin gyis bkur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi chung bstan pa'i srog shing laswa/ mi ma yin thams cad kyis bkur bar byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// ste// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// za ma yi ma
120b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// blo dar shes rab 'phel ba'i thabs// ga bur tsan+dan dkar po dang // sran mchog rgyal po e rur// gsung mdog rma med gcig dang ni// li shi dz+nyA ta a ga ru// cu gang gung gramaka
120b6(rnying rgyud): ril bu nyeng gcig byas pa rnams// dri med dang dkar khung du gril// pradz+nyA bar d+ha hrIH/ mnu ta ra At+ma na/ sarba prahA sid+d+hi sA hA/ zhes pa rtswa sngags sham bu can// 'bum phrag bzlas pa'i ril bu de// rang lus drod dang ma bral 'chang // bsgrub tshe sha chang sgog sogs hA
120b7(rnying rgyud): zla ba yang 'phel dus dang sbed// blo dang shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// dris yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ blo dang shes rab 'phel bar byed pa'i leru ste so gsum pa'o// spyi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas//

121a2(rnying rgyud): bana' thang bcas par rjo// dag ba me bas// ma tho kyis rje dzig// glang la thob gAng rnams// dbyu myed gcig byeng// dmigs rgyal la shes pang ga pa/ te dag sa
121a3(rnying rgyud): ma// rnam pangs mapa mas kyi na gyi bad+hAnapa zlog zhi ngas/ hU~M bde ba byed pa bas sa she // nga na na pa la 'tsham sa// pa stonate// ba na
121a4(rnying rgyud): gau/ bsnyen bzlab gtan la ba bzlas te// mig sogs dbang po gsal ba'i blangs// rang nyid me ma gsul ba yi// mig ni g.yas dang g.yon pa la// yig N+DI ka radam bsgos// rnab g.yas dang g.yon pa pa// yig grobo rje na
121a5(rnying rgyud): gagasas dang ni man gnyis la// nye ba ma dang mer ba bzlom// khal min gyi dag sgom// mdang sngalas na// gangs gi nga sgrub// gsal gad nga gan su gyu// 'byung brgyang gi snying sa
121a6(rnying rgyud): ribargyadang cab migs// de ltar mim byung ba las// dbang po thams ca dgas la bAr 'gyur// rnam yi sa mnga' 'thomams ma na tan gyi rlud brten pa'i srog shing las/ da gsus pa da bas kyi thos
121a7(rnying rgyud): dang na ldan pa sa nga bas// thum po'i ma gyu'o// rtsa bdang yin panas// ban padru gargyan la gyus te// mi pa pa // nyi sa pa'i ma ga // dzul pa //
121b1(rnying rgyud): dkar po dang // kA li'i phreng ba dmar po gas la// A li g.yas lak+ta li g.yon// rab tu 'khor ba 'i 'od zer ni// dka dmar dbug pu mad 'bros pas// bdag gi ma rig mun pasal zhing // mngon shes rdzogs pa med 'char zhing // dus gsums phyer shes par
121b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs// nangs par sbya rangs shar ba nas// dgongs mon ram tsug cog par// rtag tu 'bad de mngon shes 'char// thun par ye shes sems dpa' yi// las spyod dam pa mngon shes 'grub// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi chud brtan
121b3(rnying rgyud): srog shing las/ mngon parang shes pa 'amar bar byed pa'i lanr-i b+he so drug pa'o// g+hi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// zlum yi dam mngal gro la// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go// bsnyen pad+ma gtan la the byas te// gzul la rgya

121b5(rnying rgyud): sno bang zags pa'i 'tha bya/ sa mye bang pas rjod/ khams da ban 'i sa gyur// gas dang dun pa'i dun to/ pa cacas par gyur// rnam pa dam pa thams byi nan sa chung sa

122a1(rnying rgyud): rnams na/ sa su // nga du sa/ rna na ma tshus sun ga nga/ nasus
122a2(rnying rgyud): ga na bya/
122a3(rnying rgyud): bo la sogs gnas lnga ru// nor bu dbang gi rgyal po ste// dkar de mdun thing ser ldang pa'i mdog/ 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar bar gsal// pha rol rdzas kyi dngos po rnams// sna tshogs nor ba mching bu ltar// zhi bar byed pa'i las sbyor che// bdag gi
122a4(rnying rgyud): zor gyis// pha rol dang dbang med par bkug/ rang rang nor bu lnga la bstim// rngam pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// gang byas tshong las rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkhanga' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyad bstan pa'i srog shing las/ tshad las rgyal bar byedapa'i
122a5(rnying rgyud): skye so dbu pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// rgyan las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi rgyal gyis// lag pa g.yas pas
122a6(rnying rgyud): na lags// g.yon pa shes rab zangs sugs la// thabs dang shes rab las sbyor gyis// gang yin rgyan gyi tshal rtse// gsal stong bdag gzhan dmigs pa yis// snang dang mi snang nyid yi// sbyor ba brtsams pas bdag nyid rgyal// bdag nyid mi g.yo bu bta
122a7(rnying rgyud): cing // pha rol g.yo ba'i sbyor bas kyang // gang yin de las rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rgya na las rnam par rgyal bar rtsod pa'i le'u ste bzhi cu pa // // dad brtson ldan
122b1(rnying rgyud): nga na kyang sa// tham sa dmam par thob// dub da 'dugs// brgya bsgrub brtan 'bab sa// / rdzu la thun pa brgyab pa grubs// bdag nyid sa gcan dang na gas// bag da nga da
122b2(rnying rgyud): shes la pas gyu// rigs pa pad pa / ga rigs 'dzig / ngapa dz+hastong pa s+ho// ma se sa migs la byed cing // zung ba med pa brgyad po// gal dzin la bya
122b3(rnying rgyud): da ban sa pa so// du 'dzin gyi // 'du la la 'jog di
122b4(rnying rgyud): na da /
