122b7(rnying rgyud): ba su / sa na na/
123a1(rnying rgyud): nag // gang ben byung su sa/ den gang zugs pa ma pa gyu// rnam pa dum mu thams pa rlung pa pa gags sa// dang byang
123a2(rnying rgyud): dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// rig sngags kun las rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dmigs med mkha' ltar blta// pha rol bdag la 'ad bye dang
123a3(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba gang len rnams// mun pa shin tu gnag par dmigs// rang gi bsgrubs pa'i lharnams ni// nyi ma 'idakyil 'khor rab rgyas nas// mkha' pa shar ba'i 'od zur gyis// mun pa thams cad rab bcom nas// ha~M 'od sdang brtug tu byeg nga /
123a4(rnying rgyud): sogs lus ngag yid// byang chub lam gyi chos la 'bad// nyin re la nA re'i sbyor ba yis// rig sngags bye ba'i tshogs kyis kyang // bdag la sdigs par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan ze rgyang bstan pa'i srog shing lam/ rig rdza
123a5(rnying rgyud): las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// b+h+ra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// blo gros rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs// bad
123a6(rnying rgyud): nyid yi dam lhar gsal ba'i// snying gar smra ba'i seng ge bskyed// mig g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo// g.yon pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// de ltar gsal ba'i dang ldan pas// g.yo ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gang yin las dang bya ba rnams// rmi
123a7(rnying rgyud): gyis mnan nas brtsam par bya/ gzhan sdang mi bstan pa mang r+Ya// snang srid bden par med par bzhag/ blo gros rnam par 'phel nas kyang // bsam 'dun gang spyod chos dang mthun// byang chub lam la tshud par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi
123b1(rnying rgyud): dzin tan kyang brtan pa zlog zhing las/ blo gros 'phel bar byud pa'i 'du theg supa'o// // dad bcon ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// zlu ma yi ma myu kha' 'gros// rma ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen brgyab gakun la phab byas te// ngadag tu dru
123b2(rnying rgyud): srid rgyal ba'i thabs// yid ma sta dmigs snying ga ru// rnam thos seng gzhon pa'i bu// seng ge zhon pa'i 'jol bar can// lag na rgyal mtshan ne ru le 'dzin// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis sbas// rang 'dra gnod sbyin 'bum rdzas bskor// las byed po ha ska
123b3(rnying rgyud): gakhrugs// kun kyang bdag kyi rgyas sring skyongs// dpa'i dang dpung phyug sbal bas ma zhing // rtswa sngags pad kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs// skabs su dmigs pa pade yang gsapa// chus dri drings gyis rgyas nas kyang // gang bas mthun mong las 'bras 'thung // zlu ma
123b4(rnying rgyud): yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chus srid rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phreng
123b5(rnying rgyud): byas te// mr-i kha sgra ma chu bzlog pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha seng rgyal gyis// sa snga dgu la bzos pa'i// mchod rten nag po khru gang la// pang rim dgu pa de ga seng na// tsan+dan byang bu mtho gang la// me bzlog pa'i de mor mo dang // par sha ya hr-id drod thu gyi/ shAn/
123b6(rnying rgyud): ra li te ba shu tsi mi khaskam chu sarba hU~M b+h+yo bzlog pazlog/ ces pa bris pa gzhug par bya// gzhan yang dug khrug pa la tshon dang // sdo da skra g.yer la sogs pa/ sna tshogs mi kha'i rdzas kyis bkang // de la dang ras nag po yi// cod pa ni gzugs la khram ris bris// dus gtan
123b7(rnying rgyud): khang steng du bzhag/ yang na rang gi khang pa yi// byang shar mtshams kyi zur du bzhag/ mi kha thams cad bzlog par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mi kha sbram chu bzlog par byed pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//
124a1(rnying rgyud): dad tsan ldan pa la ste// zlab sa // byad na pa // ban pazla gtan la nga gyus te// bya sa/ ga pa sas// mang steg rgyan
124a2(rnying rgyud): byas nas ni// chu sngags gam du 'di na dag dgas// oMt+takA la sarba pra phreM/ mA~M sa mam/ benas kud+d+he prad+d+ha sarbA shran+d+he T+Ta swAhU~M/ zhes pa pa rta ga pazlas nAs kyang // gragra ladud pas srang thub // gang gi rjes lI btags dpa// gri dang migazong gas
124a3(rnying rgyud): med// zam yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ nyams sgrib ba spang bar byed pa'i mi ste zhe brgyad pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i na la 'byor bas// dz+wam yi ma mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa bad ni lan la bya
124a4(rnying rgyud): ge/ bskyon pasgrag gtan la pheb byas te// 'byung po'i sunam bajog pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lta ying rgyal gyis// rat+na'i dzin rtse wal// sku tshogs rnyer gyi cod pan gdags// sa pan+na mi srung stags pas// brgya rtsa banas shing rdo rdzagasang // ga ga na
124a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs su gdings shing gzing// rdo na la 'brir bar bskyed// cod pan ma 'brar pa las// yang sbrul me dang mtshon cha'i char// gnam lcags thog ltar raba'ab pa ning // nanod tha~Md 'byung ba'i su ma rnams// rang dang gnas su bzlog pas pa dang /
124a6(rnying rgyud): srung ba'i brdzu D+ga pa d+ma dmigs// das ni sbyin chad gnad myi 'gyur// rdo rje dang nyi dag dganas kyi// dben pa'i phyogs sru dam pa ngaH// skabs sa dmigs bcugasags dang // rdo rje ba slebs ga ba bya// tham yi mamapa' 'grothams cad kyiman
124a7(rnying rgyud): kyi byung brgyan pa'i ga ga mas dun ma marlos byed pa'i ngag// ni na su bas// thub mings rgya'o// bad ni su man na// babyed pang+gA gtan la ba bya /
124b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyis mi tshugs thabs// glatso bo dang chung ga dang // mu Ti sdong ngos shing kun dang // rta bon ni chen bya rgod tshil// de ltar dgu yi ril bu dang // thA ma rbu tAr/ kar shISh+Ta k+ti ni/ a li myA g+ha g+has mya dris ma tri b+h+yaHphaT/ de ltar rtsa sngags sham can la// stong bdu//
124b2(rnying rgyud): bsrung bya'i mgul du btags// rdzas kI khu bas sngags kyang bri// ril bu sran ma'i tshad dang sbyar// de dag lus la sus 'changs pa// rims nad 'og pa'i nang las skyob// nyams na yang yang gso bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi klu
124b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rims nad kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i le'u sti lnga bcu pa'o// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// grA mra yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsu ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// 'byung po dag
124b4(rnying rgyud): gis mi tshugs thabs// stag ma be dkar 'om bu dang // skyer pa tsheng nag snying snying dang // shug pa ba la dkar sol nag ste// de ltar shing dgu sor bzhi la// rtsa sngags stong gis rab gnas bya// drar tshon sna lngas mi mngon dkri// mi lag ma brgyad bsrung bya li/
124b5(rnying rgyud): lus la dri srid gnas kyi bar// 'byung pos mI mngon sgrib shing ste// bsrung ba'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ 'byung pos mi tshugs shing sgrib par byed pa'i ledra steng gcig pa'o//
124b6(rnying rgyud): dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gI// bsnyen pasrub gtan la pheb byas te// mtshan gyi gnod pas mi tshugs thabs// gri lcags rol gri tshon gang la// dri khrag chu ling dbung 'o// deng dmar dag gi
124b7(rnying rgyud): na rjes// rtsa sngags da ni byung ba rdzogs// bar byed / yum tha mdzum tha~M/ srid/ rna rjes/ mam sa hU~M/ ka ma n+naH/ rdzog brgyas shing legs baspyad// gang la brdu bar 'ad pa 'i// lus pa btags shing bgan rgya// de pa
125a1(rnying rgyud): dang // da ldan ma gas kyang / ma pa sa pa mdams ca ga'ang drug ga / ga dunan du ga/ rna na
125a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen pa sgrub gtan la phreb byas te// mthu rtsal che bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi rgyal gyis// yaso khro bo bcu du bsgon// mgo khro mo bcu cu bsgor// ni gdug pa'i mtshon char
125a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// bsugaser kye rdo byed// phyi 'bung rab tu gtams pa yis// go 'u lugs su gon bzhin bsgom// rtsa gnas lus kyi da mig rnams// lcags zhun dag gis rab gang nas// rkang rub lcags sdong lta bung bsgom// tshe chu 'bar ba nyal la// ma khro du nya pa
125a4(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM// ma ma k+Sha ya rak+Sha phal hUM swA hA/ zhes pa rtsa ba'i sngags dang bcas// zhag bdun smrab bcad la bzlas// lus la lcags phye a ru ra// chang dang sbyar la yang yang byug/ lcags srog grub nas stobs kyi dpal// mthu rtsal rab tu rgyas par 'gyur// pra la yi dam mkha'
125a5(rnying rgyud): ngogro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mthu rtsal che bar byed pa'i le'u steng gsum pa'o// s+thi// / dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// drug
125a6(rnying rgyud): gris mi tshugs bsrung ba'i thabs// dug gis nges par shi ba yi// rus pa dang ni gser gyi mdog/ sman mchog skyon dang bral ba gcig/ rnga mnyam btul ba'i phye ma la// dug sbrang khu bas ril bu sbyar// me dang nyi ma ma mthong bskam// haM la kA la phos pos/
125a7(rnying rgyud): dri ha la phas/ sarba ta la ka mar co dun phaT swA hA/ de dag rtsa sngags gsham la gdags// ston zla dar dmar khud du gtum// gang bsrung mgrin pa'i gnas su gdags// lo re bzhin du sngags rnams bsgyur// dug rigs thams cad bsrung ba ste// yod rlomached
125b1(rnying rgyud): mi bza'// des ni dmatshig nyams pa 'o// bla ma yi dmam pa' 'os thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyung bstan pa'i srog shing las/ drag gus mi tshugs shing srung bar byed pa'i ma myang bzhi pa'o/ !// dad bcon ldan pa'i rnal 'byong bas// blam yi dmam pad /
125b2(rnying rgyud): yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// gtad dang khram gyis mi tshugs thabs// ming rus mi gcig mi dgu yi// skra sen mdze pho'i thong rus rnams// ro ras nag po'i khug mar gril// lcags byang mig dgu'i thems su zhugs// rang
125b3(rnying rgyud): gI mal 'ogadong du mnan// bdag nyid lha yid rgyal bskyed// pha rol gzhan la srung byed kyang // khyad par rtsa sngags bgrangs su gzhug/ des ni gtad dang khram las thar// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gtang khram
125b4(rnying rgyud): gyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i srung ba'i le'u steng lnga pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gza' slar ngan pa skyob pa'i thabs// dur rdo mtshal gyi khram
125b5(rnying rgyud): ris can// tshon skud sna lngas rgya gram bcing // gza' skar dran pa'i 'jigs pa las// srungs sogs spel tshig gang 'dod kyang // bris nas de dang lhan cig dril// de ltar brgyad byas phyogs mtshams su// rang nyid gar gnas sa ru spa// gza' skar ngan pa'i 'jigs pa
125b6(rnying rgyud): kun// sngon chad byung ba grol gyur zhing // phyin chad gnod pa mi byed bsrung // lo re bzhin du lan re bsgyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gza' skar ngan pa las skyob par byed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// IM/
125b7(rnying rgyud): da brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// don gnyer phyogs ngan srung ba'i thabs// skyer ba'i byang bu mtho gang la// mtshal gyis b+h+yo phaT nyer gcig bris// ngos gcig dag/
126a1(rnying rgyud): la stag seng gzugs// skye mched dod pa mkhas pas bri// 'dom gang dbyig pa'i rtse la btang // gar 'gro'i phyogs su gom dgu khyer// de nas byang bu ske la gdags// phyogs ngan nyes pas gos mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad
126a2(rnying rgyud): kyi yon tan gyi rgyad bstan pa'i srog shing las/ phyogs ngan srung bar byed pa'i phre'u ste dngadun pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bskub gtan la reb byas te// ru mi
126a3(rnying rgyud): 'chi ba bzlog pa'i thabs// kham sa'i rang gzugs lus chad bzo// de la rang gi gos bkon zhing // lus kyi dri ma phye la byugs// ming 'dra mkhan 'dra'i skyon mo btang // zhag gcig rang dang lhan cig hral// de nas rang nyid min par gang // lus la thal chen po
126a4(rnying rgyud): sol byug/ yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin bsgom// chu pa gru gsum deng du bdur// steng nas sa sna mang pos byibs// gza' dang skar ma bzang la gtad// shi bdur lugs dang mthun par bya// des ni dus min 'chi ba bzlo // tshe tshad gnas su stsol bar 'gyur// rma sa
126a5(rnying rgyud): yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog par byed pa'i le'u steng brgyad pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// tha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen
126a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gag lhog gnyen modzes mi tshugs thabs// gang bsrung lcags kyi phag rgod ni// 'jigs pa ri rgyud tsam zhig bsgom// phag rgod so dang shu tshil dang // ta sbal sdig pa'i sha bsres pa// rtsa sngags khro rgu'i sngags bzlas pas// ngar
126a7(rnying rgyud): blud bsrung bya'i lus la byug/ gnyen dang mdo lkog la sogs pa// sa bdag khros pa'i gnod pa bsrung // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyu ba bstan pa'i srog shing las/ geg lkog gnyen mdo la sogs srung bar byed pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o//

126b2(rnying rgyud): yis bkab// klu rnams bkug cing rdzas la bstim// phyi rol klul mchod gsol bya// char pa dbab pa'i phrin las gzhol// b+ha ri sha ya ba ta li hUM hUM/ nA ga ra tsa tsat+ta prom phrom du purbad ya nA ga ra tsa b+ha ri sha ya sa rba sid+d+he swA hA/ stong phrag them nas chad pa 'byung // rtswa ba'i/
126b3(rnying rgyud): sngags dang sbrel la bzlas// de bar sha chang sgrog pa spang // las grub bcas bshig gnas su bskyod// drag char myur du 'bab par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ char dbab par byed pa'i le'u ste drug cu ba'o// s+thi/
126b4(rnying rgyud): da brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// char pa gcod par byed pa'i thabs// seng ldeng phur bsor bzhi la// gri khrag dug gi khu ba yis// tsakra b+ha ri shan+ta ga du tsit+ta rbang ram/
126b5(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya rbad swA hA/ rtsa sngags gsham can tshar gsum bri// la chathang tshil nang du gtum// chu mig gnyan po'i gting du sgra// ma bton bar du char pa chad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ char pa gcod par byed pa'i le'u
126b6(rnying rgyud): ske re gcig pa'i/ !/ dad brtson ldan pa'i rnang 'byor pas// za ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi/ rtsa ba dang nisan lag gi// brdzun bsgrab gtan la pheb byas te// s+yAd sna bzlog par byed pa'i thabs// 'brug gang lug nas pa dang // rin chen sna lbu bsres pa'i
126b7(rnying rgyud): sa// tsha mo nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhengs// rab gnas gzungs sngags nang snying bcas// srung 'ong ba'i thang du batham// stobs che khri bo 'ang rgyal babyed/ shA srung srud sna bzlo ga ra 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rlung bstan pa'i srog shing
127a1(rnying rgyud): las/ spud sna bzlog par byed pa'i ledu ste re gnyis pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// b+h+ra ma yid ma mkha' 'gro yi// rdza ba dang ni yan lag gI// bsnyen pasgrub gtan la phyeb byas te// lci 'dang ser bya bzlog pa'i
127a2(rnying rgyud): thabs// steng lde phur ba khru gang la// d+yer nag roras cod pan btag/ ngur ba'i logs la khro ba cu'i skyugs// oM badz+ra krod+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ oM badz+ra bo d+hi b+hi dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dar+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA ni ta kA truM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya ya tsa la hUM/ oM badz+ra rbo d+ha ha ya
127a3(rnying rgyud): d+hI wa hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dze ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kU N+Da li hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza la hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ dag par bris te gu gul dang // drug khrag khubs byugs byas te// kho bcu'i sngags kyis rno drar blad// khro bo spyan drang ngur par baN+Di pa/
127a4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// ser ba dbab dus phur pa gzir// sngags bzlas sbyangs stabs sdigs mdzub bstan// spyi 'dang ser ba bzlog par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shir las/ ser nga gcod par byed pa'i
127a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste re gsum pa'o// I// / dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// nor phyugs god kha srung ba'i thabs// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// gcan gzan dar ma'i thod
127a6(rnying rgyud): pa ru// nad gdon bgegs kyi rU pa la// tshon skud sna lngas byad du gzhug/ ro ras yugs sa'i dor rtas gril// dgug gzhug byas la bcug nas kyang // 'bru nag la sogs thun rdzas kyis// thod pa de dag khengs par bya// dmod bcol drag sngags gang 'os bzlas//
127a7(rnying rgyud): srang lam gsum bzhi mdor mnan// nog yam rdo rje rgya gram dang // 'byung ba me chus mnan la bzhag/ god sri zal ma dgral gtad// zor dang thun gyi las rnams bya// des ni godo kha 'byung mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing
127b1(rnying rgyud): lngas/ gong 'byu ba'i 'a bzhing // s+ho// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// bra ma yi mam pa' 'grol// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen pazlab gtan la phe ba byas te// chom ldan 'chang bar byed pa'i thangs// bdag nyid ma yang rnan
127b2(rnying rgyud): gyis// dug shog ro ros mtho gang la// chom rkun dgra yi gzugs bris nas// zhing lpags khrag ma'i nang du gtum// gnod byed sarba sha truM b+har+N+Na ya b+han+ta ya/ sarba sha truM lo ka b+hen+ta ya/ mA ra Na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ staM b+ha ya/ nA sha ya d+har+tha ya phaT/ ces pa cwa sngags
127b3(rnying rgyud): gsham la gdags// brgya phrag la sogs ci 'grub bzlas// zhing lpags gang bsrung gtso la gdags// de la gang la bri thams cad bsung // chom rkun dag gis gnod mi byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyad bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chom rkun
127b4(rnying rgyud): 'ching bar byed pa mang+ga hU~M raM lnga pa// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byong bas// zlum yi ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa bad ni yan lag gi// brten pa nga gtan mapa 'byas te// gcan gtan ga dugu pa'i ching // dIg+sa dog dag la gcan brtan ga sa
127b5(rnying rgyud): lcags sgrog dag gis byad gzhug cing // kha gdong rdo rje rgya gram bri// lto bar tsakra rtsibs brgyad bskor// du nas khaM a mu ka phaT/ rtsibs brgyad dag la 'bru brgyad bkod// lto bar gcan gzan gang yin gyi// mi mthar mA ra ya chings bri// mtha' ma drag po'i sngags
127b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bskor// gnod byed tsak+Shu mu khaM b+han d+ha ya/ tsakra war tig can gzan che ge mo mA ra ya/ du na sa khaM a mu ka phaT/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha sdoms/ lus rengs/ sems myos/ dbang po mA ra ya chings shig/ de ltar dmod pa'i drag sngags rnams// bris pa
127b7(rnying rgyud): dag tu brgya phrag bzlas// de ni zha nye'i chu yis byug/ rang gshed rang rang rigs 'dra ba'i// mche ba can gyi thod par gzhug/ gcan zan rgyu ba'i srang la mnan// des ni gcan gzan gdug pa 'ching // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud
128a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pan phyug shing las// gcan gzan gdug pa 'i ba 'ching bar byed pa'i lab ster byug pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal dpyod pas// blam yid ma mkha' 'thos// rtsa ba dang ni yan la gshe// bsnyen cu
128a2(rnying rgyud): gtan la pheb byas te// dug sbrul byi skyon la sogs pa// so dug can rnams srung ba'i thabs// gla rtsi bong nga nag po dang // rin chen gser dngul g.ya' dang ni// byi tsher la cha phye ma rnams// dri chen dag dang lhan cig btul// ha la bI rtse kruM b+h+rUM/
128a3(rnying rgyud): na ha~M ba na ka ba tsi ha la ma ra Na phaT/ de ltar rtswa sngags bcas pa la// gzhan tshig ma 'dres stong phrag bzlas// thum po byas te lus la btag/ des ni so drug thams cad bsrungs// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing
128a4(rnying rgyud): las/ so dug thams cad srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rmongs po srid dang 'phrad pa'i
128a5(rnying rgyud): thabs// mi rta bong bu'i sa bon dang // g.yag lug gsum thug po yi// 'bras bu btul ba'i phye ma rnams// tsa n+dan dkar dmar ga pur dang // dza ti A ru ra rnams btul// spang skyon dag gis ril bu ba sgril// ri dwags glo ba'i ril ma tsam// pu tI si
128a6(rnying rgyud): ku ru b+hA sa b+ha sa ma ri treng phob phob/ rtse sngags bcas pa 'bum bzlas shing // lho stong gar chang ngag gis phul// pho mo gang la btang gyur na// srid dang ldan par gdon mi za// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las
128a7(rnying rgyud): srid 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// srid 'phel pho ru bsgyur ba'i thabs// gdug pa sprul
128b1(rnying rgyud): gyi pags pa la// skyes pa'i sa bon ma tshul bsres pas// hA s+thi tham pu tra bi dzi hring / gzab tu bris te dar dkar gril// bud med sbrum ma'i lus la btag/ skar ma rgyal dang sprad pa gces// des ni srid rnams pho ru 'byung // bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro
128b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srid po ru bsgyur ba'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bgrub gtan la the ba byas te// rta
128b3(rnying rgyud): phyugs la sogs srid 'phel par// sre mo'i pags pa gsob pa shus nas// gang gi srid 'phel 'dod pa yi// sku la srad bu byas nas kyang // dar tshon sna lngas de dag gril// gser dngul la sogs rin chen dang // 'bru lnga rnams kyis gang ba byas// phyogs mas
128b4(rnying rgyud): la sogs ra ba yi// rta phyugs bres kyi steng du gdags// des ni rta phyugs srid 'phel nas// phyug po g.yang chen dag tu 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rta phyugs la sogs nor gyi srid 'phel pa
128b5(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mi dang rta phyugs la sogs pa'i// sring rnams srung bar byed
128b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs// zangs dang zha nye dung gi sho// mtshal byag dmar po dang dkar gril// sho shi hA dz+nye par phaT du rbad rbad pra ma ni pu tra d+ha ri rak+ShiraSh+TaM du swA hA/ rtsa sngags bcas pas brgya rtsa bzlas// srid dang ldan pa'i lus la gdags// srid la gegs med mthar phyir
128b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srid srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/
129a1(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// pha rol gdug byed dag gnon thabs// zhwa nye'i byang du mig dgu la// kha sbyor bar du dmigs bya yi// rU pa lce brkyang brang khabs steng // mtshal b+his rdo rje rgya gram bkod// yan lag byang du bcug
129a2(rnying rgyud): pa can// bris te zag pa'i rdzas dang bcas// byang bur gtims nas tshon skyed skyel// bdag nyid lha yid rgyal bskyed// dmigs bya'i rnam shes bsagal bstim// gang 'thang rwa tso'i nang du gzug/ khro yi 'grim thams dramanan// b+h+ra mi sa ha~M
129a3(rnying rgyud): pa'am// kha lce rig par gdon mi za// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shIng las/ ngag gnon par byed pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o// // dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rna ba pyid
129a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ngag mnan 'grol bar byed pa'i thabs// tsan+dan dkar po'i byang bu la// mtshal dang ga pur bsil ba'i chu// rang rang yi dam lha sngags dang // b+ha gA wa ti a ba ri mi ta/ dzA ka
129a5(rnying rgyud): ga sa rdzus na sa
129a6(rnying rgyud): 'grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// lhas ngan cho 'phrul gtong ba'i thabs// bya rog phug
129a7(rnying rgyud): pa pra ste'u ga/ sre mo'i sbrang bur gzug par bya// yugs sa'i sgra yi srad bu gdags// glad la bskor zhings la brdab// dmigs bya'i ming byang nang du gzhug/ a hi gul gul phyag rgyag/ phra mo ni bra mo thun/ phra mo tra ma ni ho taM/ a ya ma du ru tsa shan
129b1(rnying rgyud): sam la/ ku tsha tshe/ phreng phreng / rgyug chug/ par ling phaT b+ho/ zhag bdun mun pa'i gling du bslab// gang dmigs dgral meng sbrel yang // haM dang oM li bar du gzhug/ lha srin sde brgyad tshogs rnams kyis// tshe 'phrul sna tshogs ston par 'gyur/
129b2(rnying rgyud): drang po rang la 'byung ba ste// de byung da pral dmigs pa zad// phrul byed las kyi gtor ma btang // pha rol chu 'phrig slong bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i sgrog shrir las/ spyis ngan cho 'phrul 'gyid
129b3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro yi// rtse ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// lhas ngan cho 'phrul bzlog pa'i thabs// zod pa mtshan ngan dag gi nang /
129b4(rnying rgyud): pra sran 'bru nag dag gis bkang // skyur ba tsher nag seng ldeng gi// phur pa mtho re byas pa la// sa ma ya ye ke tsit+ta rgad b+h+r-i/ a ra li ye ke tsit+ta sa ma ya/ du ru ka sha pha ma sri tod pa lde zlog byer zlog byer/ dug khrag dmigs bya mang du bri// de dag de yi na
129b5(rnying rgyud): brgyag/ steng na ngongos lding gur grub// rang gzhan gang yin khang thugs// stas ngan cho 'phrul gang yang bzlog/ sdigs par mi 'gyur bar la sdigs// bla ma yi ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi chud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ lhas ngan cho
129b6(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// // da brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mthun gnyis mi mthun 'byed pa'i thabs// ha rmig g.yag gi
129b7(rnying rgyud): gang byedas so'i ming rus bri// bya rog thug pa'i bags pas gtum// dmigs bya'i zag rdzas gang rnyed dbyugs// so so'i lha rten 'og tu mnan// myur du so sor 'bral bar 'gyur// las grub rdzas bton bshig par bya// ji ltar mthun yang 'bral
130a1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi chud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbye bar byed pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// thA// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byod pas// bram yi ma mang
130a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas te// dbye ba mthun par byed pa'i thabs// rgyun 'bab chu sna dgu blangs la// ba re 'bri yi 'o ma dang // tsan+dan ga pur la sogs pa// dri 'iphe lnga tshogs btas pa la// lca
130a3(rnying rgyud): gang yin 'dum bzlas pa'i// chu dro gang gang mi mthun pa// rkang lag gdong sogs lus rnams bkru// dri khus smras pa'i ring rang gzugs// dug shing me la bsregs nas kyang // de yi rang rang lus po bshud // lan gsu mi bskang bar gyur pa ni//
130a4(rnying rgyud): 'thab byed rtsod pa yang // mthun cing nyes pa grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbye bar mthun par byed pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o// // / ded brtson ldan pa'in la
130a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed khram la 'debs pa'i thabs// drag po'i shing la byas pa yis// khram shing song bzhi khru gang ba// dug khrag dag gis khyab
130a6(rnying rgyud): par byugs// logs la stag re glang khrag dang // ro so la bsres pa'i snag tsha yis// gnod byed dgra bgegs che ge mo// lha yi khrum la da thob cig/ de sogs sde brgyad khram yig bkod// ro ras nag pos gril byas la// sde brgyad 'gu srang gnas su
130a7(rnying rgyud): mnan// dmigs bya sde brgyad lam la 'debs// mi 'dod sna tshogs de la 'byung // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dgra bo khram la 'debs par byed pa'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o// I/
130b1(rnying rgyud): dang brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// khram la thebs pa phyi ba'i thabs// rang lus gzungs sngags chu yis bkru// ku gul dri chen dung pas bdug/ ma tsha/
130b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i sa 'dag gis// mgo lus med par khyab par byug/ gcer bu phyogs bcur 'o dod 'bod// slar yang dur thal lus la byug/ dud 'gro mang po'i skad 'don zhing // bdag nyid che ge mo lha yi khram la thebs pa phyis// de'i 'gres yongs
130b3(rnying rgyud): khram gyis brjod// de nas rang gi dri chu yis// lus bkru gu gul dud pas bdug/ gang gis khram la btab gyur kyang // lan gsum dgags grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ kham
130b4(rnying rgyud): phyi bar byed pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed byad du gzhug pa'i thabs// shi sgra'i srang
130b5(rnying rgyud): bu 'dom gad pas// dmigs bya'i lus tshad rU pa bkyig/ rU pa 'bru nag sogs la bya// de yi snying gar ming byang gzhug/ bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// dmigs bya'i rnam shes bkug la bstim// dus gtan drag po nam phyed dus// rgya
130b6(rnying rgyud): srang lam gyi gzhi mdor mnan// lha 'dre'i ming 'bod dmod bcol bya// steng du dpal gyi rta bro brdung // dmigs bya rengs dang 'khums nas kyang // lus ngag yid gsum nyams par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan
130b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gnod byed byad du gzhug pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// hU~M// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la phab byas/
131a1(rnying rgyud): gang dag byud las grol ba'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yid rgyal gyis// bsung bya gang yin mdun du bzhag/ dang po byang thag sdo dmar gyis// mag sogs yan lag bkyeg rdul bya// mdun du dag
131a2(rnying rgyud): ral gri'i so la rtsa sngags mthar// hri hri ma ma pa sha pra yo ga na maHhri d+hi sarba pA paM yak+Sha kro d+ha ha pa ha la hUM phaT/ ces pa brgya phrag bzlas pa yis// ral gri'i byad thag thams cad bcang // dug shing me la bsreg par bya// lha sdigs 'ad
131a3(rnying rgyud): gis// bsrung bya'i kha lag gdod sogs bkru// gu gul dkar po'i dud pas bdug/ byin brlabs can gyi lha rten la// phyag dang skor ba byed du gzhug/ byang du bcug las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cade kyi
131a4(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ byang du bcug pa las grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste bya gcig pa'o// // / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// brten bslang gtan la
131a5(rnying rgyud): beb byas te// gang dag zugs par byed pa'i thabs// gang la byed pa'i ming rus bri// bya nag sgor skog nang du gzhug/ dmigs bya'i rnam shes bkug la bstim// bong bu'i spangs dngas nag bsre// gnag lce'i ga'u byas par gzhug/ khri lam chen po'i
131a6(rnying rgyud): 'og tu mnan// dmigs bya mugs shing 'thom par 'gyur// bla ba yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las// dgra bo thugs par byed pa'i le'u ste rtsa gnyis pa'o// ste// / ngad brjon ldan pa'i rnal 'byung
131a7(rnying rgyud): pas// bla ma yi dam mkhar 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// blugs shing 'thib las grol ba'i thabs/ rang gi dbang po'i rdzas rnams dang // sa sbyin bsres pa'i dru ba ni// mtho gang skye mchid dong par bgro//
131b1(rnying rgyud): de la me gtsang rdzas kyis byugs// ming rus mi gcig dgu dag gi// dri zen dri chu la sogs pa// bar 'bri yi 'o ma dang // chu sna mi gcig dgu bsres lnga// dri bzang kha tshur btab pas bkru// til dang nyung dkar dud pas bdug/ mthar ni
131b2(rnying rgyud): rU pa chu pis bshig/ de dag phyogs mtshams kun tu dong // thugs shing 'thib las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rmugs 'jib las grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste rtswa gsum
131b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ste// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' dgro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gang dag rengs par byed pa'i thabs// g.yag lug rwa dang gcong dang rje// rtsa
131b4(rnying rgyud): glang bu sha ba dang // gnyen dang dge ba'i dri co dgu// brdar ba'i phye la khams bsre// dmigs bya'i rU ba brkyang ba can// mtho gang skye mched do dpal// shing rigs mi mthun dgu dag gis// rtsang zung byas te lus la bcug/ shi sgra'i skud pas rgya gram
131b5(rnying rgyud): bcings// ri bo chen po'i rtse la bskyal// g.yang sgrom byas pa'i nang du gzhug/ dmigs bya yan lag rengs par 'gyur// lus kyang g.yo 'gul mi shes 'byung // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/
131b6(rnying rgyud): dbu bo ngas par byed pa'i le'u ste gya bzhi pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// b+h+ra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rengs pa grol bar byed pa'i thabs/
131b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs bya dong brus nang du gzhug/ stang na kha leb byas pa'i mthar// ming rus mi gcig mi dgu yis// bro brdung shing sna'i du dpa btang // de nas bton la gzungs chus bkru// ras dkar dag gis lus la phyi// dug gA khu ba dkar po yin// lus
132a1(rnying rgyud): bA sA li kA li bkod// de ltang lan gsum byas pamagrol// bla ma yid ma mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan kyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rengs pa'i spong ba 'grol bar byed pa' 'dras bya /
132a2(rnying rgyud): dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bslu ba gtan la phab byas te// mig nad sel bar byed pa'i thabs// nang bar mi tshig ma 'dres par// rang de dri chu drod mo yis// mig
132a3(rnying rgyud): bskams nas lag pas mnye// so la chags pa'i dri ma yis// lag g.yon srin lag dag gis byub// bstud denang ma nyer gcig bya// mig skyon rab rib mi 'byang zhing // skyon med yon tan ldan par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi
132a4(rnying rgyud): tan gyi zud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mig gi dbang po gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen drum gtan la
132a5(rnying rgyud): mgul nad zhi bar byed pa'i thabs// yung ba chu dag dkar po dang // ru rta tsan+dan dkar po rnams// bdud rtsi dbang po'i lag dang sbyar// ril bu sran ma 'bring tsam bya// rtswa sngags tha mar gdags pa'i sngags// ya mas bu tsu Shi/ d+ha ra b+hai ya phaT// ces pa
132a6(rnying rgyud): stong phrag bzlas pa de/ tho rangs dus su re re bstan// zhag re lo re'i mgul nad bsrung // sngon chad bru ma yang phan par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mgul dang zhi bang byed pa'i ne'u
132a7(rnying rgyud): bdud pa'o// s+thi// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma pi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// so nang zhi bar byed pa'i thabs// shing kun skad 'an lug mig pa// den
132b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i klad pa skam po dang // gla rtsi bong nag a ru ra// mu zi nag dang me ru tse// sngags pa'i dri chen za mnyam nas// gu gul dri chur spangs pa yi// khu ba 'dam thag ril bu dril// sran tshad rul sum med bang bskam// so nad rab tu gzir ba'i rung/
132b2(rnying rgyud): khong du gsum btang gcig gis bdug/ lan gsum bskyar bas so nad rigs// gang yin thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ so nad zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste kya brgyad
132b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// I// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// b+h+ra ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen pa sgrub gtan la phab byas te// lha gdon gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// dang dkar dri ma med pa'i khud//
132b4(rnying rgyud): chen zur mang shel gril nas// rdza ba'i sngags kyis rab gnas bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang // dam can chos myong bkug la bstim// gsol mtshang bkur sti rgya chen bya// mi lag mi brgyud lus la 'chang // lha gdon gnod pa dag las
132b5(rnying rgyud): skyob// dar dkar dag la mtshal yig tu// rtsa sngags A li kA li dang // mos pa'i lha rnams mtshan sngags dang // rang rang gang 'dod dgod par bya// ye shes lha yis skyob pa dang // 'jig rten lha rnams dran du 'gyur// hA pa yi dam mkhar
132b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ lce gdon gyi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste bya dgu pa'o// smr-i// / dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang nI la nA lag gi/
132b7(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bsgrub gtan la pheb byas te// klu yi gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// wa dang gram po phag gi snga// khyi dang sbyang ki stag gi brun// shi ba g.yag dang gcod kyi dri// lcags dang gser dngul rnam pa gsul// cha mnyam so sor dang byis bram
133a1(rnying rgyud): cag ljags kyi bar bur bcug/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang khro bcu'i sngags// brgya stong la sogs mang bzlas la// bar bu lus dang grib ltar 'chang // sa bdag klu la gnod pa rgyob// bla ma ya dam mkha' 'gro thams ca

138a1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa na nangs rgya// gnams gragasum ngam nag cang // dug dang dug shing mang bsdus// s+yA nas kyang la khyud 'dra dang // 'ganas byin du gzangs pa'an// sadz+rod brag thos 'di gnas/ b+hag gnas ni bsam sa khyag/
138a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes lha yi drag sngags gnas// skyo bo'i khrid du ma yin zhing // rab tu dben la bag phebs pa// bas mtha' yangs pa'i sa phyogs so// 'jig rten pa yi drag sngags gnas// dur khrod la sogs 'dri srin rgya// rab gnas ma byas sa phrogs te// rang gis 'jigs
138a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas su bsgrub// gzhan yang bye brag so so'i gnas// gang la gang rigs gnas su'o// khyad par drag sngags bsgrub pa'i gnas// rab ni sa dong mun pa ste// rim pa bdun gyis 'og na// las kyi gshin rje gnas pa'i phyir// stongs grogs mthu dang 'byed pa'o//

138a5(rnying rgyud): bdag byas gtsug lag khang // mdor na 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// rgyu zhing gnas pa'i sar bsrubs pas// gcig rgyab gcig gis byas pa yi// gang dang gang gis las byas pa'i// de dang de dag myur du 'grub// thogs pa med pa'i mthu tho ba 'gyur// de bzhin dra
138a6(rnying rgyud): sngags bsrub pa'i dus// dus gza' drag po rgya ba ste// phung gsum bdud kyi nyi ma dang // dregs pa stobs ldan gruba'i dus// gza' dang skar ma dzu ba la sogs// gang dang gang gi rigs rnams la// de dang de yi rigs bstan nas// nam byed srod dang mun pa 'khra
138a7(rnying rgyud): dus der drag po'i bsnyen bgrub dang // las la sbyar ba rab tu shis// zla ba mar gyi ngo dag la// las mtha' mnan bsreg zor las bya// yang ni sngags pa'i klung 'khrugs nas// rngam zhing ngar dang ldan pa'i nas// skad cig nyid der las sbyor brtsam// gnam lcags thog
138b1(rnying rgyud): dang mtshungs pa ste// las gang thogs pa med par 'grub// rab tugal ba'i dus dang ni// phyi nang 'byung ba khrugs pa dang // nya zla thA gnan 'jom pa'i rtsa// mngan stong drag pa'i 'asal 'jug/ dus ni las rnams myur 'grub 'gyur// mngon spyod bsgrub pa
138b2(rnying rgyud): gang zag ni// sems rgyang rab tu gtum pa las// blo stobs che zhing zhum pa med// lus rngam khro bo khrom pa 'dra// mig rtsa dmar la wa lo gzing // skyong lam thug thub rab tu che// ngag nyung bzlas brjod sngags la brtson// sha khrag dmar la rab tu dang // drag po
138b3(rnying rgyud): las la rab tu brtson// rgyud rtsub bro gtum rab tu che// zhe nag 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// bstan la 'artsi zhing spyi sem che// bya ba gang yang mthar 'byung byed// brtson 'grus ldan zhing snying dus can// gar yang thogs med 'jug pa yi// gang zag de 'dras pa
138b4(rnying rgyud): pan// myur 'grub dgra bgegs thul bar 'gyur// de las log pa'i gang zag rigs// 'jam la zhi dul ldan pa yi// blo rtswa thung ba'i rigs can gyis// bsrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// dmigs bya ngos bzung rnam pa gnyis// dgra dang bgegs te dgra bo na// skye
138b5(rnying rgyud): dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis// spyir ni sangs rgyas bstan pa la// gnag pa'i sems 'chang gdug cu ba can// dge 'dun spyi dgra byed pa dang // dkon mchog sde pa'i nor rnams 'joms// dkor cha 'joms shing dben gnas bshig/ byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dkug cing /
138b6(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan bsgos pa'i glegs byed pa// bla ma ngam pa'i skul bsngos// sems can yongs la 'tsho babyed// rtag tu sdig pa'i las pa byed// dge 'dun dbyen byed gnag sems byed// dkon mchog gsum la rgyab kyis kyogs// mdor na sangs nas bstan pa
138b7(rnying rgyud): skye dgra byong cing dgrol 'tshe// dmigs byeng 'dra bsgral po'i yul// bye brag dang nyid mnyes par// deb sngo grong btsug brnyes pa 'chang // rkun sna gtad cing dzag 'dral byed// brdung btsog 'grog bcom rtsub 'khrug ston// len nyes med pa zhe gcod cing // sbrul
139a1(rnying rgyud): nangs bsgru sa/ gan na g+sa / // su ga la sonas smras// sa // da
139a2(rnying rgyud): yul// rang gis mnyes gzhan gyis btsug/ de dag bskal pa'i yul yin no// bgegs ni las kyis mnar ba yi// lus sems ma rungs 'byung po'i rigs// ngang gis gzhan la gnod gyur cing // dkar po dge ba'i bar chad byed// tshol chu zhing srog la'ang //
139a3(rnying rgyud): brje dbang zang dag la gnod// mtho ris thar pa'i gegs byed cing // 'khor ba dran song kyi sogs pa'i// bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha// skabs tshol glags lha lus srog 'joms// bsrub la par chad sna tshogs byed// 'dre bdud 'byung po gang dang gang // dge ba'i
139a4(rnying rgyud): las dang bsam pa la// bar chad byed pa gang yin pa// mi min de dag bskal ba'i yul// de ltar dmigs byangos zin nas// dgra bgegs dra pa bya ba ni// 'brar du dod dang ris su bris// ming byang dag la gdags pa'o// dang po 'bur du btod pa ni// so so
139a5(rnying rgyud): zag rdzas rjes sa dang // dur khrod dag gis dang ni// phung shul 'dre gnas dag gis// drag khrag ro sol dur thal dang // dme ba rabs chad mang po yi// bsdad shul 'grim la mkhangs ste// mdor na shin tu bkra mi shis// ngan pa las byung rdzas rnams las//
139a6(rnying rgyud): khams gnag lci bag phye dang // 'dra nag phye dang dur thal dang // rang rang las kyis sna sogs// gang dang gang las byung ba yi// rUb che tshad lus dang mnyam// 'bring po dmigs bya'i khru gang ste// tha ma de yi mtho gang tshad// gzugs dang dbang po skye mched dong /
139a7(rnying rgyud): rang la nyam thag stobs dang bral// yi mug ngu po'i rnam 'drar can// yan lag rangs sam khums pa'i gzugs// sha shor dras pa'i mkhrig pazhig/ bgegs la yi dwags rnam pa can// gsus pa cha la yan lag rid// mdzod pa phra zhing mgo brgyas// mig+sa

143b2(rnying rgyud): bla med byang chub cos spyong bas// 'did yang theg mchog ces dang ma dpa// sa nas da sti'i bang dag tu// mi ga sbyangs nas dge brdzun// sram ngag yid gsum chos la spyod// las kyi bu'i bras kyang ma bsad// dkon mchog gsum pazod

145a1(rnying rgyud): bzhes shig/ bar sbyang stong pa la tshad ma 'dzugs par bzhes shig/ skyen na 'chil khungs ma 'byin par bzhes shig/ ces pa la sogs bzhes drangs shing / dmor mo sna tshogs rigs mthun brjod// rangs rgal ba da
145a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs bya'i dru ba khrag ris can// srung ma'i gtor ma bcas pa 'bul// phrin las myur mgyogs drag tu bskal// dul mo brtul zhing las la zad// de nas rba tu 'di skad brjod// to/ ye shes dang las las grub pa'i srung ma jugasad pa can khyed na
145a3(rnying rgyud): dgra ba che ge mo 'di'i lus srog dbang thang chus srid dang bcas bzas skal du gtad ba yin pas/ 'di'i sha zo// drag 'thung / srog tshong/ dbugs longs/ las kyi mtha' bsdus la/ lo dang zla bar ma bzhag// zhag dang tha mar rang rang gi sang mar nge dngas brjod
145a4(rnying rgyud): myur du sgrol cig/ che ge mo 'di'i lus srog la steng lha'i za lam gtod cig/ 'og klu'i zal ma gtod cig/ drang srong gza'i za lam gtod cig/ ces sogs srur ma mang po dang // snang srid lha 'dre yang po yi// ming nas bos te za lam gtad// rigs dang
145a5(rnying rgyud): mthun bdud du dbab// de bzhin rang gshed dang dbab kyi// za la ma gtad pa'i rim pa rnams// las mthun sprad pa'i drag sngags brjod// drang srong rnams kyi dmo pa 'dod// bgegs chen dag kyang gshed du dbang// las kyi ngem pa drag myur 'bad// de
145a6(rnying rgyud): rtags cho 'phrul dang // rtsub 'gyur sna tshogs 'byung ba dang // srung ma thams cad drag tu rbad// phrin las bskul zhing gnyer gtad bya// dgral 'khu 'phrig slong pa yi/ lhas ngan phrin bsgyel gtang bar bya// snga sel las kyi gtor ma btang // dam can
145a7(rnying rgyud): nga la sags pa// srang ma gnod la dba' bya dang // khol tsha 'phral 'byung rgyas rnams// dug shog ra ra ba nag pa la// phren rdzang la ga gris nas kyang // gshed dang spa pa gnas pra brgyal// gang la gang rigs gnad dang ban// 'byung ba 'a khrugs par
145b1(rnying rgyud): las sbyor rnams// bskrad dang dbye dang gzir la sogs// las mtha' mngon spyod drag tu gzir// rnam par nyams par byed pa'i las// drag shul 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// las rjes dgra bgegs ling ro rnams// mdze pho rabs chad nag po dang //
145b2(rnying rgyud): mon mtha' mi'i thod pa dang // gcan gzan dar ma'i thod pa ste// gang la gang rigs nang du grub// thun dang thal 'dam nag pos bcad// ro ching ro ras yugs sa yi// dong mas zil nas tshon skud kyis// byad du gzhug sogs dam par bya// dus gzeng phud gsum
145b3(rnying rgyud): ngag dang sprad// laganyan lung gnyan chu mdo dang // khrims lam bzhi mdo la sogs pa'o// lha 'dre ma rungs gnas pa'i sa// chu brag gtsug lag mchod rten zhabs// gar 'os sa ru gnan gtad bya// steng nas 'byung ba me chu dang // ngo g.yam rang thag chag po la/
145b4(rnying rgyud): ri rab rdo rje rgya gram bri// mnan gzid dmod bcol bcas pas mnan// mnan pa las kyi mtha' sdud kyi// las sbyor gnad la dbab par bya// dgra dpung mnan dang bgegs dpung bshig/ sgro byed las kyi sbyor ba bya// yang ni las rjes bsreg pa ste// phung gsu
145b5(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi nyi ma la// drag po'i shing gis hom khung brtseg/ dug khrag til nag 'bu nag sogs// thun rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs dang // dmigs bya'i rngu pa gtor ma dang // sha khrag la sogs bsreg rdzas bcas// mtshon gyis gtubs la rim bzhin 'bul// me spang lhar snyed
145b6(rnying rgyud): las rnams bya// me nang drag po'i srung ma dang // pho nya las mkhan rngabs la bskyed// kha gdangs nang du dmigs te phul// rang rang las sbyor sngags dang bcas/ da mod pa'i tshig gis drag mur bsreg/ bar mtshams le lo ma zhugs shing // ting 'dzin rdzang
145b7(rnying rgyud): med par bya// dmigs bya lhag med bzhes shing bsreg/ ro ma thal sol rlung la 'phyar// yang na khrims la mdong du mnan// 'phen pa zor gyi las rnams ni// drag sngags las kyi gto ro ma de// sde brgyad dregs pa 'gyu dus dang // phyogs smad dmigs
146a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i da drung bcas// drag khrag su tshun cha'i rang brnyas// dmigs kya dag dang bgags kyu spyad// gnas skyugs skye 'dang 'dab pa ltang // rdul phran// bur badrag dmigs te// las kyi sngags dang dam dma'i rdzog/ zung kyi lasas/
146a2(rnying rgyud): bajug par// rnal 'byor khro ba'i nga rgyal gyis// lus kyis dpa' shugs gzi brji da ba sgred// ngag tu zo las med pa khyer// yid kyis ni stong bdag sems bcas// rnam 'gyur tshom rnams 'jigs gzugs bstan// dul mo brgya zing tham mo brda /
146a3(rnying rgyud): mchim snang ldi da 'dod // dmod pa tsa la gas kyi skug+sa ga gas// dang chen pa skyed pa'i rol mo bzag/ mi rung tso 'phrul 'byed pa'i b+h+yo // ri go ba m+b+hil zhing lag g.yig/ zhing grags dag kyang drug tu ba dag/ 'byung ba'i tshu la sogs gtad/
146a4(rnying rgyud): drug po'i gis kyi mtha'// zang bsgral mnan pa sreg 'dzin pa sogs// gang da dgang dag las spong rnams// gnas nangs rdu la dang tshul min pang // byi brag das pa skyes pa brtsam// las byas gnang du song ba dang // ma sing dang li log pa dang // ma 'o
146a5(rnying rgyud): ming ga zhan la 'byags// de rje t+ta// na byung za gdang ya ba// gas pa dag la yang yang khyed// dbyems lang migs bstar gsal shing rgya// rang dang pa la migs kyi // lhang du srung ma khams rigs brdzun// dgrangs
146a6(rnying rgyud): ga rdzog bya// mthun la bzung zhing sti mthun sbed// gnan yang dub dang gnas skyebs dang // yul da yul rgyan+ya gang yin pa/ rigs dang ni rigs shes par bya// d+ha ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi b+hang gA g+ni ga gzod las/ rde kyi la
146a7(rnying rgyud): su na na la su sa lusasu sa na
146b1(rnying rgyud): pa gsungs// danas dang can ba byas das// drag palas kya bar rnams byas// ngang ngang dbang ba thal byung dang // sprul bya rang gzugs babs pa bstan// gangs skad stan pa'i thugs dgags// blathan tha pa par byad// / dang/
146b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi dbang phyug mtha' yas sku// 'od dang gzi brjid dpal 'bar zhed// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' ba// yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa'i sbyin// le ba rgan sngags kyi dbang po la// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi'i rje bkod de/
146b3(rnying rgyud): gdul bya dag dang pa dag pa// gnyis mnyanam ched po'i ngang dra bstim// brjod pa'i tshig la 'bras bu'i don// zangad du byung ba yom to// khyod rtswa snang ba'i gzi brjid dbyis// rab tu byas shing g.yos pa las// 'gro ba'i ma rig mun sel ba// sdong pa'i ye shes blon ma
146b4(rnying rgyud): spang // ngo mtshar 'di dag dpal du che// gang la gang 'dul zin las kyis// de dang der ston rnam par mdzad// dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa yis// snang seng 'khor 'das yongs la khyab// dpal 'bar chen po'i skal bstod// e ma khyod gsung snyan pa yid//
146b5(rnying rgyud): b+ha dbyangs phyogs rnams yongs la khyab// 'dul bya rnam pa dra pa la// rang rang skad kyis bskyed rdol bas// don la ma g.yos sgra chog gaspyad// log pa'i lam du gang 'khyams pa// legs pa pa la ya dag dkong// dbyangs kyi rdul pa yang spang dang/
146b6(rnying rgyud): don dang bcas pa'i chog gis// 'dod 'byung po de bzhin char chen phaT// ma ngag log sbyong gnas su bsgyur// yang dag mdzad pa mthar phyir mdzad// dgag pa byed pa'i gsung las kyang // thun chang med pa'i thos car gyis// nyon mongs pa yis gadrangs pa
146b7(rnying rgyud): da 'das yang spes pa ban// sa te pa lung ra sa// thugs sto pas pa med// rkyen pa da'i rgyag gzung sa brgyad// yam tha gas pa sa pa gying/ yang ga nga nga/ ting pang
147a1(rnying rgyud): ci gshe// thugs rdzobartse ba 'od zur gyi// drabs na ring mad par gsal// brtso rtson pa shes rnam dag pa// gcig dang dram dang bral bas// grangs las 'das pa'i snang ba 'byed// 'di dag rgyal dang / la rnams kyis// ma
147a2(rnying rgyud): bad+mar mdzod mngon 'phags pa// bsam gyis mi khyab gdul bya yi// bsam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa las// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i 'gro 'dra shar// brtse dang me brtse gnyis bral zhing // de bzhin mkhyen dang mi mkhyen pa'i// phyogs sum lhang ris mchad// zung
147a3(rnying rgyud): 'brel ya ma chad// khang mnyam yangs pa'i pho brang du// thugs kyi snang ba rnam par snang // rnam par bkra zhing rnam par 'phro// don rnams kun dang yang dag pa// 'khor 'das gnyis med gcig tu gdal// thug pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zag pa med pa'i
147a4(rnying rgyud): 'od zer gyis// mtha' med 'gro ba re re zhing // snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs mdzad de// yang dag 'khor lo de snyed kyang // dus mtha' med par rab tu bskor// de dag khyed kyi thugs mtha' yas// sku mtha' yas dang gsung mtha' yas// yon tan phrin las mtha'
147a5(rnying rgyud): yas dpal// g.yo med dgongs klong mtha' yas pa'i// thugs rje ye shes khyod la bstod// e ma ho// dpal dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs dkyil nas// shar zhing sprul pa'i yi ge dag/ tshig don gsal bar mngon byung ba// bdag
147a6(rnying rgyud): sogs gdul bya grol ba'i mgon// thogs med rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// snying dang spyi bor yang dga'achang // ngo mtshar zod du 'di khur ro// bkod pa mtha' yas gsung tshig la// 'di kun mngon par spyod pa'i rtsal// ma rig gnyid las slong ba'i sgra// bdag 'dzin zhen

147b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba 'di// bdag cag yang dag spyi bos len// dgongs pa bkrol la rjes yi rang // khro rgyal dbang chen dpal 'bar dang // bdag cag yang dag 'dus pa'i 'khor// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // drang srong bram ze rje 'am ci//
147b2(rnying rgyud): dri za thul bum la sogs te// bdag cag rjes su yi rangs shing // bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las/ rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// I/
147b3(rnying rgyud): sprin las drag pos dgra bgegs bdud dang log sred can gyi gdul bya 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po spu gri reg gcod ces bya ba/ bdag 'dra bad+ma 'byung gnas kyis dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du bsgyur ba rdzogs so// sa ma ya/ rgya n+yakye/ kha tham/ d+ha thaM/ rta nag dregs pa sde brgyad chos
147b4(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' 'di srungs// gter rkun dam nyams log lta bka' la ras gcod byed// rnal 'byor chos la gnas dang rjes 'jug rnams la gnod// bstan la 'tshe byed bdud rigs gdug pa can rnams kyi// lus ngag yid gsum stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang po nyams par gyis/
147b5(rnying rgyud): sha khrag zhal du stob cing lhag ma med par mdzod// bka' 'di'i bdag po u rgyan gsung sras rjes 'jug gi/ dam can rgya mtsho rnams kyis rtag tu bsrung ma dam par gyis// bka' gsang 'di nyid phyogs dus kun tu dar rgyas mdzod// bkra shis bde legs dpal 'bar kun tu
147b6(rnying rgyud): khyab par shog/ skyel ba'i sgra mchog gter ston sangs rgyas gling bas bla dkar dung gi sgo mo klu btsan gnas pa'i sanas gdan drangs pa'o// / u rgya na gsang ba brda'i skad du/ a nan+da rgya chat+yai wa/ bAs+ya/ bod
147b7(rnying rgyud): skad du/ bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod ces bya ba/ byin rlabs thams cad 'dradus pa'i bcom ldan 'das bla ma sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal he rug bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kun 'dus rig pa chos kyi sku// yongs rgyab gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs/
148a1(rnying rgyud): pa brdzur ba dang sngal pa ma// yang byu na sa par dbyu// rA Sh+Ta d+hA ga pa la ba// byu zu sems da// ngas ma ma marnasams ston/ bya gnas 'das pa'o// dang /

148a4(rnying rgyud): sgrib bzang pa'i tshig gis bshad// rgyas pa'i don dang bslus pa'i don// rnam par rab tu 'gros rnams la// 'di ban rang byung gzhi cig go// bla ma'i gsung rgyang bka'i bar mdzod las/ gleng bdi'i le'u skye dang po'i// 'dir bdag sprul pa'i

148a6(rnying rgyud): ldan thams bzlan// rang gtogs pa'i gding laganas// nen pa'i bral mngan ma chags// gzhan dang thugs rje'i brel dang ldan/ bskyed rdugs brtan pa tho ba bas bskur// de bzhin gang la bskur ba'i phul// gsang sngags parda la rjod drung ba// blo langs dang cu
148a7(rnying rgyud): das tshig gnas// thams de ltar bka'aphrul ba// lus ngagi yid rtsa la ldan pas brgyu// mjig rten ces ma yong mer jug// gnong yod ci dang mched la rtse// dro da nyis tho thos thal la bdUr// nye stong chos brgyad gna' gar bzeng // phying bcu phyi
148b1(rnying rgyud): par du// tha dang thab gan// gcig sul na gas 'das dus dang/ na byed bang gi dus mjugs// sag tsang ba pa 'ab// ma ngong ba nagag phyogs pa// an gsum mas kyis brlags// bdun lda pa sa/
148b2(rnying rgyud): gnas lachog ste// rtsal dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dbying 'khong gsum la gnas pa'i dang // legs par ma mi chog bcam// byung po 'dus zhing byin chen dbab// de nas dpel 'khor las la brtson// gtor mchod pa sogs kyinang dang // gas pa'i rjes dang nga /

149b3(rnying rgyud): sha po ru 'byung skyed 'og phyogs// de bzhin mtshams la sogs pa dang // 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dang // dus gsum dus med dus kyi dbyings// phyi rol 'byung ba 'dus pa'i mkhar// rnam par snang ba'i gzugs brgyan rnams// rang snang rnam dag gzhal yas kha /
149b4(rnying rgyud): sems can skyo 'gror gyur pa yang // 'thung ba'i dang sa ma 'dus pa yis// phung be la ni gzugs car dang // las kyi dbang brtson dkar nag chos// gzugs med yid kyi lus la sogs// bag chags rang snang bcas pa ste// dag partsal gyi ye shes bya// ma dka

149b6(rnying rgyud): can// rnam pa du ma'i gzugs su chags// rtsa dang rlung dang khams dang yang // rnam par rgyu dang mi rgyab// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// las 'bras byas byung byed pa'i mthus// dkar dang nag dang 'chol par yang // las kyi 'gro du byed pa ste// ring snang rnam pa
149b7(rnying rgyud): dag shes na// ye shes lha yi gnal yas sra// ngo sa stong pa chos kyi su// rang ba'in rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje'i rtsal snang 'phro 'drab// rang byung sprul pa'i sbur grol bas// 'khrul snang rang dag sgra ye sku// dkar ser dbang sdang la sogs pa/ sku
150a1(rnying rgyud): mdog sna tshogs 'od dang bcas// zer gyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'o// yongs khyab chen po'i lhar grub ste// de ltar ma rtog 'khrul pa'i blo// gzung 'dzin rang sdang 'khrul phyir brgyud// de dag 'khrul 'khor bshig bya'i phyir// dang po de bzhin nyid
150a2(rnying rgyud): kyi ngang // kun tu snang ba'i ting 'dzin las// rgyu yi yi ge rnam par spros// de las bdag nyid dam tshig pa// mos bskyed sku mdog phyag mtshan bcas// tshe dang chung dang rang 'tshams par// yid kyis rnam par sprul zhing bskyed// gdod nas dag pa ye shes sems// 'jug
150a3(rnying rgyud): bstim rnam par rol pas sbyang // 'phro dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin gyis// gtad gzhag med par rnam par gnas// yang dag lha tshogs de bzhin gshegs// rim dang skad cig dran rdzogs su// tha ma rab kyi blo yis gsal// rang sngags mtshan bcas rtsed pa dang //
150a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang sngags kyis// gnad la dbab pa'i mchu sbyor dang // 'byin 'jug gnas pa'i 'gro 'ong gis// rang snang gtso 'khor btson du bzung // dbyer med gcig tu gtan la dbab// nus pa'i rtsal chen sbar bar bya// gnam ma ri rab g.yo bar bri// rgya mtsho nyu kyas
150a5(rnying rgyud): gdab pa dang // nyi zla cha lang lta bur bdab// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang // phyi nang gsang ba rim gyis dkrug/ phyi nang snang srid dpar du byas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha rnams rang dbang ban du bya// bdag dbang lo yis ma yin zhing // pe nya bdag
150a6(rnying rgyud): bdung rgya/ phrag shes brtan pa phab// daltang brgyang bar lags // nga myang gdad la banas kyang // 'khring por rje thagal ba das// sa pa gsu lar rimams 'phro// bag zugasang bzang kyis padul// ra bslang rigs sa da gas
150a7(rnying rgyud): pa ngaskyed pa/ rgyags ngas// nga dzu pa ra 'drus byung/ gang gang ma sa chungs mye papa lagyur/ na pa / sa byed kyi/ gas pa
150b1(rnying rgyud): na/ gangs byams pas ltung dang // bar gas na dkan ba maspyod 'am/ la ba byed sgrug man// yangasas garnam pasmra// dU d+hA la dud dmas pa nga na
150b2(rnying rgyud): ba// nyon cig rang byung dang rtsal 'khong // snang zhing sring dang ngalas gzhan// dngos dang dngos men gnyis snong chos// gzugs dang ming ge mthang can kun// la 'das chan pa'i dbyings su them// 'di ga ni lte ba'i rgyal po yin// gang dadapa dag pa'i gdeng cad 'ang
150b3(rnying rgyud): bcos paslang med par gtan la dbab// bcing grol med pa'i gnas lugs la// bcos bslad me dang rarang gzhag nas// g.yo 'gul med par gtan la phab// grang dor med pa'i dang nyid la// rang ba balhag par bzhag pa yis// yengs 'khrul rnyeng dang brab par da
150b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yug ba mtshams med par 'chang // snang sring rol pa rang grol thob// 'di kun bsgom pa'i rgyal po yid// rang rtsal rig pa'i tshe 'phrul kun// rang shar rang la thal ba'i gnad// g.yo 'gul 'phong gyur med par gzhag/ rang lugs bab la rtsal zad 'bad// badz+ra
150b5(rnying rgyud): dang ngan dang dkar nag chos// gang yang blang dang ngor med par// rang snang rang grol chen por bsag/ mnyam pa nyid las mnyam snang ba/ byed pa med las thams cad byas// gang yang dgag dang bsgrub med par// bab la skyed pa'i rnam 'gyur cad// 'di kur spyod pa'i rgyal po
150b6(rnying rgyud): med// kun gas zu tu sdang bar chos// bcos bslad med par rang gi shes sra// 'byur ba med par rang du byam// lus dag med pa rnam dong ba// sku gsum bsgrub pa nyid la gnas// phra mo'i las kun rnam par snang // rang byung gzhi las g.yos med par// lam gyi bral chan
150b7(rnying rgyud): dab rdzogs par// byin pa'i thul pa'i thodzad de// rang byung bcud ngu rab smin pas// 'bras bu rtsol med gzhil phebs// 'dis 'bras bu'i rgyal po min// 'dogs med pa'i la chen gyis// mtha' bral dbyings pa kung sbyang skyong // bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// brtsol/
151a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i rnas 'dus/ klu me pa pa 'das pasmrams/ rgyud TI garang th+yA darjes su dag/ dalas tu rjod pa zhes kyi// rdzam chen ba ba smon na// dengs shAng rungab to// da'o ngang das du tu /
151a2(rnying rgyud): de'i rnam sa pa / pan byung ba gan pa ga.A p+na mi'ang ma mi kyi ma gsus // nag pa dpas byabyas padang / med mad papa do byu ga/ sa //
151a3(rnying rgyud): 'dang dris bzhin// cha 'thum rnam pa de 'dul bas// lal 'khor ba'i tshabs la bsgyu// mdag la migs 'ams pamanan// lal ma shes rang ca la jugs// man du kri pa bdag nyi sa// 'alag ga las gdas medad
151a4(rnying rgyud): 'a 'bras// bgal cal dra ga des pa'o// de dang de'i banas dbyung de// b+he bri la mogs yang dag shes// dgongs dang yang dag dgangs pa dang // gnyen dang rjem dang drang ba dang // dgangs pa'i tshe phral yang dag pas// 'dra dang 'gro ba tsha rna /
151a5(rnying rgyud): gzhag med la de bzhin stong // tha ma'i gsung rgyang dka'i ba mdzad las/ bral lam rdzogs rim gyi les sna bzhi pa'o// / d-igs rlung 'jig ston pa yis// rlung du 'jug pa'i chos rnams can// byung du 'jug pa'i 'ab rnams pa//
151a6(rnying rgyud): phyir yang dag bstan// 'khor dang 'das pa'i chos rnams can// spyi dang bye brag khyang bar yang // zung du 'jug pachen po nye// snang ba ma 'gags bskyed pa dang // stong pa mtha' bral rdzogs pa yang / gnyis med chen por zung du jug/ ma byed dang byung tshis rdung mo dang /
151a7(rnying rgyud): rtsol byas byung bde tsas rnams kyang // ngagag med zung du 'jug pa'o// rgya las byung ba'i chos rnams dang // gyen gyis bsgyur ba'i chas rnams kyang // gnyis med zur du 'dug pa ste// mdar na gnyis dang gnyis chas kun// gnyis med thos thal brang 'jug ces/
151b1(rnying rgyud): de byir ba de dang skyong ba'i chos// zag med spyong dazang chud pas// thabs kyi pa' gastobs pan dang // shes rab dpa' ma stobs thal ga/ su cig gnas pabyo 'phrul cis// spyod pa shes nyid smra ba// 'phrul 'khor ba'i rnam la cis// 'kho
151b2(rnying rgyud): yongs grub ye rdzogs dpal// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta// khyim gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la// yid bzhin nor mchog rab snang ba// rgya byed bdag po'i cho 'phrul dang // 'gro dang 'ong dang gnas pa'i stobs// nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin// gling bu'i sgra las
151b3(rnying rgyud): drangs nas ni// steng dang 'og tu rnam par bcing // 'phro ba dgag cing gnas pa spyod// rnam par rgyu dang rgyu ba ni// dgag dang mi dgag blang dor med// de dag yid kyi skyes bus bsad// nyi ma dag tu yang dag ldan// zla ba dag tu yang dag snang // zla ba dbyings su
151b4(rnying rgyud): bskyod de bcing // nyi ma 'og tu gnas pa sbar// 'bar nga 'dzag pa'i cho 'phrul kun// srog gi gnas su yang dag sba// kun lam rtsal gyi 'phro ba ni// bskyed pa'i tshe dang yang dag ldan// 'du bar byed pa rdzogs pa'i don// mnyam gnas zung du 'jug pa ste// bzhi las
151b5(rnying rgyud): 'phags shing lam du gnas// 'bras bu dbyings su phyin pa yi// TI lA bya tshwa dgye rgyun 'babs pas// dbang dang dbang yul yongs la khyab// dbang la khyab pas rnam par gsal// dbang yul la khyab cho 'phrul sdang // de kun sgyu ma'i zhing khams te// dag pa gsum gyi rtsa la
151b6(rnying rgyud): 'phar bas// ma dag cho 'phrul thabs kyis gnon// rang las shar ba'i ring rtsol gyis// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkra// rgyu las byung ba'i dngos po ni// ye shes rol pa'i rtsal chen 'bar// 'od kyis snang mun ma lus pa// bisal nas rnam par rab tu bkra// mtha' yas/
151b7(rnying rgyud): gdal ba'i rtsal bas kyang // glang chen stobs la seng ge'i rtsal// ha ltar 'phyo dang glog ltar 'khyug/ gnam lcags zog chen 'khor ba'i shugs// lo brgyad byis pa'i ngang tshul can// phyi nang gsang ba'i de nyid shes// srid pa tha ma'i lus gyur pas// thun mor mthong /
152a1(rnying rgyud): snang sna tshogs snang // khyad par ye shes mig can la// rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs snang ba// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// sku gsum nyid las ma g.yos pas// zung 'jug rtsal du shar ba'o// g.yo dang 'gul dang ldeg pa dang /
152a2(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi dra bas khengs pa dang // lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// dri zar bcas pa thams cad kyang // dga' zhing mgu nas mngon par bstod// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bar mdzod las/ grol lam bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug gi rim pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
152a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i skal pad+ma'i ljags// rnam grol de bzhin yang dag thugs// rtsol med rang byung bcom ldan 'das// thogs med rgyal po 'od mi 'gyur// sprin grol zab mo'i chos rnams ni// snang ba'i 'khor la char du phab// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu smin// rtsal chen lam gyil
152a4(rnying rgyud): 'dab rgyas// dpag chen bzhin du mkha' la spyod// e ma ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// sku gsung thugs la mngon par bstod// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// byin rngubs rang byang
152a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa zla ma'i gsang rgyung bka'i ba mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so// / sa ma ya/ #\u0f7f/ srasar+b+ba/ gad+had \u0f7f/ gter ma/ khabam/ !waMm/ #/ oM D+yan gsungasras sbrul su sangs rgyas gling sa rba
152a6(rnying rgyud): dung gi sgo mo nas bton pa shrad+haM/ u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ tha g+ha ta A tha prad kya ts+tsha/ bod skad du/ yaM dam gyi gsang rgyud bka'i thar ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal zhing dang / khro ba dang / rngam pa dang / yab dang

152b1(rnying rgyud): sa nga/ sa snya du ma satsun / na sa du ma

152b5(rnying rgyud): zin sna gasrung gi dkyil 'khor du// s+thA yi bkod par bsnang ba// sba ba'i dbyings dang yang dag ldan// wA dang lha min mi dang ni// dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal ba'i mthar// khyed kyi gsung gi dbang po yis// khyab cing so so'i mthun snang nga // skad dang // don bcas pa ma /

154a7(rnying rgyud): mngag/ 'ching bdag pas srid la mgrol// 'ching ba ma dag srid par 'khor// des na srid pa'i 'khong sa ni// bshig pa'i rten 'brel zang mo ni// thabs kyi sbyor ba rnams pas 'byung // thabs ni thabs ldan chen pas gsungs// de la yang dgang rten nas byang//

154b4(rnying rgyud): dang // rje dzagra sa dang yal ga dang // 'bar lo lnga la sogs pa yi// stong phrag bdun drurtsa gnyis kyang // bkri shes gang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// rnam par ga po dang mig so ba'i// ting 'dzin yang dge 'phel 'gyur zhing // de la nul par grub po// lnga dang 'du ba
154b5(rnying rgyud): nagang 'dris bzhin ma grangs su// nyi khri tshig stong drug brtse dag// las dag byang chub nyid gur nas// yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang // zla ba rnam par dkar bar 'phel// hI ma'i skyobs kyang rab 'bar bas// 'bar 'jig stobs mnyam sbyor ba 'is// rnam grol 'bres bu mchog rdzi /
154b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas gzhon te po dog rnam bcings pas// nga gi zigs pas rgya mcho dkrug/ rmas pa'i dod zer stod khams khengs// 'dzag pa med pas 'dzag pa 'phel// zhog nas bcings te steng du bskyod// sgyu gcan dag gis mnyam gnas pa// yongs khyad ngos bzung bral ba yi// mchog don
154b7(rnying rgyud): rnam par daphyi sa ba/ skabs// yang dag mchog la yang dag par// gnas pa ni stobs kyang de las 'byung // mdor na gnas dang spyod pa dang // 'gro nga 'od dang 'dug pa dang // phyi ma dang bdag po nor byas par// rom nyam gcig dang 'ad mnyam pas// gsang ba'i gnas las lengs/

155a3(rnying rgyud): lang go med ye gsang ste// la lar rmad du byung bas gsung // la lang sgom phye bas gsar// dam med log par lta byed la// gsang ba gnyan phyir yang dag gsang // de ltar gsang ba rnam bkra ba'i// thabs dang shes rab mchog la reg/ spyi phud lnga par gyur pa'o// yi dam
