155a5(rnying rgyud): gtang rgya/ gter rgya/ kha tha ma/ d+ha thim/ rgya rgya rgya/ bdag 'dra gar gyi dbang phyug rol pa ye shes kyis bla dkar dung gi sgo mo nas gdan drangs pa'o// / u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ Tam bya swa sA nAH / bod skad du/ mkha'
155a6(rnying rgyud): gro'i gsang rgyud bka'i lce mig ces bya ba/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i dbyings las/ longs su gsal dag rnam par bkra ba'i gzi brjid kyi/ sprul sku 'gro 'dul thabs kyi rgyal mo/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba'i dbang mo che dpal 'bar brtse ba'i sgra dbyangs ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
155a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan bde ba'i dbang mo che'i// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rnam par rol pa'i rtsal 'gyed ma// sbrul dang yang sbrul dpag med kyis// sa dang bar snang g.yo byed ma// sku gsung thugs las rang byung ba'i// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas// kun kyang rab
155b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs dur khrod chas// dar dang rin chen rus pas sbas// lag na gri zong kha T+wAM 'dzin// spu yi rigs dang gsung gi rigs// thugs kyi rigs dang yon tan rigs// phrin las rigs dang rnam lnga lnga// rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs/
155b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rigs dang rnam pa lnga// dkar se nga mar ljang mthing ga ste// ye shes las las grub pa yi// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas rnams kyang // sna tshogs las byed cho 'phrul 'gyed// rnam 'gyur gar gyi rol bcad// stangs stabs gcig tu ma nges shing // gdu
155b3(rnying rgyud): don du nges med ston// dgongs pa'ang gcig tsum nges par// gang la gang 'dul thabs ldan pas// 'grong du la thugs rjes yongs pa khyab// de ltar gtso 'khor bcas pa rnams// dur khrod rab 'jigs klong+ka yangs su// lhan cig rnam par rol pa'i tshe// gtso mo'i skul
155b4(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i 'khor// dkar mo rigs kyi zla sgrims// ye shes bskyed pa'i tshul zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje lus kyi lde mig bstan// gtso mo'i gsung las sprul pa'i 'khor// dmar mo rigs kyi rma ni mas// bzlas pas sngags kyi tshul zhus pas// bcom
155b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// gsung dbyangs ngag gi lde mig gsungs// gtso mo'i thugs las sprul pa'i 'khor// sngon mo rigs kyi rtagi pas// gnas lugs dgongs pa'i don zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// thugs mdzod gnas lugs sde mig sasangs
155b6(rnying rgyud): gletso mo'i yon tan sprul pa'i 'khor// ser mo rigs kyi zla khrims// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa'i gnad zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi lde mig gsungs// gtso mo phrin las sprul pa'i 'khor// ljang nag rigs kyi rnga khrims// sna tshogs
155b7(rnying rgyud): phrin las don zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs las bsgyur lde mig gsungs// nyid kyi sprul pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// ye shes las las grub 'dus nas// mgrin gcig dbyangs kyis nus pa ni// cho 'phrul rtags kyi byang tshul zhus// bcom ldan
156a1(rnying rgyud): 'das mas bka' bya pa// rtags dang blo 'phrul rje mig gsungs// mkha' 'gro gsung byud bka' sde mig las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas pas 'tha' ba// ulas la sa ga ga/
156a2(rnying rgyud): rdzapa gtso 'khor bskyed 'dod na// rang 'dod bral ba'i brje sems kyis// gnas bzang dur khrod ba 'jigs bsgom// drang skyeng rdul gyi cho 'phrul las// ye shes chen po'i mi rlung gis// bdag lus 'byung ba'i grong khyer bshig/ mang cig ye sa med dme
156a3(rnying rgyud): hrIHdang ma las gtso mo ni// dmar na ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// zhal gcig khro zhal 'jigs rngams can// zhal gcig rtog med phyag gi gdong // rab tu khros pa'i gad rgyangs sgrogs// phyag g.yas gri gug nam mkhar phyar// g.yon pas tshang khrag thugs kar ba
156a4(rnying rgyud): brkyangs bskums ro yi gdan la 'gying// rnam 'gyur gar gyi rol pa can// dur khrod rin chen rus pa dang // sna tshogs dar gyi cod pan sras// nu ma 'bung zhing lhag rgyas// lang tsho dang la bab pa'i tshul// ral pa nag po rtsen mthar las// dril brag yeng la'i sri dbyangasa'i wang/
156a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo yab kyi tshul can du// mtshan khung khru mor kha T+wAM ga/ gtso mo chen mo dpal 'brar ma// rang 'od 'khrigs pa'i dbus na bzhugs// de yi phyogs bzhir bskyed pa'i 'khor// shar du rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge ha las byung ba yi// sngon mo'i mdog can mkha' 'asgom/
156a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gri brugazod pa 'dzin// lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge ri las byung ba yi// ser mo'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// rin chen gri gug thod pa 'dzin// nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi 'khor// yi ga ni las byung ba yi// dmar mo'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// badz+ra ga drug zong
156a7(rnying rgyud): khrag na/ phyi phyogs las kyi shes kyi 'khod// logs las byung ba yi// ljang bu'i mdog can mkha' grem// rtags bre thug zod pa 'dzin// kun byeng rnam 'byung gang stangs can// khros pa'i tshul la hU~M sa rdzas// rang rang thabs kyid pa'abo da // mthas sa
156b1(rnying rgyud): gcan lung bakhyud // so so rang rang rigs kyi 'khor// 'dzag rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo mang pos bskor// kun kyang cha lugs rnam 'byung kun// gcig tu ma nges mtshogs ston// sgrub pa pa la grogs mdzod cing // dmachog can gyi stan pa bca
156b2(rnying rgyud): nyams pa can la chad pa gcod// rang 'od 'khrigs pa'i klong dkyil na// de ltar gtso 'khor bskyed pa ste// gdul bya'i snang tshul tha dad pas// lus grub rtsa grub lhan cig pas// gzhal yas ma bskyed dang gis gsal// rdza grub de la thig les khyab// sna tshogs dgas
156b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// ma bskyed rang bzhin lhan gyis grub// de ltar rtsa dang thig le'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi rgyun rlung gis// bskyed bya skyed byed skyed mkhan rnams// rtsol bral rang byung rnam par dag/ des na da mtshig ye shes kyang // gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa'i rtsang/
156b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med gnyis su med par rol// 'on kyang rig cal cho 'phrul las// chu la chu bzhag rnam pa can// dgug bsnye ma dmigs pa'i bye brag kyang // gang 'os rnam 'gyur sna tshogs sgo/ de ltar dam tshig ye shes bskyed// mkha' 'gro gas brgyad bka'i lde mig las/
156b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' bro'i gtsol khor bskyed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// gsung las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyan// mkha' 'gro gtso dang 'khor rnams rdzi// bzlas pa sngags kyi tshul lugs ni// rtsi ba pan pa
156b6(rnying rgyud): ma pa gnyis// rtsa ba gtso mo'i bzlas swa sti// AM badz+ra b+ha ra hU~M/ dzA ki ni hrIHswA hA/ phyi nang gsang bar rang grags pa'i// 'dzab dang shub bu'i bzlas pa dang // blo med rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can gyis// 'byin 'jug gnas pa rlung gi grangs// rang byung rtsal
156b7(rnying rgyud): bral bsnyen pa yis/ ye shes mkha' 'gro nga gis 'grub// rtsol bcas 'bad pa nyid dag gis// 'jig rten 'khrul gtam spangs nas ni// dad brtson dmatshig ldan pa yis// yang dag rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa ni// grangs dang dus dang rtags rnams ni// yang dag gsungs la 'ang
157a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// phyi nang rlung gi stong ba dang // rang babs gnas lugs 'khrul 'khor gyis// dmigs pa snying ga'i 'khor la bskor// sa bon dag la rab bskor bas// draga' ba 'khyil pa yi shes bskyed// spyi ba la sogs gnas lta ru// sngags kyi ye she
157a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dbab// bde stong drang du mnyam par gzhag/ spangs tog ye shes grub pa ste// dril dang bsgrag dang gtor ba dang // gnad la nges par dbab pa yis// bcom ldan 'das ma nyid dang ni// rnal 'byor dbyer med gcig gyur pas// 'gro 'dus 'bor rnams dam la
157a3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i gnad kyis rab tu gzir// yan lag 'khor gyi brten pa ste// srog gi yi ge nyid bstan pa// rdo rje rin chen pa thalas// rim bzhin ha ri ni sa ste// a yis yang dag dbu brnyes shing // hUM gis skud cing phaT gyis gtor// sdud pas snying gi dkyil du ste// gtor brtsa ba
157a4(rnying rgyud): lus pa'o// a ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ 'di bdun yang dril srog gi sngags// gnad 'bebs ye shes dbab dang bcas// A be sha ya hrIM hrI gdagra/ srog yig dam du bcangs pa'o// rang rang mtshan sngags bstan pa ni// oM badz+ra DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM rat+na DA ki nI hUM phaT/ A~M satwa DA k+ki
157a5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM karma DA ki nI hUM phaT/ de ltar rigs bzhi dag la ni// rigs bsdus pa yi gtso mchog tu// oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI hUM phaT/ kun khyab ye shes gdal khyab po// de ltar srog yig mtshan sngags te// gtso 'khor rab tu dril nas ni// gnad la gzir ba'i sngags bstan pa// oM badz+ra
157a6(rnying rgyud): rahI/ hrIHma DA ki nI ha re ni sa/ sarba sid+d+hi pha la hUM a/ de ltar rtsa srog yang dag ldan// dngos grub bcas pa de nyid kyi// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur// gtso 'khor gnad la phebs pa yis// so so'i sbyor ba nyid dang ni// rlung gi gnang la yang dag dbang // srog gi gnang du
157a7(rnying rgyud): yang bskul// rlung gi rta la rab bskyon pas// gang la gang 'dul thabs kyi cha// shAn+tiM pa shi puSh+TiM dang // mA ra ya yi las mtha' sbyar// de las spros pa'i yan lag tu// ngar dang ldan pas gang dang gang // so sor gtan la dbab pas 'bad// rtsol bcas rtsol bral nyid dag dang // stong
157b1(rnying rgyud): spya pas ga pa tsa/ bdan mang ba las gagags pa/ bad dang dradangs bzlas pa'i nga song mdang sa pa kyang/ gang ga dug pa shes param/ ma 'ang thogs da 'i thogalas na dgas myos pa bang bca
157b2(rnying rgyud): mam lda ngas pas rgyalab// rnags pas sgras pa'i ma 'di tshan// yang ga kyig sugasa'o// zung na ya pa ma sbyin cig/ rang ga pa du byu na chos/ mangs pa da chung
157b3(rnying rgyud): gas dpa' // gas pa padag ci rtag pa med// ma ba kyi rnam pa can// ngas ning 'di nga tshan pa rdug// da kye+e ngas rgyad rdzogs par bzlugs// de yang nga las thang nga meng // sngags rjes 'tha~M du 'tshal bci// rangs bkyis mas
157b4(rnying rgyud): yang thub pa rab tung bag/ tha~Mng dang bar grags so// bdas dang yang sa byud yang bya car// gdus bya du pa'i ras rtam sa canags la pa'i bur nags pa// de 'ung thu ga dumar byung dang // de las dam pa rab masapas
157b5(rnying rgyud): spyo pa skye/ pa // rgyum pa ga zugs pa / rdzogs na mgamag ga da das sa
157b6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ba / bad pa dang nga da// deng ba rnyen pa'i las la ma// sus rdzogs na // rdzu sgrubs nam byung dag 'a bsag/ 'dul la ba ny-id pa tug ga// ngagan 'dagatam slababacad// swa ts+tshi sa pa
157b7(rnying rgyud): pas// bzlas pa sngags ci ga dang pagang/ mad 'i byur dang bla pas// sngags ci'i tha ma pa la gsapa// mya dang brdzas pa 'dzin pa c-ing // de skye sa sa dag me dag rdzumapa// yang sa med su ses la gcung // srug sung thugs kyi sa
158a1(rnying rgyud): dpa sa/ sa/ na / ma nan sa ngam/
158a2(rnying rgyud): gnas su dkyi 'khor bri// byin gsang sogs rdzas rnams dang // mchod gtor thugs des skong rdzas rnams// bkod ba phun sum tshogs par bsham// mchims kyi rim pa dam par bcad// dgyes par byed pa mchod pa rdzas// 'a 'ar byen
158a3(rnying rgyud): las la chug pa mngag pa'i rdzas// sna tshogs mas kyi bye brag rnams// dur khrong rngas la gzhi nangs pas// bag mo byin chags brjid par bkram// de ltar rten rnams rdzogs par da // rang nyid zho gsum mnyam gnas pas// sgrub pa'i lam la 'jug par
158a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed mdun du bskyod pa yi// lha yi ti 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// de nas bzlas pa'i las la 'jug/ sla ba bcad de yengs med 'bad// thun par dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// mchod dang gtor ma bstod pa bya// ye shes dpa' snying phrin la so gno/
158a5(rnying rgyud): rtags rdzogs pa du ste// dus lam g.yel bsgrub par bya// phyi nang gsang rtags rdzogs nas kyang // bsgrubs rjes las kyi mtha' sdud dang // dmigs su bsgyur ba'i rim pa rnams// rang rang gnas skabs skabs dang bstun// bsgrub pa'i snying po lon par bya// mkha'
158a6(rnying rgyud): gsang rgyud bka'i ldemag lngas/ bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i las bstan pa'i leng rtse lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mos bka' stsal ba// phrin las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// drin las mkha' 'gro kha brgyar sna tshogs ni// bsnyen dang bsring la brtan
158a7(rnying rgyud): theb nas// gdangang gang gis zhi ba'i las// bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro la// nga rgyal ldan pas sna tshogs brtsam// de bzhin byas pa'i las rnams kyang // bdag nyid rin chen mkha' 'gro yi// dartsal ldan pas rdza tshogs brtsam// dbang byed dbang ga las rnams kyang //
158b1(rnying rgyud): bang da ba pa' 'a'adog/ danam dzadrabs sa rgyasmras banam// dran ma du myod sa nas kyang / 'ad rgod pa rtso mtshab// ngan mya nams rdzog sa byas// dbyas nyan pabardzogasacad da nya /
158b2(rnying rgyud): ma par bya// gzhan 'dabs pa pa'i las sbyor bya// bcom pa ma par yin na na// sra sa 'byung 'gran pa med par 'thab// rang dang khengs pa'i ran rgyadan// Na ri ga sri bu bum par// 'byung dres bdod // rje
158b3(rnying rgyud): na sa / ngas da la sa// ba spya sa gra bas
158b4(rnying rgyud): gso brgyan don grwa'i rtul phra'o// mildang 'grogs byur bana'i sgo mig nas/ lamakhan rlom pa brtan pa'i le ste ga / cwos ldan dmams pakang rgyal pa// 'jig rten das dang sa la sa nga// me 'jan pa
158b5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ston// ga byed cing bsgrub pa'i// rtag sa dang drim ni// bye dang nang gtin the'adu// rnam pa pas ma gyis mi 'char// rab la dngam dang phreng la nyan bya// ba mchil ma dga' 'char// sa sa pa smrapa dang /
158b6(rnying rgyud): yis 'das brtse// slang nga gsung dang thugs thob rtags// so'i rigs dang rigs 'jab// mkha' dag shes dang bum gnyer dang // ren chen 'bru 'i phung po'am// char dra bab sogs dpag med dang // bza' ba tung gagos 'ongs tid rdzas// sbyin dang
158b7(rnying rgyud): ste cu khyod// mi sring mdza ma bud med rishis// rgyan mdzes gos bzang bus shing 'dud / thogs dang brtse dag rjes su 'brang // dga' ba'i nam 'byur dpag med na// rig pa dang sa shing dbyung bar// bde legs pan tan 'dra' ba pa// rnam gyur bad
159a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ tags dpag med 'byung // sgra 'od zer dang mdzes pa'i gzugs// rigs dang rigs 'dra pag med 'byung // gzhan yang tshe 'phrul nam pa ni// byi nang 'byung ba'i nyer len dang // las dang las rnams 'thab pa dang // ma chung zig le'i gang tong dang //
159a2(rnying rgyud): de dag 'khrul pa'i cho 'phrul las// lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung ba ste// rang rang blo yis legs par dpyad// bzang la rnam par mi spro zhing // ngan la sbags pa bskyed mi byed// gang dang gang gi rtags dang ni// cho 'phrul rnam pa gang la yang /
159a3(rnying rgyud): ched zed gal ma mchis su gzhag/ rnam par 'chol ba'i rigs rnams dang // nges pa can dang nges pa med// de sogs gang dang gang la yang // bsam gyis mi khyab brtag dka' bas// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid nyams gtso// lus ngag yeng gsum dbang 'byor bas/
159a4(rnying rgyud): snang srid gtan la phebs pa ste// 'bras bu skra gsum ye shes lnga// bzang mo'i klong du sprin cing grol// bsgyur med 'khrul 'khor la thag bcad// 'pho 'gyur med par gtan la phebs// mkha' 'grogs de rgyud bka'i lde mipa las/ rtags dang cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste
159a5(rnying rgyud): 'dun pa'o// / de nas nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor// dkar mo skra dang dmar mo gsung // sngon ma thugs kyi dgas rnams dang // ser mo yon tan rigs dang ni// wang gu phrin las rigs rnams te// ye shes dbyings kyi ga'ang 'gror tshogs// dngos dang sba pa
159a6(rnying rgyud): yang sprul 'khor// las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// dngos dang sprul pa yang sprul te// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mtha' yas rnams// dga' zhing spro ba'i rnam 'gyur gyis// lus kyis gar stabs sna tshogs bstan// ngag gis bstod bsngags klu byings sgrogs// yid
159a7(rnying rgyud): kyis bsam gtan rang bzhin sbal// bcom ldan 'das pa'i sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las bcas pa pa// rnam 'gyur du mas mngon par brjod// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rted kun// g.yo dang 'phrul dang brdeg pa dang // 'od kyi thabs bdas pa dang // dang po
159b1(rnying rgyud): dang zham yang // rje za bcas pa thams cang kyang // dag nang gas pas mngon par bstod// mkhar 'grogs bud pan 'a sum ga'as/ rjes su yo ngashang sa dbar bad pa la btang ba ga// smin las mab da
159b2(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba mkha' 'thogs rdung ba'i sem ga ces bya brdzogs so// mas// dasaH// // yag/ / bral phrag kyi pang shAg da/ lam bya / rlu gams brgyad ngos kyi sa ga
159b3(rnying rgyud): btsan gyi gnas nas gdan drangs pa'o// sa 'brag gi lo stag gi zla ba na chos kyi bka' bkrol nas 'brug gi zla ba la bka' rdzogs lung rdzogs u D+yan yab yum gyi byang sems dkar dmar dang bcas pa/ bdag cag rtsa ba'i bu bco lnga/ chos bdag nyer gcig dang / 'pho
159b4(rnying rgyud): can brgyadang cha brgyad rnams la rim par gnang ba lags saM// u D+ya gsang ba'i skadadu/ ma la las shA ma/ tsug das du/ pre d+ha sa rba pra rdza sa ka/ bush+tsa pA ri sa matwAr+thA nA ma/ bod ska du/ sangs rdzas thams ca kyi
159b5(rnying rgyud): gcig po/ gsang pa gcod pas bon gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dran pa kun gyi thog ma yi// dngos mdzad sangs rgyas thogam pa// dang po nyid du phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska dbadag la grags pa 'i// sangs kyis bdung gyur gyi// dgongs pa nyid dang grangs med par// thugs
159b6(rnying rgyud): sa par/ gas nga rnyan da smu ga / ma das 'i bag pa / ga ga rnam mas// denakyis pa mas sa// pa'i da me // sa mas su bshad payin// pa'i gsung ma / ga
159b7(rnying rgyud): skabs yul don rje/ lal ma 'ongs 'jug don yin// phal 'dul don tha dang nyid// gling gi snying po cho ga 'ga' las// kun gyis grubapa ma yin no// bstan pa 'phel byedas pan du// 'di kun bzhag nga byin brlabs las// rang byung nyid du thugs les par/
159b8(rnying rgyud): rgyad dpe sor bzhad byas//
160a1(rnying rgyud): de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad bya// thags kyi sras ni gcig par yang // rang byung chen po'i daphel dang bcas// 'byung ba ska d+ma thal bar byung // 'di ni bstan pa gang byung du// 'ang+ge gang bcas te 'byung ba dzin// gangs 'dra
160a2(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa'i mi// bstan pa ku/ kyi bdag por 'gyur// 'di la ldem por bstan pa med// sras kyang bshad cing nyan med par// rang byung dgongs paklong rdol du// nyi ma smin las thon pa bzhin// sus kyang ma bsgribs dang byung ngo // 'di la 'byung bzhi'i gnod
160a3(rnying rgyud): med pas// nam mkha' dgral yar bar snang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu sus thob pa// 'di nyid de la snang ba yin// 'di ma mthong ba'i sangs kyis ni// gcig kyang 'byung brta gyid med// de rjer bstan pa rnams kyi bcos// sangs rgyas kun kyi sras gcig po//
160a4(rnying rgyud): myang 'das 'thob pa'i snga thag yin// dgongs pa rang thog 'bebs pa yi// gnad kyi tshig tu 'di nyid byung // 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas nyid ni lus thob pa// de tshe 'di ni lan gsum du// nam mkha' dag la 'phar ba dang // rang 'ong
160a5(rnying rgyud): po 'di las 'byung // 'di 'dzin rdul 'byor skal che bas// lan ga sum 'di ma chog kun+da snang // lhag dang chad pa med par ni// rdo rje'i skye yis sus brjod pa// 'di yang de dang mnyam par yang // 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// de phyir bstan pa'i rgyud rnams
160a6(rnying rgyud): g+hana?// thams cad bus gcig bsgoms shes kyang // dadu ma ldang par grol ba rnyed// 'di nis bon dang 'brel bas// bstan pa'i bdag po gang sangs rgyaste/ 'di nyid sa bon med par ni// bstan pa'i gsung ni rdzog tsam yang / khyi bo dbang pos badzod kyi nus/
160a7(rnying rgyud): drirje 'dris ma babye byeng // rgyal rnamam pang 'byung ba med// brgyad pa gcig gi nyigs sal// byi nub sa tshig ni 'a bye kyang // gang la snang ba'i mi des kyang // sa 'byo byang drangabs pas kyi// khyi yi dab pos brjod da rgyas// sems
160b1(rnying rgyud): kye busam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa dang // ci lngar mthun pa'i chos dudran// 'di las skyon par nus pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang gcig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa dang // dbyer mi phyed par 'dis 'gyur ro// de phyir bstan pas
160b2(rnying rgyud): me ro yin// rang byung tshig gi rgyal po 'di// so so'i sems can sde gzugs la// so so'i brda skad ji lta bar// 'di nyid de ltar snang ba yin// de phyir rang byung yi ger ni// thog ma bab kyis grub nas byung // rang byung bcom ldan 'das pa yang //
160b3(rnying rgyud): lta rdzogs pa'i lugs su snang // zos kyi sde snod nyid du ni// 'di tshig ye nas rang shar bas// thog ma dran pa'i gzhir gyur te// dran pa thams cad ma stongs par// tshig 'di kun kyang snang ba yin// dran zud tshig 'dadi zad par ni// rdo rje zhes rje tshog ra
160b4(rnying rgyud): sran// 'byung ba'i rkyen dang bral bas na// rdo rje kun 'byung gsang sngags yin// thabs lam du mas mtshon pa'i phyir// rang thabs bsgos pa 'di las byung // snying po rang 'dul bstan pa'i brjed// gzhi nyid kyi ni bab yin no// chos kun mnyam pa'i nan tan
160b5(rnying rgyud): rdzog/ rang gnad du ni 'di kun shar// 'di la nus pa gcig nyid med// bsgom dang bslab pa'i rtsa bar yang // 'di sngags 'khrul ba'i tshig ma yin// ma 'khrul sngon thog nyid kyi gzhi// 'di las 'phros pa spros pa'i rgyud// rgyu las 'bras bu rang byung bzhin//
160b6(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid las ni tshig kun kyang // dran pasam bral ba'i ngang nyid las// byas pa med par byung ba yin// 'od zer 'dzin pa'i skyes bu la// 'di ni snang bar 'gyur ba'o// de las 'phel nas grangs 'ga' 'byung // gsang ba'i bden pa gcig pa nyid// grangs med
160b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi// thugs dol nya / gcig dgongs don gcig/ 'dzin med yangs pa'i rtod phung yin// thod brgal theg papa kun gyi gnad// rangs 'byed pa'i sde mig mchog/ 'di ni bde ba'i sa bon 'dzin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab yin//
161a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' mnyam dag pa'i gan dag zer 'das// bstan pa can gyirtsa ba 'dzin// 'di 'i grangs sna bzung bas no// lha mon g.yul rnams dang ldogaH// 'du ga bzung ba tsam kyis 'gyur// khams ga ngag yan 'das/
161a2(rnying rgyud): bzlog go// rigs drug rnams kyi 'bros khung 'geb// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong myur du// 'jug par byed pa'i 'khor lo yin// srid pas bcings pa rnams la ni// 'di yis grol bar byed pa'o// dam pa'i snying po// dung rgyad du// drang du rten du rna ba
161a3(rnying rgyud): gyur// 'dis rdo bla ma'i sku mi srang // sbyang sa nyi ma'i 'od brdal bas// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i sman pa ni// 'di yi sna rang sangs nyid du 'gro// lhag par gnas pa'i ye shes ni// 'di yis mchog tu ston par byed// dkon pa'i mchog rnams
161a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yum// sems del bsam gtan dang gis 'grub// chos sku'i snang ba dus gcig tu// ston par byed pa'i sgron ma'o// phyin ci log las yang dag tu// dag par byed pa'i chu rgyun yin// theg pa kun gyi mthar thug tu// skyel bar byed pa'i shing
161a5(rnying rgyud): rta'o// thos bsam bsgom pa'i rgyang shing du// 'jug par byed pa'i dngos po yin// sde snod thams cad 'dzin pa yi// mnyen lhag ldan pa'i lcags kyu'o// rnal 'byor dag pa'i dkyil 'khor te// lam du 'jug pa'i sa mkhan yin// mnga' rnams
161a6(rnying rgyud): khring sgo 'gag par byed// thar pa'i skas ni rang 'jug yin// rnamya ga 'od kyi mamyongasu 'byed pa// chos rnams kyi ni gnas pa// bdud dang mu stegs mgo non yin// shes rab rmugs pa'i gsal 'debs so// sngon 'jug kun gyi srog shing byiH
161a7(rnying rgyud): lha dang sngags kyi mdo mdud do// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bskyed shing ngo // blta bsgom log pa'i dag byed khrus// man ga snying po rdzogs pa'i sa// rdo rje theg pa'i grangs rdzogs nas// 'di ni thig le nyag gcig go// 'gro rnams lam la 'dzud pa'o//
161b1(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i rgyal po longs rdzogs kyi// yon tan byung tshul rang byung ngo // le'udu 'a po'o// / am // gsang mdzod dang drazhin chog 'di yang // rang byung ba dag chen po de// gle ba rdzogagasang ba 'di ltar byung // gnan
161b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ni// dang po mngon 'phags dran pa mgon// phyag rgya dang dran 'khor lo ni// gzhi las 'phags pa'i khyad par tshig// spyi phung sngon gyi thog mar gyur// 'di dus khrag khring 'dun cu yi// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// dri dngos brdzun pa'i ma
161b3(rnying rgyud): pa la// sde snod dang po'i sangs rgyas mgon// mnga' mdzad phyag rgya 'khor lo la// 'khor ni 'dzin pa bye ba lha'i// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// sbyi mes dang po pha rol mgon// dkyil 'khor snying po rab spros pas// bsal pa gser gyi yi ge la// sa pa
161b4(rnying rgyud): drug gi phyag cher bzung // bAn thog dang po 'phags pa mgon// phyag tu dang po nyid snang pas// bzhal pa 'ad byed 'byed pa la// bdun 'bum gyin 'bras 'o// 'jig rten drab mgan zla de/ zal rgyag rgya du byas te// bskal ba pa ti ngas
161b5(rnying rgyud): la// bstan pa'i 'bras bu phyal yas las// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// snying po stong gi spyi phud mgon// snying po dam pa'i 'khor lo las// bskul brtsod pa'i snying po la// grangs med bzhi yi snying po'o// 'od ldan dang po sems can mgon// spos med
161b6(rnying rgyud): snying po rang sgra las// bskul ba snang ba'i sgron ma la// pan bun stong gi phyag rgyar bzung // mdzes pa'i dang po 'gro ba'i mgon// yang dag snying po rnam spros te// bskal pa rags pa'i yan lag la// nyer nyer brgya yi grangs kyis ni// phyag rgya 'di ni dam
161b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// thugs brtse'i snying po nyan thos mgon// phyag rgya yang dag lam spros te// bskal pa dung gi sgra dag la// brang phreng bcu yi dam par ro// mi pham zang ma sgra bral mgon// yang dag nges pa'i rgyud las ni// bskal pa dra ba'i 'od zer las/

162a6(rnying rgyud): rdul bral dri med mgon// gsang chen nges pa nyid du ste// bskal pa g.yo sgra bral ba la// bye ba dgu khri'i grangs mgon gyi// 'du ba'i phyag rgya nyid du'o// dran pa dri med pasam gtan mgon// dri med nges pa'i gas tshig spos// bska la
162a7(rnying rgyud): ldan se ge la// nyal nyi sum thu'i rgyal pa yis// 'di ni bden chog dpe par re// dam pa'i skyes bu chos kyi mgon// sangs kyis shes rabs po rje smos// bskal pa gdung bsal ba la// sang seng dgu khri'i gdung 'phel bas// dam pa

162b2(rnying rgyud): kyi nyid du gdung bzung bas// brga pa babye ba'i snying po la// nyag thag dgu khri'i gdung 'dzin pas/ 'di nyid snying po'i don du'o// yang dag gsang ba pad+ma mgon// steng gi snying po dkyil brdung byas// bskal ba yongs su bcing /

166a5(rnying rgyud): ltar lus ngag sus gtan pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi snang ba la// 'di yis goms par 'gyur ba yin// de ltar lus la sogs pa yi// gnad kun rab tu gzir ba yis// rig pa nyid dang mngon sum du// bla ma'i lung las shes pa yin// dbyings dang ring //

166b1(rnying rgyud): yul tsam gang snang ba// chom bra la ni de bzhin no// phyir snang 'gag pa gang yin pa// skad cig ma ni bcu drug pa// 'di yang de ltar 'gyur ba'o// ma smin la sogs thig le dang // de bzhin sgra la thug ga par// jug dang bcu dang lnga gsum la// gnan
166b2(rnying rgyud): ming ste longs skur ro// nang lus zad pa'i sar phyin tshe// sor mo la sogs de bzhin snang // 'di gtad 'byung ba rang dengs so// skye dang 'jug pa'i khyad par gyis// chos kun zad pa'i rang sa la// ci yang 'dzin pa med par ni// gnas pa yin rdo sprul pa'i
166b3(rnying rgyud): sku// 'di ni 'jug pa'i shugs kyis dbang // skye ba'i rang dbang sus thob pa// de yang de la gtad nas ni// yang dus 'di ltar byas pa nA// sdang ba'i rang sra se la skad de// sngon du log ste 'khrul par snang // 'dis ni sems can don kun byed// rig
166b4(rnying rgyud): mnyam par gcig pa'i phyir// stong phrag gsum rnams sems can gyi// 'pho ba chen po 'dis 'grub po// de bzhin rim dang cig car gyis// lus ni 'di yis 'grub pa yin// de kun lus zad tshad las grol// 'di kun 'bras bu nges pa'o//
166b5(rnying rgyud): mchog dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub// 'di ltar thabs las yang dag byung // sangs rgyas 'grub par 'dod pa'i yis// 'di thabs ldan na de bzhin no// gzhan spyod skems byed nyid yin pas// dngos po mthong ba ma yin na// de phyir 'di kun dkon pa'i tshig
166b6(rnying rgyud): rtag tu rin chen gter 'di ltos// 'di ltar zad pa la spyod na// 'dis ni sangs rgyas stong phrag gsum// 'di yis legs par zhal mthong yin// 'di tshig gsang ba nyid las byung // skyes bu rnams kyis 'di ltar bya// gsang chen yang gsang dam pa'o//
166b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'o// e ma ho// 'di ltar 'dod 'byung skyes bu gang // thabs kyi yan lag 'di lta bu// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid la ni// 'di ltar de yi sngon du sbyangs// sems kyi rim pa ci sbyangs pa// 'dis ni mi rtag sems la 'byor// ji ltar sgra
167a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rnal 'byor bas// sa nu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi'i// sgra don rnams la goms pa yis// rigs drug rnams kyi rang skad kyi// mngon shes 'char ba 'dis 'gruba'o// zhag rim dus ni nam drug gi// 'di yi skad kun rang ngas shes// 'du
167a2(rnying rgyud): pa med par sus shes pa// ma 'ongs da ltar 'dus pa yi// sems rgyud ji ltar shes par 'gyur// gzhan gyi don byed sprul pa pos// 'di la sngon du ma sbyangs na// sprul pa'i sa bon 'jog par ni// rus pa nyid ni mi 'thob po// des na 'byeng po'i
167a3(rnying rgyud): bslang // bya byed zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// lag ni zla byed sna tshogs bya// de bzhin 'dus byas rnam pa ni// dbang po'i mngon zhen pabazlog pa ste// yul rnams goms pa'i gnad kyis sbyangs// 'di ltar gnyid dang rmi lam gyi// dus pani byuba'i
167a4(rnying rgyud): dbye// tshad na gnad la pheb pas bzung // thig le phyi nang ba slab bya'i phyir// gang zag rnam pa gnyis don bya// bcos ma 'dus byas bsgom pa yis// dang po sems g.yeng zhen pa dgag/ 'bras bucig cher ma yin pas// snang ba
167a5(rnying rgyud): mig sman la sogs sgo lha yi// sman gyi rim pa sbyar bar bya// 'di kun gsang ba'i thabs yin no// lam gyi rtags ni lus las ni// mngon par phyi rol snang gyur pa'i// sman nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// 'di kun 'jig rten drang don du// skal ba can gyi spyod yu
167a6(rnying rgyud): mo// 'di yi thabs ni sna tshogs par// gzhan gyi 'dod yon mtha' dgag phyir// rab tu gsang bar byung ba na// le'u lnga pa'o// / khams la bslab pa'i thabs yod pas// dran rdzogs phyag rgya'i drung du sbyor// dbang ba lazhen pa bzlog pa
167a7(rnying rgyud): phyir// karmA ra g+hA g+hi hi te// phung po'i zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// b+he garan sog dagling // yul kun zhan pa bzlog pa'i phyir// pu kA ri la b+hi d+ha thi// sems kyi dngos po skur ba'i phyir// ri pa ka las mi khye// byung tshor gnas su gcad pa'i phyir// ma tang
167b1(rnying rgyud): pa zer ras rmi te// 'dus 'tshogs snang ba ngos gzung phyir// kha Ta re ka sa rmig rlung // rig pa btson rang gzhug pa'i phyir// a ke ra na b+he tsag sha/ 'khrul pa'i rang chung khungs gcad phyir// ya ri mu Da sa g+ha li// rigs drug rim gyis bskal ba'i rdzing// 5
167b2(rnying rgyud): sing ra rlung pa la ya// 'khor ba dong nas 'don pa'i phyir// mA ma ko yid sa ma ta// chos can thur du gzhug pa'i phyir// g+ha ring yaM pa ri maM ti// rol ba'i byung khung spang ba'i phyir// bu ga sid+ha pha g+ha pa// zhen pa'i phreng thag gcad pa'i phyir// dmis pI khe ta pa/
167b3(rnying rgyud): lug rgyud ar la gtang ba'i phyir// be khu ma la pa taM ki// lha yi phyag rgya blta ba'i phyir// sa ma nyi wa d+he ra ya// blta bsgom log pa dag bya'i phyir// badz+ra satwa tre to mI// sa la ma dus gcig gcad pa'i phyir// b+he ba su b+ha ra r+tha pA pA// yid dpyod nga lta ba khung
167b4(rnying rgyud): gtsang phyir// d+harmA ba ti sa g+hA yI// sku gsum lam du bslang ba'i phyir// ra smais mkha rgad tshe/ sdang ba dngos su blang ba'i phyir// ru pa sa mi mi ta laM// s+tha yi zhen pa mtha' gcad phyir// nga tig pa yang ka las// bsam gtan chen po'i sa non b+hing // gam pa
167b5(rnying rgyud): las i ti// phrin las mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// karma e ka a nus// sangs rgyas mngon zhen bzlog pa'i phyir// sang kri ma ma karma ta// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas btsal phyir// da legle pa ki lis// 'di kun rang byung chag tu'o// le'u drug pa'o//
167b6(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// bcom pa dang ni ldan pa dang // 'das pa yang dag la ma yin no// 'di tshig lam minA gdams pa yin// bstan cing bshad med brjod ma yin// gdams pa ma yin byin rlabs yin// bris shing bkod med rang byung yin// gnas dang dus med sngon
167b7(rnying rgyud): thog yin// chos min snying po thugs gsang yin// sus kyang nyan med dang shar yin// thos pa med cing sgra gegs yin// byas pas 'di kun ma yin tshig/ 'di yod 'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// pha rol mthong ba'i gsad chen las// sems yod ma yin sprul pa
168a1(rnying rgyud): yin// 'khor ba'i spyi mdud dgrol ba'o// shes bya ma yin lam sna zag/ stong pa ma yin mngon sum yul// yod med ma yin thabs gsang ba// lha med 'di la sngags yod min// pha rol phyin pa drug gi gzhi// bsnyen gnas la sag/
168a2(rnying rgyud): 'di tshul lo// de bzhin du yang bye brag smra// don dam kun rdzob gzugs kyis so// gzugs kyi rtsa ba 'di nyid rang // lha'i rnal 'byor 'di sngags yin// lung chen rnams kyi dam pa 'di// chos rnams ro gcig 'dres pa'i rten// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// phra med
168a3(rnying rgyud): 'tshong ma bskong ba'i gnas// dbang rnams kyid dmigs tad yin// shes rab rnams kyis rtogs pa gan// lkugs sa lam du m-i pa'i des// b+hag la mngon du 'byin pa'i mig/ thang pa gas dran spong bar rjod// maseM ng+ge drog pa'i sa mi na lan
168a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'dzin pa'i lcags kyur snang // chos sku rang 'jog gnas lugs yin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byed gnas// yul snang gcod pa'i ral gring snang // grol ba rnams ni 'di nyid la// rnam par brten nas grol ba'o// le'u drug pa'o// // sangs
168a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi sras gcig po/ bstan pa thams cad kyi btsas su rang byung ba/ rang byung gi yi ge chen por bskal pa kun gyi thog mar rang byung ba/ byin rlabs las rang bkod pa/ sbrul sku'i sa bon 'phel bar byed pa/ rab tu dkon pa'i tshig rdzogs so//
168a6(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya/ g+hud+ya/ l-I/ n+ya d+ya d+ha/ sbas \u0f7f/ gtad rgya/ gter bya/ kha za ma/ d+ha thim/ sbrul sku sangs rgyas gling pas pu'i phug mo che nas gdan drangs pa'o//
168b1(rnying rgyud): #// bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa las/ s+ya ba'i chud kyi rgyal po bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn su ga ta sarba sa mu dA ya tanA ma hA rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar
168b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
168b3(rnying rgyud): bdag gis zas pa'i su gci/ chug med ciganas rgyas kyi sa kyi bzung / gas dgas gas ba rtagag gas/ yin ma rnam par dag pa'i rgya
168b4(rnying rgyud): dpe dang tshad las 'das pa'i sa/ phyi nang med par phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa/ rnam par dag pas bklubs pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa ye nas rang byung gi gnas na/ bcom ldan
168b5(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ chos kyi su skye ba med pa spros pa dang bral ba/ don dam pa ma bcos pa'i thig le chen po'i dngangal mnal te bzhugs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu
168b6(rnying rgyud): ldem pa/
169a1(rnying rgyud): nas sa ga su / na su g+sa / /
169a2(rnying rgyud): nyid rnam par dag pa'i klong yangs nas// snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'byung bar mi dmigs kyang // shes rangab don dam chos sku dag pa las// ma 'gags thabs kyi snying rje nam mkha' ston// hoHzhes bskul to// de
169a3(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid mnyam pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang // yum kun tu bzang mos glu 'dis bskul to//
169a4(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// ma ltar byams pa'i snying rje chen po ni// mkha' ltang go yangs 'byed cing kun la khyab// rig pa'i snying rje nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol//
169a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bsku to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba gi sum gyi bdag paras/ chos thams cad thugs rjes ku pa khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par grags sa// denas yang / sras byun
169b1(rnying rgyud): bzang mos bla 'dis bskul to// e maho// ye shes sku mchog nyi ma lta bu las// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje'i gar mdzod cing // brjid pa'i su mchog rdo rje 'bar ba las// thugs rje rol pa'i sku mchog brtan du gsol// hoHzhes baphrul ma// de nas bam
169b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gyi bdag po des/ chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ sprul pa'i sku dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag por sru bzhengs pa dang / yum kun tu bzang mo la slar klu 'dis
169b3(rnying rgyud): bskal to// e matong ni rang byung ba'i// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyis gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos kyu 'dis bskul // sem/
169b4(rnying rgyud): mchog bde ba yis// byang chub sems ni rab spros pas// thugs bsngal tud dbyangs dbyings su thim// byang chub sems kyi thig le gas la// hoH/ zhes bskul ba dang / yab kyis bskul pa// e mtsho sangs rgyas thams ched ni// yi ge sa
169b5(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// smos pas gsung bskul rang rgyud dag/ bslus pas chos kyi phyag rgya'i don// zhes baphul pas/ yum gyis bskal ba/ e ma ha// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi thugs// rtogs par dkar bu'i snying po'i dod//
169b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs rnams kyi thugs rgyad bskul// 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa 'grol// thugs kyi phyag rgyar bsan pa'o// zhes bskul nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho gzhal yas khang dang
169b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa sprul to// de yang bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas pho brang lhun gyis grub pa/ rtswa bsod nams dang 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs shing / thugs rje chen pos thams cad la khyab pas mtha' dang dbus med pa kun tu rgyas shing /
170a1(rnying rgyud): dz+ha yongs su mchad pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ka ba dang bcas pa/ gcig dang dum dang bral zhing spros pa mang /
170a2(rnying rgyud): pas dkyil 'khor thum po/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba yongs la bskor ba'i phyir/ kun gyi pho brang ye shes kyi 'khor lor gnas pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa rgyas shing / thugs rje'i rlabs dang ldan pas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor lus/ nga
170a3(rnying rgyud): ber sna tshogs 'gro ba/ ye shes chen po mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' bas nA la'i ljon shing dang / sems can gyi re ba yid bzhin du skong bas/ dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir/ lha chen po rnams kyis bskong ba/
170a4(rnying rgyud): shigs shing mi 'gyur bas rdo rje'i ra ba dang / nyon mongs pa bsreg pa'i me ri 'bar ba'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ sprul to// de lta bu'i ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang der/ lha thams cad kyi
170a5(rnying rgyud): gnas su/ rang bzhin gyi ye nas 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla'i gdan dang / ma chags pad+ma'i gdan/ sa bon gyi tshul gyis 'phros par gyur to// khyad par du mi 'jigs pa bzhis bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rtags su/ dbus su seng ge de khri dang / stobs bcu
170a6(rnying rgyud): ldan zhing mi dge ba bcu 'dul ba'i rtags su/ shar du glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtags su/ lhor rta'i khri dang / dbang ba tu mthar phyin pas rgyal ba'i rtags su/ nub tu rma bya'i khri dang / phrin las rnam bzhis 'a
170a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i rtags su/ byang du shang shang gi khri dge sprul zhing bkod do// der bde 'ar gshegs pa rigs lnga/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul te/ chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshes
170b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rigs su mdog dkar po/ de bzhin nyid la cis kyang bsgyur du med pas/ rdo rje rigs su mdog mthing ga/ yon tan gyi gter zad mi shes shing / thams cad 'byung gnas yin pas/ rin po che'i rigs sku mdog gser lta bu/ chos nyid chags
170b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / chags par bya ba med pas/ pad+ma'i rigs sku mdog dmar po/ phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi rigs sku mdog ljang gur gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang // srid pa'i 'khor po chun
170b3(rnying rgyud): gcod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag na ye shes kyi 'khor lo/ cis kyang mi shigs shing mi 'gyur bas/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag na rdo rje/ dgos 'dod kyi re ba skong ba'i rin po che'i rigs phyag na rin po che dang / 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma
170b4(rnying rgyud): gos pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag na pad+ma/ mtha' bzhi gnon pas las kyi rigs kyis phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsdams nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi skyil krung dang / rdo rje'i skyil krung dang / rin po che'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / las kyi rigs
170b5(rnying rgyud): kyis skyil krung gi bzhugs pa/ so so rang rang gi gdan gyi steng du stsal to// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma rnams ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du stor bas/ sems dpa'i skyil krung du bzhugs nas/ rang rang gi rigs kyi
170b6(rnying rgyud): mdog dang phyag mtshan dang rtags rnams so sor 'dzin par sprul to// de dag thams cad kyang / sku mnyen pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'khril ba dang / ldem pa dang / gzhan tshul can dang / gsal ba dang / 'tsher ba dang / lhu na skrag pa dang / brjid chags
170b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gzhan yang thun mong gi rgyan/ dbu rgyan/ rin po che 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / snyan cha dang / mgur chu dang / do shal dang / sa mo do dang / phyag gdub dang / zhabs gdub dang / dar gyi cod pan dang / chos gos dang / stod g.yog
171a1(rnying rgyud): dang // skad g.yogs dang / sbu da kris dang / mdzad pad gyi gsang gas dang bcas te/ nad gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sgra tshogs las/ snrutshogs su 'phro ba lta bus brgyan nas phyogs su mam do// de sang ban pa
171a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga/ so so'i btsun mo dang / 'khor gyi sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / so so'i 'khor tshogs til gyi gang
171a3(rnying rgyud): nga ng+ge dubs ma gyis mi khyab pa yum pan cu ba ba mkha' na/ rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dag can dang bcas pa po / ye shes dang gnas kyi la tshogs/ spang la rang bzhin med pa/ snyam me snyan ne ljang de gsal bar gyur to// bde bar
171a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e mtsho bcom ldan gsang bdag che/
171a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// zhi ba dam pa rigs brgya yi// sgrub thabs bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bza
171a6(rnying rgyud): pos bka' dastsal pa// nyon cig khyab 'dag rdo rje sems// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'gyor pas// dam pa rigs brgya pa sgrub 'dod pas// bkra shis yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas// shar ri dma' la lho ri gzhol// nab mthol byang ri skyo/
171a7(rnying rgyud): mdun na me tog sngam bu yod// bya rgyal khu byug sgra yang grags// rtsi shing me tog yal ga skye// dri zhem thos kyi ngang ldan pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dbyung ba'i gnas// de ni zhi ba rigs brkya sgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor stegs bu chu ba
171b1(rnying rgyud): dri sgra lnga yi chag chag gdab// tshon srud sna lnga'i srad bu yis// thig ni bcu drug dag tu gdab// de las dkyil 'khor chen po dgu// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru chang dang // bar khams sgo bzhi ldan pa la// phyi rim par khyams sgo bzhi dang //
171b2(rnying rgyud): babs rgyan dang 'khor yug ldan// tshan sna lnga yi sA legs par bri// de la phyag mtshan yig 'bru 'am// yang na su yi gzugs brtar dgo// thog mar byang rgya ba sems bskyed de// yan lag bdun gyi tshogs bsags te// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bsgom
171b3(rnying rgyud): shing // rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// de nyid byang chub sems su gyur// 'byung lnga yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems las rim bzhin bskyed// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa yang // bde gshegs lha tshogs bcu phrag bcu//
171b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya thig le ldan par bsgom// rang sems yi ge a dkar nyid// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la lhung // sgo bcu las ni 'khor lor gyur// de yi 'phro 'dra'i rang bzhin las// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo la// rnam par snang mdzad kun bzang yum/
171b5(rnying rgyud): rigs rnams kun gyi bdag por brtag/ mi bskyod pa dang sangs rgyas spyan// rin chen 'byung ldan gos dkar mo// de bzhin snang mtha' mA ma kI// 'dod pa'i don grub dam tshig sgrol// rang gi rigs kyi cha bzung ste// 'dud pa'i tshul gyis 'khar du
171b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed// cho gA yongs rdzogs de nas ni// kun bzung rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// 'jam dpal dang ni rin chen dbyings// lhan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i dbyings// rdo rje 'chang dang las dbyings ma// shar ston pa byung go rim bzhin// dkyil 'khor ga
171b7(rnying rgyud): bor daskyed byas te// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sa steng rdo rje sems ma dang // mkha' snying rin chen sems mar bcas// byams pa pad+ma'i sems mang bcas// sleb sel las kyi sems mni// rin chen
172a1(rnying rgyud): na na sa/ na zugasas ma na na ca tu bya / sa sa/ tu na d+ha
172a2(rnying rgyud): da dzad/ mamag pa mdag nga / sarjod// dag pa so dag da// de chugs pa ma da gaH/ 'angan shing lag byam// deng 'i rnas pa dzi //
172a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// kun/ bzang po'i 'khod du 'byer// rdo rje rin chen rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin du ni phreng ba mo// rdo rje gzing rjing nyi ma'i 'od// 'dzin par mdzad dang me tog mya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhagasas ma// bzhad pa
172a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// bdes rlung g.yab 'dzin pa ni// rdo phyogs 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o// rdo rje rjes ni pad+ma 'dzin// dbyangs mayin sde lang 'dzin ma dang // rdo rje rnon po gcod pa'i bri// 'dzin mdzad rdo rje mdam ma/ rjeskal 'dzin cing
172a5(rnying rgyud): thog tu ma da // de bzhin rdo rje'i 'od mo ni// 'khor po 'dzin dang gsal bkram// rna byi don pa rngub phyogs kyi// spyan ras gzigs dbang 'a khor du'o// rdo rje las ni rgyag ma 'dzin// de bzhi rdo rje gang baphyang ma// tshe ni srang go 'arjod// hUMg
172a6(rnying rgyud): sa kyi chu 'jod pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes bya ba// mche ba 'don cing dril 'khrol ma// rdo rje khu chung 'dzin ma dang // 'bebs ma bum pa'i chu 'dzin rnams// byang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// phyag na rje'i 'khor du'o// rdo rje rgyal mtshan du kyis rong //
172a7(rnying rgyud): bkyis 'ad bapa ga/ dbang phyug rgyal po sngags kyu 'dzin// bde ba ba byed mda' dang gzu// bkod pa'i rgyun ni me tog 'dzin// bde ba rmongs byed phya rgya bsnol// rin chen 'od 'gror rin chen dang // bde batsho 'phel dril 'khrol ma// shar stong tshams
172b1(rnying rgyud): dbyel 'khor du// sa ya snying po'i 'thor du bskyed// snang bar 'ang no rdo rje 'dren// khrus kyis mabum pa 'dzin// phyag rgya'i rgyal po mda' gathu nyid// 'dzin mdzad rgyal mtshan lham dang // spos kyi glang po zam rtag/ 'dzin mdzad bzla' lha ma dang //
172b2(rnying rgyud): brtsegs kun 'dren lcags kyi ni// 'dzin dang gdugs kyi lha mo rnams// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// nam mkha' snying po'i 'khor du'o// pad+ma'i rgyal po pad+ma 'dzin// lha mo padz+ra dpal be'u ste// pad+ma dam pa kha gye ba'o// lha mo 'jigs zlar
172b3(rnying rgyud): 'khar ma 'dzid// rdo rje mr-ig mo ba ti 'dzin// byin thul phyag na pang+gA'o// zigs med rgyal po lcags kyu dgyi// 'dzi na mad nam rgyal l+h+wa man// rgyal mtshan thogs pa nub byung gi// byams pa'i 'khor du bskyed par bya// ran chen dbang sprad ra na rtsa//
172b4(rnying rgyud): skye gzugs med gisar nya 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// sgrib pa rnam sel 'khor du bskyed// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag kun// gtso bo rigs kyi mdog yin te// dkyil 'khor bye brag re re la// rigs kyi sku mdzag
172b5(rnying rgyud): mi ma ba skam// dkyil 'khor yo bar byams la// gang nyid mya yi thub pa ni// dkar po po wang 'dzin pa bzud// shar smad lha mi na thub pa ni// blon po phyug na go mtshon bsnams// lho phyogs mi yi thub pa ni// ser po gsegashang par bye 'drin//
172b6(rnying rgyud): rgun rtswa rgyal song thub pa ni// ga po te 'dzin par byed// nub skad mi drugs thub pa ni// dmar po rin chen sgromabu 'dzin// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa ni// lde gra me dang chu bsdam pa'i// shar ga dordo rje lcags kyu mo// lha skar rdo rje zhags pa ma// rlung rnam
173a1(rnying rgyud): ma sa du na sa sa / pa
173a2(rnying rgyud): la// byin mchod pa kyi byor dbul/ brjod dgas la pa gangad ba nas ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'phru'aja// oM mU la~M kA ma tAn pa san kro ta man mi swAH// 'og ma tha'i dang 'acwa nags
173a3(rnying rgyud): ci dus par chugs// thams cing 'grub par byed pa las// skub srung thugs kyadangs kluba'athob// phyogs bcings pas pa da gan gis rnams/ des da ma par gas patur 'jug// bdag da
173a4(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs sa// ba bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dam pa rigs bcur sgrub pa'i thabs bsnyen pa'i lajug gnyis pags ga // de nas dpe ma rdo rjem mas dpas yang grus pa// seMs gsang bdag su
173a5(rnying rgyud): bzang // gdul bya 'dod chags can dag la// bde gshegs sangs rgyas bzhi 'acu gnyis// ye shes bskyed pa'i srub thabs gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zhab sangs rgyas brda bcug nyis// rnal 'gyod skal ldan tshwa pa
173a6(rnying rgyud): dben zhing dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsi byas pa zhal// rin gyinaka ba brgyad kyis mangs// skrag pa'i ye shes go 'bur can// sems dang // khyud rnam par mdzes// dang pu pheM brang thul po la// mu shrI bi dag la hU~M gnas pa/
173a7(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i rten du mkhas pas pa ga// ngas pa la spyan la 'jug nas na// ! phyogs bltas to// yul gsum gas la bar gyur pa dang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yis khang // byi nang ma par kyad tu gas ma// seng ge slong chen na dang byung// nam
173b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' ljang gi khri steng na// nyi ga pad+ma rin po cher// nam sdang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin chen 'byung ldan snang mtha' yas// don yad grub pa rigs mchog lnga// kun bzang yab yum 'dod las chags// sems dpa' sems sa mtshad tshul can//
173b2(rnying rgyud): snying nam mkha'i snying po dang // spyan ras gzigs dbangagan tu bzang // drung ltar dkar ba de dag kyang // rin chen myu gu ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen sde ma 'dzin// phyag na rdo rje dri la 'dzin ljang // byams pa dmar s+ya gra d+he'o// sleb sel mdog na
173b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// 'jam dpal dkar ljang ut+pal// lam+ba sngon mo ma long 'dzin// mA le ser mo rin chen phreng // bau wang khyud 'dren gAn+te da ma re// nai rti ljang gu cod pan 'chung // me tog ma dang bdug pa mo// mar mi dag byed dri cheb ma// gnyi rmed
173b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// thub drug ta kr-i tu slob brgyad// tha~Md dbyug rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed// stobs chen rdo rje ce gsum mAM// ta mgrin thod sbrul pad+ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// ro langs me la ma la gcig pa// 'og te
173b5(rnying rgyud): 'ji dag/ lcags sngadags pa lcag sa klog dril// rim bzhin thogs pa phyogs kyi mdog/ 'od zeng 'bar ba'i tshugs chen po/ 'bar ba'i byung bste 'khrigs pa'i 'od// zhi ba'i tshul dgra bstan pa yis// rgyags pa can la dngos grub snyed// oMb ti
173b6(rnying rgyud): nan d+han / gas pa ma gnas// byi na cag nyis ng+yas mangs pa// bzhig gnyis nang ba yin// de nas snang zhid yin nas ni// rang ga sams su dam par bdag/ rtag pa'i snod lam la zhi pa// 'i la nI hU~M
173b7(rnying rgyud): dge pa'i phyi'i dri langs spyong byed// ring gis mas las byung bar rdzogs// rnal 'byar ma byad rnam gnyis so// rang las byung shing dang las spyong // des nan pa byer dbang phyug ce// gsang pa'i sdugasas sang pa dang // 'jigs pa'i bdud pa'i kyi cu
174a1(rnying rgyud): ma bas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// soms dpa'i gtsol phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes sgyu ma'i tshul 'chang ma// sems ma'i gtsol phyag 'artul bstod// ma lus don mdzad rgyal ba che// sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal btod// dang
174a2(rnying rgyud): med phyag rgya 'dud tshul can// sems ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro drug so so'i don rdzogs mdzad// thub pa drug la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// sgo skyong bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs ba cu so so'i bgegs rigs
174a3(rnying rgyud): chos srung tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di dag gis// lha rnams la ni gang bstod pas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// kun bzang nyid dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i byung
174a4(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa las/ sgra'i phyag rgya rab tu grub pa bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje rgya chen po rab tu grub pa gzhan gyi don dpag tu med pa sbyor ba'i rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM
174a5(rnying rgyud): swA hA/ zhes b+ha ba ni thams cad du dag pa'i grags so// oM bar bi dam pa rlon tho snrelaT/ deng brgyad kyi srog cad pa'o// mos zas yas ca Ne na hUM phaT/ gnyis pa gcad pa'o// som tham pas shi ga ge Ta gsul pa gtu
174a6(rnying rgyud): bcoMm mas pa kr-i ti ka ga te he huM hU~M phaT/ bzhi pa gcod pa'o// oMd ha da ha sa rban ra ka ga te hi huM b+h+rUM phaT/ lnga pa gcod pa'o// i d+ham te kha tham/ badz+ra sa ma yan rag kan/ mar hr-i da ya/ na ma pa ti nan/ sa ma rak+Sha sad+d+ha bi te A mr-i te ho ho// gzhug cing bsngag
174a7(rnying rgyud): oM d+ha ba ya aSh+ma ye A ba tsA ya A ga ts+tsha ya dr-i shru ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dgug cing bzhugs pa'o// oM b+ha ba ag+ne ye mA ma sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma mA sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mchod cing sbyin pa'o// oM prah+ma Ne sU r+ya tsan+d+ra a d+hi pa ta ye hU~M //
174b1(rnying rgyud): oM be shra ma na ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa tA ye hUM dzaH/ oM d+h+r-i tA raSh+TA ya ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa tra ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi DU Da kA ya suM ban+de/ ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi rU pak+Sha nA ga ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dza/ oM in+d+rA ya/ a b+hA ye/ a mA ya/ ni rnge tA ya/ ba ya be/ ba rba/
174b2(rnying rgyud): ya/ ku be rA ya/ I shan+da ya/ bir+N+Na ba~M/ sU n+ya tsanA ya/ A ga ts+tsha tru dza/ maHde ba aH t+ya NAM / phu nA ga aSh+Ta Sh+ya hU~M / gra hA aSh+Ta b+h+ya hUM / yak+Sha ma hA sa na pa ta ye hUM dza/ badz+ra ha pa ri a ta ya hUM / aM d+ha pa ta ye ts+tshe / A gats+tsha ya A gad+hA ya hUM dza/ bod pa'i sngag
174b3(rnying rgyud): so// oM brah+ma Ne/ sAn+ya ya/ tsan+ta ya/ in+d+rA ya/ ag+na ye/ ya mA ya/ rak+Sha ya/ barba NA yA/ bA ya be/ kra badrA ya/ I sha nA ya/ baiSh+Ta be/ de bA ya/ nA ga ya/ grahA ye/ yak+Sha ya/ i dai gr-it+ta/ d+hU pe/ puShe/ A lo ka/ bAn+te/ ni bi d+ye pU dza ya sAH/
174b4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa da rlab tu sbyin pa'i sngags so// oM ti stan badz+ra sad ta thA/ bskyed pa'i sngags so// oMn ma a man+ta bud+d+hA ni hU~MH/ gtsug tod kyi sngags so// nams man+ti prad+d+hA nAM gag par lak+Sha ts+tshin ka dra na mahA ta thA ga ta badz+ra tsak+Sha gra swA hA/ ye shes rgyan gyi sngags so// nam
174b5(rnying rgyud): saman+ta badz+rA N+Ta badz+ra ka pa tsarak+Sha hU~M/ rdo rje go cha'i sngags so// na maHsasatwA thA ga te b+ho sarba tad khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le/ sarba ta d+h+r-i ga~M ta~M prad na ni ra dza ti hU~M hU~M d+hU ShA trathA a pra ti ha te swAhA/ bsrung ba'o// oM A badz+ra aM ku sha na~M druM A ga r+dz+dza hU~M dza/ mid byang la dgug pa'i sngags so//
174b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ya ma rA dza pA tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lus la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra mA hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ ngag la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yid la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha a mri ta kuN+Da li ts+tshi na ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ thams
174b7(rnying rgyud): cad du bskrad pa'o// oM ma hA sa rbo drA na ti bi sho d+ha ni nga / drang ba'i 'o// oM ma hA ma rdzu bri sa rba Shad+da d+ha/ shag ti tiSh+Tha pa ya phaT/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// oM saHkarma a pa ra Na bi sho d+hA ya sarba dzu reg ti bi sho d+ha ya dz+wa la dz+wa la ka taM ka ta ha na ha nas
175a1(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// e mra skye pal kun tu bzang // rigs lnga b+ha brag de dag rnams// rnam par gru skye bsgrub pa gang // ske ma'i don du rnam bzhin gsungs// kur d+ha bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sa ma
175a2(rnying rgyud): dpara' che// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin rigs mchog bsrub 'dod pas// hUM chen gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// de bzhin rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// dmigs pa yul gsum gsal ba dang // mikhas
175a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad nyid// khru mdo/ dkar po 'od zer 'byar// gsal 'tshong ldan sdug gzi byin 'bar// phyag na gser gyi 'khor lo bsdams// glad chen bzhol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// gsang ba'i dgrag
175a4(rnying rgyud): sod pa dang // 'jig pa'i bdud bzhi tshom mchom// 'gro drug g.yang sa ched mchod// tshad dang ldan nam mkhas pas btags// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad nyid du brtag/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin rigs mchog bslab
175a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i rigs mchog bsgrub 'dod pas// tshon gang hUM yig shel gyi mdog/ rdo rje rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs pa gsal brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar
175a6(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // mkhas pas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sku mdog mthing ga 'od chen 'bar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril bu bsnams// glang chen bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// mkhas
175a7(rnying rgyud): pas rdo rje sems dpar brtag/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// rin chen rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// rin chen 'gyur ldan bsrub 'dod pas// hUM chen btsom gser gyi mdog/ rin chen rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtang
175b1(rnying rgyud): par bya// de la dmigs pa gsal brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // mkhas pas rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar// phyag gnyis rin chen dril bu 'dzin// shugs 'chang rta yi khril bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhi
175b2(rnying rgyud): brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid du brtag/ ces gsungs so// rin chen rigs mchog 'grub pa'o// pad+ma rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// snang ba mtha' yas bsrub 'dod pas// dmar po hUM ga so las// parba
175b3(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs pa rab brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // mkhas pas snang ba mtha' yas nyid// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag gnyis pad+ma dril bri bsdams//
175b4(rnying rgyud): bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// snang ba mtha' yas nyid du brtag/ ces gsungs so// pad+ma rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// las kyi rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// don yod grub pa
175b5(rnying rgyud): pasgrub 'dod pas// ljang gu hUM gi sa bon las// las kyi rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs par rab brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // mkhas pas don yod grub pa nyid// sra mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la//
175b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas pas rgya gram g.yon dril bu// gsar 'tshor lun sdug gzi byin 'bar// mkha' lding shang shang khri steng na// nyi zla bad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// don yod grub pa nyid du brtag/ ces
175b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// las kyi rigs mchog bslab pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba phyag rgya rgyang par bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / zhi ba'i skabs te dang ba'o// de nas dpal kun tu bzang po de/ chos thams cad
176a1(rnying rgyud): ska pa cad pa/ sagasang rtags pa dmyigs pa mnyam pa nyid dungs bzhugs pa la/ sa m+b+ha na pa bangs da tshugags/ gsung ba snyam thamag rnal pa gyun das/ gsang 'tha da bral tu bcwam d+ha// ta /
176a2(rnying rgyud): med stong pazhin durnal 'byor mthus// chos kyi dbyings las dmachog nye bar bzhengs// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong // mi gnas mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes bsgral pas/ dgral kun tu bzung po snying pa
176a3(rnying rgyud): las/ rtse mchog te ka'i su mngon par phyung nas/ gsung ba'i yum gnamazhal ma la gzigs te/ rol pa'i chos sna tshogs mdzad do// de nas yum gyi rol pa chen po'i grwa 'dis gsal pa btab po// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs den dmang gying
176a4(rnying rgyud): swa// longs spyod rdzogs mdzod rol pa chen po yis// tshe mchog he ru ka bzang dpal chen khyod// thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes bskul pas/ tshe 'phrul chen po'i rnam pas kun la khyab par mdzad de// de nas yang / yu
176a5(rnying rgyud): sa yab la cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab po// ho ya shes sbru ma rnam par rol pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i// thugs rje'i sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad sru bzhengs shig/
176a6(rnying rgyud): bskul bas/ dpal chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i slar bzhengs so// de nas yum kun tu bzung mo 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu klu 'dis bsgral te gsol ba btab po// e ma ho yid bzhin su mchog nyi ma lta bu las// byams
176a7(rnying rgyud): dregs che mchog gang mdzod cig/ gtso byin sprin srung rol pas bsgrengs pa'i sgra// thogs med na mchog rol pa'i tshe 'phrul ston// e ma ha ya bzhin gsung mchog nyi ma lta bu las// bsnyen pa'i byin rlabs che mchog brjid mdzod cig/ yan 'as/
176b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyim 'dud bkad pa'i gsungs// seng ga' sgra mas gsang sngags rgyam chaldan// a ma hA la shes sbyang pa nyi ma lta zla las// ye shes byin rlabs rnamachog de mdzod cig/ thig la sgras sbrul rnam par ma togazugs// rnam bral na nyid nges pa'i
176b2(rnying rgyud): ston// mi shes bran myongs 'das byings 'khor ba rnams// sdug bsngal gyi mtshor bcings pa thabs kyis rdol// mi rig phran pas ljongs pa don gyis phye// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ral ba'i klung gis sgrol// rnyed dang mthun pa'i sngon ba tang ji dri zhin du// gdu
176b3(rnying rgyud): phyi don du gru bzhengs 'gro ba sgol// zhes bsgral lo// de nas 'jigs byed chen po dpal chen te d+hakras/ chos nyid gdal ba chen po'i dang / kun gzhi ye nas 'das pa'i dbyings nyid las/ skye ba'i tshe 'phrul du ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/
176b4(rnying rgyud): mnga'agrod rnam par dag pa 'byung ba rnam pa lha brtsegs pa ni/ oM ya~Mr su~M kAr/ san+da sbyor nam mkha'i drang bzhin le ge e yis mtshan pa dang // 'jig rten 'degs byed rlung gi dkyil 'khor yaMgs mtshan pa dang / thams cad skyed byed lags rgya mching yas
176b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan pa la 'di khams gnas ras te bu rdzogs par gsapa/ 'degs byed brtan pa'i zhing chen gyis gan na gyis mtshan pa la gzugs khams gnas ris ba bdun rdzogs par gsal ba// 'thung brjod snyoms bskal ba'i mong de gyis mtshan pa dang / 'dris
176b6(rnying rgyud): rten rten byed kyi ri rab gi gyis mtshan pa la/ gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi rdzogs par gsal ba/ keng rus ri rab chen po'i kha bad la/ rin po che ma tig 'bar ba bkram nga la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ rin po che a sma ga ga 'jigs
176b7(rnying rgyud): pa la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ de lta bu'i steng na ye shes lnga dang ldan pa bran+ta 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / mtha' dbus
177a1(rnying rgyud): med pa ca bapa/ tAla'i sbyang kong dang gsong sang su mtho ba/ dkyil 'am can po rtag pa yong sas rdzogs pa dgra dang ldan pa/ brjod par dka' ba 'dun grong rgyun pa/ ga' thangs kyal ba/ rus pa phung
177a2(rnying rgyud): 'grol ba// khra ga zhag ge zham na 'bab pa// thA ga par rnying brtsegs pa/ wa chen po tshangs pa'i ka gdung / lha bran gyi dral gab/ zhing gi nang rtsibaN+Di dra la bri/ zhing lpags kyi thog phub pa/ zhing chen rnon po'i 'phen ga ga/ ma
177a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa/ dra ba dang drab phyed pa dang / rta babs rjen pa pa nib/ drur khrod kyi me da mar nag dang / dza rje'i rabs bstod pa la/ sngags kyi theg pa yongs su rtogs pa/ dbus kyi pho brang rngona'i zag chen ga tams pa la/ pad+ma dmar pa 'dab ma gyur du /
177a4(rnying rgyud): pa la/ rnal 'byor gsum gyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ de ltar mchags pad+ma 'bar ba'i khang / thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i steng du/ lha barba klu bo rgyad bsngal ba'i gang na la/ sgrol srong gtsab brgyad kyi khring shams pa ni/ dpa' ga tum chen
177a5(rnying rgyud): gi dang / 'jigs byed chen po seng ge'i khri dang / gdug pa chen po gzig gi khI dang / gtum pa chen po dom gyi gyi dang / stobs kyi rgyal po glang po che'i khri dang / brjid pa'i rgyal po mahe'i khyi dang / 'jigs par byed pa dz+ra srin gyi khri dang / zhe sda
177a6(rnying rgyud): sprul gyi khri ste/ khyad par ngo mtshar rmangad du byung ba'i byol song chen po brgyad kyi khri stengs su/ srid pa'i 'khor lo log pa'i lam gyi drab gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i gdan la/ chos kyi su las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i su dpal che mchog he ru ka zhes bya ba
177a7(rnying rgyud): dbu ti 'u rtsa gcig dus gsum gyi sangs kyis kyis rnams yongs suganan pa/ phyog bzhi 'du bya gnyis kyi g.yas dang g.yon zhi ba'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/ yab yum thabs dang zhes rab kyi tshul du brtsams pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma bar byung ba
177b1(rnying rgyud): chen po sngags kyi chas dang / bse zla ba dbang gi nas dang / gtan gzhan gzag gi nas dang / skul pa rdo rje'i chas dang / gdug bskul gyi zas dang / dpa' ba stag gi rgyas dang / bzi mdangs zhing lpags kyi chas dang / dam ngags pa jugag sa dang /
177b2(rnying rgyud): chen seng ge'i chas dang / gtum pa dom gyi rgyas te/ dpal gyi chas bcus brgyan pa'i slar yongs su bzhengs so// de ltar 'jigs byed chen po'i sgra dang gzhal yas khang la chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la yum dang 'khor rnams kyis 'di sad ces bstod
177b3(rnying rgyud): em ho// zlos kAn+da skal yongs rdzogs chos kyi sra// sprin med mkha' la snar tshogs brgyan pa'i sra// rdzogs pa chen pa'i tshe mchog h+Na )/ rje phyag 'tshal te ka dpal la'o// zhes bstod pas/ yab che mchogags yus kho mag
177b4(rnying rgyud):
177b5(rnying rgyud): sa phyi /
177b6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / nub tu gsung gi skal pa dpal rta mgrin dang / byang du phrin lus kyi sbal pa rdo rje gzhon nu dang / shar lhor brjid pa'i stobs can bla med he ru ka dang / nub byang du 'jigs pa'i stogs can drags pa kun 'dul ba dang / byang shing du kyad kyi stobs ched kyi
177b7(rnying rgyud): sa nga / gas rgya bye/ mamado'i 'a tshogs sus nga bas pa 'dus te/ 'angs pa mthong gsur thams cad 'dags par byad nga bla rdzogs pa zung byed bas pa/ phab sras thos dre
178a1(rnying rgyud): gsal bar su'o// bde bdag shegs pa thams cad 'das pa'i byung las// tham mngon byung ga dkyil 'khong skul pa 'i la'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas dgas pa nan tu chugs/ dpal chen po laphyag dang bsko nga bas sarnam
178a2(rnying rgyud): e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yang rnga bo// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa yi// gdug byed log lta can rnams la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan ji ltar 'dul// dpal chen yang
178a3(rnying rgyud): nga gsul drug sus / ga' pa smra/ // gas pa byan 'das// ngas thal ba ma nas// /
178a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog yin te// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' bzhin du ni bsrub par bya// gang zhig khro bo bsrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po dang 'jigs pa// gnams su gsum par gnas pa// rin sog po khros pa 'dra// shing dang
178a5(rnying rgyud): gzun tu ba'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas de du// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// bdud rtsa lnga yis chag chag gdab// ba su ta ye skud pa yis// thig ni bcu drug dag tu gdab// de las dkyil 'khor chen po dgu// kun kyang 'khor lo rdzi bas
178a6(rnying rgyud): la// su ched bar khams spong zhing ldan// de dag phyi khyams sgo rnams dang // sgo rgyan lcags ri ldan pa ni// tshon sna lnga yis legs par bri// dur khrod rgyan dang mchod pa'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor kun rnams legs par dgod// dul tshon
178a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor de dag kyang // so so'i lha tshogs ldan par bsgom// khyad par byol song khri stengs su// ye shes sems dpa' ba 'gyur te// spro bsdu cho ga gsum skyong bas// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog sdug nag 'bar ba la// 'jigs pa'i dbu
178b1(rnying rgyud): ti naka r+b+heg/ bdag shegs zhib bskyed cuganyis// phyagatu bskams nas zhabs parkyang bzad// du khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis bcan// rngom brjid phrar bskyed mnyes pa'i rngam// l+h+wa mo gnas zhal dbying sa thug sa// dasangs rgyag kyang
178b2(rnying rgyud): de// stong pa bco brkyargyang dbyings dang sbyor// g.yas pa thabs mchog gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa dud khrag stob byed pa'i// yab yum gnyis med sbyor byas te// mkha' las khro bo 'chol par s+ho// slar yang khro bo'i sprin stsal nang //
178b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi mtshams bzhir 'dus pa las// so so'i dkyil 'khor gtso bor bskyed// rang rang rigs kyi 'khor rnams kun// gsal zhing ma 'dres rdzogs par dgod// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo che mchog yab yum la// che mchog rigs
178b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi yab yum dang // dregs pa 'dul byed khro bo bcu// ta kr-it+ta spro ba bzhi dang bcas// shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// badz+ra he ru yab yum la// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung yab yum dang // kau rI ma bkyang phra men ma// gdong mo sro ma bzhing
178b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// lho yi dkyil 'khor chen po na// gshin rje gshed po yab yum la// gshin rje gshed bzhi yab yum dang // phyogs skyong gshin rje pho mo dang // gshin rje'i sgo ba bzhi dang bcas// rgyab kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso rta mthan
178b6(rnying rgyud): yab yum pa// bka' nyan phra men sprul pa dang // zil gnon khro brgyad yab yum dang // pergya'i sgo ba bzhi dang bcas// byang gi dkyil 'khor chen po ca// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum la// sras mchog rigs kyi zu rab bzhi// khro bo bcu dang de yi yum/
178b7(rnying rgyud): za byed bcu dang gsod byed de// phur pa'i sgo ba bzhi dang bcas// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// bla med he ru yab yum la// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam pa lnga// ye shes las kyi rje mo dang // srid pa'i sman mor bcas pa dang // nub byang dkyil 'khor
179a1(rnying rgyud): rdzu na su a// sa gas kyas patsung dang // nga na sa shA / na rnam // nga tu
179a2(rnying rgyud): rlung mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// reg 'dzin drug no rdul// sgrub pa'i rig 'dzin pargyad dang bcas// dkyil 'khor gyi khams la ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // kye yi lcags ngam khrod la// gaka'
179a3(rnying rgyud): da // gleng chen bco brgyad lang ga dang // ma bdu snang bzhi ba myu da// sna bdag min sa rgyag hU~M dag rgyun pa 'i dang // 'drim zlag yangs pa'i ma blo dang // dngul mi kA tan rnams dgod/
179a4(rnying rgyud): mitshogs// sru babyed spyan drang bzhugs su gsol// gus pa'i sgo nas phyag btsal te// mdzod cing ba snyed la phrin las brgyal// tshogs dang lhag ma'i mchod pas mchod// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'phro'abu // slo ban tsan tus na
179a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin / da na thams ma// bdu sa
179a6(rnying rgyud): sa 'du sa
179b1(rnying rgyud): bdagargya sa/ shA zum dag tug byed pa// thob sa can dang dang // dam bas 'das// rim pa dgags yongasasu btod/ ga nga/ gyu // sa sa ga dang / slad chus nang/
179b2(rnying rgyud): dba' las// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// che mchog he ru'i lbub phyed bya// dpung dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// rtsa ba'i zhal gsam mthing nag rngams// lhag ma sna tshogs pa yi mdog/ rdo rje kha TI rnge'u chung dang // 'khor
179b3(rnying rgyud): chen pad+ma che// ral gring gra sA zhags pa ni// g.yas pa'i phyag du rim shes bya// byan dmar zhing dbyug zong gshol dang // nyi ma zla ba ri rab dang // chu me rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag na'o// gnam zhal shes rab zhes pa
179b4(rnying rgyud): ra khrod ches kyis s+ya brgyan cing // 'bar ba'i gar dgur ldan par bskyed// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// mkha' las kho bo 'tshal par lnga// slar 'dus dkyil 'khor brgyad la dgod// gtso bo rnams kyi lhur brtag bye// byang chub sem
179b5(rnying rgyud): zer dang // so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba las// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spro bar bya// gtso bo che mchog yab yum la// dregs pa phyogs skyong 'dul byed bcu// badz+ra he du yab yum la// ki ri phra men brgyad rnams sgo// 'jam dpal gshin rje ya
179b6(rnying rgyud): la// phyogs skyong bcu gnyis yum dang bcas// pad+ma dbang chen yab yum la// zil gnon khro bo yab yum brgyad// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum la// 'jigs byed khro bo khro mor bcas// bla med he ru yab yum la// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi'o// dregs
179b7(rnying rgyud): pa kun 'dul lab sum la// rdzogs pa dbang chen sde brgyad pacas// stobs ldan nag po yab yum la// drug po lnga brgyad gakhong gyis bskor// drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la// grub pa'i rig 'dzin rnam pa brgyad// kye khyams dbang phyug te shu brgyad//
180a1(rnying rgyud): gyi yi lcags ri 'khor yug la// mkha' 'gro zhing dang lang ka dang // ma sring 'bar ma pho nya dang // mkha' 'gro 'bum thug mangs pa dang // rang bzhin dpal gyi bka' sdod pa'o// de ltar ngo bo gsal bskyed nas// mu dang ga
180a2(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs shing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bsrung la// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te// mchod bstod phrin las bcol bar bya// yang na chos nyid de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang gas pa dang la bzhag/ yang dag pa yi lam 'di la// gang dge
180a3(rnying rgyud): dang mos pa de// lhun gyi grub pa'i las la sbyor// tshe gcig nyid la the tshom med// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag de nyid don// shi
180a4(rnying rgyud): pasdus te bshad par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas de ru// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las byas nas// ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang // 'byung ba yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang // ked rus ri rab rtse brgyad par// dur khrod
180a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i gzhal yang khang // tshom bu dgu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dregs pa ti zla bad+ma'i gdan// kun la khyab par shes par bya// gdan stengs rgyu yi byin rlabs las// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthor nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs
180a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrang // dbus kyi rda ni sku dang mtshungs// g.yas dang g.yon pa dkar dang dmar// rdo rje de bzhin ka pA la'i// bye brag rnam pa gsum gsum nyid// phyag drug gis ni 'dzin par mdzad// dur khrod chas kyis lus la brgyan// gnyis
180a7(rnying rgyud): med yum dang lhan cig skyong // bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'jigs par bsgom// ya ba dang yum gyi thugs ka rnam// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nag hU~M gi 'phro 'du las// shar du badz+ra he ru ka
180b1(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed ni de bzhin lho// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal ba ste// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu'o// shar sbyor bla med he ru ka/ nub byung dregs pa kun 'dul ba// stobs ldan nag po byung nAr dra// skyo nub dag 'dzin grub pa yan// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya bas bzhi la//
180b2(rnying rgyud): che mchog rigs bzhi yab yum dang // rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung chen po bzhi// gshed bzhi sbyor ba'i yum dang bcas// las kyi sras mchog bka' nyan dang // de bzhin rigs bzhi'i sras mchog dang // dbyings kyi yum dang rigs 'dzin bzhi/
180b3(rnying rgyud): dregs pa'i sde dpon bzhi bzhi dag/ me long nang gi gzugs bzhin du// snang la ma nges so sor brtag/ gang zhig de ltar goms pa dang // phrin las rgya mtsho yongs la sbyar// mtshams med spyod pa'i skye bos kyang // bsgrubs na 'grub par gdon mi tha/
180b4(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa shin tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / khro bo spyir bsrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas yang rigs bzhi'i he ru kas zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ phyogs
180b5(rnying rgyud): bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyi// yon tan 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba btab nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal ba// che mchog yon tan bsgrub 'dod pas// dur khrod dben pa'i
180b6(rnying rgyud): gnas chen du// dkyil 'khor byi ngor byas nas kyang // bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// khrag chen thal chen bsres pa yis// mthing nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// de nyid dmigs pa'i rten du gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur
180b7(rnying rgyud): khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // 'byung ba rnam pa lnga brtsegs shing // keng rus chen po'i ri rab steng // 'jigs pa'i dur khrod dkyil 'khor ni// rtsibs bzhi gru chad khyams dang bcas// sgo bzhi gru chad rgyan ldan la// phyi nang med par gsal ba'i nang //
181a1(rnying rgyud): lha brgyad klu brgyad bsnol ba dang // byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi steng // hUM las che mchog he ru ka/ khro mo gnam zhal yum dang bcas// yon tan 'dus pa'i sku yin te// 'khor lo'i dbus sra bskyed par bya// bcom
181a2(rnying rgyud): lAn rak+Sha he ru ka/ smug nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo de bzhin pad+ma dang // ti ra'i rgya zhags 'dab chags khyud // ba su 'dren cing yum dang bcas// shar gyi rtsibs la mkhas pas bskyed// dpal chen kle hu he ru ka/ ser nag mthing
181a3(rnying rgyud): dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen thod khrag dgra s+tha dang // rgyu zhags stong gi 'jig rten rnams// bzung nas yum dang sbyor bar mdzad// lho yi rtsibs la bskyed par byed// bcom ldan b+hi shwa he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar// pa
181a4(rnying rgyud): b+han dmar 'jig rten dang // dgra s+tha dang ni gshol bsnams nas// shes rab yum dang bcas pa ni// 'bad pas nub kyi rtsibasal bskyed// bcom ldan yak+Sha he ru ka/ ljang nag dkar dang dmer ba'i zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje thod khrag bcas// ral kra
181a5(rnying rgyud): zhags pa dgra sta dang // thong gshol thogs nas yum dang sbyor// byang gi rtsigs la bskyed par bya// phyi rim lha yi/ snam bu la// phyogs skyong 'dul ba'i khro bo bcu// 'khor lo tri shul bsnams pa yi// dkar po'i mdog can shar du'o// dgra sta thod dkru
181a6(rnying rgyud): thogs pa yi// mthing nag 'jigs pa lho ru bskyed// dmar po spu gri zhags pa can// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su'o// rdo rje rgya gram dril bu 'dzin// lja dgu byang du bskyed par bya// me dpal dbyug to bsdams pa yi// dmar po shar lho'i mtshams la'o//
181a7(rnying rgyud): ral gri zhags ldan nag po che// lho dang nub kyi mtshams su ste// dmar s+ya b+hanA dza yab bsdams// nub byang dag gi mtshams su'o// dgra s+thA dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// mthing ga byang shar mtshams su bskyed// sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dang // dud
181b1(rnying rgyud): kha zo bzhugs pa bsdams// steng dang 'og tu bskyed bya ste// rang gi phrin las mtshan dang ldan// lcags kyu zhags pa ljags sgrog dril// rim bzhin thogs pa'i takrata bzhi// 'bar gsal rngams pa bskyed byas la// gsang sngags 'di yang bzlas par/
181b2(rnying rgyud): bya// A~M badz+ra kro ta ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT// thog mthar oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer bcu gnas pa// che mchog 'khor bcas snying po yin// sra gsal 'od zer 'phro 'du bya// de nyid sems nyid yin shes nas// logs nas che mchog bsgrub tu med
181b3(rnying rgyud): dadang ldan 'bad pa'i sgrub pa pos// yon tan rig 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ che mchog yon tan sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi nang nas badz+ra he ru ka bzhengs te 'di skad ces
181b4(rnying rgyud): nus so// e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ thugs kyi sgrub pa bshad du gsol// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa pos// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor gyi dor nus pa la//
181b5(rnying rgyud): thag chen dag gis chog chag gdab// ro ras dag la hUM gnas pa// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas bzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'jigs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen po'i ra rab kyi//
181b6(rnying rgyud): ltesteng na 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas khang // phyi dang nad med kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir ldan// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas mdzes// 'bar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrugs/
181b7(rnying rgyud): khyu mchog ma he stag dang gzig/ gtum pa'i dom gyis spar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen las phyogs bzung // nyi zla pad+ma zhing gi gdan// rim gyis gsal bar bskyed stengs su// hUM las badz+ra he ru ka/ mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi
182a1(rnying rgyud): na masas smras/ sa g+sak+Sha// sta rdzus smras// / sasu rgyu/ dunan nan sa // / gra na/
182a2(rnying rgyud): 'dum pa yis// dkyil la kho ga na bar ba skyed pa sh+tsa/ bcom ldan pa teH// lkug na/ mthing ga dming pa la nam// trI 'i dathug pa rdo byung // skye nags rten myur ba skya 'dzin// ban+d+ha po d+hI ThA ba nas// shar gyi rtsi bas la myed pa /
182a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan rat+na he ru ka/ ser nag mthing ga dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen gyis dbyug dgra sta g.yas// ri rab zod khrag zong gA shol bsnams// ran po d+hI T+Ta rIng bcas// lho yi phyogs su mkhas paMs bskyed// bcom ldan pa h+ye ru ka/ da mar nag mthing
182a4(rnying rgyud): dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma be con dgra sta dang // ri rab stong gi 'jig rten dag/ 'dzin par mdzad cing yum dang ldan// nub kyi ci byas la bskyed par bya// bcom ldan kAm he ru ka/ ljang nag dkar dang dmar po'i zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri dang // dgra sA la
182a5(rnying rgyud): sogs de bzhin du// bzung nas karma kro tIr bcas// mos las byar gi phyogs su'o// dkyil 'khor lha yi snam bu la// kau seng phra men 'di dag dgod// gau rI d+ha na dmar byis dbyug sngo// tsau rI mda' gzhu 'grengs ma ser// phra mo chu srin rgyal
182a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan 'phyang// be tA byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+kad mar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ldang // l+la sha mthing nAg b+hI snying za// tsan d+ha ser skya byis lus 'brel// seng ha ser mo zhing za sed// b+ham+b+hi dmar mo lag bsgol stag/ sril
182a7(rnying rgyud): nag mo byis ldag wa// thAn mthing gsha 'drang sbyang // gr-in+ta dmar mo dung gri god// kang kang mar spug zhing khur ngur// k+Sha ka nag mo b+han gri bya// u lu mthing ga lcags kyu 'ug/ ta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren// phig gdong sngon mo mche zhags bsdam//
182b1(rnying rgyud): sbrel gdong dmar mo lcags srog bsdam// thal byed ljang gu dril 'khrol sbyang // 'bar 'phrogasal bas thams cad 'phros// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i gnyen por brtag/ gsang ba'i snying po 'di yang bzlas// lho ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hUM phaT// thog mtha'
