182b2(rnying rgyud): sngo dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na 'bru bdun grong gnas pa// khrag 'thung lha rgyad srog snying yin// zhe sdang can gyi snod dag gi// 'bar ba gtum khro rngams pa'i gzugs// drag shul can gyis spyad pa'i phyir// dgra ba gegs 'dul phyir bsgrub par bya//
182b3(rnying rgyud): zugs kyi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma skye
182b4(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang // sku yi sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal ba// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub pa la// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor gyi dor byas pa la// bdud rtsi
182b5(rnying rgyud): yis chag chag gdab// khrag chen go ro tsa na yis// mthing nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// dmigs pa'i steng du gzhag par bya// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'jigs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen
182b6(rnying rgyud): po'i ri rab kyi// steng na dur khrod gzhal yas khang // rtsigs bzhi gu chad khyams dang bcas// sgo bzhi lcags rir bcas pa ni// phyi dang nang med chos kyi dbyings// ma he chu glang zhing gi gdan// steng du 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// dus gsum bde
182b7(rnying rgyud): shen pa rnams ci// skyem skul pa phru su byed// dbyag bya badrug na bzhi chung // gsasadag ngag yo da ma nga kyis ni // 'i srings phyug 'gro// thunas ma sa mang byeng rgyan sa / dri myo ngas brjid tshul sas/
183a1(rnying rgyud): na du tudan tu slad na na
183b1(rnying rgyud): na/ na ngan san sa na na na 'as so//
183b2(rnying rgyud): sa
183b3(rnying rgyud): mas ma gyu/ / sa /
183b4(rnying rgyud): ma gyur na / mam / sa / sa
183b5(rnying rgyud): sa
183b6(rnying rgyud): na ngas
184a1(rnying rgyud): ldan // sna nga na nan sa sa/ pa na
184a2(rnying rgyud): na
184a3(rnying rgyud): denas dpal tamazin gyis 'di skad ces gas / amad pa // pa gsung ga skab
184a4(rnying rgyud): yang nga chu/ na //
184a5(rnying rgyud): ma po ba pa 'a/ phyogs ku nga brel ga 'dzi// shang das nga gyu ma bzhin du// 'khor ma'i rtsibs la brtag
184b1(rnying rgyud): s+ho yi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la// ye shas zhi ba zil gnon pa'i// khro bo phyag na rdo rje dang // 'khor lo de bzhin rin chen g.yas// pad+mar la grang la phrag yon// de bzhin yas kyi khro bdag/ zil gnan pad+ma sta gri dang // dbyug to/ nI dgra s+tha dang //
184b2(rnying rgyud): sna chags rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// ye shes ma mo thams cad kun// zil gnon khro bo chen po ni// sdigs mdzub lcags kyu sbrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog kha nAM rde'u chung g.yon// ye shes khyung chen zil gnon khro// rdo rje sa dang me khyur g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung
184b3(rnying rgyud): du khyung g.yon// po rgyud zil gnon khro rgyal gtso/ rdo rje thod skam rgya zhags dang // dung khrag thod pa rlon pa dang // zhing gi dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// srid pa'i mo rgyud thams cad kun// zi la gnon rdo rje ral gri mda'// zhags pa de bzhin sdigs mdzub dang // gzhu
184b4(rnying rgyud): rnams phyag no go rim bzhin// 'jig rten srid pa'i klu rigs bzhi// zil gyis gnon pa'i khro ba ni// phyag na dkar ser dmar ba'i sbrul// de bzhin khra sngo nag po 'chang // gza' chen brgyad po zil gnon pa'i// khro rgyal rtsa ba'i phyag nyid na// rdo rje ral gri zhags
184b5(rnying rgyud): papa dang // dung khrag dbyug pa khyung bsnams pa'o// zil gnon khro bo 'di dag kun// g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// sku ni bskal pa me yi 'od// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu yi// skad kyis gdug pa so mor 'dul// zhabs bzhi
184b6(rnying rgyud): brkyang bsum gdul bya kun// ma lus zil gyis gnon par byed// rang rang yum dang mnyam par sbyor// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang gu'i mdog can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin thogs
184b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgo bar bcas// 'bar gsal rnams pa lhan ner bsgom// gsang ba'i snying po 'di yang bzla/ A~M badz+ra ma hA shro ta ha la s+thi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// thog mthar oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na ba cu bzhi'i grong mdzes pa// pad+ma'i lha rgyud snying po yin/
185a1(rnying rgyud): dbang gi thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing // khrag 'thung lha tshogs dgyes pa dang // rnal 'byor nyams chag sdig sgrib skyong // ye shes lha dang gnyis su med// gsung gi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs
185a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyad las/ pad+ma gsung gi srab thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal rdo rje gzhon nus 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal khro bo'i rje// phrin las sgrub thabs bshad tu gsol// dpa
185a3(rnying rgyud): chen yang kyis bka' stsal pa// phur pa phrin las bsgrub 'dod pas// gnams gru gsum par gnas pa// dkyil 'khor gyi dor byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// mthing nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// yul gsum gsal bar
185a4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // rtsibs bzhi sgo bzhi khyams dang ldan// de nang dregs pa khyo shug dang // phyogs skyong nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// hUM las rdo rje gzhon nu ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal
185a5(rnying rgyud): skye mdog bai DUr+ya yi mdog/ rtse dgu rtse lnga'i rdo rje che// phyag g.yas de bzhin g.yon pa na// kha T+wAM ga dang me dpung bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// zhabs bzhi cad kyi dor thabs bgrad// dug khrod chas kyis sru brgyan nas//
185a6(rnying rgyud): thod pa khrag gis bkang // phyag tu bzung nas dgyes pa'i yum// rgyas 'debs ma dang lhan cig nyid// phrin las 'dus pa'i skur bsgom bya// gtso bo yab yum byin rlabs las// 'khor lo'i lha tshogs bskyed bya ba// shar du bud+d+ha kI la ya/
185a7(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum dkar dmar mthing ga'i mdo// rdo rje dgra sta rgyu zhags dang // ral gri thogs pa blam zhing sdig/ lho phyogs rat+na kI la ma// dkar dang de bzhin dmar ser zhal// bing dang dgra sta ral gri dang // be con bsdams te bu bzhi'i gzugs//
185b1(rnying rgyud): nub tu pad+ma kI la ya// zhal gsum dkar ser dmar ba'i gzugs// ral gri mdung thung mda' dang gzu// mtshan mar 'dzin pa dbang gi gzugs// byang phyogs karma kI la'i zhal// dkar dmar ljang bu'i mdog can te// mdung dang gri grag lcags kyu 'i/
185b2(rnying rgyud): ral gri thogs pa drag po'i sku// 'jigs byed chen po 'di dag kun// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pas nam mkha' khengs// gru gsum e yi gdan la bzhugs// gyi yi khyams la bskyed bya ba// 'jigs pa'i khro cu
185b3(rnying rgyud): yum dang ldan// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// tshangs la stsogs pa zhabs bzhis mnan// rtsa ba'i phyag gis rdo rje dang // thod khrag dkrug cing mtha' gnyis kyis// ri rab phur bu 'dril mdzad cing // rdo rje'i gshog pas nam mkha' khyad// hri
185b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad sngo skya ser dmar zhal// mda' gzhu 'gengs shing sgra 'byin yum// be con thogs dang sprul pa yi// phra men phag dang rmig pu'i mgo// rnam rgyal dkar po sngo ljang zhal// rdo rje dung khrag snyems ma ni// ral gri 'dzin cang sprul pa yi// phra med
185b5(rnying rgyud): stag dang bya rgod mgo// dbyug sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// me dpal dbyug to 'dzin mdzad cing // rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu'o// sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo// gshin rje sngo s+ya ldang sngon mdog/ thod pa'i dbug pa dgra sta thogs// dur khrod
185b6(rnying rgyud): bdag mo zod dbyug 'chang // sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo// ljang sngon smug nag mi g.yo mgon// ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje gtun khu tho ba 'dzin// sprul pa gzigs dang khA te'i mgo// rta mgrin dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal//
185b7(rnying rgyud): zhags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // rdo rje gtum mo spa gri thogs// sprul pa byi la bu shud mgo// 'dod rgyal dmar ser ljang gu'i mdog/ ba dan rnga yab 'chang dang yum// rdo rje mda' snyems tho ba 'dzin// srul pa spang dang khwa yi mgo// bdud
186a1(rnying rgyud): 'khyil ba ljang dkar dmar// rdo rje rgya gram dril bu bsdams// rdo rje rlung 'byin dgra sta thogs// sprul pa seng ge pha wang mgo// dkar dmar nag pa'i zhal mdog can// khams gsum rnam rgyal rdo rje sprul// rdo rje gsong
186a2(rnying rgyud): rtsed yum gri phug/ phra men dom dang sre mo'i mgo// stobs chen dud kha gnag dang ldang // tho ba zhags pa phyag na ste// rdo rje sbrul byed rtse gsum 'dzin// srul ba dred dang byi la'i mgo// ljags kyu 'dzin dkar pa shud mgo// zhags 'dzin gser mdzo
186a3(rnying rgyud): phya ka'i gdong// srin bya'i gdod dmar lcags sgrog thogs// dri la 'khrol ljang gu khwa gdong ste// ma lus gsal bar sku bskyed la// gsang sngags snying po 'di yang bzla// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nA nA baM hU~M phaT// thog mtha' AM dang phaT bzhan
186a4(rnying rgyud): nas// bar na bcu gnyis grong mdzes pa// phur pa'i lha rgyang snying po yin// sgo bsdus phur pa'i 'phro 'du bya// phrin las rnam bzhi las la sbyar// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar bcad nas// phrin las rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde bar ga
186a5(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus brtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phrang pa phrin las sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bla med nye rugs 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal khro ba'i rje// ma mo chod gtong grub pa'i thabs// phrin las las la
186a6(rnying rgyud): bskul ba'i phyir// rim bzhin bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo rgod gtong bsgrub 'dod pas// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas ni//
186a7(rnying rgyud): khrag chen dag gis chag chag gdag// thal chen gyis ni hUM bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dra gakhrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir bcas// zhing chen bla ris btsun
186b1(rnying rgyud): nga nang gangan ng+yas su// bdag nyid mamajugatas// mun mthong naga'adugs sas can// g.ya sa dag gsan dmar dbyamam tha // du sul klung thA lhanags gapas/ na gra pa da
186b2(rnying rgyud): chis kyis bcan// srid pa'i maman pas zhis gci// yum tshan canan namam// ba'i thar thabs pacad thugs sathams pano// mtha' ben padi ni tsug tu 'gyul// da zhin
186b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bas// rdo rje dril budri la zhags dang // nyan+ta 'dud cig yang gzhi brnams// rtswa tshogs 'gyur ba'i su mdagal// gnyis med pade bas yab dang byor// mkhas pas cho gang bzhin du// dkyil 'thar na gyi 'gyid par/
186b4(rnying rgyud): ma pa la// dbu gsam stug drug zhabs pazhi bzang // phyag drug g.yas kyi dang shin// rigs kyi mthen mas mar 'ag// de bzhin g.yon na thong ba'o// rnam na gas la dang 'ang gas la 'bar// nyan gas pa
186b5(rnying rgyud): bkra gsal 'bar zhes bya ba ni// ming gi mtha' dang yang dag ldan// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma// sku mdog dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dgra sta dang ni gtun shing brdeg/ seng ge mchog chen thams stod// lho yu mkha' 'gro ba na glang gdong/
186b6(rnying rgyud): sru mdog skrod mo 'bar ba la// me dpal dbyug pa'i tho ba dang // tha ma stag mo zhing chung stod// nub N+DI mkha' 'gro bu dka'i gdong // sku mdog dmar mo mdzes tshul can// zhags pa dang ni tri thul// ce spyang dang ni zhing chung stod// byang gi ma
186b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro rdo rje'i margya// sku mdog ljang gu ched du 'bar// dbyug rten rje rgya phreng 'dzin// spyang mo'i kha ru zhing chung spyod// nam ma kha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i mchu// sku mdog btso ma'i gser ltar gdong // 'khor lo dang ni nya 'bar// rgyal mtshan dang ni
187a1(rnying rgyud): 5/ / stugA 'dzin// tha ma thag pa zhing chung spyod// srid pa'i bdang gro khams gsum yum// sgyu mdog mthong ga 'bar ba la// dbugasum phyag tu gzhabs bzhi bgrang// 'khyur la da chen ga yang gzha 'arda'// bong
187a2(rnying rgyud): bya ma lcags kyu thogs// dkar mo nyi zla'i zod phreng can// zangs lcags dkar nag zhags pa 'phen// rdo rje nyi ma mdog dkar zhing // phyag na shel gyi spu gri thogs// rdo rje khrag 'thung zhes bya ba// sngon mo thod la khrag tun 'dzin// rdo'irje 'dud
187a3(rnying rgyud): lag na bdu ci thas pa 'dzin// mdun grodang mi dgasu mam// lag she zhugs rgyal ban tos// dag ma thid pa'i rgyu byed pa// lag sring pa'i drug pa rtogs// nga mo sa zlag ma yin// lag ge she byeg pa // dam ma bdan /
187a4(rnying rgyud): zhag 'dzin// ser mo chen mo gcig pu ma// lag na mi yi g.yang bzhi brded// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na b+han+ta zlum po thogs// mthing nag chen mo mche ba can// lag na b+hat+ta sul mang bsdams// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ni// lag na
187a5(rnying rgyud): lo can// ser mo ched mo las mkhan ma// lag na bcu n+ya gram thogs// srid pa'i ma mo chags byed ma// mthing nag mi snying rlon pa thogs// ting 'dzin de bzhin cha snyoms ma// dmar mo thod pa khrag gis bkang // 'dod pa'i 'a
187a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang phyug ma// mdog sngon bdud kyi khram pa ma thogs// e ka dza~M TI ra la gcig pa// dkar mo kha T+wAM ga yiro// gling bzhi kun gyi spyi phung ni// dkar mo lcags kyu 'od phreng can// rin chen srid 'degs mdog sngon mo// lag nag yu yi
187a7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma gar dbang le brgan mdog/ thod pa khrag bkang thugs kar 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje gar dbang phyug/ ser mo me yi dkyil 'khor can// ha ra ting dkar mo chen mo ni// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// pun ting nag mo kho mo'i gzugs// lag
187b1(rnying rgyud): nam yi dkyil 'khod 'dzin// dngos po'i cha byad dmar mol// lag na rgya yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo gser gyi mdog/ lag na byung gi dkyil 'khor 'dzin// bdag nyid chen mo gcig phra ma// dbyings phyug brgyan gyi rgyal man// zhing gi /
187b2(rnying rgyud): zhags g.yang gzhi bdeg// srang bu'i zhags pa thod pa 'dzin// skam pa mo dang por thogs ma// g.yang gzhi mo dang zla ba dang // gsong byed ma dang zab mo// de bzhin dri ma sdom byed ma// srin mo chen mo 'di dag kyang // dkar rdzo dmang dang ser ba'i
187b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs// thod pa sna tshogs 'dzin ma'o// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsig ma// lag na b+han+ta dkar po thogs// lho yi nag mo kha 'byams ma// lagA na b+had+d+ha sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// lag na b+han+ta dmar po thogs//
187b4(rnying rgyud): gser ma deng lag ma// lag na b+han+t+ra ser mo thogs// gleng bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // dkang mardo rje rtse gsumathogs// mkha' la khyad lding gzhin rnga'i sring // sngon mo ma thod dkrug pa thogs// dmar mog yug zod bu yi phreng // dmar mo sbal na gzhags pa
187b5(rnying rgyud): nag mo sngar thogag nod sbyin sring // ser mo ne'u le'i rgyal pa thogs// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs banas gsal bskyed la// gsang sngags snying po 'di yang baH// oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na Sh+NI te ru ka buH tsu no krod+hi shwa rI hUM// ma ma yo ga na~M ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M phaT/
187b6(rnying rgyud): oM dang phan gyi thog mtha' brten// bA ran nyir brgyad grong gnas pa// ma mo 'khor bcas srog snying yin// ma mo rnams kyi zhal du yang // bdud rtsi thugs la las la kye// rgod gtor las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs sa// bde ba
187b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dras pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ma mdzod gtong sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dpal dregs pa kun 'dul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen thabs la mkhas// 'jig rten mchod bsgod
188a1(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs// marungs gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// dpa' ba chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gas na nas kyang // dpal chen yang kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten mchod nga rgyad bsrub 'dong pas//
188a2(rnying rgyud): gadzubacu ba lta 'dre gnas pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor gyi dor byas nas ni// khrag sna tshogs pas chag cag gdab// sna tshogs khrag gis e dbyibs bri// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur ba dang // ngar mod pa
188a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rtsi ba bzhi par khyams dang // gro bzhir bcas pa gsal bA la// gdug pa'i gtan gzhana' ba chags 'khor// shin tu 'jigs bya bskyod nas ni// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dum ni// dbugs pa phyag kyang drag par
188a4(rnying rgyud): kham nag skrag nag mthing nag zhal// dang po rdo rje dung khrag dang // lha brgyad de bzhin gru brgyad kyi// man po de bzhin phyag gnyis pa'i// 'og ma dag gis 'dzin pa'o// dregs pa'i snying ga zhabs kyis brdzes// yum chen khams gsum gyi 'a
188a5(rnying rgyud): ma// rdo rje dung khrag thogs pa ni// dregs pa 'dul ba'i g.yen par bsgom// mtshungs 'dul byed de la 'khor// rmugs pa'i sde rnams bskyed par bya// mthing nag ma hA de ba ni// gri grag dang nI tsit+ta 'dzin// rtse gas mthong pa zhag bcas pa'i
188a6(rnying rgyud): ma da pa'i yum dang bcas// gzhon che nag po thog gi bdag/ btson thod pa'i dbyug pa 'chang // gsod byed nag ma'i lag pa da / sred pa'i 'phar sa bzar ba dang // mating nag bdud rnams kun gyi bdag/ kham shing dang ni turaro// bdud mnan
188a7(rnying rgyud): oMri ma te// tham pas dang ni nang rgyal thogs// nag po klog phreng srin gyig tso// thog dang srid pa 'khrugs pani 'ad// 'dzin dang srin mo khrag mig ma// dmar nag khrag phrar thod pa 'chang // gnod sbyin me dpal mthang nag sgra// rin pa che dang mtshon can/
188b1(rnying rgyud): ba// ma mnan ma da la phram// sugri sbyang ma phyag gnyis nas// gza' bdud chen pa na thul// dung kha mda' gsu sgra la grags bsnams// gnam sman thog gi bu lug ma// dmar rgya thugs dang sar ba 'branas// klu bdud nag pa mag dgu ba// drad 'a
188b2(rnying rgyud): zhags nang rgyal thogs// gru mo nag mo zhes bya ba// mo gzugs klu bdud cha lugs can// srid pa'i lha rnams kun gyi gtso// dkar po dar mdung shel gyi gri// gnam gyi lha chen skyes bu'i bdag/ dkar po lhan dkar ral gri 'dzin// ga mdog da
188b3(rnying rgyud): yi bdud// dar mdung ral gri phyag char 'chang // ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// me long tsakra 'dzin pa dkar// sngags srung e ka dza nI ma// mthing nag g.yu s+yAd tsit+ta 'dzin// dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma// tshon dru dang ni nad rgyal thogs/
188b4(rnying rgyud): dmar nag rdo rje bdud 'du la ni// khrag dang nyung dkar thun 'bebs pa'o// srog zan dmar po btsan gyi rje// bse mdung mda' dang gzhu yi mtshon// srid pa'i btsan 'gong dmar po ni// shang lang zangs kyi zhags pa bsnams// mu stegs ka la nag po na/
188b5(rnying rgyud): rtse gsum thod pa khrag can 'dzin// mthing nag bgegs kyi rgyal po ni// kha T+wAM thod pa lag tu 'chad// dmu bdud yongs kyi rje bo ni// mthing nag shang lang mda' dang gzhu// tshangs pa lha rnams kun gyi gtso// spu gri nyi ma'i zer thogs pa'o// pho chud
188b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po yongs kyi bdag/ mdog dkar zhags pa skra gri 'dzin// gsang ba sku lha'i gtso bo dkar// rdo rje dang ni ru mtshon 'chang // mgon po ma hA kA la ni// mthing nag beng dang gri gug thogs// dregs pa'i ded dpon sum cu po// sna tshogs gos
188b7(rnying rgyud): gon re re'ang // 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis 'khor dang bcas// sprul pa yang sprul bsam mi khyab// gsal 'tsher 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms te// snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya// A~M badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT// thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag
189a1(rnying rgyud): nas// bar na krug ra brgyang gnas pa// 'jig tanam thang bstod bsgrub pa'i sngags// dregs pacan gyi rdza brgyad kyi// bstan pa bsu shing gra dgu 'dras// 'gras pa'i dab rnams skul bar 'gyur// ba bar drug da/
189a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas stobs ldan nag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen thabs la mkhas// de mod pa dragra sngags sgrub pa'i thab
189a3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // dpal chen he rus bka' stsal pa// dmod pa drag sngags bsgrub 'dod pas// srog chags bsad pa'i ri 'dra'i sa// dmar po khrab
189a4(rnying rgyud): gi mdog 'dra'i ngos// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba la// srin po khros pa'i gzugs bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // shin tu 'jigs bya'i dkyil 'khor ni// tsakra rtsibs dang sgo bzhir bcas
189a5(rnying rgyud): btu gsal ba'i dbus nyid du// bdud bgegs nyi zla pad+ma'i khar// lha mchog stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i zhal// phyag na rdo rje dung khrag dang // lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta bsnams//
189a6(rnying rgyud): zhabs gnyis dregs pa po mo gzir// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag moni// mkha' 'dogs sa gzhi gnon pa'i phyag/ zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// yum dang gnyis med sbyor byed pa'i// drag sngags gtso ba bskyed par bya// rdug sngags sde dpon bcwo bcar/
189a7(rnying rgyud): po// rang gi sngags las bskyed bya ste// 'chi ba dag gzhin rje nag po ni// thod bgri gug 'dzin mdzad cing // thod 'gri gug 'dzin yum ldan// bdud nag me 'bar zhes bya ba// khram shing bdud zhags thogs pa dang // khra ma shing thod rlon 'dzin pa yi//
189b1(rnying rgyud): yumra dang srin mo gsod byed ni// ral gri thod 'chang de yi yum// gri blag mi ma gathogs pa'o// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ni// mdag sngon ral gri dang nag 'phyar// dar na gzhing lpags 'dzin pa'i yum// mahA de wa su mdog dkar// ba dan
189b2(rnying rgyud): shel gri 'dzin pa dang // thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mchod gtor thun gyi gtor ma 'chang // mthing nag bcan po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhing lpags thogs// mu stegs nag po zhes bya ba// kha T+wA~M ga dang rje shal jo//
189b3(rnying rgyud): gza' yi gtso// nag po khram shing dgra sta 'chang // rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba// mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin// mdog ser 'gong po yongs kyi gtso// srul pa'i lag pa 'gyed pa dang // mdog dkar rdo rje mdzes //
189b4(rnying rgyud): dang dmar ba'i ru mtshon thogs// 'jig rten btsan gyi rgyal po ni// btsan gyi mdung dang gri 'dzin pa'o// klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa// dmar po bum pa rus sbal ldan// dregs pa dmod pa'i mtshon cha can// srin po'i gzugs can
189b5(rnying rgyud): kha nas dmod pa'i rtags sngags zlos// gang la dmigs pa'i srog lus gcod// de lta bu ni gsal ba dang // snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o// oM badz+ra sarba duhUM hU~M phaT// thog mthar AM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer drug gnas pa/
189b6(rnying rgyud): pa drag sngags snying po yin// de nas drag sngags gang 'dod bsgrub// gdon mi za bar grub 'gyur te// rdo rje'i brag kyang tshal par 'gas// zhes gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmod pa drag sngags bslal pa
189b7(rnying rgyud): le'u s+ye bco rgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal chen po nying nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / der sprul zhing 'dus pa'i 'tho/ khro bo dang / khro mo rnams dang / grub pa'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs lhun gyis thub pa dang / phyag rgya chen po dang /
190a1(rnying rgyud): la dbang bdag/ sa la gnas pa ste/ so so'i bsgrubs pas grub pa'i sul rus pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / zhabs gdub dang / dbu rgyan dang / stod g.yogs dang / slad g.yogs dang / dbu
190a2(rnying rgyud): gi zor tshugs dang bcas pa/ phyag na rdo rje dril bu bzung ba sha stag ste/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i rig 'dzin dang bcas pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par dga'o// khro bo spos grub kyi skabs te gsum pa'o// / bco
190a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ le'u bco brgyad zhi lho 'dus pa'i rgyud sgrogs stsogs// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / 'od kyi lo tsA pa bdag pa ra~M tsa nas bsnung zhing
190a4(rnying rgyud): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// shog ser gyi bu la lha brag tu bshus so zer ba 'dug// klan+sa/ Sh+TaSh+T+r-iH/ rgya gar skad du/ b+ha gA wAn sarba su ga tA sa mu dA yot+ta ra ta n+t+ran+t+ra ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'das
190a5(rnying rgyud): ba phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / gyi nang chu khyon tshad
190a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang he ru kA la/ 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang / rig 'dzin pho mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dregs pa pho mo rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po
190a7(rnying rgyud): nang nas rig 'dzin po mo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan spyi dpal rje// slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang // smin par byed pa'i lam dang ni// phyag rgya sgrub pa'i thabs la sogs// rtsa ba'i rgyud du ma gsungs pa// phyi ma yi ni chud
190b1(rnying rgyud): min 'dir// sems can rnams la sman pa'i phyir// gcu chos rim bzhin bshad du gsol// a la la to// zhes phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las zhus pa'i la'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
190b2(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang po he ru kas 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang sngags sgo ni slob dpon te// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas nas// nyan pa la sogs brtsam
190b3(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// bde gshegs rjes 'brangs slob dpon te// de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing // sngags rnams ma 'dres so sor mkhyen// shes rab che zhing brtson 'grus che// phyi nang
190b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud shes cho ga skong // thabs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs la// gang dang gang la ma rmongs shes// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// lhag chad med pa thams mkhas shes// gsang ba mchog gi thabs rnams sbed// che mchog he ru'i slob dpon yin//
190b5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// shin tu 'dus pa chen po ste// 'di las 'da' bar mi byed pa// yan lag dam tshig mchog tu len// spyod pa'i bye brag thabs yin pas// mi slong mi 'dor 'bad bsrung ba// mdog dkar gzugs dag stobs dang
190b6(rnying rgyud): ldan// ga bur dri ldan ri mo 'chang // rtag par sems can don la dga'// sems can sgrol ba'i thabs la mkhas// skad gdangs dung sgra yod pa ni// khrag 'thung he ru'i slob dpon yin// phyi nang chos la ma rmongs mkhyen// khyad par shes rab phun
190b7(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs// rig pa'i gnas mchog ma 'gags shes// chos spyod bcu rnams lhag par brtson// slob dpon 'khur zhing mched la gdung // sems can ci dga'i spyod pa byed// thabs kyi bye brag rnams la mkhas// gcig gam thams cad mtsham
191a1(rnying rgyud): nyid du// don makyang dga' 'amatha' dun med// gshin ldan nang pa'i gru'adapa na yin// lam gyi thabs rnams khyad par tan// rtag par banas zhing 'gro 'dra dga'// snang ba sngags pa dang ma gnas da
191a2(rnying rgyud): pa khyad par yod// spyod lam rnam bzhi'i seng ger spyod// thu gar rol mo rnams la dga'// mchod pa'i bye brag thabs mchog mkhas// lung bstan bka' bzhin byed cing gago// sun la gdung zhing sems can 'dud// pad+ma dbang
191a3(rnying rgyud): gyi nang rnam rtog mi skye zhing // rgyud dang mdo sde dag la mkhas// thabs mkhas ting 'dzin drod tshad brtson// sde snod gsum la ma rmongs dang // rtog bcas the tshom ma lus sel// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs rnams ma khyed// dad pa rnams pa myo ru
191a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sde snod drug rnams kun// rtog bcas snod ngan rnams la sred// gsang ba'i chos rnams sems la 'chang // 'bad pa'i stobs kyis man ngag 'tshol// rtsa bar bcas pa bsung byed pa// rdo rje phur pa'i slob dpon yin// thos brtson yon ta
191a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyis brgyan// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum// de yi thabs kyis 'dul thabs rnams// de yi spyod pa ma 'gags mkhyen// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// rjes su mthun pa'i thabs mchog gis// ji lta ji ltar 'dul mdzad pa// thas
191a6(rnying rgyud): mkhas dad ldan ting 'dzin gsal// gnyis med blo ldan brtul zhugs che// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i slob dpon yin// lha spyod ting 'dzin brtson 'grus che// thabs mkhas man ngag zab mo 'chad// mkha' 'gro chos skyong bran ltar chags// 'jig rten
191a7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa stodan slob dpon yin// yi dam lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// sngags kyis sbyor bdag la mkhas// drag po sngags kyi rtsal thob pa// 'asod pa drag sngags slob dpon yin// de nas slob ma'i mtshan nyid bshad// dpa' zhing sgrib stobs shin tu che// phyi nang 'dus
191b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos la mkhas// lhun sdug phrin las dag la dga'// dgongs pa nyams lon mu stegs bzlog/ lha log sun 'byin yang dag dgod// bde ba'i lam ston thabs la mkhas// bzo mkhas rig gsal bla ma bsnyen// 'dzin pa mkhas shing brjed med pa//
191b2(rnying rgyud): ut+pal zhes bya'i gang zag de// che mchog he ru'i slob mar bzung // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// dam tshig ma nyams thub par bsrungs// shes rab che zhing dad pas dpa'// ston pa'i bka' lung dag la gnas// slob dpon 'khur zhing sun la gdung //
191b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs skyongs shing snying rje rje// spyod gzob lus lag bur dri// tsan+dan zhes bya'i gang zag de// khrag 'thung rol pa'i slob mar gzung // thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal 'chang zhing // rin chen sna tshogs sbyin par gtong // khyod lam lhan sdug dag stan
191b4(rnying rgyud): bde// ji lta ji lta'i spyod pa yis// de lta de lta'i slob dpon 'khur// bla ma shes rab dgos 'dod skong // nga bdag skyon spangs dang brtson che// dam tshig ldan zhing shes rab ldan// rgyud thos legs par ston pa ni// gshin rje gshed po'i slob ma
191b5(rnying rgyud): yin// dge brgya rtag spyod mi dge spangs// bde'ang ma khro ba'i sems mi 'byung // gru gar rol mo sna tshogs ston// mdog mangs tsan+dan dri bzangs dang // spyod slad byed cing sbed pa sa// yan lag bde 'jam 'bar 'bur med// phra ma tho sen mo tha
191b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra dmar// sbyor ba'i yan lag thabs la mkhas// dad ldan brtson 'grus ting rje che// pad+ma zhes bya'i gang zag de// pad+ma dbang chen slob mar bzung // gong gi yon tan thabs cad rdzogs// rgyal po sde bcas kun gyis bstod// mu stegla sde bas bsngags pa brjod//
191b7(rnying rgyud): sde pa bzhi yis spyi bor khur// rdo rje phrar ba'i slob ma yin// dkyil 'khor mtha' dag las la mkhas// gsang drug gab sras man ga thub// slob dpon 'khrur zhing spyod pa yangs// mngon rdzogs ma mo'i slob mar bzung // khong gdug zheg nag zhe sdang rtse//
192a1(rnying rgyud): sha khrag dmar la longs spyod byed// lus dang srog la mi blta bsgrub// 'jig rten mthu yi slob mar bzung // g.yo sgyu chung zhing yid ches che// sdod la brtson zhing bsgrub bsran che// khong gdug yid ches sngags la brtson/
192a2(rnying rgyud): drag sngags dmod pa'i skyob ma yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba rtsi ma'i rgyud las/ slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gang zag gi mtshan nyid kyi skabs te dang ngo // / de nas gzhan yang bshad
192a3(rnying rgyud): nyon cig rig 'dzin pho mo rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang 'dod pas// byar ri skyob cing lho ri gzhol// shar gyi ri dma' nub ri mtho// ri brag dmar pos mtha' ma bskor// mdun na me tog snam bu yod// bya rgyal skad ni sgrog pa'i gnas// der ni ting
192a4(rnying rgyud): sgom par bya// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rim bzhin du// lha gsal 'phro 'du'i chotsho gas byas la// so so'i snying po bgrangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rnams su dbang bskur bya// che mchog yon tan dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chen po rab
192a5(rnying rgyud): dben par// maN+Dal gyi dor byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// mtshan ldan bdud rtsi lnga sbyar nas// che mchog lha tshogs gsal byas la// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// yon tan phrin las dbang bskur bya'o// yang dag thugs kyi dang
192a6(rnying rgyud): bskur ba// dur khrod chen po rab dben pa// thA na khram spang phyug pa'i sar// bya gnan sha za mang po 'khor// mi ro mang po mkhar du brtsigs// shin tu yanga'i gnas su ni// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad lha tshogs rnams// khro gtum gdug pa'i sprin tshogs kyi//
192a7(rnying rgyud): nas rab tu gsal bar bsam// so so'i snying po bgrangs nas ni// su gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas// yon tan phrin las dbang bskur ro// 'jam dpal sku yi dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal byi dor byas pa la// bdud rtsi lnga
192b1(rnying rgyud): yis chag chag gdab// khrag chen go ro tsa na yis// steng du mnan la byugs par bya// gshin rje'i lha tshogs gsal byas te// 'bar gsal rngam pa'i hUM gi tshogs// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // yin las lnga ru dbang
192b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bya// pad+ma gsung gi dbang bskur ba// nub tu kha bltas zla gam dbyibs// me tog snam bu yod pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas ni// khrag chen dag gis chag chag gdab// dbang gi lha tshogs gsal byas nas// dmar mo hrIHyi tshogs
192b3(rnying rgyud): bsams nas// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga ru dbang bskur ro// phrin las phur pa'i dbang bskur ni// gnams gru gsum dbus gnas par// tse spyang bsad shul 'dra ba ru// mi rogs pa rnying yod pa'i sa
192b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar 'phro gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// phrin las lha tshogs gsal byas nas// 'bar ba rngam pa'i tshogs chen las// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga ru dbang bskur bya// ma mo rgod gtong dbang bsru /
192b5(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chu gling rkang gcig pa// mtshogs dbang phyugs 'du ba'i sar// sha chen khrag las byas pa yi// dmar po snying gi mchod tshogs bshams// rkang chen gling bu 'bud pa dang // b+han+d+ha'i cha lang brdab pa dang // tshil chen dud pa chen po gtang // gang
192b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub yo ma byed pa la// srog gi snying po bgrangs nas ni// bka' mi 'da' bar dbang bskur bya// 'jig rten mchod bstod dbang bskur ba// srog chags bsad pa'i thul 'dra ba// dmar po khrag gi mdog 'dra'i sar// maHla grwa gsum 'bar ba la// srin
192b7(rnying rgyud): po khros pa'i gzugs byas te// de steng slob ma gzhag par bya// mkhas pas de ltar dbang bskur nas// rag sha rag sha ma laM rag sha dzi kha rag sha hriM// 'jig rten rang rgyud dregs pa can// bran bzhin 'khol bar dbang bskur ro// drag sngags dmod pa'i dbang bskur ba/
193a1(rnying rgyud): brag ri sbrul nag 'greng ba'i sar// chu gsum 'dus pa'i sum mdol// dreng po dang mo langs pa 'dra// dang gcig gnod sbyin gnas pa'i sar// dkyila'akhor bya dor byas pa la// sbrul dag khrag gis chag rags
193a2(rnying rgyud): dgab sgoms la// drag po'i gsang sngags bzlas shing bskur// lci yi dbang bskur sngags ni 'di'o// oM na maHsarbata thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa pA la At+ma ko&ha~M/ AHna maHsarba tA thA ga ta bA ga badz+ra swa thAHyA hU~M/ hU~M rnamaHsarba/ thA /
193a3(rnying rgyud): te/ hrI na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a nu rI ga Na sa twe na wA n+nahA/ namaHsa rbata thA ge ta kam 'dzis thA la A ko r+the/ sku ga sung thug su dang yon tan dang // brin las su yi dbang bsgyur ro// zhes gsungs so// nges par blang ba kyima'i ru
193a4(rnying rgyud): spu rang ri le'u ste gsum pa'o// de'ang gi skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad byab// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// dngos la gnas shing tshor med pa// ma rig rmongs pa'i gti mug do// drangs pas 'dra
193a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chos nyid don gsal 'gyur// ma rig pa yi gti mug de// spangs pas bden pa'i tshig mi rnyed// spyad pas 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings// ye shes chen por gnas par 'gyur// che mchog yon tan bgrub par bya// de'i
193a6(rnying rgyud): spyad bya ba// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge dgu pa ni// tshe mchog he ru'i snying po ste// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs pa// rang bzhin grub pa'i byin dbab phyir// gsang sngags zab mo rab spyod pas// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan
193a7(rnying rgyud): grangs mchod// rang ring gnas su bder bzhugs pa// dbang bskur byin dbab thams cad rdzogs// yang dag dpa' bo'i bu ldan thub// ye shes wa ldan sangs bus su// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bzhin do// sangs rgya
193b1(rnying rgyud): sa tu 'khrigs// de yis bsam gtan thams cad rdzogs// che mchog he ru'i phyag rgyar bshad// ces gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ che mchog phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
193b2(rnying rgyud): cag 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// zhe nas sdang ba'i ngan sems de// spangs pas 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chos dbyings ye shes thob// yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub pa bya// de yi don ni bshad par bya// rtsa ba brgyad ni snying po'i mchog/
193b3(rnying rgyud): ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ bde gshegs gzhal yas bsod nams rdzogs// de yi rjes 'gro snang ba dag/ sdang ba dag pa'i ye shes te// ru lu 'phro 'du sbyor bas so// 'khor ba rnam grol byang chub sems// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos nyid ni// ngo bo nyid kyis
193b4(rnying rgyud): skyes pa// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yi// rab tu bdag gsal dngos med bsgom// chos dbyings me long ye shes te// de la sems brtan gsal gyur ni// yang dag thugs kyi phyag rgya yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/
193b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag thugs kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// yongs su khengs pa'i nga rgyal de// nga ltung yi sems 'chang zhing // de yis log pa'i lam gnas shing // spangs pas
193b6(rnying rgyud): ma stegs lam du 'gro// spyad pas chos nyid chen po yin// rtog med bde ba'i lam gnas shang // ye shes chen por de gnas 'gyur// 'jam dpal gshin rje bsrub par bya// oM a kro ti ka hUM phaT/ snying po a kro 'bru bdun ni// gshin rje gshed po'i snying ba ste/
193b7(rnying rgyud): rtortag med bde ba'i lam gnas shing // ye shes chen por de gnas 'gyur// byang chub sems nyid dam pa ste// yang dag rin chen 'bar ba yin// yon tan snying po dam pa lon// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyu ru bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud
194a1(rnying rgyud): las gzhin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'i labus drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byan cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// 'dod la chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis// nga yis khamams dag par byed
194a2(rnying rgyud): spangs pas don rnams rnyed pa med// rab du bcings nas gnas ngan len// yongs su dag pa'i 'dod chags de// spyad pas 'bras bu chen po thob// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gsal// pad+ma dbang chen bsgrub pa gyis// oM ha ya grib hUM phaT/ yi ge
194a3(rnying rgyud): bdun pa dbang min lags// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags bcas pa// 'gro 'dus gyur pa'i dmadzog no// le banan lta bur gyur ba ste// 'dong ba'i bug chags rtog bcas dang // gnas ngan len pa thams cad kun// gdong das sang kyis te sa
194a4(rnying rgyud): pas// dag dang ma dag gnyis med de// de yi rang bzhin sangs rgyas so// bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin pas// khyab pa'i ye shes chen po/ des// lha yi gnas su bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyar bshad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par
194a5(rnying rgyud): phyi ma'i rgyud las/ pad+ma gsung gi phyag rgya'i lci'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// nyon cig 'dras pa'i tshogs chen rnams// log pa'i sems can phrag dog che// spangs pas 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chis
194a6(rnying rgyud): nyid don gsal 'gyur// nan tan ye shes chen po 'grub// phur pa drin las bslab par bya// de yi don ni bshad bya ba// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ kI la ya ni 'bru dgu ba// rdo rje phur pa'i snying po yin// don dam snying po yongs su gang ba'i tshe// badz+ra
194a7(rnying rgyud): dang ma dris chog gi tha snyad yin// ye nas bzlas pa rang byung chen po yin// ngo bo nyid kyi sngags kyi rang bzhin no// de 'dra bzlas pa rdon gyi snying po yin// ma bi cos da byung snying po sngags chog ste// zab mo bzlas pa yin zhes rgyu ru bstan// de las brtan byas dam/
194b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes ljags la don dam dbyings nas spyod// rten 'brel lus ni byen rlabs nyon mongs bsreg/ phra mo'i ting 'dzin yi dam dngos su gsal// bzlas pa mthar phyir 'bras bu chen po yin// rang gi bzlas pa yin zhes kyi ru bstan// rnal
194b2(rnying rgyud): bad+mor dam pa rnams kyis 'di bzlas na// gang gis bzlas kyang snying po len par byed// sngags kyi snying po ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas snang dang mi snang med// rtag dang chad dang yod med dang // brjod dang spa bas ma yul las 'das// rang bzhin ga /
194b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po de// ye shes mchog tu gyur pa las// rang gi rang bzhin de bzhin de// bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin pas// yang dag don du mkhas pas brtag/ phrin las phrar pa'i phyag rgya bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba gyi ma'i rlur
194b4(rnying rgyud): rnams pa pa grug pa/ rkye gi ya bshi kyig ngas pa chogs da rnams// maman sumam pa sa// tha mad ci sgrub pa bya// mam / gsong sngags pag
194b5(rnying rgyud): bdun pa// bla med he rba'i gsang sngags yin// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i rang bzhin ni// brtan pa'i don rnams dag pa ste// dag pa nyid na dag pa med// mi shigs pa yi ngo po la// dngas ma'i sa bon las byung ba// brtan pa'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas
194b6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas pa ste// yang dag don chen zab mo'i mchog/ gsas ba nyid na gsal pa med// rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis thams cad kyi// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i phyag rgyang bstan// zhes gsungs su// nges par 'byung ba phye ma'i chud lus// ma mdzad/
194b7(rnying rgyud): gtong gi zug tso'i le'u ste dbu pa// de nas gzhan yang bshad dbya // rte cig 'dus pa chags chen rnams// ram 'byor btan pa srung bya na// dregs pa kur 'dul bsgrub bar bya// oM 'dzas tas rba d+hAn smye Ta/ yi ge brgya pa'i dra
195a1(rnying rgyud): sngags ni// dregs pa kun 'dul gsang sngags yin// spo bcu'i sngags kyi rim pas g.yos pa'i tshe// rnam dag rang gang po de nyid len// nga ba nyid dang rang gi rang bzhin med// bdag dang chags bcas ma lus de bzhin//
195a2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu pa'o//
195a3(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rnal 'byor sngags la mos pa pa// dmod pa drag sngags phyag rgya bstan// oM badz+ra sarba duShAM hUM phaT// stobs kyi yi ge brgyad pa ni/

195a8(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sa mu dA ya man+ta tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sngags rgyud/ phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
195b1(rnying rgyud): bzang po he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska/ da bdag gis thos pa'i dus gtig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho zang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka la/ ladza paN bro dang khro mo dang / reg 'dzin rnams kyis bkar te bzhugs pa las/
195b2(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis bskor ba lan stong byas te/ 'di skad lusas// e ma spyi dpal chen po lags// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// sngags kyi dngos su 'thor bya'i phyir// sngags kyi de nyid bshad 'a
195b3(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs rnal 'byor don ched du// sngags kyi don rnams zhu ba legs// don grub dngos grub 'thob pa ni// sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub pa yin// de yang sgrub thabs rnams
195b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad// che mchog yon tan bsgrub pa dang // yang dag thugs kyi bslab pa dang // 'jam dpal sku yi bgrub pa dang // brla gsung gi bsgrub pa dang // phung pa phrin las bsgrub pa dang // ma mo rgod gtong bslab pa dang // 'jig rten mchod pa
195b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa dang // dmod padrag sngags bsrub pa dang brgyad// 'di rnams bslab pa bka' brgyad yin// A~M badz+ra kro ta ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu gnyis pa// che mchog yon tan snying po yin// A ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo swA baT/ gsang lhag
195b6(rnying rgyud): ge 'bru dgu pa// yang dag thugs kyi snying po yin// oM a kr-i tI ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa// 'jam dpal su yi snying po yin// oM bad+mar+b+ha kri ta badz+ra kro d+ha ha yaM grI ba hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcung zhi ba/
195b7(rnying rgyud): parba gsung gi snying po yin// I ba dz+ra krI mi kI la yas rba b+ha thu Ta/ gsang sngags yog 'brub cu bzhi pa// skur pa phrin las myong po yin/ gri bad+hU TI drugs dun gro hrIng+ge s+t+wa~M/ ma ma mo gni rtse Tu ru mu t+t+ra b+h+yo spyu Ta// gsang sngags sa ga

196b1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las// yi ge btub 'di ltar bshad// thams cad kun gyi dang po la// dbyangs yig gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// dbyangs yig bcu gsum steng du brgyan// de la dbyangs yig bco lnga pas// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// 'di ni ye shes
196b2(rnying rgyud): lnga rdzogs yin// sngags rnams kun gyi mgo la bzhag/ A~M/ pa tshan gsum pa gzhag par bya// de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// ka tshan dang po gzhag par bya// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// de la
196b3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu sbas// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa
196b4(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig zug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge
196b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa bzhag/ de steng Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// I badz+ra kro ta ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa// tshe mchog yon tan snying po de// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs
196b6(rnying rgyud): dbu cu bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/
196b7(rnying rgyud): del dbyangs yig lnga bas brgyan// gatshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yigadug pas bcan// steng du thig les mdzes par byas// mtshan yi ga gsum pa bzhag/ de gag tshan bzhi bas smras// de la ma tshan dang pas smras// de la dbyangs yig bcug sum brgyan// gatshan yi ga bzhipa bzhan
197a1(rnying rgyud): de la dbyangs yeg drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhad// da dang rnga tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis spras// ru lu ru lu rkA t+yA hUM phaT/ oM dang pha gyi thog mtha'
197a2(rnying rgyud): sang sngags yi ge 'bru bdun pa// yang dag thugs kyi snying po ste// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ thams cad kun gyi dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pa 'og tu smras// de la
197a3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tsha na yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tsha na yi ge dang po bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga
197a4(rnying rgyud): par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ ta tsha na yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang co tshan lnga yar
197a5(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshon yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de dang tha tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A

197b2(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pa 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan

197b4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ de nas pa tshan gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan//

198b5(rnying rgyud): dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas sbas// tsa tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan lnga par ldan// na tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og sha tshan gsum pas sbas// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og pa tshan gsu

199a5(rnying rgyud): te dang po'o// // de nas rig 'dzin rnams kyis gsol pa/ spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang // spyi sngags btu ba de lags na// so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba rnams// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang /

199a7(rnying rgyud): ma ngas // ng+ge/ / hU~M/ ba da su / oM 'ardzas ma la / oM 'jas ma hU~M
199b1(rnying rgyud): rmya slo bad rnyan d+ha/ ba s+yAd+hAd+ha/ oM ba wAm nA/ oMbarba d+ha nAr+tha/ oM ba a gu shAn+d+ha/ oM brda ba hwA rmAr+tha/ oM mar+tham+me sa myur bu maH/ Ad+hat+ta d+d+ha/ Ab rAdA r+tha/ oM ba s+thAHrmA/ oM ba dkur+than+te/ a nas
199b2(rnying rgyud): A lo ke d+d+he/ oM badz+ra s+pho TahU~MH/ oM badz+ra d+hU gI ra ti hA/ oM badz+ra pANi s+yA mad+h+yan+tu/ oM badz+ra ki mat+ta ran+d+he/ oM badz+ra ka rma hUM/ oM badz+ra ra NANAM/ oM badz+ra ya k+Sha hrIH/ oM badz+ra sad+g+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra dz+rad+hI hU~M/ oM badz+ra gan+d+het+te/ oM badz+ra d+hA d+hIs+t+wa~M/ oM badz+ra A
199b3(rnying rgyud): sha hA/ oM ki ti ga d+ha rat+na a~M/ oM badz+ra nIdz+haiM hUM/ oM d+harma ke tuhUM/ oM kI ShI shwa ra rA dzA dz+rIM/ oM padz+ra la pad+ma d+ha ra hrIH/ oM rat+na pra b+hA hA/ oM badz+ra kha nAM ga pA la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra a mo g+ha sha ra ya trAM/ oM badz+ra rA ga sa~M ma~M ya hrIH/ oM badz+rAHte dza la ya hA/
199b4(rnying rgyud): ASh+Ta shAg+h+ra d+ha swAd+ha/ oM radz+ra n-i dziH/ oM U mo ka a thA pra bad+hi nA/ oM mr-id+ha nA nI hU~M Sh+Tha taSh+Tha/ oM pra ti dz+nyAn d+ha dzi ni g+ne/ oMng+ga te dz+nyA na kra Ta me taM/ oM badz+ra A~M thA ban+ti/ oM badz+ra d+hAdz+dza/ oM badza bad+d+hAn k+Shi/ i nahA hA// oMhA sa ma /
199b5(rnying rgyud): oMd+ha dz+nyA na~M timAM/ oM kaR+Sha pa rA ng+ge me hA rAdz+nyAnA/ oM pad+ha m+b+ha pa pad+d+ha ts+tsha hU~M/ oM bid+d+he ye+e ts+tshats+tsha/ oM a rbo kyA rA dzi ma Sh+Ti/ oM ba~M ma le kI sa man+taN man+da/ oM ra~M li mo li hralwa ba rde btus pa rbad+h+waM/ I t+ta ke runA dz+wa la prA tsa bar+tha hrIH/ Id+ha sa n+ti
199b6(rnying rgyud): tras d+d+hi bi dz+ras ni ha/ oM sarba ni bde bi sho d+ha yab ma/ oM kar nitahUM/ oMr t+ne shA ra~M rat+na d+hA hU~M/ oM ki m+bi sa~Md+d+hi rat+naT+TarA yad+h+waM/ oM A r-i ti shAs+t+ra d+hi yam+b+hi/ oM a tsal aSh+To b+hu d+ha ra yan+te/ ad ya dza ya bti sarba shan hU~M/ a r+tha

200b1(rnying rgyud): g+hod+hab bas stsaphaT/ oMm n+da d+hA bar+N+Na ban+d+ha d+hungaT/ oM maHkr-i d+had+has hras rdzo phan/ oMm thabo ta taHte// thA phAT/ oM ma nakron+d+ha dz+nyAn dz+nyAnaSh+TA Ta/ oM maH'oHna b+hi drAngs/ oM mahAkro d+ha sngoT rnas/ oMm kA kro t+ta yasad+hagatan nga/
200b2(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ oM mad+hi kro d+hi bad+d+hA d+ha kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+b+ha be g+h+nA d+b+ha kr-i ta hUM phaT/ tshe mchog yon tan gyi sngags kyi loSh+Ta ste bzhi pa'o// / yang dag thugs kyi sna tshogs kyi sdug bstan pa/ oM sa shwA he dra ka smiM phaT/ oM brA

200b7(rnying rgyud): hUMT/ oM ye ma rA pri ta dz+wa la hUM paT/ oM ya ma rA nga ka la k+She br-i tod ThA tra hU~M phaT/ oM rig mo rag mo snying rtsis sharma dz+ya/ oM rag mo rig mo brag la mu sham dz+yo/ oM rag mi rig mo ting li ma b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rig mo tid ting ka la ma b+h+yo/ oM he sa d+he
201a1(rnying rgyud): oM ya man+ta bItrAM/ oM nA ga r+b+he bAn+d+he/ oM kha dag de bI trA~M/ oM badz+rA ya ma raHk+ko d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ya madz+dzaHSh+T+r-iHhU~M phaT/ oM ya ma mahAb ta dz+nyA phaT/ oM ya ma d+h+wi kurba hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma pa d+hi d+hu phaT/ oM ya ma AH
201a2(rnying rgyud): oM ya ma ngag sha hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma sar+b+ba sata hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma a b+h+r-i ta laM hU~M phaT/ A~M ya ma d+har+m+ma rAdza hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma de badz+ra la raM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+hIHhrIHbaM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM dag mo b+ha N+ya lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma yag mo rba lu b+h+yo/
201a3(rnying rgyud): oM ma ma ra ka b+h+yoHhrIHsnying du lu g+ho/ oM ma ma ra k+ka ma ti ru lu b+h+yo/ oM dag mo ta n+ta dra lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma nA ga ru lu g+ho/ oM ma ma ba ya de badz+ra wA b+h+yo/ oM yi gu mau yag mo rba lu b+ho/ oM ma ma badz+ra e ka ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma rag mo ru lu b+h+yo// oM kA ha~M rA ga
201a4(rnying rgyud): ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ye ma i ku sha dzaH/ oM ya ma pA sha trUM/ oM y+ya ma s+pho Ta baM/ oM ya ma g+hak+She d+d+hoH/ 'jam dpal skya'i lha tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi sngags bstan pa/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ha yA k+She ba
201a5(rnying rgyud): hU wa hra pra hU~M phaT/ oM e ka dza n+ti su h+ya si d+hi sA ma ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra kr-ita pa tsa la mra kha d+h+r-i / oM badz+nyA bak+Sha ti pra khA tha~Mng / oM pad+ma kro d+ha ha na ha na d+d+he phaT/ oM padz+ra kro r+d+ha da ha dahA hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba ts+tsha ba tsa hU~M phaT/ A~M pad+ha kro d+ha k+ki hA b+hi tA shwe phyaH/ oM hA
201a6(rnying rgyud): kr-i d+ha bar+N+Na bad+d+ha trA~M phaT/ oM pad+mA kauta~M dz+yo d+hats+tsha R+R-i tri phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA gak+Sha grad+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ha k+Shod+hawoT s+pho Ta b+h+rUM phaT+Ta/ oM gra d+ha kro d+hI tAM/ oM dz+nyA na kro d+hi d+h+waM/ oM rak+Sha kr-it+ti d+ha~M/ oM ba~Mt+takr-id+hI hU~M/ oM badz+ra kr-ih+Na hU~M/ oM ya m+b+haH!/ oM nA bats+li

202b3(rnying rgyud): bcu pa'o// / da yod pa drag sngags kyi sngags bstan pa/ oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TaM dz+nyA phaT/ ya ma ya sid+hab+h+r-i b+h+r-i dzaHdzaH/ ma ma~M ru wa ma tsod+ha dzI hI dziHdzaH/ ti r+thi ka tha gr-it+ta dz+dzi hU~M dzaHdzaH/ dra phrag du tsat+to tAM b+h+r-i dzaHdzaH/ dran tau dra tsit+ta hrI hrI dzaHdzaH/ de ba ya
202b4(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta b+hUdzAHdzaH/ ru tra daMd+hAd+hA dzA dzaHdzaH/ rak+sha ra tsi tud+h+ri dz+nyo dzaHdzaH/ rag mo rbod+hadz+dzaHts+liHdziHdzaH/ ya Sha ShAHd+hadz+r-ig+h+r-i dzadzaH/ yag mo k+Sha rbakAr+thA dzI dzaHdzaH/ rA dzaHtsed+hadz+dza dz+r-i dzaHdzaH/ yaM tri tsutset+ta d+h+r-ir+t+r-i auwau/ mun mAnang ts+yad+hA g+h+r-id+hIdzaHdzaH/ badz+ra mA
202b5(rnying rgyud): d+hAm / te dza~MHng+ge d+h+r-ing \u0f7f/ rA thal ba'i// rje pa/ nA gzun kr-Id+d+ha sa/ dmod pa drag sngags kyi sngags bstan pa'i ladri ste bcu gcig pa'o// / bslab pa bka' brgyad kyi sngags kyi bya brag gi phreng ba bstan pa'i

202b7(rnying rgyud): sbal pa/ oM badz+ra krod+ham hA shrI he ru ka hA phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// par na bcu gcig grongs mdzes pa// che mchog yon tan srog sngags yin// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// badz+ra rdo rje/ pro d+ha khro bo/ ma hA chen po/ shrI dpal/ he de dgyes pa
202b8(rnying rgyud): ru dbang drag/ ka phrin las/ dz+nyA na ye shes khro bo la// phaT ni rnam rtog gcod pa'o// de ni don chos nyid dang sbyar te bshad pa'o// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga yi snying po'o// badz+ra mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje/ kro ta khro bo/ ma hA shrI he ru ka yab che mchog yum gnam

203a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa tan po rdzob kyang nus// khrag 'thung 'phros pa'i lha rgyud gsal// de ltar yig 'bru brtags ma mo// tshe mchog yon tan lha tshogs kyi// srog dang srog gi snying por bstan// de ltar sgrog thob snying po rdzogs// thun mong dngos grub gang 'dod 'bra
203a4(rnying rgyud): ga ldan// ra sa nyi 'a rdzun rgyu sa sa pan/ ma pa phru bsas byed// yinas sbyi gyisapa bas/ dab ma 'i paba'ang/
203a5(rnying rgyud): dam khu ba dmar ba bzhin// thun mong dngos grub thob nas ni/ mchog gi dngos grub chen po 'thob// tshe gcig sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// che mchog yon tan gyi sngags kyi dgongs pa'i khye'u ste bcwa gnyis pa'o//
203a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// yang dag thugs kyi 'dzab dgongs la// oM ru lu ru lu bru~M kyo trA~M phaT/ thog mtha' mo dang phaT bzhag nas// ba ra na yig 'bru bdun gnas pa/ khrag 'thung lha rgyad srog snyed yin// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// dra nI chags pa ca
203a7(rnying rgyud): po'o// lu ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'// ru ni nyon mongs dbang sprad pa// wa ni srid gsum dbang du srung ba'o// hUM ni dgyes pa chen po'o// sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'o// b+h+yon chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gnas 'gyur ba'i yi ge yin pa'o//
203b1(rnying rgyud): pa tan na ba can bya na rdoH/ badzan rdzas kya byings byed pabyen por bsgyul sa// da gas pa rang du byu gyur ba'o/ byug 'thung drug brgyad dbyung po ba da du// oMn khrag byung yab thab datur snang ba'o// rdzu wa na/

203b3(rnying rgyud): gno rjid// dus ga ma tham na pa rjidargya na rdzong ba rnags / mas dbang du chu po/ pas da'o// yad dgadon kyi da kyang rnon pa ni// mi dpal chen ming sag gnas/

203b5(rnying rgyud): dbang med par dbang phrang par byed pa'o// dpal chen po la yus gyi snying por ston pa ni/ oM ni dpal zin ze byung ba'o// srasag kyi byung ba'o// tri thugs da kyi rgyud srul bya/ bloms la'i byed pa/ hU~M dag tu sprul ba/ @
203b6(rnying rgyud): gdug pa sgrol ba/ 'jig rten pa'i zlog gi snying por bstan pa n-i/ oM ga ba btsu b+h+ya ka/ sra mchog dmar po'odi bar gnas// nr-i mu~M gon pa mo brgyad po yang // srin mo btsud kying po gnas// na sa? sa hA'i bla mo ra brgyad pa yang /
203b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyang por gnas// hU~M slob can po bcu po yang // gang chen bco brgyad dkying por gnas// hUMnag dang slob bzhi po yang // ris ma bzhi yi ba gnas/ byi bang drug nyi cu rtsa brgyad kya // srin po nya shu rtsa brgyan byer bar gnas/
204a1(rnying rgyud): du rgyun drugs pa las pa 'byung // 'thub cang sngags tu mad rnam// ngag tan rnags pa gnang nas bsru// 'bru gu thugs 'gro 'dul// nad dang sgra dang garlags pang ston// gnang nas bcu rtsa
204a2(rnying rgyud): las la star// thams cad sems kyi tsho khyil te// 'asdus pas hUM shi zong gnas// rab tu dbar bya'i drung khrod gnas// hUM las badz+ran rtse// yab yum gnyis su med par gyur// du la sngags kyi 'phro 'du yos// bdagashegs thugs
204a3(rnying rgyud): dam byud bskul nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bste// dngos grub dang dbang bya ba dang // 'gro ba'i don rnams bya ba dang // phrin las thams cung 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// yang dag thugs kyi sngags kyi 'dzub dgongs
204a4(rnying rgyud): bAta pa'i lon steng grag sum pa'o// / ting ma pal phra mi 'ang gas pa/ oM ma ka ya nA nA ga tan ma hA taN+Ta b+hU \u0f7f/ thog mtha' m-i dang na bzhag nas// bdun yig 'thu bcol gnas// gzhan nang lha chung srog nying yin/
204a5(rnying rgyud): 'i shes rnam pa wA dang dz+nyAn pa/ oM skyabamed pa/ pra las b+hA pa tsha 'thal zung ba/ na kyi gaN+DI tshwa'i ga pa/ gzhan las kyi rgyal po/ ya lan bachen pa/ mun du gsong gan bya/ tabade ba dag pa/ gzug
204a6(rnying rgyud): ha kyis zen mo/ nangan song stong pa/ pad+mod kyig N+DI/ gadzugs dpa ba la? 'aM/ b+hU ta thags rjes b+h+yo ba bA/ dzA thugs rjes 'bugs pa/ hU~M thams cad spyad pa/ phan thabs rjes rnam rtog thams cad gcod pa// na chos nyid dang sbyar te
