204b3(rnying rgyud): bzod sum kyi sbyi pag+sa/ Adz+dza d+h+r-i phyogs stong yab yum bajugs na sgying ba'o// zho ba d+yA na'i snying gi/ swAR+tha dang b+h+yar ti rgya // oM a t+yI ka ga shi rdzogagad pa'i ting gi/ ya zh-i na na ting / bAr pa d+ya
204b4(rnying rgyud): mthang byung brgyad kyi blang ba/ yi n+do ta ka gshing mthar byed dang bcas pa'i steng ngor bstan pa'o// ai yo shaMs lnga dang ldad pas gas kyi lago 'du pa'o// sa tig gdub pa thams cad 'dul ba'o// ya hA tsug gdod par byed pa'i mam chong/ han
204b5(rnying rgyud): rgyobs/ d+ha / ngas/ dzas d+hag/ gas smras/ pa gyis gtong/ gdug pa 'dus ber sdigs su btang ba'o// oM sa rbo ta ka ya k+Sha tsugag slong myed po/ ta pan rta sbrul i ga 'i gang po/ sa nig
204b6(rnying rgyud): ga/ ya yum gnyis kyi snying por bstan pagro// dru khring med pa'i mtshugs // ting dzid bta par byung ban// de ga tu mtshogs gas sa byas ris// lcag 'dru cu 'du 'thum dzug dang // lag cin 'brang ldang srog nyid byung /
204b7(rnying rgyud): nga bang bar 'thob pa gyur// thabs tsung dkyi rdzoH// gan rje gag gagang rdza sa spyad/ ru sa chu'i ba ngas 'ad ma bya pacwabacugapa
205a1(rnying rgyud): dgas pa// sa m+b+ha sa / zan gazla mo dang ga // shA nga gas nga // bdu sma ma// smram nas nga nub// nga /
205a2(rnying rgyud): dAdabyangs pa cher po/ tabade bachen po/ kr-ita dga' ba chen po/ 'dzu ba tang snyoms chen po/ gro mi 'gyur ba 'o rje/ d+ha bdag nyid cher po// d+ya bdag ni skye/ ya 'dren pa chen po// shrI gcod pa cad po// bdag pa'i sra/ hUM snad pa chen po/
205a3(rnying rgyud): phaT gcod pa chen po// nga ni don dam chos nyid dang sgar ta bshad pan// e ya shas rnam bya swA/ pad man+ta kr-ita badz+ra dbang can gyi skyeng po// badz+ra kro d+hA zil gnon gyi khro bo brgyad kyi snying bo// ta ya gr-i ba snyam rnams kyi snying po// bru~M bka' nyad pas/
205a4(rnying rgyud): tha~Md kyi snying // phaT sI ba bzhi snying po/ badz+ra bang byin sa rgyud dang sbyar ba 'o// oM ye shes sa pargyan brda'i rigs/ tarbata ta mgri/ dang dzo / krong+ka ShA 'o// ta ya grI brta ma grin/ hUM gtums sod/ badz+rag sod sngags/ lham dz+ra dang
205a5(rnying rgyud): dpung gzhom par bstad pa'o// oM yi shas las 'khol ba/ pad m+b+han+tu kr-it+ta pad+ma ba can/ ha ya b+h+re bgasung na skad dang ldan pa/ rtswa lnga brgyad las la gzung cing dbang du blud pa/ phaT las la sbrel ba'o// dam pan bzhin bral ba dang b+hair rdza
205a6(rnying rgyud): oM ye shes rngam pa ltas sreg pa/ bar+d+ha r+tha kr-ita bad+ma dbang chen// badz+ra kr-id+ha rdo rje khro bo// ha ya grI brta ma gri/ hUM stobs kyis bu gdon thul/ phaT sod/ rA ga klu 'dul ba'i doran du bzlas pa'o// de ltar gnyen po'i don ston pa// dpal gyi rta skad thengs
205a7(rnying rgyud): gsum dang // ma mo'in kyang skad theng gisum dang // rnal 'byor brdang // sa gsum gyis// dang pos spang srid thams cad kun// ta mgri dbang gi lha dri thung / gnyis pas sdang srid sha khrag kyar// gsum pas ma sring dbyings nas bapral/
205b1(rnying rgyud): ngaldan pa'i 'khar thathu rtog pan// 'dis zam dan rtogs// shA nu 'jigs par dang // dpung shAn/ yong nas zlos// gang dag gnas par byung bangs// dbatha~Mng du byung ga byung ba yis// srin las pa yang mas 'as// !
205b2(rnying rgyud): 'dro'i dmag dpung 'di yis 'joms// sa bdag klu rnams 'di yis thal// drag sngags bsnyen pa 'di mes tul// gsung gi dngos thub 'di yis 'jog/ dbang mchog sku yang 'di yis bzong // gsang sngags zeng mo'i man ngag 'de// thal
205b3(rnying rgyud): mad rmongs pa'i gang bag dag/ dran la bstan par ma gsungs so// badz+rag srung gi sngags kyi dgong sa pa 'i las sab // drang ba phyi mas la dgongs la// oM badz+ra d+ha makA la lA swArba ba g+h+nAn brjes// thog mthal lho dang pa nga
205b4(rnying rgyud): nas// bangan brgya bzhi'i grong mangs pa// rdzar ba lta rgyad stong pa yin// oM ni gzhaN ba thams cad kyi mchog/ de bde dganags pa rnams kyi gdung btso ba pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i thugs/ byang chub kyi sems ma// badz+ran dbyings gting mtha' med
205b5(rnying rgyud): nas kyi 'phrog gas pa ldang bathams cad zung ba'i thug byeng nags kyi zag rgyang byung das/ mi gnas pang za na 'das pa'i byang gyi khrims no// k+She si~M trai la ya 'aM/ de ltar snga gsang thugs kyi 'o bang gyis brtul nas// chags pa mang bar bya ngan 'das pa
205b6(rnying rgyud): chub / da ga 'byung pa nang rgya kyis rnas sa sa dang na sangs sa spyod pa 'i ba sa pa 'i rlung rnabs pa nga// mad chub kyi byings sa d+hA grwa ga zugs sa byu bathams pang stug pa'i byung chub ma bas pa
205b7(rnying rgyud): da dun/ ba ba dag pa sa bams thu pa'i chos bgyi 'gasas nga ba ba rje kyi mas// de des sa bya tus cu 'ang ba'i bye nga bas sa pa kya nying byeng du sa
206a1(rnying rgyud): su na rna ma na kun du na rgyu na smra sa smra
206a2(rnying rgyud): lda/ ma sa // / nga sa
206a3(rnying rgyud): na / sa
206a4(rnying rgyud): pa da dzu gang / // dug 'du / Sh+T+r-im sa sa
206a5(rnying rgyud): sa /
206a6(rnying rgyud): sa rnas sa
206b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzab dgongs la// oM gun+ya dz+rad shrI he ru ka/ gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shA hI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu ru'i b+h+yo d+hI phaT/ thog mtha' o dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer nyi shu brkyang // srid bam mo'i srog snying yin// dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// bdag nyid
206b2(rnying rgyud): khwa med he ru ka'i// nga rgyal brtan por bzung byas nas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mamo mkhang 'gro thams cad kun// rang dbang med par las la gzung // gang dang gang la dmigs pa yi// las rnams de dag thams cad kun// skad cis
206b3(rnying rgyud): tsa gyis 'brug par 'gyur// oM ye shes lA/ gu h+ya yab/ dz+nyA na ye shes/ shrI dpal/ he dgyes pa/ ru dbang sdud/ ka phrin las/ gu d+hA yum gyi mkha'/ dz+nyAn yum gyi ye shes/ kro d+hI yum/ shwa rI dbyings/ s+t+waM dbyings su thim pa/ ma
206b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings/ ma rig pa'i ye shes/ yo gi n+di rnal 'byor pa/ ru wa mkha'/ ru lu dbyings/ gyo las/ hUM spus/ phaT gcod pa'o// sngags kyi don chos nyid du bshad pa'o// oM ye shes lnga/ gu d+hadz+nyA na shrI he ru ka yab kyi snying po/ gu h+ya dz+nyAn kro d+ha shwa rI
206b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi yub drug gi teng po/ ma ma lo gi nA rang bzhin rdul 'byor mjo mo bcu bzhi'i steng pa 'o// drawa rba sra spyan mo sum cu'i snying po/ blo dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi snying po'o// sde dbang du sdud pa/ phaT las la 'greng ba'o// mchen bdun cu rtsa lnga'i snying por
206b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// ye shes lnga 'dus pa/ gre d+hadz+nyAn po shes gsang ba 'i thugs/ shrI te rug dpal chen po/ gud+ha rbA da gsang ba'i yum/ krod+d+hi shwa rI yum gyi tshogs/ ni thams cad dbang du phud/ ma ma po gi nA ma mo dbang du spang cing 'khol// ras ral
206b7(rnying rgyud): mam mkha' 'gro lang la 'jung pa/ hUM gas dang dri byud/ b+ha mes las la 'khol/ de' gyes thams cad grol bar bye/ mkha' 'gro sa 'i thugs srab stan pa // a mra ya dzan shrIte drag gra la tan gro ti tsuhrI hU~M/ ye shes ce mkha' 'gro la'i ti zan/
207a1(rnying rgyud): mamamagan na byengs mas sa kun pas byas man ma / chud du nas/ Tas sa brtsam ma/ mabs sa namacan pa stong bar bstan pa// mam za na na
207a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi sngags kyi dgongs pa'i lathu brgya bdun pa// mjig tu nyid kyi rarang dgangs la/ a ba ma sa hUM Ta/ thog mthal mi dang paT bzhag nas// bar na 'thub bya dgang gnas pa// dgas pa 'dus pa
207a3(rnying rgyud): yin// mo yi shes lnga/ brda rjo rje/ rtag tums/ san thams cad/ dr-i m+b+hi sto bas n+ye ga dbang du smras/ laT gyis las la 'dzud pa'o// sngags kyi su don btan pa'o// oM badz+ran/ rdzogs pa kun 'dum gyi stong po/ sarba da t+tha dregs pa can
207a4(rnying rgyud): stobs/ hU~M yu ma thams gas pa 'i 'dul ma/ yab phra bying bdu drugs pa can tsud pa tub pa dbang du rjong dog// pe kyis tu bas 'phrog pa'o/ rdzogs pa bang du byud pa'i rnal du bzlas pa'i/ mi me zhes lnga dang snyan pa/ badz+ran/ rta gtum
207a5(rnying rgyud): sathathams cad/ dzag+sa gnon pa/ bang blang ba/ ba gyis masadrug gas byag ga// dben pa can gyis rdzogasas// rnam kyang skyebs dang ldan pa ming// dwags pa dbang dubacu da // bdag nyid masbyor phra
207a6(rnying rgyud): la// 'jig rten rdzogs pa gnad ma tho// dbang du bkrus t+ta ma stsal la// phrin las rgyam kun pa b+hair// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi sngags kyi dgengs pa bstan pa'i le'u gyi bco babyed pa'o// dmyong pa drug grag
207a7(rnying rgyud): 'jab dgongs la// oM badz+rasarba du hUM hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang tha bzhan nas// bar na srong khyer drug gnas pa// dregs pa gzing ba'i snying po yin// oM ye shes wa/ badra rdorje/ sarba thams cad/ du gnon pa// hUM spad pa/ phaT gcod pa
207b1(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi don bstan pa'o// oM badz+ra stobs ldan nag po'i stong pa'o// sar+b+ba dregs pa can sngags bdag bco brgyad // duSh+Ta gzir cing gnon pa/ hUM 'byung ba lnga'i bdag ma/ yab yum gyis dregs pa can par du bcug la gzer ba'o// phaT kyis gzi di
207b2(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'o// dregs pa can gzir ba'i don du bzlas pa'o// oM ye shes lnga'i rang sngags/ badz+ra rdo rje/ sarba thams cad/ dr-itrUM dregs pa can gyi stobs so// hU~M zil gyis gnon pa thugs 'dus pa/ phaT gcod pa'o// drag sngags gzir gnon du bzlas
207b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bdag nyid stobs ldan gsal ba las// dregs pa ma lus gzir byed cing // khams su dregs pa gnad la bor// de nyid sde brgyad las la dgye// bstan pa'i bsrung mar dbang bskur ro// zhes gsungs so// dmod pa drag sngags kyi dgongs pa
207b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi 'dab dgongs sngags kyi don bstan pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o// // mchog bskong ba'i rgyud ces bya ba le'u bcu dgu pa skabs gsum pa/ stsogs stsogs/ rgyal po khri srong lde'u
207b5(rnying rgyud): brtson gyi phyag dpe/ rin chen gter du sras/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgyu/ 'di jog shing le rgya nyis pa rjod pa sngags brtan pa'i'i nyi zla bzhig spang ba dod can ga zhan ni 'di di byas par 'dun no// mtshang 'a bslang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan
207b6(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ dus gsum
207b7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'dod pa ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub par nus pa// yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhin po che'i gter mi zad pa'i dbyings lta bu/ srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos ma lus pa skad cig tsam la thugs su chud pa/ ye shes kyi thig le chen po sna tshogs su rnam par 'phrul pa'i ngo bo
208a1(rnying rgyud): nyid rnam par snang ba ste/ 'og min gyi gnas thun mong ma yin pa'i nam mkha' khams kyi gtos chen po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i dbyings/ rang bzhin lhun gyi sa grub par gnas mo chog chen po yon tan chen po bas
208a2(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i pho brang / ye shes kyi gzhal med khang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan rgya chen pos mdzes shing / rnam par bkra bar byas pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad rnyi ba
208a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su gyur pa de na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor 'dus par gyur pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po dang / de bzhin
208a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa chen po dang / de dag gi yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig can ma dang / rdo rje dbyings ma dang / bzod pa chen mo dang / dam tshig gi lha mo dang / gzhan
208a5(rnying rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems mdze
208a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyug ma dang / rin po che'i dbyings phyug ma dang / pad+ma'i dbyings byug ma dang / las kyi dbyings phyag pa dang / rdo rje sems ma dang / rin po che'i sems ma dang / pad+ma'i sems ma dang / las kyi sems ma dang / de dag gi yang 'khor gyi dam par gyur
208a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje mdzes pa dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje sba ba dang /
208b1(rnying rgyud): rje 'khor mo dang / rdo rje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje bu tshur dang / rdo rje rnal mtshan dang / dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bkod pa'i rgyan dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / snang ba'i 'od dang / phyag rgya'i rgyal po dang / spos kyi glang po dang /
208b2(rnying rgyud): spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / pad+ma'i rgyal po dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / rdo rje mi g.yo ba dang / thogs med rgyal po dang / rin po che'i dbang skud dang / grub pa'i las dang / dga' bar ston pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtha' dang / de dag gi byang chub sems ma sgeg pa
208b3(rnying rgyud): po dang / bdug pa ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / me 'ong ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / me tog ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / rlung g.yab ma dang / dpyangs mkhan pa dang / mar ma ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / gsal bkra ma dang / gar skyur ma dang /
208b4(rnying rgyud): chu 'dzin ma dang / dril 'khrol ma dang / 'bebs byed ma dang / bde ba rgyas 'degs ma dang / bde ba za byed ma dang / bde ba rmongs byed ma dang / bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang / khrus kyi lha mo dang / rgyal mtshan gyi lha mo dang / bla re'i lha mo dang / gzugs kyilha/
208b5(rnying rgyud): mo dang / lha mo dpal be'u ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / sgron bral ma dang / mdangs can ma dang / skyabs can ma dang / dri med ma dang / sgra sgrogs ma dang / thogs med ma dang / gzhan yang lha'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / mi'i byang chub sems
208b6(rnying rgyud): 'a dang / lha ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / yi dwags kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dang / byol song gi byang chub sems dpa' dang / dmyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / gzhan yang rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje zhags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags/
208b7(rnying rgyud): sgog can dang / rdo rje dril bu can dang / de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa khyab pa'i zhing khams kyi bkod pa dang / gzhal yas khang gi 'khor lo la snang ba dang / yab dang yum gyi rnam pa gnyis su med pa dang / thabs kyi rang bzhin du snga
209a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / shes rab kyang pong bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin du de dag so so'i rang bzhin dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / lce dang / sras da /
209a2(rnying rgyud): yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
209a3(rnying rgyud): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / zad par gyi khams dang / ma lus par snang ba'i khams la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/
209a4(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal su med pa/ brjod du med pa/ dngos po'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad du gyur pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dag
209a5(rnying rgyud): dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bcas pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid dang / mi rig pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po dang / rgyu'i
209a6(rnying rgyud): tsags dang / gzhi'i khyad par dang / lam gyi rang bzhin dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi byed pa dang / mthong ba dang / goms pa dang / spyad pa dang / thob pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa dang / bgrod pa dang / spangs pa dang / sbyangs pa
209a7(rnying rgyud): dang / bskur ba dang / shes pa dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / dbang du gyur pa dang / so sor rig pa dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / klong du gyur pa dang // bskyod pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyung ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / brtan pa dang / phyogs dang / dus dang /
209b1(rnying rgyud): khams dang / rigs dang / byed pa dang / las dang / bsam pa dang / skye gnas dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / len pa dang / 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / yid kyi srid pa dang / tha mal pa dang / log pa dang / phyogs tsam nyid dang / 1
209b2(rnying rgyud): dang // yang dag pa dang / mthar thug pa dang / mchog tu snang ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / thun mong du snang ba la sogs pa yul dang / sdang ba dang / dngos po dang / srid pa dang / zhi ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la rag ma lus shi
209b3(rnying rgyud): yang dag par gzigs pas rnam par gzigs par mdzad do// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa ji snyed du 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di nyid kyi don dang len pa'i chos rnams rang gi ngo bo stong par mthong ba ni/ dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni/
209b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis brtag par dka' zhing gzhal bar mi nus pa bzhin du mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// oM chos dbyings don dam spros bral rang bzhan las// gzugs dang mtshan ma'i 'dzin pa mi mnga' yang // stong pa'i shes rab pa
209b5(rnying rgyud): 'brags smos bral ba'i// chos su lpa grub mnyapa nyid bzhengs su gsol// AHgdong nas dag pa'i ye shes tshogs las grub// bsam gyis mi khyab mtshan dang dpe byang ldan// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// hUM rnam par da
209b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i smon lam mthus grub cing // byams dang snying rje'i thugs kyang rab bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rigs kyi rang gi mchog gyur yul// sprul pa spu yi rigs kun dbyung du gsol// sti ma 'gags skye med rdo rje stong nyid skra// yan lag drug tu gsung dbyang
209b7(rnying rgyud): dpagra myed pas// bstan pa rgyam rgyas so'i bye brag du// kun gyi lam gyur sde snod de gsungs shig/ hA mi 'gyur thugs kyi dgongs pa dpag med las// gnod sdig zhi dang 'dod pa'i don rgyas dang // phal pa dab bskur gdug byed chang gcod pa'i// su
210a1(rnying rgyud): don spyod phrin las de mdzod cig/ ces bskul pas/ de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku gsung thugs kyi gnas thams cad nas 'od zer kye dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan 'akod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan
210a2(rnying rgyud): med kyi dra ba chen po bkye ste/ nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / nam mkha'i khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar bzhugs nas/ lham me lhang de lhan
210a3(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de ltar 'dug pa'i khyad par du yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdas chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bkod pa'i gnas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par
210a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdo pa
210a5(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi rnams pa'i
210a6(rnying rgyud): khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen yod pa'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thos
210a7(rnying rgyud): mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi gnas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi
210b1(rnying rgyud): khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi yang 'khor gyi thog mar 'jug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ yang dag
210b2(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'jug pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
210b3(rnying rgyud): sangs klas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+mo can gyi gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'bug pa mthong bar
210b4(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul dang bral ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
210b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag 'khor gyi thog mar 'jug pa mthong bar gyur to// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs shing 'brums klas pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag gi
210b6(rnying rgyud): gru gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi theg mar rang nyid 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
210b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang so so nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bkod par gzigs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa
211a1(rnying rgyud): dang khams dang bag la nyal gyi khyad par gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa dang / zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur pa dang / nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pa drung / phrag dog gi dbang du gyur pa dang / ser sna'i dbang
211a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang / khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa la sogs pa rnams kyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gdul bar bya ba'i 'khor kha cig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bzhugs par mdzad do// de bzhin du kha cig la ni rdo rje'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni rin po che'i rigs dang /
211a3(rnying rgyud): khacig la ni pad+ma'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni phrin las kyi rigs dang / kha cig la ni sbyin pa chen po'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni khro bo chen po'i rigs la sogs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnam par
211a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rab tu bstan to// de nas phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba'i gzhal med khang da rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag so so'i gtso bo chen po rnams la so so'i 'khor rnams kyis rang gi bstan pa'i sde snod gsu
211a5(rnying rgyud): dbyang du me da bu'i 'dra la gabus ma gyis mi khyab pa rnams bu zhing bgro bsems la snang bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyi yang gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rdzo'o/ kun tu bzang po nyid la bu zhing 'dri ba sems la snang ba dgur nas/ thams cad kyis
211a6(rnying rgyud): srin ga cig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen kun bzang mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang // yon tan dpag med ji snyed pa// mA lus khyod kyi thugs lag nas// blo ldan rnams kyis bsdub bya ba/
211a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sngon du rtsa ba dang // phyim phyi ma rab 'byed pa'i// rgyud rnams su ni lags bshad las// mtshang ba rnams kha bskangs shing // the zom som nyig rbad pa'i phyir// ma lus rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// ji ltar rigs pa'i yan lag rnams// thugs
211b1(rnying rgyud): dang tan dugasol// ces gsol to// sogs pacu'i sadus byas thams pa da gyis rdugs ni ba rtson po las byung bskyong gaga' lasas dang pan// danas bcom na 'dus nam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyogs pa 'angs ga
211b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phrag dang / sde dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ma lus pa
211b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang / rigs dang dngos po thams cad kyi dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la rab tu rtogs te/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du gyi ma'i dus kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi don du dgongs par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar gsol
211b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung dang thugs nges pa// rang bzhin gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje gsum las 'gyur med kyang // ma lus sems can khams snang ba// dus gsum rdo rje sangs rgyas gsum// thugs kyi dbang phyug nas gyur pa//
211b5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po rdzu 'phrul che// 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che// bsam pa'i yul las rab 'das te// ma lus 'khor ba'i chu bo'i rgyun// mya ngan 'das par bar chad med// shin tu rnying pa dka' ba nyid// mngon sum myur du sgrub byed pa// bde bar gshegs pa
211b6(rnying rgyud): ku 'dus chud// bstan pa'i mchog gyur gang bshad de// rtogs shing mthong bar dka' ba'i don// mnyan par 'dod na phan don du// mgon mdzad khyod la gsol ba na// bde bar gshegs shes gang la bya// thams cad 'dus pa ji ltar gzhag/ chud ces
211b7(rnying rgyud): bye ga TaM// de la dbye ba ji ltar bshad// rang gar ba skar lags// zhing gnas pa kyim byed// bcom ldan zhes ni gang 'barjod// rigs brgyad byes ci'i phyid// dam par brjod pa chogag lags// badz+ra ba 'ings pa skyes skyed// ba
212a1(rnying rgyud): ga dadon tan 'tshal na// brnam ldan 'das kyis bgang drug so'o// de nas ston pa na bcwa// 'bar rnams bsgrub ba'i dri dag brnyanas// grag sang zhugs kyi dnga'ag// sa par byang rta'aga'akyal ba /
212a2(rnying rgyud): cig 'dus pa'i 'grod gyi tshogs// gang gis mang byam lus spang // thob par bya ba mtha' dag brnyes// mi 'gyur lug sung thugs rdzogs pa// bde bachen po zhes bya ste// de yul 'bras par gshegs pa'o// bran mong bdang khrid pa hrI// sbyar zhi
212a3(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs shes brjod pa yin// rnam pa bcu brtsegs gnas pa gsum// ji snyed pa yi bde bar gshegs// thams cad ma lus yul de la// 'dus pa'i tshogs pa yin par bshad// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu rnams// rgyu dang thabs dang mthar thug tu/
212a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba'i don dang ldan pas rgyud// rang bzhin thabs lam 'bras bu yis// rgyud gsun du ni bye brag dbye// ma bcos ma bsgyur ma bslad cing // skye 'gag tag cha 'gro 'ong dang // yod med mtha' dang bral ba yis// dbyer med zung 'jug rang ngo tsam// gdul
212a5(rnying rgyud): bya 'dod chags can don du// mdzes bya yon tan ldan pa yis// tshul dgus phyi rol drang ba'i phyir// su gsung thugs ni zhi bar gnas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bdud bcom zhing // yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan pas// rang gzhan gnyis med don rdzogs la// bco
212a6(rnying rgyud): ldan zhes su brjod pa yin// nyon mongs khams dang phung po dang // dbang po yul dang bcas pa yis// rang gi rigs dang dbye ba mchog/ legs sbyar rigs brgyar 'gyur ba'o// grub byed lus ngag yid gsum ni// mi dge rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bsgrub
212b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ra sa ma ma khyad par du// mthar thag rjes bya ngam pa'o// de dag nye bar bsdu ban// baspyan bslab las kyi khang par te// rgyas bsdus rab tu bsdus pa yong// de dag nga nyid 'bral pa // rna nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// byam kun \u0f7fbzang ba cha//
212b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes ni gangs bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa ci zhig lags// de bzhin rdzogs rim ji ltar gdags// rnal babyor zhes ni ci la bgyi// thabs zhes bya ba ji lta bu// shes rab kyang ni gang zhig lags// don dam kun rdzob ji lta bu// dbyer med
212b3(rnying rgyud): du ni 'dod pa gang // de kho na nyid ji ltar mthong // gsang ba dang ni ci zhig gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos dbyings don gyi snying po dkyil// dag pa'i ye shes sna tshogs 'khor// rang bzhin gzugs brten ting nge 'dzin// brda da
212b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas tshul bzhin du// sgrub bla da nga rib par 'gyur// rten ltar d+ha ma la shes pa'i rgyud// ma bcos rang bzhin rdal ma la// thabs dang shes rab nyam par sbyor// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud// 'bad rtsol dmigs pa mtshan par bcas// mtshon du yod
212b5(rnying rgyud): bcom nyid thabs// dras gsul yi dmigs de nyid ldang // brda thabs byin gyis brlab pa dang // gnang du mtshon pas gang rtogs pa// ma mthong shes pa shes rab yin/ blo dang blo min khyad par gyis// don dam kun rdzob zhes su bstan// rang bzhir tshogs
212b6(rnying rgyud): pa rgya 'bras kyis// chu dang 'o ma du ba me// rta dang skyes bu ji bzhin du// tha dad gcig pa dbyer med de// dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags la sogs// snang dang stong pa tha dang med// thams cad rang gi ngo bong stong // gsal bcas de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba
213a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya klu dang gsung // thugs kyi gsang ba mnur thag pa// sbas pa dang ni dgongs pa dang // sra tsam min dang ngas nag/ de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// kyem ston pa kun tu bdang // !zhes bya bcoM zhig lags/
213a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin chags kyi don chen ci// snying po zhes pa'i lta bu// ting ngengon zhes pa ci phyir gdags// gzhal med khang shes gang la bya// mchod pas kyang ni ci zhig bya// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba// ye shes kyang ni gang zhig lags// dbang bsgyur zhes pa
213a3(rnying rgyud): phyir brjod// phrin las bshad pa'i don ched ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mthar thug pa dang gnas skabs su// phan byed nus pa lha yin no// gang las shes dang gang las skyob// shes shing skyob pa sngags kyi don// yon tan mthar
213a4(rnying rgyud): thug gang ston pa// thabs chen bshad la snying por 'gyur// sgrib med ye shes myur du rdzogs// ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yin// rgya khyon yon tan tshad med pas// gzhal med khang par de 'gyur ro// bsrub bya sgrub byed gang mnyes pa// de ni kun gyi mchod
213a5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams la// de nyid rgyas btab phyag rgya'o// rtog med bde dang gsal bas khyab// gang la gnas pa ye shes yin// lus ngag yid la nyon mongs pa'i// dri ma 'khrud byed dbang du brjod// zhi 'phel chags dang khro bo yis//
213a6(rnying rgyud): bsam pa gnas 'gyur phrin las so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// byang chub sems chen ji ltar lags// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bA ni// sangs rgyas zhes pa gang zhig lags// de don blta ba ji lta bu// bsgom par bya ba ci zhig lags// spyod pa
213a7(rnying rgyud): spyad pa'i tsam zhig/ dam tshe gnod pa gang la bya// bsnyen pa zhes pa'i dgos pa ci// sgrub pa yis ni ci zhig 'grub// rgyas gad ba kun ni ji ltar 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma skyes ma 'gags zhi bar gnas// dza ba dngas min gter/
213b1(rnying rgyud): chen mchog/ snying rje stong pa dbyer mi sbed// 'di ni byang chub sems chen yin// lus ngag yid gsum dang gis dril// mi phyed don gyi rdo rjedade// chos kun rig pa'i rjes su gnus// de ni 'dzin byed skyes bur 'gyur// dza snyed dun gyi drin spangs nas/
213b2(rnying rgyud): blang bu ma lus rab tu brnyes// ma rig zib po rab sad cing // dgongs pas shes bya rab tu rgyas// de la tshul bzhin ma nor mthong // yang dag don rtogs blta ba'o// phyi rol don gyi rtog pa leg/ nyon mongs phra ba tsam gyis kyang // mi brdzi goms stobs
213b3(rnying rgyud): byed pa// mthong ba nyid la bsgom pa'o// dang po'i las dang bsgom pa dang // brtul zhugs 'chang dang mnyam gzhag dang // rang gi sems la gang spyod pa// mi spyad ma mthong de spyod yin// rin chen sa gzhi bzang lta bu// skyon med gzhan bskyed nus
213b4(rnying rgyud): par ldan// nyes pa'i rtsa ba nges par spong // mi 'gal ston pa dam tshig go// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen gsang // brtsam zhing phan 'dogs ma rungs 'dul// bsod nams tshogs dang bskyed rim 'brel// bsgrub bya nyer gyur bsnyen pa ste// mchog/
213b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang thun mong las// dkyil 'khor gsum 'bros che rab sgrub pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu phan tshun du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// tha dad gcig tu gang bsdus nas// gcig gis gcig gsal rgyas 'debs so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa//
213b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ci// snying rje zhes pa gang zhig la bla// sems can don du ji ltar spyad// rig pa'i brtul zhug ji ltar spyad// zung du 'jug pa'i spyod pa gang // bdag nyid ji ltar byin gyis brlab// bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// dngos grub zhes ni gang la bya// tshe 'di'i
213b7(rnying rgyud): 'grub tshul ji ltar 'byung // bar mdor ni su zhig grol// skye bar brgyud la thogs pa gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags so sor rtog pa ste// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ye shes te// gti mug chos dbyings snang ba'o// nyon mongs pa
214a1(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhinan// sems can chos dang dmigs med kyis// snying rje gsum las yangs ma 'da'// kyar ba gams pa brtan byas nas// gas ngags sman dang stan pa dang // bzhags rnam pa sna khams gsung rgya
214a2(rnying rgyud): bdag tu skad cig tsam gyis 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i bcu ma zhugs bla na med// gang la bsngags pa'i 'khor ba dang // mi 'bral me sbyang dam tshig yin// dornaM ngam sun rdzib thams shes rab// snang zhing stong pa 'khor ba dang /
214a3(rnying rgyud): mya ngan radas la sogs pa'i chos// thams cad dbyer med zung 'jug go// rang gis rang rig ye shes de// reg mthong rtogs pas rang byin brlab// 'gog pa'i rdo rje dbugs dbyu 'dzub// 'dug gnas ldang ba khyad par gyis// 'bru gsum rang gi ngo bor
214a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// kun rdzob pa la bzlas pa yin// mngon shes drug sogs thun mong ste// byang chub rdo rje mchog yin no// smin dang grol bas mthu stobs rdzogs// mngon du gyur pas tshe 'dir bsgrub// le lo dang bcas bar ma do// shin tu so sos skye ba bgrang //
214a5(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// de dag bsgrub pa'i thabs gang lags// de yi dngos nyid ji lta bu// so so 'dor pa'i rtogs pa gang// bsam gtan zhes pa ji lta bu// rlung gi rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// de nyid 'dzin pa gang la gnas// rjes su dran pa'i
214a6(rnying rgyud): ka gang // ting nge 'dzin du gang zhig bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab tu bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang // nye dar bsgrub dang de bzhin tshe// phrin las sbyang bas thabs su 'gyur// byang chub sems gzhi stong pa dang // sa bon tshul du nges 'byung
214a7(rnying rgyud): zhing // gzugs rtags yi ge mtshan mar bcas// thabs dngos thun mong nyid du 'gyur// mchog tu gyur pa 'di lta ste// phyi nang dbang po yul grub pa// rang gnas shes pas so sor 'dor// snyoms 'jug thams cad byin gyis rlobs// rtog spyong dga'
214b1(rnying rgyud): bde rtse gcig nyid// gsang ba Sh+Ti rab spong spro dang bsdu// rang shes rig cing de zad pas// dngos gzhi mngon shes lnga la dbang // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin rlung // 'byung ba lnga dang rdul 'drar snang // gang bu snyom byed rtse la bzhag/ rang gzhan byang chub
214b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpar snang // rang gi snying po gnas su bsam// dbang por lam bsrungs zlum por bkod// gzung bya dri ma dang bral bas// de nyid ye shes sems dpar gsal// mi 'gyur byang chub sems bsgoms pas// mtshan ma lnga bstan srog gi la
214b3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams la so sor bstan// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// dngos bsdu gzugs kyi nang du bsam// skad cig ma yi ye shes gsal// sgrib pa ma lus sel bar byed// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa//
214b4(rnying rgyud): rang rig byang chub sems ni gang / de yi chu ni ji lta bu// gang zhig gis ni rkyen du 'gyur// 'bras bu 'dod pa ji ltar 'grub/ 'byung ba'i dus ni ji tsam na// tshul ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// nges par 'grub par byed pa gang // nye bar mtshon pa'i dpe gang yin// dgos pa yang ni ci zhig lag
214b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid mtshon tshul ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhi dang ngo bo mtshan nyid rnams// ma lus lhun gyis grub bdag nyid// mtha' bral ma spangs ma thob pa// sgo srung dang bral byang chub sems// lhan cig skyes dang bdag tu blta//
214b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu brtags pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// nyon mongs nyer len mtshungs par ldan// bag nyal kun ldang rgyu yin no// lhan cig byed rkyen bsod nams dang // de ma yin dang mi g.yo'i las// legs nyes phra rags mang nyung gis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor bar
214b7(rnying rgyud): sbyar// 'bras bu lus dang longs spyod dang // chos dang 'phen pa'i skal ba yis// ji ltar bsams dang smon lam dang // 'dug pa'i las kyi khyad par byed// dus ni dus gsum thams cad du// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul gnas de nyid// 'dod nga
215a1(rnying rgyud): 'dod la sogs pa'i// gnas skabs so sor 'byung ba'o// tshul ni yang dag log pa dang // ngas dang ma ngas skad mi snang // sna tshogs kyis ni bral ba dang // thob pa'i bde sdug tha dang mor// ma bcos rgyud kyi gang
215a2(rnying rgyud): ma// gcig gis dus gsum dus med par// rtogs dang ma rtogs phyogs gcig gis// kun la khyab pa nges par 'grub// rtsa me 'khor lo la sogs bzhin// rin chen rgyung byed stong sgra dang // gsal dri ma g.yos sna tshogs lus// mtshon pa
215a3(rnying rgyud): dpe yi nye phyogs yin// rang gi ngo bo thog ma yin// rnam par rtog bral rnal 'byor te// rten sogs rgyu 'bras 'gog pa la// log pa dgag pa'i gol ba'o// gcig dang du mar 'dzin pa dang // mtha' brgyad bral ba'i bdag nyid can// brda thabs
215a4(rnying rgyud): bAn chubs gtan chags kyis// nyams sa myong bas mtshan tud shes// de nas 'dor gyis yang zhus pa// rgyud rnams kyin ston pa gang // de dag gnas kyang rje 'dra zhig/ de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par dgang // 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ji steT// dus
215a5(rnying rgyud): ma zhig na 'byung // rig pa'i rjes 'dzin rdo lta bu// gleng spong zhes bya gang zhig lags// don du gnyer ba gang la bya// de dag bye brag dbye ba gang // lam gyi yan lag gang gis bsdu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// kun tu bzang po /
215a6(rnying rgyud): gyi mchog/ skyon med thams cad 'dus pa yin// lnga drug gcig gnyis gsum bzhes bsdus// gdul ba'i rigs la sna tshogs snang // gsang ba'i b+ha gnam mkha'i khams// mtha' bral bsam me khyab la bzhugs// skal yod skyes bu'i rigs sun/
215a7(rnying rgyud): la// nges dang mangs lnga dang ldan// thugs kyi khyad par bye brag mang // ma bstan ma gsungs par gnas kyang // tha dad skye dang gseng gi tshogs// bdag la nye bar ston par mthong // nyan pa po ni dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
215b1(rnying rgyud): nyan thos rang rgyal lha la sogs// rim bzhin rang la bstan pa 'khor// dus dang bral ba'i dus gsum nyid// dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// rdzogs gnyis gsum dang tsang ba la// gang rigs zad daso sor 'byung // ji ltar mos pa dayas
215b2(rnying rgyud): 'dul// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul gyis te// nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang // brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis te/ cig chang rim dang thong rgal dang // dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang // rgyu dang lam da
215b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i tshul// mas dang mos pa spyod pa dang // lam gyis yis yon tan bsdus// dang po pa dang kun tu skyed// brtul zhugs dang ni mnyam gzhag gis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa bsdus// mthar thug pa ni thun mong yin// rgyud
215b4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ni gleng bslang ba// e baM ma yA shru ta b+ha ga bAn kA ya bAka tset+ta saM mu di ta/ badz+ra ba na ta/ 'di nyid kyi ni sgras brjod pa'i// yon tan ma lus gleng gzhi'o// de yis gleng bslang nyid du 'gyur// gzhi dang la ma dang 'bras bu dag/ 'di yi don
215b5(rnying rgyud): du gnyer bya yin// shes bya gshis dang lam gang zag/ thob bya 'bras bu dag gis dbye// bsod nams dang ni ye shes kyi// tshogs dang sprin dang grol ba dang // bskyed dang rdzogs dang shin tu rdzogs// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab phye ba'i// lam
215b6(rnying rgyud): kyi yan lag rab tu bsdus// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// byang chub sems dpa' tshul chen po// dpa' bo skyes mchog 'jig rten mgon// bsam skyor phun sum tshogs pa yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas yab kyi gdung // legs 'dzin bsam gyis
215b7(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa// ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa yis// the tshom med par don bsgrub 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas/ phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thugs kyi dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus pas/ khams
216a1(rnying rgyud): rgyan gsas dang 'gro ba rigs drug tu snang pa'i sems can gyi// khams dpag tu med pa'i don bslab cing ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang / ma bskal ba rnams bskal ba dang / dbugs ma khyen pa rnams dbugs dpung ba dang /
216a2(rnying rgyud): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan pas 'da' ba'i phyir brtson par spyong gyi gnas par bzhugs so// phyogs bad+ma'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i tshul nye bar sdud pa'i le'u lce gnyis pa'o// de nas brjom
216a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de nyid kyi srung dang gsung dang thugs m+b+ha snying po gsang ba 'di dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hUM hUM hrIHhrI/ oMr+g+ha A dzi ni dzi ka/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ skA ra d+ha d+h+r-ika/ aM A ro l-ika/ hA prA d+h+r-i d+h+r-ika/ muM lAM mAM pA tAM/ aM d+h+waM swaM d+hAd+d+hi tha~M nA~M/ k+ShaM d+ha Sha ra \u0f7f/
216a4(rnying rgyud): ha re te/ hUM nA gAr ti/ hU~M badz+ra ra trA~M/ oM bai ro tsaN+Ta tAM/ oM badz+ra oMk+Sho b+hahAM/ oM rat+na sa~M b+ha pra dz+nyA hUM/ oM a mi taSh+TA hU~M hUM/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hitra/ oM sa man+tab+hadwe d+h+waM/ oM bud+d+ha lo tsan tAM/ oM pid+hi ra pa sa na nAM/ oM mA ma kI t+ta ma b+h+rUM/ asa?
216a5(rnying rgyud): pa twa rA nAM// e ma sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ma bcos rang gi ngo bo nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab yaM shes tshogs// gti mug rnam dag rgyal po che// oM// e me rang nyung bde chen thugs kyi mchog/ bdud las rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te// le wang
216a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur longs spyod ldan// hUM// e ma yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter// yid bzhin 'byung ba zad mi shes// re skrod nam mkha'i ting 'dzin mdzod// nga rgyal rang gnas che ba'i mchog/ trAM// e maM rnam dag gsung ni mtha' las 'das// dri med nam
216a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bur grags// skyon bral chos kyi yi ger snang // 'dod chags skyon bral bla na med// dz+dzaH// e mad mchog don rnams kun sgrub pa'i// nyon mongs srid 'joms mthar 'byin pa// phrin las chen po rdzogs mdzad pa'i// phrag dog las bya rtsa
216b1(rnying rgyud): bral Tha/ gas kyang du brjod pas med du brjod pa mngang nas// dmyal 'khor gyi nas bdam par dbang bskur du// da nas rigs ma ma'i dkyil gakhor gyis thang sa rnams kyang rang dang gi snying po gcan tad kyis byung ban/ a bangs pan+ta ta \u0f7f// san ba rnam
216b2(rnying rgyud): snying po'o// oM badz+raHd+hI shwa rI hrAM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra d+ha dza b+h+rUM/ rdo rje rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra rA ga ra tI hUM/ rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra sI d+ha dz+dza/ rdo rje legs
216b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra lA s+ye hU~M/ rdo rje sgeg mo'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra d+hU pa hUM/ rdo rje bdug pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHhU~M/ rdo rje 'gugs ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+rA dI pa sha ra ti hUM/ rdo rje me sgron snying po'o// oM many+dzu shrI ku m+b+ha ra mu la trAM b+h+rUM// 'ja
216b4(rnying rgyud): dpal gzhon nu'i snying ge'o// oM rat+na d+ha rA hUM/ rdo rje dbyings grug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM hUM/ rdo rje rin chen gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra sU d+hA trAM hUM/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ke tu d+hIHhUM/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM badz+raH
216b5(rnying rgyud): sa hA hUM/ rdo rje bzhad pa'i snying po'o// oM mA le b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ rdo rje phreng ba ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe NA~M hUM/ rdo rje me tog ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra pI shahrIHhUM/ rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra su Sha hA trAM/ rdo rje bde ba ma'i snying po'o// oM lo
216b6(rnying rgyud): shwA pA pa~M nAM/ spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po'o// oMp+tAng+ga ta d+hAb+h+rUM/ pad+ma dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+rA d+ha mas+t+rai hAM/ rdo rje chos kyi snying po'o// oM ba~Mdz+dza tI k+Sha dz+haiM hU~M/ rdo rje rnon po'i snying po'o// e badz+ra bi shad+d+hiHb+h+rUM/ rdo d+he smra ba'i snying po'o//
216b7(rnying rgyud): e bi kha~MhAhA/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i snying pon// oM dz+re nI ti ts+tsha tre/ rdo rje dbyangs ma khan ma'i stong pa'o// oMb N+Di A la kaN+Di n+da/ rdo rnga mar mama' stong pa'o// i badz+ra m+ba Sh+TAH/ rdo rje lcags tsug ma'i skyeng po'o// oM rA ga / ts+tsha hUM
217a1(rnying rgyud): gsal srid par byung bas// s+yAbyu k+ta N+Da/ lag du na// skab / r+m+ma na/ rdorje dbyangs skrag pa byung ngas/ aSh+Ta // dza las nga// ma bajug na
217a2(rnying rgyud): spang ba'i snying po'o// mA~M Shadza yak+Sha k+Shi d+h+waM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi skyeng po'o// oM badzes te hAdz+dza/ rdo r+d+ha Sh+Ta dz+rar gyi steng po'o// oM badz+ra d+hihrIH/ rdo rje gAr sbyar ma'i sbyong ba'o// oM badz+rad dz+nyAd+hA trA~M/ rdo rje thug pa pa'i skyeng ba'o// oM badz+ra Sh+Tha/
217a3(rnying rgyud): rdorje rjel bu ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra A be sha ya d+ha d+d+he/ rdo rje 'bebs ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra k+Sha ti ga d+ha ya trAM/ sa'i snying po snying po'o// oM badz+ra su khA na d+hi dz+dza/ bde ba rgyas 'a ba~M sa mAM'i snying po'o// oM d+harbaka d+ha b+h+rUM trAM/ chos kyi
217a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM rA dzo shwa rA ya d+h+waM/ dbang phyug rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma maN+Da lag+ni hUM/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dam pa'i snying po'o// oM rat+na rasmi ha trAM/ rin chen 'od 'phro'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra sad+d+hi d+d+he/ rdo rje snyems ma'i snying po'o//
217a5(rnying rgyud): rat+na sad+d+hi hUM/ rin cher sems mdze snying po'o// oM d+harmas d+d+hi dz+dza/ chos kyi sems pa'i snying po'o// oM kaR+thar+m+ma satwA d+h+waM/ las kyi sems pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra Sha gar+b+he d+ha ya hU~M/ nam maN+Da'i snying po'i stong ba'o// oM a mo thA hA rA ya hAM/
217a6(rnying rgyud): byed srung po'o// oM A lo ka pA ShA d+h+waM/ snang ba mchog gi steng po'o// oM 'anga? hU~M dz+dza/ b+hag d+ha'i rgyal po snying po'o// oM pra ti Sh+Tha ra dzak+Sh+mI NAM/ spobs pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM prA ti Sh+ThA na kA Ta ye tAtrAM/ stobs pa brtsegs pa'i snying po
217a7(rnying rgyud): oMd dwe sho d+ha na d+ha b+hUM/ khrus kyi lha ma'i snying po'o// oM bI ga tu dz+dza hUM/ rgyal mtshan lha mo'i snying po'o// oM de bI bi tAn hrIHhUM/ bla ri'i lha mo'i snying po'o// oM daM Sh+Ti tsat+tA tA hUM/ gdugs kyi lha mo'i snying po'o// oM ma hA ma tre sa ma ya trAM/
217b1(rnying rgyud): thams pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM mu ka rig sa ma hrIHhUM/ bde ba rmongs byed ma'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma rA dza ya hUM hUM/ padz+ra'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pad+mo rnams ka la trAM hUM/ badz+ra dam paji snying po'o// oM badz+ra a tsa la hrIHhUM/ rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i thang
217b2(rnying rgyud): po'o// oM a mo b+ha rA dzaHdzAM/ thogs pad rtul po'i ting po'o// oMd tri badz+ra shAn tsA tAM/ lha mo bad+ma can gyi nying po'o// oM bI b+hai ra bA hU~M hUM/ la po 'jigs byed pa'i stong ba'o// oM dgyes dzad+ha hrIHwa~M/ sa mo spyong bral ma'i snying po /
217b3(rnying rgyud): dza yA hA hUM/ lha mo rnam rgyal ma'i snying po'o// oM sarba pa ri sho d+hA ya hUM/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he dza l-i ya hUM/ bde ba tshe 'phel mu'i snying po'o// oM rat+ne shwa ra hUM hUM/ rin chen dbang phyug gi snying po'o// oM karma sad+d+hi rdo traM/ gra
217b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i las kyi snying po'o// oM A ra ta shwa swA hrIHhUM/ dga' bar ston pa'i snying po'o// oM a tsa la ak+Sho b+h+ya hA hUM/ mi g.yo ba'i mtha'i snying po'o// oM dza ya ba twe sarba she ne hUM hUM/ lha mo skyabs can ma'i snying po'o// oM de bi pra tsa la bi ma le
217b5(rnying rgyud): lha mo dri med ma'i snying po na// oM pa sha pa te dza ta sid+d+hiHhUM/ skra mo lcags sgrog ma'i snying po'o// oM daM bi ka drar praka ri hA hUM/ lha mo thogs med ma'i snying po'o// oM de ba lu ni d+h+waM/ g+ha'i thab pa'i snying po'o// au nai Na mu re d+ho NAM/ lha man ba pa
217b6(rnying rgyud): bya'o// oM nI ya mu ne d+hAM tAM/ mi'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM nI ya~M mu ni ni hU~M/ dud 'gro'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM pra tA mu ni hrI dzAM/ yi dgas thab pa'i snying po'o// oM tar+tha mu ni k+Shu trA~M// oM na ra ka mu ni sru~M trA hA/ dmyal ba'i thub pa'i ster pa/
217b7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra a~M ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pA shatrUM/ oM badz+ra s+phoT baM// oM badz+ra g+haN+De hoH// sgo srang bzhi'i snying po'o// dang po rje yi snying po ste/ gsum sogs bskyed pa'i snying po'o// ma lus rdzogs pa bzlas pa'i sngags// 'de bshad zhi ba'i lha rnams kyi/
218a1(rnying rgyud): snying po'i kha skong nyid dra bshad// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// da yang rgyal ldan pa yas// dkyil 'khongs yi dbus gnas te// bzhugs pa'i 'dug stangs bstan b+ha ba// rkang g.yas bad+ma dang byin pa'i dang
218a2(rnying rgyud): na pa legs par bzhag nas kyang // de nyid steng du g.yas bzhag pa// dang po rdo rje'i skyel krung yin// g.yon gyis g.yas pa'i byid par mdan// pus mo gnyis ni sar phab pa// zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa ji sba// gnyis pa badz+ra'i bzhabs stabs
218a3(rnying rgyud): rkang pa g.yas pas g.yon pa yi// brla yi steng du cung zad mnan// de nyid g.yon pa'i 'og tu gzhag/ gsum pa sems dpa'i skyil krung yin// g.yon pa yis ni skyil krung phyed// lags bcas de yi drung nyid du// rkang pa g.yas
218a4(rnying rgyud): bor pa dag/ dang dor bzhugs stabs bzhi pa'o// gdang sted dang pa gnyis ka yes// thung du drang por bsra bar bya// mnyam zhing brtan par bzhag pa ni// lnga ba bzang po'i bakhrugs stangs so// mtho gang tsam gyis rkang pa gar/
218a5(rnying rgyud): bdag stan la 'dug nas ni// tsog pur ba ba'ag bzhugs pa ni// tsog pu'i 'jug stangs nyid drug pa/ nang g.yas sems dpa'i skyil grang phyed// brtan cing g.yon pa sgeg bcas kyang // bdun pha rol pa'i bzhugs stangs so// re
218a6(rnying rgyud): rdzags bzhir bstan// dngadangos rigs kyi phyag rgya bstar// gnyis pa yis ni lha mo d+he// gsum pas sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// bzhi pa rdo rje jo bo rnams// lnga pas phyi rol sa pas dpa' ste// drug pas bran dang po // bdud
218a7(rnying rgyud): bas jig rten byang rnams so// de dag phyag rgya ma sor bstan// de nas kyi rol bskor bya // gom stabs rnam pa bdun yin te// dang po dbus su dang batheb dang // rting pa mnyam por cig la bcer// rang gi thang kar lags pa 'ag pa// mthur
218b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i stabs sung yis bshad// de nas shar du gshags nas ni// g.yas pa'i bad+ma dang pus mo bsrang // g.yon gyi sbyin pa bad+har bcar nas// bang mtho lnga bzhag g.yas brgyang yin// lhor ni g.yon brkyang de las bzlog/ thad kar bzhag nas g.yas
218b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon par// rkang mthil lha yi tshad bzhag pa// de dag lho nabarba yang sbyar// nub tu zlum po pus mo gnyis// so so'i gnas su lag gnyis pa'ag/ chu bya'i gshog pa ltar gnas pa// rngub dang nub byang gnyis kar snar// byang gi phyogs sras
218b3(rnying rgyud): ga'i stabs// sor mo rnams ni phyir bstan zhing // pus mo'i lta nga thad kang bzung // rkang mthi la nyi shu rtsa drug khron// g.yon pa'i brlad ni rkang mthil gtad // rkang gcig yin te byang shar mtshams// g.yon pa'i sor mo g.yas kyis mnad// rus
218b4(rnying rgyud): sbal stobs kyis shar lhor brtsam// de dang lhur la lag pa gang// dang pol ni lnga yin te// rdo rje'i gang stobs bsrung ba'i bram// steng 'og gnyis su la na gsum gsum// rdo rje gsor ba de yi gar// lag gnyis ngo bzang za ba'i dzu // phyogs
218b5(rnying rgyud): blta rdo rje ro langs stabs// rdo rje'i stabs sam gtun shing gis// bgegs bzung ltar byed gtan shing stabs// g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bstan// g.yas pas rdo rje ba ngan byar// dpung mgor bzhag pa ba dan stabs// gnyis pa'i dus
218b6(rnying rgyud): sra bstan bya dgra// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yis// rdo rje 'phen tshub de yi stabs// kha yi ster 'og lag gnyis gdengs// gnyis bcas 'jigs pa ltar byed pa// rdo rje 'jigs su drang ba'i stabs// g.yon pa rtse gsum snying gar bzhag
218b7(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa khu nar dbyig pa ltar// 'dogs byed rtse gsums 'jog pa// grobs chen 'dags pa'i gar stabs so// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bkan te// khar bzhag ha ha yi ge bzhes// dgod rdul rdo rje gang ma'i stangs// g.yon pa'i/ khu mar ma
219a1(rnying rgyud): mo bsrang // g.yas pas rdo 'phan tshul na// rdo dza rje yi gang thabs sa// de las mkhrug ma gnyis mad nga// rdo rje zhags pa'i thabs yanano// g.yon pa dgrar brten g.yas pa ye// khwa zung mtha ba nang nas
219a2(rnying rgyud): btod// bsgreng nga rdo rje be con thangs// de nyid las ni g.yas pa yis// mdung rtse gcig pa'i tshul byed pa// rdo rje rtse gcig gar rngubs so// de las rdo rje gdub bu 'degs// bgegs gsong tshul dbyed pa ni// rdo rje gdub bu'i tha
219a3(rnying rgyud): su bshad// gsum pa g.yon babyang dus ni bcu// rang gi kha ni 'og phyogs bltas// gdangs shing lag gnyis ma theg mar mdud// kha yi drung bzhag seng ga'i stabs// de nyid las ni phyogs kun blta// kye 'gyur seng go'i bral ba yin// ga
219a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje lung dra bzung // dgegs kyi steng bzhag g.yas pa yis// rdo rje khu tshur thob yis// brdung tshul rdo rje tho ba'i stabs// rdo rje sgeg mo'i gar dang ldan// mgo ni g.yon gyi phyogs 'dud cing // bskor bzud med skye 'phrul stabs/
219a5(rnying rgyud): rde bsdams pas snying gnas// 'dra byed rdo rnga dral ba'o// khu tshung mazararu chung gnyis bsgreng bzlog/ kha 'gram gnyis bzhag mche ba'i tshul// rdo rje mche ba'i stabs su bshad// g.yon pa'i khu zur shugs kyi rdul// g.yas kyi dpung ma
219a6(rnying rgyud): ral gri 'degs// rdo rje de la gri'i thabs yin no// g.yon mdzub mo dang g.yas pa yi// mdzub mo gnyis mdud g.yas mdzub mo// lcags kyu ltar byas lcags kyu'i stabs// khu tshur gnyis kyis g.yas phyogs su// 'degs tshul rdo rje ma
219a7(rnying rgyud): zung thabs// g.yon pa kur brtan g.yas pa yi// khu tshur thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul// lan gsum thag mdung 'phen thabs so// bzhi pa zlum po'i gang thabs ni// dgu ste lag pa g.yon brkyang ba// da drung g.yas pa'i mdza chung nga sbram//
219b1(rnying rgyud): tshul b+has rdo rje'i gang // phyogs bzhings gnan la sogs pa'i// so so'i phyag rgyas gsal byas pa// sgo ba'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i thabs// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas sdigs mdzub// bsgreng ba rdo rje 'khyil pa'i thabs// g.yas pa rdo rjeH/
219b2(rnying rgyud): gang 'dzin// g.yon gyi dril bu rna bar dkrol// rdo rje sgra yi thabs su bshad// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// mthe'u chung mdzub mo rdo rje mdud// 'khor lo bskor ba de nyid thabs// snying gar pad+ma kha' byed tshul// pad+ma kha phye'i stabs yin no//
219b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyis gzhu 'dzin gzhu yi tshul// mda' 'gengs tshul ni g.yas pa yis// rna ba'i drung 'gengs mda' gzung thabs// de nyid 'phen tshul byed pa ni// rdo rje mda' 'phen thabs yin no// rkang gcig dang por bshad de bzhin// g.yas dang ga yo
219b4(rnying rgyud): sogag lan gnyis bskor// bdun pa rus sbal gar stabs ni// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yi// rdo rje snying gar gtod de 'jog/ de dag legs spya phyogs kun bskor// sa gzhi bsrung ba'i las yin no// de nas bdag nyid bsrang bya ba// dkyi
219b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gtso bo'i ngang nyid las// phyi dang nang gi khrus byas te// chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsam// bdag med don la mos par bya// mgrin pa hrIHlas pad 'dab brgyad// mdun gyi 'dab ma lce yin te// de nyid hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga dkar por bsam byas
219b6(rnying rgyud): la// badz+ra dzaM ha zhes pas bstan// lag gnyis mthil du a las ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsgom// de steng hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga sor mo rnams su bsam// ha sta badz+ras brtan par byas// rang gi snying gar nyi ma la// yi ge hUM gyur rdo rje ni//
219b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rtsa lji n+di gis mtshan// de las dod 'phros po tshogs zung // bgegs rnams tshar bcad chung 'dus pas// rang la rnam pas khro bo'i sra// rdo rje dzin par grags par gyur// mthing gzhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtsertsa lnga 'dzin/
220a1(rnying rgyud): brngubs brjod pa 'bar bcas// dpapa' bar ma da ba cas pa bsgrub// rlung brjod bsnyad pas brtan par bya// dargyal ldan pas sar po rnams// pan tshun bsngos ta rdzabasdu byas// mtha d+ha rdzas ma bad+han// da
220a2(rnying rgyud): rab na brtan par bya// de nyid zag yi phyogs sngar bzhag/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na ldan trAM a b+hi Shi ny+tsa me// de yis rigs bdag dbang bskur blang // rdo rje lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi sku// mtheb mdzu ba gnyis la oM hUM bsam// btsun mdud gnan bcings
220a3(rnying rgyud): ji// de rje 'a zur mkhrig mar dasnol// snying gA mgrin pa lhag pa dang // spyi gtsug rgyab dang lte ba dang // dpral ba la sogs gnas dgung ni// rdo rje'i mdud pa dam bcas na sa// lhag ma lus la dra bar bzong // de nas lag g.yon sdigs ma dub
220a4(rnying rgyud): bsgreng // g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing// oM badz+ra dz+wa ya a na lArka hUM// zhes brjod bgegs la rdo rje bsnun// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba de// nang du 'bar ba lta bur bsgreng // oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hU~M phaT/ zhes pas
220a5(rnying rgyud): bgegs rnams bsregs par bsam// rdo rje spyan gyi nga rgyal gyi sku// sor mo bsnol bsdams sa la bzhag/ oM badz+ra ne tri ban+d+ha sarba bi g+h+ri// 'od kyi zhags pas bgegs rnams bcing // bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar bsam// de nas phyogs kun bsrung ba ni// /
220a6(rnying rgyud): gyi thul gyis// srung bzhin phyag rgyas la bzhag/ oM badz+ra dz+ra D+ho me b+ha bi rak+Sha traM// 'og phyogs bgegs kun bcing bar byas ma// rdo rje khu tshur me ltar bskor// lcags kyu swA bu lci bong bzhag/ oM badz+ra hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// 'jigs byed
220a7(rnying rgyud): ste phyogs bcing // dzadza dod rjed rgyal byas// phra tshung 'phre nga gnyis dbying sa// 'dzub mamatha bltar byas te// e ba sa na// zhes pas kyi phyogs mngan tu bcing // rdo rjeg zung stong ragyur byer// gra gas dacings brje
220b1(rnying rgyud): 'a ma da smrabar ban// ga ga/ dran zhugs phyin paH ts+tsha// rtswa bang pa zlog par bdud cing dgang// oM dz+ra ga// datud mtshungs pas gang byug pad/ dzang ba dang rgyal gyis/ na
220b2(rnying rgyud): ma bzud // martse drung bri dang ltar byas nas/ a badz+ri tang ni ba tig na // de ses nu ba phyogs bgegs pabacing ngo // rdorje dus mtshams kyil gyis// dza rje gnod sbyin dmang ba snyed// oMr+g+haM bid+hik+Sha le drang muH// byung tshogs dge
220b3(rnying rgyud): kun de yis bcing // rdo rje rtse mo'i nga rgyal gyis// khwa riri bo degs ltar bya// oM badz+ra ti 'a dwe ru Ta ma Ta// mAM yi phyogs su bgags brjed ngo // rdo rje las kyi rgyal gyis// khu tshur gnyis brji ng+ge mthig mi bsngol// mthe'u zung la ta mdzub mo bzlas/
220b4(rnying rgyud): o hUM badz+ra kAH/ rdorje rabs bskor bar byas ma// rdo rje seng mo bcwam byas nas// oM rbu badz+ra d+hA // phyi rol du rje dra mag bas ma// dzA rdza las kyi rgyal gyis// de nid byin phyag rgya dang// oM badz+ra d+ha thA sa ne+e b+he// de las rdo rje rgya gram bkod//
220b5(rnying rgyud): lus ngag yid kyi bya ba rnams// ma lus rdzogs par ldan byas nas// srung badz+ra yan lag rim bzhin 'grub// de nas mkha' la 'khor lo bsam// mchod pa'i lha rnams rang las sprul// yan lag bcu mos kun mnyes bya// rten yul de dag
220b6(rnying rgyud): la bsdu// nam smin phung po 'od kyis sbyang // bsod rnams mthar thag de la dmigs// de nas ye shas tshogs bsgom gyur// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// ye shes lnga dang spyir ta bsgom// rjes le rten la ga' la meng khyang // 'byung ba'igan/
220b7(rnying rgyud): dang bcos la bsgom// de nas so sa'i rigs kyi gangan// gang ltar bsngags pa de bzhin pasam// de la lha rnams rgyu dang rkyen// thabs dang yan lag ngag gis dbyung // gsum gsum bzhi dang gsum dang mu// ku rdzogs cho ga yan lag yin//
221a1(rnying rgyud): de la gsal brtan dmigs pa bya// ye shes lha rnams de bzhin dgug/ bar snang khams dang gzhal yas khang // chos bdun drug gis da mnyes bya// de nas ma lus bslab bya klung // sdom pa dang na dam chog gzug
221a2(rnying rgyud): mchod brjod bshags dang phrin las bcol// bzod pa'i yul dang nyes pa bshags// dus rnams kun tu mnyes par bya// de nas rang gi gnas su gshegs// bkra shis smon lam chen po gdab// de yi dge ba mthar thug sngo// de nas bsam gyis
221a3(rnying rgyud): mikhyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su bslab// phrin las bzhi la dus spar dmigs// phyi nang gsang dang mangs pa'i// srid pa zhi ba chos nyid snang // ma lus khams dang rigs dang dro// bas mang nyon mongs yang dag brjod// rnam shes yul
221a4(rnying rgyud): dang tsas pa dang // phung po rnam grol rigs kyi sgra// las dang kha dog ye shes gzugs// phrin las gdul bya'i khyad par las// ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dag gis// bla med lam la yang dag gnas// rgyu 'bras lnga dang drug la sbyar// zhes bshad dang
221a5(rnying rgyud): rtswa dang sbas pa'o// yan lag bshad pa'i bskong yin// zhing chen po'i yan lag gi// khyad par bshad pa'i la'u'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gang du 'dod chags rnam dag pa'i// skyes bu gdul ba'i don gyi phyir// zhi ba'i lam gyi rnal
221a6(rnying rgyud): dang // rim pa bzhin tu bkang stsal pa// thog mar 'jig rten thun mong ste// rjes su theg pa la zhugs bya// de nyid las kyang khyad par du// bsam pa che la rab tu sbyar// de bzhin du ni rab tu dpag/ sngon du song bcas rnal 'byor bzhis// brgya
221a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim pa de mthar dbyung // brtan cing gnas pa dang po las// de nyid shes par bya ba'i yul// lus la brten pa'i phung po dang // khams dang skye mched 'gyur ba rnams// rigs brgya lnga dang bzhi bcu gnyis// gsum dang gcig tu bsrub dag
221b1(rnying rgyud): grangs gas pa sa gsung zab // dang nga nga bzlas par 'gyur// rnams sems ti nga 'ang // mabyar thag dang na thal pa dang // sgyu masazla' pham la rlab// dalas dbang bskar yangs rdzogs nas// rang ba zhin mi dgas pa snang bar zang
221b2(rnying rgyud): tad sbed dang de la sogs// gnyis sra snad pa dbyer med pas// zang du 'jug pa rtogs par 'thar// mi slobs pa ring ba cwa rdzogs// de ltar dpyugs bshang lam gyinam// yan lag phyogs gcig tsa nyid las// tha de bram tshogs pa ma na
221b3(rnying rgyud): d+hi bar bstan pa las// khams kyi mngon pa skyed daphung po yang // gdus rtsa dang pags pa dang // swa dang drim skya rus dang // khwa bi rdim dang khrag rnas // rnag zhagang ngasrabs bshang dang gas// mchis maklad pa snang par dang /
221b4(rnying rgyud): t+ye sba khal long mkhris lgang ba// khro rting mtshar pa po ba dang // bad kan srin pa phyed nga nang // skra dang ba s+tha sa mo dang // mag dang yan lag nying mag sogs// snang ba'i phreng po khams skye bcang // lhan cig gnas pa phung po pad// phrad pa
221b5(rnying rgyud): des dang brtab dang // ma rig pag chags sring len rgyun// nyon mongs sogs ni bsags las byung // rje bde lnga phung 'di dag ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas ldang shes bya// skye mched sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// sa nA me thung stong pa nyid// rkye
221b6(rnying rgyud): gros dkar sgrol mkha' dbyings// rtse dngag ceg dang gsam kyis 'azlas// khyad par rigs brgya dang zab yang // gzugs nyid rnam par snang bad dmes// bye brag ring thung phra slo ba sogs// gyi nang gnyis sdang la sogs pa// de 9
221b7(rnying rgyud): na no// ngag ga ga mig pa 'jung // ba kyi mi zangs// mingang du khad ba sa// dgas ye ga nga bgyu // bar tha ring byed byung gadrug 'a//
222a1(rnying rgyud): bad kan rlung sogs rin chen 'byung // mtha' yas kyi na bde bar mar// sdug bsngal tshar ba don grub yin// btang snyoms rnam par snang mdzad do// 'du shes phung po mtha' yas gaH// mi bskyod dang gnyis par
222a2(rnying rgyud): 'du shes// bzhi pa rin chen 'byung ba'o// rnam med 'od dpag med pa yin// mang por snang ba don grub ste// g.yo med rgyu bral rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin 'du byed don grub gzugs// khyad par rnam sbyang lus 'du byed// ngag ge snang ba 'od dpag
222a3(rnying rgyud): med// yid ni mi bskyod pa yi gzugs// khams kyi 'du byed rin 'gyung ste// thar pa don yod grub pa'o// rnam shes mi bskyod pa yin te// mig dang rna ba sde dang lce// lus kyi rnam par shes tshogs kun// snang mdzad rin chen 'od dpag
222a4(rnying rgyud): med// don yod mi bskyod rang gi gzugs// 'di dag gtso 'khor yab kyi dngos// dang po sum cu nyid du 'gyur// khams kyi dbye bar snang ba yang // lci zhing srabs rten byed sa// bud+d+ha lo tsa nyid yin no// brlan dang gsher bas rab tu sdud//
222a5(rnying rgyud): chu yi khams ni mA ma kI// tsha dro sprin zhing skem byed pa// me ni gos dkar ma yi khams// bskyod 'degs rngub dang 'byung ba dag/ yang dang g.yo byed sgrol ma'i khams// go 'byed yangs pa'i yon tan ni// stong nyid mkha' dbyings kun tu bzang //
222a6(rnying rgyud): rus pa sgra dang bshang ba dang // sgying dang mchin pa rnam snang mdzad// sru dang sen mo nA gA rin 'byung // so dang lpags sha 'od dpag med// rgyas pa rtsi ba rus don yod grub// dri ma rgyu mkhris mi bskyod pa// nang gi khams lnga'i dbye ba ni// ri rab rnam
222a7(rnying rgyud): sdang mdzad byin rlabs// shar lho nub byang gling bzhi yang // rim bzhin rigs kyi byin rlabs yin// de dag phyi yaMs khams so// chu kha mas mA ma kI yaM gzugs// bad ka na mchi ma rnam snang mdzad// gcin rdul khrag dang / bachu dag/ rga
222b1(rnying rgyud): rim byin gyis rlabs pa'i rigs// phyi rol rgya mtsho rnam snang mdzad// 'bab chu chu bo bkod ma dang // lteng ka rnams kyis rigs bzhir 'gyur// gos dkar mo nyid me khams la// mgo bo me drod rnam snang mdzad// snying ga lte ba yan lag dang //
222b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i me rnams so sor ris// rdo las byung ba'i gtso bo ste// rgyan bzhag me shel gtsub shing dang // nags kyi me yis phyi yi rigs// rlung khams sgrol ma'i khams rang bzhin// khyab byed rlung ni gtso bos bsdus// srog 'dzin mthur 'byin tu
222b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // me mnyam rim pa'i byin rlabs gnas// steng 'og dbus rlung gtso bo ste// phyogs bzhi rang gi rigs phyi rol// kun bzang mkha' dbyings phyi nang gi// stong pa lnga dang phyogs lngar shes// skye mched sems dpar sbyar ba yang // mig
222b4(rnying rgyud): gri skye mched snga'i snying po// de la rigs kyi lngar phye ba// snying po dag ni mi bskyod mthing // sir nag rin 'byung me'i rang bzhin// 'bras dkar chu ni 'od dpag med// g.yo 'gyur rlung ni don grub po// gzugs snang 'dzin byed rnam snang la// rang
222b5(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs pa'i skye mched lnga// rnab phyag na rdo rje ste// phra rags gzugs ni mi bskyod pa// gtsod gyur rang bzhin rnam snang mdzad// bu ga mtha' yas 'od dpag med// g.yo byed rtsa ni don yod grub// sgra rnams 'dzin byed ri ni 'byung ngo //
222b6(rnying rgyud): sa yi skye mched nam mkha'i snying // phru gzugs rang bzhin nang dbus dang // sna bug dri 'byed rim bzhin du// mi bskyod rnam sdang rin 'byung dang // don grub mtha' yas rang byin rlabs// lce yi skye mched 'jig rten dbang // gzugs dang
222b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin rtsa ba dang // gtso mo ro yi khyad 'dzin rnams// shar dbus lho nub byang gi gtso// sgrib pa rnam se la lus skye mched// ngo bo rus pa sha dang lpags// reg snang lnga ni snang mdzad de// lho nub byang shar rim pa dag/ yid kyi skye mched 'jam
223a1(rnying rgyud): drapal te// lus la brtan pa'i rnam shes chags// kun gyi bdag dang phral du gyur// kye dang dang dang gyur ba ni// dbang po yul dang sgrom ched rnams// thad chub sems dpa dkyil 'khor ro// gzugs smra dang ga
223a2(rnying rgyud): yul rnams// lnga dang bcu'i rlung rang bzhin// srogasel gyen su mnyam khrab byed// lha rnams yang dag nges par bya// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag tshul// dang po phung po la brtin spyod// gnyis pa rnams ni dbang por gnas// m+b+hi drung nang gi las kun
223a3(rnying rgyud): bAslab// rdza ba gsum ni rten bcas shing // kun gyi rnam shes mya lus gnas// srog 'don tshul d+ha rtag par gyu// dang po srog gi rlung zhes bya// ba shang gci khra ba khrag 'og rlung // zur du 'dren sel de nyid do// dbang po'i sgo dang yan lag
223a4(rnying rgyud): gri// rgyor reg la sogs mnyam gnas te// za'i thung smra sogs stong du 'byin// 'gro zhing sdod bskyod gyen khyer grags// khyab 'dzin 'gro ldog tshogs kun gnas// de la khyab byed rlung ngu bshad// shar sogs dbus gtso rang bzhin gnas
223a5(rnying rgyud): snyi zhog ma lte ba dang // tshigs rnams la ni rab tu brten// yan lag rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // ldad kya mig gi skye mched la// sdang ba sgrib bral yid yul mthong // rol dang 'gying bag sgeg nyams bcas// rjes su chags dang
223a6(rnying rgyud): ma spor// drug dang mi sdug 'i tang snyoms gzugs// kyai nang byed pa'i las kun bsgrub// dbus shar nas brtsams rim bzhin gitso// nA N+ya sgra ste rna ba'i yul// 'ur 'ur mgo dang sgra 'byin dang // rtag par rgyuni s+kha glu dang du//
223a7(rnying rgyud): ma brjod pa ga nas su // dra ning lag dang ral mo sogs// phrin las bzhi yi 'arjod spyod ga/ sri tso 'gyur rim pa sngar bzhin no// sgra yi skye mched yang dag // ma lus dri dang yan lag rje// kun 'dzin nang gi bri zas ni// khyed par
223b1(rnying rgyud): dri dag mi bgyod pa// gzhan dag dbus lho nub byang rim// lce yi rnam shes rab tu su// mngar kha bskra dang lan tshwa tshe rim gyi// dngos rgyu lus kyi yon tan te// bstan nas 'khrung dang sgo reg dang // rngub dang gnyis rab sbyor ba yis// gnas rnams/
223b2(rnying rgyud): gsum dang dbu ma'i gnas// dbus lho nub byang shar sogs kyis// go rim gyis ni yul lnga yin// ye shes lnga yis rab phyeb// rten gsum dag ci dgrol ba la// rnam rtog bag chags ma lus sbyangs// chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes so//
223b3(rnying rgyud): po ma lus gzugs brtan bzhin// cig char snang shes me long 'dra// khams gsum bsam pa snod bcud tshogs// sems rtogs rang du mnyam de nyid// dus gsum phyi nang chos kyi dngos// ji bzhin ma 'dres rtogs pa de// rang bzhin sgo//
223b4(rnying rgyud): gsum las rdzogs spyod// ma lus grub pa'i ye shes te// rang gi rigs las byung ba yi// de bas phung po skye mched khams// gtso bos byin brlab so so'i rigs// yum dang sems dpa' lha mo dang // sems ma thub pa sgo srung ste//
223b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i rIk+Sha ni rnam brgya ste// phung po skye mched yul dang bcas// khams lnga 'byung bzhi rnam dag pa// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// phung po de nyid rigs lnga ste// lus ngag yid ni sku gsung thugs// rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang // gsang
223b6(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i rigs gcig go// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs rnam lnga la// khyad par shas che gnyen po ni// rnam dag phyag rgya'i tshig bsgrub ste// zhib bslab mchog kha ba kang yin// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar rnal 'byor lus kyi lha// nges pa
223b7(rnying rgyud): snang tho' gyur nas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // 'byung bzhi rnam shes yul dang bcas// dngos grub kun gyi thun mong ru// lha dang stong pa rnal 'byor gsum// rags pa las ni phrar gyur pa// ngag gi sgra dang rdo rje yis// bzlas
224a1(rnying rgyud): rtags kyid 'o// srog rdzus naseM ma tha bshad// thang ba bdag nga napa// 'ad lnga 'bru 'du pag mad las// kau tug pazhin pa tsu smram// dpa sa myags pa// sagasu ngas kya
224a2(rnying rgyud): gang ma// 'od dang bdug deng 'gro ba la// mgrin pa snying ga stegasang gnas// steng du 'gro la sogs pa dag/ dbugs las rig pa nyi shu wa// bsdus pa'i gzugs brtan steng sgo lngas// rdza dang ba sogs kyi dang dang // byang chubasams
224a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la gnas// 'gro rnams kun gyi rnam shes ten// rtsa ba yan lag lnga dang bcu// yul gsum g.yas g.yon dbus la gnas// las bzhi la sogs gsum gyis spyod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das sdang ba// ma lus dbugs so/
224a4(rnying rgyud): rnaMmA sa kI// rtsa ba nyid kyis byin gyis pa rlabs// nam mkha' dang mnyams bon te// bdag ting nge 'dzin la sogs// spangs pa'i dngos grub dam pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' grol/ 'od ldani gzhal med khang du bzhugs/
224a5(rnying rgyud): da cad zed gang shA // badz+ra ma ga sa nga kya par byed/ nga mer sgra yang dag so// nga thud pa / ma byung ga /
224a6(rnying rgyud): rmongs spyod bsam mi khyab// gzhal med khang par gnas pa'i lha// rten gyid pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin bzhugs// 'og sgo pad+ma bzhi dbus na// gsang gnas rin chen 'byung ldan te// steng 'gro bcu gnyis pa
224a7(rnying rgyud): me sar// 'od dpag med pa'i ngo bo nyid// don gru bajug du rtsa bzhi dbus// snyoms mdzod me yi rang bzhin no// khyab gnas phyi rol yan lag brten// rnam snang mdzad pa de bzhin no// 'gro ba zhes bya gzugs la spyod// rnam 'gro rdza
224b1(rnying rgyud): sa s+ho// na/ nan/
224b2(rnying rgyud): pa gsum dubyed// gzhas med/ khang gi steng sgrol// rlung mes dang chu rang bzhin// rang rang gi ni 'phro byed bzhi// g.yas nas rjod bcas skyed 'og dmer// pad+ma rigs kyi bzlas pa yin// g.yon na snyoms byed dbugs dang bcas// 'od zer
224b3(rnying rgyud): ljang sums rigs zlos// thun mong 'og 'gros yig wa~M// rin chen rigs kyi 'od bar smros// rin chen shel bag dkar po'i 'od// mau bskyod rang bzhin bzlas pa yin// khyab chen kun 'a rten pa dang // rten bcas kun tusnang mdzad zlos//
224b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu spad pa'i dus// don gnyis mthar phyin gnas par bya// 'gro ba'i bzhon pa de nyid shes// sngags zhes bya ba gnyis pa ste// ji ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // yi ge sgra yi brjod pa dag/ lnga bcu'i yan lag kun
224b5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang // rtsab ma phyes gcig yin te// ma bcos pa las gsum du 'gyur// bamal pa la 'gro 'ong nas// dang po'i las la yang dag gzugs// gzhi yis sems can khams bskyed cing // lam rdzogs drilal gyi nang 'gro//
224b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin grub pa'i bzla ba gsum// nyon mongs kun srung phrin las spyod// oM AHhUM/ dus gsum thams cad 'di la gas la// gnas dang rab tu byed pa la// dang po'i thunal lnga yin te// gnyis pa nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas// gsum la
224b7(rnying rgyud): brgya gnyis nyi shu skar// bzhi pa la ni dgu brgyaste// lnga pa nye blo tshig stong dang // drug brgya nag gcig dga' ba zlas// 'di ni shin tu phra ba'i lam// bkon par bcas te phrin las 'grub// gsung tshig ma lus 'di yis rlos// ngas
225a1(rnying rgyud): gnal byang rdzogs 'dad pa'o// pam bya bgang bshad par// / de nas pa ga dang 'angan// dusags sa spangs thas thams ste// sa na mjog pa rab dgangs gang // dmacho gangs kyi brlab pa banan
225a2(rnying rgyud): lnga'i dam tshig wA yi dngos// ye shes la rdzogs thub pa'i rdzas// sra brgyad yan lag stong dang bcas// gyi nang gsang ba'i de nyid las// rang bzhin spyad dang bslabs las byung // phan dang nus mthu dpag med kyang // tham la rnam /
225a3(rnying rgyud): badragyur te// dngos su spyad par ma nus pa// dzi dang kha dog ro bsgyur phyir// rtsa ba lnga las yan lag go// cham thun kyal blon 'khor rnams kyis// dbye ba bcu ba rab sbyar te// khrol bu skye mgrong bu la// nga yi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis/
225a4(rnying rgyud): na gyis brlabs te rtags phyung ba// bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod yon tan yin// rang bzhin gnas pa'i yon tan la// longs sbyor sgo nas bsrub pa ni// spyi dang bye brag so so ste// dang po rten gyi gang zag ni// nga yis rab bstan mtshan nyi
225a5(rnying rgyud): khyad par bla ma mnyes byas shing // dbang rdzogs thob cing nga mtshig ldan// lha dang mkha' 'gro nyer gnas pa// srub 'byor lus srog gtong phod cing // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus ldan pas bsdam// 'byung bzhi'i rus pa rgyas shing
225a6(rnying rgyud): 'phe'// ston zla gsum ni dus kyi mchog/ dka' thub brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang // grub pa mchog brnyes rnam snang rgya// rang dang bla mkha bskang ba// don grub byang chub sems kyi kyu// ma dang sring mo bu mo drang // mtshan nyid kun ldan
225a7(rnying rgyud): snang mtha' yas// gnas bdun pa dang bu chung dang // mtshan nyid kun ldan rin 'byung yin// sangs rgyas yab yum rang nyid dang // gzhon nu lo brgyad ma chad rnams// mi bskyod bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin no// grogs ni mngar gsum che ba gsum//
225b1(rnying rgyud): bzang drug 'bras bu gsum da // yung bslang kyis rgod shun// kar ga pur khye'u ro tshan// khyi gung kar mig ma bye'i sha/ sa rtog bong nga skyer bar shun// bsre ru brag zhun par pa ta// ser thig sro lo At+pa la sngon// de dag sbyar zhing bstsu
225b2(rnying rgyud): skadan// rims nad dug neng khrag nad sel// bdud rtsi tsong zhi brag zhun dang // ba lu'i lo mtsha ba gsum// se 'bug can gzan sha sbyar te// bsnyungs shing lhud na mchin nad sa la// bdud rtsi cong zhi sdig srin dang // se 'bru sug phre
225b3(rnying rgyud): rnanas rnasapa 'i hrI pa po'o// 'ad nga shA nga// gang stsu byung chu dang/ 'o/ napa bas// bka ba shAs/ skye sgrubs pa sa ma sa
225b4(rnying rgyud): mtshe 'bras zo sha sbyar sha sros// sbyar zhing bkrus na kha spu dang // smin ma skye bar byed pa yin// bong 'bras bong nag spang btsir khu// / byi nag phag nag brun mu zi// ka ra si la sman thad chu rnams// chu grang gis sbyangs bkrus shing spyad//
225b5(rnying rgyud): 'brum bu'i nad rnams thub cing sel// bdud rtsi dang ni tsha ba gsum// gnag rgod mkhris pa bya rgod tshil// mar rnying dang sbyar zhag dgur bsrub// ril bu byas te rtag tu bsten// grang bas mi tshugs gos su 'gyur// bdud rtsi bya dang sgong rtsi dang // ru
225b6(rnying rgyud): zi zla rtsi drod gsum tsha// mar rnying dang sbyar zhag gsum bsgrub// rtags phyin rkang la byugs pa na// sa chu grang lcags kyis mi tshugs// bdud cigaser srang drug cu bzhi// mang srid de dang mnyam par sbyar// ru rta bcu drug srang dang mnyam/
225b7(rnying rgyud): bzang dug sres brgyad 'bras gsum mnyam// zla ba bcu bsrub longs spyad na// gang mi gyogs dngos grub rted per 'gyur// bdud rtsi drug lhar byang ba'i shar// ro thal zangs lcags rdo phye dang // wa sbyang mdze khrag sha rus rnams// shang
226a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ yungs kar nag/ kya gram lam dang rtswa 'grams// gangs dang ram tha mchod tanas// dro lcags rin chen lnga wa phye// ldong ros grwaN+Di sha tshu la zan// rta bong su ma tshor ma'i shing // zer gu gul dkar rtag dang /

226a5(rnying rgyud): drug/ tsha 'bras drug ni longs spyod stobs// sbyor ba mthar gyi mab+hang par du// g+ha tsi mu bri shing kun tshal// pre tsho ti tse seng phrom dang // mgron thal che'i rkyen yungs kar dang // bdud rtsi sbyar te zhag bdun du// bsnyen na klu gdug gdon

227a2(rnying rgyud): mar khaHlde gu dang // gong bu bcud len la sogs pa// dri ro nus pa'i stobs bsdus pa// 'u su lkog sgyu mar rnams te// dang po gnyis pa mdar gsum yin// nus pa tshagasum rtsa ba lnga// spyir spyad rtsa brgyad yan lag stong // dkyil 'khor
227a3(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i thang par gyis// bslabs pa'i khyad par 'bras bu ni// gtsang sme dang bral longs spyod nus// thun mong 'dra zhing khyad par rdzogs// rtsu ba chen po'i sgrub pa yin// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub thabs ni// rtsab rgyu yi khyad par las// mi ta
227a4(rnying rgyud): khyi dang bya la sogs// srog chags che phra gang rung ba'i// byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba dang // gshegs lam bzhugs gnas 'bras bu dang // chu ba tshil dang rkang mar dang // thal kar rdo rje mtshan ma dang // cong zhi brag zhun la sogs rnams//
