231a1(rnying rgyud): te khangs TI kAs// ma lus snang ba de yis brgyag// 'am chung drug dang lda dag dang // khams gsum khyab pa d+ma ji skad bya// bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil ba khor 'dus// dang sa dang bro yi yul du bslab// snga ma dag gis rim bstan nas/
231a2(rnying rgyud): kyi mde bzhin spong pa ni// rim gyis gnas pa'i bsrub chen po// bco brgyad dang ni bzhi bcu gnyis// lnga bcu drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi// so sor yang ni bdag gi lus// phung po lnga ni phyi dang nang // rnam shes brgyad ni yul dang bcas// 'byung bzhi 'du shes brnyas
231a3(rnying rgyud): brdzus pa'i// de dag ngo bo so sor bsgom// phyi rol dbang po'i yul dang bcas// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi bdag/ rnam shes skye mamed yan lag dang // nying lag sha dang khrag la sogs// don snying snod bcas rang gi dngos// de dag tshul las mi
231a4(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba'i// rab tu spros pa grangs med mthang // slob pa lus kyi rim pa ste// de dang rje'i mthun sgra dang skad// rtog pa smra brjod de bsgrub pa// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hrI// badz+ra he ru ka zhes nas// g+han+d+ho ho yi bar dag tu// sngon 'gro 'jug dang bcas te sbyar/
231a5(rnying rgyud): lha dang mthun pa'i zhag grangs su// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// gla gar phyag rgya shes rab dang // thabs su sbyor ba byang chub sems// lus ngag yid kyi brda la sogs// longs spyod kun ldan mchod par bya// bsnyen pa sngon song bslab pa ba
231a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor che dang rdzogs pa yi// rnal 'byor dag gi tshul bzhin bya// dang por brtags pa'i gnas dag tu// lus kyi cha mnyam gcig gam gnyis// phyi nang nus dang sbyar la gzugs// tshul du nges pa bzhin du bri// sku
231a7(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// yo byad gsum du cha dgos te// mchod sbyin bsngo ba'i yul dang sbyar// 'jigs byed pho brang dkyil 'khor bskyed// phyogs sbyor dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// yab yum nyi shus gdan du gzir // bar du gcod pa de bzhin
231b1(rnying rgyud): bsal// thun mong mchog gi bsrung ba brtsam// phyi dang nang du 'dzin pa bzlog/ rutu chen po tshul bzhin mnan// dbab dang bca' dang bshags pa dag/ nga yis sngang bshad bzhin du brtsam// 'khor lo// byams dang sgo rnams la// rigs bzhi yum dang bcas/
231b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // masring bcu drug pho nya bzhi// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor de lus la// sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rab gi dril bu yis// yab yum gnas su rgyas gdab cing // tshogs pa gsum gyis gang bsngag
231b3(rnying rgyud): ba// rigs lngal d+hi nyi shu lnga// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rdzogs tshul di bzhin par// bskyed dang dgug gzhug rim pas bstan// bzlas brjod 'phro 'du'i bsnyen pa yis// de bzhin bsgrub pa dag la yang // bskul dang bsdu ba dag
231b4(rnying rgyud): la yang // smra ba'i skyon bcu bral ba yis// 'bar 'phro gsal 'bar nus shes bya// gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang 'od // so so'i yul la de nyid bstim// dngos grub dang ni bar chad brtag/ de nyid bzlog pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// 'byung chen bzhi yi las la gyur//
231b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang thugs rje las byung ba'i// byin rlabs kyis ni yul rnams kun// chos nyid zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnyis med thabs kyis ma lus bskal// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// sgyu ma'i tshul du gzhan la snang // byas dang grub pa gang yang
231b6(rnying rgyud): med// ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin la// bya dang byed pa kun dang bral// bdag nyid don rtogs de bsgral bya// mtshan ma'i rtog pa ma lus kun// phyir gyur sdang ba kun las bzlog/ bsgom bzlas bsgyur ba'i goms stobs kyis// brtse ba dang bcas
231b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi don// rnal 'byor tsam du de bshad do// dad pa dbang dang 'brel pa yis// lam gyi rtsa ba de nyid las// gsang ba chen po'i dbang bzhin du// rjes su bstan pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ byin gyis rlabs kyi khyad par ni// gyi nang yon tan mtshan nyid
232a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rang byed brnab pa'i sa pa can// snod bzung rdzas gas ting 'dzin ldan// mas pa'i 'dun pa zer g.yos pa// de nyid dbang phyug rdzogs gyung nas// ngardal gsum dang bcas pa las// dzarnga pa mnyam stong drang
232a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi yon tan spros// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// mnyes pa mchog gi mchod pa spar// tshul mthun lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// gnas drang bcas pa'i dga' ba bzhi// 'khor lo dang bcas gus la byas te// sbyangs shing bzod
232a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa dang lam// sku dang ye shes 'bras bur bcas// rtags rnams srog dang rten gyis sbyar// lnga dang bcu sogs nyi shu lnga// brgya phrag gnyis dang ldar de bzhin// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bar// 'gro ldog ldog cing gsal ba rnams// dbu ma
232a4(rnying rgyud): gsum du nges par 'du// rang bzhin yon tan gsum gyis brgyan// 'dam skyes gnyis 'byung sgra stobs ldan// dpe yi chos mthun skye bar 'gyur// bsdam bya sdom par byed pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de// dpe don rtags kyis sbyar byas
232a5(rnying rgyud): nas// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// sa chen nyi shu rtsa gcig gi// yon tan dag dang ldan par gzhug/ rnam shes tshogs dang yul rnams kun// 'od gsal dang du snyoms 'jug cing // phyi srog dbu mar
232a6(rnying rgyud): gzhug pa la// gnas pa che chung brgyad kyis mtshon// yon tan gsum nyid shas che chung // cha mnyam skye ba'i mtshan nyid dbye// tha dad dam tshig tshogs par sbyar// rnam par mi rtog ci nus bslab// bzlog gzung bcas pa sngon du sbyar// bla ma
232a7(rnying rgyud): ma mtshungs ldan pas// yon tan mtshan ma de nyid ni// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// rjes su slob ma de nyid kyang // yum dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis// lus kyi 'khor lo byin dbang cing // chags dang rjes chags yul rnams la// dpa' mo'i dkyil
232b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor nges par brtag/ dga' dang skye dga' mchog tu dga'// bral ba dang ni skad cig bzhi// rnam par bstod sogs de dag la// chas dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // bde chen zag med dam pa bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi la rim bzhin dbab// dpa
232b2(rnying rgyud): dang bsgril dang gzung dang bzlog/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba brtsam// ma lus thabs dang shes rab dang // mnyam pa nyid du rab tu sbyor// phung po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lngar sbyor// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ma mo ste/
232b3(rnying rgyud): yul brgyad phra men brgyad du spor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo bzhi// 'du shes bcu ni khro bcung sbyor// bde 'gro'i yon tan ma lus mthong // dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med lam// rnal 'byor rig pa'i ngang du spod// mnyam pa nyid du bsgom 'ang gas
232b4(rnying rgyud): goms pa mthang zin pang rjed med// gsang ba thabs dang shes rab dbang // tron 'gro shes rjes tshul du 'brel// bskyed rim bsgom dang mtshan rdzogs dang // tha da me pa'i mnyam stong dang // rang dag nges pa dag gis ni// dbang bzhi'i lam dungs pa
232b5(rnying rgyud): la// smin par byed pa'i gzhi yin te// rjes su spyod pa mtha' dag gis// lam spyad rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// lus kyi khog pa gzhal yas khang // don snying rigs lnga yab yum ste// snod drug sha khrag drod dbugs dang // dbang po mig
232b6(rnying rgyud): sogs rnam shes rlung // rtsa dang bcas pa ma lus dang // skul tshigs yan lag nying lag ni// lha tshigs dum bu ma lus rnams// gtso dang 'khor gyi tshul du mthong // bdag ci 'dra bar de bzhin gzhan// smra ma rmi lam bzhin du mnyam// lus
232b7(rnying rgyud): ngag yid kyis dben gyur pa'i// sgyu ma'i sku de bsam gtan gyi// bye brag spyod pa dang bcas pas// 'od gsal stong nyid la gnas te// rang gzhan mngon sum gyur pa la// rtog pa che 'bring tha ma'i dus// snang ba rags dang bar ma dang // thim
233a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim kyis pa ba dag/ sde 'gur yang na mi bri srid// lus sems snang ba gan sa mang 'ang // rten dang rten pa bangs pas// 'du sa dum lus rgyug d+hA gsal// sgru bad+ha dmyangs dang thug yinaH// ngan dpyog pan
233a2(rnying rgyud): nyid// mnyam nyid mya ngan 'das dgongs te// theg pa spyi gco dang btu brjod// ye shes rang la snang ba ni// 'od gsal don gyi mchog yin te// sru dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// rang gzhan dron gyi rtsol ba spangs// 'khor bar rtog da
233a3(rnying rgyud): ngani 'das// dbyer med zung du 'jug pa la// he ru ka dpal zhes su brjod// srid zhi chag bral mya ngan 'das// dpal 'bar kr-i d+hI shwa rI ma// rtsa ba yan lag de bzhin no// sngon du gnas pa bzhi yin te// khyad par bstan pa lca ma yin no// spyod
233a4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pam zhes bya// bsngags thob rten gyur de nyid sku// ma lus mnor gsal ba ni// de yi ye shes chen po yin// smon lam thugs rje'i stobs srad pa// phrin las mdzad pa'i tshul yin no// rang bzhin gyis ni yang dag do// sa lam tshul du grub
233a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu chos sku gcig pu nyid// gzugs su sangs rgyas bde chen 'dus// yon tan rnal 'byor zab mo ni// sku gsum dang du rtogs pa yin// gzhi ni mkha' 'gro sgyu ma skye// bde mchog bde bar gyur pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod par rung
233a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis// the tshom med par spyad pa las// byis pa so so'i skye bo dang // theg pa dman la gzhol rnams kyis// mthong thos 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// de bas myur du bgrod pa'i lam// 'di tshe sangs rgyas bsgrub bu pa// sku gsums la ba
233a7(rnying rgyud): byung // mdor thugs kyi bsrub pa la// rim gnyis dbang bzhis bsdus pa'i lam// 'bras bu dang bcas mthar thug tshul// / bskong dag tu bshad pa yin// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa po// rin chen dbyings kyi rgyal po de// rang gi rigs
233b1(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang drug s+ho// 'khong lo bani las tha ma'i las// 'khrul zhing 'khor b.rab tu 'arjod// yab lag ljin dgrasang bu gsum// tshul ba rtswa dang no 'od zer ba// dra ba zhi rdorje n+ya tham dz+hal// gnang sabus 'bru da paslang 'gros so// dang ba ma
233b2(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis ba zhi// ya ma dngas do me ya// mo yi mo g.yon sa dog nang // mo yi pho g.yas gnam lteng gyi// pho yi gnyis las pho yi mo// ya ma rA dzas k+She ya// g.yon la 'og nang rnam grangs so// pho yi pheM g.yas gnam ste phyi// ni
233b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas g.yon la dbang drag g.yas// pho mo so sor bskor bar bya// 'khrul lugs bzhi la pho mo ba'i// don gyis tshang ba de nyid do// phyi nang gas ma gnyis yin te// bsnyen bsgrub las spyor dbye ba dang // phyi nang gsung ba'i bdag nyid do// dang nga
233b4(rnying rgyud): dam bcas pa ni bsnyen pa'o// de yidags byin bsgrub pa ste// dngos grub sha dang bdud rtsi'i rdzas// ma lus longs spyod ldan pa dang // gzigs brtan la ni sku gzugs bkod// gsang ba nang gi gsang ba gsum// khri phrag re nges dngos grub
233b5(rnying rgyud): blangs// the tshom som nyi med par sprad// gnyis pa khyad par las sbyang ba// dkyil 'khor dbus su e gu gsum// sum brtseg bris te sted zung la// skyed bu gsum la ga'u bzhag/ 'khor lo legs bris nag por sba// phyi nang gsang bu'i
233b6(rnying rgyud): ma bzhir// so so rang gi las la sbyar// khyad par bsnyen bsgrub pos spyod la// 'ju rgyad g.yon bskor ba spen pa ste// bzhi snying gcig trail bsnyen bsgrub yin// g.yas bskor baspen pa'i las sbyor ro// bsnyen pasgrub gsum sbar spyir
234a1(rnying rgyud): nyid// rlung gi bslab pa bcu btun pa// bsrub pa'i bsnyen pa dag 'gyur// dang po sa so rtoga'o// yam med btu bdun// bsgrub pa'i yang ni bsgrub pa yin// yam da ba bdun pa// g.yas bdar 'gyu /
234a2(rnying rgyud): nga ro// las rim kun la de ba'in sbyar// las spyong nyid la dbye ba ni// 'bru deng bdun lagayon bskor bas// las la spong ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nyid g.yas bskod las bsgrub pa'i// dam tshig pa gcig phyag matsun ni// las kyi sa
234a3(rnying rgyud): pa yin// 'a tshul bcu yi bye brag ni// bzhi snying dri la dang so sor kye// drang po rtsa badril ba dang // las k+Sh+mI kha kong dril ba las// rtsa ba bzhi snying gcig dril pa// zlog me brgyad gcig dril ba ni// ya ma d+hi dzas do ma ya// yA me do ru
234a4(rnying rgyud): ya / ninA yA// zhes pas rtsa ba brgyad las ni// sumra d+hu rtsa gnyis dril ba yin// bdun bzhigacig tu de la ba ni// ya ma dngas dom// ya mo dorba ta yod// yad yon ya N+De// ya

234b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba bcu las zin dgu// yi ge zad pa gcig ste bcu// bdun bskyod g.yas g.yon du bzhi ste// bdun bskor ya nas me yi bar// ya yi bzlas lcags rdzogs de bzhin// gcig las bdun du 'gyur ba las// nyi ma dang po bzhi bcu dgra// bzlas
234b2(rnying rgyud): pas dang po'i yi ge zad// gnyis pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar// ru bzhi zad pa'i pho brang dbus// ya nyid lnga 'gyur dag tu bzlas// ma med k+She// bzhi bzhir 'gyur bas spyir bcu dgu// de yis dbus kyi lnga zad cing // bI rim nyi ma gnyis pa ste/
234b3(rnying rgyud): man chad gsum la bzhi bzhi ste// nyi ma gsum la bcu gnyis te// dbus mtha' zad pa'i chu bzhi'o// ru gcig nyid la bcu drug tu// bzlas pas bzhi po bzhir 'gyur te// de las ltos pa'i ru bzhi yin// nyi ma gnyis pa'i yi ge res// bcu drug
234b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i drug cu bzhir// 'gyur bas gnyis pa'i yi ge zad// gsum pa bzhi pa de bzhin sbyad// las skabs gnyis zhes bya ba ni// gnam thus dang ni bskur 'gros te// dang po sngar bshad gnyis pa ni// rus sbal lta bur bsdur 'gros te// yam med
234b5(rnying rgyud): k+She/ rA dza sa do/ ru na yo ni/ rA ya tsa ni/ gcig rjes gcig gis gdon la brtag/ 'od zer snang ba rnam brgyad ni// rtsa ba nyi ma shar lta bu// a kro bcu bdun 'khrul lngar khyab// bya rgod gzan la 'dzums lta bu// ya ma yed bcu bdun pa/
234b6(rnying rgyud): gzus pa'i yul la skar mda' bzhin// khyi phun chud pa'i btson bzhin du// dril ba mi gsal kun la khyib// lcags sgrog bcug pa sems gzhungs bzhin// bcu drug kun dang 'brel zhing 'jug/ skyes bu go mtshon bstar ba bzhin// sems dpa'

235a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis byed pang// sa su'i skyugs kyis ma lus gcod// 'od pa brgya kyi na 'phral ston// 'tha dag las gson nyin mtshan du// bzlas pas bzhin pazlabatugs bye drus// phyogs mye sus sa /
235a2(rnying rgyud): sngag khrul mtsho bsdeb bstan pa yang // gzhi dang dngos po thabs 'bras bu// dang po yab yum gyi nang gsang // 'od zer brgyad dang bzlas lugs bcu// du bzhi rdo rje rgya gram ste// lnga lde dag ni bzhi lnga'o// dngos gzhi mo yi mor bsdeb dang //

235a4(rnying rgyud): gsum ste bzlas lugs bcu// gsum pa'i sngags mtsho ba sdeb pa'o// nyi ma bya rgod btson skyes bu// lcags gser thog dang spra gling ze// 'od kyi dpe brgyad rang mchor bsdeb// lnga tshan bzhi dang bzhi tshan bzhis// rdo rje rgya gram du bzhi'i bsdeb/

235b1(rnying rgyud): sangam ya// ya ma do R+tha Na yod ya/ ya mon/ rA yak+She ya/ ya k+She yar+g+ha ni dam sa// yi ge nyi shurtsa brgyad la// su mA drangs dom// ya mo dod+ha Na yod// yang s+yoni da ya De// la Sh+ye ya ni nga// yi ge hi sh+tha rtsa bzhi pa// ya ma rnangs do//

236b2(rnying rgyud): 'breng ba dzo mtsho bsdeb la// ngo bo kun gzhi bag chags dang // bcas pa rnam dag gshin rje gshed// dbyings ring ye shes gnyis med pa'i// chos kyi sku yi dngos yin mod// srog dbugs ma dngas 'phrog ras pa'i chog// de nyid kya

236b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag tu 'khrul pa'o// phyi nang gsang gsum dngos yig bdun// rnam pa gcig po bcu 'dun las// bcu gsum gnyis dang nyi shu brgyad// bcu gnyis gnyis dang bcu bdun no// bzhi po gnyis dang bdun yin te// gsum gnyis sde dang bzhi

236b6(rnying rgyud): sa rje// yan sa je dang ya nas me// de ltar bdun bskor dril pa ni// gnam zlas bzhi snying gcig dril pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag tu 'khrul// ya nas yo dang ya nas do// ya nas yo dang yanas ra// drug drug zug bskor jing ba nI// las kha bzang ste nyer bzhir nga/ bral//

237a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa yin te bzhir 'khrul ba'o// ya man ni shar phyogs kyi// las sdebs bzlas pa gsum du 'khrul// de ltar g.yon gyi bstan bsgrub nas// g.yas kyis gsan cing rnam zhes dpral// bzlog pa g.yas bskor g.yo rjes dpag/ g.yas pa
237a3(rnying rgyud): zing 'grub pa yin// bca' gzhi 'khor lo stegs bu gnyis// gzhi dang gnag smug bskor thabs dang // bsnyen bsgrub gsang sngags tshang bar dkod// dur khrod ro ras legs par btul// snag tsha dug sna tshogs pa dang // mi khyi ru gsum

237b4(rnying rgyud): la ltos nas ru bzhir bshad// de ni 'khor lo bcas pa yi// de nas dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi ni// gnas ni ngur khrod phyi g.ya' dang // shan dmar ri dang chu gling dang // rkang gcig brag nag ri bo dang // de la sogs pa drag por bsgrub// rong
237b5(rnying rgyud): ro zos ro gos sogs// stag gzig ga yi spyang lung sde dang // ce spyang sbrang pu tre la sogs// de dag gnas sar dkyil 'khor bca'// sa ni phung shul dag nas blang // gru gsum rdo rje zla kham la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag gis bskor//

241b1(rnying rgyud): d+h+wang mnyes pa'i las kyis ni// rigs lnga sangs rgyas ye shes lnga// rang bzhin grub pa'i dbang bskur bya// oM ma hA shAn+ya tA dz+nyAn A dan d+hAn/ pra h+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na/ sa man+t+ra dz+nyA na/ kr-i d+hanASh+TA nA dz+nyA na/ badz+ra swa b+hA wA At+ma chu/ de nas la

241b4(rnying rgyud): mchod// bskyod dang bshags sbyang phrin las bcol// byer zhud le lo rab spangs pas// yi dam bcas pa'i bsnyen rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brtan bri// mchod pa bstar te bsgrub pa brtsam// mchog dang thun mong rtags thon nas/
241b5(rnying rgyud): phrin las gang 'dod de dang sbyar// las kyi lhag chad ma lus bskyang // mang nyung rgyun dang dus tshig su// dgongs nyams spyod lam bstan par sbyar// snang sems dbang gi snang ba 'byung // de ni phyi ltar bsgrub pa'o// nang sgrub shes rab ting 'dzin
241b6(rnying rgyud): ldan// bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po'i sku// dngos su gsal rdzogs ngo bo yis// 'jig rten lha srin dregs pa can// rtsol med rang dbang nyid du bsdu// gzugs snang ba dang sgra grag pa// dran rig dbang gi sku gsung thugs// yon tan rdzogs
241b7(rnying rgyud): tedagos 'dod 'gyur// 'gro don phrin las bsam yas pa// bsam pa dang ni smon pas rdzogs// gsung mchog nang du bsgrub pa'o// gsang sgrub dmigs pa'i longs spyod kyis// yon tan ma lus dang la rdzogs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i snang ba'o//
242a1(rnying rgyud): na san gyud do// sa kyi thag// bcos yun 'o dus pa// chos da na 'du// dang dupa su nga brdung ba so// ga do ma par byed zlas da na// dang thos rab
242a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed rdzogs su rdza kyis la byung // ngos med// thab gzhan don thung // 'bras byug zhan da mi btsal te// rang la gnas pa de ny-id miH// gzhan dang rnam 'phrul yan lag+sa te// rang sems bang gi tshul po la// bcos shing bsgrub cag
242a3(rnying rgyud): da mo pa phyag cag tu 'ang sa// doni gyis gos byeda'i rigs// bskyen pa pa yan la gdus pa'i sngags// gtso nga brjod pagasung ba sgrub med// rang dzi ni skyes pa kyi rgyal por// rang dbang ldan grub dang gyi 'o// de
242a4(rnying rgyud): ga/ gtag la ni ba e nyi sa ma yadul hU~M hU~M yang / sbyi nang gsang ba'i khyad pa mas// gdul bu thabs kyi dbya pa gyis// gtsugs daseM las dmigs dang gyur// bcu 'don gyis rgya
242a5(rnying rgyud): ga 'du'o// rtog byed du// rkang brtsams cad byed med// song do kya da pa yin/ bzhin kyi ra / pa sa
242a6(rnying rgyud): nga ni ma cag kyi// dngos grub kyi na// bgrub tid 'dzin pargyam danapa// thod pas sa dod d+hA hrIg // khams gsung dab dra nga balnga ba dang // ma chog rjes sra baphrus pa da // rngam
242a7(rnying rgyud): sa rjod// ba da// srid pas bsgrun pa cing dadags/ sa ngan sa kyi 'i jigasas pa// sog pa de nin songs// thugs pa dang ni thang bod dpar/
242b1(rnying rgyud): dang nom pa'i 'jams kyis// stong pa'i rnyog pa bslus pa ste/ gsung gi bslab pa dpag med kyang // dag gi brda las byung ba ste// ngag gi rgyas la rab tu rten// bskrad pa'i rim pa bkren par bAHsa// skra dang gsung du rje'i te
242b2(rnying rgyud): ba// dgongs pa'i// dazengs gsum lang // spyod pa bsnyen bsgrub gsum sbyar te// rdzogs pa'i rim pa dpe yi chos// 'gros dgu dang ni skad bcu gsum// don rtags mtshon pa dang sbyar ba// sku gsung thugs su dril te bsgrub// gsang sngags
242b3(rnying rgyud): smra bar ba rdzogs nas// dam tshig can rnams bskyal ba dang // dregs pa'i dmag dpung gzhom pa dang // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams gdul ba dang // bskyed rdzogs gsum dang dgongs pa bzhi// rtsa ba yan lag gsung la bsdus// dbang bco
242b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i kha skong bshad// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag/ rab tu sgrub byed bla na med// blo dang ldan la nges par bstan// 'khor ba'i sa la snying brtser bskyed// mya ngan 'das la dgod pa dmigs//
242b5(rnying rgyud): dge bo'i 'bras bu rdzogs par spyad// bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po bsal// dam tshig ldan la phrin las bcol// gnas kyi dam pa nges par gzung // gzugs brnyan rten gyi pho brang baN+Dig/ kri dang bsgom pa mchog tu sbyar// sku gsung thugs dang yon
242b6(rnying rgyud): tan dang // phrin las dmigs pa'i rten la dgod// dngos grub gnyis kyi dmigs pa bya// rim pa gnyis kyi gzhi bca' zhing // bsnyen pa gsum gyis mthar phyung ste// dam tshig lha dang gnyis med bsgrub// mtshan ma gsum gyis gtan la dbab// dus la
242b7(rnying rgyud): maphrin las sbyar// bka' sdod pho nya bran la sogs// spo zhing gzugs la brtan par dbab// gab sbas kyis ni gsal ba gsum// mthong bar byas nas gnas bdun gar ba// yab yum sras kyi sngagla rnams dang // phrin las sngags kyis dbab par bya// gzir dang na
243a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du spyad// gon du ma gyur bskang bshag+sa d+ha// smyob+ha bzlog bdun gyis bya// las kyi lhag ca ma lus pakang // sdig pa srung zhing gnas nab stsu// rtas kyis spro bar gyur bA na// dmigs pa gsum ni mtshon gyis bsgral// la zas byang
243a2(rnying rgyud): cing mtshon gyis gtub// gnan pa'i phrin las mnor spyad// bka' sdod pho nya mnyes bya'i phyir// gtor ma rim pa bzhin du dbul// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang // dkyil 'khor bsdus te spyod lam bsgos// 'asrung zhir rtog pa gso
243a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// go cha bgo zhing gnas su btab// mdo sde bklag cing mchod rten bzhengs// snying rjer ldan pas rab tu gsang // bajug pa kho na nyid du ba// gzhan yang thugs kyi gsang chen 'di// gnod cing gdug pa snang baspel gyir// gzhu
243a4(rnying rgyud): dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// tshad med rnam pa bzhi ldan pas// bar chad med par bsgrub pa'i phyir// zangs lcags tsher ma can gyi shing // dbang dang mngon spyod gnyis kyi rgya// brgyad dang ni bcu gnyis
243a5(rnying rgyud): mgo dang skyed pa bcu drug dngos// zur gsum chu srin kha nas dbyung // yab yum sras kyi grangs dang mnyam// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// dmigs pa mi brjed gzungs dang skrag/ rtags dang ldan pa'i brten pa bya// dkyil 'khor zla gam zug
243a6(rnying rgyud): bcas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgo khyams mdzes// sgrub rdzas yan lag ma lus dgod// dbang byin brlab kyis gzi byin bskyed// rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol// nye bar byed pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po hUM// sems
243b1(rnying rgyud): rang sngags phyag mtshan dang bcas pa// bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// sprul pa dang bzlas zin las mdzad// gnodan cing 'gal ba myur du sgrol// dmigs pa drag po'i pho brang du// 'brug 'dren sdom sgrol phro nya yis// ting 'dzin gsal bas
243b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su dpab// khros pa'i phrin las thams cad brtsam// gzugs phung lhag ma pho nyas rol// rdul phran tsam yang ma lus bsam// de la rang dang dmigs pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum gsal ldan pas// rngag shul dpag med snar gyur na// rdo rje'i brag kyang
243b3(rnying rgyud): 'jom par 'gyur// rigs ldan phung po smos ci dgos// las mjug 'phang bsreg gnan pas bsdu// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// mngon rdzogs yab kyis dbang bsgyur te// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid las// brten pa den dang 'das par 'byed// bdag
243b4(rnying rgyud): nyid thig ler mnyam sbyar nas// rnam pa gsum gyi ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med bsam 'das rnam par dag/ ma lces chos kyi dbyings su snang // snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo las// blang dor med par kun tu snar // med pa'i dang la mngon gsal ba'i// da
243b5(rnying rgyud): las shar ba'i yi ge hUM// bdag gi dbugs las gyur pa yi// 'og phyogs rlung gi sa bon brten// bdag gi zag las gyur pa yi// de steng chu yi sa bon brtad// bdag gi sha las gyur pa yi// de steng sa yi snying po yin// bdag gi drod las gyur pa yi
243b6(rnying rgyud): me yi sa bon phyogs kun khyab// bdag gi sems kyi ngo bo las// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lnga rgyu yis bskyed// mkha' la rlung brten 'byung ba lnga// bdag nyid du ni gsal ba las// sa bon las ni dkyil
243b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgom// hU~M las thod rnon gzhal las khang // ka zhu zod skam ka gdan pas// lha rnams gdung bres su rnams phyas// gza' rnams bad rdza skar dral// bru rgyal rigrab ni sbrul nag brgyan// 'khor los bon kyis sbyangs nas// thibs brgyad pa rung tu/
244a1(rnying rgyud): // gsal// bad+mo'i sa bon 'od kyis sbyang // 'dab brgyad pa ru de nyid spang // 'od kyis mtha' dbus rab tu gus la// gdan gyi sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// brtag pa'i dri zla grul bu mu dang // ku dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa// 'i chings bsol
244a2(rnying rgyud): su// de stangs pho mo bcu bzhi bsgyel// dkyil du rgya mtsho thod phreng gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// rdo rje khros dang dge rje mo// shar gyi phyogs su bsnol te gding // rin che ma khos dang ral gcig ma// s+ho yi nas su la
244a3(rnying rgyud): gros dang dmang mo gnyis// nub kyi phyogs su mgo bsnol ba'o// rnam 'phrul ser mo las mkhan gnyis// byang gi phyogs su bsnol ba'o// rgyun gyi rgyal mo me yi phyogs// dbyings phyag ma ni bden bral phyogs// 'dig nyid mni drung lha'i phyogs
244a4(rnying rgyud): gcig pu ma ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim gro bskyed cing 'khor rnams mnan// b+hag bcu bzhi'i gdan steng na// bdag nyid byang chub thig le las// snying po ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun du bzang // rnam pa ma thar pa'i dbu ldan zhing // ye
244a5(rnying rgyud): ngag gi phyad tu can// mtshan dang dpe byad yang drag ldan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// bdag gi gzugs kyi ngo bo las// rnal 'byor nyid bzhi bde mchog ma// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag pa thugs kyi dkyil//
244a6(rnying rgyud): rtsonas 'phro// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga' zhing // ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// me 'grod par ni srid par khyab// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga la// skye 'gag med pa'i klong du thil// srid pa
244a7(rnying rgyud): kyis su brgyan cing // spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// hUM ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' klong kun gyi gter gyi dbyibs// mkha' klong dade pa'i
244b1(rnying rgyud): lam mchog ni// skye 'gro kun gyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dam skong // bcom ldan bde ba'i longs spyod 'di// 'dzum mdangs bcas pas dbul lags kyis// dgyes pa'i rdo rje gsong nas kyang // re rgong bdud rtsi'i chang chen
244b2(rnying rgyud): yob// mnyam gzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'byung gnas skye 'gro bde bar dbab// rin chen dkyil 'jam klong yangs su// spyi dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ re skong bdud rtsi'i chang chen phob// b+h+rUMHga pad+ma'i dkyil rnaM 'dir/
244b3(rnying rgyud): 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ldan// phyi lcags nang bstan sgo bar bcas// rin chen dkyil 'jam gdan btings nas// bla med mu 'phrul lde mig gis// lcags khrol lcags phye gdan la 'khrugs// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ga'u ru//
244b4(rnying rgyud): med khrag 'thung sku bsil nas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bag chags bkrus// hUM mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa che// ma chags pa la bde ba che// thar pa byede ba'i b+ha ga'i dbyings// ShAHdor med pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags
244b5(rnying rgyud): bkru ba'i phyir// spyi dpal bla na med pa yi// gsang ba'i don ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// ye shes chu bos khrus chen mdzod// oM thabs las byung ba dbyings kyi lam// dbyings las thabs chen bla na med//
244b6(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes sbyor ba las// bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen blo// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes par mchod// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i tshogs su spro// 'gro drug sgrib skyong phyag rgya che// mu stegs bdud 'dul za byed che// dab po gsal byed ye na
244b7(rnying rgyud): yon byang chu sems sa s+ho// byang sam kyi thig le las/ sa bzhag kun gyis tshogs pas na// thams cad thig la nyid kyi nga // gnyis med myong ba'i thogs // sa rba snre/ ma ba tu/ thegs // ste/ oM ba ba
245a1(rnying rgyud): na
245a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ldan la no// la naH/ myu // 'dzul hU~M gaman+ta/ thag dza ga paSh+T+rIH/ ga pa/ bam+'ud+h-i ma
245a3(rnying rgyud): tsaH// / 'a du'i na/ ga/ des dzal/ mthungs te/ ting ti / bams sa/
245a4(rnying rgyud): ti \u0f7f// a bar du 'acwo/ s+ho// sbyinam ma / brgyang gzhan dang shAr// gnyis mang spong ba'i tha~Ms // byang chub se myed kyi di za mas// 'byung ba lngam 'gro 'dugyur//
245a5(rnying rgyud): dro / sa bon las ni su bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bstan ma sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgo 'byer cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// dngas ma'i sbyin pa rtog tu /
245a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phra mdog la// dkar la dang ba'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gros// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bsum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyud pa yis// po don las ni srung bskyed po// mkha' 'gro yang gas
245a7(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig ler sgo 'byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gting / chags 'gyur ba'i mu mdog laM/ na bza' ljang gu \u0f7f/
245b1(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnod sbyin gnon// bdag gi chu las sla bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ dbu gsum dug gsum dbyings su 'dul// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya kying // dmar po dbang gi na
245b2(rnying rgyud): brgyan// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum chu bdag gnon// bdag gi me las sru bskyed pa/ mkha' 'gro 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog/ spobs ldan dbu gsum srid gsum sbyang // phyag zug rangs ma'i yongs
245b3(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gshin rje gnod// bdag gri bkrag las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rdo rje'i dbu gsum skye 'gro sgrol// phyag zugs sku mdog sna tshogs la// brtse ma gser gyi na bza' gsol/
245b4(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhi brgya byin gradan la bzhugs// bdag gi gsang ba'i thig le las// hUM dang myaM las sku bskyed pa// gtso bo'i gdan du 'khor rnams gsal// snying rtsa dbu ni'o cho 'phrul yin// g.yas g.yon gser nyi 'od chen las/
245b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ti zla zong tha~Mng gnyis// snying cu phyogs bzhi'i dngas ma las// gsang ba sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// nang gi rtsa bzhi kha dog bzhi// khros ma bzhi dang dges sde bzhi// lte 'phro ba'i rtsa las ni// srid pa rmugs kyad tsha rnams bstod/
245b6(rnying rgyud): pasnod kyi rtswa drug las// e ka dza Ti spun drug bskyed// srog rtsa zangs kyi sbu gu las// re ma ti ne mched gsum byung // bshad kha rlung 'doms rtsa gnyis las// nam mkha'i rgyal dang spyi 'gro ma// mgrin pa dbang po'i rtsa bdun las
245b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi srin mo bdun du 'askyed// lag pa g.yas g.yon stong rtsa bzhi// sring mo bzhi ru bskyed pa'o// sbrang rtsal ni dmag gi rgyal// sbyangs pa sprad kyi rtsa las ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// rang ga gnas la bskyed par bya// byed pa po dang bya ba mo
246a1(rnying rgyud): pa na na stes// 'gyu rgya s+ho// / ngas nyid pa // rnye rdzun pacwa na/ / snrus/ sos sa// d+harna
246a2(rnying rgyud): ma sa 'am /
246a3(rnying rgyud): bgyi/ deng can sto ga snga chags s+ho// zed khya sa cad mo dang / mthod ci ga na na // sa bya'i dug can mAm ni// rgyas su pa'i ganganadu gdeng bar bya/ sri pa du
246a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang // thugs mi dgas sdom bzhirnams// mngon sum gang dang gdi nga / da rkyen gas 'i'i dkyil 'khor stig// sring brgyags byed tshosnyoms sunan// srid padang sngags zhung ma'is ga
246a5(rnying rgyud): pa di rjo mchis// 'dang byams sargyam smi / sa mam// tu tu mi // bas ma pa'i rtsal ldan ga nyis can// dang 'i 'dug gas skyes// lag
246a6(rnying rgyud): thabs pa shes ra ba cis/ dmag gi rgyam ma thun pa zhis ma// srid du 'dug byed ni mo ngas// dbang sus brkyang badras/ du'i dris lab // shes brten pa ga na banyid// lcags pa'i tshig nyid
246a7(rnying rgyud): sa na sa//
246b1(rnying rgyud): nan phaT/ mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i rtswa gnas pa// nA mu thun ma mo rnams bkrus te// rkye tanan/ tra ta paT/ zhes pa dag sngags padza pa gros// rma ma chog lcags kyi ga dru klu'o// ngal gri rgyal ma nang du zhugs// rtswa stsal gnas pa'i mamam/
246b2(rnying rgyud): snying gshegs khrag chen mngon rdzogs kyi// ljags kyi steng du phu lA ba yis// mngon rdzogs mdang sa dang ldan pa dgyur// ma mo rnams ni myos shing 'thibs// bdag gi snying khrag zhal du rngug// lce snying bzhag pa phyi rol yin// che ba'i
246b3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad 'artseg// hU~Mng ni lug 'thung can gyi // ngani kun gyi yab// da ni sri ga sus m+b+hi rje'i mchog/ de ni mkha' 'go glan gyi ts+tsha// tham+b+hasA cu kun gyi snying zag pa // khyed kyi snying khrag da la yod// nga yi dbang du gyur
246b4(rnying rgyud): kyis/ sam gyi/ rgyas dag saH/ gdag kyi snrurnams bsgye na// nga khyen pa lung zhugs/ oM badz+ra a nas ga na zhes pacing nas te// sgrub pa'i las rnams zed pa bam
246b5(rnying rgyud): rang lus rtsa yI dkyil 'khor la// ma mo las kyi shrI sa bsten// de nas ma mo thams cad gyen// 'jig rten sdang ba'i lugs bshad pa// nam mkha' stong pa'i yi ge lAs// mthing nas su gsum yi ge i// ljang nag 'brar ba'i sa bon la
246b6(rnying rgyud): rdorje che gram dkyil 'khor bskyed// chags pa dbang gis bon las// chu grong 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyer// thugs rje 'bar ba'i sa bon las// sreg byed 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// snyoms mdzad blams pa'i sa bon las/
246b7(rnying rgyud): 'byams brdal ba'i gzhi ru chags// zhe sdang rol pa'i sa bon las// ri rab brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lder// yon tan 'bar ba'i sa bon las// khong seng srog gi sngon shing bskyed// i thi ma pa'i sa bon las// gling bzhi lding phran rim pa bzhin/
247a1(rnying rgyud): smon tan gsed kyi'i bdun dang // snying rol pa'i mtsho bdun ldan// sprul pa las mi mkha' 'asgom// ring bde la bskod rje gnas/ b+ha gza' dang skar ma rnams// ri rab de lnga 'dong zhing rgya// ri ba ga yu yi tham rdzom
247a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das chos dbyings rgyal ma ste// tshangs pa kun sgrol tsan brgyang// yum mi zhabs brgyad bzung bas brjes// dpag bsam shing dang ba gling // a 'bras kyi ga sgo ldang // shing lci ba d+ma gnas// pa'i byed
247a3(rnying rgyud): rngub bzhugs// ri rtse bum pa'i shi mtshams na// brgya byin rkang pa g.yas g.yon las// gser gdugs lci zla'i phreng bas bskor// de stong rgya mtsho thod phreng bklags// ri rab bum pra'i ldog bzhi lnga// hrIM gi ri ti'i 'o mtshan te// lkog+sa
247a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi cho 'phrul las// khros pa'i dbang chen bu mo bzhi// brkyang bskum bur gyi stabs kyis bzhugs// ri rab lkog bzhi'i rol ni// khyab 'jug 'khor lo'i lte ba lnga// bdud rtse'i chu mig bzhi skyes par// rgyal chen bzhi drang dgas
247a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi// khrus byang phyud nub cim du ba zhugs// ri dab bum pa'i gru bzhin// skabs bzang ser skya'i lcing ga na// skyes pa'i mtshan bzhi po ni// gan n+ta la gnas te bdud rtsi sku// rje mi 'jig rten drung lcags yin// dpag bsam shrI shi gang nga
247a6(rnying rgyud): mamakhan po bar chags byed dang // me snyo mas gnyis ni so skyong gnas// dbug pas ma shing gi sa ban// ka la~M yaka'i og mtshams na// na m+b+ha ma kha'i rgyal mu spun gnyis bzhi // dpag bsam shing gi so mo la// blangs pa dkar po'i 'ag pa
247a7(rnying rgyud): la// dza ti sman gnyis mnyam bzhag spyod// ri rab rlung gi 'gram pazhil// sa bdag phag gi lte ba na// gru 'dregs pani ni gyad kyi tshul// ri'i dran rol mtsho bar pa la// phung byed klu bdun nor bu'i gnas// hrIn
247b1(rnying rgyud): na nga / sa zhan / sa// na mas nga na/
247b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi po la// d+h+ya lnga chen bzhi gyi sgri ba ma// pad+hU bad+hA du la sring ba'i dang // dam pa po bkrI skye pa'i tshul// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa gan// kyeng ngam ldam pa'i gdan byung // ri brag blagasan 'bar ba la// khog khyong byar babang
247b3(rnying rgyud): gnas// mdor na ri rab rgya mchod do// gling bzhi lha yiganas gzhan rnams// ma lus srid pa'i mu mo yi// rgyu dang lam+ba dang 'bras bur snang // 'jig rten snang ba'i tshul yin no// de nas gsang bgab pa'i gter// bdag nyid che ma mag
247b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i// rkang pa chung sogs 'khor lo bdun// lus kyi ljon shing rim pa la// yum drug rje mo dman mo dang // ye shes sbas pa'i ma mo sogs// brgyad cu rtsa gsum rtsa la rdzogs// gzhung lam srog rtsa bsgril ma la// rang bzhin dkyil
247b5(rnying rgyud): dakhor rtsa bgrubs// ba shad khadrung dang 'ad sras su me// gzhu dang dag po'i tshul du gnas// rgyal mo spyan gnyis g.yas g.yon \u0f7f// lce ba'i gzhi na khwa srod la// srid pa chags byed rgyal mo gnas// pho ba dang sa sdigs 'byed rdzal/
247b6(rnying rgyud): le dang bcas rlung du bskor// zas 'dzu bas ni chu sems ma// 'am rgyad lnga yi ba gachags ni// skyong byed snying gi 'khod krol// rang gis bon phrin las bzhi// kun ga'i yid sgo nyon mongs lnga// a sogs spangs pa'i yon tan bdun// dbang po
247b7(rnying rgyud): po medabang ba'i// rnam shes sbas pa'i mamo bzhi// ma sbyor ba'i tshu'i duganas// ting gang ra 'das babyed pa'i gnyi// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' 'grom// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga yi \u0f7f// 'od zer rtsel rang bzhin gnas/ mang ci'i rtsal du 'a'o// gseng sa
248a1(rnying rgyud): ma'i rjod che gnyis// ga sen mu dang thod phreng gnas// nang gi 'ong la dgyes thebazhi// mgrin pa longs spyod ma sgomasnyam// yan lag bdun gyi kha spyong dbus// sprin mo bdun ni buzla bzung spyod// rang bzhin pa gra drug 'thod pa
248a2(rnying rgyud): mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// za byed ma mo yul longs spyod// bde chen 'khor lo byang chub sems// tshangs pa'i gdung bzhi rgya gram bris// rtsa 'dab so gnyis kha skrod gnas// srin po'i gnyen po sbas ma bdun// srog rtsa chu byed sked pa la// snyi
248a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gar dbang gnyis// 'dod khams gtso gsum 'dud pa'i tshul// byang chub sems lam rtsa stod la// dza ti spun drug gnon pa'i tshul// rtsa smad mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad// yi ni lig bzhi la sring mo bzhi// smad la dmag gi rgal mo bzhi//
248a4(rnying rgyud): gsang bzhi tshul gnyis mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// chos kyi mkha' 'gro sna tshogs pa'o// skying nang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// rtsa ba mi shigs rdo rje'i dbyibs// bye brag lnga yi 'od 'bar ba// thogs med rtsa ba 'byung lnga'i gtso// kun bzang las
248a5(rnying rgyud): ni rgyal mo lnga// rig pa laH ni dngas ma lnga// kun gzhi sems rtsa sgo lnga'i rtsa// gzhi rtsa 'dzin pa'i rtswa yin te// dug lnga me lce lnga yi rtse// ma rig pa yi rtsa ba las// 'gro ris sa bon lnga yi rtse// rig pa ma 'gags rdza ba las// ye shes che
248a6(rnying rgyud): po'i rtse mo lnga// mngon rdzogs yab kyi rtsa ba las// rigs lnga'i bde chen rtse mor gsal// 'byung ba lnga ni srid pa'i bskos// rgyal mo lnga ni sprul par shar// gsang ba'i gter du dngas ma lnga// yon tan sgo lnga'i rnam shes yin// 'khor ba skyed pa
248a7(rnying rgyud): mongs lnga// 'bras bu 'gro ba drug tu sdang // 'dul byed gnyen po ye shes lnga// 'bras bu longs spyod rtogs pa'i sku// snying rtsa gcig la 'dab ma lnga// de yi rtse mo brgyad du sbyor// nyi zla kha byor zhal gyi dkyil/
248b1(rnying rgyud): bcud kyi thig le gnas// yum drug rje mo bcu bzhi'i gnas// rang bzhin theg le 'od gsal ba// ye shes ye nas thub par gnas// dngas ma lnga las rgyal po lnga// kha dog lnga lnga ni thod phreng // gser zhi rgya men rgya mtsho ste// shes rab snying rje'i
248b2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid can// rnam shes bzhi la ma bzhi sbas// khros pa'i bu mo 'od rim la// chos kyi 'khor lo nyi shu la'o// steng 'og dkar dmar thabs shes rab// rta mgrin dbang gi sgo bsru khring+ga// 'byung ba lnga zhig 'od pu khru// ma mo lnga bcus gsang dbang
248b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar// rnam shes lnga la ye shes lnga// dug lnga'i rtsa ba dbang gis bcad// 'gro ba lnga yi bag chags sbyangs// gsal ba'i ye shes kha dog ldan// pho brang rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogaso// dbu la 'dus pa'i yab yum rdzogs// mdun rgyab gas
248b4(rnying rgyud): gyi hi ma la// phra men ma dang thod phreng nyid// 'joms byed bag chags gnas sbyangs pa// sbas ma bzhi dang khros ma bzhi// 'od phreng dges sde ma bzhi'i dang // mkha' 'gro nyi shu'i dkyil 'khor la// hUM sras drug gis ljongs spyod mdzad// dbang gi rgyal
248b5(rnying rgyud): pos sgo bsrung zhing // rgyu gcig dbyings nas phyung nas ni// 'od zer sngags kyi phreng ba yis// snying phugs zhal nas sngags kyi 'od// bzhu btul gyis ni thig ler gyur// srog snying rten yang de la bsdu// rlung dang r-I gyi sgra phyung nas// thig le
248b6(rnying rgyud): med dbyings su thim// bdag nyid la bzla'i don du bya// 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// yon tan gab pa'i gter du bshad// bshad lugs 'di ldan rnal 'byor ni// ma mo thugs kyi dngos grub thob// des na snying gi ljang zhes bya// de nyid las
248b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa// rnam par grol ba'i lugs bshad pa// chos nyid ye shes rang byung dang // yon tan bzhi bsdus grub pa'i rtsa// 'khor lo bdun dang rtsa ba'i srog/ rtsa brgyad stong dang 'khor lo brgyad// hUM sna po gnyis dang rdzog pa'i lung// rim gyis bshad dang bye/
248b8(rnying rgyud): la yang
249a1(rnying rgyud): rnabyud // gzhan sa rjod sa sas/ sa ga na// du // rna// na pa ga mdzong // sung 'dun/
249a2(rnying rgyud): 'bru gcig gi nyid spyod rnam bzhi la// sku gsung thugs su thag chod de// chags sdang ngargyal phrag dag gi// gnas bsgyur bsgom bsgrub rnam pa las// gti mug chen po yang dag nyid// sku lU mngon shar gi srung lhur grags// thugs lnga yon tan
249a3(rnying rgyud): las lnga// rang gzhan lhun gyis grub par snang // rang gnas gnyis med ye shes dang // mngon rdzogs rgyal po che ba'i mchog/ dpal 'bar yum dang gnyis su med// ljang stong gnyis med ye shes la// chos kyi 'khor lo 'bru 'dra'o// sna tshogs//
249a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i cho 'phrul rten// gsang ba'i gdung bzhi dges sde bzhi// 'khor lo nang gi rtswa bzhi po// rang rig ye shes rgyal po la// sems can chen po lnga yi khri// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul kun gyis mchod// dpa' gdang gsang rdzogs bcu bcu bzhi/
249a5(rnying rgyud): mi gnas bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan// 'dab brgyad dbus na rtse lnga pa// rgya gram phra bkod sa bon las// 'grub rgya don mi phreng bar ldan// gnas 'dzin la phab 'od 'gro 'drus// 'bur bzhi mdzes pas thugs rgyud 'phrul// gtso chen de la
249a6(rnying rgyud): bzung // lam du bde ba rgyas par bya// 'od zer 'jig rten khams su sgo// yul gnyis ma grub stong par gsal// 'od kyi 'khor lo gnas bzhi la// 'dab bzhi'i lte ba rdo rjer bcas// yab yum mtshon pa'i snying blos bskod// 'od zer gnyis
249a7(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyad bskul bas// 'khor ba'i sa bon so sor snang // 'dres pas sna tshogs gcig tu gyur// rlung dang lhan cig phyi rol 'phros// rang lus 'dzin pa'i sdang ba sbyangs// sdang la rang bzhin ma grub pa'i// daSh+Ti
249b1(rnying rgyud): tshod zing dzin pa thang girtsibs// bi sh+'uk+ki lA sa phaT/ me 'khor ma ga T+Ti na/ be she spyi la ya sa/ babyung lathugs ngas gican// d+h+r-i gak+ShA la ya \u0f7f/ spyod byeng rdung gi pad nu ban// spos dus chung rgyal rdul lags thogs// du sh-i s+t+rai ya
249b2(rnying rgyud): gA'i bar zang rtswa mi mug // 'di da ga'i sa yin rgyan / ka sh+ta sa/ !sa gas myed/ m-i nga / gags/ ga gas patsun pa'o// sa/ dzad mi gzugs thog d+has dpe rgyug// pa / nga mag
249b3(rnying rgyud): rdzu // nga bzhin no pa'i byasas pa \u0f7f// rdub kyi 'dza mas bskyed pa// dz+haM Sh+T+ri d+his la hU~M Ta/ / se tha~Md da du sa// Sh+T+r-i pa wAn/ rnam kyis du so Sh+T+rI n+tu/ d+hI la da/ Sh+TAH/ dkrub paskyon pabacan cam/ ya nan kr-i ta /
249b4(rnying rgyud): gsud pa gags b+had+han+te/ mtshal rnams/ ma ni yod par per sa men na// ta mi hU~M sa/ mayi ba sa tha~Md rnal rnyan// nu po'i mang ma ma pa ma/ rdzogs pazhi'i rgyub tsam ni/ N+DiSh+Tha phaT/ 'dod pa ma rje sa rgya ga ma
249b5(rnying rgyud): la sa/ stag sa // su pag su// de ga sa sa byed pa// dumyu / 'am
249b6(rnying rgyud): thogs/ nga ba'i gcan tshul dzin no// rig gapas/ the ga mgo ni dung dmang badzin/ pa / sri mgo na nga tshogs pazhi'i tho ba rlom par bsas/ byang gi tshogs kyi 'khor stsal/
249b7(rnying rgyud): las rdzogs pa 'i rje brngu bskyed// sngags rnamapa' la gdon// tak+Sha la yal Ta/ b+hi kyil latir 'dzin/ 'adz+rad gAkyil la na/ spobs pa zhig mug 'dzin// nam hi kI la la phaT/ gzi n+dan dgang po 'khor lo 'dzin//
250a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skor sngags rnams ma gyi song bzhag/
250a2(rnying rgyud): mthus nas na susmran/ sa gas nas skyed/ lags na sa/ kyi sbyi / mas / mardzu /
250a3(rnying rgyud): Ta/ dmang mo na'i 'dud 'dzin napa// gabertan lan/ sang tra rgyams kyang // gang kyi 'ab lartsibs 'argyad la// srid pa la brgya'i khrob pa// 'jug na snrel yalaT/ dkang ngam mi rgya'abor gar// rdzag pa la ra/ jigs byed kho
250a4(rnying rgyud): ga la ga sa/ gang ba dam ba 'du nga// sngag la ma ma/ ga nga 'ang sa rgyags thong la sangs/ thogazung bar gyum 'a / gzu sa zlas/ seMn pa'i mas byed pa 'an da
250a5(rnying rgyud): l-i yangaT/ b+h+yo'i byengad rgyal ldan bden can// zha kI la ya phreT/ 'jigs skabs spyang bya thod thug 'dzin// kam kIl ya'o// rim bzhin mtshams kyirtsibs la'o// gsong sbed sa ning gshing dbyug 'dzin// yaTI ki la ya hU~M phaT/ d+yang rigs ma ning gi slo
250a6(rnying rgyud): kyi da ma// rdzogs kyad nga/ dis rjodzod// sa ts+tshos/ g+sa d+hA cigasmra sa// nga ma kyil 'a na/ 'ju pan ga /
250a7(rnying rgyud): la zu d+hA / nas gzhan kyang byeg/ sa sa ma lug da / kla rnaMs / da phyis thal na ming / sa ldan/ nga ma'i la rdzu med /
250a8(rnying rgyud): gras 'al khegs ma sa/ ya spong sa yo ma 'a gi ti gtus pa sa das ni// lang gyi phyog su da ga la pa na du byed
250b1(rnying rgyud): na/ du na na na na na
250b2(rnying rgyud): smra du
250b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
250b4(rnying rgyud): ga
250b5(rnying rgyud): man
250b6(rnying rgyud): munasu na sa
251a1(rnying rgyud): 'dul/ tan rjem su sa// na rnam pas// dag rgyas shwe pa d+ma// m+b+ha // / pa sa/ ba na
251a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// hUM ba~M swa kI la ya phaT/ skar mda' gdong ser bya khwa 'dzin// gang b+ha kI la ya phaT/ glog srin sna tshogs mngag 'ja 'a thogs// rag sha lo d+ha kI la ya phaT/ mdangs brog sngo sangs chung gang 'thogs// dag sha phaT/ 'jigs byed dri zad
251a3(rnying rgyud): stong gsum// gar+b+he phaT/ stong gsum grags gnag lugs mdung thogs// ru se phaT/ khrag gi myatsho skams dmang lcags sgrog/ ki tA ra ta phaT/ khrig lag lja na ga khram shing thogs// dbus dang phyogs mtshams sgo bzhing bsam// de la nam ma'a'i
251a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dbab// 'bru brgyad sngags kyis dbang byin brlab// mchod pa gsum stob mnyes pa'o// oM shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ yab yum bsnyen pas gsang ba yi// ma mo bzhi bskul yum bzhi yis// 'khor lo bcu tshan sum cu
251a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis// de yi khrag 'thung lha rnams bskul// so so 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag bzhi// 'bum phrag bzhi yis so sor bzlas// bsnyen rdzogs bsgrub pa'i las chen ni// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i lte ba la// bid+ha nub tu khra bltas
251a6(rnying rgyud): la// tshon skud gsum gyis btags nas kyang // ming rus snying dang dpral bar bris// rten bzang kun lnga bkang bsgo zhing// gsal ba gsum dang ldan byas te// 'byung ba'i snying po gsum gyis sbyang // yan lag nyid lag phur bsu brdeg/ ral gris gtubs te
251a7(rnying rgyud): shar du bsreg/ tsakra rtsibs bzur ldan pa la// sde tshan bcu yi 'khor lo bskor// gcod byed 'phen byed sngags kyis brgyan// khyi yi grod par ling+ga gzhug/ tshon sna lnga yis bcings shing gdags// yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg cing brab// oM shrI he ru ka da la du na rbad//
251b1(rnying rgyud): nan cwa sa/ byu/ d+hA / / ga sa shAn / dag / smra na
251b2(rnying rgyud): dang bang du stegasu myur ba ba dgas la grubabs// ma ma'od kyis pa ma du/ khyothubargya thobab tu'i ga // glo bzhi ste byung ba'i/ na kyis pa pazhi la ma 'do sa
251b3(rnying rgyud): bskyod// ni la'i rgyal pa yin ga zu// d+hag zugs dadas kyi blan gyis zug// oM d+hI ti n+yaka drang pa hrInad+ha/ rag dza \u0f7f/ ke sa thun d+hi hU~M phyog la mA ya rgyad/ rtags rgyu N+DI m+bu'i ba pa dzi // brjod po rje drug// gsang rjen ba zangs ca /
251b4(rnying rgyud): nAb phyog dru khamad+ha// yan dag lnga la phri bskor// shes rab rnyid rjes tshogs pa da ga// rnam nas sgyogs marba baH// rlung tu dbang gi sbyin pa skyeg sa// gdeng chen thob rgyas sa'i sngags// gtsad dang sa ba pa'i sngags kyis barbaH// ra ting nang du lcags kyis
251b5(rnying rgyud): b+hUH/ oM nI hi cag grog la tham ling / kha bram thog la ba s+thA badz+ras/ khrag la thim mA ra ya zad/ rtags myong rangs pang la'i yang // byang gi khong mo lte ba la// chags srang rdzogs chen bab rjid // byang gi po zung thugs pa kyi// rgya thas pasnol par
251b6(rnying rgyud): ying+gag r+dz+dza // lus kyi b+h+yog bcur khyab bur gdab// sgo bzhi'i phur pa yan lag la'o// g+ha~M gi has bsdus mkha' la dbub// 'phang gtub bsreg pa sngar bzhin bya// yon tan sngags brgyan tshomathu bcung // tsak+Sha sarba hU~M phaT gdag// bya rog stod du sbal khwa'i gzugs//
251b7(rnying rgyud): migs pa'i'i rgya zu / mi ti su ma byang ba ba sa d+hag rgya rgya la du ming nas byu 'a pa'i rjegs grags te/ tshalas kyi slong min/ 'an ya ga pa spyod de/
252a1(rnying rgyud): bla ba ma gsum dang banas// lci lhums rgyas pa mdzub gad te// mdzad mad pa'i phreng bas brgyun// b+han+ta'i nang du mugs pagang // phur ba rdzas kyigatso bo bzhag/ chags byed chags snyoms gnyis la bri// bdun lam bdun bya bdun mi// lha grangs ldan par du gang//
252a2(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa'i lha bsgom pa// dbyings kyi yum drug mag bo la// rdul 'byor bcu bzhi 'angos pa'o// bum par bla med he ru ste// lte bar chags 'dig/ un gnyis so// s+ye la dza ti ma mo drug/ lte ba'i dkyil la re te ga suma?// dpal grogs gsem pa dge
252a3(rnying rgyud): ma// bzhi dang sring bzhi bsgom par bya// zur gsum la ni dbang mo ste// kyi mor ma bdun la sogs bsam// bdag nyid phra men rgya mtsha mo// dbu gcig zhal lnga mkha' 'gro ljarang// bsgom pa mche ba gtsigs shing bzhed// sprul pa bsgrim la mchod cing bsnyen// ma myo du
252a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen la dbab// dkar nag mtshams sul gnad bye// sems la bsdus te rtsa sngagasu la// badz+ra ba d+hi dzi la zug la run ho tra kI la la badz+ra chu dran mar NA phaT/ phyung bas gang ba ste mkha'i la dbab// gting dngag med pa'i gnas su ba sti ma// b+ha la tsiH te/ le laM sa ma ya ho// 'di mis
252a5(rnying rgyud): sman drag grab spong // shin tu bdangs te bshad pal// / de nas de rje 'dzin rgyal po// yang dag nogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sum bde chen dang nyid las// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzugs su brtan// 'jig rten rdzogs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// stong phrag brgyang drang thung
252a6(rnying rgyud): hrI// myed par sprul pa'i sde brgyad pa// lha blan mog shin rngub tsa// bdud dunal pa gzod sbyin papa// dab dang hU~M dang badz+ra byal// rang pa byung phrag kyang drug// de la sa myam pa drug cuH// rnam brgyad kyis yin te// dbye ba byin gsang pa'i// yang gang gi
252a7(rnying rgyud): dang drag po sngags// sbas pa dang ni pas byeng dang // btags chags dang ni brgyad yin te// lha dang lha men dri za dang // mkha' lding lto 'phye mi'amachi// klu dang lus srul po rnams ni// gyi ltar btags shing zags pa yin// rgyal po bdud dang gshin
252b1(rnying rgyud): d+ha// gnad sbyin srin po ma mo bcan// de bzhin nang du brtags shing chags// ma sangs gling dang dgra lha dang // rngu bdud ma stegs ma pa' 'gro dang // 'gang po thazang zhes byab// gsang bar btags shing chags pa yin// nang gi rnam shes kun
252b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi dang // yid dang yid kyi rnam shes las// dbang po lnga yi dngas mar bcas// gsang ba'i lam la rgyu ba dag/ yang gsang gter du sbas pa'o// khyad par sbas pa zhes bya ba// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // ngargyal phrag dog ser sna
252b3(rnying rgyud): dang // khro dang gnod pa'i sems rnams ni// kun gyis mi mthong rab tu sbas// drag rtsal lha dang 'jur mad bdud// gshin rje gshor dang rgyal po dregs// gnod sbyin shan pa srog gcod srin// gdug pa klu dang glen pa gza'// rang rang drag po'i sngags
252b4(rnying rgyud): su 'gyur// las kyi khyad par byed pa ni// smyo 'bog brgyal nad snying rlung dang // mdze shu rims nad yams nad dang // pho log glung thabs gzer ba dang // mtshon 'khrug drag dang rtsod pa dang // gri dang gnam bab rang gshed dang // de la sogs pa'i drag
252b5(rnying rgyud): shul spyod// rang gi las kyi khyad par kun// myur du spyod pa zhes bya'o// dpa' ba dang ni mi sdug dang // phrin skyel snying 'byin rgyal po'i las// dregs chen skye dang dpung bsdebs te// glo bur srog 'bebs bdud kyi las// las kyi 'khrul 'khor dmigs
252b6(rnying rgyud): bsal nas// klad 'khor myesabyed gshin rje'i las// thog dang ser ba sbyin thang las// ri rab bsnyil nus gza' yi las// rgya mtsho'i dbyings nas klong brtol nas// mdzen dgag gtong klu yi las// grir 'thibs rma khrag btsan gyi las// za
252b7(rnying rgyud): 'drang za 'drung 'dzin byed cing // rmongs shing chud byid gnod sbyin las// glo bur srog gtsang drug bral na// srin po'i las su bsngags pa yin// rims nang lams nad gze zhing dang // khrag 'grug rmed pa ma mo'i las// de dag gnod pa'i las yin te// lan byed de las
253a1(rnying rgyud): bzlog par 'gyur// btags shing chags pas dbye ni// rgya las dgra lha rgyal po gang // bdud las rgya bdud ma stegs dang // d+hU d+ha rnams sa btags shing chags// ma mo las ni mkha' 'gro dang // lha mo srin mo mon mo dang /
253a2(rnying rgyud): bal mo gru mor btags shing chags// btsan las yab rde ya ma shung dang // gagod ze drang rnams su btags// gza' la rog ti khyab 'jug dang // bye tri pa tral sogs brgyad// gnod sbyin las ni mon pa dang // 'gong po ya bdud ze 'gong rnams/
253a3(rnying rgyud): srin po las ni drag byed kun// gshin je las ni yi dwags tshogs// shin tu btags shing chags pa ste// rnam grangs bsdus pas phye ba'o// rgyas par phye ba 'di ltar bshad// lha las bregs pa'i lha chen brgyad// klu las gdug pa'i klu chen brgyad//
253a4(rnying rgyud): gza' las gza' brgyad de bzhin te// gshin rje las kyang phyogs bsrung dang // ma mo las kyang ma bdun dang // srid pa'i gtso dang brgyad yin no// gnod sbyin nor 'dzin sde dpon brgyad// srin po brgyad yab srin po yin// bdud las rje bdun gtso dang brgyad//
253a5(rnying rgyud): 'di dag rang rigs yon tan dang // rgyud mtha' rdo rje 'dzin gyis ni// tha dad so sor bshad de bzhin// gdul bya'i rigs dang 'dul byed kyi// ston pa'ang de bzhin shes par byos// 'di dag nang gi bskyed tshul yang // ma mo kun gzhi'i rnam shes las//
253a6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje yid kyi rnam shes te// bdud ni nyon mongs can gyi yid// mig gi rnam shes lha yin no// rna ba'i rnam shes srin por snang // sna yi rnam shes bdud du ste// lce yi rnam shes gnod sbyin yin// lus kyi rnam shes btsan dang gza'// dran rtog gzugs
253a7(rnying rgyud): sman rig// byed pa'i las rnams de la 'khodar// se na ga dod dus pa yin te// m-i gtong 'bebs pa bskyed kyisaH// gshin rje 'i dregs gshin gyi rje// gzug cing thunapas sun ts+tsha// gnad du zag tsong mi 'tshor bas// gzi zhes kyi
253b1(rnying rgyud): par grags pa yin// d+hen bskyed gzhir gyud ma mo ste// gnod pa skyed byed gnod sbyi no// yan lag rdzogs su dbye ba yang // gdug chub che bas lham yin// gang du'ang 'byung bas 'byung po ste// lha min kun sprul lhangam rtsi// yid kyi
253b2(rnying rgyud): sgom dri za dang // stobs ldan khro gtum srin po yin// mkha' la spyod pas mkha' 'gro ste// zas yid btags pas yi dgas yin// kun gyis bkur bas rgyal po yin// gzhan gyis bstod pas btsan yin no// lha khyod log pa mu stegs yin//
253b3(rnying rgyud): las rgyal gyur dgra lha ste// bcos par mi nus rmya zhes bya// mthu stobs rmad byung ma sangs te// gtum zhing ltogs byed 'gong po yin// ngan g.yo'i rgyu ldan the brang ngo // gzhan yang rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// gzhan yang sprul pa yang stsal dang // sum
253b4(rnying rgyud): sbrul la sogs bsam mi khyab// gtso 'khor bka' nyan las byed kyi// sde ba rgyad dag tu dbye bar bya// gnas dang rten pa'i khyad par yang // g.ya' re gangs khang pa partsegs// khang bzung nyams dgang lnga bskrang ste// dri breg brag nag rab tu thos
253b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs mngon par bdud ba khyab bo// rgya mtsho mtsho dang rdzing dang ni// ne seng rgyas par klu bsgrub gnas// bum brtsegs bra ga nag phyogs ma nges// lho gzhol mkhar chen gshin rje bsgrub// ri 'dus rtse dang chu 'dus mdo// lung ba che 'phro gza' bsrub gnas// naklu
253b6(rnying rgyud): chen dur khrod ma mo ste// gling rgyas ri ljongs gnod sbyin gnas// gtsug lag khang chen gsar dang rnying // lha yi khyad par phyogs gzhan bsgrub// ri thang mtshams dang khang mtho rtser// phyogs mthun bye brag sngar bshad bzhin// brag dmar khros rdza re
253b7(rnying rgyud): brtson rnams bsgyung // de dag la sogs gnas gzhan yang // rnal 'byor rig pas legs par brtag/ sdung yul gyi yis sgrub pa 'dzas// rta dre dur lug bya dang khyi// bya rgod rgyal mtshan gcan gzan gzugs// shing bzangs lo 'bras
254a1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa rnams// g+ha yi rgyal po bye brag mnyes// cag kyi dang 'dab chags te// nag po'i chas zhugs bdud mnyes 'gyur// shal smug grom ldan sna tshogs// dkar ma ngar tho brdud rma yin te// srog chags so/
254a2(rnying rgyud): rigs nag chags dang // ba dan 'ag rdo bdung dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan grang ba dag/ mam yum rnams maces pa'i rdzas// rig panas mda' ma drang bangan dmid// sbrul mtshan bzhan pa bcan da// bod mdzar rnam ching da yang
254a3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod dkyil 'khor ga shin te la// ra nag mig dmyur sha Sha sh+ya hA/ sbrul lpags mda' gzhug na rnams kyi'o// rin chen gzhugazhan pa sa// dag ma chags gnod sbyin tan// mtshan na sha khrag cha ba dang // dum na ljongs su
254a4(rnying rgyud): dengs// 'dab chags chu mtshan rtad mar dang // mtshon cha drag po ri btsan rten// de la sogs pa dregs pa can// spyi dang khyang par bye brag gis// gang la shes shing bsngags pa dag// btu zhugs can gyis brjen par bya// rin men 'bru lnga bcu dbye/
254a5(rnying rgyud): pathams 'du nga/ rgyun gyi ba na kyis da pan na tus dus // 'du byed ma canas sa
254a6(rnying rgyud): sa zags// 'di bang mo nga ljongs su ba gis// bsgrub pa'i 'angs kyi byung pa mas// dmigs pa'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rdzas// mams mchod cing bstan par gyur// 'jig rten pa dang tshul mkhyen pa// 'arig rten chod
254a7(rnying rgyud): zhes su bsha// / drag po'i sngags kyi brlab pa yang // byi nga gisang ba gnad dang bcas// gco chen phra gsung thugs na// byang chub sems kyis bsrub byab// thun mong khyad par bsgrub pa'i byer// rang sngags ming dang sbas par bcad/
254b1(rnying rgyud): bsgyu dang lnga zhung las la sbyar// rnam pa sbyor ba rtags rnams kyis// mngon du byung ba de nyid dang // sgrogs shing dbab parten sbyar ba'i// brtul zhugs ting nge 'dzin dag ni// stabs dang mi 'jigs rig pa yis// don kunu bsgrub pa de shes bya
254b2(rnying rgyud): 'jog rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rig// gang la gang gis der po// gnyis med rig pa 'dzin pa'i thugs// rnam 'phrul nges pa'i blo stobs ni// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// dbyer med dgongs pa'i khyad par che// bsrung bya sdom pa'i bye brag kyang /
254b3(rnying rgyud): thigs chen lha yi bye brag la// rten du rung ba mi brnyas shing // lus kyi longs spyod gzhom mi bya// rgyu dang mi rgya'i nag po'i phyogs// mi bskrad mi brlag bdud la bsdom// gshin rje'i rigs 'khyal ma mo brnyes// gru lnga sha khrag rmang
254b4(rnying rgyud): btsang bsrung // mkhon lugs mi gtsang mo rgyud 'khrugs// tha men rdzas nag gnod sbyin te// byams sems phan spangs srin po la'o// gdug byed mi brnyas btsan la'o// che 'phrul nus pa mi bzlog gza'// 'jig rten gnas pa drag po'i sngags
254b5(rnying rgyud): dmod pa'i tshul du sngags zlos na// shin tu dgos par bstan pa yang // bla snying gter dang gdab phur dang // bcing dang bseg dang mnan dang skra// gnas dus thebs dang ldog pa dang // bsrung mtshams drong tshang rtags rigs rnams// gtso
254b6(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i las yin no// lnga bdud srin po gnod sbyin dang // rgyal po gshin rje mo rigs te// gzang kya la sogs sde brgyang tshogs// nyi rdo kho chu gri rtsags dang // nor bu pha wang long bu'i rdo// mu men g.yu sbam zla nying rdo// shel mkhar chu shing /
254b7(rnying rgyud): phur pa dang // gri lcags gser gyi thur ma dang // gri mtshon gyi bur rkang thur dang // zangs thur la sogs snying zlar yin// tsher ma can dang chu shing dang // seng ldeng lpags dang mchog phur dang // dug shing bse dang gri lcags zangs// mthun pas
255a1(rnying rgyud): rab byo snying phur bya// mi dang drung 'gro dra men dang // rin rkyen tha med dang sdod pas// zangs lcags kyi li rgod pa dang // sdug gzig gyi la ni le dang // hu wa dang zlab sdod rnams ni// so so'i bcing rngom pa da pa
255a2(rnying rgyud): rmongos pa'i gzhi pa rang sngags bri// hung mdzo dang bcas la dril// mthun pa'i rdzas dang sdo dang yul// snying cad rnams la 'brags ma dgod// so sor rigs pa'i srad byas paskum// sgrub pa po ye lus la ga dbyes// sde brgyad pardad chem pa
255a3(rnying rgyud): na/ dang nAganas gcog 'dra/ // dmathog srab dang phrag tsong dang // thig dag zag dmar ltos pa dang // gangs de'i mtshams dang shing ga gzung // de mo dz+ha dang 'dus che dang // mdzathas ma lhag stog dang //
255a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo dngadu rna mig nang// dur grod sa yi srabs chen dang // mi shis gdug pa'i gnas rnams su// so so'i las gnye gtad par bya// dus bzhi'i zla ba dang po dang // de yi tshes grangs brgyad gsum la// skya rangs nyi ma 'char ka la/
255a5(rnying rgyud): lha dang rgyal pos las byed 'gyur// kun bdun gsum nam langs nas// chub dang gnyis kyi zeng la'o// ma mo tis gsum nyid mtshan gung // btsan ni 'bring bzhi'i zug gsum la// nang nub nyi ma dmar thag la'o// gnod sbyin dgra gsu
255a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dir// gsum bzhi nyi shu dgra la'o// srod kyi 'jing ni bdud kyi dus// gshin rje bcu gsum nyi shu lnga// de dag la sogs 'gro zhing rgya// sde brgyad dregs pa'i las rnams kun// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing //

255b1(rnying rgyud): gcig gzhan sums
255b2(rnying rgyud): ma na ma ma na// sku/ smras slong na s+ho/ da sa sa nga// sa nga rgya mas/ sa// 'ad/
255b3(rnying rgyud): las 'jug/ dmyigs dang pyod pa pa ma nod// rkyen ng+yas gcig pa'i bsam pa hrI/ la sprul badrug pa rnams rkye rkyen smra pa 'gyu/ dgas pa'i ma man ma mdzegs /

255b5(rnying rgyud): 'jug bcus// dmag dpung che zhing dmigs bdag/ gtsang zhing btu la khrugs che bis thebs// gang gis la thigs pa yi// sreg sung thugs kyi mtshan la mthong // kun gyis brtsod cing dbang bskrad da // phyag dang skyen 'gyur bu
255b6(rnying rgyud): pa byed// gro zhing rlom pa'i dpa' gdeng ldan// 'dri na dri nu las nus pa'i rtags// mkhan po slob dpon rgyal po dang// rje dpon la sogs gang mar byung // nye yang dbang du ma 'dus rtags// sran phyogs pa tshan mnyam gnyis dag
255b7(rnying rgyud): mnyes na las kyi rlung ba'i rtags// bran byes yog sa rje byung / ga zhing da pa rkyen pa rtags// yang che b+h+rUM // las da tshwa'adu thaM pa ni/ zad pa'i sa spyong ba yin// dmag dun myon
255b8(rnying rgyud): 'tshang las la 'jud// dar 'gyur dunga'i thung rol mo rdzas// dbu che dag gis grogs byed na// rbad pa las la chud pa'i rtags// gsong tshong long dag 'gyed pa dang // shing gcong drug gshog mkhar bkyil dang // mes bzlog rgya
256a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrungs sa gnon dang // rlung gis khyer dang rang bzhin zhig/ gsang pa'i las kyi don 'grub rtags// sha ba khrag 'thung sbyin moza// bshad dang yongs spyod byed la sogs// don grub gsad las zin pa'i rna
256a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa thugs rjes bsgral ba dang // zhe sdang nus pas bsgral ba dang // man ngag thabs kyis bsgral ba las// bye brag thun mong khyad par dag/ so so'i mthun tshogs man ngag bzhin// bsnyen bsgrubarbad gsad las skor la// sbyor
256a3(rnying rgyud): dngos rjes kyi bya ba dag/ thog ma bar dang tha ma'i bar// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// 'brel zhing tshang la brtson pas spud// las mjug mnan zhing gtad pa las// bsnyen bsgrub gnas ljags skye gnas dang // las khung rang gnas gnade 'gros
256a4(rnying rgyud): dang // spyi dang phyi yi skye gcod bya// tshad dang khug dang bstim dang spyad// kun la man ngag rig ldan bya// gnyen po dngos gzhi bsgrub pa dang // dril dang dbye dang gnas skrod dang // dril dong 'phang ba chud pa dang // 'thibs dang gzer dang mtha'
256a5(rnying rgyud): la gtad// gzhug dang bskyil dang rjes gcad pas// dbab pa gnas su brdeg par bya// chos nyid bden pa'i blta ba dang // ting 'dzin dmigs gsal bsgom pa dang // dpa' bo brtul zhugs spyod pa dang // rab gnang sngags kyi drag bu la dang /
256a6(rnying rgyud): 'brad rigs bden pa'i tshig stobs dang // rang gshed thabs kyi yon tan dang // bsod nams tshogs kyi dpung bskyed dang // gnyen po stobs la sogs pas bzlog/ bsrung bar bya ba'ang de bzhin no// lus gnas dang ni bdag po gnyer// dus rdzas thabs
256a7(rnying rgyud): dang rjes gcad dang // bsrung dang nus pa rdzogs pas mnan// thabs shing rdzas dang sngags dus lha// ting 'dzin ldan pas bsreg par bya// bsham dang bsgrub dang bshe ba dang // phyogs dus ma nor lam phye bas// dbang gzugs mkhyen gsol ldan pas
256b1(rnying rgyud): phang // gzhi gnas khro ba'i gsang zhing bsgrag/ bsnyen pa bskyar dang drag sngags dastug/ rdzas kyis badrug dang shes bstan// nyams pa gas zhing ba skang ba dang // ngag bkrol rtswa rtse bsnyen bslab dang // las kyor lan gsum brkya nga/
256b2(rnying rgyud): spogs// mdor nam grub par du ni// brtag cing bsgrub pa man ngag gnod// rang bzhin 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// rang gzhan sdang ba rtog pa ste// sde brgyad la sogs lha dang srin// ma lus rang gi sems snang bas// gaka na na
256b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa yod ma myong // sems kyang rtog pa tsam nyid las// dbyibs dang kha dog dngos po dang // mtshan ma'i rtsa ba yongs ma grub// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong // de nyid kyang ni des stong ste// mi stong cung zad yod ma yin// stong pa chen po chos
256b4(rnying rgyud): kyi sku// spros pa'i mtha' 'dzin rgyu nas spang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs snying po// 'di nyid dang la gang gnas pa// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang du bsgyur// rtsa ba 'di yin yan lag gzhan// kun gyis 'di la blta bya zhing /
256b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom dang rab tu spyad par bya// gtso bor sangs rgyas bstan la dmigs// rang sems dpa' dang gdeng ldan pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs su spyad// dam tshig sdom pa bslang sbyor ba// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub gzhi// te
256b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal ba yis// mngon sum 'dod pa bzhin du sgrub// man nga ga the tshom spyad pa yi ste// 'jig rten rtog pa ngan pa ldog/ lus sems bde ba 'khor g.yog pas// rang bzhin rten 'brel rdzas kyis 'grub/
256b7(rnying rgyud): bcol bsul dam pa dang zad pa'i grogs// bla srog gis ni dbang med 'gro// bla rtags kyis ni dus mi 'gyur// bsrub 'phel dben gnas yo byad yin// yon tan yin te sngon rnams kyang // bzhin pa sgrub tshul mthar ma gyon

257b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas mi 'byor// de dgu la sogs lha srin gyi// bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas// las gnyer lha tshogs so sor bsgrub// rang gi rigs dang las kyi gnyer// ma shis glo bur sbyar mi bya// dngos grub kun 'byung log
