258b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par bshad pa'o// / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i sbyi rgyu las mtshang ba la stong pa'i slad rdzogs so// ci gar gyi mkhan po slob pon chen po bad+ma byung gang pa dang / zod kyi so tshab dag par tsa nas
258b6(rnying rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i brang po'o// gtid kya/ skyes rgya/ gtad rgya'o// / dar skad du/ b+ha ga ldan sarba su gi tA saM mu dA ye tan+t+ra pra b+he kuny+dzA ka tan+t+ra na ma/
258b7(rnying rgyud): mod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa lde mig gi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
259a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang yum kun chu bzang mo bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa/ rang bzhin ldan gas thub pa 'og min gyi gnas namatha' dang dbus
259a2(rnying rgyud): med cing gzhi tshad las 'das pa/ rgya dang phyogs yongs su ma chad pa ye shes kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang yon tan dpag tu med pas rgyas par gyur pa'i pho brang chen po rnam par dag pa na/ bde bar gshegs pa
259a3(rnying rgyud): til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs pa rab tu gsal ba'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin
259a4(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kun skye ba med pa la// mnyam pa nyid kyi dang gnas kyang // kun rdzob sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ni// ma skyes pa las ma 'gag mthong //
259a5(rnying rgyud): bya'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad byang chub sems su gcig/ snang ba tha dad sna tshogs te// gcig dang du ma brjod las 'das// rtse kye/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no// ngo bo gcig las tha dang spang /
259a6(rnying rgyud): dpe don mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing // ci yang med las cir yang snang // 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig pa yang yang dag lam// rnam par rtog pa'ang chos
259a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sku// skye ba med pa gzhi yin te// ma 'gags sdang ba lam yin no// lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu ste// kye zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med do// rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa la// byin rlabs thugs rje chen po yis/
259b1(rnying rgyud): skyong gsum rgyal ba'i mus kyab kyang // byang chub sems la g.yo ba med// mkha' dang 'ja 'tshon ji bzhin no// 'khor pa'i bde lhag tu 'bras dang // bde gshegs su dang ye shes tshogs// byang chub sems kyi 'o gcig/ byang chu sems la rtse shi med/
259b2(rnying rgyud): chos ci sku la 'du 'bral med// 'khor 'dras chos la bzang ngan med// mnyam pa nyid la rgyu 'bras med// sems nyid rtsal la 'gag pa med// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba las// bltar med bsgom zhing dpyad pa med// 'gra ldan gyis sus
259b3(rnying rgyud): ma nor ma bcos chos nyid la// rang bzhin gyi med chas kyi dbyings// mi 'gyur lhun yub byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma 'gags chos// rgya mchod chu za na 'du ba ltar// 'khor 'bras thub chub kun tu 'dus// bcud mchog snying po rdo da/ bas
259b4(rnying rgyud): da 'dod dag med// ri nyi martogs na// phyogs phyid padzin// da ni dbring bcom ldan 'das/ rdzog ting sdigs myigs/ dag pa nyid pa dge pa sto// byeng das pastsal yod//
259b5(rnying rgyud): dri ma med pa'i chos// bla mod byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rna ma zlog gzhom pa dang // thugs rjes 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// gnyis med dges pa'i tshul du mdzod// ces bskul zhing gle blangs pas/ yum kun tu bzang mos bsul pa/ kye/
259b6(rnying rgyud): bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// gang gis 'dul ba de bstan phyir// gtso bo mchog la gnyis med bya// zhes bskul to// de nas yab kyis bskul pa/ ho// dges pa chen po gsang ba'i thugs// mnyam pa nyid las mnyam
259b7(rnying rgyud): par bzhengs// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras// khyab pa'i don du mngon par dbyung // zhes bskul to// de nas yang yum gyis bskul ba// kye/ 'gro ba'i ded dponaganyen gcig po// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ gnyis med bde ba'i
260a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings dpal nga// bde ba chen po ba 'thugasol// zhes bsgral to// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi dang bzhin rjo chags pa'i rgyal ba btu dgang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa pa
260a2(rnying rgyud): bzhag nas dbyings kyi yum chen mo la rab tu bskul pa/ kye ho/ skye med mkha' dbyings dag pa'i yum// bde chen dbyings kyi bdag nyid ma// thugs rje'i gdul bya bstan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i bde chen skyed mdzod cig/ ces 'phrul to// de nas yang yum
260a3(rnying rgyud): kyis bskul ba// ho// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ded dpon gtso// dgyes pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo yis// byang chub sems rgyun bde ba yi// sprin tshogs char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes bskul pas/ yab kyis sa ma ya ho// zhes bskul bas/ yum gyis sa ma ya
260a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bskul to// yab kyis ra ho&ha~M/ zhes bsgral pas/ yum gyis d+hag yA ma~M/ zhes baphral te/ rol pa chen po mdzad pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ya a nu d+hag Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A t+ma \u0f85hadzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM hU~M hrI hrIHta/ zhes bya bas bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs
260a5(rnying rgyud): tu med pa zhing khams kyi bkod pa chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rab tu rdzogs pa dang / zhi ba dang khro bo'i rnam pa dang / yab dang yum gyi rang bzhin du ldang ba dang / sku so so'i rgyan gcig par snang ba dang / sprul ba dang las sgrub pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor
260a6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa rab tu snang bar gyur to// snying po de kho na nyid las/ rol pa chen po'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i cha lugs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu
260a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye/ bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi sku// ma 'ongs phyi ma'i dus ci tshe// gdul bya 'dod chags can don du// rigs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i tshogs// kun nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i thabs// cho ga yan lag yongs
260b1(rnying rgyud): sapa// dman dang bar ma mchog rab don// rgyas bsgras shin tu rab tu bzlas// rtog pa'i dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir// ma lngas gsal bar bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhal 'dzum pa chen po mdzad pa'i 'od
260b2(rnying rgyud): zer gyi dra ba chen po dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab par mdzad nas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// phyogs bcu'i tshul ba de bzhin
260b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs// ma lus bsdus pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam pa rigs brgya'i dang nyid de// de nyid bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ni// phun sum tshogs pa'i bcud ldan pas// ma nyams snod dang ldan la bstan// ri bo dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// 'dung dzi spangs pa'i rna
260b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan nas// sa yi cho ga rgyas pa ste// brtag sbyang bslang zhing mkhyen par gsol// phyi nang gnas dang sbyar ba'i khyon// chag chag skyang nul legs byas te// khro bo'i stangs stabs mtshams kyis bskor// bka' bsgo bslad dang /
260b5(rnying rgyud): bsrung bar bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i grogs dang bcas// byin gyis brlabs pa'i srad bu yid// dkyil 'khor jo brang thig gdab pa// rdo rje khu tshur byin brlabs nas// slob dpon shar bltas skyob ma yis// nub tu bltas te gdab par bya// pho brang rdzogs pa'i
260b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dgu// rdo rje'i sa dang gdung gis bcad// spyi dang bye brag phyi dang nang // phyogs dang mtshams kyi phyed kyis dbye// bar khyams sgo dang rta babs bcas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i gnas// rin po che yi brtsig pa dang // ka ba rdo rje zla phyed dang //
260b7(rnying rgyud): pad+madz+ra ba mda' yab bca// 'khor lo ri dwags gdugs kyis mdzes// rdo rje'i dbape me 'od 'bar// gzhan yang rgyan rtags sna tshogs pa// rin po che'am 'bru lnga yis// phyi nang kun tu legs par bri// pho drang dgu yi dbus nyid du// 'khong mo rtsibs
261a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ brgyad kun tu ldan// de nyid gu chad byams dang bcas// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// pad+malas kyi rigs rnams kyi// dbus nas shang ljon ba byung sogs// dkar mthing ser dmar ljang gu yi// rim bzhin 'dog ldan
261a2(rnying rgyud): phyi rol phan chod gdab pa dang // snang byed dra ba 'phyang bas brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// mnyes pa'i yo byad sna tshogs bstar// cho 'phrul bzhi dang ting 'dzin gsum// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// cho ga gsum dang yan lag bzhi// dkyil
261a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgrub pa kho na'o// snying rje'i yul la dmigs pa dang // byams pa dga' ba btang snyoms kyis// cho 'phrul bskyed de ma lus myang // sbyong zhing bdag med de bzhin nyid// kun tu snang ba'i snying rje gsum// med pa las ni yod pa'i rgya// phyi nang dngos po kun
261a4(rnying rgyud): te// ye shes sa la gnas pa las// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun bral zhing // rang bzhin chos nyid dang gis gsal// stong nyid dang gnas chos kyi dbyings// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// yul dngos rigs kun gsal bar snang // chos rnams stong pa
261a5(rnying rgyud): rab sbyor zhing // padag gzhan mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid// ma skyes rang bzhin med pa yi// dmigs med chos la so sor brtag/ sems bskyed pa dang smon lam gyis// nus pa mthar thug nan tan bskyed// ji ltar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// pad+ma nyis
261a6(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i steng // lha rnams so so'i yi ge nyid// rang gi kha dog mthun pa las// 'od zer sna tshogs rab smos pas// sems can khams kun thabs kyis sbyangs// slar 'dus dmigs pa dag mdzad de// yi ge snying po phyug mtshan thugs// de las yan lag bzhi
261a7(rnying rgyud): bas// rang gi lus kun yongs rdzogs te// 'khor lo dbus kyi gdan steng du// gtso chen rnam par snang mdzad dang // yum chen chos dbyings kun bzang mo// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la// mi bskyod pa dang rin 'byung ldan// snang ba
261b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas don yod grub// spyan ma gos dkar mA ma kI// dam tshig sgrol ma rnams kyis bskor// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// de bzhin 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la/ rdo
261b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po dang // chags pa dang ni legs pa dag/ sgeg pa ma dang bdug pa ma// lcags kyu mdang me sgron ma// phyogs dang mtshams la rim bzhin dgod// lho phyogs dbus su 'jam dpal dang // rin chen dbyings su g.yum dang baHsa/
261b3(rnying rgyud): rid chen gzi brjid dang // rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhad pa ste// phreng ba ma dang bdug pa ma// zhags pa ma dang bde 'a ma// yab yum phyogs mtshams rtsibs la'o// nub dbus spyan ras gzigs dbang la// yul chen pad+ma'i dbyings phyag ma// rdo rje chos dang rngon
261b4(rnying rgyud): po dang // smra ba dang ni 'khor lo ste// dbyangs mkhan ma dang mar me ma// lcags sgrog ma dang gsal bsdam// phyogs mtshams la ni rim bzhin dgod// byang phyogs dbus sro rdo rje 'dzin// las kyi dbyings phyag yum bcas la// rdo rjelas dang
261b5(rnying rgyud): rdorjeganod sbyin khu tshur dang // gar sbyar ma dang byug pa ma// dril bu ma dang 'bebs pa ma// phyogs mtshams rim bzhin bskor zhing dgod// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// sems dpa' sa yi snying po nyid// yum chen rdo rje sems mar bcas// phyog
261b6(rnying rgyud): rtsibs la dgod pa ni// sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang // dbang phyug rgyal po bkod pa'i rgyan// rin chen 'od 'phro phyogs bzhir dgod// bde ba rgyas 'debs rmongs byed dang // cho 'phel ma dang za byed ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi mtshams la dgod// lho nub 'pher
261b7(rnying rgyud): lo'i dbus dag tu// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po la// yum chen rin chen sems ma ste// phyag rgya'i rgyal po snang ba'i mchog/ spobs pa'i rgyal po spobs pa brtsegs// yum chen rdzas kyi lha mo dang // rgyal mtshan bla re gdugs lha mo// sems dpa' sems ma ba
262a1(rnying rgyud): kyis bskor// nub byang dbus su byams pa dang // yum ze na pad+ma'i sems ma la// pad+ma'i rgyal po dam pa dang // rdo rje mi g.yo thogs med dang // pad+ma can dang 'dzin byed ma// skyon bral rnam rgyal ma yis bskor// byang bar
262a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus dgaH// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel dang // lus chen las kyi sems sa la// rin chen dbang phyug thub pa'i las// dga' bar sgron dang mig yo'i mtha'// lhamo skabs can ni med ma// skra gcan ma dang thogs med ma// thabs lan
262a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sems mas bskor// phyi rol khyams kyi cha dag la// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // byol song yi dwags dmyal ba yi// thub pa chen po jug bzhugs bya// phyi nang phyogs kyi sgo bzhi ru// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma// dril bum rnams
262a4(rnying rgyud): rim bzhin bsgoms// de dag kun gyi phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog rgyan rtags ma lus pa// nga yis sngon du bshad pa bzhin// so so'i ming gis bskyed par bya// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjed 'bad// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// mtshan dang
262a5(rnying rgyud): dpe byad ma lus rdzogs// mnyam la ma 'dres 'ja' tshon 'dra// gsal la mi rtog me long gi// gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsgom par bya// rigs kyi bdag po so so yi// sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlab cing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// oM AHhrI/
262a6(rnying rgyud): gnas gsum so sor bsgom bya ba// dkar dmar mthing ga'i mdog ldan pa// 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram la// khyad par ldan pa bsgom par bya// oM hUM hrI hrIHhA/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan cing // ye shes sems dpa' reng
262a7(rnying rgyud): pu// tshon gang so so'i snying la gnas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM na hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA A da ha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa hA
262b1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsan tu/ ma khan ma dz+nyAn pa sa b+hA ba shAd+han tu/ oMs sa ga ta ma na ga 'jas thAb yA kA r+tha/ masarba ta thAg ta spang ba pa na ya bajas b+hab d+ha cha/ phung po khams dang the marjed dang // yul dang sa spang ba ma lus chags// da ga
262b2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i lhar bsgoms nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug pa ni// gtso chen thugs ka'i yi ge las// 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// 'og min gnas su spros pa las// chos dbyings dkyil 'khor thugs rgyad bskul// nam mkha'i dbus kyi mthan
262b3(rnying rgyud): nas// mchod bstod mnyes pas tshogs bsags te// gsol gdab bshags dang bsngo ba yis// bdag nyid rung ba'i snod du bya// slar yang 'od kyi cho 'phrul gyis// rang gi lus su gzud par bya// gsal ba 'od ldan gnyis med rdzogs// slar yang
262b4(rnying rgyud): mnyes par bya ba ni// thugs las sprul pa'i gsang yum bzhis// gzhal yas khang gi sgo bzhi nas// gnas gsum mnyes pa'i phyag gis mchod// 'dod yon lha mo sna tshogs kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mchod cing yongs su rdzogs par bstod
262b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa'i spro bsdu bya ba ni// phyi nang gtso bo dgu rnams kyi// rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi// snying dbus so so'i srog rten la// yi ge'i phreng sngags 'od 'bar 'phros// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab byas te// bde bar gshegs kun mnyes mdzad nas// srug
262b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// sems can khams kyi rgyud sbyangs shing // thams cad dang rig lhar gyur nas// chos spu thig le gcig tu bsgom// yang na dam pa brdzus pa'i sngags// oM d+ha na pany+tsas twa kro d+ha mu na ye swA hA/ gnas gsum yi ge gas
262b7(rnying rgyud): las// rang gi mdog ldan 'od 'phros pas// ma lus su gsum dag byas te// 'bras bu gsum la sbyar bar bya// de nyid 'od zer 'pho 'dra yis// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa rnams// brtan pa'i rtags dang ldan pa yi// dngos grub gang 'dod chad dang
263a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin thun gyi mtshams dag la// bstod cing bshags dang mchod sbyin b+ha// grub pa'i tshad ldan 'dod pa spos// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings su gshegs// dmachog tshogs ni sgo bzhi dang // phyogs mtshams ca
263a2(rnying rgyud): ngos nas brtsams// rim gyis dbus kyi gtso la bsdu// de nyid ye shes sems dpa' la// de yang thig le gcig la'o// de ni mtshan ma'i spos dang bral// de las slar yang lha rnams kyi// nga rgyal ldan pas spyod la me b+ha// gal te bde ba'i gnas 'dod na
263a3(rnying rgyud): dpag med sgro ldan skyes bu yis// lus gund rlung dang bcas pa yi// rnam shes dang ni byang chub sems// ye shes thig ler rab sbyor ba// dus bzhi gcig tu mngon mthong ba'i// blo can de yis kun tu bzang // nga dang gnyis med myur du 'grub//
263a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po la rab tu gzung ba'i sbyor ba'o// / de nas rab tu sbyor pa yis// ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon thabs ldan gyis// rdo rje slob ma nyer bzung nas// rim pa'i dbang bsrur byed 'dod na// bkra shes dben pa'i gnas
263a5(rnying rgyud): dag tu// dus chod gza' skad shis pa la// 'dus byas dge bas tshogs bsags te// phyi nang srung ba yongs rdzogs nas// lhag gnas sta gon bya ba ni// sa yi tshogs yongs sbyangs shing // legs par bstar ba'i stegs bu'i steng // lha rnams so so'i bzhugs
263a6(rnying rgyud): sar// dri bzad thig le mdzes pa'i steng // me tog tshom bu dgod par bya// rang rang snying po dbab byas pa'i// 'khor lo'i gtso 'khor tshul bzhin bsam// yan lag bdun gyis tshogs bsags shing // byin brlab dngos grub 'dod gsol bya// gtso chen dbus
263a7(rnying rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams kyi// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa rnams// rten 'brel rgyan dang rdzas sbyar te// rang gi gnas su legs bkod pa// 'khor lo'i bdag rnams nang du bskyed// sngang bzhin mnyes sbyang gsol bar bya// gzhan yang gyi nang gsang ba yi// rjes
263b1(rnying rgyud): gnang bral ba'i rdzas rnams dang // bsangs shing bkrus te sta gon bya// rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs dag kyang // khrus byas rgyan gdags dris blugs te// sangs rgyas dang ni sras tshul gyis// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// yul gyi mchog la skyabs su 'gro// don dang /
263b2(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob smon 'jug gi// byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// sdig pa sbyangs shing tshogs chen bsags// ku sha bri ma zhing so shing dor// srung ba'i sbyor ba 'bad par bya// 'di ni lhag gnas sbyor ba'o// nangs par skya rengs shar ba'i dus// sta gon lha rnams mkha'
263b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// tshogs bsags dge ba cung zad bya// slar nyid rdul tshon pho brang bzhengs// mchod cing sgrub pa'i rgyan dang rdzas// legs par bsags te dgod par bya// de nas ji ltar 'byung ba yi// lha rnams rang gi tshogs bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor sman drang
263b4(rnying rgyud): bstim// mchod bstod bzlas pas mnyes par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni// khrus byas phyag btsal sems bskyed de// rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog thogs// phyi rol gnas nas gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas des// bar chad dris te gnang ba sbyin
263b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bdag por mkhyen par gsol// slob ma yis ni me tog dor// gdod g.yogs bkrol te pho brang bstan// dam tshig rdzas dang bro tshig gis// mi 'da' phyag rgya mchog gis so// bsam pa brtan por bzung ba dang // lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang //
263b6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub mtshan ma ma thob par// rab 'bring tha ma'i rgyal gyis sgrub// rtags dang mtshan ma mthong gyur nas// phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa bskur ba ni// tshul bzhin spangs pa slob ma'i tshogs// mdzes pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni//
263b7(rnying rgyud): mthar thug mthong bar gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon mchog de yis// byang chub sems kyi nga rgyal gyis// rnam rgyal rtsa ba'i bum pa rnams// rnam pa chu la ngo bo lhas// lus kun khyab par bstim byas te// nang gi bsam pa brtan po dang // sngags tshig sla yi/
264a1(rnying rgyud): bden pa brjod// gzugs brnyan la brten de bzhin te// rin chen dpung bdun bkra shis brgyad// tshul ldan de yis phyi dbang bskur// chos nyid gzugs brnyan me long dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // chos dung rdo rje rgya gram dang /
264a2(rnying rgyud): cod pan phyag rgya ming gi dbang // las dang chos dang gzung sngags rnams// nang gi dbang du bskur bar bya// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi rgyud// rgyu dang 'bras bu rab sbyor ba// gnyis med mnyam pa'i bde chen te// nges par bstan pa gsang ba'i dang // ded
264a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas smon lam gdob// slob ma bla ma lha rnams kyis// rim bzhin bshags byang me tog dbul// gtang ngag tshul bzhin rgyas par mchod// bkra shis brjod cing bsdu gshegs brtsam// rtag tu spyod lam dam tshig gzung // 'di ni kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin//
264a4(rnying rgyud): 'phang sbyor ba'i las yin no// rdo rje slob ma nye bar gzung ba'i las rab tu sbyor ba'o// / de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// bde gshegs sgra gsung thugs kyi rten// gzugs brtan tsam la ye shes lha// rab tu gnas par bya ba ni// rgyas bsdus shin tu bsdus
264a5(rnying rgyud): las// rgyas par spyod la zhu ba pos// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// ri bo rtsi shing skye ba'i dbus// bkra shis yid 'ong gnas mchog tu// ji ltar bshad pa bzhi yi las// ma lus rdzogs par byas nas ni// gang la bya ba'i rten la sogs// lhag par gnas pa
264a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// khyad par bgegs bskrad bsrung ba dang // bdug dang bcing dang bsreg par bya// rdo rje slob dpon srub pa pos// khrus byas gos bgros brgyan byas te// bka' bsgo srung ba yongs rdzogs bya// sems bskyed tshogs bsags dge ba sbyar// tshul bzhin bsgrubs
264a7(rnying rgyud): byinang rlabs dbang // mchod sbyin rje cher sbyar nas kyang // dbang dang mkhyen par gsol ba gdab// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rtags dbyung bya// de nas dkyil 'khor shar phyogs su// rnam lnga'i stegs bu legs bshams la// grub pa'i rten de bzhugs su gsol// nye
264b1(rnying rgyud): 'bro thung byas nas ni// sngags kyi spong bas bar chad bskrad // 'bras zan chang bus drim gyi// me nA rlung gis bsreg gtar bathA// 'byung rdzas lnga yis kyang bkra// til mar 'bru mar bzu mos thugs// dar ras ras ser kyis byibs la// dbang segs ga dang /
264b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i steng du bzhugs// tsan dan gur gram dz+nyA ti dang // glu Ni A ga ru yis byugs// dam tshig pa ni gang yin bskyed// de yi ye shes spyan drangs te// bzhugs shing bstims la phyag btsal zhing // de nyid mchod bstod bzlas par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis//
264b3(rnying rgyud): bum pas dngos su dbang bskur bya// dkra shis brjod cing rol mo bslab// byin brlab dbu rgyan cod pan smin// yi ge gnyis kyi go cha bgo// slar yang mchod bstod bzlas pa bya// de nas lha rnams snyan gas na dbab// rten nyid na bzlas g.yogs te bzhugs// yon
264b4(rnying rgyud): bdag gam ni slob ma la// dbang bskur gyir ni bdag 'jug bya// de nas slob ma gzhug byas la// dbang bsrur ma lus rdzogs par bya// slar yang lha tshogs brtan bzhugs la// nga rgyal ldan pas ku sha'i steng // chos nyid thabs kyis nyal bar bya// de ni lhag gnas
264b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'o// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// byin rlab ldan pas khrus byas te// mchod sbyin sngon song bum pa bsnyen// stegs pa la ni dri bzangs spyard// lha rnams mchod bstod rdzogs par bya// de nas rten de zhal ba bus la// bkru spyang phyi ba sngar bzhin bya// steng bar
264b6(rnying rgyud): lhung zhing lha bskyed de// ye shes dbab cing bsre bsnan bya// gnas gsum 'bru gsum gsal bar dgod// gong bzhin dbang rim rdzogs par bya// rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyase gol gyis// skur krur gdul bya'i do gang la// gang
264b7(rnying rgyud): gis 'dul bder bsam zhing // spyan dang shangs dang zhal dbye zhing // choms 'thung dbu skra bshad dang gzhar// na bza' rgyan dang rol mo dbul// longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul srur dbye// yon bdag mdun du bkug nas ni// rten de mchod pa'i rjes gan
265a1(rnying rgyud): na// gang ng+gA zi'i ting du dang por bzhugs// matog la songs mtshad pa tshogs// 'byod pa yis chas par mdzod// sbyin 'asreg gis kyang tshogs pas za// denges dkyim 'khor bdag por bya// de nas mchod pa man
265a2(rnying rgyud): la ngas na po/ ga zhi na dpa papadzin pa/ byung byung // dgagasams rnas ma ga/ 'angs/
265a3(rnying rgyud): dra rlom par bya// de las gang yin kyang brtsor // spyadang rtse thu bas nubaza'adu bras// chos gang babyu gsung thugs kyi ming // rten 'brel bcas pa thibar \u0f7f// sdang bya gang rab gnas la sogs \u0f7f// gtsug lag 'ang ba yin nini//
265a4(rnying rgyud): sngags pani// rlung gi le shes paskyed par gyi/ kyis m-i sa basbyin no// mthong na gzugs so ni// 'du yang bsgyu ba byas nas ni// drag thal grags mardzogs pang bsam// mnyes pa'i bya ba sngang bzhin no// gang te sa pa

265a7(rnying rgyud): na sa su sa su sa su su rgyu ni/ du gyu phru du sa
265b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs shing bkru// bdud rtsis byugs pa'i ngas kyis da'i// sngags dgod phyag Na'i mtshan ma gdab// gnas ldangs bod drug dgod cing // phyi rol lha yi phyagamatshan dgod// mar me la zangs mnyam par gajug/ ji ba'i skyegs bu'i steng du shan /
265b2(rnying rgyud): 'khong bzhengs gsol ba'i// steng du mdzes pa'i khrel bzhig/ khang bu su mthog bu bzhi gyi// zag zhi pa'i shing gi brjod// steng du bya rgya'i dkyil 'khor dgod// phyogs pa ni gzung zag btaga'i te gzung// rdo rje slob dpon las bdag gis/
265b3(rnying rgyud): 'phor bsnyen pa gzhung bsrangs la// phung po'i rnam shes gnas nas dgug/ las bdag 'jug pa tshul bzhin bya// bad pa'i dbang dang rus pa dang // nir dbang bdu jig rtsi dbang bcu// srub dbang bcug sum gsang dbang gnyis// sum cu rtsa drug bsrur
265b4(rnying rgyud): na bka' rtags phyag rgya dang // chung 'dzin phyag rgya shes rab gzung // bkra shis rdzas dang rin chen bdun// khyad par gdan dang mdzes pa'i rgyan// rdo rje ming dang 'khor los sbyar// dbang bcu rem pas bsdar bar bya// don ldan lus de rol mos pa su// bsre
265b5(rnying rgyud): khang nad lcags yol bas bre// phyi rol mchod rdzas rgyas par bshams// til 'bras gro dang yungs kar dang // 'o ma zho dang mar dang bcud// yam shing rdzas dang dgang phrugs bskur// bdag nyid las ci ltar bsgoms la// phung po me lhar bsgoms pa yis// thugs/
265b6(rnying rgyud): kang lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// ye shes me lha spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas rim bzhin dbul// bstod cing phrin las gsol ba gdab// de nas lha rnams spyan drang bstim// ma nyes byas mchod rdzas bdud rtser bsam// phung po sdig sgrib phung phyir dbul// l+h+wan
265b7(rnying rgyud): so so'i snying po la// che ge'i sarba dun te shrId+hi ru swA hA// zhes btags bdun las mi nyung bzlas// bsreg rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin no// bstod tshig sngags kyis lha rgyud bskul// lhag mas me lha'i gtang ga bya// sdig sgrib ma lus spangs par bsam//
266a1(rnying rgyud): gsol la ye shes gshegs// dam tshig rang gi gnas su bsdu// rnam shes ltar byas dbyings su bstim// thal chen sku gdung 'bar bar myangs// thabs 'dis rang bzhin don chen rdzogs// kun bzang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
266a2(rnying rgyud): po'i lus rab tu spong ba'i sbyor ba'o// / gzhan yang rab tu bshad pa ni// gal te phung por mi ldan na// ming byang la rten sbyang ba ni// gro ga shing shun ras dag la// gzugs mdzes ming rus ldan pa ze// 'phan gdugs bcas te rten la gdags//
266a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lho phyogs stegs bur bzhag/ lha rnams mchod bstod rdzogs pa dang // bdag po'i ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// mchod sbyin rgya chen byas nas su// bar chod bgegs la bka' bsgo zhing // bden pa chen po brjod par bya// bar do rigs drug gar
266a4(rnying rgyud): gnas kyang // rnam shes 'od zer lcags rgyas dgug/ gzugs la bsti ma ste gson bzhin bsam// lus ngag yid kyi bar chad bgegs// gshin rje gshed dang rta mgrin dang // rnam par rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// yungs kar sngags te tsher gcang bya/
266a5(rnying rgyud): dpal rnon pos zlog pa gcad// ngan song kun 'dren gyis ni drang // stobs po rdo rje gnod sbyin no// drag po'i nus pas mtshan ma gzhom// sgrib pa rnam par sel bas bkra// ye shes me yis bsreg par bya// lan chags sbyin pas de nyid dpral/
266a6(rnying rgyud): sum skyed pa'i lus chab gsol// ngan song gsum dang bde 'gro gsum// rigs drug g.yang sa'i mtshan ma bcad// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/ sbubs 'gro sems bskyed tshogs bsag cing // me tog phul te lha ngo bstan// bram pa'i da
266a7(rnying rgyud): bskur rdzogs par bya// lam kyad chos bshad nor rdzas bstab// bsngo ba smon lam rgyas par bya// lam bstan rgyal ba'i sras su bya// de nas bsreg sbyang rdzogs tshul gyis// thal 'chos sgra'i rten du bsgyur// gnas pa dam pas mchog tu bya// go 'phang chen po
266b1(rnying rgyud): gdon miT// dbyar med kun tu bzang po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las rab tu grub par byad ba'i sbyor ba lnga bstan pa'i ladra gnyis pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan
266b2(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis nyin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs mnyes par bya ba dang / dam tshig can dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / 'gro ba phal pa dang / rigs myong ba dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang / gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas tshogs rab tu 'phel bar byed pa ni 'di dag bka' stsal
266b3(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// grub pa chen po byed pa'am// yang nasar chad bsal ba'i phyir// mchod mgron chen po dbye ba ni// gnas khang gtsang ma dris byugs la// snod gzang mdzes pa du ma ru// chu gsum me tog bcug spos dag// ma
266b4(rnying rgyud): dri che ba zhal zas dang // rol mo sgra dang 'dod yon lnga// bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan// mchod pa'i dngos por rab bstar nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rten bkod de// khrus byas gos bzang bgos nas ni// rnam par mi rtog dang nyid las// dkyil 'khor bdag po
266b5(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal gyis// dri chab nang du hUM las ni// khro bo las rnams rgyal byed pa// mthing nag ral gri zhags pa thogs// mchod rnaMs bgegs kun bskrad cing gzhom// oM swa b+hA ba shub+h+yaHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&ta/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ sbyangs shing bsang ba nyid duH
266b6(rnying rgyud): oM AHhU~M/ badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ badz+re tA pe hU~M/ badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ badz+ra gen+d+he hUM/ badz+ra ni bi te hUM/ badz+ra A ha ra hU~M/ badz+ra sha b+ha hUM/ lha rngas dam par byin gyis brlab// nam mkha'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bsgom// rang bzhin gnas nas snyan gas na dbab//
266b7(rnying rgyud): ga'i dod kyis spyan drangs te// zla brgya phyis gdan la bzhugs// gnyis med dbab pa mchog yin no// zhal bsil zhabs bsil brda sbyor ba'i// yon chab phul te 'dud phyag 'tshal// de nas me tog dbul dbul// bdug spos shangs pa mer me spyan// dri chab
267a1(rnying rgyud): kAr dbul bya zhing // bshos gtsang zhal la sgra ni stan// rim pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa'o// 'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun// lha mo brgyad sogs legs pa rnams// kun bzang blo yis srul te mchod// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
267a2(rnying rgyud): khams sun gyis// spos sman ngan chen dpag bsam shing // me tog shing tog 'bru badz+rad ci// chu gtsang wa stan gzugs mdzes pa// mchod 'os dngos po ma lus kun// bdag med blo yis blangs te mchod// gnas gsum myor ba'i tshogs mchod kyis/
267a3(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes bdag nyid la// las sbyangs dngos khyab gsal bar bsam// drin lanabs pagyid de dag la// cha lugs don rtags mthun pas bstod// sdig pa bshags te yi rang dbul/ 'gro don mdzad phyir bzhugs gsol gdang /

267a5(rnying rgyud): nams tshogs kyi mchog yin no// gzhan yang mchod byin stobs ldan ni// legs par bstar ba'i gnas de chu// gshos gtsang 'bras dang khung ba dang // zho dadu 'o ma mar thung phum// gtsang mar sbyar ba gsum du bgos// sbyang srel rang mos 'ardo byed pa'o// badz+ra
267a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brnab// oM I hU~M d+hIH/ kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ zhi srang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// bskrad cing dbang du bsgrubang rtse// dang po hUM yi mchod mthon ni// mgon mdzad bdun curtsa gnyis te// tshangs pa bcu byin rgyal chen pa ni//

267a8(rnying rgyud): grotra/ ga yas byung / ra shA rnangs pa byin yA

268a4(rnying rgyud): zhing skal te mos par bsgyur// spyod par dbang bsgyur thob par bya// phrin las bcol zhing dbang bsdus la// tshul bzhin bsngo brgyas par bya// bshags srung las sbyang bden pa brjod// chos kyi sbyin pa bsngos nas ni// 'phags pa rnams ni dbyings su gshegs/

268a7(rnying rgyud): mchog tu// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhi nyid la// ye shes lnga yi khri 'phang brtsig/ yang dag mtha' yi bum pa bskyil// stong nyid snying po'i srog shing btsug/ bcu gsum sa yi 'khor lo 'bar// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdugs kyis bkab// chos sku
268b1(rnying rgyud): 'brur mad rin po che// mi rtog gzugs su'i dang paban 'gyur// rnam dag sngon bral na bza' bgos// chos nyid don gyi sku gdung yin// de yi don rtags 'byung ba ni// rtags mtshan sku gdung bzhed 'dod na// rdo rje las kyi nying 'dzin gyis// sa brtag byin brdang
268b2(rnying rgyud): bsrung zhing bskor/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas sbyang ba dang // brdud dang bsrad pa'i bar du bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin chu yis sku// ting 'dzin chen pos 'bi 'bi bya// thams can snying po'i ti laM mar bsku// gzugs su 'byung ba'i brkos por du// 'bi be chos su 'arngam
268b3(rnying rgyud): par gsal// sor mo rigs lnga'i ngang gis dazung // sku gsum tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam// stobs bcu ldan pa'i ri rab ni// byang chub chos kyi sa la bzhugs// mi 'jigs bzhi yi bang rim la// so sor rig pa'i bum pas mdzes// rnam pa
268b4(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i sgo btod cing // tshad med bzhi yi bre bzhag nas// thabs dang shes rab skar khung btod// srog shing stong pa bco brgyad de// 'khor lo pha rol phyin pa bcu// mkhyen pa'i thugs rje char khe bla gdugs// rin chen tog ni sku gsum rdzogs// dril bu gsung dbyangs
268b5(rnying rgyud): drug cu'o// dar dpyang rin chen ma 'dres chos// bsung med gsum gyi rgyal mtshan btsug/ na bzang ba skyel med chos nyid du// byin gyis brlabs shing bsam par bya// rang bzhin chos sku spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan dag la bstim zhing dbab// khrus gsol gdan
268b6(rnying rgyud): dbul gas phyag 'tshal// dza swA dang ting 'dzin blos sprul dang // 'dod yon bdag bzung med pas mchod// don rtags tshig gis rab tu bstod// dbang bsrur mda' gsol me tog dor// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun de la dbang // khyad
268b7(rnying rgyud): par las kyi bye brag ni// lha rnams pa srub dang sdig pa bshags// shi ba'i don la skye ba dang // bgegs bsal ba dang bsod nams spel// rgod gtong bzlog cing nad gdug bcad// khrims nyams gso dang dam tshig bskang // byang chub bar chad bsal phyir
269a1(rnying rgyud): dang // lhag pa'i lta nga sngags sa bya// 'dad pa sa ma dzad nags pa thong // ldan las gdang zang gdu nang// bslang shing 'dud pas brtan pa bya// nga bras drug nga gnasas brgyan
269a2(rnying rgyud): sra gnyis 'grub// gzhan yang tshogs chen bshad pa ni// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' bad+ma thong // mchod sbyin gyis par btad byas nas// byin gyis brgyad cing myong ba dang // bas pa'i yo rba da
269a3(rnying rgyud): lags sang bsted pa'i sted// zlab tu byed zlum pa byung // sang ba'i byar dadangadabus suni// nga nas babyed cing tsam ze// phyir ma ma dza kyis brgyan// ma dbang po mngan// dmam la kya du sa nga ba byas parjes pa
269a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin mam she bya ba yin// 'bras chen ti la sogs 'bra sa tshogs// kra sha spos rdugayas su bzhag/ mthang rdzas phal pa g.yan drung // dgang thugs dam tshig mdun bzhag nas// gas dkar rgyan pags ku shi'i rdzing // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngargyal cis/
269a5(rnying rgyud): dade'i phyim zung grol gyis 'phyag// dbang lug de'i sa thu yis gtor// dug byed kyim phyir bstan pa dang // chag lnga'am gsum dag gis// skye na la kyang gsal ca te// byang badz+rag nga du yis// dbang thug sa su \u0f7f// bas rdzu
269a6(rnying rgyud): kyi'apas pa nga // gan she sa sa rnam 'im// thugs kyis thams na// dmas mi dag / da ma // ngas ma da ba // b+hagag pa byeg pa // gas comam patsun pa /
269a7(rnying rgyud): dza nga ma tshungs pa'i la shes dazug// bgegs bskrad pa skyes nyi mthod ngas dbul// dkar gsum mang gsum nyi la dang sa// mam shing ngam 'bras panarnam pa// rim pazhin zu te bgags su bya// bapyod 'dod pa'i dzin lapa bco// maN+Da
269b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams pho brang gsal byas te// ye shes phab la mchod rdzas dbul// lha rnams so so'i sngags phreng la// mchod bsreg rdzas kyi sngags btag dbul// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad rtse bar du'o// dgang thugs kyis ni
269b2(rnying rgyud): mdzel bshags te// brtad cing gso la gang baphrin las btsal// dkyil 'bar bkrus te me lcags// mchod rngus bsreg rdzas sbyar bzhin pasdang // bshags gsal bcol ba de bzhinan// ye shes gshegs te dmachog bsdu// sngon las bsngo stebs
269b3(rnying rgyud): shis brjod// nang gdon par chad zhi ba dang // mthar thug sdig srib sel ba'o// phyi ma'i dus kyi sgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor gnas pa'i tshe bsid pa// phun tshogs dben pa'i gnas dag tu// pho brang legs par gnas byas la// rin chen bum pa mdzes pa ru/
269b4(rnying rgyud): bkru zhing brab bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// nang du bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis dgang // tshe bshos mdzes pa stong bzhag ste// rdo rje rgyang margya yis gdab// sems dpa'i ting 'dzin skad cig gis// hUM las bum pa gzhal med khang // nang du sngar bshad lha rnams paphyed//
269b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i thugs ka rting dablag med// dmar pa tshe zas 'dzin pa bskyed// thugs kar rdo ste gyur// thag nas yig dri dang bzlas// bsgom pa mchog mdzag yin na// chos dbyings gnyis myed de bzhin no// 'od zer lcags bu'i rnam pa yis// 'jim
269b6(rnying rgyud): bdud dang gshin rje yi// lag nas bla tshe stobs kyis dgug/ dpag med thugs kA 'i ga bur swa// de nyid gnas nas hUM brgyad nas// gzungs thag rdo rje'i khod srug nas// mnyes byed 'od 'phros kun tu khyab// snod bcud tshe dbang bkrag mdangs bsdu
269b7(rnying rgyud): gnas dbus su ni me lus bstim// tshe dbang sngags kyi 'phro 'dra yis// lha rnams nyi zla'i bar du gzhug/ snying po lnga po 'od du thim// gnas lngar yig 'bru 'od du bekru// slob ma'i lus la bstim zhing dbab// tshe dbang mthu stobs byas par bsam/
270a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'is pan 'dangs// maung snang par thar ba las// ma 'gyu ces dbyings man pa na/ rnams kyis dang ba dmas// rtags zung bdag pa khrug tudangs// da yas thab ma 'chags med pa// bden pa /
270a2(rnying rgyud): brjod dbang bkur bya// 'chi med ga zi brjid brtan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon bskor te smon lam dang // bkra shis bden pa brjod par bya// 'di yis yun gnas sgrub pado// 'di dag ma lus thams cad ldan// kun bzung ba yeng ngadagis bslab/
270a3(rnying rgyud): rjes bka' stsal te// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyung rab tu 'byed pa las/ las ma mornal pa rangadabye ba'i brda ste gsum pa la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rab tu sgrub par
270a4(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i stod pa yang dag par gsang ba kra'i tshogs su gsung thugs gsang ba chen po las rab tu phyung ngo // oM laka srin phral // ba man ban+d+ha ga yak+Sha taHsa d+ha ta ya/ tsititI shwe ti sin+na d+ha na du ya yan/ mu t+ta na pas ya mi hU~M sarba wAT+Ta/ pakaSh+Ta rab tu bsgob
270a5(rnying rgyud): sngagasus// oM maHma tes ma rten pas ma ya n+te/ mthun pa dgasal ba'i sngags so// oMm mA mad+h+yaH/ dbab skrig// mabadra'i 'i rgyab bA nan/ bstis par// oM'i ma d+ham n+tashAn+na d+hIn brdzas rdzas hU~M d+hag tsa/ oM bdas ma pas
270a6(rnying rgyud): bA ma tiH/ dbye ba'i sngags so// namaHsa rba thAg ti thos bta thAg tA badzas na dz+ha la ni/ klo ba gtsug na kar sa thA/ tri ba'i thags so// namaT+Tas rbata thAg tA ba dz+ra kI li k+She lA yaM wAkar+N+Na ya s+thaH/ rdo rje thad pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// nA mArbA sa satwa thAg te b+h+yaHsa rbaT+Ta/
270a7(rnying rgyud): 'ab+h+ya/ bad ma kar cha thAg d+hA NAM/ ga kyi saH/ thugs kyi sngags so// oM ba bI li kA la sa padz+ra A lo gas canan mar sha rung du ma~M/ phung pa'i rdzogs sa// m-ig ka la shibardadun du rung raswA hA/ mang ba sngags so// oM badzi ti Sh+Tha kak+Shi ta sa swISh+Ta/
270b1(rnying rgyud): bya gas pa// ma gdab mas kul shA zlapa la byas// thum pa rnam par chul pa'i dgas pa// mang gyu da / sku ya grus// mas ga ga sa sbyin gsus rgyu smra dpa ngags // nga /
270b2(rnying rgyud): bcu gyis pa hU~M/ bcugs pa'i thugs so// mas sa/ ga nyis ts+tshin tu mi du // bdud pa rdzogs sa// ni la sa ma hU~M zhig gnas pa ya swAH/ mdzod ldan gyur// me bajig rgyu ti na/ 'byung
270b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra buM d+d+he su me pa hA ma tri bud ka UH/ me tog gi // oM badz+ra d+b+ha biSh+TAn+ta b+hud+d+ha a rbu ga t+ye rA hA/ bdug sa kyi ro// oM radz+ra ya N+Di te ba ri rag gan a ti ri li s+pho hU~M/ snang ba 'ang // oMs rba ke du shi kot+ta bA ga ta swa b+hA bas nAka tI pa~M rA hA/ bza' ba'i nga// ngor za drug
270b4(rnying rgyud): ta a shu ta na drA ya sAr+tha/ glu // namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ oM i d+hid+g+ha s+phar na ni sa ga bran baM/ d+hA ma ta dA A ka rarA sha ya sa ma r+d+ha ya/ namaHsarba d+hathA ga tA bi ri shwad mi tA le/ na ma rba te su madz+nyA na d+ha me/ sarba te thAgA te \u0f7fsi/ d+herme t+yad dza an+ti t+tAn d+ha sitsahAny+dza/
270b5(rnying rgyud): chod pa chen po rab tu grub pa'i snying po rnams ma// oM oM d+hIsmr-i dz+nyAn s+thA ma ya b+h+yAM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM yus ma bris me ma hA sA maM/ me tog gtor ba'o// Amr-i ta gr-it+ta d+hI pra ti sgyog/ sa mA ya d+h+waM/ brtag pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+raHpra be sha phaT/ mig
270b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags so// oM ma~M d+d+hi sid ti ta ya maM/ bat+ta ba'i sngags so// oM ban badz+ra b+ha T+Ta ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya shrI b+h+raM/ spang sa ma ya~M Sh+kaM/ sgo bye ba N+Di shan gyi'o// oMsar+b+bat+ta thA ga te phreng stan At+manAM/ ne tu yA mis rba thAg ta badz+ra sa twa mad+hi b+h+rU~Ms maM/ phyug btsal
270b7(rnying rgyud): sha rtse// mi badz+ra m+ba br-i shi ya a ma/ dam chog sbyin pa shing byer// ma badz+rag la sha ma b+hihrIHhU~M/ ba ba'i gar gyi'o// mau rdzu tid rdu las ma ma tha ba na hrIhA/ spangs sa mabru~M / nan// mas drug tu rdzas hU~M/ ka ta A ts+tsha ts+tsha /
271a1(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thAg ta zangar NA a b+hI ShId+ha maM/ phyag 'i ltola'o// oM rany+dza lA be sha ya sa ma ya a/ dmachog sbyin pa lho'i'o// oM ratra ka la sha a b+hiSh+TilAtAM/ bkra ba b+ha'ang// oM padz+ra ga tod+ha TA ya sa ma ya pra ba sha shI ShAM/ spangs la yad+da/
271a2(rnying rgyud): rub kyi'o// mosas twa thA ga tu me rnamapra bar+d+ha ya sAt+ma nAM nA~M na tA yA mes bta nAg tu badz+ra d+ha ma tha btA yA nA~M/ phrag ga'o// Sh+T+r-i madz+ra da mu ma be sha yas sa la A/ de mchog gi'o// oM drag la sha a ti m+me/ bkru ba'o// oM kamra ba to/ na las ma la ma
271a3(rnying rgyud): spa ra sa ma ya g+ne/ sgo dbye ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza ka ma NI A thA nI nIn+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta 'adz+ra ka ma gu r+tha maM/ phyag gi'o// oM ka mra A be shA yas pa ya a/ dmachog gi'o// oM karma ka la sha a b+hiSh+Te lpa a/ bkra ba bya ga ma// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha
271a4(rnying rgyud): ya sa ma ya pra bI sha shI kr-i/ mA ra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ dbus kyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta prad+d+ha k+ShA ya bAka tsit+ta pra Na men ban+d+ha na ka ro mi/ phyag gi'o// oM sa b+hA ba prad+d+ha A pre sha ya a a/ dam chog gi'o// oM bud+ha ki la sha a b+hiSh+TiSh+ya maM/ brgya ba 'o// a bA dz+ra ka po ta lA
271a5(rnying rgyud): waM/ stegs pa'i'o// oM A r+d+he naM hwe swA b+hA ba thad+haHsa tsun+ta rmA shrad+d+haHsab+hA ba u shu pa kir saM tit+tha/ bum pa bskyed pa'i'o// oM tsa t+yarmah+ma pu d+ha ka la sha set+taM mu mo sti ti/ gyi spang ba'o// o ka la shas rba prad+ha gr-i Na sir+t+ti hUM/ nang srung ba'o// oM dz+nyA na m+bi ma hA kar+tha/
271a6(rnying rgyud): par sha se d+d+hi thAM/ rgyu'i thugs so// A d+de pa ny+dza si h+ni hUM/ rin po che'i'o// oM pa ny+ra ni Sha dzA yai/ sman gyi'o// oM d+hU pa pa p+pa sid+hi kra dra hI/ spos kyi'o// oM gar+b+ha pad+d+ha sid+haM kraR+tha hUM/ snying po lnga smin pa'o// pany+dzan+ta d+hi si ma ya sid+hi nI/ 'bru'i'o// oM A hU~M mu kha la 'ig
271a7(rnying rgyud): shas hA/ rkyen gyi'o// mo ka swa Tak+ka sreg sa hU~M/ kha gyen gyi'o// oM padz+dza mi ka d+de/ mgrel bcings pa'o// oM A mrarbA m+bi traka pa shes taka rbaNAM/ gzungs zag gi 'o// oM bri ba tsan ba dris twa rat+na saM b+ha ba oM mai d+ha ba a ma g+ha sid+d+hi A mra/ AHdruM/ yungs kar
271b1(rnying rgyud): gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM rbad+d+ha tsit+sAd+h+waM/ 'o ma btsal ba'o// oM ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta a d+hISh+ThA nab+h+yAM/ oM dz+nyAn+d+ha ka la sha badz+nyA sad+d+hi sid+d+hi pad+ma badz+rA ya/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang bzhugs pa'i'o// oM prad+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma a b+hi Sh+TiSh+Tha oM hU~M hU~M hrIHha/ mU dz+ra thaM/
271b2(rnying rgyud): gya sbyin pa'o// oM shu pa ri ka ri sid+d+hi b+h+yAM/ ka la sha ma ta mu dru sarba gu Na sad+d+hi b+hI/ ril ba sbyin pa'o// oM ma pa ne ka na bi shra d+he b+h+yAM/ chu sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa naM pa sid+d+hi hAM/ 'bru sbyin pa'o// au a mr-i ta paSh+pa ra k+Shi ma hA kuru hUM/ sman sbyin pa'o// aud+hU pa par+Na a
271b3(rnying rgyud): pa de sha ma hA sid+d+hi hUM/ spos sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+dza rat+na sid+d+hi hUM/ rin po che sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa gar+b+ha sid+d+hi b+h+yAM/ snying po sbyin pa'o// oM kaM pa shri shwa su me pa ta stAM/ gu na b+h+yAM/ kha rgyan sbyin pa'o// oMd na l+li ti la kA shi ka si ka trUM/ mgul chingasu sbyin pa'o// o Sh+Ta pa
271b4(rnying rgyud): ya sa ri sra pa ka sha sA mi ta ku ru d+h+waM/ gzungs tha ga sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA Ad R+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra a b+hiSh+TiSh+ya a/ maM long sbyin pa'o// oM dz+nyA na tsakra a b+hiShIny+tsa a/ 'khor lo sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA s+phA ra ta ma ku ta a b+hiShIny+tsA mi/ dung sbyin pa'o// oM badz+ra rak+Sha trI ta baM hUM/
271b5(rnying rgyud): rgya gram sbyin pa'o// oM bud+d+ha hUM badz+ra tI rat+na hrIHpad+ma hA ka rma a b+hiShIny+dza mi/ dbu rgyan sbyin pa'o// oM sarba bud+d+ha ka lA a b+hiSh+Ti ny+tsa mi/ bum pa sbyin pa'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi ShIny+tsa trAM/ phreng ba sbyin pa'o// oM badz+ra a laM ba ne a b+hi ShI ny+tsa a/ cod pan sbyin pa'o// oM bud+d+ha badz+ra
271b6(rnying rgyud): rat+na pad+ma karma ma hA mu dra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ phyag rgya lnga sbyin pa'o// oM nA ma pu tra ya b+hi ShIny+dza a/ ming sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+tsa bi d+yA d+ha ra man+ta a b+hi ShIny+tsa ya/ gzungs sngags sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu ya sa ma ya a b+hiShIny+tsa a/ gsang ba sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga
271b7(rnying rgyud): ta ma hA pradz+nyA sa ma ya a b+hiSh+TiHmaM/ thabs dang shes rab sbyin pa'o// rab tu dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma hA ded+d+hong+ka Ta b+her bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shra pA sha ha sA ya/ oM a mr-ita kuN+Da li/ ga ga b+da hi khA hi tiSh+ThahrI ShA/ ban+d+ha bat+ta/ ha na ha na/ daha daha/
272a1(rnying rgyud): paHpar+b+ba/ gang sa/ baTal/ pa yak+shaH/ ma na / k+Sha ma tha /
272a2(rnying rgyud): kA ya pe sha d+ha na swA hA/ byug pa'o// oMr t+to a ba ha ri nI tAM/ bdang ba'o// oM AHhUM sarba ti thA ga ta A b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ya s+t+waM/ dbang bsrung ba'o// oM tsak+Shu maN+Da la'i sho d+ha nA ya swA hA/ mig dbye ba'o// oM dpe bya kar+t+ta ya ne da ka lo ki ti ba sad ta hri/ rna ba dbye ba'o//
272a3(rnying rgyud): oM pa bya ga nA sA sarba laM po daMr wi hrI/ sna dbye ba'o// oM bo bya mu khA ya gar+b+ha swA hA/ kha dbye ba'o// oM sarba po ki sha sa d+ha ra ni tri/ so sheng sbyin pa'o// oM sarba sho da na kha cho da tAM/ oM karma ne ha ra ni d+he/ spa breg pa dang bshad pa'o// oM rat+na oM la kAr hUM/ rgyan gdags pa'o//
272a4(rnying rgyud): oM dibi pa pra pu ya swA hA/ na bza' sbyin pa'o// oM ba su tsag pa ri ka re swA hA/ rkyen dbul ba'o// oM rat+na matra la u pa hUM/ gnas dbul ba'o// oM e ma ye ga gnas pa ri ka ra ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra si tA pa se ye swA hA/ bsil ba'o// oM A mr-i a mr-i ta kuN+Da li sarba big
272a5(rnying rgyud): ha na hUM phaT/ bseng ba'o// oM a ka ne te b+ha ga ya swA hA/ bskyed pa'i'o// A gats+tsha/ bod pa'o// oM ag+na ye d+hU be praSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he i maM gr-i h+Na prA dza a la la ho// dpral pa'i sngags so// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+nyA ya hUM/ til dbul ba'o// oM bi ma la ya sA
272a6(rnying rgyud): mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA pa maM b+hat+pa la sA hA chan gyi'o// oM A yu Sha swA hA/ dUr ba'o// oM ye ma ye gA ga la bA ri ka ri ye swA hA/ 'bru'i 'o// oM bine ta sta badz+ra swAtA// yam shing gi'o// oM a ha ra sus sde ma hU~M da re be sha sha n+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma lus pa'i sngags so// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa
272a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las chen po rab tu bsgrub pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dgos pa chen po'i don rab tu dbab pa'i rnam par dag pa'i cha lugs kyis
272b1(rnying rgyud): gdub rgya chen po dang rang gi gnas dang yongs su btsun pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstod pa 'di bkra' ba to// rdza rigs lnga sram la shas lnga// gtso can rags kun bdag thos// nam snang mdung ba zla mdzas dkar// byang chub phyag rgyas 'jom pang nga//
272b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mi bskyod sku mdog mning // sa gnon phyag rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ rin chen 'byung ldan su mdog ser// mchod sbyin rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/ snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mnyam gzhug pa ga bsdams// don por grub pa
272b3(rnying rgyud): mdog ljang // skyabs sbyin rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// gnyis med rigs kyi yum rnams ni// kun bzeng spyan mgos dkar mo// mA ma kI dang sgrol ma ste// so so'i yab kyi tshul bstan zhing / gcol 'dud pa'i
272b4(rnying rgyud): tshul du bzhugs// yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyag ma// mdog dkar rdo rje brtse lnga bsdams// rdo rje sems dpa' sgra mdog dkar// phyag
272b5(rnying rgyud): rdorje rje lnga 'dzin// rgyal po mdog ser lugs rtswa 'dzin// chags pa mda' gtu 'gengs mdzad dmar// legs pa ljangag rgya gram bsdams// sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje 'dzin// badrug pa mdog sAr smin 'phro ma/ rdo rje ljags rje mdog ni dmar// rdorje smon
272b6(rnying rgyud): mdog ljang gsal// lho sogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang // yum chen rin chen dbyings phyug ma// mdog ser rin chen ral gri 'dzin// rdo rje rin chen 'dzin mdzad ser// gzi brjid mdo ga ser nyi ma 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal
272b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan 'dzin padamar// bzhed pa mdog ldang so phreng 'dzin// rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin pa dkar// rdo rje me tog 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje zhags pa 'ched mdzad dmar// rdo rje 'bebs ma bsal mdzad ldang // nung phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan spyan ras
273a1(rnying rgyud): gzigs dbang dang // yum chen badz+ra dbyings phyug ma// mdog dmar pad+ma dmar po bsdams// rdo rje chos dkar pad+ma 'dzin// rnon po mdog ser ral gri 'dzin// gru ba lce 'dzin sku mdog dmar// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pa ldang /
273a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje dbyangs dkar pi wang 'dzin// rdo rje mar me 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje ljags sgrog 'dzin ma dmar// gsal bkra ljang gum bya 'dzin// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje dang // yum chen las kyi dbyings phyug ma// ma
273a3(rnying rgyud): sde no dri la thub snams// rdo rje las dkar kya gram bsdams// srung bsang po ga cha bsdams// gnod sbyin dmar po mchi ba bsdams// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzad ldang // rdo rje gang bskur sku mdog dkar// byug pa dri chab 'thong ma ser// rdo rje dkyis mdzad del 'khol
273a4(rnying rgyud): dmar// rdo rje 'bebs mdzad rgya rgyun bsil// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldanas oM snying po dang // yem tshon rdo rje sems man// mdog dkar rin chen skye ma bsdams// don rgyal mtshan phra mdog dkar// chu smin gser mdzag phyag na
273a5(rnying rgyud): bsnams// dbang phyug rgyal po sor lcags bya// bkod pa'i rgyan dmar me tog bsnams// rin chen 'od 'phro ljang rin chen// bde ba rgyas 'debs khaT+wAM dkar// za byed ma ser mda'i gzhu 'gengs// rmongs byed dmar mo phyag rgya bsnol// tshe 'phel ma ljang dri
273a6(rnying rgyud): bu 'dzin// lho thub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan nam mkha'i snying po dang // yu mtshan rin che na dbyings phyug ma// mdog seng rin chen ni ma tog/ snang ba'i mchog dka rdo rje bsnams// phyag rgya rgyal ser mda' gzhu 'dzin// spos kyi glang po
273a7(rnying rgyud): 'od srung dbang // spobs pa brtsegs ldang lcags su bsdams// khrus ma dkar ma bum pa 'dzin// rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma sra mdog ser// bla re 'dzin mdzad lha mo mar// gdugs 'dzin ma ni mdog ldang sngo// chub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom
273b1(rnying rgyud): ldan byams pacan pa dang // sum can pa d+ha'i mams pa // mdag dam k+ta gang ba ba rnams// bdu 'dzin ma dmyal pa dkang // badz+radam pa 'ad rnamasar// dang mag yangs \u0f7f// thugs pa N+Dal ldang lpags kyu 'din// rgyu da pang dun
273b2(rnying rgyud): dkar// 'jigs byed ma ser 'khor lo bsdams// sngon thal dmar po rla bsnams// nam rgyal ma ldang rgyal mim na bsdams// byang shar ma rnams kyid dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan sleb pa rnam snrel dang // sum chen lus kyi sems pane/
273b3(rnying rgyud): ljang phyag na po ti bsnams// rin chen dbang sbed rin chen dkar// grub pa'i las ser rgya gra ma bsnams/ dga' bar skyon dmar me khong bsdams// mi g.yo mtha' ldang bsam gtan mdzad// lha mo skyabs can gdugs 'don dkar// lto la dri med
273b4(rnying rgyud): sa
273b5(rnying rgyud): ma gan sa // ga phyogs thapas na gnas bzhugs pa// byid pa dag / nga ba mas// pag padu ma ga pa rnams// nathams thams kyi'og ga// shA/ gas la zad dzin pa par ma ga/ rabardzogs kyi rdzogs
273b6(rnying rgyud): dgen mas// rnam papa'i ma na rnaMs// phyogs thams kyi lags dag na// chos rgyal mthong drug na brnams// dpelas rgyam tho bzhin// ga di phyogs pa dkyang // zhwanang da shags pa se// nab
273b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ su#/
274a1(rnying rgyud): nas// 'gro drug g.yangs chod pa la// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brtag/ bde gshegs ku gyur pa nye// rang las byung zhing dang lus bral// zhes gsungs pa// bad gagan
274a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal kun tu bzang // de nyid rigs lnga grub pa'i thabs// nyon mongs rnams kyis
274a3(rnying rgyud): gnyen po che// legs pa nyid du bshad du gsol// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// de nyid rigs lnga bsgrub 'dod pas// yid 'od dben pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal gyi dor gnas nas su// bdud rtsi rnam lngas chag chag gdab// dpa' bo 'du lnga'i
274a4(rnying rgyud): dmigs rten dgod// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan gyis mdzes// phyi nang med par kun tu gsal// seng ge glang rtarma bya khyod // nyi zla sad+ma'i gdan stengs su// dbus su rnam
274a5(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad de// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' la// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan yin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so// byung du don yod grub pa ste// rang rang rigs kyi kha dog lu// 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // ral gri g.yas
274a6(rnying rgyud): ni rim bzhin 'dzin// g.yon pa kun ni dril bu bskams// yum rnams ya ba dang gnyis med 'khril// de ltar brtan pa thob pa dang // gsang ba'i sgyeng po lnga yis sbyangs// oM hUM trAM hrIHa// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni// don mtshon rgyal ba
274a7(rnying rgyud): rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lnga dpa' bo 'bru ldang 'dus// 'bru lnga yi ge mar 'dus shing // de nyid skye med klong du thim// bde gshegs dgongs bcud des don 'dis// pU lnga ye oM hUM hUM AHny+dza ya byang shes rnam lnga yis// dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur//

274b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyod kyi da byas nas ni// rje zhem sras kyis chug chag gdang // mthing ga rdza yig dmigs pa'i nad// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni// skye mdag dgar ban la ste rnyed pa// g.ya da
274b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// goyon pas dril bu dasul brtad// ti tha ba dra'i gdan la bsgrags// can dang malpags ldan par bsgom// de'i rgya ba mthon pa da // gleng ga gni ni gsum pa'o// 'bar la pad-i rje'i ting // pa nga rgya dgag// rig 'a

275b1(rnying rgyud): bi dza sAhA/ na bza' gsol ba'i sngags sa// oM sar+b+ba tAthAg ta rbang ya ma Ni ta Sh+T+rI g+h+nAT+Ta/ d+ha mang+ga trag rdzo hr-id la swA hA/ gnas pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga tA tAn pa r+tha kro d+ha satwa mun yAM swA hA/ dngu par ta ba rum t+ta maN+Dal gaN de ba cakra/ badz+rag ki swA hA/ dkyi
275b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi sngags so// oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni sarba ta thA ga ta a pa nA ya swA hA/ las spang ba'i sngag so// oM a mr-i ta sarba bid badz+ra tiR+Ya ka pre ta ka na rA ka ga ti pa ra na tra thA hUM phaT/ shi ba la phan pa/ bya ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te/ sa man+da
275b3(rnying rgyud): s+pha ra na ra smai b+ha ba ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza lA ni hUM/ oM puN+ye buts+tshe ma hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi ta A yu b+h+yAM dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti swAhA/ ba la phan pa'i sngags so// i na ma/ sarba bud+d+hA nAn a mi de ba laM laM laM sarba a ba ra Na bI sho d+ha ne sarba yaM pA paM bi ma li A yud+ha ra pu s+ye pu N+ye ma hA draSh+Ta
275b4(rnying rgyud): kurba swAhA/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Na ye ma hA yak+Sha sen pa ta ye/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ma hA ba la ha na daM ha pa tsa bid+ha r+tha ya/ dza nI la lbo pa wa kroSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ bgegs gcad pa'i sngags so// oM mu stA ni sum+b+ha h+ye/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/
275b5(rnying rgyud): A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bA na bit+ta rA dzA ya hUM phaT// spong gdon gcad pa'i sngags so// oM ka kyi ka kyi du ru du ru hUM pa pha ra dza/ le rgyas khe rgyas tsas me na maM no/ nad b+he sa nan/ d+hA re badz+ra ka ru da ta ya swA hA/ mdze nad gcad pa'i sngags so// oM tsa du ar+ya sad tA du kha pa ha sad ta oM
275b6(rnying rgyud): sa s+yAd ne d+ha ma ka makA lU k+Sha sa nad aH o nA ro ha ne rung ngan de a sIg sarba k+She shi sid+d+hi swA hA/ oMrga man+ti a te na ni taM ri mi ti swA hA/ sdom pa gso pa'i sngags ro// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dz+r-i D+ho mA b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a

276a5(rnying rgyud): don la dgongs dang dgongs med dang // de bzhin sgra dang ma yin nyid// des pa nyid dang drang btsam// sbas tshig spyi yi yi ge las// bdag po'i snying la nges gnas pa// thun po gzhan la snying brtse dang // go ba bzang la rab bstan te// lhag par spyod pa nyid la

276b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung so so'i nus par ldan// rin chen ri rab gzhal med khang // mtshan nyid kun ldan khyad par du// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi brgyad kyis mdzes// rtsal stobs shugs mdzes rigs ldan pa// 'degs byed steng du dong bsil 'od// 'jam mdangs
276b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pas gsum dbyung ste// rtsal chen steng du med pa'i rgyu// rdo rje chu skyes ming gis mtshan// gzugs sku 'jig rten khams su spro// gzhan don mdzod pa rdzogs slar thim// phyag rgya yongs kyar byed pa'i yid// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan dkar 'od//

277a2(rnying rgyud): rdo thugs kar brten// g.yon pa dri la thus yum la bzung // btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// mthun pa'i tshul dgras rab tul khrel// sna tshogs rigs kyis dbu rgyan cing // g.yon pa dri la gzugasu gang brten// g.yas byanyi ma'i 'od kyis 'grel//
277a3(rnying rgyud): rnam shes lhar+ya bsgom// sku mchog pade chen gnas sra bsgom// longs spyod gnas su ma byin no// snying ga ste ba gas barba// r+the dang A hI rim bzhin dgod// mthong myom tshor dang myong ba la// hU~M ris pa'i na bsam// oM b+h+r-id+b+ha dang dr-i rnams ni// de dag kyi rol
277a4(rnying rgyud): yul la dgod// yig sgra yi dkyil 'khor las// gnyis med sems dpa'i thugs gnas// 'od 'azlos sku gsung grags bsdus nas// mdun gnas de la gsol ba ni// oM 'bar pa'i rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan zin las rmed byung ldan// 'di nyid kun dang
277a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam skyong ba// phyag rgya sbyin por bdag spyong cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA k+ShA ya thAka tsi d+ha badz+ra la thA ba A Sh+Ta ko&haM/ wa gsung thugs kyi rgyal bskyed// sum gyi grwa mi dkyil 'khor dgod// 'dang yon lda dang b+h+rUM bsgoms te// spyi bo mgrin par li dang // lhag mar rmu n+ya
277a6(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA bas ma// maD+ga kyang myo hU~M d+hI Sh+Ti sa/ zlaral pa chu ba nyi gong // byin gyis brdabs pa'i gnas ldas// 'bru lnga bsgoms te su rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khod sbrul phyir 'dzin pa'i gnas// 'byug su mdzo pa rji babyed// oM sarbata rtag ta ma hA saT nga gi badz+ra sa thAg sa
277a7(rnying rgyud): kau rbe// yum gri bde ca thugs de kyi la // rkyen brnangs thabs mags mi ge las// ma ban pa can ma'i mu rdzogs nas// sr-im rtsa brgyad ming gis 'byung / rang gi na lugs yong sa rdzogs pa// gsal 'tshong lca sdugag bye d+ha bar// shA rdzogs
277b1(rnying rgyud): phreng bas 'phags// kun tu khyab cing ldan gyis brub// ma rig sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i phyir// skal ngan gyi yang gzugs bstan pa// bcu gnyis mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// 'grobs sa phyogs 'dul ba// rgyan ldan rdzogs par gsal bar ldan// thugs
277b2(rnying rgyud): kyi sa bon 'od phreng las// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// rang gi mdun du mngon par bsam// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH// ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad du byung // de nyid kyi
277b3(rnying rgyud): ni mnyam bzhugs pa'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ dzahUM ba~M hoH/ rang shar dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen par ba rdzogs dam tshig mchog/ ye shes
277b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor mnyam sbyor bya// sgyu ma lte bu'i kun la brdal// mchod phyir dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // de yi phyag rgya chen por bsgom// bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs bsdus thugs kar shim// gsang ba
