278a1(rnying rgyud): na / ga / na /
278a2(rnying rgyud): hA kro d+hA da ha da ha tAM/ oM ya mAR+tha ka ma d+hu krod+ha pa tsa ba tsad+h+we/ oM As+ya sa tsa la maHkro d+ha ba d+ha bat+tam+b+ha/ oM pad+mA d+ha bta me kod+hA hu la hu~M l+r-iSh+Ta/ I ma hA kr-i d+hai drAki rI d+h+r-i tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/ AM a mr-i ta mAH tAM/ oM bi khyA nAn ta kr-it+ta ma d+h+ya / oM sa
278a3(rnying rgyud): bAkro d+ha d+h+r-i ka ra ga ji ga hUM/ oM mr-i sh+tsa kro d+ha ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+phoT b+hUM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na tra la dz+wa la ba badz+ra hU~M phaT/ dbab pa'i sngags so// oM d+han tsakra dz+wa la dz+wa la Sh+kaM/ brdeg pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra mr-id gar hU~M thA ko Tas+t+wa~M oM Ta ya r+tha/
278a4(rnying rgyud): brdung ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ badzub pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tik+Sha sha ke ha la ha la hUM phaT/ gcad pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra raM pa raM ngo la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ bsreg pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA shwa n+ya ta dz+nyA na~M trA~M/ oM ma hA kA ru Ni hUM/
278a5(rnying rgyud): mAhAs+'u ShaN+DaM/ rim pa'i sngags so// oM pra r+d+haHt+tAskAr/ dwe ba/ ma~M ba d+ha si~M/ ma ha ra Na tAM/ spo ba sgra'i sngags so// oM wa ka shA ma hA le/ yAM ka ma dak+Sha rti/ byAM ma mA na ni ri mtshal/ mr-i dz+r-i madz+r-i/ la~M ti sha man+ta la/ ra~M d+ha ni d+hi lu maN+Da la/ trA~M rAHd+hA
278a6(rnying rgyud): bI shwar+d+heD+h+we/ bskyed pa'i sngags so// sa he s+t+waM Sh+Ti ga/ mA kr-i r+b+ha san+ta la/ a tsan+d+ra mAr+d+hal/ pa pad+ma maN+Da la~Mb+h+yAM/ r-i ra t+na maN+Da la thAM/ gding ba'i sngags so// oM bAdz+ra tsi A bA shwA a s+yA/ Ana? daM paM s+yAta ta/ na ma~M hA ra te/ badz+ra ti sau/ pra ba ta s+thu NAM hUM phaT/
278a7(rnying rgyud): sata ra Na b+h+rUM/ bzhag pa'i sngags so// oM mr-ing+ka ny+dzi shwa ri/ dzi na dzika pad+ma maN+Da la o/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+h+r-i/ tset+ta sid+d+hi s+thar Na phaT/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA geHhaM/ rA ga yA mi/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ tsi r+tha e praM maN+Da wad+h+waM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra NatAM/ dbab pa'i sngags so//
278b1(rnying rgyud): am/ dz+hab+h+yAM/ sam+b+ha// / \u0f7f!/ k+Sho/ \u0f7f/ dza/ gr-iH/ dzas/ ma / steH/ d+h+r-iH/ grA hoH/ g+has/ bcu bas+ho// d+has rba la/ mang ga stang po dang bcas ta dbyung ba sngags sa// mas thAg ta mat+ma / ka maHti thAg
278b2(rnying rgyud): sa mo dr-i sh+ya hau/ bod pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pad+ma sa ma pra be sha ya A be sha yA/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dbab pa'i sngags so// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo thA ga ba te b+h+yo badz+ra sA ra pra mdza ni/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ sar+ya kr-i bud+d+he d+haH/ tad+yad+yA/ oM brjo ba
278b3(rnying rgyud): hA badz+ra ma ha te badz+re/ ma hA bi du badzo/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+tabadz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi man+do ba saM pa maN badz+re/ oM badz+ra sa rba ka ma A ra ra Na bi sho d+ha na badz+ra swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM AHbadz+ra suMrba to bi bi sha ma hA ra thA gA Na tsakra phung me g+ha pra tI ts+tsha ba len+te/ ma d+hu maN+Da ya swa kha ho// pUng kha la/
278b4(rnying rgyud): khA ti/ bstab pa'i sngag so// las rtswa tshogs pa'i rig pa'i ldag so// rab tu snang ba dbyung ba'i khyad par ro// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgo dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po la gsung gi sgra mnyes pa'i brjod pa rnam pa lnga slob mdzad de/ chos nyid kyi snying po rang gis rtogs
278b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'don las sgra brtan lta bur grags pa ni/ e ma/ ma skyes dbyings las skye ba'i cho 'phrul ni// dug lnga rnam dag sku lnga rigs lngar gsal// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// chos sku khyad par ye shes lnga yi dang // rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar 'khor lo bskod/
278b6(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod mthing gardo rjes gnon mdzad// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rin chen dbyigs// snang ba mtha' yas mdog dmar ting 'dzin mnyam// don yod grub pa ljang gu rgya gram 'bar// go 'byad kun tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// brtan mdzad sangs rgyas spyan mthor
278b7(rnying rgyud): tshugs bsnams// bsreg mdzad gos dkar ma ni rin chen 'bar// skyong byed mA ma kI ni pad+ma bsnams// bskyed mdzod dam tshig sgrol margya gram bsnams// so so'i rigs mchog yab kyi tshul 'dzin ma// thabs kyi sgra las shes rab bskyed pa'i yum// gsang
279a1(rnying rgyud): mchog mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde 'byung gnas// bde gshegs sras tshogs ma lus yum gyur ma// 'gro don mdzad phyir thugs rje'i sku srul ma// rigs lnga yab yum tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi thug
279a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sras// sa lam yon tan ma lus rab rdzogs shing // 'gro kun bla med gnas su bzod mdzad kyir// sa bcu rtsal tshab gnas bzhugs sems dpa'i gtso// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser ral gri bsdams// spyan ras
279a3(rnying rgyud): gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma bsdams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dri la bu bsdams// kun bzang mdog dkar rin chen snyem bsdams// byams pa dmar ser klu shing gun+d+he bsnams// sgrib pa rnam snre la sngon po po nyi bsnams// 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar ser ut+pal
279a4(rnying rgyud): bsnams// tshogs bkyang dag pa rnam thar bkyang rdzogs dang // sems dpa' brgyad kyi sbal phyag 'tshal bstod// bral ba'i sku gzugs mchod pas many+dzus mdzad ma// 'dod yon tshogs kyis ma lus thugs dem slor// nyon mongs spangs pas ye shes rab rgyas
279a5(rnying rgyud): rjem sa grug nga rgyas byu bskal ma pa // lAseM ga ma pa lang thabs bsdams// sal mir ma na can dang ba bajams// gad ti mngam pa 'a sbyi ma ga rnams// d+hi thaMng thug mgyur// chu gang mamam
279a6(rnying rgyud): pran+de ser mo me tog parda 'thor // gsal ba'i mdangs ldan dmang mo mang me bsnams// gar+b+he ljang gabyug pas mnyes mdza me// yul brgyang rnam dgas brgyad rab rdzogs pa'o// sems ma bskyed kyi skul phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs drug 'jig rten lams
279a7(rnying rgyud): kyai na ma da pyir// mthun drag thabs kyi spong bar ston// bcu gnyis mdzad pa'i tshum gyis gdu le ba byud // mang gas kyi rlabs ca 'phrul snga tshigs rkyen// sgra ye thub pa ma dag dkang 'i chung 'dran/ lce me thub pardzun pago cha bsdams// ma ye nga/
279b1(rnying rgyud): pa sar po gsog shang 'dzin// rgyal sang thub pa mthing ga po nyi rna mas// yi dwags rtsub pa dmang bzla pa ba snams// dmyal ba'i thub pa nag pa mchu bsdams// thugs rjecan pas 'gra drugs mang 'dran// bcom ldan thub drug sul phyag tsha la baspyad//
279b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs gra gsung thugs las skul pa'i Ta// dus bzhin ma dag phrin las ye shes ban+de// rab tu rigs mdzad drug shul khro ba'i grwa// gtsochen las mdzang thugs rjes gdug pa 'jal// rnam par rgyal ba dkar po bcan bsnam la// nga langs man ma ngag
279b3(rnying rgyud): dkar lcags tha bsdams// gshin rje gshed po mthing nag thod dbyug bsdams// me la ma ni mdog ston zhags pa bsdams// Na mthi na dmar bzod sbrul pang+gA bsdams// rwal gcig ma ni mdzo / dmar lcags klog pa snams// bdud rtsi 'chil
279b4(rnying rgyud): ljang gu chug ma bsdams// khro ga nyer ma ni mdog ljang dril bu bsdams// khro tshul spyan gsum zhabs gnyis dar thabs bzang // khwa rgya la yab yum sbal phyag 'tshal bstod// dbyings kun rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// thugs rje'i dbang gis dngul byed
279b5(rnying rgyud): sur bstan pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// thabs dang shes rab sbyor la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces phyogs bcu thams cad du chos nyid kyi sgras khyab par mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i gzugs kyis thams cad la
279b6(rnying rgyud): snang bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rlung rab tu 'byed pa las/ dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgo nas bslab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// sku lnga ldan rdzogs ye shes kyi// thig le snang ba'i rim pa ni//
279b7(rnying rgyud): bsam gyig mi khyab mtha' yas mthag/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa'i zhing // bas ma yas rnam dag gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// ma lus mthong thos nye bsnyen dang // rgya cher gsungs pa'i don 'byung ba/
280a1(rnying rgyud): shAs mthun pa byu ban// ga nga sa thalab // rang pa dang u da hU~M// sangs cam thun gyi ma gamigs// dang gang la sa nga ma dung // phyag nga du nga // sags kyang ga sa ga nga
280a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen pos mi gtong ba'i// 'gro drugaso so'i lus su snang // de ltar dang lus dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil lor gsang ba bsgrub par bya// lus dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil gabor la ni lus kyis bsgom// lus bye kyil 'khor las byung ba// sems
280a3(rnying rgyud): dang rdzas kyi dkyil pa par mchog/ gseng ba'i bag le sa kyi kyi sa// 'byung ba'i shes rab rigs kyi sas// ba rjen gas rigs bzhin te// byang chub sems rdo rdo rje tshogs// yul rdzang dran parba dkyil ra ba la// bdag nyid ga par
280a4(rnying rgyud): yig 'drungs// thags rje sa sa sgyumar snang // po ga las nyam sa/ da panas she ma ma mas// sde shes ngas pa ma da pa bas// ngagasus 'i // me ni pa rje mi drung ba// kyi 'dzi ma
280a5(rnying rgyud): yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid debyings// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bzhi dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sra gsung yon tan zin las thugs// ma lus bdag gis zhal mthong brje// dbang sgyur mchog ni 'di yin no// 'byung ba phung pos
280a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas lnga// rnam shes brgyad dang de yi yul// sems dpa' sems ma rgyad yin no// 'gyur ba bzhi ni sgom pa'i// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs thub pa drug/ lus las byung ba'i 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// ma lus mnyam sbyor thugs rje
280a7(rnying rgyud): 'byur // phyogs dus kun tu 'dus pa'i mgon// sgyu ma'i lus kyi sbyor ba yis// 'bad rtsol phral ba'i lus la spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i lus 'di la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i myong ba yis// rang las byang zhing lhun gyis grub// gnas spyod 'phro dang tsa
280b1(rnying rgyud): ba gsum// gsang ba'i ye shes pa sted pa'i gnas// mkha' daci 'phrog ma dbyings te zla// ye shes bdag po yab yum bsgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'dar bar mi mdzad dam chog mchog/ nang du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o//
280b2(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsang ba'i de nyid don// lus kyi de nyid rlung gi gnas// sems kyi de nyid ma bcos pa// thabs dang shes rang rdzogs sangs rgyas// dri med dngas pa chos kyi sku// ma btsal gtan la dbab par bya// sems kyi gnas lugs de nyid ni// ma bcos dus na'o/
280b3(rnying rgyud): bzung ba// kha sbyor snyoms 'jug rmi lam bral// yid med lus dang btung bas myos// yul rtog ma zhugs sna tshogs te// rang gi de nyid mtshon med shes// skyod byed rgyabs tshod bzung zhing // mi mthun gnyen pos rtags dang sbyar// dngos grub kho na nyid du
280b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bas de yi sgrub pa po// phrin las dngos grub gnang ba ni// lha klu gnod byin srin po dang // mkha ljid lho dgye mi'am chi// dri za srin po sha na dang // 'byung po sbal po lus sul po// skem byed skyo byed brjed byed dang // gshin rje mkha' 'gro la
280b5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs tshogs dang // rlung dang mkhris pa gang kan dang // 'dus pa rnams ni yan lag bcas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i rnam grangs nad// lhan cig skyes dang glo bur ba// 'byung ba'i lus kyi mthun 'phrod dang // rten cing
280b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel 'byung rtags dang ltas// gang gis gnod cing 'tsho ba'i phyogs// sdang zhing gdug dang 'tsho ba dang // drag shul spyod dang sbyor sngags dang // rang la gnod dang gzhan la phyogs// rang gi de nyid yongs shes pas// nyon mongs rtsa ba yan lag bcas// gzung dang
280b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa ma lus pa// zhi bar gnas pa nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas ye shes lhag par mthong // gnas shing goms pa brtan gyur pa// 'di ni zhi ba'i dngos grub po// gnas pa'i tshe dang grub pa yi// las la dbang thob dngos grub ni// rdzas dang longs spyod dpung dang 'khor//
281a1(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i dpal dang snyan par grags// gzugs bza ngadabang phyug ldan pa dang // stobs dang brtson 'grus rab rgyas shing // blta dang mthong dang g.yo ba dang // yod med gshis la dmigs pa dang // bgrod dang 'gro ba myong pa rnams//
281a2(rnying rgyud): 'osadrab sa// rta dang skyes padi lta ba// rang bzhin rgyu bas tshogs pa dun// gcig nyid la shes nyid yin yang // 'khong ba dang ni myang na 'das// rnam pa dang nang ba dang // man ldag pa dang gnas skapas ste// d+ha 'bras chags pa thed da dang // snang ba /
281a3(rnying rgyud): ba dang // sems dang sems su 'dzin pa dang // stong dang stong par byed pa dag/ rang gi ngang du rgyas pa ni// dngos grub gcig tu 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten chos phyir gzugs can dang // gzugs med khams kyis bsdus pa dang // lus dang longs spyod brtan pa na
281a4(rnying rgyud): pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje bo'i tshul dag gis// rang gi yul du bya ba dang // nyon mongs pa dang nye ba yi// nyon mongs nyi shu la sogs dang // dge ba des 'gyur kun 'gro dang // snang ba'i rang bzhin bcu phrag brgyad// yul dang yul can ma lus pa//
281a5(rnying rgyud): rig rgyal pos dbang bsgyur ba'i// phrin las dngos grub nyid yin no// rgyud lnga lam gyi snang ba dang // rigs drug 'khor ba'i g.yang sa dang // bar chad bdud bzhi'i nus pa dang // bgegs dang 'byung po nyon mongs dgra// las dang las kyi 'bri bskyed kyi//
281a6(rnying rgyud): skye pa'i
281a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal gyis// ma lus ldog par nus pa ni// phrin las drag po'i dngos grub po// rgyu dang rang bzhin gzhi dang las// gyad kyi lus gnas nor bu bzhin// mthong rtogs mngon du spyod pa ni// 'bras bu'i phrin las dngos grub po// 'di las phra mo'i ting 'dzin ni/
281b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes brgyad pa sngon song nas// rig bcas rig med srung gnas dang // 'phen pa'i lnga phung la brten pa'i// rig bral myang dang rig pas drang // gzung ba che las brtan pa yis// mchod sbyin gnang ba stsal ba dang // rten bsgrub pa dang spel ba dang // lug
281b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang sems bsgyur dang // gtan 'pho nyid dang sgyu ma'i lus// dag pa'i mkha' dang du ba dang // srin bu'i tshul dang sgron me che// smig rgya 'od lnga pa yi tshul// 'gu byed rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rmi lam bar ma dor myang zhing // snga ma'i rted las gnas pa
281b3(rnying rgyud): 'pho ba dang 'jug pa dang // ldog pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // gnas gyung ba dang chag 'ang bab// dam par bshad pa la sogs pa// pas kyi med par byas pa mi thab// nye bar spyod pa thams sngar 'jug// gnas gsum dag par las skyes ni// ngos ma
281b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa rlungs / kyi gas pa la sogs// brgyad pazlangs med de// cig // na byung ba // dngas kyi smras gas// /
281b5(rnying rgyud): smye dgagasas mas snang / dugs sa / rin can sa kyi / padang dgas pa sa kyis // lam chog tha~Mg garjod// nga ba'i rnam na ma// gnyisas
281b6(rnying rgyud): dron gos dkar ma yis so// mAm kI yis thag sungs te// rlung ni de mchog sgrol mas so// sa mi snying pos mig dbang po// nam mapa'i snying pos na ste// sAni sun ngas gzigs kyis so// na phyag na rdorjes so// byor ba mthong byabyams pas kyang /
282a1(rnying rgyud): thos 'gyur kun tu bzang zas hA// rtsar ba sleb pa rnams la lo// myong ba'angam dpal rnarna zas kyang // gzugs sdang skrag pa ma yas snang // grags chang klu dbyangs lan mas te// rnam pa kun ni dag rtsed ma// tho ba
282a2(rnying rgyud): drud ma// 'dam chub dag pa pyong byed ma// 'dod pa rang ging dgas srung // rnam par rgyal bas zhi bar bya// gshin rje gshed kyis rab rdzus shing // ha la sgri bas dang drang wa// bdud kyi 'gyel bas mngon du pyod// mum rnams kyis ring grag pa dang /
282a3(rnying rgyud): bcing sa ma dab ba der byab byin// rig sa drug drug bsngal so so rba// bcwa byin skal bas ldan pas kyang // sags pang ris nga ldang byed pas// yang pa'i skye bas pa min kyang // mirnams bya thab pas so// thA sa dgas kya byung te// dmam
282a4(rnying rgyud): mdzod ces yi dgas te// ras rgyal sprul pa sa dkyil bskyed// lum dag ma na drugasung nags// thab mardzas thams cad byan// bskams dang gzhan na rib pa dang // ngas 'byung dka' stod rdzogs mdzad cing // byang chub pa dang chos gsungs shing /
282a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs tshul mdzad dang sra gdung bstan// zhi du gnas pas ma pa kha cig tu// skyabs su 'gro zhing sems bskyed dang // sdom pa kun la yongs gnas dang // dbang bskur 'jug pa'i tshul dag gis// gtan gnas slong dang spyod mdzad cing // gnas
282a6(rnying rgyud): bltar rang bzhin shes pa yis// thang der zla zag mi gnas la// gdong nas 'gyur med shes pa yis// rtsol bad dbyings su gnas pa yang // las kyi khyad par so so yis// grub pa'i mtshan rtags ma pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs
282a7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyung rab tu 'byed pa las/ nang dang gsang ba'i phrin las dngos srung rtsi rnamam par grub pa'i liT ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs chen po lnga'i bdag po 'byung ba'i phung po nyon mongs pa spa dang yi
282b1(rnying rgyud): shes rnam par dag pa'i ngang du grub par byed pa'i/ gsang ba chen po'i don nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje las rab tu byung ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor las la nye ba yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// stong zhing bdag med kun gzhi
282b2(rnying rgyud): yi// rnam shes rig pa byang chub sems// rdo rje gsum du dbyer med gnas// sems nyid skye med yi ge las// 'phro 'du'i las kyi sbyor ba yis// yum lnga'i mkha' dbyings 'byung ba lnga// phyi nang thun mong khyad par yin// 'dod yon 'byung ba'i gzha
282b3(rnying rgyud): med khang // seng ge glang chen rta dang ni// rma bya nam mkha' lding gi gdan// rgyan ldan rdzogs pa bzhengs su gsol// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin sbyor ba yi// mngon sum snang ba bsgom pa ni// oM hUM trAM hrIHhA/ 'khor lo bzhi ldan pho brad du// kha dog lnga
282b4(rnying rgyud): mdzes par bsam// spro bsdu yongs su rdzogs pa las// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// padz+ra rgya gra ma rnams su gyur// de nyid slar yang gyur pa las// rigs lnga rang gi yum dang bcas// zhi ba chen po'i tshul dgur ldan// ye shes dam chog rang gis ba zhugs/
282b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid can// gzugs brnyan rdul tshon de 'dra bar// rang bzhin gnas nas rab bskul te// rin chen khang par gnyis med gnas// 'dod yon sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis// grangs med rdul mnyam lus kyis 'dud// rdzas kyis
282b6(rnying rgyud): mnyes pa 'di yis bya// rigs mchog so so'i rdzas kyis mchod// sku lnga 'dus pa'i dngos grub blang // rang gi med gri sgra tshogs kyis// sa bon las ni sku rdzogs pa// grangs med brjod las 'das pa yi// yo ga'i gsung gi 'khor lo yis// dbang po'i
282b7(rnying rgyud): zheng kun bzhes mdzad de// dngos grub ma lus dbyig bsdus shing // sems can khams kyi rgyud spangs nas// rang gi rigs kyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// de la sku yi cha lug dang // don rtagla rnam dag sgo nas ni// yon tan tshog+sa
283a1(rnying rgyud): // bstod par bya// rdul tshon ting nge 'dzin la bsdu// ting 'dzin rang gi sems la bsdu// spyod lam kun tu rgyal bya// 'din gyi yi rdul tshon la// brten nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'o// phung po'i dkyil 'khor bslab pa ni// rang lus dgon pa'i gnas
283a2(rnying rgyud): dag tu// gzugs lung de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rnam par shes pa rdo rje'i rigs// tshor ba'i phung po rin po che// 'du shes phung po pad+ma'i rigs// 'dradu byed las kyi rigs yin no// sa sha de bzhin rigs kyi yum// nam mkha' rus pa rdo rje'i rigs//
283a3(rnying rgyud): drod mo rin chen rig kyi yum// khrag chu pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rlung dbugs las kyi rigs kyi yum// mig dang rna ba sA lce lus// glo snying pa kha la ma mchin mcher dang // rgyu byed rtsa dang yan lag bcas// snod lnga rkang laganying lag kun// rigs lnga nyi
283a4(rnying rgyud): du ya nas gnas// dran pa tsam gyis dbyings las bskul// gnas tshul shes pas gzhug cing bsdam// gnyis med mthong bas mnyen phyag 'tshal// ngang la rang gnas rdzas kyis mchod// skye gtsugs grin pa snying gdang // lte ba gsang ba gnas
283a5(rnying rgyud): lnga ru// rtsibs 'chang chu skyes chu gram dang // gsal 'bar chos 'byung sngags rnams la// drug cu rtsa bzhir 'byed byed kyis// 'khor lo rdzogs pa 'dzom pa yis// kha dog lnga ldan yig 'bru 'phros// rnam shes bzhon pa lnga nyid kyi// rtsa ba yan lag bcu sbyar zhing // gnas
283a6(rnying rgyud): bas lnga 'gyur bzlas pa'i mchog/ lhun grub lnga ldan don gyis bstod// gnas bsgyur grub pa'i dngos grub blang // phyi nang snong bcud ma lus kun// 'di las mi 'da' 'gyur med pa'i// don chen gcig gis dkyil 'khor bslu// phung po'i dkyil 'khor bslab
283a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bstan pa'i chos kyi phung po dag/ brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa ni// de nyid nyin mongs gnyen por bshad// rtsa ba gti mug zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ste// yan lag sgo lnga'i rnam shes dang //
283b1(rnying rgyud): khams dang skye ma chad mA lus kun// rnam dag rigs lags rgyud ni// rang lang rgyal nom pa dang // chags shing rgan pas drug tu 'gyur// gzhan la zhe sdang khor khror bcas// phrag dag 'tsho zhing gnod pa'i drag/ gti mug ma ga blun
283b2(rnying rgyud): kun la gnod pa'i drug yin yang // rnyed pa'i rgyu dang gnas pa'i gzhi// 'jigs pa'i can dang 'gro ba'i sa// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lor gnas// phyi dang nang dang gnyis ka dang // snod dang stong pa chen po yis// dkyil 'khor bdag pos so rigs/
283b3(rnying rgyud): rgya rkyen gnas gzhi med bzhin du// rang nyid dran pas bskul bar bya// mthong dang goms pas drangs shing dbab// ma chags spyod pas mnyes par bya// mi spad pa ni bstod pa nyid// phye 'gror yengs med bzlas pa'o// the tshom mo nyi yid gnyis dag/ 'dapa
283b4(rnying rgyud): gang phral dngos gra 'a thob// dug lnga rin chen lngar bsgrub pa'i/ drag lnga'i rang bzhin de nyid ni// ye shes lnga rnams kho na ste// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ye shes te// dper nag yang dang dri ma'i tshogs// bral byas me long dkyil 'khor la/ @
283b5(rnying rgyud): dang kha dog mtshan ma'i dngos// za 'dres tha dad snang ba nyid// ma grub bzhin du gsal ba ltar// rnam rtog glo bur dI ma dang // bral ba'i sems nyid dkyil 'khor la// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par brtag/ phur po khams dang skye mched tshogs// bde ba sdug bsngal
283b6(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khyab// gzugs brtan sku brnyan tshul bzhin du// ma 'gags so sor snang ba'i rgyus// yul la dmigs pa'i snying rje skye// de las nga rgyal mnyam pa yi// ye shes lci ba 'di lta ste// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs pa dang rab tu
283b7(rnying rgyud): byang // kun rdzob don dam khyad par gyis// chos rnams stong par mnyam khyer bas// gang zag bdag tu 'dzin med cing // yul kun de yi tshul 'dra bar// chos su bdag 'dzin bral ba yis// de la dmyigs pa'i snying rje 'byung // 'dod chag drag las rtog
284a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// ye shes skye bar bsgrub pa ni// chos kun gdong nas ma skyes shing // rang bzhin med pa'i don bsgoms nas// gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa'i sems// me dmigs stong pa nyid kyi yul// spros pa'i mtha' sogs thal bar
284a2(rnying rgyud): bsas// dmigs med snyeng rjeng gis 'thung // gti mug las na chos dbyings sde// ya shes bsgrub pa m+b+hi 'i rjes// gzung 'dan yan lagasun thal ba// rang bzhin pa nyid kyi bdag/ dngas po dang bral 'od gas lang // mnyim bzhag stong pa nyid gnas na/
284a3(rnying rgyud): ji lta ba yi ye shes so// phagadog gu las nan tan gyi// bya ba thab pa'i ye shes ni// ban rdzob snyed rtswa do rdzogs pas// sams bskyed pa dang sngon lam chis// gzhan don 'byung ba'i byud par ni// ji ltar rigs pa'i sbal ba ni// rang ga tshul 'dra gzhang don du// don
284a4(rnying rgyud): dam mya ngan 'das dbyings nas// kun rdzob rnam 'phral 'jig rten du// mthun 'jug sna tshogs dag tu ston// rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes kyi// chu dang ngo bo rang bzhin te// 'di la grol dang shes pa dang // ngang gis gnas las mchog tu 'gyur// ngag lnga khon ye shes lnga
284a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang gsum dang gcig gang gnyis// gti mug khon gcig yin no// 'di la gnas pas de bsgrub pa// ye shes lngalas yongs rdzogs pa'o// u lwa stan grub bsgrub pa ni// gzugs kyi drung po gti mug bcas// snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra// rnam
284a6(rnying rgyud): shes phung ba zhe sdang bcas// rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi sku// tshor ba rgyal bcas pa ni// rin chen 'byung ldan sprul pa'i sku// 'du shes 'dod chags phung por bcas// mthar yas mngon par byang chub sku// 'dra byed phrag dog phung por bcas// don grub mi
284a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rje su// mtshan bzang dab byang ldan pa dang // dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang // sna tshogs don du 'byung ba dang // gcig las gcig 'byung gcig pa dang // ma btsal 'gyur med ldan grung ni// yongs rdzogs su lnga dngos yin no// de dag srin gyi
284b1(rnying rgyud): dang // bar bslab par mnan// al rnas rtag/ sanaH/ dU d+hAm+b+haH/ mahAka dang / b+hamad+hA sa/ ma thatham pa/ mnyam ma khams pa/ a ma/ sa yab/ gan gnas ga dang // na gang da rdzus// bdan na
284b2(rnying rgyud): ga~M ming mtshan te// yum dang bcas pa 'di las 'ab+h+ring // mA s+dza mAM tsA dz+dza sr-in+di \u0f7f hoH/ sa ma ya tAM/ sarba ta thA ga d+ha pa gyon ma/ a t+ti br-i ho// sarba pa mAs mr-i kag ga khA hi ShI taM/ sarbata thA ga ta kA ya bA gaHt+tam dA pad+d+hi ma r+d+hab+h+yAM/ spyan dang bstim zhing mnyes pa dang // 'a
284b3(rnying rgyud): bu 'grub par bya ba'o// rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa dang // 'byung ba lus kyi phung po dang // nyon mongs lnga dang ye shes lnga// rdzogs pa'i sku ldang bsgrub pa yis// sangs rgyas 'dus pa lngar bsgrub bya// 'di ni lnga phung rtog par bcas// rigs drug rgyud lnga shes pa ste//
284b4(rnying rgyud): nyid phrin las kun tu bzang // zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i chud rab tu 'byed pa las/ rab tu bsdus pa'i rigs kyi rtsa ba'i bdag nyid chen po tshul lngar grub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba
284b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs so so'i bdag nyid rab tu sgrub pa'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa/ khyad par gyi gzhi dang rang bzhin dang / thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu chen po tha dad du snang bar byed pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba chen po las rab tu phyung ste bka' stsal
284b6(rnying rgyud): to// ma 'ongs 'byung ba'i dus dag tu// skyes bu gti mug zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod chags phyag dog rnams// so so'i yan lag bcas 'chang bas// rang gi rigs mthun gnyen po ni// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma las kyi rigs kyi sku// tha dad so sor bsgrub
284b7(rnying rgyud): khyad par gti mug can dag gis// ma reg rmongs pa'i rtsa ba ste// shel mdog oM du gsal bar bsgom// tshor ba'i sgo nas spro zhing bsdu// rnam par shes pa'i rten rnams kun// sa bon rdul phra gcig tu bsgom// gzugs sgra/ ba dog bcas pa kun//
285a1(rnying rgyud): gsum yul dugasal ba dang // rnam par snang mdzad sku gnyis brtan// dkar mdo sa gsal ba 'khor lo can// phra mo bsgom dang ril por bsgom// brnyan+d+han da ngag yo ba rnam chug// rtag pa can po sgras bu gzugs// bdag nyi dag
285a2(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i dgra gsum dang // bar du gcod pa'i bdud bzhi dang // rigs drug lhung ba'i g.yang sa rnams// tshe 'di nyid la choms shing chod// 'byung ba'i rgyu yis mi bskyod cing // nyon mongs rkyen gyis mi brdzil// rang rig dbyings las
285a3(rnying rgyud): mi g.yo bar// dag pa'i sems la dbang bskur na// 'di ni de yi tshad yin no// gzhan yang zhe sdang khong khror bcas// nga rgyal rlom sems ldan pa dang // zhen cing gdung ba'i 'dod chags dang // phrag dog sred len g.yo dang sgra'i// rtswa ba dkar ser dmar dang ldeng // d+hIs+t+ra
285a4(rnying rgyud): hrIhrIhA 'od gsal ba// spro bsdus so sor gsal ba dang // rdo rje sems dang rin chen 'byung // mtha' yas don yod grub pa rnams// rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bcas// so sor sngar bzhin gsal bar bltas// grub pa'i tshad kyis rab tu brten// gal te dag gis
285a5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub 'dod na// dus gsum 'byung ba'i bde gshegs tshogs// ma lus su gsung thugs bsdus pa'i// gsang ba'i snying po 'di nyid ni// oM AHb+h+rUM zhes bya ba ste// sgra dang shub bu rdo rje'i bzlas// gsum gyis 'jug gnas ldang ba'o// chu dang rtsu ba yan lag bcas/
285a6(rnying rgyud): 'di la rnam shes rab zhon nas// sgo lnga dbang po'i lam las byung // gzugs sogs yul la dmigs shing chags// kun rdzob tsam du brtag bzod de// don dam rang gi gshis yin zhing // gnas lugs gdod nas snang ma myong // de bas nyon mongs lnga yi dug/ kun
285a7(rnying rgyud): tu khyab pa'i gzhi nyid la// sa bon tshul du btab pa las// rnam shes yan lag chu lungad rkyen// 'dod yon drod gsher nus pas smin// klung lnga'i 'bras bur gyur pa las// rigs lnga so so'i ye shes kyi// mtshon gyis myu gu mur du bcad// le 'dab 'bras bu bskyed mi
285b1(rnying rgyud): nus// sa bon gzhi yi bgal skam// da ni gdong nas rang gi dang // 'di la bcos su ci zhig yod// gal te rigs kyi rgyu 'bras lnga// gcig tu bsdus te sbyang ba ni// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// the tsom bral ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sa gzhi legs pa
285b2(rnying rgyud): brgyan nas su// phyi nang bdud rtsi'i dri yis bgo// ting 'dzin 'phel ba'i yo byad rten// gzugs sgra chos kun 'bru gsum las// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpar bsam// lag pa'i 'du byed phyag mtshan 'dzin// nyi zla bad+ma'i lus bde'i bya// man gyi// tshan dang dpe
285b3(rnying rgyud): byad dang // dbang po lnga yi longs spyod tshogs// ma lus pa ni mchod pa'i rjes// rlung cu sgra brjod bzlas pa ste// snyan pa'i cho ga zos bstod pa yin// spyod lam kun ni phrin las so// stobs ldan rgyu mthun 'jigs pa yis// rkyen gyis mi brje brtan pa'o// tshad deng
285b4(rnying rgyud): rtags su nges par gzung // smon lam sems bzang brtan pa'i phyir// gzhan don phrin las spel ba ni// ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba'i// chos kun 'bu gsum dang nyid du// ma lus 'dus pa'i sku gsung zugs// gtan la dgab pa'i gnad bsdus la// rab 'bring za ma'i sgo
285b5(rnying rgyud): yi chos// zab dang rgya che gnad 'dir 'dus// khams gsum skye 'gro gnas gsum dang // mthong bya bsgom bya dag pa gsum// smon lam ye shes bgrod pa'i sa// gnas gsum spyod pa 'bras bu dang // bsrung bya dgag bya dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin rig
285b6(rnying rgyud): dang ma lus sku// gsung dang thugs kyi mtha thug gsum// bde dang rig pa snang ba yin// dbyer med gsal ba'i stong pa dang // thabs dang shes rab dbyings ye shes// don dam kun rdzob ma bcos pa'i// dbyer med gsal bar rang gi dang // lus gnas rje dang
285b7(rnying rgyud): der brten pa'i// dngos med chu dang zlum po'i dngos// yon tan phrin las mnyes byed dang // bsod nams mthar thug mchod sbyin las// dngos grub sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// sgrub byed pasnyen pa byin rlabs bcas// mthu dbang dam tshig cho ga dang // skyob byed
286a1(rnying rgyud): yul dang dam pa'i sems// gtan 'pho rig pa 'dzin pa'is// dgra gsum bdud bzhirjod chad rtags// mtshan mar bcas pa'i gnad yin na// 'byug smras rgya ba dang bcas pa// dang sa masad pa' phrag sung rdzogs// ban nyid/
286a2(rnying rgyud): du ye nas gnas// 'khor 'das ma lus kun gyi srog/ gcig tu gnas pa kho na ste// sgo gsum 'di la gang gnas pa// rab tu lci ba'i sdig pa dang // gnas ngan len gyi chu bsags sbyang // so so zar po'i rigs bdun dang // blon 'drug bslang pa nyi shur bcas// kun bzang
286a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis rab bshad pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i khyad par dang // gzhi dang yan lag bslab bya las// gang 'das sor 'jug khyad par stobs// ngan 'gro'i sred las rab tu zlog/ gshis ngan dang ni dus min dang // 'chi dang 'jigs pa brgyad las myong // dpal
286a4(rnying rgyud): 'byor phun sun tshogs 'grub cing // myur du mthar thug sar gnas byed// bris btags mthong dang bzlas pa yi// yon tan tshad gzung yod ma yin// mchod sbyin mnyes shing tshim pa dang // longs spyod par thob 'di yis 'grub// 'jig rten pa dad 'das pa yi// lha/
286a5(rnying rgyud): rnams bsnyen cing bsrung bzlog nus// da ltar dang ni ma 'ongs pa'i// mi 'dod sdug bsngal phyogs spang zhing // bde 'dod thar pa ma lus 'grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// za dang blo rigs sdang ngo la// dge slong dang ni
286a6(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu'i gzugs// byang chub sems dpa' rdzogs longs spyod// zhi ba'i tshul dgu ldan pa dang // kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin// khro tshul 'chang ba'i rigs kun gyi// bdag nyid thabs dang shes rab dang // snying rje dang ni stong par ldan// mi 'gyur mi shigs sra ba po// blo dang
286a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa mthu ldan zhing // bzhon pa cha la rab brten nas// go cha bgos te bdud 'dul ba// gzhan don spro zhing the tshom med// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin// 'di ni mthong bas kha cig spong // kha cig bsam pas spang bar byed// sngon du srid pa'i don la bsam// ma nor ma
286b1(rnying rgyud): bcos mi 'gyur ba// me rtogs kun la snying rje bsam// rang gis byed pa po 'di nyid// mthing ga hUM las spro dang bsdu// mnyes spang las kyi rdo rje 'gyur// 'bar gsal 'od du gnas pa las// bskyed pa rdo rje 'chang ga skra// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rang ga mdag/ thabs
286b2(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab brda mdzad cing // pad+ma dang ni nyi zla gnon// tshul dgu 'chang zhing mtshan dper ldan// yang na khro tshul gar dgur ldan// zhe sdang can dang 'dod chags can// rang gi rigs kyis so sor sbyang // snang dang blug pa'i rtog pa kun// ma lus sgegasung brag
286b3(rnying rgyud): brdal// ngo shes phrad dang bral ba yis// rang chud dngos po'i zhen pa gcad// ma rig sems dang sems las byung // snong dang cher stong rab tu stong // snang zhing rabasnang snang la sogs// gnyis med gcig med gcig kyang med// dus rnams kun tu 'di la ba
286b4(rnying rgyud): rnyed langs rgyas lnga dang gcig/ bdag nyid dang dang rang bzhin no// spyod la mdus bzhir chos kyi sras// mnyam par spyod pa de yi mchog/ snang brgya lnga yongs rdzogs shing // 'byung 'jug gnas pa gsum gyi gsung // bde 'ad ma rtog snang ba'i thugs// 'di ni yon rol pang
286b5(rnying rgyud): gis mchod// dam pa'i yid kyis rgyan du bsgrub// 'di dag so so'i phrin las ni// gsal ba gsum dang 'od 'byung ba'i// gnas dang sgo gnas de yi thabs// yon tan gnas dang dgos pa dan// drod tshang rtags gsum ldan pa yis// rang dang pha rol grib pa myong // me rlung
286b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i gzugs dang sbas// 'khar btsas las la sbyar ba'o// yul gsum 'phro 'dra tsha ba yis// bar chad 'gegs kun dpung tshogs gzhom// zla drug sbyong badrag po yis// rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa bzhed// gnas gzhag dbab dang them pa yis// 'bru
286b7(rnying rgyud): gsum sugasu thugs dbang bskur// dam pa'i gnas gsum slob sngani// rten 'gyur lus kyi bskor ba dang // rang dang sa rol nyas tshogs bskang // bkra sbrang las dang 'byung ba'i nad// mdog slong 'gro ldog bde rjod bskyed// sred pa dadabang bsgyur 'bob dang // sngar/
287a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ zhang bsnung bas yul gzhan ba rten// thags rdugasum dang rtags par ldan// tshogs mchod macad sbyin stobs ldan gyis// mtha man yul la byud par dmigs// 'bab pa btsun la brtan pa las// lus gnas par gyur
287a2(rnying rgyud): bsal cing // mthar thug tu ni don rdzogs byed// phrin las lam du bslab pa'o// mtha' dang dbyings nas lhan grub pa// 'bru gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// skye 'gro thams cad rigs kyi bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi lha nyid sdang // phyi dang gsang
287a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi// dag pa gsum ldan mchod pa'i na// klo bsdu 'bru gsum zhi dang rgyas// dbang dang drug po'i phyin las spyod// lcagasum 'bras bug su ma sbyar ba// gnas gsal dag pa bsten pa'o// cho ga gsum gyis dngos grub sbed// dus gsum gzugs su bsas pa ni// do
287a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba chad nyid yin// gsung dbyangs drug tu yan lag sbyar// brag masgra brtan 'di nyid shes// rgyal ba rnams kyi suM gsung thugs// yon tan ye shes ldan pas bstod// byi nang snong bcud pa ma dang rig/ skye med chos dkyangs phyag rgyar bsdu// gsang tshul shes pa dag yid na/
287a5(rnying rgyud): 'brug sam las ni kyang dag zhi// sgra gnas pa'i rnams sa pa'i tshul// bcug nyis mdzad pa'i rim pa yis// gzhan nang dgal snang byeng ba// 'brug sum bskyed cing rdzogs pa yis// gnas gsum gdan dang bdag par bcas// nyem zlab 'phrin las kyis// rang chung las la skor ba
287a6(rnying rgyud): yin// rdzogs shing bskyed pa'i 'bru gsum ste// de ni zung du 'jug pa las// rab tu sbyangs te rnal 'byor mchog/ rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen por gnas// rab tu 'brel ba'i bsgrub pa'o// lnga dang gcig dang drug dang gsum// thud mong 'jug pa'i khyad par byes// tha
287a7(rnying rgyud): mang na sang ba chen bshad cing // bde ba gshegs pa kun par 'gyur// zhes bka' rtsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi srung nga gsung dang thugs kyi rnyeng pa dpon nyid kyi dang la mnyam par brdugs te/ dbyings kyi yum can mo nyid dang / skug sung thugs padab cad
287b1(rnying rgyud): bo'i ngang du 'du 'bral med par rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang bcas te snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed par byed pa las rigs kyi snying po de khon nyid mngon par byang chub pa ngas par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa po//
287b2(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa zhi ba'i cho gas rab tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga'i las rab tu sbyor ba bstan pa'i skabs dang po rdzogs so// @#// bder gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud rab du 'byed pa'i lde mig las tho ba napas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
287b3(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang po de ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba'i dbang du zhi ba chen po'i de nyid rgyas par bstan nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid dpal rdo rje he ru ka/ 'jigs byed chen po khro bo chen po rab tu khro ba'i sku 'bar ba'i rgyal po bstan te/ phyogs bcu'i rnam
287b4(rnying rgyud): mkha'i khams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i klong du gnas pa/ gzi mdang sa dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' mthing nag yongs su dag pa'i klong na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po stobs dang ldan cing kha dog mdzes pa'i
287b5(rnying rgyud): shugs das khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong rab tu 'khrug pa dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste rab tu spang ba'i steng na/ matrang chen po'i phung po rab tu bkram pas phyogs bcu ma lus par bsnyams pa// rus pa'i phung po rab tu gtams pa'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i dngos po bang rim bzhis
287b6(rnying rgyud): par snang ba'i steng na/ drag po dang gtum po la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa yan lag dang nying lag gi gtso bo dag gis leg par bcigs pa'i rim pa chen po gsum gyi rmang dang brtsigs pa bad rkos dang bcas pa/ gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer gyis brtan par byas pa/
287b7(rnying rgyud): nya chen po dang chu srin dang sbal dang rus sbal dag gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas rab tu sbas pa/ bla re dang chun 'phyang dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / do shal gyi rnam pa dang / lnga ldi dang / phreng ba dang / zar chags dang /
288a1(rnying rgyud): yol ba dang ldan pa'i rgyun dang / rin po che dang me dang nyi ma la sogs pa chags pa'i mdangs kyi 'od 'phro ba/ 'brug dang glog dang sprin dang / khu rlangs dang / nabun dang / kha char dang / ser ba dang / rab tu tsha zhing grang ba'i rlung 'khrugs pa dag gi sra \u0f7f
288a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa dang / lha chen po dang klu chen po dang ye dwags chen po dang gnod sbyin chen po dang nam mkha' lding chen po'i tshogs dang / baglang chen po dang / byol song gtam po dang / tir chen po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang / chu'i snying po dag pa chen po dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i chags pa dang
288a3(rnying rgyud): gdan bting ba/ yon tan chen bstung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dkar po dang dmang po'i 'od bye mdangs las gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang grong da ga pa d+hA N+Dag+h+ra kyi yo byad kyis mnyes pa'i mchod pa rab tu sbyor ba'i gnas de lta bu 'phrul bar mdzad nas/ nyid kyi su las dbyings cid 'dra
288a4(rnying rgyud): shur chen mo dpal 'bar khro ma chen mo mngon par phyung zhing sprul nas gnyis su med pa'i sku gsung thugs mnyam par sbyor ba las/ 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang rdo rje ga dbang he ru// dargyal rin chen gshin rje gshad// 'dod chags pad+ma dbang snod
288a5(rnying rgyud): srid las phrag dag rdorje 'dang // bgacags mngon bye tes// sar pa 'dus byed dgas pa na no// bram mthukhyen stabs kyi bdag/ sgyu mtshad rnam dag rang bzhin chos// gan ba dag drugs pa can pa brgyad// dang po rigs kyi yum dang bcas// sprul pa dpal che 'thong ba
288a6(rnying rgyud): sras 'khor skal pa rnam byung ba// rigs kyi khro bo khro mo dang // phyogs ba'i dang ni mtshams bzhi ru// gnas bcas rigs dang rang rang 'khor// sgo bzhir phrin las byed pa dang // bka' sdod po nyar bcas pa dag/ rang gi stan dang bkod pa dang // khang ga lag cha rgyan dang tshul//
288a7(rnying rgyud): baphrul 'don cho 'phral dang // kun brjod pa dang rjes su bstan// yongs su bstan pa dag dang bcas// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rin chen dang // chags chen las byed sna tshogs dang // rtags mtshan dus mtshams mthun 'jug dang // ming sring rigs 'chang lus rnal 'byed//
288b1(rnying rgyud): dag yid las thabs yum dang 'khor// mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro phra men ma// 'bar ma gnod sbyin srin mo che// slas dang byi mo bran mo dang // mngag gzhug rigs dang bcas pa dang // cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan pa// dbang phyug dang ni grol sbyin dang // rnam grol thams ca
288b2(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang // nam ma pa'i dbang mo rnal 'byung ma// dbang srud ma dang rnam par gdung // gsang grogs ma dang lam na// rdo byub dang // dam cig ting ba sangs rgyas ma// bkod na dpang rgyug med bzhin ga ra// chags pazhican ldan pasum khyab
288b3(rnying rgyud): byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bde ba'i dbang phyug ma// 'joms byed dga' dang khyab dbang phyug/ gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// lha tshogs khrag 'thung he ru ka/ thabs dang shes rab longs spyod pa dag/ rgyal byed rol byed za byed dang // dran byed snyoms byed rdal
288b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma// rigs kyi cho 'phrul gsang ba'i 'khor// me 'da' chad med rol pa dang // 'jigs byed 'joms byed za byed dang // gsang ba ma dang dga' ma dang // gus pa ma dang g.yo med dang // gsod byed 'dul byed dregs pa dang // mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba dang // zhe/
288b5(rnying rgyud): dang gro dang dpa' dang sgeg/ 'jigs dang gshe dang snying rje dang // dgod dang rngam dang nga zhad pa che// ma lus snang bar gyur pa'i tshe// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ dbyings bdag kro d+hi shwa d+hi ma// mnyam nyid nga mgra med sku gsung thugs// bzhengs bzhugs 'jug ldog rnam par
288b6(rnying rgyud): 'das// g.yo med rnam rol mdzad pa'i dus// rdo rje kun bzang kro d+hI shwa dI mas// rnam dag dbyings kyi don gyis rab bskul pa// e ma ho// ye shes nam mkha' rgya mtsho rnam grol klong // mi gnas mi dmigs chos spu he ru ka/ bsam 'das rnal 'byor byang chub sems kyi
288b7(rnying rgyud): rje// ma g.yos dgongs pa rnam dag dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes pas rab bsul don la dgongs mdzad de// ma lus chos kun stong nyid dbyings las shar// rdo rje mngon sngar nam mkha' dri ma med// nyi zla'i spyan gyi 'od kyis gzigs mdzad de// zhal 'jum d+ha8/
289a1(rnying rgyud): dru kyi ma 'phrul bkod pa las// byang chub sems kyi sman chags mngan 'a sa// rol pa'i thog 'jug 'ad byon bla sgrogs shing // thugs rje'i char 'bebs ye shes mya ga byed// grwa gang stan mchog ral pa'i rgyan g.yo zhing /
289a2(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i spyod chen skyor mnyes bstim pa dang // dgong dang steg dang 'khyud dang gtong ba dang // spro dang bde 'jo thabs kyi rig pa dang // za 'thung myang 'cha' ldag dang 'thung ba dang // dga' chen khyab 'jug rol pa der snang mdzad// dbang sgyur yum chen 'dzum bag rnam 'dud cing //
289a3(rnying rgyud): sa chags sku gsung thugs ldan mchog gis bskul// e ma ho// rdo rje che mchog dpal ldan par gyi bdag/ skal bzang longs spyod rdzogs sku rol pa'i gtso// tshogs gnyis mnga' bdag thabs ldan rgyal po che// thugs dam dbyings nas rol pa'i bde chen bzhengs//
289a4(rnying rgyud): de brjod bskul pa yab kyi thugs chud de// bde chen dang las cho 'phrul skur bzhengs nas// rnam 'gying brjid pa gar gyi phyag rgya che// bzhad pa sna tshogs brkyangs bskums 'gyur bag dang // brda dang sprul pa nam mkha' khyab mdzad de// thams cad mtshan ma rnam pa yod med dang /
289a5(rnying rgyud): thug+sa kyi rang bzhin rdo rje he ruH// sprul ba'i bdag nyid tshul brgyad rang gi gso// rab snang he ruka sogs yum dang bcas// sras 'khor phrin las sprul pa snang ba la// gyur mngon yum gyi thugs dam bskul ba ni// e ma ho// bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rgya mtsho che// thugs
289a6(rnying rgyud): rje'i mnga' bdag sbrul sku 'byung gnas gtso// ye shes sgyums rnam rol phrin las mchog/ thabs dang shes rab dpal gyi sbyor ba ston// yun chen gsung gis rab brjod bskul ba las// de nyid mkhyen ldan thugs kyis rab dgongs te// rdo rje'i rol pa de nyid snang ba'o// ting
289a7(rnying rgyud): nga 'dzin la snyoms mdzad cang mi gsung // de la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis ngo mtshar mdzad// thams cad ma lus rang 'dus mgrin gcig tu/ yid gdung glu yis bskul zhing gsol ba ni// e ma ho// nam mkha' lta bu'i gter 'byin sku yi mchog/ rdo rje gang mdzad
289b1(rnying rgyud): tshe 'phrul khyab par// bslangs lags pakod pa mtha' yas rol pa'i gaH// tsha 'phrul thogs med 'byung bar ston cig/ e ma ho// dbyangs kyi yan lag nas tshe mtha' yas la// / stan thug ca ma 'gags snang po'i gsung// me 'jigs phra ldan nas
289b2(rnying rgyud): so'i brda// stan grags dbang phyug legs sgra de gsungs shig/ e maho// spos thal rnam par mi rtog pa de chen thugs// de nyid khon rnam gropa yo shes che// mig yo rdo ngas chen mtshon par lung // snying po chos nyid don gsal de phung zhig/ sal la/ ma yin ba
289b3(rnying rgyud): 'dam bying ba// mi shes rmongs pa'i srid pa'i dra bas bcing // dman pa'i 'gro ba ma lus bsgral slad du// mi 'gyur thabs kyi gru chen de spyod cig/ gnyen po gsang sbyor sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ srub dang sgrub chen bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen// las dang las chen rgong dang nye
289b4(rnying rgyud): sgong // mi 'byur gzer dang rnal 'byor yan lag dang // gcad dang brla ba dang bskyed dang bstim pa dang // mchod bstod bskul dang brjod dang skyong ba dang // mthong dang goms dang spyad par bya ba dag/ spangs shing thob bya gnyen po sdang bya dag/ pi dge gnod pa 'dug sngog sung /
289b5(rnying rgyud): dang blang // bya ba min pa bya ba las kyi dngos// rab 'bring tha ma blo dang dbang po yi// khyad par gang yin yul gyis kyi ba dag/ de ltar ris bzhin gas rdzogs de ston cig/ sa ma ya.a lal nyo nas 'phral to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen te drag das pa rje nyid kyis /
289b6(rnying rgyud): zhing 'dus pa'i laso la gzigs// gas kyi ga nas lcags kyi dbang ga byung // tshangs pa'i gsung gis rnam pa pang grub mdzad de// wu yi bkad pa d+ham snang ba ba// ma lus don gyimatshon pa legs gnas shing // byang chu ba sems pa thugs rjed pag pa dang rnye
289b7(rnying rgyud): rgya rje tsan rig 'dzin thabs kyis las// byang chub chen po rnam byor the ba'i 'khor// tha ma dbang phyug su yi mnyam sbyang ba// che ba'i yon tan mchog gi gtso gyur ba// thugs kyi rdorje yang dag nges pa'i mchog/ spu yi sbramachogag shin rje kun gyig shid// gsu

290b1(rnying rgyud): ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang // dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la// rdo rjes dkug cig 'bung bar btag/ g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni// sti nga'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // khyung gi khrag chen thogs pa dang // sti rA phra mo'i gsus pa nas/

290b4(rnying rgyud): cig la// rig sngags nyid dang spod gtong bcas// dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya// ngas sam gro ga'am rtsa rnams la// khro bo'i gzugs su bris pa 'am// yang na srung pa nag pos bcing // ha ha gad mo chen po dang //

290b6(rnying rgyud): de dag gtubs nas ni// thod pa gzhu dang bcas pa yis// hom khung gru gsum sgro can du// ri zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos bod// de nas rig sngags bsreg par bya// de ltar lha dang bdag sbyang na/
290b7(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga'i chas dang ldan par bya// ma mchen mo sha la sbron// 'byung po'o sha na zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// ma mo chen mo khrag la spyon// gru dang gar dang gad rgyangs kyis// so sor mchod de bsgrib par
291a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang can gyis rang gi yid// khro dang khon du 'dzin chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi mthu dang stobs// rtog pa drag shul cher spyod cing // mdzes phyogs kyi dbang gyur pa// sna tshogs bstan pa bzhin du// khro ba de bzhin gshegs pas sbyang //
291a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis de mi rtag/ byis pa rnam la sngar ma bstan// tshig gis sgra brjod bsam mi khyad // chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste// ming du brjod pas shes mi 'gyur// rnam par brtags pas de mi rtog/ sems dang sems can 'khor ba dang // lam da gu dang bzhon pa yis//
291a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bla na med// shes rab ting 'dzin gnas dag gis// phra zhing zab pas gting dpag dka'// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang chos// dang por 'khor 'jug sems can te// sgrol zhing bskyod pa bde ba che// dran mkhas gsal bar gnas der byin// zla
291a4(rnying rgyud): byung rab tu'ang 'phags// gting rdzogs gab pa phra zhing 'khyug/ sems can mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// de bzhin gshegs pa yab yum sras// bdag gdung srog nor bran dang ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa//
291a5(rnying rgyud): dang 'bras bu zhes// thabs dang shes rab byang chub che// dbang byed ma nor 'da' bar dka'// mi zad snying rje gzi brjid dang // sna tshogs thams cad 'byung ba dang // mdzad pa'i tshogs ni lam yin te// 'dod pa'i 'tshe ba longs spyod che// cho 'phrul phyag rgya bsten pa gnyis/
291a6(rnying rgyud): bsrub gnyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa la// yul gyi 'dod pa dmigs pa dang // rol zhing bsgrub pa 'bras bur sbyar// smin cing don grub kun las log/ rang bzhin byed pa sna tshogs 'byung // mtshan ma bstan pa rnam par 'dud// rab 'byed 'dod pa lhag 'dod stor//
291a7(rnying rgyud): lhan grub pa yis shes pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu zhes// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i gzhi// mtshan ma yul dang sems las byung // rtog pa dus gsum dngos po yin// don nyid phyogs bzhi log pa'o// dmun dang gdugs dang bskyed pa dang // gdung dang kun 'a
291b1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs lnga// rgyu 'dus de byin mtshan ma dang // las dang rnam rigapung po b+ha// mthong thob tshor dang myong rig pa// yul la spyod pa'i dbang po lnga// sa chu ba drung nam mkha' dang // dus kyi/ dacig tu drug gis// sa bon rtsa ba byug dang // sdong dus ya la ga yan lag dang // 'dang
291b2(rnying rgyud): tog 'bras bu sben// rnying dang skam brkyen 'bruganyis// gzugs mthong sbra sbom ni tshong zhing // ro myod reg byed chos shes pa// sre ba'i skye mched bcug nyis so// mthong snang mnor zas dang theg/ gsal tshor rloms dang tshoms pa dang // ngo pyong bro dang byed par 'os// shes
291b3(rnying rgyud): dang shes bya rtog pa dang // rang bzhin chos nyid bco brgyad de// spyod chos mtshan nyid bcu gcig ni// 'du shes bsgyur dang dbang du byed// rnam g.yo sgro 'dogs 'gal ba dang // rtsub 'chal chags dang gnod par sems// log blta gzung 'dzin spyod pa yis/
291b4(rnying rgyud): bu rdzogs dang rim pa dang // glo bur gnas bsgyur lnga yin no// dka' thub snyoms 'jug spyod pa dang // gdung zhing spang ba lam lnga'o// bzong gidu de nyams 'dod rtsod chags kyis// gnas pa drug tu gyur pa yin// dus dang rgyu dang rang bzhin gyis// rang gis mu
291b5(rnying rgyud): bzung ba lta ba gsum// shes pa gcig gis rgyu dang lam// kun rdzob don dam tshul gnyis po// kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang // yongs su grub pa rang bzhin tshul// rim 'jug rkyen myor mngon 'byung dang // thams cad rdzogs pa thabs chen bzhi// d+hu lam bshad
291b6(rnying rgyud): bya rtog pa dang // 'bras bu la gnas chos lnga ste// mig dang rna ba skye ba dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni rdzu 'phrul te// gzhan blo shes pa rig pa'o// 'pho 'jug bltam dang rangab tu brtsam// mnyam sbyor nges 'byung dka' ba spyod// byang chub bdud btul chos ston cing // cho 'phrul
291b7(rnying rgyud): 'da' byed sku gdung gtams// dbang mdzod chen po bcu gnyis so// mi g.yo chos snang rdzu 'phrul dang // kun rdzob rjes bstan bsam gtan dang // byin rlabs skye ba chos nyid stobs// yon tan 'bras bu cho 'phrul gyis// bcu gnyis dag tu brtan pa yin// na
292a1(rnying rgyud): dang pyidang byin dang // stong ba chen ba den dam dang // 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang maHny+dzu// de las 'da' dang dus gsum bral// blang dor med da nga bzhin stong // chos kun rang gi mtshan nyid sto// sri migs da
292a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ngo bo nyid dang dngos med pa'i// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// ye shes stong pa paco brgyad do// migs ni nyams me bsgrib pa// rdzogs dang ma g.yos mnyam pa nyid// gnyis med rnam dag kun legs dang // sbyar ba rdzogs chu ba rig pa'i ste// bdu gcags
292a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan yin// ngo bo nyid dung chos nyid dang // longs spyod rdzogs dang srul pa dang // 'byung byed tshegs sbyor mthong bsgom dang // mi slob mthar phyin par chad med// 'bras bu yongs rdzogs mkhyen pa dang // khyab dang tshogs 'byung kun tu dbang // dregs
292a4(rnying rgyud): pa 'bras bu drug/ ma lus rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// 'bras bu chen po gcig yin no// de la rdzogs pa 'bras bu'i chos// ma nor gtan la phebs pa dang // the tshom med cing sgo srung bral// thabs dang shes rab res pa'o// rlabs chen khyab pa brjod las 'das// ldem pa ma
292a5(rnying rgyud): dus gzhan dang // gnyen po blangs dang gzhan dan bsrung // kun rdzogs che ba de nyid dang // bdag nyid mngon par 'phags gyur ro// rigs dbang 'dres shing 'dus pa dang // mnyam skyor tshad ba'i tshogs chen du// nam dge stsal pa drag shul dang // dbyangs ldan dga'
