293a1(rnying rgyud): bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ tshul gsum nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// nas rab tu bshad byang // pri la'i dus na skyes// mkhas su ma
293a2(rnying rgyud): pa che ba dang // phyi nang chos la sbyangs pa dang // bstan bya chos su mthong ba dang // yang dag snying po'i don shes shing // phrin las gyod banus pa yis// gnas pa shes pa yo byad dang // 'khor rnams phun sum tshogs pa ni// ma lus kun gyi thun mong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin
293a3(rnying rgyud): bslong ba dang // rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa dang // shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi// dbyings dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid ldan// bsam pa dang ni skyong ba dag/ rang gi zhi bde mi dmigs shing // ma lus kun gyi don 'dod pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i shes pa'o//
293a4(rnying rgyud): ni mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // phyi nang mi 'khrugs mtshan nyid sogs// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan ldan// 'khor lo gsum gyis sku rtsal shes// gnas paskur shes pa yid bzhin no// tsha ba dang ni mchod sbyin no// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye ba bdun pa'i
293a5(rnying rgyud): de// / nang ri bar ga cid kun zlog pa// yo byad phur tshogs parlab pa // yum dang las byed rdul phyag gsum// bka' spyod mchod pa skyob la sogs// 'khor du bsten pa dam rtse// zla ba bye nang rim pa pa// bkra gang rna mtsho dang rjod rje dang rnams
293a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bya ba'o// nga yis thog mar bshad pa ye// sa der steng dog par sdang dang // phyogs kun legs par brtag pa ste// 'khor lo bad+ma rgyal mtshan te// de dang ldan pa phying mtshan nyid// dang me drug bcas pa dang // sa rog seg ma gyo mo dang // rus
293a7(rnying rgyud): sbeng nyung dang // drang khrod rdzas dang ldan par brtag/ snang dang mi spang mdzin mi mngon// legs bslar gnang ba thob pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin// mnyes pa mdzeg gas sbyang ba yis// phyi nang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang // glang 'byin gyis
293b1(rnying rgyud): nga bang // gas gsog badrang 'dub mtshad rje dang // sdig pa myong ba pas rgya dang // bsrong dmas kyi shing gzhan danasu// chags sa dag pa lnga bad pa dang // sran sa bcal zla nga pa brnag rdzogs can thun dang ba chags ma/
293b2(rnying rgyud): nangs dpa da rnam paba'o// bya dang ngotsho bsacan// dbang nang ba dang thab sa ngacan// mgar ci da na bris pati // bye dang na shes pas na shing / zhing rgyam dang bang dadru ba'i// zeng brgyad dmas kyis patheg pades// rtun pam sa
293b3(rnying rgyud): nas+ya// phyi rol phyogs pa ni myong ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po la// mthun pa'i sa la brten btsugs te// mdzad pa dang ni bstod pa dang // dpral b+h+ring bcwom pa deg \u0f7f// mtshan ngan snod du dmigs pa'i brdugs// dam ngo
293b4(rnying rgyud): nga sa
293b5(rnying rgyud): rjes pagag dang ces// ban byed pa mnam// tsun nas kyang brjid/ mas pa sa na pa// rang bzhisas pa'angabazhi smras/ mas ba
293b6(rnying rgyud): byed// drang du bskrad cing bsdam pa la// chos kun sbyong ba'i dang tid las// rang sdang ye shes mkha' bzhin bsgos// nyi bla'i steng du mi ge hUM// sgo dang bslu pa'i las rgyas te// dra n-i d+h+r-ig ces bya ba yis// rdo rje sems dpang gas pa byas te// dkang bsgo badz+ra nga
293b7(rnying rgyud): gas kyi// rigs kyi ma po datharnams kyi// sum pa chags pa cas gas pal dang // phyag ma can partson pa ba ldan pas// byin rdzing pa'i pas kyang // denas kyi ma drug byung // rgyal po dab bzhengs nas// mtshan ldan rjod ci nga //
294a1(rnying rgyud): ra nga bdud kyi migs pa/ blon gyis brlabs ga nag ga dang// gcan la phrum pas bangs bas pa sam pasrel d+his// byang chubasam ca dadag das 'od ma da phyogasanas nga
294a2(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta gas gnas su gsung // de nas bskul zhing legs gdabapa/ seng du ye shes mo zang bzheng // sna gzhi ci la gdab pa ni// rdzogs pa'i dang ni mtshams bzhis// tshig gangad ba stir bshad pa'o// pho brang rgyan po di kyig 'khor dag// 'bya
294a3(rnying rgyud): 'dir bcas pa la// 'khor lo chubs brkyang bar khyams dang // mu khyud klu chud 'dod 'byung las// cha dgu rdzogs pa'i theg tu gdab// phyi rol zhums dang sgo bzhir bcas// dum thod 'bar bar ba dang / 'byung ba chen po gnas par bya// he rug rnams dgo pa
294a4(rnying rgyud): gsol// rin can 'bru dang sa dang do// rab 'bring na mar sbyar ba'i rgya// 'dir ni dung khrod thal chen las// byang sems dkar dang sbyar ba shang// ji chen gyis skyer lhoru ste// dmar pa dang s+yang rngu ba tu'o// ji tshwas sgrar ba byung nga ste// sran gyis spang ba dbus sra'o//
294a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes lngar byin brlab// oM hU~M trAM hrIHtA yis ni// 'od kyi 'phro 'dra bru ba'o// pho brang lte ba mthing nag ste// gcod byed rtsibs rnams dkar ser dmar// ljang gu dag tu bri bya zhing // khyams dang glu chad go rnams ni// rang gi rigs kyi phyogs kyis dbye// rbod phreng gdung
294a6(rnying rgyud): khrud de// mdzes pa'i mtshan mar rab tu bri// phyi rol bang pa de bzhin te// dregs dang mtshan ma'i kha dog gyi// de ltar gnas pa snang ba bzhin// mA nor tshang dang rdzogs par bri// de dag byin gyis brdab pa ni// e yang nu kar b+hUM// yi ges bon 'phro 'dral sa/
294a7(rnying rgyud): stong zhing bskyod dang gsher ba dang // brtan dang bsreg pa bstod pa yis// song nyid snying rje snying por bcas// 'dzin pa gsum las rab chub// nga yi gnas chen 'di ltar bsgom// rigs kyi dpal chen te ruka/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag/ 'di
294b1(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab par bya// de la rgyan btags gsol ba ni// mtshan ldan spang ma ka pA la// grangs dang mthun pa phyogs dgu'o// pags pa chen po'i thar tha// mu ma'i ngabarda byed do// don snying rnams ni 'phyang 'phrul ta// rak+ta zhal bu byams su drangs// phyi rol bsrung da /
294b2(rnying rgyud): rgyan rnams ni// ral gri phur pa mda' dang mdung // phyogs mchoswa ba swa ta yis zes// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs kyis// ye shes dbyings nas dgongs su gsol// bdag nyid 'jug pa'i sgo dbye zhing // gsang ba'i ming phul gsol ba gdab// gus pas phyag btsal
294b3(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas dbul// nye bar bsnyen zhing bstod pa bya// phyi rol bsgrub pa'i grogs rnams kun// snga ma las ni phyi ma bzhin// dam tshig rtogs pa bsre bya zhing // brab dang bcing dang bdug pa dang // bskrad dang gcad pa dag tu bya// skyabs su song zhing sems bskyed de//
294b4(rnying rgyud): sdig pa ma lus bshags byas nas// rim pas gsol ba gdab byas te// gnang ba thob nas me tog dbul// lha dang 'brel pa brtag par bya// de yi rjes bsrung dam tshig bsgrag/ mig phye nas ni dkyil 'khor bstan// slar yang mchod cing bstod byas te// sgrub pa
294b5(rnying rgyud): po rnams gral bshams nas// ji ltar rigs pa'i mnga' gsol nas// bshags bya gnang ba ma lus byas// de nas gtso chen rgyal po la// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad gsol// ma lus byin la rtags gdab cing // dam tshig bca' ba nyi shu bya// byin brlab
294b6(rnying rgyud): dbab cing thugs dam bskang // rigs kyi dngos grub tshul bzhin blang // rdo rje 'chang gi lha rnams bsnyen// las kyi rgyal pos tshul bzhin bsgrub// kun sbyor gsum dang 'byung ba lnga// bkod pa gcig dang mdzes pa bzhi// kun tu khyab par rab bsgom
294b7(rnying rgyud): ste// gtso chen cho ga gsum dang lnga// yab yum yongs su rdzogs pa bskyed// sngon du bshad pa de bzhin no// gang dag rjes sra bshad bya ba/ de nyid kyang ni dus 'dir bshad// gtso chen dkyil 'khor yab yum bcas// bskul dang spro dang bsru ba dang /
295a1(rnying rgyud): dbab dang bsgril dang g.yo ba dang // nges par 'byung bdag gis ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams brgyad du// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab byung ste// phyi rol tu yang 'khor rnams sbrul// rang bzhin gnas nas de nyid dpag
295a2(rnying rgyud): de dag gnyis su med par bya// slar yang las kyi lha sprul te// mnyes bya kun gyis mnyes par bya// de nas ma lus 'khor bcas kun// sku gsung thugs su gsal gdab ste// slar yang srog gi dkyil 'khor la// mu shel dkyil 'khor gzugs tshad tsam/
295a3(rnying rgyud): de nyid la ni rang gi dngos// byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'dzin cing // de nyid kyang ni pad+ma'i steng // rin po che yi tshul du gnas// nyi ma'i steng du sa bon nyid// rang gi ming tshig snying po bkod// mthing ga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom// myong byed pad+ma 'da'
295a4(rnying rgyud): la// rdo rje dkar po rtse gsum la// kun gyi gsung 'byung sa bon te// rang sngags dmar po 'od bcas bsgom// tshangs pa'i gnas su rtsibs brgyad pa'i// 'khor lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sku yi sa bon rang sngags bcas// 'od zer dkar po'i 'gro du
295a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de nyid brtan byed tshig gis gsal// 'phro 'du ye shes rang gi rgya// phyi rol phyogs mtshams thams cad du// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun mnyes par bya// tshur 'dus rnam rtog bag chags sbyang // gzugs dang sgra dang 'od dang bcas// phra mo'i
295a6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rig pa nyid// rang gi yid la gsal ba yis// gnas gsum rnam par dag pa sbyang // de ni dang po'i bya ba'o// de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba// sdang bshad las su rung ba na// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i// tshogs kyi dus gcig bsnyen pa la//
295a7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ye shes ngo bor gyur// gnyis med brtan par gnas pa ste// ma lus nye bar gyur pa'o// tha ma'i dus su gnas bsgyur te// rdzas dang lha dang cho 'phrul de// dkyil 'khor kun tu zo rangs dus// bsgrub chen rnams kyis rgyan rtags gsol// 'phro
295b1(rnying rgyud): 'ad kyis phyi dang nang // sdod brgyad ma lus thams cad kyi// yan tan brjod ldan ma lus pa// thams cad ma was gnas 'dis// mkha' gsang dwangos grub chen por babya// de dag kun pa ngas can du// bzlas pa'i skyon pazhi spang ba na// lga dang
295b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang // dbyangs dang dngos grub phrin las kyis// chos nyid snying po shes pa brgyad// gnas skyong dus su bsam pa'o// nye dang spro dang thim pa gsum// bar ba'i dus su bsgom par bya// bsgyur ba gsum bzhi btsal ba bcu// gang spang
295b3(rnying rgyud): yan lag dgu dang bcas// de ni tha ma'i dus su spyad// rdo rje dril bu nyung dkar dang // mar me mAM sa phyag mtshan dang // dpal rdzas 'khor lo dbang mchog dang // zas bcud tsheg la'ang ma des dang // bla rgyas phro ma dang 'phar ba dang // dpa' bo rnams kyi dngos grub sbyin/
295b4(rnying rgyud): lha dang slob dpon sgrub pa'i grogs// rim bzhin phan tshun bshags sbyang bya// bkra shis dang ni smon lam gyis// gla dbyangs mchod bstod lhag chad bskang // gter sras gzing dang gnan par bya// bsdu ngadabar chad bsrung ba dang // chos nyid mi dmigs blo brtan te// yul
295b5(rnying rgyud): mchog dam pa de mnyes bya// 'di byas dus kyi bsnyen pa ste// sgrub pa chen po gcig yin pas// kun tu bzang po nyi ka/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs su 'grub// bsnyen pa chen po'i sbyor ba yin// 'di dag kun gyi thun mong bsrung / mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// phyi bshad
295b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba chen po lnga// nang du drug po'i mtshon cha lnga// gsang bar rigs kyi khro bo lnga// de nyid ye shes rnam lnga'o// de las tshig tu brjod bya ba// sbyin ma mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sgra// spros med rnam dag dngos dang bral// gdal ba
295b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ye shes kyis// phyogs bcu ma lus kun du khyab// snod bcud snang ba dpag tu med// thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong // 'di las ma ltos chos gzhan med// rang gi sems nyid snang cha las// gzhan snang 'bral pa tsam nyid las// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rtog pa de//
296a1(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams por bzhag
296a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma dang du ma rnams gcad byar// ed+d+ha na maN+Dal shUn+tat+tA mad+ha rIH/ na rgyug ma 'bar ba na// dbugs kyi rang bzhin stobs dang rnam// thams cad g.yo zhing ma lus 'dags// rngam pa zad gang mthun
296a3(rnying rgyud): med shugs kyi phrin las mdzad// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad du// rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang // ma rig pa yi sgrib pa'i tshogs// thams cad gtor zhing ma lus sbyang // gleng dor yod med dgag bsgrub dang // spang thang rtog pa ji snyed kud// rang gi sems kyis mtshangs
296a4(rnying rgyud): gcad bya'o// yaM ma hA kar+m+ma s+phar Na swa b+hA ruHhUM/ baM rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyun 'bab pa// rang gi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te// chu yi rang bzhin gtsang zhing dngas// yan lag brgyad ldan yon tan rdzogs// bde chen byang chub sems kyi rkun// bag chags rtog pa'i de ma 'akru//
296a5(rnying rgyud): rna las kyi gnas ngan sbyong // gnyis snang 'khor ba'i rgyun la ma bsal// ye shes chen po'i rba rlabs kyis// ma rig mtshan ma'i rnyog mgrung // dngos dang dngos min sgrib pa'i tshogs// ma lus sbyang ba'i mtshams gcad bya'o// baM ma hA maN+Da la mu tra b+he sa pa la
296a6(rnying rgyud): raM dbang ba'i rgyal po me yi dpung // bdag gi drod kyi rang bzhin te// gsal zhing bsreg pa'i mthu stobs ldan// snod bcud khams kyi rang bzhin kun// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs rnam rtog bud shing bcas// ma lus sreg byed tsha ba yis// gan
296a7(rnying rgyud): ngan lan gyi phung po bsreg/ ye shes me dpung 'bar ba ni// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// bskal pa'i me chen kha dog lnga// ma lus bsregs te mtshams gcad bya'o// hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta ya dz+wa la stam+b+ha pa ta ma hA tsar+ya hUM// laM khams gsum brtan pa'i sa gzhi ni// bdag nyid
296a8(rnying rgyud): las gyur pa ste// brtan zhing mi g.yo rnam par 'arjid// 'jig rten mthu chen kun gyis kyang // gzhig cid smad par mi nus te// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba// dpal ldan skyong gsum srid pa'i gzhi// phyogs bcu ngas gsum thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas mo brang ste/
296b1(rnying rgyud): gzhal med khang chen rab tu brtag/ mi 'gyur mi shigs yongs su brtag/ bdag nyid chen po'i mtshams gcad bya'o// b+h+rUM ma hA sa ma ya bud+d+ha lo tsa nas ma a l-ika hUM// ye shes 'byung ba chen po lnga// bsreg dang gtor dang bkru ba yis// cis kyang gzhig par mi nus pa'i/
296b2(rnying rgyud): stong pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// ji bzhin 'dod pa rab bsgrub pa'i// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// tshig tu brjod pa'i don bsam shing // phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// snod bcud rnam rtog rab sbyang bas// bar gcod 'dul ba'i mtshams bcad do// de nas nang du
296b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha lnga// mi bzang 'bar ba'i mtshams bcad pa// he ru ka yi thugs ka nes// rdo rje 'khong lo thob dang // ral gri phur pa'i rang bzhin dag/ hUM oM ba Ta AM hA las 'phros// steng 'og phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bcu// thams cad mtshon cha'i rang bzhin te// 'og nas sa gzhi
296b4(rnying rgyud): gtams pa ste// snyed nas sprin 'khrigs char du 'bebs// bar snang rlung bskyed thog ltar rgyu// phyogs mtshams 'du 'phro me ltar 'bar// rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ 'khor lo 'bar ba bskor zhing gcod// tho ba 'bar ba 'phyar zhing brdung // ral gri 'bar bas gcod cing gtung
296b5(rnying rgyud): zla ba 'bar bas 'dapas shing 'bigs// bar gcod byed pa bgegs kyi tshogs// ma lus rdul du brlag par bya// oM dz+nyA na tsa kra dz+wa la hUM/ dz+nyA na badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ dz+nyA na tik+Sha dz+wa la hUM/ dz+nyA na shak+ti dz+wa la hUM/ dz+nyA na kI la ya dz+wa la hUM/ nang du khro bo rig lnga ni// shin tu khro zhingag tum pa ni// zhi bas 'dul bar mi nu
296b6(rnying rgyud): te// thugs rje chen po'i thabs mchog gis// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sku yi cha lugs khro bar mdzad// rgyu 'bras gnod pa de 'dul phyir// rigs kyi khro chen 'bar ba lnga// dbus dang phyogs bzhi dkyil 'khor rnams// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun gyi//
296b7(rnying rgyud): dngos po rdzas dang mtshan ma kun// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma phran las khrag 'byung ste// thams cad dpal chen he ru ka/ khro bo'i tshogs ni nam mkha' gang // khro mo'i tshogs kyis sa gzhi khyab// khro chung tshogs ni skar ltar 'khrugs// dam tshig can ni da
297a1(rnying rgyud): nas bzhengs// sangs rgyas khro bos gti mug 'dul// rdo rje khro bos zhe sdang 'joms// rin chen khro bos nga rgyal 'joms// pad+ma'i khro bos 'dod chags 'joms// phrin las khro bos phrag dog 'joms// dri za gshin rje kra rnams dang //
297a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams gnas pa bgegs kyi tshogs// 'jig rten phyogs bcu gzhan du byer// 'di ni dpal gyi pho brang ste// bgegs zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA bud+d+ha badz+ra ra ShA pad+ma karba saN+Da le bi dza ya
297a3(rnying rgyud): bod+ha hU~M phaT/ hU~M mo rgyal kun gyi ye shes ni// zhe sdangang rgyal phrag dog dang // 'dod chags gti mug nga dgis dag/ gti mug dpa' chen gyi rbeka/ chos dbyings ye shes dang drugs la// kun tu ma bcos mtha' da thil// zhe sdang dpal rin te nA ka/ gzugs
297a4(rnying rgyud): brtan ye shes ngang du gsal// ma nor ma lus mkhyen pa'i dang // nga rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ mnyam nyid ye shes ngang du gsal// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i blta ba bral// 'dod chags dpal chen he ru ka/ rtog pa'i ye shes nga du gsal// tshes kun thub chub khong
297a5(rnying rgyud): du chud// phrag dog dpal chen he ru ka/ phrin las sna tshogs dang du gsal// thams cad ma grub gang yang med// chos skra spos bral che ba'i mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku he ru ka/ sprul sku khro bo khro ma'i tshogs// rang bzhin mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// phrin las mngod pa
297a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sku// thams cad sku dang ye shes la// bgegs su rtog pa gang yang med// bsrung bar bya dang srung byed med// gcad dang gcod byed gang yang med// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med// 'di la bsal du ga la yod// rang gi sems dang gzhan gyi sems//
297a7(rnying rgyud): dachos du'i nga du shes// chos sku kun bzad te ru ka/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya ba rba po d+him hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ srung ba chen po'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bde bar
297b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs rnams kyis// yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa yi// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa che// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i lung bshad pa// thog mar 'di la rtsom pa yis// nga yis sngon du rab bshad pa'i// mtshan nyid rab rdzogs rgyas bus// dpa' zhing brtul ga rje/
297b2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// rigs bzang yon tan rgyan dang ldan// ma lus thob pa de yis ni// thabs dang shes rab grogs bzang btsal// ji srid spang bya ma lus pas// sangs rgyas drang srong grub pa dang // rdo rje phra men sbyor gnas dang // dur khrod chen po mngon du rgya// dmatsha
297b3(rnying rgyud): can gyi grogs byed cing // bkra shis rdzas kyis rab brgyan pa// 'byung chen dang ni dregs chen dang // mi dang mi min dgra med cing // phun sum tshogs pa gtsang ma der// legs par brtag ste nges bzung zhing // hud la gnang ba thob pa dang // thabs kyi tshogs led
297b4(rnying rgyud): par srung // yo byad mchog gis bsnyen bkur zhing // thog ma bar dang mthar rdzogs pa'i// mi zad gter dang ldan par bya// sngon 'gro dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur pa gdab// phyogs bcu kun nas bsrung bya zhing // zhe sdang chen po'i ting nge
297b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo'i lus ngag gis// ting 'dzin byin brlab rab tu bskor// gzhal med khang pa legs par bsgom// mchog dang dman dang bar ma yis// yul gsum mchod pas kun mnyes nas// sgo gsum gyi ni nyes pa sbyad// rang gi rigs kyi lhar brtag nas// phyo
297b6(rnying rgyud): bzhir rten bzhi mnga' gsol zhing // phrin las ji ltar bsngags pa gsol// nang du bya ba'i rim pa dang // gsang zhing bya ba rnams kyis sbyang // dur khrod bdag po dang dgug cing // gsang dang gnan dang bsrung bar bya// de nyid gzhir gyur sa gzhir bya// lus kyi tshad ldan
297b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa la// lus dri mdog bzang rnams kyis bstar// shes rab grogs kyis rab 'bad de// gnas lnga mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// dri dang rgyan gyis rab bgos te// rgyu dang kha dog tshul ldan pa'i// thig srud rdo rjer byin brlab brjod// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma che// oM dang
298a1(rnying rgyud): d+ha zhes bya ba yis// oMg+ne a dad phaT gyis brgyan// 'bru lnga dang ni byang chub sems// oM AHhU~M gi rang bzhin gyis// cho ga gsum dang ldan pas gdab// mkha' dang gsang ba'i 'gro 'dra yis// dkyil 'khor dgu'am lA las ni/
298a2(rnying rgyud): bcu drug cha yis phye zhing gsal// zhi dang shin tu zhi dang khro// rnam grangs kun tu khyab pa yi// rin chen ye shes tshon sna lngas// ngas bshad bzhugs pa'i pho brang bzhengs// bsnyen par gnang ba bshad bzhin du// skra rdzogs phyag mtshan snying po la/
298a3(rnying rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma yis// rdzas kyi khyad par mngon par dbyung // phyi na gsang ba bum pa'i rdzas// khyad par 'di la bsngags pa yi// ye shes lnga ldan dbus su dgod// sku gsum lhun grub shar du ste// yid bzhin gter ldan lho ru'o//
298a4(rnying rgyud): gsum sgrol mdzad nub tu ste// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin byang du dgod// mi shig mdzod ldan shar lho ste// srid gsum yongs sgrol lho nub tu'o// dug gsum gtan dkrug nub byang du'o// mtshan ma spos bral byang shar du'o// so so'i ming gi mtshan ma dag/ rigs kyi rdzas ma
298a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rdzas kyi rnam pa de sbyar bya// kha dog rigs dang mthun pas bcing // dur khrod srung ba'i rdzas kyis bskor// thun mong mchod rdzas rgyas par bsham// zhi ba g+han ta na'i dus// phyogs bzhi dag na rab brtan pa'i// dur khrod rdzas
298a6(rnying rgyud): dang mar me dang // yum dang yab dang rgya mchog sngags// nga yis sngon bshad rigs brgya dang // brgya phyed lnga dang gcig nyid kyi// gnas mchog gsum du 'bru gsum gyis// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du gsal// ye shes lnga dang skya mchog dang // yab yum thun mong nga
298a7(rnying rgyud): rgyan gsal// dgug gzhug pa stim pa tshang byas nas// dam tshig dbang chen rnams kyis bsngags// rnam par rtog pa kun sbyang ste// bsnyen pa dam pas nye bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba pal+la a mr-i ta/ ra sA yan tan dza ya/ gu N+ya dz+dzahU~M hrIH3/ sman rnams thams cad bdud rtsi
298b1(rnying rgyud): byed sna tshogs sku gsung thugs// gsang ba'i dngos grub nye ba'o// sman dang dam tshig lha rnams na// kun dang rgyas ldan dam pas sbyang // stong tshogs mchod bstod ting 'dzin gsal// bskrad dang bsrang dang bar chad bzlog/ rtags rdzogs thod pa ldang bya
298b2(rnying rgyud): zhing // rigs lnga'i dam tshig dbab pa ni// rdzas mchog rnam pa lnga dbye ba// dbus su sems 'du rtsa ba brgyad// ga bur cu gang dzA ti dang // gur gum sug smel li shi dang // ka ko la thal kar rdo rje dang // shA rI ram dang bcas te dgod// shar dri dri chen
298b3(rnying rgyud): a ru ra// a ga ru dang dzA ti dang // du ru ka la sogs pa dgod// lho ru mAM sa snying sna tshogs// zho sha rnams dang tsi tra ka/ ka ko la li sogs par dgod// nub tu pad+ma rak+ta dang // tsan dan li shi skyu ru ra// rgun 'brum star bu la sogs dgod// byang du rdi chu sna tsho
298b4(rnying rgyud): dang // gur gum ce bog la sogs te// rtsa ba lo ma me tog 'bras// lus bcud dbang po yan lag dang // rtsa khrag chu la sogs pa kun// shar lho nub byang phyogs dang dbus// rang gi rigs dang 'khor du dgod// yaM raM las ni bskyod dang bsreg/ dbus/
298b5(rnying rgyud): su a maM nyi zla la// oM hUM swA AM hA zhes pa// dkar mthing ser dmar ljang bu dbus// shar lho nub byang rim bzhin bskyed// 'od ldan rgyud lnga sbyong byed cing // snod bcud rab bsdus mtshan ma ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri'i 'phro 'du dang //
298b6(rnying rgyud): lnga yum dang bcas pa yis// gsal ba'i snod du blangs nas kyang // rdo rje pad+ma'i 'phro 'dra dang // so so'i ngogs kyi snying po dang // tshogs lnga ye shes lnga dang bcas// chang chu 'o ma rin chen chu// mtshams bzhin so so'i 'dul skyong gis// rtags dang ldan pa
298b7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // gnyis med gsang chen rigs gcig gi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgo ma// / oM sarba dalA a mr-i ta/ badz+ra bo d+ha sa ma hUM/ zhu ba'i ngo bo nyid du bya// kyor pa'i nus rtogs rdzogs pa dang // mchod bstod dngos grub blang la sogs// shes rab kyis na/
299a1(rnying rgyud): thabs mnyas bya// bzang mchog las can pardzas// mnyam nyi thugs la bstim ning phyug/ zhangad rtswa yang btud bya/ gnas du myu sha zad pa bad// lag sumal 'drubs// sman lasags sas dang
299a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// lha dang dkyil 'khor rdzas rnams kun// dur khrod chen po'i gsang ba mchog/ dpal gyi khro rtags cha lugs bsgyur// pags pag yang gzhi mchog steng du// dri ma chog bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgo// dkar dmar sems kyi thig le bri// rdo rje gang che mas
299a3(rnying rgyud): gzug/ mang 'a gas 'bas dang shes rab kyis// byi rlabus bdud rtsi 'gyel ba las// gtso chen dang ni 'khor gyi tshogs/ rang gi rigs dang mtshungs pa yis// ye shes bdud rtsi dbab par bya// spyong ba'i bskyen pas bcu zhing btub// mdzan dugs la
299a4(rnying rgyud): rung ba dang // mtshan ma dbyings su sbyang ba'i phyir// gtso 'khor rim bzhin phyag rgyas dbab// btag bcog sbyang dang spel ba ni// shar lho nupa byang phyogs rim bzhin// sngags phreng bcas pas mthar byung ste// bdug cing bslad dang bsrung ba dang // gle bro gang dang martso/
299a5(rnying rgyud): bstod bye// khro ba rgya'id rgyal stangs stabs kyis// yon tan brjod cing sgribs bskrad// yige 'bru lngas bzhud nga brtul// zin las rnam pa sreg spyang las// rdzas kyi phrad kyis mnyes par bya// mtshan ldan yum de rgyan byas nas// bzang po'i snod du rgas btang
299a6(rnying rgyud): nas// rdo rje rgyal po lnga yis bzung // stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang // sems gsum dag pa'i byin rlabs dbab// phyi nang 'byung ba yongs rdzogs pas// dur khrod rgyun rdzogs gzhal yas khang // pho brang chen po dgu bsams nus// rang gi gdan steng sa bon gyis//
299a7(rnying rgyud): nyis// gan sa nas gyingasargyag / phyogs pa da kyil 'thong rgyas 'i rgya du yong sa cam god // du gyi gyi dang gyi// dam pa 'i 'du sa la/ gas sa sa pani phrus jus/
299b1(rnying rgyud): mr-imra dang bdA bye'o// rlung dang ma yi sbyor ba las// gzhal med khang pa brgyad dkyus su// gtso chen brgyad kyi dbu gsum pachis// de snyed bdag nyid te drug/ zhabs bzhi yis ni rab tu mnan// mkha' mnyam klong gi zhabs brgyad kyis// he rug brgyad dbu
299b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis mnan// dbu phyed rngub pa'i bdag nyid las// nyi shu rtswa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad dbu brgyad rnams sbyor ba// rdzogs byed he ru ka nyid ni// dbu ma'i ljags las nu sbyor// thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// bum pa'i dbus le 'bru
299b3(rnying rgyud): bskor// 'di ni sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brgyad dang ldan// he rA ka yid rgyal ldan// ye shes dkyil 'khor tshogs dkrug cing // slar bstim mchod cing bstod byas nas// bya ba chen po der 'jug pas// bdag nyid de
299b4(rnying rgyud): sbyang sngags dang bcas// ting 'dzin me dpyang rlung gis bskyod// dron rtogs dpe dang ldan pa ni// ye shes chen po'i brgyad rtsi ste// mu tig dkar po rdo med ldan// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bcu zhing btul// mnga' mngon bcu gnyis dang ldan pa/
299b5(rnying rgyud): 'du gsum gyis don chen bsrub// de 'dra'i sbyor ba dpag med kyis// rim bzhin thabs kyi man lag las// brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'bad pa ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rnams kyis gcod byas nas// 'od dang dubaskra dang dri//
299b6(rnying rgyud): skad 'phel ba rab tu ston/ de s+ya mchod bstod rgya chen bya// ting 'dzin bskyed cing bar chad bzlog/ skyugs pa mchog gis gzung bar bya// 'dod pa rdzogs nas bsgyel bar bya// oM AHhU~M sarba padz+ra a mr-i tad+d+hi hrIH/ pargya rtsa brgyad kyis ting 'dzin pabyang /
299b7(rnying rgyud): phreng chen por dab brgya ning // oM ma hrIHsa maM a pra be she ma tho bi hUM hrIH// bar du thogs shing ting 'dzin gsal// dngos grub gnyer zhing gsol ba gad ga// pho brang dgu yi steng gzhug nas// las dang mthun pa'i dbang rdzas bskur// phyogs bcur
300a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// lhag su rgya ma ngas gsas sacad// dubazhin pa da/ nga nga // da sa/ phyugs sa// dmigs ma dgasamams 'gyur// mnyas pa sa sa mas na na
300a2(rnying rgyud): sa// rin chen dbang po'i sgrol thim// rigs kun so sor gnang ba dang / rdo rje slob mas me tog gtor// rim pa bzhin du dbang sbyin pa// srul tshig dbyangs dang sngags rdzas bcas// phyi nang gnang ba de nyid tshul// yul gsum mnyes kyi dag sung
300a3(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas chen po bstar ba yang // bsreg cing mchod de gtor chen la// 'phags pa mchod cing gdod longs spyad// ri lu lcags sam za ma tog/ thog ma'i snod gzhug bsnyen cing bkur// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas la sogs//
300a4(rnying rgyud): bskal pa grangs med skad cig gis// mnyam dang chos lhagayon tan rdzogs// phrin las rnam bzhi lags bshad cing // byin kun mnyes gtang rag gtang // gnas bsrung lha gzhan der mi bstod// kun gyi don du bsngo bya zhing // mtshan ma spros bral dngos yin /
300a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi yon tan te// mnyam nyid rtogs pa kho nas 'grub// nyon mongs dug rnams sran du bskur// ye shes lnga yi longs spyod la// rdzas kyi drug rnams spos ci dgos// dpe don brda dang rtags yin no// gdul bya'i rigs la kha tog lnga// bsdus pa yon tan gser
300a6(rnying rgyud): lta bya// rnam dag dpe mtshon dkar po ste// chags chen dbang ni dmar por sdang // phrin pas kun rdzog ljang gu'o// don ldan mi 'gyur mthing nag ste// ma lus kun rdzogs dri yin no// thams cad ro gcig de yi ro// dngos po'i rdzas su snang ba'i bcud// rang bzhin yon/
300a7(rnying rgyud): tan che ldan las// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa bsam mi khyab// ma lus rang gi lus su 'dus// rnam par rtog pa ye shes sman// sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal ba med// don rtags chos dang sman gyis ni// dpal gyi mdzad pa de sbyang ngo // hUM zhi khro rgyal ba ye shes sku// 'gro la phan
300b1(rnying rgyud): dzod thugs rje can// srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcag go// lha yi lha rnams dgongs su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa// sprul pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas// ma lus 'dus pa mkhyen par gsol// bdag ni rgyal srid longs spyod dang // rang 'dod na
300b2(rnying rgyud): mi bslab cing // 'gro gzhan don du 'bad rtsol na// kun gyi dpal du 'gyur bar bya// kun mkhyen ye shes spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan kun gyi lhag bsam mkhyen// spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa// rnal 'byor bslu bar mi bci'o// khe dang grags pa 'jig rten chos/
300b3(rnying rgyud): rgyu ngan pa'i sems spangs nas// sman tu bzang po byang chub sems// don dam kun rdzob tshul bzung po// sems can thams cad bdud gyur te// bdag la gnod pa rab sbyar kyang // shes rab snying rje 'brel mas bsrung // yid dam lha dang bla ma dang // mchod bzung thegs te
300b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// srog gi phyir yang mi spang bsgrub// snang sems rmi lam sgyu ma la// 'chi bas 'jigs pa ma mchis te// skye bo gzhan gyi don 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// rang dbang du ni skye ba blang // bdag ni gcig pu'i zhing de la// myur 'gro sgrog ma mchi
300b5(rnying rgyud): pas// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo zhing // byang chub sems kyi dka' ba spyad// shes rab thab kyis don mdzad tshe// 'gro ba las kyi 'dul skal la// so so'i bla dang skad bzhin du// ji ltar 'tshams pa de bstan no// rnal 'byor mchog
300b6(rnying rgyud): lam zhugs pa yi// skyes chen rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// nus pa ji snyed shugs kyis ni// brtson 'grus 'bad pas bsnyen bkur ro// gsang ba zeg pa bla med la// rab sdang gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba// nus mthu drog rtsal ci yod kyis// myur du sgrol bar bdag 'tshal
300b7(rnying rgyud): lo// de lta'i dus chen 'di nyid nas// theg chen bla med thug gi par// dpal chen bde bar gshegs rnams kyis// ji ltar dam bcas de bzung ngo // zhes brjod don rnams dam bcar bzung // dam tshig chen po'i bsgrub pa'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// kun tu 'byung /
301a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ pa kun gyi mchog/ he rug dpal bdab ma// 'di la das par 'dod pa yis// ngadang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// skyes bu rnams kyi don bshad pa// sman grol thob pa ma gtogs pa// cha ga gcig tsam yang ma bstan te// rang gi rgyu na
301a2(rnying rgyud): do pa yi// skal bzang mchog ldan de yis ni// srog lus blo dang rdza.a rnams kyis// yul mchog mnyes byas 'dod pa blang // bum pa gsang ba gsang chen dang // theg pa kun 'dus blta ba 'di// rim pa rnams kyi dang po'o// las dang rig pa'i brtul zhug
301a3(rnying rgyud): dang // sa bcu kun stong mnyam bzhig ster// mngon par gnas pa'i rim bzhin du// pan nus cho ga lam ldi dang // rgyal thabs skye brug thabs chen yin// dang po'i las can de smin pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad gyi// skal pa 'dzeg
301a4(rnying rgyud): bltams gyur tshe// lha klu'i dbang pos dngos dbang bskur// dge sbyong chen po sangs rgyas che// bdud bzhi dgra las rgyal byas nas// sa bdag lha mos legs brjod nas// bkra shis bum pas de dbang bskur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dgongs
301a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyis blangs pa yi// dag pa'i snod phul de dbang bskur// 'khor los sgyur rgyal des bu spyod// spyi bor bum pa yid bzhin btegs// 'khor mo yo byad sna bdun gyis// mngon par bstod pas de dbang bskur// dka' bu
301a6(rnying rgyud): gnas gyur na// khyed kyis bsam gtan 'di yis ni// mthar thug don chen mi thob pas// rang gi 'od gsal de zung la// rang dga'i gnas su khyod song la// byang chub mchog la do yadra spyod// tshig rdzogs dam pas de dbang bskur// longs spyod rdzogs sgra'i rgyal rdza/
301a7(rnying rgyud): gyis// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i shes rab ma'i// btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rol mdzad pa// rig ma chen mos de dbang bskur// mngon byung de nyid mdor nas// zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang // zhib mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog/ spos med mtha' la yongs ma
301b1(rnying rgyud): nas// 'dus mabyas shing kun byas thab// bdud kyi skyon bral margyagazang ba// denar brdzogs da dbang 'phrang// dam pa bzhi yis brdzogs te// de nas gang du ldog ma byas// rang dang gzhan gyi tshul snang las// mu dang ya shas chags byung ba// dang
301b2(rnying rgyud): ni rdzogs pa'i phrin las min// drung khrod rgya gling ri dang ljongs// dus ni chus dang 'byor ldan pas// phran sa mchags pa'i gnas nyid dra// gsol ba gad ba dang chos 'byung zhing // yon tan rab rdzogs 'phel dus der// byang chub sems ldan chud srungs shing // rkyen
301b3(rnying rgyud): yon tan rdzogs pa dang // yon tan de nyid thob 'dod pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan slong ma yis// rigs bzang sems kyis rab bskal ba'i// rten drung ltung ba'i spyan lnga rba// brtag dang bslang dang byin gyis brlab// sbyangs shing bzung ba sngon song ba'i// dkyil 'jo ga bum pa lha rnam
301b4(rnying rgyud): dang // slong ma stu gan bya ba las// rjes su bsnyen pa lags bshad nas// byang chubasams rjes bzung ba yi// thig zis tshan ni rin chen 'gyi// rje sogs ting nge 'dzin gyis zas// ye shes chen po nyer bskyen nas// smang yang d+hani I lam sbyang ste// pho brang / rdu me tog byed/
301b5(rnying rgyud): gsol ba gang brjong blo 'i byed nas// ku shas dag byas snying na bsgom// nang du rdo chen po bzung // kwa sha so shing srang srung sbyin// de dag mtshan nyid ltas kyang brtag/ las kyi chu yis gtsang sna spyod// tshogs yongs su smin pa dang // nang du 'dong la dag tshig bsreg/ rnaM
301b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i ye shes dbab// me tog zeng ba lnga la dor// gang gi rigs su 'gyur ba brtag/ gsol ba btab pas mig byinas// gzugs brten gtsal khor legs par bstan// de nas sgrogs pa'i sal bzhag/ me tog phreng bas dbang 'askur \u0f7f// lha dang phrum na
301b7(rnying rgyud): rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming la sogs// rig pa chen po'i dbang bskyang // rdodzu pa dpon gnang ba'i dbang // seng ga parda'i ji steng du// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs dang // phyag mtshan dade ni dam chog gsum// dbugs dbang lung bstan phyer mi zlog// ny+tsar
302a1(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i bum dbang ngo // bum pa'i bcud mchog bdud rtsi lnga// btung ba'i dam pa blud pa ni// rang rdzas bum pa gsang ba'o// bde ldan lus kyi bum pa ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// chu yis ye shes sems dag pa// shes rab dag pa'i bum pa'o// phyag rgya
302a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bum pa las// sems kyi chu rgyun babs pa yis// thabs mchog gsang ba dag byed pa// sbas pa'i bum pa bzhi pa ste// thun mong gsang ba khyad par dang // rab tu sbas pa de dag gis// lus su 'dzin pa'i phyogs kun smin// thabs dang shes rab nges par dbab// lus kyi nyes
302a3(rnying rgyud): ma dri ma sbyang // sgrib tshul sa dang lam gyis sbyang // bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi lam// dam tshig ye shes sbyor ba'i lam// gzugs brnyan mthong ba de nyid lam// kun tu gnas bsgyur bsgom pa'i lam// nges par thob pa mi slob lam// dang po las kyis yin te// gnyis pa/
302a4(rnying rgyud): da pa'o// dang po rab tu dga' ba nas// gzhi pa brgyad pa'i bar du 'gro// phyi yi brgyud pa bskyed rim dang // phrin las bzhi dang grub chen brgyad// thun mong yan lag thabs chan dang // dang po'i las kyi spyod pa bstan// gnyis pa rjes spyod rnal 'byor te// gsum pa la ni bden pa gnyis// kun
302a5(rnying rgyud): sum mdzad drug pa'o// kun tu sgra ni ji ltar dang // ldem po ma yin drang ba dang // tshig tsam yan lag tshugs kun bstan// ku sha la sogs gtsang sbra yis// ltas dang me tog dor las brtag/ lus kyi brda dang phyag rgya bstan// mgo la dbu rgyan cod pan te// dag byed rdzas kun lus dang spyi'o// dam tshig rdo rje dril
302a6(rnying rgyud): chu bcur te nus pa dbyung // dud khrod chas rnams lus kun la// phyag rgya phyag mtshan lag la'o// dbugs dbyung yon tan slob pa myed// srub rdzas lung sbyin kun byir ro// don dam phyir mi zlog la bstan// rgyan gyi khyad par rang gi gnas// rin chen nye ba'i rin chen bgyad// bkra shis nye ba'i
302a7(rnying rgyud): sa kyis// tshung mdun me lus rdzas kun gyis// sngags tshig smon lam rnams kyis sbyin// tshad med bzhi yi dgongs pa dang // rang gis lhag pa'i lha rnams bstim// dag pa'i yon tan rgyud lnga myong // kun grub ye shes lnga rjes 'dzin// phyag rgya dam tshig grub pa lnga// slob ma rjes
302a8(rnying rgyud): sa can kyang /
302b1(rnying rgyud): sasbyin byas nas// gagasum sgrub pa'i dus 'tha// bran pa sa nus shing 'bras thabapa// dbyung mo zung brdung ban 'joms// rang bzhin gnas dang bsags pa dang // don rabs dang lam gyings// sangs rgyas sa la yon tan ldan// thur myong dang ni myabyung
302b2(rnying rgyud): thug pa'i// dngos grub kyis ni bzang 'dzin lhag/ bdud 'joms 'phrod pa'i yon tan no// nus pa sgrib 'khrud sgrib skyong dang // las byed pa dang 'bras bu thob// mngon du phyogs dang bdud 'joms pa'o// phreng bas ma dang dri ma 'khrud// mos pas spyod pa'i
302b3(rnying rgyud): sgrib skyong zhing // 'dod lha mnyes pa lam yin te// 'bras bu mthong ba'i lam ma phyogs// yi dam dngos grub nye ba yin// gzung 'dzin phung po'i bdud rnams bcom// chu ni blo gnyis dri ma dang // dang po'i sa la dri ma 'khru// zhe sdang nga rgyal grogs su spyod// lam bsgo ma rim
302b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dngos grub yin// nyon mongs rtog pa'i bdud rnams 'joms// ming gdag rdo rje dril bu yis// phyi nang mtshan ma gnas ngan len// rang bzhin g.yeng ba lnga nyid dang // gnyis brgyad par gyi dri ma sel// 'dod chags phrag dog rnam dag pa'i// rigs su byed cing 'bras bu ni// mtha
302b5(rnying rgyud): phyinas ma mngon phyogs shi // ltar sogs thun mo grub pa'o// 'chi bdag gnod pa'i bdud 'joms byed// gsum pas g.yeng ba phra mo dang // sa bcutha ma des gsal bas// sa la mgong ma de bstan byed// brtul zhugs kyis ni ma tog brtan// chu dang dbu byan dam tshig gis// dum
302b6(rnying rgyud): par brtan pa bka' stsal to// lus brtan rdo rje dril bus byas// bdag po'i dbang gis dbugs dbyung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la phyogs// 'bras bu dngos grub brtan par byed// lha dang 'grel pa'i bdud 'joms nus// me tog gis ni 'bras bu zhi// dbu rgyan chu yis rgyu mthur byed//
302b7(rnying rgyud): rnam smin rdo rje drul bu yis// ming gi skyes bu rab tu byed// 'bras bu dri med brtan pa bzhi// ngas bshad yon tan ma lus pa// 'di yi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rten 'brel gyis// mtha thug nus pa 'byin pa ste// nga ye bstan pa dang ba /
303a1(rnying rgyud): danam rim pa gnyis pa ni// da dang bangs cas thams cad to// dgas tho bdan pas nga// gnamasachag dam pa 'a nyis// 'dod chags da nga ting 'dun rdzas// dgas d+ha ga ldag sa sa 'asdus ta// lda gdapal pag yod
303a2(rnying rgyud): kyi// gsang ba zugs kyi dkyil 'bar du// rgyal thabs lci thugs dbang byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun rjo kyis ni don dam mchog/ rang gi rigs su bsrubs pa las// dbang mchog chen por bgyur ba na// nga dang nga yi sras rnams kyis/
303a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud can dam pa de bshad do// gnas ni yang yum gas pa'i mkha'// khyad par gyuran cig rgyas pa dang // drang tha tha~Mng dang rdzogs las byas/ rang gi gnas dang rigs ngan dang / mthen macan dang stobs can dang // garam khan chos ma gdas pa'o// gsung po da
303a4(rnying rgyud): mkhan ma la sogs// rgyud myang yon tan phun sum tshogs// nga yis bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid ldan// 'di ni gnas kyi dam pa'o// gang gi yon tan de rdzogs nas// pad+ma'i chu rgyun 'bab pa dang // he ru ka la gsol btab nas// gnang ba thob pa dus su brtag/
303a5(rnying rgyud): yAm gnyis med gsum blang yul// bum pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa dang // bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor du 'khrugs sa// longs spyod 'dod pa ldan pa'o// thog mar lus kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ NA ni 'dom gang de nyid // legs par 'bab pa sgo bzhi ste// sdang ba nyan 'do
303a6(rnying rgyud): yin// d+hU ting bu mtshangs pa'i thig/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ni rdo rje'i gdung // ka ba rkang brgyad de nyid ni// yan lag bzhi ni rta ba pas yin// rtsa ba'i snying ni pho brang sgo// snying gzhan snod bzhir bcas pa ni// pho brang chen po brgyad yin no// sha dang rus pa brtsig pa ste/
303a7(rnying rgyud): dang rgyas pa zhim chu yin// pags na gyi 'i 'khor drug ste// bsgri ma 'bar ro// dbang gi yul brnam bdun rje// sgra dang migani rgyal mtshan mthong // phung ba ldanan gyi chen lnga// 'byung ba ldan sumachen lnga// rnam par shes brjid yu dang 'ardzas/
303b1(rnying rgyud): na man brgyad mnano// sams dngamams las byung ba dang // snang ba dang ni de las smras// rtag pa'i dang bzhin ma smras pa// gdang tha dang rnam par gnas// thams cad ma lus del 'do// ba'adang brkang ba gad tsas// mnyas par nga sa dam ma gas
303b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma pa sa // na / ma / sa gan pa kyi 'ang na/ na zhal las byeng/ de brtas padang ga da/ na brjin du 'dag / du gnyis pa shes
303b3(rnying rgyud): rom dzu gdong bkab nas// gsol ba gdag cing bskor nas su// phyag btsal me tog dbul bar bya// dmachog gini rdzas kyis dbab// mig bye mthong brtag bstan cing brtag/ nang rol du ni gtso chen dang // khams gsum bdag po mnye ma sbyar bas// ba ga
303b4(rnying rgyud): bong po dag/ rim gyis phan te sbyin par bya// dkar nu rdzas dang rgyan nga ga dang // tshungs skor 'ab dang ming byin badrwag/ skra dang bde dang blang ba dang // rnam par mi rtog/ longs spyod dang // bde tho ba 'od dang gsal ba ste// phreng brgya dang dab rgyan dang / rdo rje dri 'buM
303b5(rnying rgyud): dang / brgyal grags lung bstan phyir me ldog/ dbugs dbyung gsang ba'i dbang yin no// gzung canan bdud ce lnga// dang ba byeng blo de'i rgyal draH// sems can dbab ba de mi thebs// bajug rlomin gas pa ma// dod pa deni spel ba'i gnas// rdorje pa po
303b6(rnying rgyud): dgani skyon yon gsum gyis sku gsum mchod// 'gro ba'i sgor dbab skra zhing gsang // de nyid rnam pa bzhi yin te// rang bzhin rgyu 'bab bum pa las// ro myang ba ni gsang ba yin// rtog med la mthob gsum pa ste// gnyis med ye shes bzhi pa yin// badz+ra
303b7(rnying rgyud): ste snang 'a na phyin gas gnas dag gi lam// yul gsum rgyal drim med// sgo gnyis pa yi skyong sngags te// dang po'i sngal slob pa yod// dgongs dang nges dang ji ltar min// sgras dang ma lus ldan pa dag/ rnal 'byor chen po'i don yin no//
303b8(rnying rgyud): yi gsang ba yi pa/ yang
304a1(rnying rgyud): smra na na du na na su na na sa / na du
304a2(rnying rgyud): mi na // ky-i bas mi ma ga pa// ga na / ga /

304a4(rnying rgyud): na/ sa / / kyi / dzin la ma sa/ nga/ na sa

304a6(rnying rgyud): na dri ma 'di sten/ // byu byas pa'o// ny-im rdzogs da sa// ma ga / rdzung bas te// rten pa nga la sngags men// 'bang ma na pa dgra bad// shes
304a7(rnying rgyud): sa
304a8(rnying rgyud): brnyes pa'i gsang ba/ yang
304b1(rnying rgyud): 'dir rnam rtag yod ma yin// wA dang / kyil 'bar spyo bzhin te// gsang ba'a'amar po rnam pa bzhi// gsal ba'i 'dab ma rang gi gnas// rtswal lag rnam pa can// sngon du bshad parab brtan te// g.yas g.yon dbus gsum mtshan tad brtag/ dran ldan
304b2(rnying rgyud): modzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dris bsgos mchod tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ma lus lhag pa'i lha ru bsgom// oM hUM phaT dang AHyis ni// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// gnas gzung 'jug par gsol gdab ste// bcu zhugs blang dang dbab par ba// de ras dus
304b3(rnying rgyud): rigs kun la// dga' shing gus pa'i sems bskyed de// phyag btsal nas ni me tog gtor// shes rab sangs rgyas mig bya ste// lus kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus bstan// chags chen gla gar rol mo'i brda// mtshan nyid bzhi sogs rgyun dbab dang // nga gro
304b4(rnying rgyud): sbya rdorje dgong // bskyod pa'i sgra ldan te paT 'bod// ma mar gnas bsgyur ngas pa babyed// lus d+hi sti gtong dag gis smras// pad+mar thung byed phyir mi ldog/ bum pa phreng chu sa rgyan dang // rdo rje dral bu mang brtul zhugs// dmachog dbugs dbyung spang bstan pa
304b5(rnying rgyud): phyirim mthong ba'i ye shes che// shes rab bde chen 'khor los srog/ dbab cing myang ba nang gi ste// zhi bo di skad cig rnam bzhi yis// kun tu bde thob gnas pa'o// phyi ru brda sprad bum pa ste// bad+ma rdo rje phrad gsang ba// rab bde gsum pa ye shes bzhi// gnas
304b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi blang ba de'o// bud med sgyu ma sems kyis brngas// mtshan nyid rnam pa'i lus kyis myang // shes rab skal pa med pas kyang // rlung sems 'gog pa'i thabs kyis kyang // bde chen skad cig mthar thug mtshon// sems sbyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes bgyur// ma chags
304b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma can du sgrib// sems rig rang bzhin 'od gsal brtan// rtsa gnyis kyis ni gzung 'dzin 'gog/ gcig gis las rnams kun las brtag/ 'od zer 'phro dang bskyod dang 'bar// 'bab cing skyes gang bde chen sku// de nyid rtsa lnga rlung bcu yis// las su kun
305a1(rnying rgyud): byang sprul pa'is// steng dag sgo dang bar rnams su// rlung dang sngags kyi de nyid kyis// rab slar 'byung dang rngub pa dang // bzlas dang reg dang sgyu ma'i tshul// bde dang gsal dang ma tog las// rgyun mi 'chad pa ye shes kyis// 'ja
305a2(rnying rgyud): dang 'das tshul dam lus shing // ma nor de yis shes 'bras bu// phyi rol smig rgyu du ba dang // srin bu srog dang mar me dang // nam mkha' lta bu rim bzhin 'byung // brtan rdzogs rim pa lnga dag gis// skad cig dga' dang brda bcu gnyis// rang rig bdud ni lnga skad
305a3(rnying rgyud): cing // de 'dod yon tan lnga nyid spang // bang skyong tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi// skye mgrin steng ga lte ba dang // gsang sbas gnas chen bcu drug las// yar 'phel mang 'grib phyed phyed bzhi// la sogs yi ge badz+ra drug dang // sram curtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// badz+ra/
305a4(rnying rgyud): kyi phyed dang bzhi nyid kyis// ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shak+Sha// oM AHhUM dang haM gis ni// 'khor long bus su de nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis gnyis sbyor// ting 'dzin lha dang lus dang rtsa// dbugs rlung bcu dang thig le lha// tha ma la sems dang byang chub sapas/
305a5(rnying rgyud): dza la de brten rim par rdzogs// gnas dang 'phro dang rab tu 'phro// thim pa sku yi nus pa ni// dang po dang ni bcu gcig pa'i// sgrib 'joms phyag rgya thob nus// bcu gnyis pa yi rig pa 'dzin// spyi bo sprul pa'i bar 'khor los// nyon mongs nas brtsam bdud bzhi
305a6(rnying rgyud): 'joms// ngamachog 'khor lo bad+ma'i gnas// rdo rje bder bskyed bde 'bab pa'o// sprul pa'i chos spyod bde 'che// rnam ston nu mthun chos kyi sku// dri med skyes bus tshogs byed// de yi rjes sman la 'byor des// 'di ni shes rab ye shes kyis// rim pa gsung
305a7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba yin// ngas sngon mthar thug bstan pa la// byang chub sems dpag byed rnams kyis// ngag gsal ba li ye shes bgrub// rnam par rtog pa de rags len// de la de ni yod ma yin// rang gis rang rig ye shes te// theg pa'i blta ba spyi 'byams
305b1(rnying rgyud): bstan// thugs mchog 'gyur med de la gnas// dus gsum ngas med dus kyi mchog/ sems nyed gang shes bla ma mas// bsam gyis mi khyab da yi sras// gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor de// rang gis gsang tshad mi rig ste// de nyid gang mthong mig byed pa de
305b2(rnying rgyud): snyoms stobs lam nus dkyil 'khor mchog/ kun la dbang bsgyur rang rig pa'i// rgyal chen rdzogs pa rang dbang mchog/ blta ba theg pa spyi 'byams kyis// khong du chud pa'i rnam grangs yin// de nyid gsang ba gnyis pa ste// gsum sogs brjod la bas
305b3(rnying rgyud): ni khyab// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ste// gcig dang du mar 'dzin las grol// 'od gsal gzhi dang lam 'bras bu// sems nyid chos nyid ngo bo nyid// thabs gsum dang ni shes rab gsum// snang ba gsam dang stong pa gsum// ma lus zung du 'dug pa ste/
305b4(rnying rgyud): med yi ge 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa chen po'i sa zhes bya// bcugs ma ngon brjod las 'das// de la brtan bya yod min zhing // ston par byed pa med nyid bstan// ljang da stong pa snyed pan// rnam par rtog pa de yi rdza sa// dgongs pa rang rig de yardzas// 'gyu
305b5(rnying rgyud): med pa de yi nus// kun gyi mchog gyur 'bras bu yin// rim pa 'ong bzhi tshogs pa ni// rten 'gyur gzug gis shes gyur gyis// kun la dbang bsgyur ngas par tshig/ kun ma khye ga 'phang rtags pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'bang ba sgrub pa ste// phyogs kun mnyes bya
305b6(rnying rgyud): tshig ste// mdzegs pa yis rdzogs bya min// rdzogs la mardzogs de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs dang khyad par dang // smye dang byed par thun mod bcas// rdo rje chang ba mi skad cing // des gsung 'thun pa'i bka' mi rngag// der rtags smin la'ang thob man// kun tu thams
305b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang mi rtsa// byang chub sems kyang rab tu gzung // gzhan den phyogs kun spyad pa dbyung // gsang ba yul med de mi brjod// su gur lus la mi brtas te// legs bshad som nyig la bya// bstan la rab sdeng rdzas gzung min// tham sa rtags pa babyung maH//
306a1(rnying rgyud): par myos pastan ma dbyu // shes rang kun la m+mu pa byung // ngas bas shA y-in byung na 'dag// gdugs del byu ga byung// yang dgastsal sa dus// ngams byan pa gang // dang ma danan
306a2(rnying rgyud): ga te rnam par klog gyung na// brjod pa'i tshig 'dis rab tu sbyangs// oM bde gshegs kun 'dus rgyal bzhi lo'i dang // chos su smos bral ba de chen gdong nas dka/ longs spyod rdzogs skyabs ma 'das brjod pa 'ang // gle bru 'gro na rdzogs mdzod dag
306a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs// oM phrin tu bzung po che mchog ha sa// 'gro 'dul thabs sde gtso brgyad la khor dang bcas// yon tan skra gsung thugs dang phrin las bdag/ 'dod 'byung kun rdzogs sbrul phyag 'tshal bstod// mi dpal ldan ni gro dang daphyug gsang ba'i tshogs// d+hin
306a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rnyed pa da pa tshogs// spug sung thugs ma tes napa ma pa'i gter mdzod ces// tha med mtshang sbyin mchog sbyang ma tsud par bzhes// mi thag med dus nas 'khor 'das bdag gzhan tshul// gnyis mang byed chub sems su gcig nyid kyang // las pa du
306a5(rnying rgyud): pas thang ngas slong gnas// gnyis yin lag ste yid kyis po com byung // ba ga bkal nyal gyi rtogags// rgyal ba'i dgrangs spyod rabs gta mthor// thabs dang shes rab la thal thang dor rjod// tsam cig gsang ba'i dam las 'gapa zhing nyams
306a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i don ched sgrib pa'i rgyur gyur pa// gnang rtsong zhi ba'i sems bskyed lam sbyangs nas// tsa ba yan lag sgyu gsung thugs kyi gsang // blun mar bye brag khyad par byas ma mi khyab// de ltar gdams pa'i gzhung bzhin ma rtogs pa// bde gshegs rgyal ba ni Sha~M
306a7(rnying rgyud): khor dang bcas// thugs rje mnga' bdag khyed la bzod par gsol// ye shes phul gyis sangs rgyas sa ston cig/ dus gsum rgyun du mi 'bral dgongs mdzod cig/ zhes brjod tshig gis mnyes shing sbyang // mchod rdzas chen po de bsgrub po// de nas byin/
306b1(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab bya'i phyir// phung ba'i rdzas kyis sgrub pa na// gzhan gyi don la 'dag pa dang // rang gdangs pa mchog 'dod pas// yig lnga las legs byung ba la// sa ga'i mangs par 'ang ltar ldan// dmya gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ga dang // dra
306b2(rnying rgyud): shongs yangs pazlog mnas// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa gnas// yon tan tshogs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas bgegs rnams bzlog/ rngabrang tshul dang ldad sra babyu //
306b3(rnying rgyud): ldan mang ste// rang sngags yig tu byin gyis// rdorje sa tshur las kyis bya// pho brang dgu me rkun dgas kyis// mkhas pas byin brlab d+ha tshogs 'byung // gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyun gcod phyir// 'jug pa las ci sgo gsum bya// de la rdzas kyang med ni// dre las men
306b4(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi yi// phyag mtshan gser dngul zangs dang lcags// shug pa gseng shi tsan dan dmar// chu shing tshor ma can gyis ni// rgyu yi don 'brung de bshad bA// gtso chen dgu dang rab sbyar ba'i// khros pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan bcas// khru bzhi pa'am
306b5(rnying rgyud): gsum du \u0f7f// lhag pa'i lha rnams de bzhin du// khru gang pa dang mdzub gang sogs// rigs dang mthun zhing grangs dang mnyam// rdzas kyi gtso bo mchog tu bya// rang gi gnas su gtsal phyogs// mdzes pa'i gnas su dgod par bya// dod dam mung ba dgug cing brtan/
306b6(rnying rgyud): phyag btsal mnga' gsol mchod cing bstod// he sa/ sogs 'khor dang bcas// nges par byin gyis brlab cing dbab// zhi dang rgyas dang dgug pa dang // drag yul spyod pa'i gnas dag tu// kun rdzob las kyi phur pa yang // blangs dang mnyam pa de bzhin du// rang
306b7(rnying rgyud): dbyibu ldan mdun du dgod// sngags pa'i rdzas kyang rab tu bsgyur// rdo rje chang chen dbu'am 'khor// rdo rje las byed grangs dang mnyam// rngon bshad tshul dang rab ldan pas// srid pa'i phu bu bsgrub pa'i phyir// de la dbang dang dngos srung drang // ye shes zlo ba der gshegs/
307a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ nas// rtags dang margyan mnyan par byud // dal dngas gagazhan pa yis// bsgrub pa'i lha rnams dang sngags la// kA la k+ShI la yas nabs ba d+hA paT/ tsas sngags sngon du bstan par bya// gsar ba pa thag gzang ba dang // rab
307a2(rnying rgyud): me klad la bskor ba dang // lcags kyi tsha tshe gdab la sogs// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i rnam pa 'phro// ye nas lha rnams sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum du ni rab tu bkod// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // b+ha da tsa r+ya su kha dang // brgya byid byang chub chal
307a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus don gsal byed par 'gyur// bsgrub pa cher spyod de yi gnas// phrin las bzhi gang gsang sngags bzung // rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags// dmigs pa dag dang dgos ched kyis// las kyi rim pa der spyad de// phyogs brgyang gru gsum sum brtseg
307a4(rnying rgyud): kha khyer mi bzad phur bus bskor// drag po'i rdzas rnams kun kyang bsham// bum pa'am yang na brje'i snod// lcang lor bcas pa skam ma ma rnon// grangs dang mnyam pa dbus su dgod// gzhan yang ji ltar bshad pa yi// rdzas mchog dam pa sna tshogs dgod//
307a5(rnying rgyud): kachen dgra rnams kyis// so so'i 'khor gyi khang bu rnams// rdo rje phur bu'i 'od kyis mdzes// chog sna tshogs brtan par bya// de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// nang dug zhug cing drang bar bya// sngon bshad de bzhin tshogs bsags nas// rim pa bzhin du yang dag
307a6(rnying rgyud): ldan// be sgrub pa de yi ting 'dzin ni// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas su// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bsam zhing gnas pa de gsal bya// bcud kyi sems can thog ma nas// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor de// rang la sngags pa'i phyag
307a7(rnying rgyud): mtshon dang // lhag par phur par 'dzin par bsam// gdong nas gnas pa de shes bya// de dag rab tu bstims byas nas// dkyil 'khor gtso bo 'khor dang bcas// spyi dang bya brag sngags rnams kyis// phur bu'i ming gis spel te bsgrubs// rang lha byung
307b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags byung nas// thams cad spyi dril bsgrub par bya// las grub nus par gyur pa dang // so so'i dmigs pa mdun du bya// las kyi phur pa mnga' gsol te// bye brag dgu yi ting 'dzin gyis// phur bu bskor ba zhes bya ste// cha mchog gtso bas snying la gdag/
307b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra hi rus mgrin pa ste// gshin rje gshed kyis klad pa la// rta mgri nA dbang gis gsang ba ste// rdo rje gzhon nus 'dus pa'i gnas// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos lag g.yon te// dregs 'dul gyis ni rkang g.yas la// stobs ldan nag po lag pa g.yang // sems
307b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' rkang g.yon la'o// 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du// rang gis phyogs bcur bskor te gdab// las rgyud rtsad nas bcad pa dang // gsang sgo thibs kyis mnan pa dang // dug lnga sbyi nas gzhom pa dang // 'gro dang stobs dang dpral ba dang // srid pa'i skye rgyud ga
307b4(rnying rgyud): nga// phrin las chen po bzhi spyad phyir// so so'i gnas su gdab par bya// rtsa bar snying rtsa 'dab ma bzhi// kha dog so sor bstan pa las// yan lag rnam pa brgyad du gsal// g.yos 'dab chos nyid rtsa gsum ste// ser po zla kham stong pa'i dbyibs// g.yo
307b5(rnying rgyud): b.rang rgyud rtsa gsum ste// dmar nag sbrul bzhin 'khyil ba'o// 'og 'dab yon tan gcig tu gnas// smyug nag rgyu ma bzhin du'o// steng du ye shes gcig gnas pa// mthing ga 'khor lo lta bu ste// kun gzhi rnam rtog nyon mongs yid// yid dang ho/
307b6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i rnam shes gnyis// brgyad kyi dbus gnas dang ma ni// mdog dkar rta rnga bzhin du bsgril// tshe yi dang ma brgya 'dra// khrag gi dang ma mtshal byi mgo// drod kyi dang ma me long gi// nga dang zil pa lta bu ste// rnam shes dang ma 'od kyi dkyil// rang lhar
307b7(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i phyag mtshan te// ri rab phur pa rdo rjes brgyan// hUM phaT ldan pa'i phur gsum la// rdo tshan chu 'dus bzhin du bsam// sgrub pa po yi thugs kar thim// zhi khro'i lha rnams sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rbod gtong ngo // mchod
308a1(rnying rgyud): bstod drag shul rig pa 'dzin// so sor dus la bab ces brjod// pho nya bskul zhing zad gsang bya// lcags dang ser ldeng bya phung dang // skyer pa tsan dan mchog phud kyis// gti mug bsal zhing 'dod chags bsam/
308a2(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang gsad cing phrag dog gdul// dmyal bsnyil zhing smad pa ste// thal 'byin dgongs pa byang chub sems// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// bdag gzhan ma lus bskal bar bya// 'di yis gal te rtags med na// sngar bzhin bsnyen bslab rdzogs
308a3(rnying rgyud): par bya// de nas rtags dang ldan pa dang // sngar bzhin las la sbyar bar bya// bsgrubs pa de nyid byin gyis rlabs// nad dang gdon dang bar chad phyogs// rang bzhin ma lus zhi bar byed// tshe dang dbang thang longs spyod tshogs// rab tu 'phel zhing rgyas par byed
308a4(rnying rgyud): log lta dgra bgegs mi mthun phyogs// ma lus dbang du sdud par byed// drag shul can dang gdug pa'i sems// sgrol zhing mngon du spyod la sogs// thams cad 'grub pa 'bras bu ste// byin rlabs phur pa'i sgrub pa'o// de nas tshe yi lung sgrub pa// phun sum
308a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang // rtags 'i shing / sa kyi 'a sa// dbu ma pa ma/ // gadzadan can zu brgya // rabat+yA d+hA da pa brgyad // byang la mam da do// mjams par na
308a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad de// dbus rnams zla gam kha sbyor te// mtshan bzang kun rdzogs bum pa ni// phyi nang blta ba rdzogs mthun spyad// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta A yudz+nyA na b+h+rUM/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams bris pa ni// so so'i rigs kyi mdog dang bstan// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su'o// byang
308a7(rnying rgyud): chub sems dang rdzu 'phrul che// rtags dang ldan pa'i 'brang rgyas te// gtso bo rnams kyi zangs ldan pa// 'bru bcud zhal zas tshogs las bsham// rin po che yi rgyan rtags kyis// legs par brgyan pa bdud rtsi yi// btsung dang bcas pa der stsal nas// dar 'phan za
308b1(rnying rgyud): ratshogs kyis brgyan// nas 'bras 'bru yis brgyan par byas// 'bru lngas byin brlab gzung thag gdags// rigs chen lnga yi gtso bo yis// so so'i phyag tu bzhes nas ni// che mchog he ru ka nas ni// badz+ra he ru rdo rje mchog/ rat+na he ru gshin rje gshed// pad+ma he ru
308b2(rnying rgyud): mgrin dpal// karma he ru gzhon nu mchog/ rang gi rigs kyi gsang sngags la// badz+ra A yu She dz+nyA na hU~M dzaH/ zhes btags bsnyen pa 'dzub tu bya// de nas mtshams bzhi gtso dang sngags// de bzhin du ni bya ba yin// rigs kyi thugs gsang rin po che// rna She ma
308b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus// oM hUM trAM hrIHhUM rnams ni// zla ba la ni 'od bcas gnas// 'khor 'das kun gyi byang chub sems// 'chi med tshe yi rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med rdo rje'i lam nas byung // shangs kyi rlung sbom steng nas bteg/ lhun gyis grub pa'i
308b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// kun tu bzang po tshe dpag med// he ru ka yi sku gsung thugs// dus gsum rgyal ba yab dang yum// sras dang 'khor bcas rdo rje'i tshe// rin chen srog las nyi zla'i 'od// 'phro 'du phreng bar ba gsal ba'i// snying po gsang ba'i bsnyen par hra/
308b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par bdag nyid gsang ba yi// dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs ka nas// dkyil 'khor zla kham ga'u'i nang // tshon gang ye shes sems dpa' de// so so'i rigs bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas// ya ba yum rnams kyi thugs kar 'phros// phan tshun 'gro ba'i 'khor lo
308b6(rnying rgyud): yis// 'og min gnas nas ye shes klong // rang bzhin 'od gsal thugs kyi dkyil// byang chub sems kyi 'chi med tshe// gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'du bya// phyogs bcu dus gsum 'jig rten khams// snod bcud tshe brtan dkyil 'khor yin// 'gyur med skad cig
308b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'bral ba// lha rnams kun la bstod cing bskul// tshe dbang dngos grub byol ces brjod// slar yang bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin spro// rtags dang yon tan yongs rdzogs nas// 'od phung sgrub pa'i rdzas la bstim// de ni tshe sgrub bsnyen pa'o// de nas sgrub pa chen po ni//
309a1(rnying rgyud): rab rdog ltar gsal lhas rgyas+ya// ye shes sems dpa' brog gi 'o// rigs kyi lha mo gzugs kyitshe// 'dod yon lnga ldan langs spya // srid par gnas pa yun ma cha// bsam pa ma phrag dpal gyi lha// bkad pa zas dang
309a2(rnying rgyud): bcud kyi lha// bzlas pa rgyun chags ngag gi lha// hUM las rdo rje srog dang ldan// a las 'gyur med tshe dang ldan// baM las rdo rje lu gu rgyud// 'di ni 'ching ba'i las yin no// rdo rje bsdam pa'i phyag rgya las// mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bya// bsam gyis mi khyab
309a3(rnying rgyud): spos te dgug/ rlung / gnyis nas hUM bskyil bas// khyad par bye 'gro mang po'i che// byang chub sems kyis dbang bsgyur dag/ skar meda' bzhin du blangs nas bstan// skye 'gro srog gis bsdus pa las// bstims te dbang bskur don byas pas// rab tu spel ba'i ting 'dzin ni// klad bye
309a4(rnying rgyud): yum gyur phyag rgya yis// ma lus mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma// thugs kar sku mchog tshon gang las// gzi mad dra bstar bar A yuHbstim// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags 'di dag/ so sor 'bum du bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra A yu She dzaHA yur+d+ha na tshe b+h+rUM// 'di ni sku yi snying po
309a5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ma mr-i ta ma hA b+hA dra tse hU~M// 'di ni gsung gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra A yu She ma hA pu N+ye bu gyes pa ri mi ta dz+nyAn NAM// zhes pa thugs kyi snying po'o// skra yi tshe ni lus la ste// phung po lnga la rab tu thim// gsung gi tshe ni ngag la ste// dri med dbyings las rab tu thim// thugs kyi tshe ni yid la ste// byang chub
309a6(rnying rgyud): mchog gi sems la thim// rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po las// a d+hi Shi lam zhes pas// kun tu bstim par bya ba'o// skal ldan bsnyen pa mchog gi lung // bdud rtsi 'chi med sman gyi tshe// dbang mchog dam pa rigs kyi tshe// byin rlabs phur basbal pa'i tshe// zla ba ma rdo rje dbang gi tshe//
309a7(rnying rgyud): bslabs pa'i 'bras bu blan med// rin chen srog gi gzhal yas khang // le banan gsung gi dkyil 'khor // kun tu bzang pos rgyas btab nas// he rug yi rtsal bskyed de// gshin rjegashed kyis bsrubar bya// rta mgrin dbang gis bsrung ba ste// rdo rje gzhon nus dbab par bya//
309b1(rnying rgyud): dgas rnas pas bcing byadang // chags pa 'dral bas bskrad pa te// stobs kyis na nga cad drug/ rnams kyis bam pan// mamang rigs kyi napas yang// mthum 'a'ar ba mamatshal 'phrul// phyag ma can ma la tham pa sams//
309b2(rnying rgyud): dam 'i sa// ded nga te'i byibs kyis byung // byin du sang ba'i nga ba rnams/ ma this brlab byung b.ris// dus pa'i sanyam pa'i dus dras dugag/ dran kyis stsal pa'odangom// 'ams gsus par 'dus bya ba 'ibartags// byan pa
309b3(rnying rgyud): lenam// lha bar tshogs kyi dngas srabag tu// lags par gsol ba gang badrud sa/ slabapa pa la bsnyes pa yis// khye da pa don gas pabyed// dag pa dzid par dru ba bar 'byung // rkye gyi rlob pa smrab bas// dus gsum sangs kyis su
309b4(rnying rgyud): ba gshegs pa lung cu byud// dal byo gsum gyis bar smras pa// thog sa ma das tham med// chun ma chad drangs pazhidang do// ba med rnams na 'gapa // 'jig 'ang gachags pas pa na// 'jig bdag med phyogs 'ag cam// 'jig da nga
309b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// khacig kun rdzo ba de ni dam blta// 'acig bdag gzhan bzang ngan 'byang// kha cig thabs kyi ches spyod// kha cig dus 'ga' shes rib ston// 'di na thadang ma yin te// thams cad gcig las byung ba ste// gcig tu ma lus 'dus pa'o// ma'ongs /
309b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di nyid// shi tu rnyed dkar gyur nas ni// sbal bar ldan pa 'ga' zhi pas// sbrul med dag gis rtsod par byed// de nyid dus su 'di rnyed pas// rang byud tsam du mi basbyin te// d+ha ba yan lag bshad pa dang // lung bshang srub zabs mtha' dag gis// rngon
309b7(rnying rgyud): bdang ngos par gtan la dbab// de ltar sdong ldan rigs kyi sreg// dang brtson ldan pa rim bzhin brtan// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dung 'a gyur rab tu 'byed pa yang smra bya ba chen po bstan pa'i 'i gsungana'i
310a1(rnying rgyud): de nas rab tu phan gdags pa'i// las mchog rab tu bshad pa ni// rig dang ldan pa sngar bshad bzhin// rten 'brel rnam pa lnga yin te// rdzas su bsgrub dang thal chen dang // gnas sbyang ba dang bsgral ba dang // gshed chen bgags nA/
310a2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba ste// dang po srid pa'i bamachen yin// ston pa 'khor dang gnas dang dus// yo byad ji ltar ngas bshad bzhin// tshul dang mthun pa'i las kyis spang // snang zhing srid pa dur khrod klong // thugs rje chen pos rig cing gzigs// 'khor ba'i skyabs gling chen po
310a3(rnying rgyud): las// rigs drug 'khor ba ma lus 'dul// rgyud drug 'dus pa'i rnam shes bsreg/ dug gsum mtshon gyis bsad pa ni// rtag chad mthar shi'i do gling nas// gti mug chen po'i rgyu blang ste// byang chub sems su gsal ba'i phyir// rgyu mchog chen po btsal bar bya//
310a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes spyan dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// rdo rje'i 'gros dang 'byon tshul te// dang po rigs brgyud mtshan dang ldan// skye ba bdun pa brtag par bya// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang // srid gsum zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'gros kyis btsal bar bya// yid bzhin nor
310a5(rnying rgyud): bu gter 'byed pa// dgos 'dod skong ba phyag rgya'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// ma mo'i 'byon tshul stabs kyis btsal// phung po gshed dang dpral ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa// stobs chen khro bo'i skur bsams te// gsang snga
310a6(rnying rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// gson dang gshin gyi bdud dang bgegs// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa de// phur bus btub te ro sh+man gril// khung bur mnan nas rogazir la// de nas rdo rje'i gur gyis blang // rdo rje'i 'gros kyis khur nas ni// gnas su 'ongs te phyi
310a7(rnying rgyud): mtshams bcad// de nas dam sriganan par bya// sgo nas phyi rol 'a'odo ma gang du// mkha' 'gro'i khung bu brus nas ni// dur khrod gnas kyi thod pa la// nang du dam sri'i snying po bri// ngur khrod rkang gi phur bus gdab// nang du stegs bu tshul bzhin brtsig/ sgrub rdzas
310b1(rnying rgyud): jan tud rdugs par na// da la ga sas rnas pa // dang ma thab ga shi da su dang // sna sgrub pa dus// dang ba nga sa thab // thab ba // maud kunan bas cos phyugapas// da par bsgrub pa ma na man chan/
310b2(rnying rgyud): nga zlabs 'thab// tshe 'das nyid dgazigs pa ni// dbyang ngag rgyud napa 'thams pade// rdzun sa nan pa sa gzang rdzo // nyid la rnam shes dgrag// gang dag 'di la gzhan shin dang // 'a ga zhan la brten pa rnams// tas/ d+ha
310b3(rnying rgyud): skyes// mas cad byed cing 'jug par 'gyur// 'gro drug kyang lnga'i sgrib pa snang // bag chags spya phyir tho bzhis gsul// shar du shos so/ gnas kyi sgo// d+hI che sbyang du bzhug cing brdung // lho ga na rjes khyod pa// khrag 'byung badz+ra /
310b4(rnying rgyud): tun do nas 'o// badz+ra pa'i steng du'o// byang tu ma la sbed// gdum gyu rtags kyi thubardung nga// de gro bzhis sbyangs thasas// rang gi yongs spyod pa thog te// slob pa di ba bsgru ba'i// ngagacigs sgrib pa 'i bya ba'i bye
310b5(rnying rgyud): ma bdud rtsem 'gyis pakra// bcas pa rtsegadung shes pa yis// sems bgyid yin da la ma drung // gsol ba gang ba ste pa la 'bor gas/ mig tu nga bstan par bya// phyag btsal po dang bum ma chog paskye// khyed kyis rnabs te rjod
310b6(rnying rgyud): snan pa// na nga ma dang rig pa da// skug sung thugs dang / dang // phrin las su byed kyis dpa'i// de ngas kyu yi ba ga/ dkyil ba da ngas pa / bral bang sa kyang / gas na sa/
310b7(rnying rgyud): sa kyi rnam grangs gtams nas kyang // rigs kyi su pas rnam par bkod// gzhas las yang byen kyis pazlag// dran pa'i bdaka pa mnas kyang // rang gi gnas cin 'a dgod // mthun rjes kyis meng rigs pa// rdo rgyal pongs pa 'ad dang //
311a1(rnying rgyud): 'don dang sgrol ging rdo rje bya// stobs pa dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // ji ltar rigs pa mnga' gsal nas// spyan smras dpal gyi chas rnams gsol// rtags rgyan gad ba cing rdzas gzhan dgram// dngos grung rtse'adod dmang byang bstsal//
311a2(rnying rgyud): tshe mchog rol pa'i gcor bskyed cing // rigs chenab rgyad kyi dkyil 'khong btim// thig chen gdang nas bskos la gdab// co ga'i yan lag rdzogs zhing // 'ja ba bzlas do rdo'i bsnyen pazla// hrIn thebs rtags gsum byung ban// dngos thub blang zhing dbang na
311a3(rnying rgyud): bskur// ru dra'i ngo bor gzigs pa la// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// skod rdzas ji snyed pa dang bcas// phung po tshogs su phul nas ni// bam chen sbom pos bskang ba dang // phung po rdul du bshigs nas kyang // sha khrag rus pas bskang bya yang // byang shar
311a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams su bsgral bya ste// ru dra bsgral ba'i zhing yin pas// pho nya dgug 'dren btang nas kyang // dgra bgegs rnam shes dgug cing bstim// lha dang dpral phyir rdzas kyis bdug/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i dmod pas zab// srid gsum lha 'dre'i dmag dpung
311a5(rnying rgyud): dbab// lus la rigs drug yi ge dgod// ngan song dgag pa'i snying po bzlas// sbyong ba lnga dang grub pa lnga// skong ba lnga yi dgongs pa bya// byang chub las la bgrod pa'i phyir// ba su ta ni byin gyis brlab// rdo rje thig gi bcu tshal gdab// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skos kyis
311a6(rnying rgyud): gdab// phung po gnas lnga bkru ba'i phyir// mtshon cha lnga yi char yang dbab// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod gnas brgyad rdzogs pa'i phyir// ro yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// dbang ldan gnas pa'i phyogs su bsgral// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon chen
311a7(rnying rgyud): gyis// dngos grub log rtog phral nas kyang // rdo rje sbyor phyogs ma nor bar// shel phur gnyis kyis rtsad nas bzung // nges par brtag pa'i gzhi ma la// cung zhig stong de steng 'og bsgyur// bzhin phyogs gar blta legs nyes brtag/ de nas rdzas su blta/
311b1(rnying rgyud): na'o// lha dang bdud rtsi mchod rdzas drang // dngos grubargya dang sbyin sreg rdzas// de la b+ha ru bstsu ba ni// nan steng sdong dang dbang po dang // sha khrag rus pa pags pa sra// yan lag nyid lag pyod tshul dang // rgal tshogs ni ba mar khrag so dang // gnas na NA /
311b2(rnying rgyud): byung chub sems// gnas dgu 'byin pa'i lam gsung de// zang dgu yi lha rnams sna // gnyis med pa pa rjes subasgo// brdud ni bslab pa'i rjes sraH// rtsu ba yan lag brgyad yin te// mngon pa'i phyi dang gnas pa dang // bzhi pacu'i yan lag ra bar ba'o// dam
311b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnon myong mchong ba'i rdzas// bza' dang btung dang srung dang ldag// sdom dang gzung dang bdug par bya// dngos grub rngus kyang de nyid do// rdung khrod mun du bya ba ni// bad+hA glaing thul rjog phung dang // bA re rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs// srang me bzhag pa sog /
311b4(rnying rgyud): gling ba chen por bya ba'o// sbyin sreg hom du bya ba ni// de nyid bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// thig bzhi gdab pa'i mang tshe dgu// 'khor lo rtsi thu brgyad lte ba la// phrin la sa chen po bzhi dag gi/ kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma dag // skye dang bye brag bsngags par bya/
311b5(rnying rgyud): spyir yang mtshams bcad rim pa lngas// bar du gcod pa'i bdud rnams bzlog/ sdod bzang mtshan gsol brjod cid dgram// rdzas rnams mo sor bsngos nas cang // phyags gzhug pa'i gnas rnams su// mnong mo sor dgo pa zla// dpal dang ldan
311b6(rnying rgyud): sno dgra la// rmad du byung ba dgu dgod de// 'bar ba chen po gnas rnams su// brjod pa'i tshul gyis byas la bar bsgos// phyag rtswa gzhan yang legs par bkod// b+haH ste la sogs pa kun// hA tsug nas ris bzhin du// so sa'i gnas su dgon
311b7(rnying rgyud): smye drang bzhin pa nyid dzuH// mthus mchod pas mnyes pa dang // bsreg pa'i ngas kyi mchod bya zhing // ye shes ska dang me nga// skang ya byung ba cig dang // chang par 'gyur ba bzhin du// rab gas par byaba'o// skyed pan
312a1(rnying rgyud): dag par bya// phrin las rnam bzhi gang rigs bshad// mkha' 'gro mchod dang gzing mnan dang // mi zad gter du sra la sogs// las kyi rgyal pos rim bzhin spyad// 'di ni dmachog chen po ste// rdzas mchog bam gyi las yin no//
312a2(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bya// de las gzhan pa bsreg pa'i las// rnal 'byor chen po bya ba ni// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// yo byad phun sum tshogs par bya// phyogs skyong sbyin gtong lan chags gzhal// bka' bsgo mtshams gcad sngar bzhin du/
312a3(rnying rgyud): brang dgu pa bzhengs su gsol// gnas dang yo byad byin gyis brlab// mchod rdzas sna tshogs tshogs par bsham// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni bum pa bzang // rgyan rdzas mtshan nyid ldan pa dag/ lha yi grangs dang ldan pa dag/ las kyi cho ga rdzogs par dgod// de nas dmig
312a4(rnying rgyud): pa gang yin pa'i// ming gzugs mdzan mar ldan pa la// rgyan dang cha lugs mdzes par gdags// rnam par shes pa dgug byas nas// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs dgu yi// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// chos dbyings rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te//
312a5(rnying rgyud): drangs bzhugs la mos phyag btsal// mchod bshags phrin las bcol pa yis// 'od zeng drabs srid gsum gyi// nyon mongs dri ma ma lus bsal// rin chen shel sgong ltar bsams la// sdug bsngal rnams la skyo babyed de// thugs rjes rigs zug gnas ni
312a6(rnying rgyud): dgug/ chu skyes gzug ga dag bzhi la brten// an+bi su tri pre 'u zhes// dbus su rigs lnga'i snying po bri// lnga dang rigs lnga lcags kyu la// phyi rol 'dab ma bzhi po yis// mchod sbyin gyis ni lan chags gzhal// gsang sngags drag pos gshed dang dpral// bdud
312a7(rnying rgyud): dri chus pri nang babu// rigs dbang lnga yi yum la bsrur// ye shes lha dang gnyis med par// ngo bo stong pa nyid du bya// rigs drug gnas nas bton nas ni// slar yang dngos su byas nas ni// pho brad chen po'i drung du khrid// sgo bzhi dbye bar gsol ba gdab// gan
312b1(rnying rgyud): na gas/ la smrag // margos da ma // rlug na dang ldan gyur// ga sa mas sa gang thas/ thA / bste// du ga sa /
312b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khod rnams// byang kyi ny-ing dang ldog tu sten// thug na rje tshad med pa'i ldan nas// blo ba 'jigs byed phyung bstan nas// bdug pa can rnams 'dul bar 'drar// ma ma rnyir ba brjod depa ni// gdus kun byen gyis ba ba bar bya// da mang
312b3(rnying rgyud): gos byed// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhag nas ni// sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// de nas spang yang byin dbang cing // rdo rje nagrangs pa la zhugs nas// bsnyen pa sngags kyi 'gro 'dreH// rdo dzing las rdo rdzogs par spyad// mchod cing bshag
312b4(rnying rgyud): bskang shing bcos// khrig 'thung bdun bcan thal// marnye nga pral kyis ni dmigs par zug/ bkar bar ba dam padang zhing // badz+ra dang rdzogapas par zad pas la// sker yang bapra dang bskur ba dang // drang ba khams dang spyir blangs te// rjod pa ma
312b5(rnying rgyud): la tshogs kyis// gra 'din la bskul bar bya// de ltar ldang ma bdun la lags// zla ba rgyad dmatho rags kyis// las dang na mongs pag chags spyad// denas dang pag ni sbyin pazugs// zeng dgu yi sted rlung // kab zhing po brgyad kyis pa rten /
312b6(rnying rgyud): d+yani las kyi ma/ khang du// bzhi'am brtad kyim mar snang // gab+hang ba la yum gang lag+sa// ma ning ldan dang \u0f89\u0fa4 ba thag byung ma// nang gdan rnam rtag N+DI ba dang // tshang bang mings spyod rnas pa dang // log sam mtha dbang bsnga dung // dbugs
312b7(rnying rgyud): thos ba/ la 'dod rnams// gang la bsngags pa dang spyod // zlum pa zlaba'i zla'as ma// rdodzin chen pa rdza dang // ngam bri dka sang dam dang nag/ 'amatshan dang bras cu sbyin// 'dog dmang dang ma macad// bras rgyal po phred 'amaung // Sh+T+r-i
313a1(rnying rgyud): na / na ma dang // ga dang/ sats+tsha// gas gyu// sa pa / dus da//
313a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bapor dang // ska yang ma chog ga/ dkyi pa bad kyi'i lda gyu / sa pa ma sa // nga bas byung // bskyed dang gas de rdzogs pan// sa song thugs sa na nga/ #
313a3(rnying rgyud): rlos gsum ma mthong shing // bsdu ba rnam byung la mthungs pa// thamal pa dang mas pacam// rdul bung // dpas brtog par ga ste// srid pa ma sa par shub ste// sgra nga ga ti med pa bstan gshegs// khyod sa
313a4(rnying rgyud): de// bsto mnar ta ma da // ji ny-id mdzus yum shing gis// gnyis med la shes mye da te// mang ga rnam tig sregs shing spangs// da byung tu rkyen thal nga phyir // batho namasachogs la sus myob bas// gdong nas snying po byang chub ba'i// martog ting /
313a5(rnying rgyud): bzlon// gal tede ltar min pan// sku gdung bgos te na tshar gad ba// sbyar ba shang tshugs rdzogs chen bsag/ bzlog pa'i brten pa de dag ni// rang bzhin ldan gyis thub pa ste// b+ha med dbu ma'i snying po gnas// ma thus mnyes par bye ba bstan// bsreg dang byang
313a6(rnying rgyud): babazhi lalas// ban pa'i yan lagags kyi mchag// de nyid gnyis pa'i sbyong bar// thogs nyid nasasems can khams// rnam dag dbying pa las ma g.yas pa // bdug 'dzin la bas 'khor ba nga thams// de brgyal brnams kyis dgongs// kun pa nga nyid
313a7(rnying rgyud): ti sha// mang dathung sprul pa mdzad pa mas// ye shes pas ma mi rdzam mas// byang chu chen po'i lam 'ad bstan// deSh+Ta bshad pa'i gnas chen du// dran su tshogs pa'i yon tan bsas// sngon du 'grub rdzogs thus te// dkyil 'bang dathub tshul bzu rgya
313b1(rnying rgyud): tshurgyun du tu kun na na tu chu rgya rgyu
313b2(rnying rgyud): ma na
313b3(rnying rgyud): na
313b4(rnying rgyud): sun
314a1(rnying rgyud): mcha ci byung // gtang dag gtang zhings tu smras// maldan grangs rgya ba rnams thal// sa pagrangag pa ga kyil gabad pas// rdzas kyi grus bu rtsub pa// gas sa na supa dang //
314a2(rnying rgyud): bsrel tshul du bsdu// nor bu rgyal mtshan rtsal mtshad// tsha rba mra bzhengs 'gro don bskul// gshin nyid 'gro jug sems can dang // ngos pa drag dang slob ma dang // lha deng dkyil 'khor yam shing dang // 'phreg rdzas nyid dang brjid rtsi lnga/ skyong ba nyid da
314a3(rnying rgyud): shes// kun gzhi'i rnam shes bcud phung nas// gdos bcas phung po'i snyig ma can// dkar nag las kyi lhang 'dzin cing // dge dang mi dge dran byas pa// byang 'gyur ting nge 'dzin gyis su// bkra stong spro dang byin gyis brlab// lam bsnun nyid kyi rgyachung
314a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po nyid kyi las// gnas spyir mchod pa smon lam nis// blams sgribs spyong blams bya'o// bshags sbyang bskad bya sor gzhug pa// slob ma nyid kyis bya ba de// las kyi khyad par 'di dag nyid// cholas 'das pa shin tu gyur// de yi don du haM ru ba// 9
314a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rab tu sbyong ba'o// bla med rnal 'byor theg pa la// rab zhugs phrin las stsol ba ni// shes rab ting 'dzin thabs ldan pas// sgra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'grub// ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang // shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang // thabs mkhas
314a6(rnying rgyud): pa yis// rtags dang drod tshad ngos bzung shes// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po des// zhi khro rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bsgom// gang la dmigs pa de drangs te// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis de mnyes bya// thugs rje chen pos de nyid bskul// de nyid kho bo'i ting 'dzin bsgom
314a7(rnying rgyud): phrin las rtse gcig mdzad par 'gyur// shes rab phyag rgya ba cings te bskul// hUM mig yo phyag rgya chen po'i der// chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa ni// phyag rgya chen po gnyis med pas// dmachog chen po'i dus la bab// oM ka re ka rer tsas ma ya karmas pa
314b1(rnying rgyud): hA/ thabs kyi rgyal pos 'di skad su// dzumatha'am 'dzin ma 'gog pa'i// mnyam nyid rdul 'byar thod nulang// kau theg tum rnams mdangs dang ldan// sna tshogs byang chub sems meg ma// As matsal d+han d+hA tA sa thA ba ma jug tu/ zheb tung nga 'dzan las ban/
314b2(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa sta zur bstan// phyogs mtshams zla 'og kun bltas nas// skye shi mtshan nyid 'jig rten gsum// thar pa'i rgyu ni ci yang med// ngan 'gro gsum gyi gting brgyud la// snying rje bskyed nas 'di skad brjod// byams pa tshad med khrog tu ma sdang /
314b3(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i bsod nams mthar phyir pa// bskal pa'i mtshan nyin dga' ba'i mchog/ btang snyoms yal bar mi 'dong ngo // oM ma hA karba NI ka ma thA me bri// swa b+hA byA At+ma ko&haM/ de nas lhan cig skyes bgegs la// lan chags dpral ba'i gtor ma gtong // /
314b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mtshams kyis gcad// thabs dang shes rab// nyis ka yis// 'gro ba bsgral pa'i phyogs su blta// dur khrod bdag pos bsdig pa'i phyir// oM sarba pA paM karmarmA he ta pa sa ta sha ma ma tra ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA paM kar te hi bi to te kha T+wAM ga ru da hU~M pa
314b5(rnying rgyud): oM sarba kar te ha pa si ta ma hA a ka ra sha ru d+ya hUM phaT/ lho phyogs su ni lan res mchod// ba ya ke shwa tsit+tahUM phaT/ pradz+nyA kaM shwa tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ldang zhing gsod pas lan gsum brjod// sta zur g.yas g.yon re re zhing // gzigs 'brums tshul du blta
314b6(rnying rgyud): oM pradz+nyA u pA la hUM kro d+hA e shwa ho// gar gyis gom gsum slar bor nas// yul rnams kun la rab gzigs nas// yi ge dag gi tshigs su snang // rab bskyil gar gyis srid pa kun// bdud rtsi'i mdog gzigs mchod cing bstab// kha kha mi ka ta yas a la la
