314b7(rnying rgyud): oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta yo gi ni kha raM khA hi// rdo rje zhal du bsgrub pa ni// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// bsgral ba kho na'i las su rung // bsgrub po dpal chen zhal du bstab// khro mo sbrul dang bcas la sogs// yul rnams 'dul ba'i skal du bzhes/
315a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i zhing du sbyor// ging chan rdo rje'i phyag tu dbul// ye shes rgya mtshor bzhes su gsol// de nas khro bo'i sngags kun dang // lha mo kuN+Da lI'i sngags kyis// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bsal nas// dkyil 'khor du drang 'di
315a2(rnying rgyud): dadu// thar pa'i las byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// dga' zhing spro bas 'ong ba ltar// skal par ldan pa'i sems can khyod// shin tu bde zhing legs par 'ongs// bde gshegs thugs rje thabs la mkhas// blo ngan sems can snying rje'i yul// gnyis med
315a3(rnying rgyud): sa kyis bsgral bar bya// thabs dang shes rab tshogs pa kun// gnas par gyur nas las kyi rje// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa rnams// spyan 'dren tshur byon gshegs su gsol// ha ha ki li ki li zhes// bzhad pa'i gdams
315a4(rnying rgyud): sum khengs// bde mchog bde gos dkar klong du// slob ma'i tshul cig gnang bar mdzod// 'dod pas rol cig dgongs shig khA hi// sbyin no bsgral lo gsol cig rol// ngo mtshar mchod ta tu bstab po zhes// gla sogs dmar chen snying po lnga//
315a5(rnying rgyud): mogazer 'phel gsol// rak+ta me tsa rgyud chen gsol// zhi ba'i sgrub pa bgrub 'tshal gyis// dri med gzi ldan mchod pa 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams kyis bzhes// thabs dang shes rab tshogs kun gyis// rgyu dang yul las dmigs tshul blta// g.yon pa'i sngags
315a6(rnying rgyud): bder gtad de// ye shes mkha' lding gter chen gyis// 'khor ba'i bye'u zug blang ba ni// bu phug ma yis zas ster bzhin// 'dus pa'i tshogs kun rab tu dgyes// ha b+ha ha pra mo tri sarba du prA sha/ stegs bur bzhag ste 'di skad brjod// mi rtog ye shes dkyil
315a7(rnying rgyud): 'khod de// zag med sems kyi ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan rnam pa lta bu ste// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// thabs kyi rdo rje rnam grangs ni// chos kyi dbyings las chos nyid gnas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// su dag
315a8(rnying rgyud): mchog de spyod su ba rlo // yang /
315b1(rnying rgyud): phyin pa phyir ma ldag/ a tan tsata ma k+Sha ga Na ma t+pal pra da shu Sh+Ta/ wa ta zla za chags kun bsgral/ lam chud dgag pa'i snang po lnga// 'brug sum bcas pa'i nus pa bsam// de las me dpung smras pa yis// chu dang phyogs bcu'i sems
315b2(rnying rgyud): can gyi// rtog pa ma lus bsreg par bsgom// so so'i phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// rgyud lnga drag po'i sngag kyis gzhom// sbrul pa sems can chu las bsdu// bar gcod pho nya spos dgug ste// sgra lus khro bcu'i snying po dang // stadra stabs mtshon cha sngags dang
315b3(rnying rgyud): bcas// rtse gcig ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yis// sangs rgyas yin te ye shes sku// ye shes rnod pal mtshon cha yis// log rtog 'khor ba rgyun gcad do// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' ring las// thugs rje chen po'i rol pa yis//
315b4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum gcig car bsgral pa'i phyir// dug gsum rtsad nas gcad par bya// mnyam nyid don la khyad 'byin dang // dam tshig 'khu byed can nyid brlag/ log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyan gcod pa// gshin rje'i gsal shing mi bzad pa// gdug par gyur pa rnam
315b5(rnying rgyud): par 'joms// gshog pa'i ral gri karta ri// gdug pa'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa// khong nas khros pa'i phung po 'joms// rno ga dug drag po rtse dgu la// tshe dang phung po bcas pa 'joms// b+hi da ra tsa hUM/ i hA na ra tsa hUM/ ki ma la tsa kra pa tsa hU~M/ d+ha da tsam ma
315b6(rnying rgyud): dAkroHhUM/ badz+ra ni kun par tsa kro hU~M/ sti ra ra ka ma ra na tAM/ badz+ra ga na tsat+taSh+kaM/ kro d+ha ra tsA ma ta he ru ka maN+Da lo tsats+yai/ gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di// gshed byed thams cad dbang bar byin// gsang sngags kyis ni sbyin brlabs te// rig sngags kyis ni rdzogs
315b7(rnying rgyud): byas nas// 'di la longs spyod rtag tu sbyar// 'chab pa'i phyogs nas ci bde bar// khyod kyis 'di la longs spyod cig/ bdag gis bcol pa'i las rnams kun// ma lus 'grub par byin gyis rlobs// ngan 'gro skyong byed rab brtags te// ka tang ral bri gtad nas
316a1(rnying rgyud): kyang // rdo rjem nya gang kar// gtang ldan pa 'di longs la// mar+g+haSh+Ti k+ta gnas spyod do// 'jam dpal rnon po'i shing du bskyod// 'gang pa'i rtsa brdung nas byung // tsat+ta d+hAd+ha'i nang du gsul// shes rab yum gyis 'bang bzhan
316a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ zhe brgyan gyis grub par sbyor// bu khyod rgyal ba'i zas yin te// nga ni shes rab pha rol phyin// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum yin pas// mkha' dbyings bde ba'i gnangs chog na// rgyal sras bde ba'i de bzhin gshegs/
316a3(rnying rgyud): ma ti pu du sha ma to// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dbyings su dgug/ rigs lnga thabs kyis byin brlabs nas// lhar skyes 'og tu bskyod byed bsam// 'chib med pa'i srog gdon pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rlung lta bu// gang dag bsgral nas rdo rje'i tshe// de nyid rdza
316a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa ni// rdo rje sems dpang khyod nyid b+ha byas// thabs la mkhas pas spyod papa 'angs// sred pa 'am ma rtog pa la// 'khor ba rgyan gcod myang ngan 'dus// chos kyi 'khod mi bzod pa'i gas// ma mo ched pa'i gdanas bzugs/
316a5(rnying rgyud): haM/ mnyam nyid rdo rje dbyings phyug gis// stong nyid seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas// bdud bzhi rab tu bcom pa'i rtags// 'jigs byed seng ge'i khril bzhugs// oM badz+ra sid+ha hUM/ mya ngan mi 'ad 'a thugs rje'i dang // nyon mongs ma srungs gos pa med// bag chags
316a6(rnying rgyud): na med pas na// nga d+ha'i gdon la 'khrugs par gyis// oM bad / zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas te// 'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug gyir// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags// kye ma zla ba'i gdon la bzhugs// oM d+haH ng+ge/ dag
316a7(rnying rgyud): rnams la// rtag par rten par mi byeste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i glang lugs nas// de la'ang thogs pa med par mdzod// kun gyis 'og min gnas su thar// k+Shat+tha'i sgra yis bskul b.ris// dbyings su zin nas phyag kya 'ad/ stod bang 'tho ba dang /
316b1(rnying rgyud): da// nan por sna ma da / kAng+gA rnam pa rgyal ba rnam/ na da kyi ma thos pacad// in du 'an lda da// don pa gnas rnams ga sa// sa gnas sa d+ha sa// gas
316b2(rnying rgyud): gas 'ings na 'dul bar byed// na na rdzu 'phrul// / gzugs kyi zung 'du / spyo / byu na
316b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed bkod nas gdan mchog 'bul// ye shes lnga la ra la nas kyang // stobs dang mi 'dugs rig pa dang // dbang dang rngu 'phrul dang sa grub stsol// 'byung bachen po la rnams ni// rigs kyi su mtshon dpa' bal+la// gsang ma zhe
316b4(rnying rgyud): na// gnyis la nas // bya sa ma kyi rnam // yin brang mtshan gaganas// bangs dang shes rab 'a yul// rang ni skye ba kyim bar zlog/ de ga shegs pas rgyad mi
316b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i lhag ma dag/ legs bsdus sku gsums la bzhengs// thabs chen dpag tu med pa dag/ nga dang rtsal ba rnams kyis bshad// de dang de las brjod pa bzhin// mthus tshogs dgra byas te// rang bzhin snang ba chos kyi phra// gzugs skye su mre
316b6(rnying rgyud): tsho sa// 'gra 'du byed mang gyu// 'di gyur gas brgyags pa yis// bdag tu lazhi pa dang pral zhid // gzhan du dang 'phrug sa rjems// med pa 'i bde badz+ra bya// don sa bskal pa yis// las kyi byung byed pa'o//
317a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur pas// las kyi 'phan pa sna tshogs shar// khyad par skye rga na dang 'chi// dus dang dus min 'byung ba la// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshis ngan 'gum pa bco lnga srid// glo bur 'byung ba phyi nang las//
317a2(rnying rgyud): pab yan lag sna tshogs las// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yis// thugs rje tshad med bzhi las ni// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams kyis// ston pa dus las yol ba med// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum// rigs kyi thog mar 'byung ba ste//
317a3(rnying rgyud): man+ta shrI dang kArba nI// lo ke shwa ra ma d+ha ni// mA Ni badz+ra kar ti ni// sprul pa dum 'byung zhing mdzod// dus gsum 'byung ba dpag tu med// khyad par du ni mtshon cha'o// gnod pa rkyen du byung ba dang // rwa dang mche ba me dang chu// dug dang sa steng 'byung balnga/
317a4(rnying rgyud): gshis ngan yin te gdul bar bya// de yang he ru ka yaM rigs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las can des// sngon du bya ba rjes bsgrub cing // bsnyen bsgrub chen po gzhir bzhag nas// phan gdags las su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol phyogs mtshams brgyad// ha mkhu
317a5(rnying rgyud): mda' gang gru gsum brtsig/ rang rigs kha dog ldan pa la// shug pa tsher ma can la sogs// gdug pa can gyi shing brtsigs te// dug dang skye tshe nyung dkar sogs// yam shing thun gyi rdzas su bya// slob dpon cha lugs gnas pa dgu// gtso dang 'khor gyi tshul du bya//
317a6(rnying rgyud): gdul bya shes pa dgu'am drug/ bam chen bsrub pa'i dus bzhin bya// me lha'i tshogs mnyes byas nas// khyad par mtshon gri me yis gzul// lag na bdud rtsi ku sha dang // til mar lcags ram rde'u phran// khyad par gsang pa de yi rdzas// rwa dang lcags kyi
317a7(rnying rgyud): drag thig dul// me ni chu las gdul ba ste// chu nis yis gdul bar bya// dug la sngags pa'i sman gyis bdug/ sdig pa me dang mtshon gyis te// zang du lhung ba de yi gri// rgod kyi po gzil gdul bar bya// dom dang dred kyi ga yang gzhi dang // sman pa dang ni
317b1(rnying rgyud): gnas rnams dang // gzugs dang rma dang dri yis gdul// 'di dag ma lus phyi ma dus// mu thas kar yis na// he drag bzhin bsal bar byed// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi // sgrol ba'i sgra dang mtshungs par bshad// bad+mag dang grub dang mnan pa dang // gnas/
317b2(rnying rgyud): sa se pa sa gnas+ho// thab mam sa dun sa/ thams cad ltu sa pams sa byung// dang ba gas pa bsgru dus/ mi gnas nga/ la sa sa// dum nas pa ga gas
317b3(rnying rgyud): sa// dbang dang thun gyis brlab pa dang // dngos grub chog rnams kyis ni// byang chub chen por gnas 'gyur nas// gison gyis bslang pa'i lus su bya// de nas yon gyi bdag po yis// rdon 'chang ldanin gsol zhing // de la bcur dang migs bshad bya
317b4(rnying rgyud): da
317b5(rnying rgyud): gdul ba'i las// cha 'das gshin las pan pa'i las/ rnam pa lnga drangs bstan gyis// a rgyan yul gyi skye mchog gis// rdorje chos kyi gsung bzhin srubs// sheH la yi shwa kya'i rags// rAdza wi kAn yid mthong // 'gro ba brgyad nas mongs spyod rtsal// sa
317b6(rnying rgyud): bzhing brgyad pa de bzhin no// bde ba gshegs pa thams cad 'dres pa'i spyad rab tu 'byed pa smos/ las rnams nges par bstan pa'i leT ste bzhi 'o// / de nas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyid bzhin gshegs rnams dang kying chungasams
317b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnams dang / khra ba dang bla mo dang / rigs dang rigs kyi phul pa dang bcas pa rnams cid da ma dang byed/ nyid kyi sru tshogs su sprul pa mdzad de 'dind ces bka' la to// ma 'ongs des na 'byung ba ma// te rgyug mi sgrub 'o// rna 'byong gsung
318a1(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid can// blo dang dbang po bsam pa'i mchog/ rab 'bring tha ma'i rten can gyis// bde bar gshegs pa rgya mtsho che// kun 'dus tshom bu dgu yi gtso// 'khor lo bcas pa de mngon phyir// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'di rnams kyis//
318a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bshad pa'i gtso dang 'khod// rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // pho brang chen po'i bzhugs tshul dag/ mngon du 'dod pa de nyid ni// spros la dga' ba'i gang zag gis// rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du bskyab// gal te bsdus la dga' ba yis// glo dang dngang
318a3(rnying rgyud): po 'bring dag bris// rang gi gtso bo mchog rnams la// rigs kyi gtso bo bzhi rnams ni// yum dang thogs su bcas pa'am// rang rigs gcig pu'i tshul dag gis// so so'i 'khor lo la gnas pa// pho brang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis// rjes su rnal 'byor tshul du
318a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub// de nyid kyang ni cher bsdus shing // shin tu bsdus la dga' ba'am// glo dang dbang po mthar gnas pas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pho brang la// gtso bdag chen po he ru ka/ yum dang bcas pas dgu bsgom ste// rang gi mtshon byed dang ldan pas// rdzogs
318a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor bar du bsrub// rten mchog drag shul cher spyod cing // gsang ba'i don du spyod 'dod pas// bsrung dang tshogs bsag bslab pa dang // phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ ljags kyi sbyor ba yongs shes pas// shin tu myur bde bsgrub bo// gang bas
318a6(rnying rgyud): shin tu brtsod ldan pas// rgyun tu myur bar de nyid kyis// kho na yang dag yi dam du// bar chad med par bsgrub pa ni// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// smin byed lam gyis rab sbyangs nas// de nyid mthong ba'i nges pa
318a7(rnying rgyud): yis// rnam par dag pa'i mthar son nas// lha gzhan logs nas mi 'tshol te// tsit+ta gsang chen pho brang dbus// rten gzhan brgyad ni de yi 'khor// sgo brgyad phyogs mtshams pho brang ngo // sems kyi rgyal po he ru ka/ che ba'i mchog ste dbus na gnas//
318b1(rnying rgyud): sgolnga dag gi rnam shes dang // kun gzhi nyon mongs yid nam shes// rang gi rigs dang phyogs dag gis// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyig tso bo ste// snang zhing rtog pa ma lus pa// de la 'khor du bkod pa'o// snod drug la sogs de yi gnas// bza' bathung lats+tsho
318b2(rnying rgyud): mchod pa stob// mnyes pa'i spyod lam phyag btsal ba'o// dga' ba'i bstod pa de nyid de// lus kyi phyi rol sha tshil pags// gzhal med khang gi brtsig pa ste// keng dus skal tshigs ka gdung dang // thod rus rgyal mtshan ba dan bcas// ba spu me ri 'bar ba rgya
318b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil rten zas dkyil 'khor ro// rtag tu gnas par ngal snang // 'gro dang 'ong ba byon zhing gshegs// snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te// de gsal longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// bde chen thob pa chos kyi sku// nyer thob thim pa bar mdor// mngon par byang chub
318b4(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i sku// mthar thug 'od gsal zung du 'jug/ rab brtan 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku// de nyid shes na gnas pa yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor yi dam rgyan// nar mar bsgrub pa'i tshul yin no// 'di dag dang por he ru ka/ brjid pa'i dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ mdzes pa'i phyag
318b5(rnying rgyud): ni bzhi bcu gnyis// rdo rje dbyings mchog bkod par// gnyis pa'i dus srung yi sgra// dbu dgu drug ni bco brgyad de// ma mo phra men bcu drug gis// g.yas dang g.yon du rnam par mdzes// zhal gsum phyag drug bsdus pa ste// zhabs brgyad bzhi dang gnyis kyis
318b6(rnying rgyud): brnyan// sngags spyod pal ci rigs te// rgyun du bsgrub pa rnal 'byor pa'i// gro yo rim pa de bzhinan// de yang sems kyi rnal 'byor bas// phrin las bsgrub pa'i yan lag gis// bstod dang bskal pa mtshogs pa// lha rnams kun gyi phyag mtshan dang // su mdog
318b7(rnying rgyud): dang ni bzhugs tshul gyis// gdan khri dag gi gnas sgo nas// ji ltar snang bde bskul zhing // maung gi rnam grangs spos pa dang // pho brang gnas kyi mtshon pa dag/ che 'bring chung ngu rnams kyis bskul// rnam par dag pa'i don rtogs la// rgyas dang bsdu bar
319a1(rnying rgyud): brjod pa yis// chen po'i skye ba brjod pa dang // bstod pa mchog gis mnyes byas nas// nyes pa bshags shing bskang ba la// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ni// thugs kyi rdo rje sems dpas bsdus// sprul pa bram ze mi thon
319a2(rnying rgyud): gagis gang la gang gi phyir// gang bstan de dag don gyis ni// lha rnams dbang btsugs nyes bshags ltar// 'gyod tshangs brjod pa'i bshags pas bskang // bdud rtsi bcud mchog jo gad phud// gtsang sbyor chen po'i mchod pas kyang // zhi khro'i dkyil 'thor
319a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus pa// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha dang bcas// dus bzhi dang ni drug dag tu/ bskung ba yis kyang de brnyes bya// srog chags rnam shes brten ldan chu// bskal ba'i zhing bcu der dmigs nas// phung po bzhir gnas mchod pas kyang // de dag rab tu bskang bar bya//
319a4(rnying rgyud): slar yang de yi rdzas la sogs// thim par byung ba de yis ni// phung po don snying 'khrug snod// rus pa la sogs tshogs kyis bskang // phyi nang rin chen las byung ba'i// rgyu mchog rigs kyi yo byad la// ri rab gling bdun gling bzhi dang // gling rgan mu khyad rgya mtsho/
319a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod spyod lha dang tshangs par bcas// stong dang stong gnyis brla ma dang // stong gsum b+hi ni 'jig rten khams// spyi phud bye ba phrag brgya'am// mdzes pa gcig gi tshad kyis ni// ri rab chen po'i yang stengs su// mtshams bzhi dbus su rnam par rgyal// khang bzangs rnam par/
319a6(rnying rgyud): bkrab ni// rang bzhin bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// tshogs kyi bdag po he d+yaka/ che ba'i mchog gi pho brang gnas// mtshams bzhi log ni re re la'ang // rang gi rigs kyi he ru ka/ yum dang khro tshogs sgo srung bcas// de dag 'khor gyi pho brang ngo // bang rim gnyis pa'i
319a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs pa r+ya// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las bzhi// he ru ka bzhi 'khor bcas kyi// gnas yin de yi mthams su ni// rgod gtod mchod pastod drag sngags dang // rigang 'dzin pa'i he ruka/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i gnas su bya// tha ma de la lha rnams kyi/
319b1(rnying rgyud): chung ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang ging gi tshogs// ma mo sring mo pho nya dang // 'bar ma dang nis bdag mo// de dag kun gyi pho brang ste// gling bzhi 'gro ba phal ba'i gnas// de dag rang gzugs pho nya dang // longs spyod sems ldan 'dab chags dang //
319b2(rnying rgyud): ri dwags gcan gzan phyags rnams dang // sa chu bar snang gnas rnams kyang // kun gyis bskang ba'i rdzas su bya// pho mo byis pa yul 'khor dang // lus sems dag gi mthun glud dang // longs spyod lnga yi glad du 'bul// tha ma phrin las rnam pa bzhi// gang la
319b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa de sbyang bya// 'dod yon mthun pas bskur ba yin// rjes su spyad pa'i phrin las ni// bsrung dang mnan bsreg bzlog pa yi// las kyi gzer bzhi bsad thun lnga// 'gyur med kun gyi thun mong ste// 'khor lo thod pa bsreg rdzas dang // gtor
319b4(rnying rgyud): dang ni thun rdzas kyis// spyi dang bye brag so so yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las la sbyar// 'di dag gis ni don bsgrub phyir// sngags bsgrub dang bzlas pa dang // skyon yon sgra dang 'khrul dmigs dang // yan lag lnga yis kun shes bya// bza' dang bzung dang 'gro
319b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // spyod lam yan lag sbyor ba'o// dus bzhi thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor lnga// rgyan tu legs spyad lam yin no/ phyir sbyang nang gi rnal 'byor gyis// khyad par rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// rdo rje lus kyi gnas lugs lnga// gnas pa rtse dang g.yo ba rlung // bdod
319b6(rnying rgyud): pa byang chub sems dang ni// mi shigs thig le rnam lnga dag/ sprin grol lam la de bzhin ltar// de dag 'bras bu thob pa yang // bral dang spang thob mi gnas pa'i// sku gsums la goms pa la// yi dam lha dang bar gcod bdud// gsang ba'i dgra dang nga
319b7(rnying rgyud): drug la// phung po nyon mongs lnga rnams la// de nyid gzer gyis mi 'byung zhing // de yi ngang du gsal zhing brtan// ma lus pa dang ye shes kyi// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mchog// sku gsung thugs dang
320a1(rnying rgyud): thA/ dang // phran las rbod gtong mchod dang rten// rngag sngags dag 'a na grub pa pa// thabs 'di dus gsum thams cangs// chal ba rnams kyis lags bshad pa// myanga' bdag sangs rgyas gca can gyis// nal 'gyor gsum pa
320a2(rnying rgyud): chen yiH// ba bar gshegs pa thams cad 'das pa'i rgyud rabacu byed pa pas/ phrin las la zhing pa'i thabs mdo ba rdzus/ bstan pa'i la lA pan// / de nas bcom ldan ta drags// gsang mchog rnam par 'bral //
320a3(rnying rgyud): ting de 'dzin gyis dgongs mdzad de// 'di skad chog tu bka' phrul to// me mnam mkha' lta bu'i chos// mi gnas mi rtog pas ma dang thal// rna ma dag sems kyid kyil 'khong \u0f7f// tshugs med yul las 'di badza da// gzugs brnyan snying rje byang chub
320a4(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od ltar kun la gsal// de nyid kho na las gzhan pa'i// 'khor ba'i sa ni rtog pa'i yul// hU~M zhes grags pa'i byang chub sems// rgya'i sbrul chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu// gsal zhing 'bang buM 'od dang bcas// mi 'gyur rdo rje \u0f88\u0f90 ya~M hUM// ni pa
320a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin te// spyong pa mchog gi sri dbyings las byung // mtha' dang dbus med kun tukhyab// bas ma 'das blugasu ma mthing nag e// ya~M na g.yo pa'i tshe 'phral ldan// stobs chen sra ma thigs dbang gi rgyal// mi 'byur mi shigs rdo rje ldan// ljang nag pa
320a6(rnying rgyud): gdengs bskyod pa ma y-i// khon rgya yi dngos po ste// gsher dru thugs rjes kun la snyoms// mkha' mnyam byin gyis rlabs na ga yo// ma lus rjung pa'i dmar ched de// phreM/ rdo rje 'brang ba'i rang bzhin thong // mi dmigs dag pa brjid pa'i phyongs// srin tsa
320a7(rnying rgyud): sra ba'i bdag nyid kyis// bcu gsum rdzogs pa'i skrag nag suM// raM/ gsal byed sreg pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis dngos po 'joms// 'od chen cho 'phrul dregs pa'i bdag/ 'phro 'dus rig byed dam rags la raM// laM/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rin
320b1(rnying rgyud): po che// rdo rje brtsigs pa'i ri rab 'bar// mtha' dbus phyogs bcu mkha' dang mnyam// rim par rtse mor rab rdzogs li// b+h+rUM/ dpal ldan rdzogs pa yum gyi mkha'// zhing khams chen po bsam mi khyab// rnam dag tshogs rdzog gzhal yas khang // bkod pa tshad med 'od ldan d+hI// rab
320b2(rnying rgyud): snying po'i tshig 'di'o// oM/ chos rnams sems las gud na med// gdod nas ma skyes brjod las 'das// blang dor med pa'i ngang nyid las// mnyam pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ a/ de nyid ma rtogs 'khrul pa la// mkha' ltar mkha' nyid snying rje che/
320b3(rnying rgyud): lus khyab pa'i ye shes kyis// kun la snang ba de bzhin bsgom// oM ma hA d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ hUM/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// gdod gnas dag pa gsal ba'i rgyu// mthing nag 'od kyis kyogs kun gsal// thams cad ma lus rnams 'byung hUM/ oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA nas twa ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ e/
320b4(rnying rgyud): chos kun ye nas dag pa la// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ni// kun tu bzang po'i dbyings kyi dang // stong nyid sems kyi rang bzhin rdzogs// e A ka sha maN+Da la hUM/ yaM las bskal pa'i 'thor rlung ni// bag chags sdug bsngal ma lus gtor// dam tshig sgrol ma dbyings kyi mkha'// spyod byed dbus
320b5(rnying rgyud): kyai nus par ldan// yaM karma rak+Sha hu~M b+ha twa maN+Da la hUM/ khaM las khrag gi rgya mtsho ni// 'dod chags 'khor ba kun sbyangs nas// pad+ma gsang ba dbyings kyi mkha'// chags gzhi khrag gi rang bzhin gnas// oM ma hA su kha rak+ta ma hA le hUM// suM las gru gsum bsgral ba'i sa// rdo rje
320b6(rnying rgyud): gra ma mi zad gter// sangs rgyas spyan ma dbyings kyi mkha'// gti mug shwa yi dpung du bsgom// oM ma hA baM smin+ta maN+Da la hUM/ raM/ 'bar ba'i stobs kyis srid gsum 'joms// sreg byed gsang ba'i mtshan nyid can// 'od 'phrul gos dkar gas ma'i mkha'// drod kyi 'phro 'dud mar gsal 'ab
320b7(rnying rgyud): btsAn dra la ts+yad+ha mr-ig+d+ha/ kaM/ zhe sdong ma spangs kun gyis spangs// dkar zhing 'tshor ba byang chub sems// ya shes gsang ba'i dbyings kyi yum// lhag par snang ba dus pa'i gzhi// oM ma hA kan ti da Ta ta shaM kha ma N+Da la hUM/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// spu yi dkyil 'khor yongs
321a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// 'grod dang myang ngan 'das pa'i chos// sung ba mchog ga bdag pa las// gdan dang / cig man chadadu// smyan srapa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad// 'a du lams thag ga rgyam tho rdzogs// gzugs kyi 'ams na na/
321a2(rnying rgyud): ste// keng rus gzugs med khams su'o// ri rab la ba nor bu'i 'od// dman pa'i theg pa gsum rdzogs pa'i// rdorje brag chen gtams pa la// bya spyod rnal 'byor las rnams rdzogs// pad+ma las ni rnal 'byor gsum// nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dbang phyug chen pa
321a3(rnying rgyud): yab yum bcas// nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyang phyir// dpa' gtum 'jigs byed gdug pa can// gtum po'i stobs dang brjid pa dang // 'dzin dang zhe sdang rab sbyor las// stag gzigs seng ge dom dang glang // me dang chu srin sbrul gyi ni// lha dang klur bcas rab tu
321a4(rnying rgyud): spel// dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis bskor// he ru ka yi gnas bcur ldan// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // tshig brjod 'di yis gsal bar bya// hUM nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor chen po'i pho brang dgu// theg pa rim
321a5(rnying rgyud): dgu rdzogs pa'i chags// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par mdzes// tshogs brgyad gnas su dag pa'i rtags// chos sku spros med lte ba zlum// ye shes bzhi ldan gru ched bzhi// bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhir bcas// phyi rol bskal pa'i me ri 'bar// rin chen
321a6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// nang gi thod pa tshar gsum brtsigs// mthu chen bdud kyi mgo bcad pa'o// 'jigs byed khro bo'i gzer chen btab// ka zhu nyi ma zla bas brgyan// rnam thar brgyad kyi them skas bres// phyogs skyong bcu ni bla re bklubs// lha chen dbang phyug
321a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan 'phyar// gdug pa sbrul gyi zar tshag/ sbrul chen rigs lnga'i chun po 'phur// gnam lcags gzer chen btab pa la// b+har+tha 'jigs pa'i gzer chen ldan// zhing chen ga yang gzhi bla res phug/ zhing chung bags pa thal la// ba su ta li wa
321b1(rnying rgyud): pas spel// dri chen rje du'i zham chu 'bab// kang gdung bya 'thung zhing lding // ser stag don phred mchong zhing chug/ nyi zla gza' skang 'khrug cing 'phen// ye shes lnga ldan 'od zer 'gro// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa// zhi zo rgyal ba'i pho brang mchog
321b2(rnying rgyud): b+ho pi shwa bi shud+d+he b+han+da ga ta dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la hUM/ de ba ma hA nA ga ma hA ru tra ti ra bi/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan+da maN+Da la/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ta ra na hUM/ gzhal yas khang chen 'bar ba la// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// gnas dadu rdzogs pa'i pho
321b3(rnying rgyud): br-ing la// dbus kyi gdan steng yi ge yoM// 'phro 'du 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// kun tu bzang po he ru kaM/ che ba'i che mchog gyur pa ni// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rdzogs par gsal// zhal ni gsang ba'i dur khrod de// spyan 'bar he ru ka/
321b4(rnying rgyud): yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gis ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// rang gi rigs mtshan yongs su rdzogs// dud khrod chen po brgyad kyis brgyan// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// oM shrI ma hA he ru ka hU~M phaT/ dz+ye hUM kun tu bzang mo/
321b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi yum// kro d+hi shA rI dbang phyug ma// rnam par thar pa'i dgu dgu ldan// stong pa bco brgyad phyag rnams kyis// g.yas pa rdo rje ma mo brgyad// g.yon pa dril bu phra men brgyad// gtso chen 'bar ba'i cha lug gi 'dzin// zhabs bzhi mnyes spyod sku la
321b6(rnying rgyud): 'khril// oM ma hA kro d+hI shwa tI dz+wa la ni d+hi hUM// yab yum gnyis su med pa yi// mkha' gsang byin rlabs cho 'phrul las// paM maM hUM aM a phaT ces pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM rdo rje// pad+ma ma chags zla ba aM// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // nyi zla mkha'
321b7(rnying rgyud): gsang dbyangs su sbyor// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ hUM bde mchog sgyu ma'i b.ras mtshon te// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang byung ye shes 'od zer 'gro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba
322a1(rnying rgyud): gas na na nga// / gan na su/ /
322a2(rnying rgyud): yas su// bde chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zlos// sangs rgyas sbyin tshogs ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyor bas bstim// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M// oM dang ldan pa'i thig le las// sku gsung phyogs kyi rdo rje bskyod// hUM gi 'gro 'dus mkha'
322a3(rnying rgyud): lalab// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// nam mkha' bzhin du gsal dag pas// dri med nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gnas// drug hrul laT gyi sgra brjod pas// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// cho ga gsum gyi sbyong ba yis// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung ga yo//
322a4(rnying rgyud): hU~M hU~M trAM// stong gsum gyogs bcu rdul rnyed kyis// bkang nas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor sgo// de dag sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ma lus bsgral// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM// 'khor ba bskal ba'i zhing de dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i tshogs chen
322a5(rnying rgyud): bu chu chu'u
322a6(rnying rgyud): gyis// rang bzhin med par bsgral bas ni// mnyam nyid chos su chen par ston// oMm hA shI hi drug ma dzug du pra be shA phaT/ brab+han b+hUM// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi bzang dang // dregs pa ru nyi zla dang // pad+ma 'bang ba'i gdan snying du// he run dang gshin
322a7(rnying rgyud): rlog shed// rta mgrin rdo ji gzhon nu dang // mngon rdzogs rgyal dang dregs pa 'dul// stobs ldan mchog dang ngag 'dzin gtso// rang gi rigs dang yum dang bcas// sngar bzhin myong ba byin rdzabs las// sras 'khor sprul pa'i rdzogs bcas kun// rang
322a8(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i tshig gis // kyi de nas rdzogs gsal pa dang // byin gyis brlangs shing dbang bsrung nas// dmatshig pa la brtan bzhag s+ho// ye shes dkyil 'khor dang bye na// ma mdzad tu chub
322b1(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings rnam dag gsal ba'i pho zang n+yag// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshogs dbyings nas bzhengs// rigs lnga yab yum sams dpa' lham drul dang // mthar byed sko ba sbas su thub badrug/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol// ni rung
322b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'dus dpal chen he ru ka/ yon tan tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bzhengs// he ru ka dpal yab yum khro bo bcu// ta kr-i ta sgo ba'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// ye shes lhun grub dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dpa' chen khrag 'thung yab
322b3(rnying rgyud): yum dbyings nas bzhengs// rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum ma mo'i tshogs// sgo bzhi srung ma'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// gshed chen ri
322b4(rnying rgyud): lnga b+h+yor sgrol yu ma dang bcas// phyogs snong blo skyong 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dab gi rgyal po khro rgyal rtswa mchog dpal// gsung mchog sgro tshogs chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// khams gsum dbang sdud yab yum sras 'khor bcas// @
322b5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa sgom gshegs su gsol// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa'i phur pa bsrub phyir dbyings nas bzhengs// dpal chen khro bcu yab yum sras mchog rdzogs// dpal 'byung phra thabs phra men gshegs su gsol// khams
322b6(rnying rgyud): gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i rgyan// snang srid 'byung lha'i bdag mo sgrub khyod cig/ bla med yab yum dbyings kyi yum chen dang // tshogs bdag sman mo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// chos su lhun gru ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde gshegs rig pa
322b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa dbyidra nas bzhengs// byang chub sems mchog grub pa'i rig pa 'dzini// rigs bzhi khro rgyal rig 'dzin gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul mdzad khro bo che// khams gsum gyi 'dul yab yum dbyings nas bzhengs// bdud dang gshin rje lha
323a1(rnying rgyud): klu gnod sbyin gtso// sde dpon chen po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// mthu stobs rtsal 'chang dpal chen 'byung bdag yum// sngags bdag dregs pa 'dul byed dbyings nas bzhengs// 'jig rten drag sngags spyod pa'i tshul
323a2(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba'i// sngags bdag dregs pa 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i dkyil 'khor nas// dam tshig pa las bzhengs pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// dpal gyi bka' sdod rigs kyi mthu ston pa'i// phrin las bsgrub pa'i srung ma gshegs su gsol/
323a3(rnying rgyud): thAg ta b+hi ru d+he ba ga Na oM A ra li hrI hrIM/ de yis ye shes lha rnams ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'od dang rnam 'phrul byin rlabs bcas// sprin tshogs 'bar zhing bkod pa las// dam tshig tu ni dbab pa'i phyir// gnyis med pa la thim par bya// hUM sa
323a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas bu ni 'dus tshe mchog he ru ka/ dpal 'bar khro mo gnam zhal dbyings phyaphyug ma// sras 'khor sprul pa las kyi pho nyar bcas// byol song gtso bo lha klu bsnol ba dang // nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gdan steng du// dam tshig gnyis med dang du bzhugs su gsol// de
323a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzid pa'i chos dbyings po brang du// bde gshegs rigs lnga yab yum sras 'khor bcas// gtso mchog rgyal po'i phyag gi dkyil 'khor la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad 'khor lo'i lte ba la// he ru ka dpal
323a6(rnying rgyud): mtshigaso chen brgyad// dpa' chen dbyings kyi yum dang mnyes mdzad rnams// ru dra chu glang klu dang lha yi gtso// mkha' gsang ma tra ti ra dang 'phan dang // nyi bla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// gtso chen so so'i rigs kyi sras mchog dang // gnyis med yum
323a7(rnying rgyud): da ngang du spyod mdzod cing // phyogs rnams 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi pho brang la// rigs mchog mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// gnas brgyad dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi'i bar khyams la// ma mo bcu drug phyogs skyong bcu gnyis yum// khro brgyad khro bcu yab
323b1(rnying rgyud): yum thathabs bcas// tshogs kyi ma mo phyogs bzhi dregs pa can// rigs 'dzin 'khor bcas sngags bdag yab yum rnams// tir mchog phran gdan la bzhugs su gsol// phyi na dkyil 'khor phyogs kyi sgo bzhi la// gdong mo gshinA rje phonya phra men ma/
323b2(rnying rgyud): srid bzhi dreg pa las kyi bka' nyan bzhi// phan mdzad slob dpon bzhi rnams so so yi// phyogs bzhir mnyam pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// dbus dang phyogs mtshams pho brang mu ran la// ce byang ma brgyad dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// ging chen bcwo brgyad
323b3(rnying rgyud): spang po nya'i tshogs// phur srung mo ging sman mo lnga bcu brgyad// lha srin sde dang mkha' 'gro gong dang bcas// rang gi gdan bcas gnas sra bzhugs su gsol// phyi rim par khyams phyogs bzhi'i gdan steng du// lha chen yum dang mkha' 'gro ging gi tshogs//
323b4(rnying rgyud): ma bdun rdo rje'i pho nya sring mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang bka' yi bstan srung rnams// he ra ba ma chen rang gnas gdan khri la// pho nya bka' sdod dz+wal du bzhugs su gsol// oM a thA ga ta b+hi ru de ba ga Na sarba ma hA sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra ma ra na hUM/ gnyis su med par mthong
323b5(rnying rgyud): gyur nas// de dag sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir// mchod pa chen po bcu gnyis te// dam tshig las kyi lha yis so// de nas lha phyag btsal ba ni// ho bcom ldan kun bzang rigs lnga 'dus pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang mo rgyal ba kun gyi yum// sras 'khor sprul pa khro bo'i tshogs
323b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// zhi mchog rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ gsang chen mnyes mdzad dbyings phyug khro mo'i rgyal// sras mchog yab yum khro mo sgo srung bcas// che ba'i yon tan rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs lnga khrag 'thung
323b7(rnying rgyud): yab yum khrob che// gnas yul rnam dag ma mo phra men bcas// phrin las rnam bzhi bdud 'dul khro bo bzhi// thugs mchog 'gyur med lha la phyag 'tshal lo// gshin rje 'dul mdzad skye lnga sbyor sgrol yum// phyogs skyong khro bo yab yum phra men bzhi// tshe dang
324a1(rnying rgyud): srog la dbang mdzad gshin rje'i tshogs// sku yi khyad par bstan la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang gi rgyal po khro mo yum dang bcas/ sras mchog sprul pa lham dral dregs pa'i tshogs// ma lus zil gnon khro rgyal gnyis med yum/
324a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi go ha sprul pa'i sgom bzhi// gsung rdzogs dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi rgyal po rig lngagatso mo yum// khro bo khro mo phra men lha ma dral tshogs// sras mchog sprul pa sgo bzhi'i khro mo dang // zin las bsgrub pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bla med
324a3(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung nyid bzhi yum chen mo// dbyings dang ye shes las kyi sman mor bcas// so so'i 'dul byed rigs kyi skur bstan pa// zod gtong las kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid skye med dgongs pa lhun grub cing // mkhyen rig ye shes thugs ces
324a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' ltar khyab// 'gro ba'i don rdzogs gnyis med rig pa 'dzin// rgyud kun bdag po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs pa'i tshogs 'dul khro rgyal yab yum gtso// phrin las dbang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // 'jig rten phrin las sgrub pa'i
324a5(rnying rgyud): dregs pa can// mchod pa stod phrin las grub la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs ldan 'jigs byed gnyis med lha po yum// ngag sngags sprul pa sde dpon las kyi lha// phrin las bka' sdod phyag brnyan gsang ba'i bdag/ gtso 'khor dmod pas bstig la phyag 'tshal
324a6(rnying rgyud): lo// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan lam du// rab sbrul gzugs bstan gsung gi gnyar blangs shing // dam tshig dbang gis thugs kyi dgongs pa bsgrub// bka' yi bstan srung rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// a tha gA ta b+hi rba ba gaNan mo brtan da ma/
324a7(rnying rgyud): de yis rab tu mnyes byas nas// mthun pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa ni// ma bcos rdzogs pa'i tshe mchog he ru ka/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gi dkyil 'khor ni// rgyal ba yen rnams phyag g.yas thabs kyi dang / kun bzang mthing ga rdo rje dril bu bsnams// snang mdzad
324b1(rnying rgyud): dkar bzas kyi 'khor la bskur// me bskyod mthing gas gzhan rdorje 'dzin// ran 'byung gsar ma dag nor bu mchod sbyin mdzad// mtha' yas mdog dmar tang 'dzin bad+ma rgya// don grub ljang gra rgya tham skyabs sbyin phyag/ sa snying dkar po rin chen mya gru bskams// nam
324b2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i snying po mthing ga ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu rdo rje dri la// byams pad mar skya gar gyi gun d+he bsdams// kun bzang dkar po rin chen myu gu bsdams// sgrib pa rnams la sngon po po ti 'don// 'jam dpa
324b3(rnying rgyud): dkAr ljang me ltos ut+pal 'ang na// gshin rjegashed po mdog dkar thod dbyug brnams// stobs chen sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// rta mgrin dmar ba tha~Md sprul pad+ma bsdams// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang gu gam bsnams// lha yi thub pa mdog dkar pi wang ba rnams/
324b4(rnying rgyud): lhamin dub sngon po po cha bsdams// mi yi thub pa gser mdog gseg shang bsnams// sangs rgyas yum rnams phyag g.yon shes rab dang // bya ba'i chos ni mthing ka mnyam gzhag 'gro// kun tu bzang zo mdog dkar dril bu 'khrol// sangs rgyas spyan ma mthing nag zeng
324b5(rnying rgyud): tshugs bsnams/ gos dkar ma ni mdog sar rin chen bsnams// mA ma kI ni dmar gsal pad+ma 'phyar// dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu rgya gram bsdams// lA s+ye dkar mo me long sgeg par 'dzin// mA la sngon mo rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// gIr ti dmar mo po wang rgyud 'dren
324b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad// ni rti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan phreng // bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dmar seng spos khang 'dzin// dag pa'i mdadra ldan sngon mo pad+ma khro// gsal ba'i 'od ldan dmar mo mar me 'dzin// dag byed ljang gu dung phor dri chab 'thor// ro langs dkar mo 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu
324b7(rnying rgyud): brlabs// mi pa ldan mad ji gags pa bsdams// ral gcig dam da do lugs sgrog bsnams// srog nyer 'di ljang gu dril zu rnams// rgyal seng thab pase ma po ti rnams// yaM dwags thub pa dmar po rin cher sgom// dmyal ba'i thub pa mthong ma
325a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ bsdams// yab yum gnyis med thabs dang shes rab gyur// wI dul phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// gnyis med um chen gan mazhal dbyings phyug ma// dpung gu phyag na btsa brgyad stong pa'i dbyings// g.yas g.yon dang tra/
325a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dril bu bsnams// g.yas kyi 'og ma dbyings kyi ma mo brgyad// g.yon gyi 'og ma yul gyi phra men brgyad// rang rigs rtags kyi phyag rgya mtsho par bzhes// bcom ldan che mcho ga raH he ru ka/ smug nag dbu gsum phyag drug dkar dmar zhal// g.yas g.yod
325a3(rnying rgyud): dang po 'khor lo b+han dmar bsdams// bar ma gnyis ni ti ra rgyu zhags 'dren// tha ma gnyis ni khyung chen pa su 'dren// rak+Sha kro d+hI skyug nag zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis yab 'khyud 'khor lo dung khrag stob// che mchog gu h+ya he ru ka dpal rje// dbu gsum ser
325a4(rnying rgyud): nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag g.yas rin chen ri rab dgra sta 'phyar// g.yon pas thod khrag stong gsum rgyu zhags sdom// gu h+ya kro d+hI rin chen dung dmar stob// bi shwa he ru dmar nag dbu gsum ni// dbus ma dmar nag g.yas mthing g.yon dmar
325a5(rnying rgyud): zhal// phyag drug dang po pad+ma d+han+da 'phyar// bar ma gnyis na stong gi 'jig rten bsnams// tha ma gnyis ni dgra sta tha~Mng gshol 'dzin// sa nu kr-i d+hi pad+ma dung khrag stob// bcom ldan dpal chen yak+Sha he ruka/ dbu gsum ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag
325a6(rnying rgyud): drug dang po rgya gram b+han+da dgugs// bar ma gnyis na ral gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na rgya phreng ti ra bsnams// yak+Sha kro d+hI rgya gram thod khrag stob// dri za 'dul byed tri shul 'khor lo dkar// me lha 'dul byed me dpal dbyug tho dmar// gshin rje 'dul byed
325a7(rnying rgyud): dgra s+thA thod dbyug mthing // srin po 'dul byed skyug nag ral gri zhags// klu rnams 'dul byed pad+ma spu gri dmar// rlung lha 'dul byed rnga yab b+han+ta bsdams// gnod sbyin 'dul byed rgya gram dril bu ljang // bgegs kun 'dul byed dgra d+ha rtse gsum mthing // lha rnams
325b1(rnying rgyud): ca pa ga su ngas/ u bdag 'dul byang du 'grod pa dgas// ya bye dpar bsngags kya rnams// zan n+ta ba par pogags pa brnams// brnyan btad ma bsngags sog parnams// ltung bu dal ba dums// du
325b2(rnying rgyud): gsum sangs nas yanatan 'dus pa tshogs// rang reg drug rgyu'i margyad pa pazhes su gsol// shar gyi kyi na sa dkyil bar gci ba bdag/ bcom ldan phrag 'thung ba nyes// dbugasam ma tha~Md dag dgar dang dpa ba nal// phyung drugadzi 'a rji byed
325b3(rnying rgyud): 'i
325b4(rnying rgyud): dbugs med mar dag ci theng ga dkar po shis// phyag drug pazlab ca bsgrag yas// de bldan dam dbring gsha g.yonan pa sdams// rdzab yod lag stsog// btsun ldan byeg 'a' ga 69/ dbug sum nag dkar dang ma
325b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i nag// phyag drug rgya ga mar la tha~M gra sta g.yas// stong gsum 'jig rten par mthong gshol g.yon// kamu ba tI N+Da gra ma thod khrab sdob// ga tAmathing ga stan dmar byis chu 'dzin// tso rI mar mo thabs kyi mda' gzung gengs// bu mo mang mo du srin bye
325b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan phyid// brjenag mar 'o 'byor// phug dam thong bus paris su 'dran// b+ha ljang bu rung khrag 'drag cang 'thung // sme ma mthong na gsum pa'i bye byin pa// matang kyir mgo lus 'bral// sa tab po zhing bder ge'i dbo// sbed pa gro
326a1(rnying rgyud): mgo lag gnyis brdol// sal nag ma gyis ldag la yechag/ dz+nyAn mthong ga sha 'drang sun 'ams// gyata mang ma dru ba byanod mag// kAng gdamar skragazhang khrung dung byang mag// kAka nag monyan thabya gamag// u lu
326a2(rnying rgyud): nag lcags kyu drug pa'i mgo// rta gdong dkar po gugs byed lcags kyu 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo 'ching byed pa cha zhags sdom// spel gdong dmar ma sbom byad lcags smyig 'ching // srung gdong ljang gu mnyes byed dril bu 'grol// thams cad thugs 'dus par//
326a3(rnying rgyud): chen lha ye tshogs// rang rig phyag ma'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen po rgyal gshi na rje'i gshed// mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bzad// dbugasam ga yas da
326a4(rnying rgyud): g.yon dam dadabus na ga zhal// phyag drug btson dal gri dpra thA g.yas// g.yon pasdigs mdzub madrid thung rtan dpar 'dzin// ba ta nag mo dgra sta drang dmar stog// ral gcig sngon ga N+DI shul g.yang gzhi 'phyar// sas mchog ya ma ra dzag shin rdo gshed//
326a5(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum mthing nag g.yas dkar g.yon dam gal// phyag drug 'khor lo ral gri lcags sgra g.yas// khaD+ga dgra s+tha rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon// g.yu yaM la gcig nag mo dung dmar stob// lha mo dpala' bar ral gri ne'u la 'dzin// sras mchog myos byed 'brar/
326a6(rnying rgyud): pag shin rje'i gshed// dbu gsum g.yas sngogayon dmar dbus ser nag/ phyag drug ba con ral gri dgra ste ga yas// g.yon pa nyan dmar 'khor lo lcags kyi bsdams// gtum mo drug thul ser nag d+han dmar stog// khrag gi bdag mo s+tha mr-i tsata na/
326a7(rnying rgyud): sras mchog gshin drag shed pa ma // dbugasum g.yas dag g.yon rdzi dadus dam zhal// phyag drug brtson dbyig to la T+wAM ga las// bud dpang 'khor lo d+ha ma'i nags pa g.yon// lha mo 'ang zer dmar mad dmar rdzog// glang bzhi gtsug 'byams nyid da
326b1(rnying rgyud): sras mchog rab pa char dgu gshen rje'i gshed// ljang nag g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug pa can gtun shing dgra skra g.yas// b+han dmar rgya zhugs 'khor lo g.yon na bsnams// bdud 'dral nag mo khram shing b+ha n+da ga yon// can
326b2(rnying rgyud): mo mgo 'phyang dung khrag dgra sta 'phyar// nag 'joms mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// nag mo ral gcig yab 'khyud dung dmar stob// phya sangs dkar po bum pa rdo rje gshol// shel gyi gdong dgu yab 'khyud zangs mi thogs// khrag 'joms dkar ser brag
326b3(rnying rgyud): dang 'khor lo 'dzin// shel mig khro mo lcags kyu dung dmar stob// glang mgo smug nag kha T+wAM lcags kyu bsnams// dkar skya mche gtsigs skar mda' dung dmar stob// yab ti sngon ga ral gri lcags kyu 'dzin// dred kyi a bsham zam shing d+han+da thogs// mig
326b4(rnying rgyud): dmar skrag nag ral gri dbyug pa g.yas// khrag gi ral gcig g.yas g.yo na dung dmar stob// sdig pa dud kha lcags sgrog phreng ba brtsams// klu mo pus 'gro gcol dung dmar rto ba// tel ba rdzo nag spu gri rak+ta 'dzin// spyan gsum mche gtsigs b+han+ta ra
326b5(rnying rgyud): stob// bdud 'joms smag nag thob b+han dmar bsdams// smug nag ral gcig yab la dung khrag stob// chos rgyal dkar ser rdo rje khram nag 'dzin// rdo rje ral gcig zhags pa dung dmar sto ba// 'bar ba dmar po rtsis byang btun shing 'dzin// de mar mo mgo dgu
326b6(rnying rgyud): tri shul b+han dmar stob// thod dbyug mthing nag zhing dbyug sho rdo'u bsnams// nag mo phag mgo zhags pa thod khrag stob// dung gi nod mgo rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// nag mo b+hag mgo rin chen zhags pa 'dzin// kang ka dmar mo pad+ma lcags sgrog 'dzin// ljang nag
326b7(rnying rgyud): sru mgo rgyag ma dril bu 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa sku mchog 'dus pa'i gtso// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rlub phyogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal po'i chu// dmar nag dbu gsum phyag
327a1(rnying rgyud): drag gapas pan bzang // dbug sum ga yas da rAn lan b+ha thus dmar shal// ga na 'gags gsas// jes shAn pang sngags klog g.yon na bsnams// 'akang na la du ga ga// sprul ba za ba na las
327a2(rnying rgyud): na ga/ kal gcig phyag gnyis sum dag dmar nag 'brar// phyag gnyis sa mar dan tha khrag dang // rdornga re rab phrar pa dzin zhing 'brel// dpal chen sprul pa'i zil sa nan khro ba brgyad// dper nage dbugasum kyag drug ga bas bzhi ba thang // dbu ga tsug rta go d+hI
327a3(rnying rgyud): zung gsung 'byed// zhi ba'i lharnams zil gnan na mkhyen ni// phyag drug 'char ma dang na chen g.yas// bad+ma la gri sgril phrag yonan ba sdams// brgyad baphrus thabs kyis zhi ba gas lngaganon// ming ma khro mo skul dkris par 'jil// las kyitha ba tsal gan /
327a4(rnying rgyud): na do// phyag drug da grag zagayas// brnyed bsta ma ga yin na pa rnams// rje ba tur par macul dbyas par 'bre'o// mamang la gnon dbyings kyi sum drag gnon// phyag drug rdzogs mdub ldegs kyu 'phrul zhugs g.yas// lpags smin
327a5(rnying rgyud): na dang snams// dbangs dpar ba cu dmas pa 'thil// grang rnams thal nan pas byung can ba snams// rgyagadra dngas dang ma da g.yas// rnams rlung gA nga gA yin du pa snams// gtsug dpangar po phrus dbyes pa phyi
327a6(rnying rgyud): dajil gnon dregs pa'i lha brgyad gnon// phyag drug rnga thod khrag rgya grags g.yas// dung khrag thod dron zhing dbyug g.yon na bsdams// rdo rje las byed dmar mo yul 'khril// ma rgyad zil gnon me bdun phreng bzhi gnon// phyag drug rdo rje ral tha mda'
327a7(rnying rgyud): gangs// zhigs pa sdigs mdzu gcu ni g.yon na bsnams// gzhon rje las kyang dmar po phul 'khril// kun mos zil banin gadrug pa'i sbrul brgyad gnon// phyag drug srul dkar mer dmar g.yas na bsdams/ hrul wa sbrul ldang nag po
327b1(rnying rgyud): gnan pa rnams// zlum las zad da pa grostsal 'jal// gapa nams pag don zagapa' bcad ga do// dang gags par la gagasas// dang shAgapa nga sgrub pa dkrugs// dod rten pas kyad mang la la/ da
327b2(rnying rgyud): rnams ni kha thod thug sto // zla bzhi'i ba nya dkar ser dmang ldang mdog/ lcags bya 'gas pa lhags srog dral bu 'dzin// dris gsung pa de gshegs gzung gi dbang phyugatshogs// rang dag phyag rgya'i bachad pa bzhes su gsal// byang rgyags dkyil 'o
327b3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'dus pa na tso// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sgra// dbugasum phyag drug gabs ba'i sgra mdog mdzad// dbugasapa g.yas dka g.yon dbar dbus paci shal// g.yas pad rje dang kyil bsdangs// g.yon pa la nI ma dpung 'bar ba brtsams// ba ma gnyis ni//
327b4(rnying rgyud): ri rab phrar pa 'jil// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs 'i nA tha~Md theg rdzog// sangs zas mas mchog bad kro la ya// dgra gsum g.yas dkang g.yon rdo dbus da gal// phyag drug dang po rji dag ste brjegs// pad ma gnyis ni ral gri zhags pa 'dzin/ @
327b5(rnying rgyud): mchog na chen rany+dza kI la la// dgra gsum g.yas dkar na yon dmar dbus sar gal// phyag drug dang po btson dgras bsnams// bar pa gnyis ni rin chen la tho bsdams// dbang gisras mchog badz+ra kA la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon
327b6(rnying rgyud): ser dbus dmar zhel// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung thung ba rnams// bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// phrin las sras mchog kang kI le la// dbu gsum g.yas dkar gi yin dmar dbus ldang zhal// g.yas g.yon du
327b7(rnying rgyud): pa mdung dang gr-i khrag bsdams// bar ma gnyis na lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin// kun kyang ba mad rab phrag pa 'dril// sgra spang gsar dngul zangs lpags phrang pan// gru gsum 'bad+hab a yi gdan la bzhugs// hU~M chen sde lhas dang dbar ba'i zhal/
328a1(rnying rgyud): mas su lang rdzun gas/ da dunan na na// da smra //
328a2(rnying rgyud): maphyag gnyis 'khor la dri shul bsnams/ rdo rje skams meral gri thun dmar stob// yab yum skal ba stag dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug pa sngon pa dkar dang dmar pa'i rnal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis me dpal dbyug pa bsdams// rdo rje lded mo lpags b+ha b+han dam

328a4(rnying rgyud): na gzhal// bang pa'i phyag gnyis ral gri zhags pa bsdams// dzarjeg tun khung zebadang khrag ts+tsha ba// yab sum sprul pa gzis/ dang khe ta'i mag/ rta mgrin dmang tho kar dang sngo ba zhal// ba ma'i phyag gnyis sug zhugs pa thogs// rdo rje gtum ma

328b2(rnying rgyud): med rnam // bshad mig can dkar btugs thags// mag can par mazhugs su 'an// blan mags nad mar so lcags ma dzin// thamams can thang bral bu'an// sa bsum pa de ga shegs sem pas gas
328b3(rnying rgyud): rkyen d+ha'i mtshad pa bzhis su gas pa// shA ts+tsha'i dkyil 'khor ba ba gshegs pa na \u0f7f// bcom ldan ma nardzogs pa med ste// dbugs ma ga las dka sa san sa bas mthong zhal// phyag drus dang phrul khyang stsal zhags g.yas/
328b4(rnying rgyud): glags gzug yanan bsdams// kun tu bkyang ma nyid bzhi mkha' ba'i 'thong // dgra ga cig kA la rgyag drug phyag mam na// rdo rje rje ma zhags pargya rtsagayas na pa rnams// rdol buHnAg yang gags yanan rnams// shar phyags mkha'a'
328b5(rnying rgyud): gdo rnam snang gsal// phyag drug dang ga n+ta ldan// bar ma gnyis kyis dag rdza gtan shing bag/ tha ma phyag gas ma ngag sachag can byed// mA la mkhal khri 'dagasal pa yang ga dang // phyag drug dang peran can byan+da ldan// bar ma sa sa
328b6(rnying rgyud): mi dpal byug tha bsdams// tha ma'i yug gis sgeg ma gang phrin pa stod// rlub phyogs ma pa 'a dgromanyan gsal skra ka'i gdong // phyag zug dang ba ba n+d+ha ldan// bar ma gnyis na zhags pa'i thul bsdams// tha ma'i phyag gis ci lhung zhing zung ba stor/
328b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs mapa' 'gi klung ga na yang gsal g.yos// phyag drug dang pa rgya gram thu ba snams// bar ma gnyis ni dbyug zo zeng 'dzid// tha ma'i phyag gis sbyang ga zhang chung bstod/ dmam phes 'grob theg gas lado dza' macu// phyag drug dang po ba
329a1(rnying rgyud): paN+Da ldan// ba mag nyes nanal mtshan ma ngon// thams nyas drug pakang rlung bad+mo// dbyangs ma sum tshan nag pa'i rnal m+b+hal// dbug sam thabs bya// rang rags pal dag gas la// srid pa pad 'a
329a2(rnying rgyud): gsum bu mdog mashing // rgyag drug dang po 'khar ma na pacoM// bad ma g.yang ga n+tad mar gyis pakang // ba ma gnyis ni ma tham lpags zla 'dzin// nye bzod zeng ma dag dkar 'ang 'a'adogs la// phyag gnyis zangs zhugs sto thaMng zhan
329a3(rnying rgyud): cos ma ma dag // thug 'ang ba ra bam na // ma ma pa tham pa brnams/ kyi pas na byed pa 'a can ci / / dzin pa dbangs rdzug
329a4(rnying rgyud): sa thags// bdag nyid dmar ma ma 'azhags pa'aphan// gcig byed par ba zhing lpags g.yang gzhi bdabs// dka mamag gcag ng+gA zlum bzugs// nag ma man gtsigs par zhugs// dbang ma dbung da tu yang me nga
329a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa
329a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs na nga 'dugs na pa Sh+Te na// bdag dbang myong na byed thag zlags// ga byung bar mabyu na/ kur ban pa la'ab thags// dran gnas pa dkyil 'kho gas/ gtid mang ba rgya pa kya
329a7(rnying rgyud): sus rdzos/ da// 'ad pa ma kyi sa na// seM // ma mas u gyun pan
329b1(rnying rgyud): lcags bya thogs// srin mo dmar sa thod khrag zhags pa 'dzin// srin mo sdom byed sngon mo lcang lo 'phyar// dkar mo mcha gzigs thod pa dkar po thogs// nag mo kha 'ab+h+ram+ba b+har+tha ldan ma thogs// dmar mo mchu 'jebs b+han+da dmar pa thogs// ser mo las
329b2(rnying rgyud): mkhan d+hAn+da ser po 'dzin// lha yi sring mo dkar mo rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje'i sring mo sngon mo thod dbyug thogs// klu yi sring mo dmar mo sbrul zhags thogs// gnod sbyin sring mo ser nag ne'u le 'dzin// bde bar gshegs bzod gtong 'dus pa'i bdag/ rang ris phyag/
329b3(rnying rgyud): rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// nub byang dkyil 'khor 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu gsum phyag drug kham nag sdug mning zhal// dang po'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas g.yon phyag bzhis lha brgyad
329b4(rnying rgyud): klu brgyad mgo// khams gsum gyi 'dul phyag g.yas rdon 'khyud// phyag g.yan drang khrag gtso bo'i zhal du rdzob// lha chen mthong nag gri gag tsa d+hA ga yon// btsun mo yu ma rtsa gsumathong khrag brnams// seng ga kyang chen gshengs par khrel bzhugs// @
329b5(rnying rgyud): rlung mdog nag brtson g.yas// g.yon na tha~Md dbyug ma he rgya grang bcibs// sgrol byed nag mo srid pa'i mthong sa bskor// bdud po srog rje mthong nag khram shing g.yas// g.yod na dgra ste bdud rta nag po bzabs// nag mor tI wam shing nad rgyal brtswa /
329b6(rnying rgyud): dril zang ma mnang gasra mtsho bsu sra bcabs// nig po zlag phreng klog gi phreng ba 'dzin// rgal mgro khrag mig khrag por zhal du dzi na// yang yum gnyis med 'brug dang rngamo bcabs// yin me dpal mching nag ran chen bsdams// g.yon na ma tshan /
329b7(rnying rgyud): stag sed rngam pa bcibs// mon mo nag mo phyag g.yas spu bri brtsams// g.yon na spung gi lcags kyi phag mo bcibs// srid pa'i rgyal mo mdog dkar 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon na ma long 'brug mi sgra chen bcibs// e katsatAM smug mthing nat+ta ga yas// g.yon/
330a1(rnying rgyud): nag u sbyang de 'u rta nag po bcibs// nag mo mgyogs byed g.yas na mtshon drub bsnams// g.yon na nad rgyal so bya nag po bcibs// rdo rje bdud 'dul mthing nag khrag thun g.yas// g.yon na mdung thung dre'u nag po bcings// sro sha
330a2(rnying rgyud): dmar po bse mdung dmar po g.yas// g.yon na mda' gzhu chibs su ta dmar bcibs// skyes bu dmar 'bar sha wa lang g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na zangs zhags chibs su rta dmar bcibs// bgegs kyi rgyal po mthing nag kha T+wAM g.yas// g.yon na zad
330a3(rnying rgyud): khrag chibs su rta nag bcibs// kA ya nag po phyag g.yas rtse gsum bsdams// g.yon na thod khrag chibs su rtsal chen bcibs// dmu bdud nag po g.yas na shang lang bsdams// g.yon na mda' gzhu dmurta mchod rgod bcibs// gang ba bzang po dkar po pa
330a4(rnying rgyud): dan g.yas// g.yon na shel gyi gnam du dkar po bcibs// spyi bdud rgyal po mdog dkar du mtshon g.yas// g.yon na ral gri rdo rta gro bo bcabs// gan ma thil dkar po g.yas na dang dkar bsnams// g.yon na ra' gri chibs su rta dkar bcibs// tshangs pa
330a5(rnying rgyud): dkar po g.yas na nyi zer bsdams// g.yon pa spu gri seng ge dkar mo bcibs// rdo rje chung rgyal dkar po bdud zhags g.yas// g.yon na spa grib glang sA ring bcibs// skyes bu skra lha mdog dkar rdo rje g.yas// g.yon na rtsa mtshon tsar kham pa bcibs// legs
330a6(rnying rgyud): ldan nag po gri gug g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na ber chen bdud rta nag po bcibs// gza' bdud rgyal po mdog nag sku smad sbrul// phyag g.yas mda' gzhug yon na sbrul zhags bsnams// thog gi bu yug dmar skya thog ser 'phen// yab yum
330a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis mang 'brug can yid mthags bcibs// klu bcung dag pa smral zhags nang rgyal bsdams// klu tha~Mng sbrul kyi na srin sngon rtsib // yagranag mnad rgyal dus thur bsdams// mu srad sgra'i khyil bu dag pa mdan// 'jig rten las byed dregs pa ca
330b1(rnying rgyud): gsas// na rgya na ga na ma na/ da pa gru ga pa// sngags sa na/ chung nan pa dus/ sa yang gas na/
330b2(rnying rgyud): rgyag bzhi pa wa praH/ bsdams// 'byung lnga'i bdag mon la gcig sgra ma dag mthong // g.yas g.yon phyag gis mkha' 'dugs sa gzhi gnan// 'tsho bdag mthing nag zod pa bre sreg bsdams// btsun monag mo gtso zan pa 'i nA
330b3(rnying rgyud): badrad monag mo kha drangs traM shul ga yas// nag mo khrag 'angag kham pa mthod rten bsnams// gsod byed nag po la gri zod khrag g.yon// sring mo nag mo gri zug mi mgo bsdams// gnod sbyin sngo dag ral gri rba mtshon bsnams// dpag cig zon mo
330b4(rnying rgyud): grags dang dag bskams// lha can dkar po d+hA shal phreng sngams// bang po nag po mtshad gtong thun ga tor bsnams/ rdza btsan nag pa dang na gzhags pa bsdams// yag nag pa TI ma zug snams// har mdzes dkar ba shal zing nga dashang
330b5(rnying rgyud): batha dang mang po mdung dmang ral gri bskums// dzaMrje mdzes pa de yang po du mtshon 'gyur// pha nya lag dgu ma dgas sbal pa 'byed// khyab 'jug nag pa khram zhing dam lnga bsdams// gzhon ci gtum bum pa nus sbal ban// sngags te bdag po rlog \u0f7f/
330b6(rnying rgyud): bstad rnams// ku kyang zhing lpags rnyed pa'i na bapa'i gas la// zhabs gnyis dag dang bgags kyi ti la gzer// dumed pa'i mngon 'chang lham chags can rnams// 'dze ga phyag d+ha' mthod pa bzhes su gsol// lhon ba dkyil 'khor dag pa 'dzin pa
330b7(rnying rgyud): gas// thab pa pa bcad pa dbang brgyar zhing // mthun 'gazag par sbyin bye drubs // byag rgya nga u kyig thab pa dang // rnam pa bye dang rgyame bang pa dang // ma a thang bye gas pa rgyad tham dang // dpa sa dbang chung mas pa
331a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'o// rgyal tsha ba ga ngan byang chubasams dpa' rnams// rang / phyan rgyu'i mchod pa bzhas sa gsol// 'di dag rang gi phyag \u0f7f// dang ba mchod pa chen pa yis// gnyis par 'a bskyed pa // / yon tanartags
331a2(rnying rgyud): tsas chog gis mnyes// gsum pa 'dod pa'i yan tan tshogs// gzugs sbya dri ro rig chas sa// bzhi pa nyon mongs lnga bad de// wa bskol ba kye 'chi med// drug pa 'thal med sbyor ba ste// bdun pa drug gsum lung bas mchod// brgyad pa drug ldardzun/
331a3(rnying rgyud): yin te// dgu pa rgyud byung mchod pa che// bcu pa dmachog badz+ran bya'o// bcu gcig pa ni zhal zas tshogs// bcu gnyis gtsang byor lhag ma kI// 'di dag gis ning dang bcas// dus gsum rgyal bkun mnyes 'gyur// da yos bslab par bya ba dag/ kun
331a4(rnying rgyud): mthar byin yon tan tshogs// ma sras byed byed 'di yinan// tsam dpal ldan ta mu// dpal chen pa yi dgongs chen po// rigs brgyad dgu yis rab mangs pa'i// rten 'gyur gcig gis grub pa la// sugasung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las dzod
331a5(rnying rgyud): ting ba sgrub mchong dang // dmod pa dag thal bstan tha rnams// gi rlung rig pa 'dzin dang bcas// zhi dang khyo dang blan med bcas// pha nyams kyi byed pa dag/ nga yis bshad pa gang yin pa// mi 'ongs dus nabaHldan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' brags chen
331a6(rnying rgyud): mo// kyo dang dang dang sras dang gsang// thun pang khyad par bya zag rnams// gang gis pasngags pa rnams la snyom// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i drung batha' byed pa las/ lhangs pa byung zhing thub pa'i man tu drug pa'o//
331a7(rnying rgyud): dedas ti dra rigs lnga la sogs pa'i gapa'i rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das pa 'di nga cas gas maH// tham ci ldan 'das can bzang brjod kyi sru dang gsung dang thugs dang yo tan dang phrin las ma cad par dang / zong gi nyid da nga slod pom sogs pa
331b1(rnying rgyud): po khro mo drag shul spyod pa'i las/ nges par bzung ba 'di dag bstan pa dang bshad pa dang brjod pa'i yul ni gang / dus ni ji tsam zhig na lags/ tshul ni ji lta bu/ yon tan ni ci zhig yod pa lags/ bdag cag gi the tshom gcad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// de ra
331b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtse ma he r+ya ga yi tshogs// 'khor dang bcas pa kun nyon cig/ phyi ma'i dus dang yi sku// sbrul pa thun mong sdang ba 'di// chos sgra mnyam pa nyid gyur na// thos pa dang ni zag pa 'dzin// skyes bu rnams kyi yid la gnas// ran can/
331b3(rnying rgyud): dgu yi sprul pa'i gzugs// 'ang ma dbyangs lha dang bcas pa yis// legs bkod nam mkha'i che 'phral ston// kun tu bzang pos nyar sdang zhing // 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs bcas kyis// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro'i gnas dag tu// gsang ba'i rgya yis bta
331b4(rnying rgyud): byas pa// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nas// kun bzang dgongs pa skong byed pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la snang // yan lag phyogs btur rgyas par byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i myu gu yis// khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la ston// mtha' 'khor
331b5(rnying rgyud): sham+b+ha li zhes par// de yi gtsor gyur 'jig rten mgon// shA ro b+ha gi lha yi bu// rnam sbrul bkod pa mchod dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin// dbang bsgyur yongs rdzogs der 'byung gis// khyod rnams bshang bar ma pyad cig/ ces bka' stsal nas
331b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das he ru ka yum dang gnyis su med pa sgra'i zhing bkod pa dang bcas pa chos kyi dbyings su thim par gyur to// 'khor 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gsung rjes su bsgrub cing thug zhi ba chos gyi skur mthong bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan
331b7(rnying rgyud): 'das 'arjes su yi rangs shing mngon par bskyed de// ba bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ phyi mangs pa dang byung ba bstan pa'i laT ste bdun pa'o// / zlab can pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yid bzhin gyi yon tan chen po
332a1(rnying rgyud): ngas par bstan pa ngas dzugasas/ 'dab gshegs pathams cad 'as da kun kyad pa dzumags gang bshad pa gas/ gangal la bas/ zab sa pa pa bdun yod pa/
332a2(rnying rgyud): mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bo ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i blang po'o// gter bya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta shAn+ta sa mA dza mU la ma hA tanA nA ma/ nga
332a3(rnying rgyud): skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rang byung gi rgyal po de nyid/
332a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba ma bcos pa'i thig le chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang la mnal te bzhugs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo de nyid/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje'i chus brlan par mdzad de/ dpal kun tu bzang po la thugs rje'i rol pa tshad med pa zhes
332a5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i glus bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la mnal ba la/ byams pa chen po'i thugs rjes sad par mdzad de/ yul sems can la rab tu dmigs pa dang lam la dmigs pa dang / kun tu dmigs pa med pa
332a6(rnying rgyud): dang / stong pa chen po las rab tu skyes pa'i rtsal ma 'gags pa las/ byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa/ brjod pa thams cad las 'das pa chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i yi ge a zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ skye ba med pa las sgra 'di byung ngo // e ma ho
332a7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gdal ba'i klong // e ma ho snying rje rgyan chad med/ e ma to gsal ba'i yig 'brur shar/ e ma ho yon tan dpag tu med// e yaM baM laM raM b+h+rUM/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye nas ma bcos rdzogs sangs rgyas// snod bcud rnam rtog gis brtag
332b1(rnying rgyud): nga// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che// nam mkha' rlung chus dang me// gdod nas rnam dag yum lnga'i mkha'// ngo mtshar gzhal med sna tshogs dang // dag pa'i ye shes gzhal med khang // gdan khri 'od kyi snang ba rnams// zhi ba rol pa'i gdan mchog
332b2(rnying rgyud): ste// dag pa chen po'i 'jig rten las// mdag pa ni yod ma yin// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags las// ma dag pa yi khams su snang // yum lnga'i mkha' klong dag pa las// ye shes 'byung chen rnam lnga ste// ye shes lnga las gzhal yas 'od/
332b3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa can gyis shes par bya// zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang / snang grags kyi dngos po thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i phyir/ 'di ltar snod du snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams su byin gyis brlabs/
332b4(rnying rgyud): so// de yang 'byung ba rnam par dag pa nam mkha' yongs su dngas pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i mkha' klong / ye shes chen po'i nam mkhar lhan gyis grub par bstan to// de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni spol
332b5(rnying rgyud): ma'i mkha' klong rnam par dag par bstan to// chu'i dkyil 'khor ni mA ma kI'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i dkyil 'khor ni spyan ma'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o// me'i dkyil 'khor ni gos dkar mo'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o// 'di ltar nang
332b6(rnying rgyud): gzhal med khang rnam par dag pa gdan dang bcas pa ni/ yu ma thams cad kyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'dus pa ni/ lha'i gzhal yas 'jig rten pa'i yon tan las 'das pa ste/ shar phyogs ni shel gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/
332b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs ni gser gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ nub phyogs ni pad+ma draga'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ byang phyogs ni in+dan la'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ dbus kyi cha ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin las grub pa'i ye shes kyi sa gzhi yongs su dag par// 8
333a1(rnying rgyud): brtsegs par snang ba yang ye shes lnga'i dang bzhin/ thams cad rang bzhin sutig dang / shAl dang / gsung dang / patha drug dang / mnyan la 'ang du mas/ dad bang gyi snang bas rab tu brtsigs pa'i gzhal las dang
333a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i 'tsho sa smras pa/ gru chad glo 'bur du bcas pa/ khyams dang sgo'i g.yas g.yon rdo rdo kabs brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan gyis sbas pa/ dzi la bA dang zar tshags dang / rin po che phagu'i brtsigs pa/ ngar gyi lnga khris brkun pa/ yid las
333a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchod pa chen po dang / rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul te/ rta babs kyi rgyan chen po bzhi dang bcas pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ rdo rje'i thog phub pa/ zag pa med pa'i pha ba chen pos gtibs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i to/
333a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'jig rten pa'i gdan khri'i rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir pho brang gi dbus su saM las seng ge'i gdan dang / shar du hi las glang po che'i gdan dang / lhor g+hi las rta'i gdan dang / nub tu maM las rma bya'i gdan dang /
333a5(rnying rgyud): byang du khaM las shang shang gi gdan dang / de dag gi steng rnams dang / phyogs dang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu dang grwa rnams su/ skyon rnam par dag pa'i rtags su baM las pad+ma'i gdan dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
333a6(rnying rgyud): gyi gdan dang / thugs rje chen pos rjes su bsil bar mdzad pa'i rtags su zla ba'i gdan rnams bkod cing sprul te byin gyis brlabs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos dbyings rnam dag ye nas rdzogs pa las/
333a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i don phyir cho 'phrul slar bstan pa// 'jig rten sdod kyi rnam par rtog pa kun// yi nas dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen te// ma bcos spyan rdzogs lha rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam dag gdan dang bcas pa dang gis gsal// che ba'i
333b1(rnying rgyud): chog dpal chan kun du bzang // gnyis mad rol pa lta ga tsha 'phrul ston// snang phrad chos la gyon med gzhal yas nyid// rang byung can pa 'i zhi pa khams dag pa 'dir// brdad rtsi sems cad mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'is// gzugs pa zhang chu
333b2(rnying rgyud): pas gang bar mdzad// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang bstan pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzugs bzan gyi la
333b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas de ma thag tu snying rje chen po skye ba med pa las byung ba'i yi ge a de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sang ge'i khri gdan dang bcas pa'i steng du babs par gyur to// de'i 'od zer gyi rna
333b4(rnying rgyud): pa las gzugs kyi sku dpag tu med pa spros te/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par song nas/ 'gro ba thams cad dag pa'i sa la bkod ste/ de yang kha cig tu ni chos kyi sras 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// kha cig tu rna mongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sras 'gro ba'i don mdzad
333b5(rnying rgyud): rdo/ kha cig tu ni sprul pa'i sgras 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// de bzhin du kha cig tu ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / kha cig tu ni bram ze dang / kha cig tu ni khyim bdag dang / kha cig tu ni tshong dben
333b6(rnying rgyud): dang / kha cig tuni dmag dpon dang / kha cig tu ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang rje gto can dang / byol song la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gshegs nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus par zad par mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku gsung thugs
333b7(rnying rgyud): la mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul te/ slar rang gis bon al 'dus pas/ rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa'i bdag nyid du gyur te/ slar yang rdo rje de nyid las gzugs kyi d+ha'i 'od zer kye rang bzhin can snga ma bzhin du spos shing 'dus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang /
334a1(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pathugs kar bzung ba/ g.yon pas dril bu dkul brten pa/ mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad rgyas rab tu brgyan cing 'od 'dom gang
334a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang bcas pa/ phyogs sbyong ba brgyad kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du dad cing lhags te bskor bas mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid la dmigs pa dang ma bral ba/ thugs rje byams pa'i stobs mnyen zhing lhag pa/ gzhang
334a3(rnying rgyud): yang sku'i cha lugs tshul mdzes pa dgu dang bcas par bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos rigs kyi phung po lnga yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka'i dbus kyi mdun las hUM mchi
334a4(rnying rgyud): ga 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa byung ste/ hUM mthing ga de las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog mthing ga rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas mdzad pa'i phrin las/ sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /
334a5(rnying rgyud): par mdzad nas slar 'dus nas/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i mdun du rang nyid ji lta ba'i lum dang lhan cig tu seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// de nas dpal kun tu bzang po'i dbu'i gtsug tor nas/ oM dkar po las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po 'khor lo dar dril bu 'dzin
334a6(rnying rgyud): pa byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyis thugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin dag par byas nas tshur byon te/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la glang po che'i khri la rang nyid ji lta ba'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du dbu'i g.yas
334a7(rnying rgyud): gyogs nas sA las rin chen 'byung ldan sgra mdog ser po rin po che dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas sems can gyi tshor ba'i phung po sbyangs nas/ lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs la d+ha'i khri steng du rang gi lha mo dang 'khod par gyur to// ltag
334a8(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi thugs kanas hU~M oM swA d+hi hA zhes 'od zer mdog pa tshogs dang bcas pa byung ste/ d+hUHming dgi' bas bcom ldan 'das/ sogs kyang chub/
334b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyogs nas hrIHdmar po las snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu bsnams pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyi phung po dag par mdzad de/ nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du rma bya'i khri la rang gi lha mo dang 'khod par
334b2(rnying rgyud): gyur to// g.yon gyi phyogs nas hA ljang gu las don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi 'du byed kyi phung po dag par mdzad de tshur byon nas/ byang du 'khor lo'i rtsibs la mkha' lding gi khri steng du rang
334b3(rnying rgyud): nyid lta bu'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kun bzang yangs pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes rol pa sgyu ma'i skur bstan pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // phrag
334b4(rnying rgyud): dog ma spangs rgyal ba'i sbyar snang ba// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes rnams// rang dag rang zhi mnyam pa chen po las// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med lhun gyis rdzogs// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med// ces gsungs so//
334b5(rnying rgyud): zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos thugs rje ye shes chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yul dang yul de'i bdag po yongs
334b6(rnying rgyud): su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de ma thag tu/ spyan dang / ljags dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / sku dang / thugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po mdog dkar po rin po che'i myu gu 'dzin pa phyung ste/
334b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dag par sbyangs te/ tshur gyon nas steng gi phyogs su 'khod do// de bzhin du nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser po rol gri bsnams pa/ byams pa dmar ser klu shing gun d+he bsnams pa/ spyan ngas
335a1(rnying rgyud): gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma 'dzin pa/ phyag rdo rdo rje ljang bu dril bu bsnams pa/ kun bzang dkar po rin po che'i ske ma 'dzin pa/ sgrib pa rnams la ser po po ti bsnams pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar ser po ti dang ut+pal 'dzin pa
335a2(rnying rgyud): rnams phyung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag par sbyangs te/ tshur 'dus nas shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyod
335a3(rnying rgyud): dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dag tu zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du rang rang gi yum/ lha mo la s+ye dkar mo rgya gram 'dzin pa dang / mA le sngon mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / gI ra ti dmar mo pi wang gi chud 'dren par byed ma dang / nI
335a4(rnying rgyud): te ljang gu gar bsgyur ma dang / bdug pa ma dkar mo spos sprin 'phro ba dang / mdzes ma ser mo me tog 'dror ba dang / gsal byed ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa dang / dag byed ma ljang gu byug pa byed pa ste/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nis dpal kun tu bzang pos
335a5(rnying rgyud): bdud thams cad mthar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de ma thag tu nyid kyi sku'i mdun dang rgyab dang g.yas g.yon gyi phyogs nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'od zer dang bcas pa phyung pas khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / gshin rje'i gshed ces
335a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / rta mgrin dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / bdud rtsi thal sbyor zhes bya ba rnams su mdog dkar po dang / mthi ga dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dag/ phyag gi be con lcags kyu dang thod dbyug zhags pa dang / pad+ma lcags drog dang / rgya gram dril bu 'dzin pa
335a7(rnying rgyud): dag phyung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / phung po dang / lha dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi tshogs thams cad bcom nas slar byung ba gzhal yas khang gi sgo bzhi/ shar gyi sgo dang /
335b1(rnying rgyud): lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su pad+ma'i steng dang zla ba'i steng du 'khong bar dUr to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'gro ba rnams zhib chen pos rab tu 'dul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhug nas/ nga ma thag tu mra'i blang bag gi gnas dang phyag dang /
335b2(rnying rgyud): zhabs kyi mthil dag nas/ sprul pa'i dge sbyong chen po drug byung nas spro bar mdzad pa ni/ dkar po pi wang 'dzin pa dang / sngon po go cha 'dzin pa dang / ser po gsil byed 'dzin pa dang / mthing ga po ti 'dzin pa dang / dmar po rin po che'i sgom 'dzin pa dang /
335b3(rnying rgyud): me dang chu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dag/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ rigs drug tu snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams rang rang gi sdug brdal gyi dngos po thams cad sbyangs nas/ slar rang gi gnas su phyogs drug gi gdan pa 'khod par gyur to// de nas yus
335b4(rnying rgyud): tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mkha' ltar dag pa'i thugs// bsam 'das gnyis med thig le chen po las// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'gro la rab bstan pa/ sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ci yang sa ler ston// mig dang rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce// yid
335b5(rnying rgyud): chos gzugs bla dri ngo reg dang chos// dbang po tshogs brgyad dngos yul ma lus pa// ma spangs rang dag ye nas lhan rdzogs pa// rgyal tshab sras po byang chub sems dpa'i sku// bde gshegs mnyes mdzad mchod sprin lha mor bcas// yab yum thabs rang shes
335b6(rnying rgyud): rab snyoms 'jug pas// dges mdzad chags pas ye shes gnyis su med// gshin rje bgegs dang dag pa'i pad+ma dang // shes rab chen pos mthar thug sar phyin pa// khro chen rgyal po ye shes sgo bzhir gsal// 'gugs 'dren 'ching sdom rab tu dgyes
335b7(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// lha dang lha min mi dang dud 'gro dang // yi dgas dmyal tshogs 'jig rten ma lus pa// nges don dbyings su ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // thub mchog sbal sku dge sbyong bla na med// ces gsungs so// de ltar dpal kun tu bzang pos/ zhing chen po'i
336a1(rnying rgyud): d+hA/ la pas gzugs dang bla'i chos thams cad sdod dang bcud yi nas rnam par dag pa/ phyogs bcu kun Ta d+ha yongs sum chad pa 'ad kyil 'khor tan dang rton par bcas pa/ dag pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis bzangs pa thams cad mar
336a2(rnying rgyud): spyan gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
336a3(rnying rgyud): cad ci ye shes la 'jug pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs mthag \u0f7f/ yum kun tu bzang mos klu'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun no// @
336a4(rnying rgyud): shes gsal ba dri med pa/ byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// zhes ga rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad gnyis su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di
336a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// e ma sems ni lus kyi rtsa ba ste// lus kyang sems kyi snang ba'o// sems kyang tshig tu mtshon pa ste/ tshig ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid// e ma kun tu bzang po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me
336a6(rnying rgyud): bskyong bas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad//
336a7(rnying rgyud): kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e mchos rnams phye ba med pa te// yi ga med cing gnas med la// rtogs pa'i drabar ba thangs pa// bskyed par bya ba'i don mchog yin// zhes gsungasas// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chan 'byung ldan thos byed rlung
336b1(rnying rgyud): mapas 'dagagrangs pa/ ma dngas pa cad dag dngas mang na// chas kyimatshan nyid blang ba yin// bdag sod chom las lags byung ba'o// byang zlab sams ni bstan pa lan// sa gsungs sa// danas bcom ldan 'das pa dadag sa bas na
336b2(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs sa// a ma dngas pa skye ba med pa las// dngas pa ma cing bsam du med// namamakha'ag 'phangs banasas// de ltar ngas rnams brjid// chas gsangs sa// de nas pacom ldan 'ad zhin yod grub pas byang chub kyisepas 'dig zu
336b3(rnying rgyud): emachos rnams rang bzhin 'dagasam ba// gdong nas dag cing rtog pa med// sems can mad cing thog sang med// sangs rgyas med cing byang chub med// ces gsungs so// de nas pa snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyisams 'anag
336b4(rnying rgyud): gsa'as pa dang dgas dang rgya par shes// dbang ba phra hU~M nga gan// ma n+deb shAng ba mang pas na// myang na 'das pa'i sa la gyun// zhes gangs so// dag 'dras pa'i rnal pa dgagis kyang chu kyi pa dgasang /
336b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'byung ba nga // 'dod dang rtsings pa drug bsngal tha~Mng // 'di dag na rabs spyang // brnyag namang ba kyi yang med// nas gsungs sa// de nas tho chen pa 'dres nga chu kyi mas da gagrangasas// mAm 'dig cags na pa yon pa \u0f7f// pa 'a
336b6(rnying rgyud): gtung // mu ga sa nam mdamags pas+ho// kam byas nga byed gangs mgru// agasangs// zhi ba 'dul pa cu ba rgyad las/ byang chub sems mas pa da du 'du sa pas
336b7(rnying rgyud): dpal phrin pang po nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pargya da pa ba na / byags bcun bkrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grags kyang bskul sngags par byung ngas de bzhin gsheg pa pa kran bang ba gang nabadang gshegs sa
