337b3(rnying rgyud): chen kun bzang rdo rje 'chang // rigs kun bdag po rigs kyi gtso// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog/ rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhun rdzogs pa// sprul dang bsam dang bri ba dang // rin chen rnams las brtsig pa ru// gnas kyi khyad par gang dag tu// 'jug pa'i gang
337b4(rnying rgyud): zag 'di lta bus// ci 'dra ba yi tshul gyis 'jug/ rten pa bzhengs pa ji ltar mdzad// der ni ting 'dzin ci zhig gis// 'jug pa'i rim pa ji ltar 'tshal// dam tshig sdom pa ci zhig sbyin// nus par ldan cing phan pa gang // de yi bsnyen bsgrub ci ltar bgyi// dmigs
337b5(rnying rgyud): shing bskyed pa gang zhig lags// gsang sngags de yi bzla' thabs gang // rdzogs dang rab rdzogs ji lta bu// de dang mthun pa'i spyod pa gang // de dag 'bras bu ji tsam zhig/ ma 'ongs skyes bu 'dul don du// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsol reg/ ces gsol pa
337b6(rnying rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// sgrub pa po phan bya ba'i phyir// dzaM lta khyod kyis spobs pa bzhin// rim pa'i tshul gyis bshad par bya// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/
337b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul bar dgongs dang gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don nyid ni// sgras btags len ni ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sras don 'byin thabs// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung // sdod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan//

338a2(rnying rgyud):  sa pa mas pa gyu ga pa sa sa pa gas su sa
338a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'pho ba kun 'dul byer// rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ ma bcos dbyings su rdzogs papa na/ dzo bying surab tu rjod// di don bya thag bdam yas pas// rang bzhin sdang dang byin gyis brlas// yid las byung dang 'du byed dang // myur ba'i 'du byed las rnams te// gsang mchog
338a4(rnying rgyud): spyan thub 'ogro min dri// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang gis gsal// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlabs te sprul par bya// dring srong chen por ba 'jigs shing // ma mo mkha' 'tshwa'i tshogs gnas shing // ri dwags gcan gzan chub

339b1(rnying rgyud): mang dugs pa// thad rnams pa nam chod pa dang // slob mthan la pan gdags byed// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// sang ni dkyil 'khor thi lags rgyas// gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// bya byas rlab cang dbang bslar bad// don pa na canam na

339b7(rnying rgyud): sems / dag khyen// pa mamang nings sa mthug/ spyod pa 'ad sa dzin no// gzhang yong ngas thas cud dpa dang // thug nga pa'i mi @// ban pa sa /
340a1(rnying rgyud): lung ston che ba brjod pa ni// dge ba'i rtags sungs lung bstan// de las bzlog pa'i rtags rnams kun// ngan par bshad de gang mthong yang // tshogs bsags dag pa'i don la'ang // bsgyur zhing blta ba'i cho ga bya// de ltar /
340a2(rnying rgyud): tubartags nas na// bla ma dpal chen nyid la bshad// de steng dge'o zhes sma na// rmi lam la brten dngos grub blang // mi dge sprul sbyin bsreg bya// gsang sngags cho ga rnams kyis bzlog/ 'di ni sta gon cho ga ste// kun tu bzang po nga yis bshad// de ltar rdzobs
340a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud sbyangs nas// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i phyir// bsod nams tshogs ni sngon 'gro bas// ting 'dzin rim pa rdzogs byas la// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dmigs pas bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs shing // gnyis med bstim zhing mchog
340a4(rnying rgyud): pas mchod// bstod de so so'i sngags bzlas nas// slob ma'i mig la brda' byas te// mchod bstod gsol bas rgyud sbyangs nas// sems bskyed rigs kyi sdom pa gzung // dam tshig bsgrags shing bro bor la// ye shes sems dpa' snying la dbang //
340a5(rnying rgyud): AHhUM a we sha ya a a/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo bzhi nas// phyag rgya dang ni mchod bstod bya// de nas me tog phreng ba dag/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus dag tu// gtso bo'i spyi bor rab tu gtor// de nyid blangs te mgo la bcings// gdong g.yogs brda phye dkyil 'khor
340a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dmachog chen po'i sdom pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin
340a7(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gang zhugs pas// srungs shing sdom par bya ba dag/ spyi dang khyad par lhag pa yi// rnam par dbye bas bzung bya ste// so sor thar dang byang chub
340b1(rnying rgyud): sems// bya snod rnal 'byor rgyud rnams las// bsrung bar bya ba gang gsungs pa// thun mong sgra/ yi dmatshig yin// khyad par bya brag bsrung bya ba// rtsa bar gyur pa bzhi dag dang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// ji ltar smon dang 'dug pa yi// byang chub sems gsum bsgom/
340b2(rnying rgyud): yis// rdo thugs kyi dmachog gi// rang nyid yi dam lha tshogs gi/ sngags dang phyag rgyang ba'i 'don pa// dus kun d+ha ni rgyun mi gcod// rdo rje gsung gi dmatshig yin// rgyud bgrel dbang bskur de nyid bstan// bla ma nyid dang lhan cig 'grogs// lus dag yid kyi
340b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sku yi dmachog go// gzhan yang sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// bye brag phye ba gsang ba'i snod// blta zab spyod pa bslab pa dang // ming gzungs rtogs pa grub pa'i rtags// dus rnams kun tu gsang bar bya// bsgrub gnas rdzas dus grogs rnams ni// khyad par
340b4(rnying rgyud): dus su gsang // gzhan yang slob dpon mched dang lham// gsang ba bsgrags dang gnas skabs dang // de ltar 'os pa shin tu gsang // gsang bar bya ba 'di rnams kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang // rdza na dang ngag brlang brjod
340b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// thabs mchog nges pas zin pa yis// gnas skabs gsal bar shes par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // ngartsal phrag dog nyon mongs lnga// rang bzhin shes pas mi spang ste// rang rig ye shes nyid yin no// dri chen dri rma sha chen po/ @
340b6(rnying rgyud): byeng chub sems kyi rgya// bdud rtsi mchog rdzas chen wa// rdorje 'dzin pas dag par blang // sangs rgyas rdo rjes dpa' dang // rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med// don med pa dang rnam snang mdzad// ye shes lha yi rang bzhin te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /
340b7(rnying rgyud): phrin las lnga ru rab tu bslab// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam ma pa'i khams gzugs tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed tshor ba dang // mig sogs 'dzin dang de yul lnga// rgyal ba yang yum byang chub sems// mchod pa'i lha mi tshogs su bsgrub// gzhung ngan lhag par
341a1(rnying rgyud): dam chag na// rab tu nyug par 'asrung ba // gtan gzhan rgyam pa'i khrimi bshog/ zam tog gsasmra// rin can lhag zhan ma bsreg cig/ kun pol ltas byung ste// pacu bana'abru' mgasod// drug
341a2(rnying rgyud): snod du bcud mi zlag/ don dang mi ldan ngas mi byed// shel zhing 'dam du bsgyur mi bya// mdag snod du drug pa med// yid bzhin no bum batheg // byung chen gshig pa'i ya med thal// gnam lcags srung mo'i mtshan mi gdab// gcan gzan gang pa'i lhag

343a1(rnying rgyud): pa nyid du gyur// 'phro 'dra las kyi sbyor ba yis// las kun mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// rtog pa'i rlung dang chu rnams kun// mI shigs pa dang bdud rtsi'i rgyu// brtan byed yid bzhin 'byung ba ni// sgrol ma mA ma kI dang stan// rang gi ma

345b2(rnying rgyud): pa yang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub ste// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur/ de bas da nyid rtogs bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen lam// rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen por bshad// 'khor 'das dus gsum phyogs bcu yi// rdzas dang dngos
345b3(rnying rgyud): dag/ rnam shes 'byung ba phung po dang // yul dang skye mched bsam pa ste// 'di dag rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin pas// phung po lnga ni yab lngar rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum lngar rdzogs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad// yul brgyad sems ma byad du sa/
345b4(rnying rgyud): mu padi blo bzhir gnas pa te// sa ba'i nyon mongs thub badrug/ yid kyi byed pa kun tu bzang // chos su bya bkran pazang ma// ye nas mnyam du gnas pa la// phyi nas btsal zhing bsgrub tu byed// sngar bzhin dbyings su gshegs pas na// de bzhin gshe
345b5(rnying rgyud): bye bdebs na// per bar gshegs tordzogasas sa rgyas// maspangs pa nyid blangs pa te// mthab pas na thob par mchog/ gtang ba dan mthu da thos// theg pa gcig go mthar thug pa// ga Na rkyor ba'i cho sanas// sems dpa chen nga
345b6(rnying rgyud): sa / sa
345b7(rnying rgyud): ngas /
346a1(rnying rgyud): rten pa'i gzhi ni gzhal yas khang // longs spyod mchod pa'i tshogs chen po// pham bu dang bu mo ni// yab yum sras dang sras mo ste// phyi nang 'khor ni nye du dang // bran 'bangs mngag gzhug la sogs yin// dang po nyid na sogs pas na
346a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rdzogs pa zhes bya ste// snang ba sna tshogs sprul pa'i sgra// rtog pa longs spyod rab rdzogs te// mi rtog ye shes chos skur rdzogs// 'di la ma rdzogs zhes brjod pa'i// skal med de dag 'khor bar lhung // de bas rdzogs pa'i tshul shes pa'i// rnal 'byor
346a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po ni// gnas gsum sbyor ba ci 'dra yang // ngo bo nyid kyis sku gsum rdzogs// ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i gdeng thob pas// de dag myur du mngon dpung phyir// rig pa'i spyod pa mngon dbyung bya// sngon bzhin spyad par bya ba ste// dang por spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/
346a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten mi mthun phyogs// rang la gnod pa gzhan la spang // phan pa'ang de bzhin bsrub par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni phan gnod bral// ma rungs bkren dang dakhrugs pa dang // dbang dang ngag med log lta can// chags dang zhen pa yongs mi 'dor// de nyid mchog
346a5(rnying rgyud): gyugyur la spang // 'phags pa snying rje'i gnas min te// lam gyi grogs sug la 'gyur// rlom sems khe grags phan yon dang // phrag dog can dang dbang med 'gyod// bsams pa'i dri mas 'bags pa min// gnas dang spang ba gnod pa'i yul// rang bzhin bslab ba stso
346a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan// bzod cing ma chags don dang bcas// dka' ba spyod nus spyod pa'i grogs// dus 'dir ma rungs ma phan cing // 'khrul pa'i gnas ngan yul yin no// thabs dang rnam 'phrul ma dag blta// stong pa snying rje can sto zhing // rlabs chen 'jug pa pha rol 'angs//
346a7(rnying rgyud): rdzo bden pa'i dag pa'o// dus gsum ngon yod bcas pa dang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs// 'tsho ba bdud rtsi bzhin du spyad// dran dang shes pa bag yod bsten// dge dang sdig pa'i byed pa bgrang // bsngo phyag cig las gzhan du min// sgyu ma skra brnyan rmi lam
346b1(rnying rgyud): bdag dang dngos po sems can dag/ dbye ba med cing yongs ma thab// gus shing ma 'dres ltos pa med// nyon mongs med par spyad pa ni// thun mong chos su spyod pa'o// dman pa'i bden 'grus mi smon cing // gcig pung zhel gnas pa// yul gsum sa
346b2(rnying rgyud): slor ba ste// mdus dbye ba med pa'o// khyad par 'di mi spyod pa ni// dkyil 'khor gsum dang mtshang ba lnga// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma lus pa// rtse ba yan lag brnyas pa dag/ nga shi de nyid yo shes pas// rdzogs par longs spyod de nyid do// bdul drugs
346b3(rnying rgyud): gang 'dzin pa'i// byes bu dam pa'i rjes su zhugs// phyi dang rlung gi gsang gyur dang // rab tugasang pa'i dus dag tu// rang gi spyod pa yo du mi 'dor// mkhan pa slob dpon lha rnams dang // nyan thos dang rgyal sems dpa' drang // 'jig rten pa la ba rung //
346b4(rnying rgyud): lhan cig ga dang min// gang gang gis dmigs pade// mchog sung dgas kyi rting bung // de las rdzogs pa'i 'bras pa ni// gdong nas dag pa'i zhing khams la// dag dang mdag gnyis med phying // bral nga thob pa mi dmigs cang // ming tshig tum kyi 'bras dun
346b5(rnying rgyud): ma'ongs rgyas bu drang ba dang // la mngon bslab phyir rab tu snang // rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin dang ni// ngo bo nyid dang spyod pa'i tshogs// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// 'bras bu zhes su bshad pa ste// bsrung cing rtsol bag la yod// mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi spos dang bral/
346b6(rnying rgyud): dang dper byas gzugs sna tshogs// thang nga mthong ba 'bras bu ste// grub pa'i dngos pa yong ma myong // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'og min gsang ba'i pho brang sdang // zhing gi bkod pa sna tshogs dag/ med pa nyid kyis phyogs bcur khyab// 3
346b7(rnying rgyud): babyed dang drug sogs kyi// rnam par byedang myong ba dang // sna tshogs rigs kyi 'khor wa tshogs// rtogs par ngadabyung ba'i rus// skye 'gag tag chad 'gro dang 'ong // yod ma mtha' 'as rang 'das shing // gdod nas gnas dang bsgom pa yis// zhing
347a1(rnying rgyud): bu 'khor lo dang // thabs dang shes rab gcig nyid kyis// brtags shad snang ba tsam du 'gyur// mchog rgyur dman rang bar ma'i sku// sna tshogs las kyang sna tshogs te// rigs nga mthun pa'i bdagazhen pas// ches lhag yung
347a2(rnying rgyud): yin// gnas skabs mthar thug dus dang thabs// thun mong khyad par yongs su 'byung // ma lus pa dang mnor pa'i// rang dang gzhan gyi snang ba yi// yod dang med pa'i mtha' 'dzin pa// shes dang mi shes rtog pas ngas// de la grib byed khon dngas//
347a3(rnying rgyud): dri mdag/ rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// las kyi mtha' yis de mi mthong // bslab cing thom pa bsrung las rnams// dman pa'i las la ched lhag pa// nyon mongs pa las rang dga' ba// thar med gnas kyis bgrib pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang spring po dang /
347a4(rnying rgyud): sreg bsngal byed pa tha dang dang // shes bya yul dang yul can dang // mthong dang bsgom dang rtogs pa yis// gnyen po rim gyis stobs gyur ba// de nyid kyis kyang mthong mi nus// kun rdzo ba don dam rang bzhin shes// bde ba dang ni lkug pa
347a5(rnying rgyud): du sbrul du min// bag la nyal gyi rnam pa yang // blta ba'i chos kyis de mi mthong // gzugs brtan mthong dang ma bsdams dang // mnyam nyid rab tu rtags pa dag/ byab rjes basmra ba spu gsung thugs// phrin las sngon 'grorjes su byed// dras gsum
347a6(rnying rgyud): chags shing // theg pa med la bstan du med// ma bsgrubs pa yis lhun gyis grub// ma bltas pa yis mthong dri ste// ma lus mkhas pas thob pa'o// shes dab shes bya skad cig ma// g.yos pa med par ba gis gnas// mabs blam thob dam
347a7(rnying rgyud): ma brtags ma shes mthang drug ste// 'du 'bral med pa 'bras bu yin// zhes bka' stsal to// zhib 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ su gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
347b1(rnying rgyud): na dus mya na cas bka' sa la nas/ tid kyi ga ga smrasas dang nas pa byin pa rnams kyi nam par ma 'dathapa kyang ca pa nga nga ma yangs 'gas par dadag byung / drus gsu thags pa sa sa byas thams cad kyi shA
347b2(rnying rgyud): kyigru bo chen po dang bcas pa rnams rab tung ces shing yi rung bas 'ong zer gyi rnam pa dpag tu med par gyur nas/ yang khams gsum pa'i dngos po ma lus par spangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi su la jim par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal ngan n+ta bzang po nyid ni lus da
347b3(rnying rgyud): su med par slar yang chos ting zhi ba'i slong rnam par dag pa'i dbyings de nyid du mnal te bzhugs nas/ phyi ma'i 'gro ba'i don pasam kyis mi thub pa dag la rang bzhin gyis dgongs nas mi 'da' ba nyed du mdzad do// zhib 'dus pa rgya ba rgyad cer bye ba/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil ra
347b4(rnying rgyud): po'i dgongs pa rdzogs so// / rgya gang gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po padz+ra byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo d+hi ba za ro tsan bdag gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i blad pe'o// gter hU~M/ sras rgya/ gtad bya/ #/
347b5(rnying rgyud): dgeg/ cag / dang / hUMrtag wAn ma d+ha/ d+hi mA pa taN+Da ma/ bad skang du/ bcom lda rnaMngs dpal rgyam ga 'angs ba'i byud ces thab/ bcom ldan da sa dpal dun tu bzang ba ga sa dug la rgyag ma/
347b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rnam par dag pa thA ga yangs pa'i klong chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyings bsdam gyis mi khyad pa
347b7(rnying rgyud): rin pa che sna tshogs las byas pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par 'phro ba/ dur khrod chen po'i nang 'jigs par byed pa na/ sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa chen pos bzhugs pa'i tshe/ gsang ba chen po'i 'khor dpag tu med pa'i dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ deng don
348a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rab tu rnam par snang mdzad pa dang / rab tu mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / rdo rje rol pa dang / sa rngon ma dang / chu rdo ri ma dang /
348a2(rnying rgyud): rje ma dang / rlung rdo rje ma dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje ma dang / gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum du snang ba dpag tu med pa dag dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / kun nas khro ba dang / zhing gi bkod pa rnam par snang bang
348a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu rdzogs pa'i gzhal med khang gi rnam par snang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang / sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sprul pa dang / bran dang bran gyi yang bran gyi tshogs dang / brjod ces mi langs pa'i yang brjod kyis ma langs pa rnams
348a4(rnying rgyud): yang thabs cig go// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bltas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po hA ruka/ che ba'i tshe mchog kun gyi gtso// dpal ldan rje btsun 'gror ri mgon// khye
348a5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi bdag/ rnam par zhe las khro mdzad cing // nam mkha'i mtha' khyab gzhal med khang // dag cing gtsang ba'i ngang nyid las// dur khrod ltar mdzad ci yi phyir// chags med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// shes rab snyoms mdzad ci zhig lag
348a6(rnying rgyud): su ma lta bu'i chos nyid la// khyod kyis nges par mdzad pa gang // gzhan yang khyod kyi chos nyid las// rnam par 'phrul ba ma lus pa'i// don de dang 'dir bstan du gsol// a la la ha zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor
348a7(rnying rgyud): da ces bka' rdul to// kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ sems rab tu dang bas nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ sngon pal pa chen pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dgu brgyargya dgu 'das pa'i ring sngon 'bu ba rkang pa chen pog
348b1(rnying rgyud): parab tu dga' ba zhes pa bral/ 'jig rten gyi lam lung dka' ba zhes byang ba zhig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ skyes bu 'dul ba// ba la~M lgang ba/ bla na med pa/ 'jig rten mthun pa/ lha dang dran
348b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur pa/ zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang po chen po don gyi de khon nyid yang dag par nges pa dang / de skye sa pa dang
348b3(rnying rgyud): tshul du rnam par brjod pa dang / sgra'i tshul de rnam par ma yin pa brjod pa dang / dgo dra zab mo'i tshul du 'arjod pa dang / rang gi don mngon sum du brjod pa'i sgo nas chos bstan pas 'dul ba gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs der 'dus pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa drag pos phyi ro
348b4(rnying rgyud): yul nye bar bzung nas/ rgyu'i khyad par dang 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / las dang las kyi khyad par ma brtags te/ spang bar bya ba rnams ni blangs la blang bar bya ba rnams ni spangs te/ gsang ba'i tshig la log par lta bar gyur pa'i dbang gis/ las mi bca pa dag po
348b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rim gyis nyams su myong bar gyur to// de nas yang bdag tsha ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las thar nas grang bar gyur na tsam drangs snyam pa dang / pad+ma lta rags pa la sogs pa grang pa'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa byang bar gyur to// de/
348b6(rnying rgyud): sems can dmyal ba chen po ji snyed pa rnams kyi nang du/ bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myangs te/ de las thar bar 'dod pa dang / yi dwags chen po rnams dang / byol song gi lus chen po dag tu skyes te/ bskal pa stong phrag ga
349a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ / gabar du sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar gyur // de nas yang las ngan gyi shugs ma bzad pa dpa gtsam bslabs par byungar nas/ sngon gyi tshwa nang gtum pa'i bgazugs kyi rgya mthun pas nying mtshams sbyar nas 'jig nan kyi bdag pa
349a2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po yab yum gnyis kyi sred pa blangs te yum gyi lhums na yang 'jigs pa'i sgra drag po 'byin pa la 'thon pa dang / yi dgas kyi gtsob srin po'i cha byad 'dzin pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rab rgya khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/ thal ba'i mdog can mig dam pa/ ral
349a3(rnying rgyud): pa rab tu 'bar bgyen du brjes pa/ kha gdangs pa'i mche ba gtsigs shing dri ngad dang kharlangs drag pos gzhan bskrad par nus pa/ dud 'gro gtso bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / srin po'i rgyal po pags pa lus la bgos pa/ mgo dang sbed pa dang / yan lag gi chog
349a4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni/ dug sbrul nag po kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgo bo phreng ba 'jigs su rung bas dkris pa/ lag padrug gi g.yas na ni/ tri shU la dang / thod pa dang / cang te'u dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang bcas pa'i dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri thogs pa/
349a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon na ni/ kha T+wAM ga dang / rgyu ma'i phreng ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / dbyug pa chen po dang / lcags kyu dang / gri gug dag bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ lus gcig la mgo brgya stong pa/ mgo gcig la lus brgya stong pa dang / yan lag nyid lag pa
349a6(rnying rgyud): sku'i tshogs rnams las mtshon cha'i tshogs du ma 'gyed par byed do// de'i las dang mthun pa'i chung ma srin mo nag mo 'gyed ti ma zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mdog nag cing ral pa 'khrigs pa kha mig nas me rab tu 'bar ba/ yan lag gi rnam par 'phrul pa
349a7(rnying rgyud): las kyang las kyi srin mo chen mo ze byed ma zhes bya ba dang / brag byed ma dang / chu byed ma dang / rlung byed ma dang / sham sham mo dang / skam pa mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / dri snom ma dang / chang 'thung ma dang / phor thogs ma dang / thod phreng ma dang /
349a8(rnying rgyud): 'ag rje ma yang /
349b1(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi ma dang / de dag la sogs pa 'byin pa/ de'i bran dang / pho nya tshogs dag kyang / khyi dang / wa dang / phag dang / stag dang / seng ge dang / bya rog dang / thug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khra ma dang / pra bud dang / bya la dang / bye ba dang
349b2(rnying rgyud): bre mo dang / TI ga pu'i mgo can gyi tshogs kyis rab tu bskor ba/ gzhan yang log sred can gyi rigs las byung ba'i min po dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung ngo'i tshogs rnams kyang zan du byas te/ de dgra thams cad kyang 'jigs tshu dran pa/
349b3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas te mtshon cha bzung zhing gdug pa'i daro sgrogs pa/ dbugs tshab dang rab tu mang ba'i rlung drag po phyogs bcud 'byin pa las/ rims dang drug dang / dbyig dug la sogs pa nad dang mtshon gyi char 'bab pas/ gtsang mang rigs kyi lha la sogs pa'i sems
349b4(rnying rgyud): na ma
349b5(rnying rgyud): bdun d+ha bsdu ba'i yid kyi phyi rol gyi yul dag la dngos po dang mtshon mang brtags nas bdag gi dgyur ba ni snong brgyad kyi ngas pa thams cad pa khyab par gnas so// yang na nga bdag med pa la mtshan ma'i mtshan mar brtags nas/ nga dang bdag tu bzung ba las byung bani/ dran
349b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshigs pa gnas par byed/ las dang las kyi 'bras bumatha' dag yongs su rgya cing med par bzung ba ma chu na/ sems can gyi khams ma mam pa'i ngag gi yul dang rnamam pa khams dang byud pa ste/ ni phyir nga'i grags pa phyogs bcu 'di bzhin gshags pa thams
350a1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi thug d+ha gcig pa'i snying rje chen pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dang phrin las kyi mang dab chen po song la yongs su skul te/ spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs shing sasol gyis sgras mngon par go bar mdza dang / phyogs bca'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
350a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang chos kyi su zhi ba chen po'i dnga'as gzugs kyi su la 'dzin pa'i blang ba bzhengs nas/ 'di ba ldan pa rna rgya ba rnam pas drangs pas/ de nyid til mi gang bri bzhin du gyur ba de byang chub kyi sems ldang ba kunas gsang ba'i lam nas byung ba ma sngor snang zhing yang rnam byed
350a3(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i ngo bor gnas pa/ dbugs dri zhim zhing ring par gyur par byed pa rdo rje'i sna'i rtse mo la dril zhing tha mi dad cing dbya ba med pa gsang ba'i pad+ma'i gesar gyi rtse mo la yang reg cing 'phro bar mdzad nas/ yum pa d+ma'i dbyings su nga ba pa rgya mtsho ltar bskyil ba la byin gyis blabs kyis/ nga 'phyag
350a4(rnying rgyud): rgya'i ngo bor gyur nas/ khro ma rdo rje dbang phyug ma yang 'od kyi tshul du snang bar sbyar bar mngon par 'du mdzad nas/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i sku nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i bskal pa'i me chen po dang ldan pa/ khrag gi rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas
350a5(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i rtsel/ du thod chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi gnas chen po bcud du sbal zhing sdang bar byas te/ skyes bu bdag tu lta ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ thugs rje'i shugs drag pa mngon du phyung nas/ de bas kyang zas lhag 'a rol
350a6(rnying rgyud): po'i cho 'phrul bstan cing de gdul ba'i phyir snang ba yin gyis/ khyed rnams nga'i sku dang gsung nga thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzad 'di la the tshom dang som nyi za bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'das pa rtsa ba'i rgyud pas/ de bzhin
350a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las yongs su mdzad pa gleng gzhi'i le'u sti dang po'o// / de nas yang 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa phyi ma'i tshe bye ma'i dus na phyogs
350b1(rnying rgyud): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i tshogs 'di dag chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong du ma gyur cing / khams gsum pa'i sa la snang bar gyur nas/ tshul 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i log sred can dag las rnam par ma dag pa 'byung ste/ bla na med
350b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dag la yang rab tu rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi sngon gyi phrin las ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bdag cag la brtse ba chen pos dgongs te/ yang dag par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
350b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku'i dang las gzugs kyi sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba thams cad kyi nang na che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa he ru ka chen po'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ gsung gcig gi dbyangs kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par mdzad ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs chen
350b4(rnying rgyud): dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum po yis// 'o dod 'bod cing
350b5(rnying rgyud): ltung bar gyur// mi bzad chen pos sdug bsngal te// dug gsum mkha' la mngon zhen pa'i// ji ltar mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gdul// srid gsum bdag po gdul ba'i phyir// nga rgyal chen po'i skur bstan te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas// khro mo dbang phyug mngon ltung ste/
350b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i cho 'phrul las// khro bo 'chol ba'i dmag bsdus nas// sngon gyi phrin las ji lta ba// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs par spyad// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo
350b7(rnying rgyud): las// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul 'chang khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rnams sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus spos ci dgos// thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa yi// kun tu bzang po de bzhin
351a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs// dmatshig la sdad rnam snang phying/ drung zlo ga kyi phyag rgyang gsal// oM mahA mI he d+ya/ kro tI shU d+his ma yad kyi shod+ha ya stan hU~M TA/ d+hi ma/ bzang po rdo rdzas mas// sangs rgyas rnams cad bkrus byas nas//
351a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud chen po// zhi bar bstan pas 'dul ma yin// khro bo'i tshogs kyis gdul bar bya// kha trang la ru tra A kar+d+ha ya ma te kha ru lu ru lu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de yis drag pa'i bdag po de// phung po nyam thag gan N+Dal ma na na// mgo bo lho Ta
351a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams su bsten// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su brkyangs// stong gsum 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'dzam bu'i gling gis yi char// dur khrod chen po brgyad du byas// de yi 'khor byung lha brgyang bskal// rang byung mchod rten chen po brkyang // srin mo sha ma sham mo la sogs
351a4(rnying rgyud): gnas las grub pa'i ma mo brgyad// yon tan brgyad ldan mkha' 'gros bsung // pho nya seng ge stag la sogs// rang gi lus dang mthun pas btul// zab mo la sogs pa yi// srin mo nyi shu brgyad rnams kyang // btul te bka' yi bsrung mar bzhag/ de
351a5(rnying rgyud): rnam shes hUM du bsgyur// byin brlabs sprul pa'i spyod mtshams su// 'phangs te rgyal ba'i sras su byas// thal bas brgyan pa'i zhing khams su// thal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan gyis// las kyi lhag ma tsam nyid las// rang dang
351a6(rnying rgyud): chos mthun tshar gcod cing // sgrol byed nag po chen po yin// de yi 'khor gyi thog mar byung // phyogs kyi dregs pa'i bdag po bcu// bskal cing tshar bcad 'dul byed pa'i// khro bcu'i zhabs kyi gdan yin no// gnod srin mo ni mig gcig ma// glog 'gu ma dang rlung
351a7(rnying rgyud): shugs can// klu 'dul ma rnams khyo dang bcas// bskal cing tsher bcad 'dul byed pa// mthar byed chen po brgyad rnams grul// de yi gnas dang pho brang yang // gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs// de yi phung po sha khrag ni// bdud rtsir dbyin gyis brlabs
351b1(rnying rgyud): rol// mdor na 'dod khams dbang phyug gis// dregs pa khyo shug g.yog 'khor bcas// ma lus bsgral zhing tshar bcad de// kha cig 'bor dang poltar mngag/ la la gnas dang gdan byas// mA 'ongs dus nA sgras bu dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kun nga //
351b2(rnying rgyud): sku gsum phrin las che ba'i mchog/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ he ru ka yi tshul 'chang ba// brtul zhugs bzang po de la ni// ma rig log par blta ba'i tshogs// bdud bzhi phyogs su gtogs rnams kyis// 'tsho zheng bar du gcod pa'am// gdug cing 'da' ba /
351b3(rnying rgyud): nus ma yin// de la 'di yi gzhi nyid kyang // ngo bo sems rgyun ma chad cing // tshig las 'da' bar mi bya ste// bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i tshig/ rtsa ba nyid du gyur pa ste// snyigs ma'i dus kyi ston pa dang // da lta sangs rgyas 'di dag la// tha dad du ni cung mi brtag/
351b4(rnying rgyud): gsar pa'i grogs dag kyang // de dang rjes su mthun par blta// sgo gsu ma gus pas brtson bya zhing // dam pa'i tshig las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin he ru ka yi tshogs// ming las byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen// spro bsngalas la sbyar ba dang // dus bzhi phyag rgya de nyid ni// sngags dang rna
351b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor ldan pa yis// kun ma chad par bsten cing mchod// nga yi thugs la mnyas bsam pa// rdzas dang ye byung gnas dang ngas// phyag rgya chog dkyil 'khor dag/ gsang bar 'os pa gas pa'i byang// 'di dag gan laganyerd du gtad// ngag 'acu lnga ye she lnga/
351b6(rnying rgyud): yang spang bar mi bya zhing // gshang gci khu ba sha dang khrag/ longs spyod chen po rtag tu rol// bsad cing du ste mi rig spyad// brdzun zhing cu ba la brlang ba'i tshig/ der ni rtag tu smra bar byos// phung po dang ni 'byung ba kun// nga yi rigs kyi yab yum ste// yul dang rnam shes
351b7(rnying rgyud): de yi 'khor// 'khor dang skye mched gzhan rnams kyang // de las byung bar shes pa yis// rigs kyi sku lnga rab tu bsgrub// mthong dang rig dang shes dang spyad// 'di las 'da' bar ma gyur na// log par blta ba 'dul nus shing // sangs rgyas rnams dang
352a1(rnying rgyud): nganyid 'jug/ bcom ldan 'das dngal rgyan rtog 'dus pas ba chud las/ bri ma mngon pas kyang bdam rdzog gcugasa'i'i ste gnyis pa'o// / dem gna'ab tugs da rna/
352a2(rnying rgyud): mngon sprul pa// chos kun gud na yang med de// nam mtha' yang pa'i dbyings nyid las// mi rtog rang byung thugs rje'i shugs// rang bzhin ma 'gags cing yang gsal// rnam par shes pa'i gzhi nyid kyang // brjid pa'i nus pa rgya dang ldan// dngos po
352a3(rnying rgyud): pa 'jig rten bsregs// bag chags sdug bsngal ma lus gtor// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i spyan lam babras// gti mug mi zad gter du gtams// zhesdang keng dus 'bar ba brtsegs// dug gsu mthong ba rna tshogs dang // lha klag na 'dang gyu ra bcas//
352a4(rnying rgyud): sbrul dang dus sbal dang // dregs pa rlung bskal ba yi// sha khrag sa pa pags pa dang // don snying sdod bcas rnams kyis brgyan// gzhal lus khang pa dur khrod bcas// gang gis 'dul ba de ltar blta// dngos po ma lus chos dbyings lasa?// rdul tsam ga yo
352a5(rnying rgyud): med pa ste// nga ni chos dbyings he ru// nges pa'i don dang yi gnas// nga la yul dang phyogs mgub// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa ste// 'di ni nga yi bzhugs pa'i gnas// bskal ba'i zhing brgya mngon spyod kyis// bskal te thugs rdzas mi rtog 'dzin//
352a6(rnying rgyud): gongs rnal 'byor pa la bstan// 'di ni nga yi lung gi gnas// phyogs brgya dregs pa'i bdag po brgya// khro chen badz+ra yi gdan du gsal// nga yi bgrub pa'i gnas zhes bya// 'byung ba dang ni phung po rnams// nga nyid gzhi yi gnas yin no// dman pa'i theg
352a7(rnying rgyud): drang ba'i phyir// 'du shes btsun bsam pa'i gnas// lam lnga dang ni rnal 'byor lnga// 'gro ba'i gnas sung yis bshad// rig dbang stobs lnga brten pa'i gnas// dug lnga rgyad lnga sbyangs pa'i gnas// bdud rtsi sha rnams bsten pa'i gnas// 'di
352b1(rnying rgyud): sa nam// sa la gas// pargya shAs// gas na// dodan pa ma sa/ 'dug sa da // du ga da
352b2(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs rjo// ba dkyis // kyang ningan mtshan pa dang // drugs pa'i dag palta rgyad// tha sa dang sa / ma gyis lapas ma'i
352b3(rnying rgyud): sa panas sangs// brdzus shi // byed// na shAsum gyus d+han// rgyas kyin ya cid // grug da / sa/ smon pa dag ngas med
352b4(rnying rgyud): gas phyog sa/ // ga mas panin mas ma gas
352b5(rnying rgyud): sus sa
352b6(rnying rgyud): na/
352b7(rnying rgyud): na du du na na na su
353a1(rnying rgyud): rgyags me ston dang thal// dam mas ldan sa rnab gtsad// dgasasu du ste sang rnams 'a mas// zhags pas thams gsu dgung nga/ g.yon pa dang pa bang thugan// thugs sa 'am na byabs nga/
353a2(rnying rgyud): zhe du gardos pa'i phung po 'joms// rkyen mongs thab rnyog pa ga nol// sbyis dang d+hIzlab yis// ma rig zin pa'i chogs rnams sil/ der brdegs pad+ma gnon// khrag g-i kyi tshis gnas nas tha// med du las da tshogs rjes/
353a3(rnying rgyud): baT+Ti // btsa d+pa dbyug gi ma na rdzogs// tshemachog dpa' ba'i rgya brgyad ni// grang chen na tshun stobs brgya ldan// dag lags zin las rnams ni bad// rdul ng+gAn gdug pa'i dug rnams 'dus// zhing lpags nyon mongs rgya ba garjod// ra sa
353a4(rnying rgyud): don chags// thal chen mtshan mas phrin las brtson// zhag gi zongs nyon mongs rngub// bskal ba'i med pung rtog rdzogs bsrag/ 'bar ba'i spyan ni dgu phrag gsum// gzigs pas ma lus bdal 'god// lha mo dbang phyug khro mo'i rgyal// zhal gsum phyag rngu/
353a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa la// snang bshang yab kyi phyag mtshan 'dzin// kun nas rab tu bskyod pa'i tshul// snron gyi phrin las ji bzhin du// gnas gsum yul drugasal bar bya// de yi 'dul ba'i las rnams byed // gal te 'dul bar ma nus nA// hUM dz+ha s+pha Na phaH/
353a6(rnying rgyud): sa~MhA Na b+hUM/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he dgaka ma hA tsan d+has rba Sh+T+ri ta/ t+t+wa na ta baT+TiSh+T+ri / badzam thA hrI na rnyed man+toD+hi/ nga ni kun bang tes// che ba nyi mchog dpal gyi ng+ge// dbe ni nyi shu gcig ldan// sa dang ye shes ma lus rdzogs// bzhi' rnguH
353a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis phyag na ni// ji ltar bshad pa'i sangs rgyas ni// bzhi pacu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par bzhugs// zhabs brgyad bzad pas lha chan brgyad// byol song btud dang bcas pa gnon// ti 'dzin ba rgyad ded chos nyid spyong // ngal pa lam nag srid byerang 'ang /
353b1(rnying rgyud): smin mtshams sna phrag glog stong 'gyu// 'bar ba'i spyan ni drug cu gsum// sdang mig zhel gdon cing gzigs// shangs nas 'thor rlung spong zhing 'tshub// snyan nas drag po'i 'brug stong sgrog/ rngams pa'i zhal gyis khams gsum rngub// gnam lcags mtsha
353b2(rnying rgyud): bzangs yag gtsigs// leb rgan lcags 'gril glog stong 'gyu// ba spu Tu lum me stag 'phro// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkhar khyab// dpa' zhing theg la 'jigs su rung // rgod cing gshe la 'jigs par ston// snying rje ngam dung zhi ba'i tshul// 'brang ba'i
353b3(rnying rgyud): 'od kyis phyogs bcur khyab// khro mo 'dod chags ye shes che// he he dges pa'i gzi mdangs can/ rin chen pad+ma rab rgyas la// mnyes pa'i sbyor ba'i rol pa stob// dbu dgus dgu'i rtogs pa 'joms// stong pa bco brgyad phyag dang ldan// g.yas kyi dang po
353b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yis// chos sku 'gyur med tshul gyis bzhugs// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag gsal// dug gsum ma lus stong par gsol// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na// gau rI ma mo brgyad 'phyar zhing // g.yon gyi 'og ma phra men bgrad// zhabs bzhi rigs
353b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi dbyings su gnon// dur khrod dpa' ba'i chos la sogs// ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis srul 'khril// hU~M AHoM hUM phaT AH/ zhes nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor de lta bu'i ded dpon dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams la de ltar
353b6(rnying rgyud): snang bar mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ su'i dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas kun bzang he ru kas+ya// skul ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i phyir// mkha'
353b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings rdo rje byin gyis brlabs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM ldan dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor oM dang lan// chags med pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa thA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hu dza badz+ra swa thA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM dz+ra
354a1(rnying rgyud): gaparlos rdum ga tu ma thog das/ mnga' dong d+ma gzhal lasas// bde can thugs kyid pa la 'dod do// sangs rgyas smin tshogs ma lus la// rabadags mnyam pa'i sbyin pas dzin// yo gta ma lda da
354a2(rnying rgyud): swab+hA wa At+ma ko&trAM/ oM dang ldan pa'i thig le las// skrag sung thugs kyi rdo rje brtsod// hUMgs mkha' la phab byas te// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// mkha' lags la dag nyite ng+ge 'od// sa ma ya hU~M/ sam yan+ta/
354a3(rnying rgyud): chu ba sems kyi sprin tshogs las// khyo bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i dregapa ma lus bskal// A~M badz+ra kro ta bi shwa dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya yad ha dz+wa la hUM phaT/ e h+ye hi ts+tshi ts+tsha s+phar Na phaT/ saM ha / hUM/ /
354a4(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT/ hU~M hrI Sh+T+r-it+taM/ Sh+T+r-iSh+T+r-ib+h+yAM/ hatata/ ha hahaha/ hate/ hi hi tiH/ dza hU~M ba hoH// nga yi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ rang las byung ba gzhan lagasal// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs gzugs 'chang // rigs kyi m-i dzin pa /
354a5(rnying rgyud): lnga n+de ka sha he ru ka/ smrig nag g.yos dkar g.yin dmar zhal// 'khor lo ter khyung chen g.yas// b+han dmar klu zhags bsu g.yon// raka sha kro tI shwa rI yum// 'khor lo stan/ stob cing 'khril// bcom ldan gu hra he ru ka/ ser nag g.yas mthing g.yon dam nas/
354a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen ri rab dgra sta g.yas// thod khrag ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon// pu h+ya krot+ti shwa rI ne// rin chen b+han dmar stong cing 'khril// bcom ldan bi shwa he ruka/ dmar nag g.yas mthing g.yon dkar sku// pad+ma be con dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar ri rang
354a7(rnying rgyud): gshol g.yon// bai shwakro trI shwa d+hi ni// padz+ra thod khrag sto bcing 'thil// bcom ldan ya ga tes// ljang nag g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhal// phyag mar 'gri dag snga ga yas// tan d+ha nags thong gshol g.yon// ya kro trI shA rI ma~M// rgya gra mthod drag
354b1(rnying rgyud): skyob cing sbyor// khro mo'i tshogs 'di thams cad kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis gtso bo'i mdog/ yab yum khro tshogs rnams kyi sku// gtso bo dang mthun chos kyis bstan// rang gi phyogs nas mnyam par bzhugs// gnas mchog de yi phyi ma la
354b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu drig pa 'dul byed pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa bcu// mdog dkar 'khor lo tri shul 'dzin// me dpal dbyug te 'dzin dmar ser// mthing nag thong dbyug dgra sgra thogs// skrag nag ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// grwa gyi phul zhags
354b3(rnying rgyud): thogs pad mar// dmar s+ya b+har+d+ha rda yab thogs// ljang gu rgya gram dril bu thogs// mthing nag dgra sta rtse gsum 'dzin// sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// dud ka tho ba zhags pa thogs// kun kyang zhabs gnyis brkyang bsum gyis// so so'i phyogs
354b4(rnying rgyud): dregs pa gnon// ji ltar 'jug pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// shes rab gshin rje pad+ma dang // stobs chen khro bo chen po bzhi// dkar po 'gugs byed lcags kyu 'dzin// ser po zhags pa 'ching byed cing / lcags zlog sdom byed dmar po ste// rdeg byed dril
354b5(rnying rgyud): can mdog ldang // sprul pa'i sras tshogs 'di rnams kun// rang gi rigs mchog dbu brgyan cing // khro bo'i chas dang nyams kyis mdzes// mkha' la mngon par rkyen gyis dbyung // oM ma hA shrI rak+ta he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA shrI gu ha he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ma hA shrI
354b6(rnying rgyud): shwa he ru ka hUM phaT/ AM ma hA shrI yakrA he rukahU~M phaT/ A~M raka sha kro d+h+we shwa d+hIts+li b+h+yo/ AM ku t+ya kro tI shAng+gIts+tshi b+h+yo/ AM bi shwa kro tI shwarI n+thi d+d+ho/ A~M yag sha kro trI shwa rI hU~M b+h+yo/ oM ma hA kro ta in+da ha ni ha na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro ta a ga ned ha da ha hUM phaT/ A ma
354b7(rnying rgyud): ha ya ma pa~M tsa ba rbo hU~M phaT/ A~M mahA kr-i tA dka shaM b+han+da d+har+tha hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra ma hA kro ta nA ga hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro ta ba ya be tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ A~M ma hA kro ta ya krAts+tshinIts+tshaH hU~M phaT/ A ma hA kro ta bi na ya ke b+hin+de b+hin+dahU~M phaT/ A~M ma hA kr-i ta prah+ma NaH
354b8(rnying rgyud): kho mo kro N+DI dang // khro bo 'akro ng+tha thob kyang brdang rnying sor bzhan
355a1(rnying rgyud): gang theg// // sa pa / zas tu nanasang / ma su dang/
355a2(rnying rgyud): sha ma song/ srog can ni ba sod/ rnaMl rnaMm na song/ shitud snyi byeng ldang/ snying chud thog tshad/ srog tud dbugs stong / ma mtshan ldan med dang / srog 'a rnams pa'i tshogs kun gyis// stong gsum ma lus 'jig rte ga
355a3(rnying rgyud): Ats+tsha hrI Sh+T+rIH/ kA ya wA/ No/ She a d+hi Sh+Tha na A we shA li/ b+hU we sha ya b+h+rU~M/ prad+ha badz+ra traM badz+ra kar+m+ma a b+hiSh+Ti b+h+ya swAH/ dzin hU~M ba~M hoH/ badz+ra dz+nyAn cimi ma d+hal/ e A li dz+dzaH/ sa ma ya ba h+ya hoH/ zhes gsungs nas den che mchog gas rab cha
355a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus shing lus pa med pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba las phyung ste/ khams gsum pa'i sa la snang bar mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtso bo dregs pa can rab tu gdul bar dka' zhing / 'jigs par mi nus padag kyang
355a5(rnying rgyud): sngangs shing skrag nyes la 'gyel nas sgra dadang po 'don cing / yid kyi dmigra pa tsam gyis phyogs brjod dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid gsang ba'i che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ dpal ha ruka la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur to// bcom
355a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par spro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u sna bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma kun bzang
355a7(rnying rgyud): he ru ka/ ma 'o dus kyi sems can rnams// skal ba med cing gdul dka' la// gtsang zhing sme ba'i rtog pas bcings// khyod kyis dam par gsungs pa'i chog/ gshang dang gcib bam pa'i rdzas// rdzogs par longs spyod ma nus na// gtsang sbras grol bar
355b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ram ci// 'jig rten log rtog can rnams la// gsang zhing spyad pa ji lta bu// thabs dang yon tan grub pa'i tshad// mkhyen pa'i thugs rnga dpag med pas// myur du ston cig che ba'i mchog/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // kun tu bzang po ha rugs//
355b2(rnying rgyud): ma lus bshad cing bkrol ba'i dus// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di na// tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// klu dang bram zer gtsang sbrar spyod// des kyang grol bar ngas ma bshad// byol song rtswa mchog gtsang ma za//
355b3(rnying rgyud): srid 'tsho ba'i bar du spyod// de'ang grol bar nga sa ma bshad// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul ba'i sgra// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// don dam nges pa'i lung 'dir nyon// zhes bka' stsal nas/ nyid kyi bugla gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po las 'od zer dpag tu med pa
355b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phro bar mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i rigs rnams dang / mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / de la sogs pa'i klu rnams dang / gzhon nu smin drug
355b5(rnying rgyud): dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dang / ljang sngon dang / g.yon phyogs lha la sogs pa drang srong gi tshogs rnams dang / gzhon nu sprin dang / go'u ta ma dang / gzhon nu log sred la sogs pa bram ze'i cho kla
355b6(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / gzhan yang dri za dang / me lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo so so 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'bra skyong dang / dza ma b+ha la dang / dA shu ba'i bu mo 'od 'chang ma dang / nor gyi rgyun ma dang / rma bya'i mgul la sogs pa shing thog
355b7(rnying rgyud): dang / rtsi thog dang / sman du gyur pa rnams kyi gtsang sbal spyod cing / gzhan yang 'o ma dang / 'bras dang / mngar dang / me tog dang / chu dang / shing thog gi 'bru dang / shu te dang / nye'u shing dang / ra mo shag dang / a ba ru dang / brag rtsi dang
356a1(rnying rgyud): anas lasags pa/ sa la gtsang sbyar spyod pa'o do nas/ brgyad len cing dgang thub dang mangs par spyod pas ngam par byud rnams bang kyang kyi lang bsgrus sa/ thang chub sems dpa' mas dpa can podang ma pa
356a2(rnying rgyud): rnying thar sogs pa rnams ni kun tu bzang ba nyi rug blta bar mi brjod pa rnams kyi snyan par bzhugs nas yang di skad ces bka' stsal te// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi lnga// thabs dang ldan pas rig cing rtog/ chos tid gcig las thadad pade// rig lnga'i macan da
356a3(rnying rgyud): yon tan tshogs// 'di ltar rtogs na grol bar 'gyur// rang bzhin gdong nas dag pa yi// mnyam nyid dbyings su rab rtogs shing // gnyis med don gyis zin pa ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grung // gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa'i yid// mkhas pas gnyis/
356a4(rnying rgyud): musr-i b+ha// ye shes su lja rdzogs pa'i phyir// dI chen gsar mdag rnam snang mdzad// mngon 'thung sprul pa chos kyi sgra// byang chub sems ni dkar ba'i mdog/ dri med dag pa'i ye shes sgra// mangs yid bzhin zin chen 'byung // sna tshogs 'byung ldan
356a5(rnying rgyud): nyi nyid sgra// rat+na chags med dmar byas na// rje med rnam dag pang+gA'i waM// tsan byed ljang 'i mag/ kun du dan grub las shA m+b+ha// lnga ldan sa pa bdud rtsi lta// rang gi zhal yang gis gnas// dri min sring b+ha dang // myangs byang sem
356a6(rnying rgyud): 'di rnams kr-in// sems can rtog pa bzlog pa yi// gtso bar dang da grangs shing brgya'o// martog gcang sa med par bye// rang bzhin rnaMm dag bdud ci la// spyad cing zas pa'i yan tan na// khyo bag dug dang blang thabs dang // mdo dang gas pa lasas
356a7(rnying rgyud): sel// prA lde ye shes lhan gyis thub// a 'bras nun 'bum pa nas// lha rdzas dge ba lis rur// sha rdza zos pa'i yon tan ni// shes rab gas la zhing ting 'dzin brtan// dug lnga 'joms shing mnu stabs che// rdzu 'phrul stabs ldan mnga'
356b1(rnying rgyud): 'gros sa// thang nga chen pa'i dngas grub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i gdung // dkar la gangal la mnapa yang cam// nyan thos rang rtul rnams kyi gdung // sran la ma sha'i 'bras pa tsam// gang 'a gu sems can pal 'a bdung /
356b2(rnying rgyud): tung 'bru til 'bru tsam de nyid// spyad cing bsten pa'i yon tan gyis// rus pa sra ma khreg rdo rjer 'gyur// thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob par byed// sngon tsho nga yi phrin las kyi// thugs rjes dz+wa la de b+ha bsgral// de yi no byang ba'i stan// badz+ra kad
356b3(rnying rgyud): snying khyo sha/ spyi bog nad rnams sel bar byed// mngon shes drug gi sems dang ldan// ye shes drug gi dngos grub thob// me tog so ma 'bras bud dmar// srid pa'i nad sems las rgyas// rtsa ba mA lar k+ta kha// 'khru bag nad rnams gas zhing garjod// da
356b4(rnying rgyud): gidangos grub 'thob par byed// 'byung ba bzhi yi byin rlangs las// sprin chen klog gi gling ba can// sgra dang yud tsam bcas pa yi// swa stengs byung par chang phab nas// bdud rtsi thigs shing zags pa ni// rgyam ma'i wub gangs kyi rtsa// nags kyi mu dang rtswa
356b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs// rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed nas// dmyal ba'i chagang sdug bsngams la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs// sa gzhi yum gyi rang bzhin sa// byang chub sems kyi tshor bab pas// thams cad sbyin cing bangs par mdzad// chu la brgyad las
356b6(rnying rgyud): yis// bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas// rtsab stong pa yal ga dang // lam matog shun pa dang // khrab 'bras bu snying por bcas// ro dang dri dang kha dag la// rtab gcig la yan lag brgyad// yon tan stong dang bcas pa yi// bzhi brgya rtsa ni'i
356b7(rnying rgyud): nadas la zhing // 'gro ba drug gagasas su 'gyur// srid pa chags byed supa shing gis// bdud cing rgya mtsha bsrubs pa las// bdud mi chul po bdud ci gyur// chos bzang lha yi mdun sa nas// rAhral yis brkus te 'thung // bam byin tham tan car
357a1(rnying rgyud): pas// zag zitha bdud rtsis la lhung // bskyed cing sbyin pa lha yi rdzas// dus min 'chi las thang bar byed// mngon shes lha yi dngos grub thob// gser nga dul zangs lugs de bzhin gsu// rin chen bdud rtsi'i thags
357a2(rnying rgyud): shi la dzA tra yo ga si// mchin pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// grub pa'i rig 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// sred med bu dang khyab 'jug gi// de yi zags pa'i dri gshang gci// chu klung gangs kyi 'gram du bye// nye'u shing dang ram nye'u// nang khrol ngo cing nad na
357a3(rnying rgyud): zag pa zad de nam mkhar 'gro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob// dang po srid pa'i bdud rtsil// lha dang lha min rtsod cing 'thab// brgya byin dbang po'i lag pa la// lha ma yin gyis mtshon phog lhung // de ye sha khrag smin cing bskyed// dbang po'i lag dang
357a4(rnying rgyud): lag/ dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya ste// nor dang 'bru rnams 'du bar 'gyur// rta mgrin dbang gi dngos grub thob// yul 'khor srung gi pu bu bo// drang srong yan lag dga' ba ste// ming ni rgyal po gaM shes gnyen can// g+hu su ku ni mchod mdzad// 'dod 'a
357a5(rnying rgyud): yi gtso ngor skyes// bod pa 'phyis pas drag po khros// lha chen de yi dpral ba nas// mig gcig lhag par 'dug pa las// smin cing bskyed pas sa sted khyab// 'bu su lug mig rnam gsum gyi// mig gi mngon shes thob par byed// sa min po 'ang
357a6(rnying rgyud): grub thob// dA yi sngon gyi phrin las kyi// lha chen tshangs pa bsgral ba las// sna nas khrag zag bskyed cing smin// sgyu ma'i 'bras bu srin gyi shing // dri yi mngon shes 'thob par byed// nam mkha' snying po'i dngos grub thob// 'das pa'i dus na sngon
357a7(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin dbang gi phrin las kyis// kha 'bar bzhi yi lce bcad de// sprin zhing bskyed pas bdud rtsir phyor// do ba dang ni gnyi ba dang // lu ba dang ni sa ba bzhi// me tog ma lo ru kr-i dang // gser gyi mdud can ta lo tr-i// smad pas lce yi mngon shes dang //
357b1(rnying rgyud): ngas gzigs kyig 'phang thob// nga yis srin po bum tha bskal// chung ma srin mong mun te// rnab a sho kan tu gyur// spyad pas na pa'i nad rnams sel// sgra yi mngon shes mnga' bar byed// phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// ti la ma bur ma spang gyi dang/
357b2(rnying rgyud): lanAn mar dang snying po lnga// bdud rtsig tu ba'i yan lag ste// rlung ma khris padakan nu se dang // 'dra ba'i nad rnams sel bar byed// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// gos ha dang le seng dang // gti n+ya ti ming he// me tog sngams yon tan gyis// 8nga
357b3(rnying rgyud): mkhris glong nga dug rnams sel// rigs kyi yum lnga'i dngos grubathob// shing thog mun 'brumaka/ ko la// a 'bras pa na 'bras bu lngas// sha khrag rus pa chu ser dang // lus kyi nad rnams sel bar byed// sra gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga 'i

357b6(rnying rgyud): snod ldan su mtshogs par byed// gser dngul zangs lpags g.yudang lnga// dbul zhing spongs pa sal byed cing // rigs sngagrags kyi dngos su thog// rang bzhin spyang ba'i yon tan las// bsrub pa'i yon tan bsam ma khyab// kye mtshangs pa drang srong dang /

358a1(rnying rgyud): ma nyams par bya sa// brgyal rdugs 'dzin pa 'ong la/ dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'o// bka' yidas pa'ang nag/ ma ka'astsal bas/ mangs par nga thongasamags pam ba gas su byung ba gag sa
358a2(rnying rgyud): par 'dzin pa'i longs spyod rnams bshang ba dang gci ba dang byang sems kun+da lta bu dang / pir+b+ba lta bu dang / me dang / rta dang // gyi dang / baglang dang / glang po che'i sha dang / myos par byed pa dbu bcud kyi btung ba rnams kyi rlabs te/ rgya mched chu d+ha das zla dang /
358a3(rnying rgyud): nang nagangal bdang / khyi dang/ bag dang / bang bu'i tshogs rnams kyi sde ba~M dang / khrag gi slong chen po sdang ba kur nas brtsal te/ gtsang ba dang lba ba'i rnab par rtog pa dag pos gzer zhing 'dug pa la/ rang rnyeng gi las dang mdzun par bdul

358b1(rnying rgyud): dang du mngon par sprul ba ste/ don dam par ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong zhing 'dus mthus pa/ bdag med pa/ rnam bzhi pa/ zag pa med pa// kha nam thob med pa'iji gtan las 'das pa/ de bzhin nyid las g.yab med pa las thul pa tsam tra dad
358b2(rnying rgyud): the tshom za bar ma byed cig/ ces dbug dbyung ba mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang drang srong dang bram ze'i tshogs de dag la/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par rol pa chen po mngon du bstan te/ dakhor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis tshangs pa
358b3(rnying rgyud): drang srong la sogs pa de dag la sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar mdzad pas/ de dag thams cad rang gi lus ni rigs kyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs su snang bar gyur la/ ngag gis ni thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin no// zhes
358b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgra rgyun du brjod de/ phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtogs pa las grol zhing / thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings chen por ro gcig par gnas par gyur to// mi gtsang zhing skye ba rdzas kyi dngos po rnams kyang dri dang kha dog dngang phun sum tshogs pa/ lta na sdug cing /
358b5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod kyigatso ba yid bzhin gyi nor buran po ches bu 'dod pa 'don ma lus bathogs pa med par 'grub pa/ dngos srab kyi zhum tham zad pa'i gtong chen por gyur te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs kyi mchad pa mnyes par 'brur cing / rab
358b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i byeng chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yang longs spyo dam pa'i mchog tu gyur / gzhan yang nga'i tshe byang chub sams dpa' 'jam dpa' skyes yang 'di skang kyis smras so// ces rigs kyi bu dag ma 'das pa dus su sems cadag dag bcom ra

359a2(rnying rgyud): thashar gyi bu la sogs pa gza' dang rgyu skar gyi ded dpon chen po rnams dang / g.yon phyogs kyi lha dang rkang gnyis spyod pa la sogs pa gru'i gtso bo dang / thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug la sogs pas don byed do// me lha dang chung lha'i gtso bo khyad rnams ni lo ma dang /
359a3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu las gyur pa rnams longs spyod de/ tri dang ro dang nus mahA dang 'bras bu'i yon tan gyis sems can gyi nad rigs bsal ba'i phyir/ sngon gyi gnas kyi rigs rjes su gzung bar gyis shig/ bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin la sogs pa rnams kyi mesan chen po'i bcud kyi na cis
359a4(rnying rgyud): can gyi rigs kyi mo dang 'a dog dang stobs dang lang tshe bzag dang gzi brjid rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rigs rjes su gzung bar byis shing // 'bras skyong gi bu mo dang / dza mthal dang / de ba tsu'i bu mo dang / lha dang klu'i bu ma rnams kyis ni rang rang gi yongs spyod pa rjes gang gis pa

361a3(rnying rgyud): dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas pad+ma g.yon pa yis// rdo rje Sh+Tha gram pho brang gnon// phred tsam mkhang nub sbyor bste// 'phro 'du byin thabs rabang skal bA// A~M A sarbab rgyan mr-i ta trA~M Sh+T+rIH/ sgra dang 'od kyi brtul zhugs kyis// byang chub sems kyi sbyin tshogs pa
361a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ma lus mnyes par blta// dkyil 'khor bdag po he ru ka'i// snying ga'i 'bru dgu 'od zer gyis// gtso bo'i dbu gtsug lam nas zhugs// ljags kyi dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du mdzad// phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor bcas pa yang // thabs dang shes rapa 'od ldan de//
361a5(rnying rgyud): mo yum gyi zhal sgor 'bab// de nyid he ru ka dpal lo// rigs bzhi dbang mchog khro bcu rnams// yum bcas bde chen gcig tu gyur// slar yang pho brang chen po ru// rigs kyi bdag po rnams su gsal// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// gnas mchog de yi phyogs kun nas// 'od
361a6(rnying rgyud): phud 'bang bas dngos nyid spar// byin gyis rlabs kyis khro tshogs dang // dbang chen yum bzhe sdang bar mdzad// de yi rigs bzhi gsang mchog dang // sku gdung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // rigs bzhi gtso dang 'khor rnams las// 'od sprin steng phyogs 'bar ba las// yum
361a7(rnying rgyud): chen mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil// gsal ba'i zhabs dang gsang ba'i dbyings// dbu ma'i byin rlabs spyi gtsug 'bar// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mthong // 'od byung phyag mtshan tshogs kun gyis// byin phabs ljags kyi sbyor ba las// dbang gi dkyil 'khor yum dang bcas//
361b1(rnying rgyud): yin// de bas rigs kyi bu khyed rnams// nga yis ji ltar bshad pa yi// yon tan chen po 'di long la// dman pa par ma mchog tu gyis// yul dang dngos po sems thun dang // khams dang byed pa las rnams kun// nga lang ban/
361b2(rnying rgyud): pa yongs med pas// de bsang nyid kun tu babang // che ba'i mchog ste mchog tu gyur// ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das dpam che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yin nan ma chags nyubang bsdu pa'i lan+da te bdun pa'o// /
361b3(rnying rgyud): gla tso men he rags// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// khyad par bsgrub brgyal ba'i bka'// snang skyid snang byar shes pa'i sgra// b+hag nyis rkyen gsum las byung ba'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'di// bde chen mnyam nyid
361b4(rnying rgyud): gyi ngang // bdag 'dzin rnam dag shes rab sgra// chags pa kun bral gyi med dbyings// gnyis med don las sna tshogs ston// 'di ni don gyi bdud rtsi'o// ma skyes kun bzang che ba'i mchog/ bde chen klong 'dus dbyings lhag ma// nyon mang
361b5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag rigs kyi gtso// ye shes lnga rdzogs su lngang grub// drug lngar rtog par nga grol ba// 'di ni ming gi bdud rtsi'o// 'dul ba'i thabs mkhas khro bo'i sku// phra chog spyad mdzad 'khor lo'i gsungs// 'chi med las kyi bdud rtsi
361b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rig pa byang chub sems// 'dres dang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// nyon mongs ma rig migatsang nang// chos nyid ye shes nus ngas spong // tshong lugs brgyad ldan chos kyir// shes pa brgyad kyi don bdud rtsi// ldan rnams
361b7(rnying rgyud): bdud bye dmigs pa ste// bsgom pa brgyad kying mdzes so// byinang rlung brgyad thams cad can// bdud bye nyid dum lnga ste// su 'ang nyid rtsa ba bcad// dbyibs dang 'dog gyi dang dang // thabs dang shes rabar dang mdu/
362a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// kun tu bzang po tesa?/ nga ni yon tanag ba ste// che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// 'di la the tshom ma macig/ dman pa'i 'jig rten chos kyis ni// rgyu dang las dang nyan mangs kyi// sdug bsngal phung po skyed pas na// nga yi yor tan/
362a2(rnying rgyud): shes mi 'gyur// log pa'i brtson 'grus shes rab kyis// rags pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dag/ me long rtogs te phra ba min// dka' thub brtul zhugs mchod sbyin dag/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs yod med// nga rgyal snyoms 'jug mngon shes lus// tshe dang skal pa thos zin yang /
362a3(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i sa bon ma zad pas// nga yi yon tan rtogs pa min// rgyun zhugs mi ldog dang rgyal bas// blta dang bsgom pas spang bya ba'i// kun nas ldang par dgra pa tsam// spangs pa'i dgra bcom thob zin kyang // 'gru byed phra mo bag nyal bas// nga yi yon tan ga la rtogs// kun rdzob don//
362a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshul shes pas// shes pa nyid dang nyon mongs pa'i// sgrib byed spangs te ston pa'i sa// rlab chen sos kyang cung tsam las// yang dag mthar thug shes pa min// byA ba lus dragra rab spyod dang // mnyam pa'i gzugs brtan gsum dag gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma snang mod sang // thabs/
362a5(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde chen rides skyongs shing // 'dod pa'i lam laHpa phyogs pas// nga yi yon tan ma mthong ngo // gang dag chags sogs skyed pa'i gzhi// rigs gcig pa dang thadad dang // nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ rang gi de nyid yongs shes shing // ba/
362a6(rnying rgyud): chags dang bcas kun gyi gzhi// rnam par shes pa'i yul tshogs rnams// zag bcas zag med 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das// dbang po'i longs spyod yul gyur rnams// de nyid shes pas yongs bgrub pa// nga yi yon tan mthong ba yin// nam mkha'i
362a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ji bzhin du// bcing ba med cing grol ba yang med// dpyir ma mtha' gnyis mi gnas shing // chags mid chags dang bral ba med// rnal 'byor bzhi dang sku lnga dang // ye shes srin las ma sbas pa// sngang sang tshul gyis sdang ba de// nga yi yon tan shes pa
362b1(rnying rgyud): mam
362b2(rnying rgyud): ma // gong ma pa dang / / sa byu // rgyun sman gas+ho// ma / rgyu 'o// ga nas/ shA
362b3(rnying rgyud): phrin las rgyun bdapa'as// 'od dang brji ngapa// rgyum 'gazugs pa rtson par byed// ming du m-i na zugags min/ sa pa rgyam ma ra/ gal tu tshul ba mthang na// nan ga ra shed da/
362b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra zhing gling ba nga// sa napa kyim mr-i ta A sham pa 'osan ma Sh+Ta/ hA ya d+hi Sh+Tha bya lwa la b+h+ya mardza the byab / mthos pa ma yin la hrI Sh+T+rI TI/ rdo rje rlob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis// ma do rtagasam bar bya/
362b5(rnying rgyud): kA ya~M A tsit+tam hAs ma ya // rdo rdo rgyal pad+ma yis ni// yid bzhin po tha~Mng de la bstan// A~M A trA~M ma n+tha shrI ha~M nA~M/ bau d+hI bA d+hiH/ sab pa mA sa mr-i ta~M oM ti Shi mA ma bi shA ya~M isaH/ srog gi snying po rgyad gsum po// gnas gsum byang na ba sems la d+hi // oM ma mazab mas
362b6(rnying rgyud): yaM wA k+Sha tsidz+haiM A yu pha la sid+d+hi thAM/ mkha' dbyings phyag rgya che ba'i mchog/ dpal kyi mchog gtum pa dkrol// pad+ma sa me ye pra br-i sha ya phaT/ don dam gnyis med theg le las// bu gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur// mahA gr-ir+dz+dza kA ya wAka tsi/ sid+d+ha pa~Mt+taM dz+dzaHd+d+he/ thams cad mkha
362b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ste// kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan mgrub// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rim pa'i don la 'jug par byas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang bskur spyod yul dam pa ste// dam tshig phrug rgya srung ba'i mchog/ bsod nams mchog tu phyin pa ste// blar
362b8(rnying rgyud): med pa myur dri 'grub// dengos khyod kyis brjon pa gyis// zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rgya ba'i rgyud las/ dram chog chen po byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs yang drag par bsdu ba'i ladra hU~M drug pa// // de nas gtsacan te dregs// 'dzum
363a1(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs nya dang // yon tan zin las yan lagago/ dang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid sa// dus gsum de nyid shes par byed// bdud pazhinyan mongs nad 'jams sal/
363a2(rnying rgyud): shi 'du 'bral med pa'i don// bsdu myod da mchog phrin las dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i lung // phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba dang // sems dang sems nyid chos dang ni// chos nyid gsang bde nyid // bde da jug
363a3(rnying rgyud): dang // 'khor 'das chos dang gtsang mi gtsang // mog rtog spang len lam du rdzogs// sbyor ba'i don du dkyil 'khor brgyad// mnyam nyid thugs chung klong du bzhag/ lce 'chi med cing ma bcos la// phung po sde'i lnga ye shes bya// rang byung kun
363a4(rnying rgyud): pa zar yab yum ste// 'di ni dag pa'i dgongs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal tshe mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa'i khyad par nye bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gtso tshan he ru kas/
363a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// spyi dang khyad par bye brag gis// yongs su rdzogs dang so so yi// nus pa gcig pur dbyung ba'i phyir// dam tshig rtsa pa rnam pa lnga// yan 'gayen yon bcas pa ni// nga yis sngang bshad de dag las/
363a6(rnying rgyud): rang gi rigs mthun gnyen po dang // grogs dang skyob kyi khyad par las// rgyal po blon po dmangs lta bu// skad cig thug brad bstan pa yis// tshe ring nad med bde ba dang // yang tshe kha dog stobs dang gzi// 'phel zhing dbang po rig pa
363a7(rnying rgyud): gsal// mkha' la 'gro zhing pha rol gyi// nus stabs gnod pas mi tshugs shing // kun gyis bkur sti'i 'os su mthong // khams kyi zas dang ma 'brel zhing // gos med mkha' lagaceng bur spyod// sngon gyi rgyal ba chernams
363b1(rnying rgyud): ci// rig pa 'dzin pa'i grul thob 'gyur// de nyid ma reg par du yang // nad dang rmugs mi tshogs shing // bar mi bskal pa 'jigs las nAr// gzhan la phun pa sgrub la sogs// yon tan chen po dpag med 'an //
363b2(rnying rgyud): bas nal 'byor gyi rnams kyis// dadang sangs rgyas thams cad ci// gsung bzhin spyar du 'byed par klubs// kun bzang dang rigs lnga yis// bzlas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' 'di 'ang mdapang rngon pa
363b3(rnying rgyud): tshangs dang 'jog po li tsats+yai// drang srong bram ze rjes gzung phyir// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin long la// dam rjes su bsrub par gyis// byastan pa 'di bzhin gang bsrub pa// 'khrul ba'i rnam rtog 'ching ba las// 'di la
363b4(rnying rgyud): du ni grol bar 'gyur// da lta thub pa chen po yis// 'dzam du gling gis yis char// tshul 'di nyid kyisu bstan gyur kyang // blod min skal bzhan pa yis// gtsang sbra dka' thub rkyong bar rto// sangs rgyas
363b5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi bstan pa gcig/ gsung gcig dag gis nges bstan kyang // rang gi rnam pa'i tshul gyis go// 'di ni bdag gi don spyod ces// mthun pa'i gdul g+ha ba cig paste// de bas rig pa 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa
363b6(rnying rgyud): ldan po byed na mas kyis// gal gang gis 'dul ba yis// rigu chen gnyen po de zung la// lha dang drang srong bram ze dang // mkhan po slob dponas byad kyis// nus pa gang yin de nyid lnga// ji ltar 'dul ba de ston cig
363b7(rnying rgyud): phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag na// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di la// mos dang mi mos 'dul mi 'dul// tha dad so sor 'byung 'gyur te// gas shing bstan pa'i tshul de nyid// skad cig dus la rig par gyis// zhes gsungs nas
364a1(rnying rgyud): sa sto sa sa pa na na ma na ngas sbru gas pa / ma pa dgas ma sa /
364a2(rnying rgyud): ba me sa sems sa pa shi med pa bung da// mayod pa gtugs pa'i 'dus pa'i dam ded de zug gas gas pa da ma pa zhin// rnam da pa ngas ma
364a3(rnying rgyud): sa / bye
364a4(rnying rgyud): sa pastan dngas/ du shes sas ma ba pa nyid cing 'drag pa/ bcom ldan 'dab dpa cig ngas lan ba cung las ngang chubazhi pan gag pa dngas su pan sa
364a5(rnying rgyud): thu sa mya pa gas/ ga kyim ma mi ni nang 'dra byung ngadang / nga bya chu ba 'a bdag gis 'acu gan 'ang bar/
364a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// / gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya chu rmya
